Kubʼij chkech: «Rumal rech che xa jubʼiqʼ ri ikojonik kʼolik, kcha chkech. Ri in kinbʼij chiwech, weta kʼo ikojobʼal ix jacha jun nitzʼalaj ijaʼ, ri ix kibʼij na kʼu waʼ chrech we juyubʼ riʼ: Jat bʼi chiriʼ chi kʼa jaleʼ, kbʼe riʼ, e man kʼo ta jun jasach riʼ che ri mata kʼo ri ikowinem chrech».
Ri eʼareʼ kimulim kibʼ pa ri Galileʼa. Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Ri ukʼojol ri achi kjachitaj na pa ri kiqʼabʼ ri winaq,
kkikamisaj na riʼ, e pa ri urox qʼij kkʼastaj na uwach riʼ». E ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj kebʼisonik.
Aretaq chiʼ keʼok pa Kafarnaʼum, ri kkimol ri kebʼ drakmas keqibʼ ukoq rukʼ ri Luʼ e kkibʼij chrech: «Ri iwajtij, ¿la man kutoj ta ri kebʼ drakmas?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «Qastzij nakʼut». Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ kopan cho ja, are nabʼe ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas kachomaj Simon? Ri erajawibʼal ri uwachulew, ¿jachin taq chkech kkita wi ri alkabʼal, on ri kuchuj; chkech ri kalkʼuwaʼl on chkech ri ekaxlan taq winaq?».
Aretaq chiʼ kubʼij ri areʼ: «Chkech ri ekaxlan taq winaq», ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri eʼalkʼuwaʼlxelabʼ, man kkitoj ta riʼ,
kʼatekʼut arech man kabʼan ta kʼax chkech, jat pa ri polow, jakʼyaqaʼ ri chapabʼal kär, e chachapaʼ ri nabʼe kär che kel uloq, chapochʼoʼ ri uchiʼ: kʼatekʼuriʼ kariq riʼ jun estater; chakʼamaʼ uloq e chatojoʼ rukʼ weriʼ ri alkabʼal rajawaxik kintoj ri in e ri alkabʼal rajawaxik katoj ri at».
Pa we jun kajbʼal riʼ, keqebʼ ukoq ri etijoxelabʼ rukʼ ri Jesus kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jachin bʼaʼ ri nimalaj ubʼanik pa ri rajawibʼal ri kaj?».
Ri areʼ kusikʼij jun alaj akʼal e kuyaʼ panikʼaj chkech
kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij: «Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, we ri ix man kikʼex ta iwibʼ e we man kibʼan iwibʼ ri ix, ix jeʼ jas ri eʼakʼalabʼ, man kixok ta riʼ pa ri rajawibʼal ri kaj.
Jachin ri kunitzʼirisaj na ribʼ jeʼ jas we alaj akʼal riʼ, are areʼ riʼ ri nimalaj ubʼanik pa ri rajawibʼal ri kaj».
«E Jachin kukʼulaj jun alaj akʼal jeʼ jas we areʼ riʼ rumal ri nubʼiʼ ri in, in ri kinukʼulaj.
Kʼatekʼut, ri jun winaq che kutzaq ri uchomanik jun alaj akʼal che kkojon chwech ri in, are utz riʼ chrech, che kokisax che ri uqul jun chkech ri nimalaj taq abʼaj che kkisilobʼisaj ri ebʼurix, e kjut ubʼi pa ri nim polow.
¡Kʼax rech ri uwachulew rumal ri jastaq che kutzaq ri uchomanik! Rajawaxik che kpe ri kutzaq ri chomanik, kʼatekʼut kʼax rech ri jun winaq che are kbʼanowik kkitzaq ri kichomabʼal ri winaq!».
«Jeriʼ nakʼut, we rumal ri aqʼabʼ katmakunik, chaketaʼ ubʼik e chakʼyaqaʼ ubʼi naj chawech: are utz riʼ chawech che kuʼt aqʼabʼ on kuʼt awaqan katok pa ri kʼaslemal chuwach che katkʼyaq ubʼi rukʼ ri kebʼ aqʼabʼ e rukʼ ri kebʼ awaqan pa ri junaliklaj qʼaqʼ.
E we rumal ri awoqʼoch katmakunik, chakʼotoʼ ubʼik e chakʼyaqaʼ ubʼi naj chawech: are utz riʼ chawech che attzoqʼ katok pa ri kʼaslemal chuwach ri katkʼyaq ubʼi rukʼ ri kebʼ awoqʼoch pa ri Kʼeqbʼal Mes rech ri qʼaqʼ».
«Miwetzelaj uwach jun chkech we taq enitzʼ riʼ: rumal rech che ri eʼanjel che kech eʼareʼ chikaj, ronojel qʼij kkil uwach ri Nutat chikaj».
«¿Jas kichomaj ri ix? We jun achi ekʼo okʼal uchij, kʼatekʼuriʼ ksach jun chkech, ¿la man keʼuya ta kan riʼ ri jumuchʼ bʼelejlajuj cho ri juyubʼ arech kbʼe che utzukuxik ri jun che sachinaq?
E we kuriqaʼ, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech che sibʼalaj kkiʼkotik chi na riʼ rumal ri areʼ, chuwach ri ejumuchʼ bʼelejlajuj che man esachinaq taj.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, man urayibʼal ta ri Itat chikaj, che ksachik, knebʼaʼ xaq jun chkixoʼl we taq enitzʼ riʼ».
«We kmakun ri awachalal, jat e jariqaʼ awibʼ rukʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ chayajaʼ ri areʼ pa itukel wi xuwi ri at e ri areʼ. We kuta ri atzij kachʼak riʼ ri awachalal.
We ri areʼ man kuta ta ri atzij, chakʼamaʼ ubʼi awukʼ rukʼ jun chik on ekebʼ chik arech ekebʼ oxibʼ eqʼataltzij, kkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun jas uwach.
We ri areʼ, man kraj taj kuta ri kitzij, chabʼij bʼaʼ weriʼ chkech ri komon. E we xoqujeʼ man kuta taj ri kitzij ri komon, chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, che ri areʼ, jun chkixoʼl ri ma junam ta qakojonik kukʼ e jun chkech ri eʼajtoqʼinelabʼ chawach».
«Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech: Ronojel jas uwach che ri ix kiyutu chuwachulew, kayuttajik chikaj, e ronojel jas uwach che kikiro chuwachulew kkiritajik chikaj».
«Xoqujeʼ, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, che we ekebʼ chiwech ix cho ri uwachulew, kkijunamatisaj ri kichʼabʼal, arech kkita chwech jun jas uwach, xaq apas ta neʼ, weriʼ kyaʼtaj na riʼ chkech rumal ri nutat che kʼo chikaj.
Jeʼ ne riʼ, aretaq chiʼ ekʼo kebʼ, ekʼo oxibʼ, junam kimulim kibʼ pa ri nubʼiʼ, ri in, in kʼo riʼ kukʼ chilaʼ».
Chi chanim kqibʼ ukoq ri Luʼ e kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿joropaʼ mul rajawaxik che kinsach umak ri wachalal che kmakun chnuwach? ¿La wuqubʼ mul?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Man kinbʼij ta wuqubʼ mul chawech, areʼ kʼut kinbʼij oxkʼal lajuj mul wuqubʼ».
«Rumal kʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri rajawibʼal ri kaj jeʼ jas jun ajawinel che xraj xrajilaj ri pwaq kukʼ ri eʼupataninelabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xumajij rejalaxik, xkʼam ubʼi chrech jun ajpataninel che lajuj mil talentos ri ukʼas.
Ri jun achi riʼ, man kkowin ta che utojik, rumal kʼuriʼ ri ajaw xtaqanik, arech kkʼayix ri areʼ, ri rixoqil, ri eralkʼuwaʼl e ronojel ri ujastaq, arech are kokisaxik tojbʼal ri ukʼas.
Chi chanim ri ajpataninel kukʼyaq ribʼ cho ri raqan e uqasam upalaj cho ri ulew, kubʼij chrech: “Chayaʼaʼ kebʼ oxibʼ ikʼ chwech, kʼatekʼuriʼ ronojel kintoj na riʼ chawech”.
Ri ajaw kutoqʼobʼisaj uwach ri jun ajpataninel riʼ, kutzaqapij kanoq e kuchupʼ kan ri ukʼas.
Aretaq chiʼ xel ubʼik, ri jun ajpataninel riʼ xuriq jun rachiʼl che okʼal denariʼos ukʼas rukʼ. Xuchapo e upitzʼem che ri uqul kubʼij chrech: “Chayaʼaʼ kan chwech ronojel ri akʼas”.
Ri jun rachiʼl kukʼyaq ribʼ cho ri raqan e sibʼalaj kukʼomij chrech: “Chayaʼaʼ kebʼ oxibʼ ikʼ chwech, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinya na riʼ chawech”.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ, man xraj taj, are xbʼek, e xukojoʼ kan ri jun chik pa ri cheʼ chi kʼateʼ kutoj na ronojel ri ukʼas.
Aretaq chiʼ ri erachiʼl kkil weriʼ, sibʼalaj kebʼisonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kebʼekibʼij chrech ri kajaw ronojel ri xkʼulumatajik.
Chi chanim ri ajaw xtaqan chrech usikʼixik e kubʼij chrech: “Itzel ajpataninel, ri in, ronojel ri akʼas xinchupu, rumal che ri at sibʼalaj xata chwech;
¿la man rajawaxik ta kʼut, che xoqujeʼ ri at xatoqʼobʼisaj uwach ri awachiʼl jeʼ jas xintoqʼobʼisaj awach ri at?”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ri royowal, ri ajaw xujach chkech ri eʼajmayur chi kʼateʼ kutoj na ronojel ri ukʼas.
Jewaʼ jas weriʼ kubʼan na chiwech ri ix, ri Nutat chikaj, we man rukʼ ta ronojel iwanimaʼ kisach chkijujunal ri kimak ri iwachalal».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus kukʼis ri ucholajil we tzij riʼ, kel ubʼi pa ri Galileʼa e kbʼe ubʼik pa ri utinimit ri Judeʼa, chʼaqap chrech ri Jordan.
Sibʼalaj ewinaq kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ, e xeʼukunaj chilaʼ.
Ejujun fariseʼo keqibʼ ukoq rukʼ e kkibʼij chrech arech kkikoj ri areʼ pa kʼax: «¿La yatʼalik che jun achi kuya kan ri rixoqil, xaq apas rumal neʼ?».
Kubʼij: «¿La man isikʼim taj che ri Tikonel kʼiysanel, chi pa ri utikbʼal uloq ri uwachulew, xeʼutik ri eʼareʼ chi achi e chi ixoq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ xubʼij: Jeʼ, ri achi kuya na kan ri unan e ri utat arech kukʼam ribʼ rukʼ ri rixoqil e chi ekebʼ kkitunabʼa na kibʼ e xaq ejun bʼaqilal chi ri?.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ man ekebʼ ta chi riʼ, xa ejun bʼaqilal chi riʼ. Xa jeʼkʼuriʼ, ri junam xutunabʼa raqan uqʼabʼ ri Dyos, man yaʼtal ta chrech ri achi kujach uwach».
Kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas kʼu che, che ri Moʼises xtaqanik, arech kya ri wuj jawiʼ tzʼibʼatal wi ri jachoj ibʼ e kjach kanoq?».
Kubʼij chkech: «Ri Moʼises xuya bʼe weriʼ chiwech, rumal rech che ri iwanimaʼ jeʼ jas jun abʼaj, kʼatekʼut pa ri nabʼe kanoq, man jeriʼ taj.
Jeʼ, kinbʼij chiwech; ri jun achi che kuya kan ri rixoqil –man rumal taj che ri areʼ kech nim chʼutiʼn– e kkʼuliʼ rukʼ jun ixoq chik, kubʼan jun makaj riʼ rukʼ ixoq».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «We are waʼ ri ubʼantajik ri reqaʼn ri achi rukʼ ri rixoqil, man utz ta riʼ kkʼuliʼk».
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Man konojel ta ri winaq kkichʼobʼ ubʼeʼal we tzij riʼ, xuwi ri enikʼaj che yaʼtal chkech kkichʼobʼo.
Rumal che ekʼo emenchoʼr che ejeriʼ uloq tzi chu kisantil uloq, e ekʼo emenchoʼr che xa ibʼanom kumal ri achijabʼ, xoquje ekʼo nikʼaj che xas eʼare ri eʼareʼ kkibʼan kibʼ emenchoʼr rumal ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj. Jachin kkowin che uchʼobʼik weriʼ, chuchʼobʼoʼ bʼaʼ».
Kʼatekʼut, kekʼam ubʼi enikʼaj akʼalabʼ chrech arech kuya ri uqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ e arech kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pakiwiʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kekiyajyatej ri etijoxelabʼ.
Chi xaqbʼiʼ kubʼij ri Jesus chkech: «Chiyaʼaʼ bʼe chkech we akʼalabʼ riʼ che kepe wukʼ e meʼiqʼilo che kepe wukʼ, rumal rech che ejachin taq ejeriʼ jacha we akʼalabʼ riʼ, kech ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj».
Chi chanim kuya ri uqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kel bʼi chilaʼ riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun achi kqet ukoq rukʼ e kubʼij chrech: «Ajtij, ¿su ri utz kinbʼan na ri in arech kinriq na junalik kʼaslemal?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «¿Suche rech kata chwech puwiʼ ri utz? Xa jun ri Utz. We kawaj katok pa ri kʼaslemal chaterneʼbʼej taq ri pixabʼ».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «¿Jachike taq kʼut ri pixabʼ?». Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Matkamsanik, matmakun rukʼ ixoq achi, matelaqʼanik, mabʼan itzel qʼatojtzij,
nim cheʼawilaʼ wi ri anan atat, e chaloqʼoqʼej ri awajil atzʼaqʼat jeʼ jas kaloqʼoqʼej awibʼ ri at».
Ri ala kubʼij chrech: «Ronojel weriʼ nubʼanom; su ri kraj na majaʼ kinbʼano?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «We kawaj che at tzʼaqatlaj winaq, jat, jaʼkʼayij ri ajastaq kʼolik e chayaʼaʼ chkech ri emebʼaʼibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kakʼojiʼ jun nimalaj aqʼinomal chikaj; kʼatekʼuriʼ chatpetoq e chinaterneʼbʼej ri in».
Aretaq chiʼ ri ala kuta we tzij riʼ, kbʼisonik kbʼek rumal rech che ri areʼ kʼo sibʼalaj umebʼil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, sibʼalaj kʼax arech jun qʼinom winaq kok pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj.
Jeʼ nakʼut, kinkamulij ubʼixik chiwech, are man kʼax ta rokem jun kameyo pa ri uteqʼ jun bʼaqʼ chuwach ri jun qʼinom winaq che kok pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos!».
Aretaq chiʼ ri etijoxelabʼ kkita weriʼ, sibʼalaj ksach chi na kikʼuʼx e kkibʼij: «We jeriʼ, ¿jachin kʼuriʼ kkoltaj na?».
Ri Jesus, sibʼalaj keʼukaʼyej e kubʼij chkech: «Chkiwach ri winaq man kowinem ta rij weriʼ, kʼatekʼut chuwach ri Dyos ronojel kowinem rij».
Chi xaqbʼiʼ ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Kawil yaʼ, ri uj ronojel ri qajastaq xqaya kanoq, e atqaterneʼbʼem ri at, ¿Su kʼuriʼ ri kqechbʼej na?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri ix xiniterneʼbʼej: pa ri kʼakʼ uwachulew, aretaq chiʼ ri ukʼojol ri achi katʼuyiʼ na cho ri nimalaj utem pa ri Uqʼij, xoqujeʼ ri ix kixtʼuyiʼ na cho kabʼlajuj nimalaj taq tem, tekʼuriʼ kibʼan na qʼatojtzij riʼ pakiwiʼ ri ekabʼlajuj ujuqʼat ri Israʼel.
E ri areʼ che uyaʼom kanoq ri rachoch, ri erachalal, ri eʼunan eʼutat, ri eralkʼuwaʼl, on rulew neʼ rumal ri nubʼiʼ ri in, kukʼam na riʼ sibʼalaj ujastaq e krechbʼej na ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal».
«Kʼatekʼut, ekʼi winaq che enabʼe, eʼare ekʼisbʼal kan riʼ, e ekʼi winaq che ekʼisbʼal kanoq, eʼare enabʼe riʼ».
«Jeriʼ nakʼut, ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj kjunamataj rukʼ jun ajaw che xel ubʼik che kitzukuxik eʼajchakibʼ aretaq chiʼ ksaqar uwachulew, arech kechakun pa ri rulew tikonbʼal uva.
Kubʼij chkech ri eʼajchakibʼ che kuya na jun denariʼo chkech tojbʼal ri kiqʼij e keʼutaq ubʼi pa ri rulew.
Kel chi bʼi jumul pa ri urox kajbʼal, keril enikʼaj chik pa ri kʼayibʼal che ma kʼo ta kichak.
Kubʼij chkech: “Xoqujeʼ ri ix, jix pa ri wulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz itojik riʼ kinbʼano”.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ kebʼek. Kel chi ubʼi jumul pa ri uwaq kajbʼal e pa ri ubʼelej kajbʼal e xoqujeʼ junam kubʼano.
Xoqujeʼ xel ubʼik pa ri juʼlajuj kajbʼal e aretaq chiʼ keʼuriqaʼ enikʼaj chik che ekʼo chilaʼ, kubʼij chkech: “¿Suche rech, che ixtakʼal jun qʼij waral e man kixchakun taj?”.
Kkibʼij chrech: “Rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun uyaʼom jun qachak”. Kubʼij chkech: “Xoqujeʼ ri ix, jix pa ri wulew”.
Aretaq chiʼ kqaj ri qʼij, ri rajaw ri ulew kubʼij chrech ri umortoʼm: “Cheʼasikʼij ri eʼajchakʼibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chatojoʼ ri kiqʼij chkech. Chamajij kukʼ ri ekʼisbʼal taq ajchakibʼ, keʼakʼisbʼej kanoq ri enabʼe”.
Kepe kʼut ri eʼajchakibʼ rech ri ujuʼlajuj kajbʼal e jun denariʼo ri kitojbʼal kkikʼamo.
Aretaq chiʼ kepe ri enabʼe, kkichomaj che nim chi na ri kitojbʼal kkikʼam chkiwach ri enikʼaj chik. Kʼatekʼut, xoqujeʼ jun denariʼo ri kitojbʼal kkikʼamo.
Aretaq chiʼ kkikʼamo, kewixwatik chrech ri ajaw:
“We ekʼisbʼal taq ajchakibʼ riʼ, xa jun kajbʼal xechakunik, e keʼatojo jeʼ jas ri kujatoj ri uj, e ri uj xqaqʼiʼ ri ukʼaxkʼolil e ri uqʼaqʼal we jun qʼij riʼ?”.
Chi chanim kubʼij chrech we jun ajchak chkixoʼl riʼ: “Wachiʼl, man kʼo ta jun itzel kinbʼan chawech: ¿La man xujkanaj taj che jun denariʼo ri atojbʼal kinya chawech?
Chachapaʼ ri atojbʼal e jat ubʼik. Chnuwach ri in, kinwaj kinya chrech we jun kʼisbʼal riʼ junam jas ri kinya chawech ri at:
¿La man kuya taj kinbʼan rukʼ ri nupwaq jas ri kinwaj ri in kinbʼano? On ¿la itzel kinawilo rumal che ri in, in Utz winaq?”.
Jeriʼ nakʼut, ri ekʼisbʼal kanoq eʼare enabʼe riʼ, e ri enabʼe, eʼare ekʼisbʼal kan riʼ».
Ibʼenaq, tajin kepaqiʼ pa Jerusalem, keʼukʼam ubʼi pa kitukel ri ekabʼlajuj, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech pa ri bʼe:
«Chiwilampeʼ, kamik riʼ tajin kujpaqiʼ pa ri Jerusalem, e ri ukʼojol ri achi kjachitaj na riʼ pa kiqʼabʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ, e ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ; kamikal ri qʼatojtzij kkibʼan na puwiʼ ri areʼ,
kjachitaj na pa kiqʼabʼ ri ma junam ta kikojbʼal qukʼ, arech ri eʼareʼ kketzelaj na uwach, kkichʼiy na, e kkikoj na cho ri ripbʼal; kʼatekʼuriʼ, chuʼrox qʼij kkʼastaj na uwach riʼ».
Tekʼuriʼ, chi chanim kqet ukoq rukʼ ri areʼ ri kinan ri eʼukʼojol ri Sebʼedeʼo, achiʼlam kumal ri eral, kumej ribʼ chuwach jeʼ jas kʼo jun kuta chrech.
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas kawaj?». Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «Chattaqan bʼaʼ arech we ekebʼ wal riʼ, ketʼuyiʼk, jun pa ri awikyaqʼabʼ e jun pa ri amox, pa ri awajawibʼal».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri ix man kichʼobʼ taj jas ri katajin kitaʼo. ¿La kixkowin chech uqumuxik ri qumubʼal amajaʼ che kinqumuj na riʼ ri in?». Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jeʼ kujkowinik?».
Kubʼij chkech: «Kixqumum na riʼ pa ri nuqumubʼal amajaʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri tʼuyulem pa ri wikyaqʼabʼ on pa ri numox, man pa nuqʼabʼ ta ri in kʼo wi ri uyaʼik, weriʼ kyaʼtaj na chkech ri ejachintaq usukʼumam apanoq ri nutat chkech».
Ri elajuj chik, aretaq chiʼ kkita weriʼ, kpe koyowal chkech ri ekebʼ achalaxik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus keʼusikʼij rukʼ e kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix, iwetaʼm che ri ekʼamal taq bʼe chkech taq ri amaqʼ, kekitakʼalbʼej jacha exuwi eʼajawibʼ chkech, e ri ekinimal kekipitzʼobʼej rukʼ ri kikowinem.
Man kuya taj che jeriʼ chixoʼl ri ix, kʼatekʼut, jachin ri kraj are nim ubʼantajik chixoʼl ri ix, are okoq che ipatanijel.
E jachin ri kraj che are nabʼe chixoʼl ri ix, chuyutuʼ bʼaʼ ribʼ che ipatanaxik.
Jeriʼ ri ukʼojol ri achi che man petinaq ta uloq arech kpatanaxik, ri areʼ, are keʼulpataninoq e are kuljachaʼ ri ukʼaslemal arech kitojbʼal ekʼi winaq».
Aretaq chiʼ kel ubʼi pa ri Jeriko, sibʼalaj winaq kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ekebʼ moy che etʼuyul chuchiʼ ri bʼe, aretaq chiʼ kkito che ri Jesus katajin kqʼaxik, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «Ajawxel, chatoqʼobʼisaj qawach, ukʼojol ri David».
Ri winaq keʼkiyajyatej arech kkitzʼapij kichiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj ko chi na kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «Ajawxel, chatoqʼobʼisaj qawach, ukʼojol ri David!».
Ri Jesus ktakʼiʼk, keʼusikʼij e kubʼij chkech: «¿Jas ri kiwaj kinbʼan chiwech?». Kkibʼij chrech:
«Ajawxel, ¡kqaj kujaq ribʼ ri qawoqʼoch!».
Ri Jesus kutoqʼobʼisaj kiwach, kuchap ukoq ri kiwoqʼoch, tekʼuriʼ, chi xaqbʼiʼ kʼakʼ chi ri kiwoqʼoch. E kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ naqaj chik ekʼo wi chrech ri Jerusalem, keʼopan pa Bʼetfage, chuxukut ri juyubʼ Olivo, ri Jesus keʼutaq ubʼi ekebʼ chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ.
Kubʼij chkech: «Jix pa le tinimit che kʼo apanoq chiwach. E chi chanim, keriqaʼ na jun atiʼt bʼurix che yuqulik e jun alaj bʼurix chik che kʼo naqaj chrech. Cheʼikiraʼ uloq e cheʼikʼamaʼ uloq chwech.
E we kʼo jun winaq kʼo kubʼij chiwech, chibʼij bʼaʼ chrech: “Are ri Ajawxel kajawataj chrech, e chi ukamik keʼutzalijsaj uloq waral”».
Weriʼ kkʼulmatajik arech qastzij kbʼantaj ri utzij ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos:
Chibʼij chrech ri umiʼal ri Siʼon: Chi uchanim riʼ, ri awajawinel petinaq uloq awukʼ, kwononik e ukejbʼem jun atiʼt bʼurix, e jun alaj bʼurix, che ral chikop rech eqaʼn.
Kebʼe nakʼut ri etijoxelabʼ, e kkibʼano jeʼ jas xeʼutaq ri Jesus chrech.
Kakikʼam uloq ri jun atiʼt bʼurix e ri jun alaj bʼurix. Kkikoj ri kiqʼuʼ chrij e ri Jesus ktʼuyiʼ chrij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq kkilikʼ taq ri kiqʼuʼ pa ri bʼe. E kʼo nikʼaj chik kkiqʼip apan uqʼabʼ taq cheʼ che kkilikʼ pa ri bʼe.
E ri winaq che enabʼejinaq e ri eteren kanoq, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «¡Hosanna chrech ri ukʼojol ri David! ¡Tewchuʼtalik ri petinaq uloq pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel! ¡Hosanna chilaʼ pa ri nimalaj kaj!».
Aretaq chiʼ kok ri areʼ pa ri Jerusalem, konojel ri siwan tinimit xewaʼalaj uloq. Kkibʼij: «¿Jachin waʼ we areʼ riʼ?»,
e kʼu ri winaq kkibʼij: «Are waʼ we areʼ riʼ Jesus qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, Ajnasaret rech Galileʼa».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kok pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, e keʼeresaj uloq konojel ri kekʼayinik e ri keloqʼomik chilaʼ: kukʼyaq ubʼi ri kimexa ri ekʼexal taq pwaq e ri kitem ri ekʼayil taq palomax.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Tzʼibʼatalik: Ri wachoch kbʼix na chrech, ja rech chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼut, ri ix ibʼanom jun kikʼolibʼal elaqʼomabʼ chrech!».
Xoqujeʼ pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, kepe rukʼ ri areʼ enikʼaj moyibʼ, enikʼaj takmaʼyibʼ e keʼukunaj ri eʼareʼ.
Ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri etzʼibʼanelabʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri jastaq che kubʼano, e aretaq chiʼ keʼkil ri akʼalabʼ che kkiraqaqej kichiʼ pa ri rachoch ri Dyos: «¡Hosanna chrech ri ukʼojol ri David!», ri eʼareʼ kpe koyowal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿La kataʼo ri tzij kkibʼij we winaq riʼ?». –«Kintaʼo, kcha ri Jesus; kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: ¿La man kʼo ta jumul isikʼim ri wuj riʼ: Pa ri kichiʼ ri akʼalabʼ e pa ri kichiʼ ri enuchʼ, xasukʼumaj ri bʼixobʼal nim aqʼij?».
Keʼuya kanoq, kel ubʼi pa ri tinimit, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kbʼe ubʼi pa ri Bʼetaniʼa, e chilaʼ kuqʼaxaj wi ri aqʼabʼ.
Kqasar uwachulew, aretaq chiʼ ktzalij uloq pa ri tinimit, knumik.
Chuchiʼ ri bʼe kril jun wikox, kqibʼ ukoq rukʼ, kʼatekʼut, xuwi kuriqaʼ ri taq uxaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Mijumul mayaʼ bʼa awach!». Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim kchaqiʼjirik ri wikox.
Aretaq chiʼ kkil weriʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, mayibʼal kekanajik e kkibʼij: «¿Jasche che chi xaqbʼi xchaqijirik ri wikox?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, we kʼo ikojonik e man kubʼan ta kebʼ ikʼuʼx, man xuwi taj kibʼan weriʼ rukʼ we wikox riʼ, xoqujeʼ, we kibʼij chrech we juyubʼ riʼ: “Chatel ubʼik chakʼyaqaʼ ubʼi awibʼ pa ri polow”, jeriʼ na riʼ kbʼantajik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ronojel ri kita rukʼ ri ikojonik pa ri ichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, kikʼam na riʼ ri kito».
Kopan pa ri Rachoch ri Dyos, e aretaq chiʼ tajin kukʼut ri tzij, ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri eriʼjabʼ taq winaq kepe chi rukʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas rukʼ kowinem kabʼan at weriʼ? E ¿jachin yaʼowinaq chawech we kowinem riʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Xoqujeʼ ri in kʼo jun jas uwach kinta chiwech; we kitzalij uwach, xoqujeʼ ri in kinbʼij na chiwech jas rukʼ kowinem kinbʼan weriʼ.
Ri qasnaʼ xubʼan ri Xwan, ¿jawiʼ petinaq wi? ¿La petinaq chikaj on petinaq kukʼ ri winaq?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kkichomaj weriʼ chkibʼil kibʼ: We kqabʼij: «Petinaq chikaj», ri areʼ kubʼij laʼ chqech: «¿Jas kʼu che, che ri ix man xixkojon ta chrech ri areʼ?».
E we kqabʼij: «Petinaq kukʼ ri winaq», kqaxibʼij qibʼ chkiwach ri winaq, rumal rech che konojel ri winaq ekojoninaq rech ri Xwan jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos .
Kkitzalij uwach ri utzij ri Jesus; jeriʼ kkibʼij: «Ri uj man qetaʼm taj». E ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Xoqujeʼ ri in, man kinbʼij ta chiwech, jas rukʼ kowinem kinbʼan weriʼ».
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ chibʼij bʼaʼ chwech jas ri kichomaj puwiʼ weriʼ. Jun achi kʼo kebʼ ukʼojol. Kubʼij chrech ri nabʼe: “Nukʼojol, jat kamik, jatechakunoq pa ri ulew”.
E ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: “Ri in man kinwaj taj”, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuchomaj chi na, kukʼex ukʼuʼx e kbʼe pa ri viña.
Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kubʼij chrech ri ukabʼ; e ri areʼ kubʼij: “Jeʼ Ajawxel, kinbʼek”, tekʼuriʼ ma kbʼe taj.
¿Jachin chkech ri ekebʼ xubʼan ri rajawanik ri Tatxel?». –«Ri nabʼe». Kecha chrech. Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, che ri eʼajtoqʼinelabʼ e ri ixoqibʼ che ekech nim chʼutiʼn, eʼareʼ nabʼe keʼopan na chiwach ri ix pa ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che ri Xwan xpe uloq iwukʼ che uyaʼik ri jun bʼe rech sukʼil, kʼatekʼuriʼ man xixkojon ta chrech ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajtoqʼinelabʼ e ri ixoqibʼ che ekech nim chʼutiʼn xekojon chrech ri areʼ, ekʼu ri ix, kneʼbʼaʼ xiwil uwach, man kikʼex ta neʼ ri ikʼuʼx chuwach chi kanoq we jastaq riʼ, arech kixkojon chrech ri areʼ».
«Chitatbʼej jun tzijobʼelil chik. Jun achi kʼo jun rulew e kusukʼumaj utikik ri uva chilaʼ. Kukoj pa jun tapya, kujam jun yitzʼbʼal uva e kuyak jun tzʼuqtzʼik ja ilbʼal kʼolbʼal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kuya pa qajik chkech nikʼaj ajchakibʼ e kbʼe ubʼik.
Aretaq chiʼ kpe ri uqʼijil uwach, keʼutaq ubʼi nikʼaj eʼajpataninel kukʼ ri ajchakibʼ, arech kkikʼamaʼ ri taq uwach.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼajchakibʼ keʼkichap ri eʼajpataninelabʼ, jun chkech kkichʼiyo, jun chik kkikamisaj, jun urox chik kkikʼyaq chabʼaj.
Jumul chik, keʼutaq chi ubʼi nikʼaj eʼupataninelabʼ, are ekʼi chkiwach ri enabʼe. Kʼatekʼut junam kkibʼan chkech jeʼ jas ri xkibʼan chkech ri enabʼe.
Chukʼisbʼal, kutaq ubʼi ri ukʼojol chkech, e kuchomaj: “Nim waʼ kkil wi we nukʼojol”.
Kʼatekʼut ri ajchakibʼ riʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri ukʼojol, kkibʼij chkibʼil kibʼ: “Are waʼ ri echbʼanel. Joʼ, jeʼqakamisaj e chaqechbʼej kan ri rechbʼal”.
Kkichap ri areʼ, kesaj uloq pa ri tikonbʼal e kkikamisaj.
Aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri rajaw ri ulew, ¿Su kubʼan na riʼ chkech ri eʼajchakibʼ riʼ?».
Kkibʼij chrech: «Jun kʼaxlaj kikamisaxik riʼ kubʼan chkech ri eʼitzel taq eʼajchakibʼ riʼ, e kuya na riʼ pa qajik ri jun ulew chkech enikʼaj ajchakibʼ chik, che kkitoj riʼ ri uwach chrech, chi aretaq chiʼ uqʼijil».
E ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «¿La man isikʼim ta jumul ri tzij tzʼibʼatalik: Ri abʼaj che xkikʼyaq ubʼi ri etzʼaqal taq ja, are okinaq che rajawal ja; are ri Ajawxel xbʼanow weriʼ e sibʼalaj jeʼliklaj mayibʼal chuwach taq ri qawoqʼoch?».
«Rumal kʼu waʼ kinbʼij chiwech: Ktoqix na waʼ ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos chiwech ri ix arech kya na chkech jun siwan tinimit chik che kkibʼan na arech sibʼalaj kwachin na ri uwach».
Ri enim taq chuchqajaw e ri fariseʼo, aretaq chiʼ kkita we taq utzijobʼelil riʼ, kkichʼobʼo che eʼare ri eʼareʼ tajin kuʼbʼij:
Kkaj kkichapo, kʼatekʼut kkixibʼij kibʼ chkech ri winaq, rumal che kkichʼobʼo che ri areʼ jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Kchʼaw chi jumul ri Jesus, ktzijon kukʼ pa taq tzijobʼelil, kubʼij:
«Ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj, kjunamtaj rukʼ jun ajawinel che kunimaqʼijrisaj ri nimalaj ulaʼnik rech ri ukʼulanem ri ukʼojol.
Keʼutaq bʼi ri eʼupataninelabʼ arech kebʼekisikʼij ri eʼulaʼ chrech ri kʼulanem. Kʼatekʼut ri eʼareʼ man kkaj taj kepetik.
Jumul chik keʼutaq chi ubʼi nikʼaj eʼupataninelabʼ, e kuchilbʼej ubʼi weriʼ chkech: “Chibʼij chkech ri eʼareʼ che keʼinsikʼij: Chiwilampeʼ, sukʼumatal chik ri wulaʼnik, xechʼoltajik ri eʼalaj taq nuwakax e ri echomaʼq taq nuchikop, ronojel utzirinaq chik, chisaʼj pa ri kʼulanem”.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta kkaj chrech weriʼ; jun kbʼe pa ri rulew, ri jun chik kbʼe pa ri ukʼay;
ri enikʼaj chik, kekichap ri eʼajpataninelabʼ, kekibʼan kʼax chkech, kʼatekʼuriʼ kekikamisaj.
Sibʼalaj kkʼanarik ri ajawinel, keʼutaq ubʼi ri eʼuwinaq rech chʼoʼj. Kekikamisaj ri ekamisanel taq winaq riʼ e kutiʼq qʼaqʼ pa ri kitinimit.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech ri epataninelabʼ: “Sukʼumatalik le ulaʼnik, kʼatekʼut man taqal ta chkij ri eʼulaʼ xesikʼixik.
Jix bʼaʼ pa taq ri kuriq wi ribʼ ri taq bʼe, kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri winaq che keʼiriqo cheʼisikʼij uloq pa we kʼulanem riʼ.”
Ri eʼajpataninelabʼ kebʼe pa taq ri bʼe, keʼkimulij e keʼkikʼam uloq konojel ri winaq che kekiriq uloq, cheʼitzel e cheʼutz winaq. Ri nim ja rech kʼulanem knojik chkech ri winaq che xesikʼixik».
«Kpe ri ajawinel e kok ubʼik arech keril ri eʼulaʼ xesikʼix, kʼatekʼuriʼ kril jun che ukojom ratzʼyaq che man rech ta kʼulanem.
Kubʼij chrech: “Wachiʼl, ¿jasche katpe waral e man akojom ta uloq awa- tzʼyaq rech kʼulanem?”. Ri areʼ man kchʼaw taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi chanim, ri ajawinel kubʼij chkech ri eʼupataninelabʼ: Chiyutuʼ ri raqan e ri uqʼabʼ e chikʼyaqaʼ ubʼi pa ri qʼequʼm: chilaʼ riʼ kubʼan wi ri oqʼej e ri quchʼuchʼem wareyajʼ”.
Rumal rech che sibʼalaj ekʼi kesikʼixik, kʼatekʼut, man ekʼi taj ri kechaʼik».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri efariseʼo kebʼek e kkimulij kibʼ chrech uchomaxik jas kkibʼan chrech ukʼamixik jun utzij ri areʼ.
Kekitaq ubʼi ri ekitijoxelabʼ e ejujun eʼajerodiʼano rukʼ, arech kebʼekibʼij chrech: «Ajtij, ri uj qetaʼm che ri at, at jun winaq saqlaj atzij e rukʼ saqlaj tzij kakʼut ri ubʼe ri Dyos. Man kaxibʼij ta awibʼ rumal jun winaq, rumal che man kawil ta ri ubʼanik, ri ukowinem ri jun winaq.
Chabʼij bʼaʼ ¿jas ri achomabʼal?: ¿la yaʼtalik ktoj ri alkabʼal chrech ri Sesar on man yaʼtal taj?».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Jesus retaʼm ri ketzalal, kubʼij chkech: «¡Kebʼ ipalaj! ¿Su che kiwaj kinikʼamij?
Chikʼutuʼ bʼaʼ chnuwach ri pwaq rech ri alkabʼal». Ri eʼareʼ kkikʼut jun denariʼo chuwach.
E kubʼij chkech: «¿Jachin uwachbʼal weriʼ e jachin ajchaqʼeʼ ri tzʼibʼatalik?». Kkibʼij chrech:
«Rech ri Sesar». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech: «Ri rech ri Sesar chitzalij chrech ri Sesar e chitzalij chrech ri Dyos ri rech ri Dyos».
Aretaq chiʼ kkita weriʼ, kemayowik, kkiyaʼ kanoq e kebʼek.
Pa ri jun qʼij riʼ, kepe uloq rukʼ ri areʼ enikʼaj saduseʼo –ri winaq riʼ man kkikoj taj che kʼo kʼastajibʼal wach– e ri eʼareʼ kkita chrech:
«Ajtij, ri Moʼises xubʼij kanoq: We kʼo jun kkamik e man kuya ta kan ralkʼuwaʼl, ri rachalal kkʼuliʼ rukʼ ri rixoqil, arech kuyaʼ rijaʼal ri rachalal.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ekʼo kan chqaxoʼl ri uj ewuqubʼ achijabʼ eʼachalaxik. Ri nabʼeʼal, xkʼuliʼk e xkamik, man xuya ta kan rijaʼal e jekʼuriʼ xuya kan ri rixoqil chrech ri rachalal.
Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ xkʼulumatajik rukʼ ri ukabʼ, rukʼ ri urox, chi kʼateʼ rukʼ ri uwuq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ukʼisbʼalil xkam ubʼi ri ixoq.
Pa ri kʼastajibʼal ¿jachin kʼuriʼ chkech ri ewuqubʼ riʼ are rixoqil, rumal rech che konojel xekʼuliʼ rukʼ ri areʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix, sibʼalaj ix sachinaq rumal che man kichʼobʼ ta ri tzʼibʼatalik, e man kichʼobʼ ta ri ukowinem ri Dyos.
Pa ri kʼastajibʼal wachaj, ri eʼachijabʼ man kkikʼam ta kixoqilal, e ri ixoqibʼ man kkikʼam ta kachajilal, ri eʼareʼ keʼuxik jeʼ jas eʼanjel pa ri kaj.
E ri jastaq che bʼim puwiʼ ri kikʼastajibʼal ri kaminaqibʼ, ¿la man isikim ta ri nikʼaj utzij ri Dyos jawijeʼ kubʼij wi chiwech:
“In, in Udyos ri Abʼraham, in, in Udyos ri Isaʼak, in, in Udyos ri Jakobʼ?”. Man jun Dyos taj kech kaminaqibʼ, ri areʼ jun Dyos kech ri ekʼaslik taq winaq».
Ri winaq aretaq chiʼ kkita weriʼ, kkimay uwach ri utzij.
Ri efariseʼo, aretaq chiʼ ketaʼmaj che ri esaduseʼo man xekowin ta chik xkibʼij jun tzij chkech, kkimulij kibʼ.
E jun chkech ri eʼareʼ kukʼot uchiʼ arech kukʼamij:
«Ajtij, ¿jachinchike are nimalaj pixabbʼ chuxoʼl ri pixabʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Kaloqʼoqʼej na ri Ajawxel ri Adyos rukʼ ronojel akʼuʼx awanimaʼ, rukʼ ronojel awalmaʼ e rukʼ ronojel awuxlabʼal;
are waʼ ri nimalaj pixabʼ e are waʼ ri nabʼe.
Ri ukabʼ kjunamataj rukʼ we jun riʼ: Kaloqʼoqʼej na ri awajil atzʼaqat jeriʼ jas uloqʼexik awibʼ ri at kabʼano.
Chrech we kebʼ pixabʼ riʼ tzuyulik ronojel ri pixabʼ e etzuyulik ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos».
Aretaq chiʼ kimulim kibʼ ri efariseʼo, ri Jesus kuta we jun kʼotoj chiʼaj chkech riʼ:
«Su ichomabʼal puwiʼ ri Kristo? ¿Jachin ukʼojol?». Kkibʼij chrech: «Ukʼojol ri David».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «¿Jas kʼu che bʼaʼ, che ri David, rumal che silobʼisam pa ri Uxlabʼxel, kubʼij Ajawxel chrech, aretaq chiʼ xubʼij:
Xubʼij ri Ajawxel chrech ri wajawxel: Chattʼuyul pa ri wikyaqʼabʼ chi kʼateʼ keʼinkoj na ri eʼakʼulel chuxeʼ taq ri awaqan.
We chi are ri David kubʼij Ajawxel chrech ¿la kuya kʼuriʼ che ukʼojol?».
Man kʼo ta jun kkowin che utzalixik uwach ri utzij. E chi pa we jun qʼij ubʼik riʼ man kʼo ta chi jun kukachʼo kʼo jun kuta chrech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim, ri Jesus kchʼaw chkech ri winaq e chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ e kubʼij chkech:
«Cho ri utem ri Moʼises etʼuyulnaq ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri efariseʼo.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ e chikʼoloʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ ronojel ri kkibʼij eʼareʼ chiwech, kʼatekʼut, mibʼano ri kkibʼan ri eʼareʼ, rumal rech che kkibʼij e man kkibʼan ta ri eʼareʼ weriʼ.
Kkiyutʼ al taq eqaʼn e kkikʼyaq chubʼoʼjal kij ri winaq, kʼatekʼut ri eʼareʼ man kkaj taj kkisilobʼisaj ukoq rukʼ jun uwiʼ kiqʼabʼ.
Ronojel kkibʼano arech keʼil kumal ri winaq. Nim likʼilik kkibʼan chrech ri uwach ri filakteriʼos e nimaʼq taq raqan kkibʼan chrech ri uchiʼy ri katzʼyaq.
Are kqaj chkiwach ketʼuyiʼ pa ri nabʼe taq kʼolibʼal pa ri nimalaj taq ulaʼnik e ri nabʼe taq tʼuyulbʼal pa taq ri Ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal,
kqaj chkiwach kya rutzil kiwach pa taq ri kʼayibʼal e xoqujeʼ kqaj chkiwach che “Rabʼbʼi” kecha ri winaq chkech».
«Ri ix, miyaʼ bʼe che “Rabʼbʼi”. kecha ri winaq chiwech: rumal rech che chiwech ri ix xaq jun Ajtij kʼolik e kʼu ri ix iwonojel ix achalaxik.
Xoqujeʼ, mibʼij “Tat”. ri ix chrech jun winaq cho ri uwachulew: rumal rech che ri ix xa jun Itat kʼo chikaj.
Xoqujeʼ, miyaʼ bʼe, che “Kʼamal bʼe”. kecha ri winaq chiwech: rumal rech che xa jun nim ri kʼamalbʼe chiwech ri ix, are ri Kristo.
Ri nimalaj ubʼantajik chixoʼl ri ix, are kuxna ipatanijel.
Ri jun che sibʼalaj nim uqʼij kukoj ribʼ, kbʼan na kowinem che uqasaxik. Ri jun che kuqasaj ribʼ, man nim taj kukoj ribʼ, sibʼalaj nim na uqʼij kkojik».
«¡Kʼax iwech ix kebʼ taq ipalaj, ri ixtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri ixfariseʼo, che kitzʼapij ri Rajawibʼal ri Kaj chkech ri winaq! Qastzij nakʼut, ri ix man kixok taj e man kiya ta bʼe chkech ri nikʼaj chik arech keʼokik.
¡Kʼax iwech ix, kebʼ taq ipalaj ri ix tzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri ix fariseʼo, che kisolij taq ri polow e ri taqʼaj, kaj uwachulew arech kixkowin chrech uchʼakik jun itijoxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xchʼaktaj iwumal, kibʼan chrech che are taqal ri areʼ kokik kamul ralkʼuwaʼl ri Kʼeqbʼal Mes chiwach ri ix!
Kʼax iwech ri ix, ix moy kʼamal taq bʼe, che kibʼij: “We jun winaq kujikibʼa ri tzij puwiʼ ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos, weriʼ man utz taj, kʼatekʼut we jun kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij puwiʼ ri qʼan upwaq ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos, jun taqanik waʼ weriʼ chrech”.
¡Ix kon e ix moy taq winaq! ¿Jachike are nim ubʼanik, are ri qʼan pwaq on are ri nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos che kutyoxrisaj ri qʼan pwaq riʼ?
Xoqujeʼ ri ix kibʼij: “We jun kujikibʼa ri utzij puwiʼ ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ, weriʼ man utz taj; kʼatekʼut, we jun riʼ, we kujikibʼaʼ utzij puwiʼ ri sipanik chrech Dyos, jun taqanik waʼ weriʼ chrech”.
Ix moy taq winaq! ¿Jas ri nimalaj ubʼanik, are ri sipanik chrech ri Dyos on are ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kutyoxrisaj ri sipanik chrech ri Dyos riʼ?
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kujikibʼa ri utzij puwiʼ ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ, kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij puwiʼ ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ e puwiʼ ronojel ri kʼo chuwach;
ri jun che kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij puwiʼ ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolbʼal, kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij puwiʼ ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos, e puwiʼ ri Jun che jeqel chupam;
ri jun che kujikibʼaʼ utzij rumal ri kaj, kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij rumal ri utem ri Dyos e rumal ri jun che tʼuyul cho ri tem.
Kʼax iwech ri ix, kebʼ taq ipalaj ri ix tzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri ix fariseʼo, che kitoj ri alkabʼal puwiʼ ri kulanto, ri qʼebʼun e ri komins, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kixok ta ilo chrech ri nimalaj ubʼantajik pa ri Pixabʼ: are ri sukʼil, are ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e are ri kuʼl kʼuʼx. Rajawaxik kbʼan weriʼ e man kya ta kan ubʼanik ri jun chik.
Ri ix, ix moyibʼ kʼamalbʼe, che kichaʼ ri alaj us e kibʼiqʼ bʼi ri kameyo.
Kʼax iwech ri ix, kebʼ taq ipalaj ix ajtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ix fariseʼo, rumal rech che chrij wi kichʼajchʼobʼej ri qumubʼal e ri laq, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix, ixnojinaq chrech sibʼalaj elaqʼ e chrech sibʼalaj itzel.
¡Moylaj fariseʼo! Are nabʼe chachʼajchʼobʼej ri upam ri qumubʼal e ri laq, arech xoqujeʼ chʼajchʼoj kkanaj kan chrij.
Kʼax iwech ix, kebʼ taq ipalaj ix ajtzʼibʼanel e ix fariseʼo, ri ix kixjunamtaj rukʼ ri saqalaj taq kijul ri ekaminaqibʼ: che chrij sibʼalaj utz kkaʼyik, kʼatekʼuriʼ nojinaq chrech ubʼaqil ri kaminaq, e chrech ronojel tzʼil;
xoqujeʼ, ix jeriʼ ri ix, chrij ri iwachbʼal kkil wi ri winaq che ix sukʼ winaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ ixnojinaq chrech kebʼ taq palajil e chrech ri ma sukʼil taj.
Kʼax iwech ix, kebʼ taq ipalaj ix ajtzʼibʼanel e ixfariseʼo, ri ix kitzʼaq ri ukʼolibʼal kijul ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos, e kiwiq ri kijul ri esukʼlaj taq winaq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix kibʼij: “Ri uj, weta xujkʼasiʼ pa taq ri kiqʼijil ri eqanan eqatat kanoq, man kʼo ta qech riʼ kukʼ chrech ri utojik ri kikikʼel ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos”.
¡Xa jekʼuriʼ, chi ix wi kibʼan ri qʼatojtzij piwiʼ che ix kalkʼuwaʼl kan ri xekamisan kech ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos!
Xoqujeʼ ri ix chinojisaj bʼaʼ ri kipajbʼal ri eʼinan eʼitat!»
«¡Ix rax taq akan! ¡Ix rijaʼal itzel kumatz! ¿La kixanimaj na riʼ chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij che taqal chiwech ri Kʼeqbʼal Mes?
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, keʼintaq ubʼi eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos chiwech, che nim taq ketaʼmabʼal, e xoqujeʼ eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ: ri ix, nikʼaj waʼ chkech eʼareʼ keʼikamisaj na, e nikʼaj chik keʼirip na cho ri ripbʼal, enikʼaj chik keʼijichʼij na pa taq ri ukʼolbʼal ichʼabʼal, e nikʼaj chik oqtam kij riʼ iwumal xaq jawijeʼ tinamit kebʼe wi,
arech kturuw na piwiʼ ronojel ri sukʼilalaj kikʼel tixinaq chuwach ri uwachulew, chi kmajitaj uloq rukʼ ri ukikʼel ri sukʼlaj Abʼel, kopan chi rukʼ na ri ukikʼel ri Sakariʼas, ri ukʼojol ri Bʼarakiʼas che xeʼikamisaj ix chuxoʼl ri tyoxlaj kʼolibʼal e ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ.
Kinbʼij chiwech: Qas jeriʼ, ronojel weriʼ chyaʼtaj piwiʼ ri ix».
«Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ri at che keʼakamisaj ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos e keʼakʼyaq chech abʼaj ri etaqom uloq chawech ¡Sibʼalaj nurayim kimulixik ri eʼawalkʼuwaʼl jeʼ jas kimulixik ri ral kubʼan jun tʼuʼq ekʼ chuxeʼ ri uxikʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix man iwam ta weriʼ!
Jeriʼ nakʼut, tolonik kkanaj na kan ri iwachoch.
Jeriʼ kinbʼij chiwech, rumal che man kiwil ta chi nuwach waʼ, kʼateʼ kopan na che kibʼij na: Tewchiʼtalik ri areʼ che petinaq uloq pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel!»
Kel uloq pa ri rachoch ri Dyos e aretaq chiʼ bʼenam chik kubʼano, ri eʼutijoxelabʼ keqibʼ ukoq rukʼ arech kkikʼut chuwach ri taq ja rech ri nim rachoch ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix, ¿la kiwil ronojel we jastaq riʼ? Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, waral riʼ man kʼo ta jun abʼaj kkanaj kan cho jun abʼaj chik che mat ktzaq na uloq cho ri ulew».
E aretaq chiʼ tʼuyul uloq puwiʼ ri juyubʼ Olivo, ri eʼutijoxelabʼ keqebʼ ukoq rukʼ pa kitukel apanoq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkita chrech: «Chabʼij chqech jumpa kkʼulmataj na riʼ weriʼ, e jachike riʼ jun kʼutbʼal rech ri apetbʼal ri at, e ri jun kʼutbʼal che rech xopan ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uwachulew».
E ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qas chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ che man kʼo ta jun kixsubʼuwik.
Rumal rech che sibʼalaj ekʼi riʼ ri kepe na che kkiqʼaxij kibʼ pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in e kkibʼij riʼ: “In ri in Kristo”, kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj ekʼiʼ riʼ ri kekisubʼ na.
Xoqujeʼ kita na utzijoxik taq chʼoʼj riʼ, e kbʼe utzijol taq chʼoʼj riʼ; qas chiwilaʼmpeʼ mixibʼij iwibʼ: Rumal rech che weriʼ rajawaxik kkʼulmatajik, kʼatekʼut, majaʼ na riʼ ri ukʼisbʼalil.
Kchʼoʼjin na riʼ, jun amaqʼ rukʼ jun amaqʼ chik e jun ajawibʼal rukʼ jun ajawibʼal chik. E pa taq nikʼaj kʼolibʼal kkʼojiʼ wiʼjal riʼ, e kubʼan na taq kabʼraqan.
Ronojel waʼ weriʼ, are umajibʼal riʼ ri uqʼoxom, ri ukʼaxkʼolil che kaʼlax ri akʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kixkʼam ubʼi riʼ pa ri kʼotoj chiʼaj rukʼ taq kʼax e kixkamisax na riʼ, e ketzelax na iwach kumal konojel ri jetaq amaqʼ rumal ri nubʼiʼ ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼi riʼ ktzaq ri kichomanik e kkisutij kibʼ riʼ chkiwach e ktiʼtaj kibʼ riʼ chkiwach.
Xaqteʼ riʼ kekʼiy uloq ejujun che eʼesal taq uwach ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos e sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq riʼ kekisubʼu.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ kkʼiy na ri itzel, sibʼalaj ewinaq riʼ kjorobʼik ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx.
Kʼatekʼut, jachin chi utz kuchʼijaʼ pa ri ukʼisbʼalil, ri are riʼ kkoltaj na.
We Utzalaj Tzij riʼ, che rech ri ajawibʼal kya na ubʼixik pa ronojel ri uwachulew, jeʼ jas jun ilbʼal kʼutbʼal bʼanoj chkiwach konojel ri siwan taq tinimit. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe bʼaʼ riʼ ri Kʼisbʼalil».
«Aretaq chiʼ kiwil bʼaʼ na we nimalaj taq kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx riʼ, che bʼim rumal ri Daniʼel ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, che tiktalik pa ri tyoxlaj kʼolbʼal (¡Chuchʼobʼoʼ bʼaʼ jachin kusikʼij uwach weriʼ!),
¡xa jekʼuriʼ, jachintaq ri ekʼo pa ri Judeʼa, chi chanim cheʼanimaj ubʼi pa taq ri juyubʼ,
jachin ri kʼo uloq puwiʼ ri uxotal ja, maqaj uloq che ukʼamik ubʼi ri ujastaq pa ja,
e jachin ri kʼo pa ri tikonbʼal, matzalej uloq che ukʼamik ri ratzʼyaq!
¡Kʼax kech ri eyawabʼ taq ixoqibʼ, e ri tajin kekʼiysaʼnik pa we taq qʼij riʼ!
Chixchʼaw bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos, arech man kikʼulmaj ta weriʼ pa ri qʼälaj on pa qʼij sabʼado.
Rumal rech che pa taq we qʼij riʼ, kkʼojiʼ na sibʼalaj kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx riʼ, che man ilitajinaq ta uloq chi arechiʼ xkʼiyisax ri uwachulew chi kʼateʼ na we qʼij riʼ, e man kilitaj ta chi jun riʼ jacha we kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx riʼ.
E weta mata kjikʼitaj upam taq we qʼij riʼ, man kʼo ta jun riʼ che kkoltaj na. Kʼatekʼut, kumal ri echaʼtalik taq winaq, kjikʼitaj na upam we taq qʼij riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo jun chi aninaq kubʼij chiwech: “¡Chiwilampeʼ, ri Kristo kʼo waral!”, on “¡Chiwilampeʼ kʼo jelaʼ”, mikoj weriʼ!
Rumal rech che kepe na eʼesal taq uwach ri Kristo, e eʼesal taq kiwach ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos che kkibʼan na nimalaj taq kʼutbʼal e nimalaj taq mayibʼal, kekowinik kesubʼunik, xoq weta kekowin chi chkech ri echaʼtalik.
Chiwilampeʼ, ri in xas xinnabʼisaj ubʼixik weriʼ chiwech».
«Xa jekʼuriʼ we kbʼix chiwech: “Ri areʼ kʼo pa ri tolonik ulew”, mixbʼe ubʼik: “Ri areʼ kʼo pa ri naj taq kʼolbʼal”, mikoj bʼaʼ weriʼ.
Jeriʼ jas ri kuypaʼ kel uloq pa ri relbʼal qʼij e sibʼalaj ksaqarsanik chi pa ri uqajbʼal qʼij, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ na kʼu riʼ aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri ukʼojol ri achi.
E chi jawichiʼ kʼo wi ri kaminaq bʼaqilal, chi chilaʼ riʼ kkimulij wi kibʼ ri jetaq kʼuch».
«Chi chanim chuwach chi apan ri kʼaxkʼol rech taq we qʼij riʼ, kqʼequʼmar uwach ri qʼij, man knikik ta chik ri ikʼ, ktzaq uloq riʼ taq chʼumil pa kaj, e ktotax na uloq taq ri ukowinem ri kaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim riʼ kilitaj uwach chikaj ri ukʼutbʼal ri ukʼojol ri achi; kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel taq ri winaq rech ri uwachulew kkichʼay na riʼ ri uwokikʼuʼx; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkilitaj na riʼ ri ukʼojol ri achi che petinaq uloq pa taq ri sutzʼ rukʼ nimalaj ukowinem e nimalaj uremelik utikʼilik.
E ri areʼ keʼutaq na ri eʼanjel rukʼ kxojilinik taq trompeta e kekimulij na uloq ri echaʼtalik winaq chi pa ri kijebʼ uxkut kyaqiqʼ uloq, chi pa jun uxkut kaj ulew chi kʼa pa ri jun chik».
«Rukʼ ri wikox, chiwetaʼmaj we jun tzijobʼelil riʼ. Aretaq chiʼ tʼon chik taq ri uqʼabʼ e ktuxnik uloq taq ri uxaq, ri ix iwetaʼm che naqaj chik kʼo wi ri säqʼij.
Xoqujeʼ ri ix, aretaq chiʼ kiwil ronojel weriʼ, chiwetaʼmaj che naqaj chik kʼo wi ri Areʼ cho taq ri uchiʼja.
Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, che ma kqʼax ta na we jun mayilqʼijsaq riʼ, xas chuxeʼ kanoq kkʼulmataj waʼ ronojel weriʼ.
Ri kaj e ri uwachulew xa qʼaxel, e kʼu ri nutzij man qʼaxel taj.
E ri rejalbʼal qʼij riʼ, e ri kajbʼal riʼ, man kʼo ta jun etaʼmaninaq, xa ta neʼ ketaʼm ri eʼanjel chikaj, xa ta neʼ ri Kʼojolxel, xuwi ri Tatxel etaʼmaninaq».
«Jachaʼ pa taq ri uqʼij ri Noʼe, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ ri upetbʼal pa taq ri uqʼij ri ukʼojol ri achi.
Rumal rech che pa taq we qʼij riʼ che chuxeʼ kan ri nimalaj jabʼ, ri winaq xewaʼik, xeqʼabʼrik, xekʼuliʼ rukʼ ixoq rukʼ achi, kʼateʼ ri qʼij che ri Noʼe xok pa ri jukubʼ,
ri winaq man kʼo ta naʼtalik chkech, kʼateʼ aretaq chiʼ xpe ri nimalaj qʼeqalaj jabʼ che xeʼukʼam ubʼi konojel ri eʼareʼ. Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ pa ri jun qʼij che kpe na ri ukʼojol ri achi:
ekʼo kebʼ riʼ cho ri kulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi chanim jun kkʼam ubʼik e kʼu ri jun chik kya kanoq.
Ekʼo kebʼ ixoqibʼ riʼ junam kiwach tajin kechakunik, jun kkʼam ubʼik, e kʼu ri jun chik kya kanoq.
Chixkʼaskʼat bʼaʼ, rumal rech che man iwetaʼm taj jas ri qʼij kpe na ri iwajaw.
Qas utz uchʼobʼik chibʼanaʼ weriʼ: Weta retaʼm ri rajaw ja, jas ukajbʼal chaqʼabʼ kpe na ri elaqʼom, klawchin riʼ e man kuya ta bʼe riʼ che kjaq ri utapayil ri rachoch.
Xoqujeʼ bʼaʼ ri ix chixkʼasaloq, rumal rech che pa ri jun kajbʼal che man kichomaj taj, kpe na riʼ ri ukʼojol ri achi».
«¿Jachin riʼ ri utzalaj ajpataninel, che ri ajtij xrokisaj kʼamalbʼe chkech ri uwinaq cho ja, arech kuya ri kiwa chi pa ri utz kajbʼal?
Utzalaj we ajpataninel riʼ, che aretaq chiʼ kpe ri rajtij kuriqaʼ tajin jeriʼ kubʼan weriʼ.
Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech che krokisaj na riʼ kʼamalbʼe chrech ronojel ri ujastaq.
Kʼatekʼut, we ri ajpatanijel riʼ kubʼij pa ri ranimaʼ: “Ri wajtij kbʼiytajik”,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kok che kichʼayik ri erachiʼl, kok che waʼim, kok che uchobʼik sibʼalaj amajaʼ kukʼ ri eqʼabʼarelabʼ taq winaq;
ri rajtij ri patanijel kpe riʼ pa jun qʼij che man reyeʼm taj, e pa ri kajbʼal che man retaʼm taj;
sibʼalaj kukʼajisaj na uwach riʼ, e kukoj na riʼ chkixoʼl ri kebʼ taq kipalaj: chilaʼ riʼ ri oqʼej e ri quchʼuchʼem wareyaj».
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri kaj kjunamtaj na kukʼ lajuj qʼapojibʼ che keʼel ubʼi rukʼ ri kikantil arech kkikʼuluʼ ri chʼabʼ ala.
Ejobʼ chkech ri eʼareʼ, kʼax kichʼabʼexik, e ri ejobʼ chik kʼa ketaʼmabʼal.
Ri ejobʼ qʼapojibʼ che kʼax kichʼabʼexik, kkikʼam ubʼi ri kikantil, kʼatekʼut, man kkikʼam ta ubʼi ri oleʼo.
Ri eqʼapojibʼ che kʼo ketaʼmabʼal, kkikʼam ubʼi ri kikantil xoqujeʼ kkikʼam ubʼi ri oleʼo pa taq ri lmeʼt.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal che kbʼiytaj ri chʼabʼ ala, konojel ri eʼareʼ kʼax chi kiwaram e kewarik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ pa unikʼajal aqʼabʼ ktataj jun raqow chiʼaj: “¡Kʼo chi waral ri chʼabʼ ala! ¡Chixel uloq chrech ukʼulaxik!”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim kekʼastaj konojel we eqapojibʼ riʼ, kkisukʼumaj ri kikantil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kʼax kichʼabʼexik kkibʼij chkech ri kʼo ketambʼal: “Chiyaʼaʼ jubʼiqʼ qech ri oleʼo rech ri ikantil rumal rech che kchuptaj ri qakantil ri uj”.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chkech: “Jayiʼ, xuwi kʼo ri qech uj, weneʼ man kutzaqaʼ ta chrech ri qech uj e chrech ri iwech ix; are utz laʼ kixbʼe che uloqʼik ri iwech ix kukʼ ri eʼajkʼayibʼ”.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼel ubʼi che uloqʼik, kopan ri chʼabʼ ala, e ri nikʼaj che kisukʼubʼam chi apan kibʼ, keʼok ubʼi rukʼ ri areʼ pa ri rulabʼal ukʼulanem, e ktzʼaptajik ri uchiʼja.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼateʼ keʼopan chi ri enikʼaj qʼapojibʼ e kkibʼij: “Ajawxel, Ajawxel, chajaqaʼ ri uchiʼja chqawach!”.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij: “¡Qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, ri in man wetaʼm ta iwach!”.
Chixkʼasal bʼaʼ, rumal rech che man iwetaʼm ta ri qʼij, e ma iwetaʼm ta ri kajbʼal».
«Xoqujeʼ jeʼ jas jun achi che kel ubʼi pa jun bʼinem. Keʼusikʼij ri erajpatanijel kʼatekʼuriʼ kuroqixaʼnij kan ri upwaq chkech.
Chrech jun kuya kan jobʼ qʼan pwaq, chrech jun chik kuya kan kebʼ, e chrech jun urox chik kuya kan xaq jun; chkech chkijujunal kuya kan ri kanaʼw chrech, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kel ubʼik. Chi chanim
ri jun che xya kan jobʼ qʼan pwaq chrech, kbʼek, kuchakuj e kuchʼak chi na jobʼ qʼan pwaq apanoq.
Xoqujeʼ ri jun che xya kan kebʼ chrech kuchʼak kebʼ qʼan pwaq chik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri jun che xya kan xaq jun pwaq chrech, kbʼek, e kubʼan jun jul pa ri ulew e chilaʼ kumuq kan ri upwaq ri rajaw.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ okʼowinaq chi sibʼalaj qʼij, ri kajaw we eʼajpatanijel riʼ kpetik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kusukʼumaj ri urajil kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Kpe ri jun che xya kan jobʼ qʼan pwaq chrech, e kujach ri jobʼ qʼan pwaq chik, e kubʼij: “Ajawxel, xaya kan jobʼ qʼan pwaq chwech: chawilaʼmpeʼ riʼ, ri in xinchʼak jobʼ qʼan pwaq chik”.
Ri ajaw kubʼij chrech: “Utz bʼaʼ riʼ, at utz e at sukʼlaj ajpatanijel, ri at, at sukʼ pa ri jubʼiqʼ, ri in katinkoj na puwiʼ kʼi jastaq; chatok bʼaʼ pa ri ukiʼkotemal ri awajaw”.
Chi chanim chik kpe chi uloq ri jun che xya kan kebʼ qʼan pwaq chrech; kubʼij: “Ajawxel, kebʼ qʼan pwaq xaya kan chwech: chawilampeʼ riʼ, ri in xinchʼak kebʼ qʼan pwaq chik”.
Ri ajaw kubʼij chrech: “Utz bʼa riʼ, at utz e at sukʼlaj ajpatanijel, ri at, at sukʼ pa ri jubʼiqʼ, ri in katinkoj na puwiʼ kʼi jastaq; chatok bʼaʼ pa ri ukiʼkotemal ri awajaw”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe chi uloq ri jun che xa jun qʼan pwaq xya kan chrech, kubʼij: “Ajawxel, ri in wetaʼm awach, at jeriʼ jeʼ jas jun kʼaʼnlaj achi: ri at kajachʼ uwach jawijeʼ man xattikon ta wi, e katmolonik jawijeʼ man xajopij ta jun jas uwach.
Rumal kʼuriʼ, ri in xinxibʼij wibʼ, xinbʼek e xinmuq ri qʼan pwaq pa ri ulew: chawilaʼmpeʼ, kʼolik riʼ ri awech at”.
Kʼatekʼut ri rajaw kubʼij chrech: “¡At Itzel e at saqʼorlaj ajpatanijel! Ri at awetaʼm che ri in kinjachʼanik jawijeʼ man xintikon ta wi e kinmolonik jawijeʼ man xinjopin ta wi.
Taqal chawij weta xaya ri nupwaq chkech ri achijabʼ pa ri ja kʼolbʼal pwaq, arech aretaq chiʼ xintzalij uloq ri in, kinkʼamaʼ ri nujastaq che wech ri in e xoqujeʼ ri ral.
Chimajaʼ bʼaʼ ri jun qʼan pwaq chrech e chiyaʼaʼ chrech ri jun che kʼo chi lajuj qʼan pwaq rukʼ.
Rumal rech che, ronojel ri kʼo jastaq rech, kyaʼtaj na chrech e ktoʼtaj na uwiʼ riʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri jun che man kʼo ta jastaq rech, chi ktoqix na chrech ri kʼo rukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we itzel ajpatanijel riʼ, chikʼyaqaʼ bʼi pa ri qʼequʼm. Chilaʼ riʼ ri oqʼej e ri quchʼuchʼem wareyaj”».
«Aretaq chiʼ ri ukʼojol ri achi kpe na pa ri ukowinem, kukʼ konojel ri eʼanjel erech areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim ktʼuyiʼ na riʼ cho ri utem rech ri ukowinem.
Chuwach ri areʼ kemulix na riʼ konojel ri siwan taq tinimit, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ kutas na kiwach riʼ, ri enikʼaj kukʼ ri enikʼaj chik, jeʼ jas ri ajyuqʼ che kutas kiwach ri chij kukʼ ri kʼisikʼ.
Keʼuya ri chij pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ e ri kʼisikʼ pa ri umox.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ajawinel kubʼij na riʼ chkech ri ekʼo pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ: “Chisaʼj ri ixchaʼom taq winaq rech ri Nutat, chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ ri echbʼal rech ri Ajawibʼal che sukʼumam uloq chiwech ri ix chiʼ pa ri utikik ukʼiyik uloq ri uwachulew.
Rumal rech che ri in xinnumik kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix xiya ri nuwa, ri in xchaqij nuchiʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix xiya wukʼyaʼ, ri in man in iwinaq taj kʼatekʼuriʼ xinikʼulaj iwukʼ,
ri in, inchʼanalik kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix xiya watzʼyaq, ri in, in yawabʼ tekʼuriʼ ri ix xinisolij, ri in, in kʼo pa cheʼ tekʼuriʼ ri ix xiniwilaʼ”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim riʼ, ri esukʼlaj taq winaq kkibʼij riʼ chrech: “Ajawxel, ¿jumpaʼ ri xatqil ri uj che at xatnumik tekʼuriʼ xqaya ri awa, on che ri at xchaqij achiʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ ri uj xqaya ri awukʼyaʼ,
on jumpaʼ neʼ man atqawinaq taj kʼatekʼuriʼ xatqakʼulaj qukʼ, on at chʼanalik tekʼuriʼ ri uj xqaya awatzʼyaq,
on at yawabʼ neʼ, on at kʼo neʼ pa cheʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ ri uj xatqilaʼ?”».
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ajawinel kubʼij na we tzij chkech riʼ: “Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech che aretaq chiʼ xibʼan ri jastaq riʼ chrech ri inlaj chʼutin chkixoʼl ri ewachalal, chwech ri in xibʼan weriʼ”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij na riʼ chkech ri winaq che ekʼo pa ri umox: “Jix, chi naj bʼi chwech ri in, itzel taq winaq, jix pa ri junalik qʼaqʼ che sukʼumam chrech ri kʼaxtokʼ e chkech ri eʼanjel che erech areʼ.
Rumal rech che ri in, xinnumik kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix man xiya ta nuwa, ri in xchaqij nuchiʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix man xiya ta wukʼyaʼ,
ri in, man iniwinaq taj kʼatekʼuriʼ man xinikʼulaj ta iwukʼ, ri in, in chʼanalik kʼatekʼuriʼ man xiya ta watzʼyaq, ri in, in yawabʼ e in kʼo pa cheʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ man xiniwilaʼ taj”.
Chi chanim kkibʼij na we nikʼaj riʼ: “Ajawxel, ¿jumpaʼ xatqil ri uj che xatnumik, on che xchaqij achiʼ, on che man atqawinaq taj, on che at chʼanalik, on che at yawabʼ, on che at kʼo pa cheʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri uj man kʼo ta jun utzil xqabʼan chawech?”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ kubʼij na riʼ chkech: “Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, che ronojel ri jastaq che man xibʼan ta chrech ri inlaj chʼutiʼn chkixoʼl ri ewachalal, chwech ri in man xibʼan ta wi weriʼ”».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ we eʼareʼ riʼ, kebʼe na riʼ pa jun junalik kʼax, e ri esukʼlaj taq winaq kebʼe na riʼ pa jun junalik kʼaslemal».
E aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus kukʼis ubʼixik ronojel we tzij riʼ, kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ:
«Ri ix iwetaʼm chik, ri Qʼaxebʼal xaq pa kebʼ qʼij chi apanoq; kʼatekʼuriʼ kjachitaj na ri ukʼojol ri achi arech kripabʼaʼxik».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim kkimulij kibʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri enimaʼq taq winaq, pa ri nimalaj rachoch ri Nim chuchqajaw che Kaʼifas ri ubʼiʼ;
e kkisukʼubʼaʼ uchomaxik arech rukʼ subʼunik kkichap ri Jesus, e kkikamisaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij: «Man kqachap taj pa ri nimaqʼij, arech man kkitukij ta kibʼ ri winaq».
Ri Jesus kʼo pa Bʼetaniʼa, pa ri rachoch ri Simon tajin kqʼiy ri ubʼaqil.
Kqibʼ ukoq jun ixoq rukʼ che rukʼam uloq jun lmeʼt bʼanom rukʼ jeʼlik taq abʼaj, nojinaq chrech kʼokʼlaj kunabʼal che sibʼalaj paqal rajil. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuqʼej ri kʼokʼ kunabʼal puwiʼ ri ujolom ri areʼ aretaq chiʼ tajin kwaʼik.
Aretaq chiʼ kkil weriʼ ri etijoxelabʼ man utz taj kkinaʼ chrech e kkibʼij: «¿Jasche, xaq kubʼan kʼax chrech weriʼ?
Xuya ta neʼ weta paqal rajil xkʼayixik e ri pwaq xya ta neʼ chkech ri emebʼaʼibʼ».
Ri Jesus retaʼm ri tajin kkibʼij e kubʼij chkech: «¿Jasche che kitzijoj we ixoq riʼ? Ri areʼ xubʼan jun utzalaj bʼanoj chwech ri in.
Rumal nakʼut che ri emebʼaʼibʼ kekʼojiʼ riʼ ronojel taq qʼij iwukʼ. Kʼatekʼut, ri in, man ronojel mul ta waʼ kinkʼojiʼ iwukʼ.
We kunabʼal kuqʼejej ri areʼ cho we nubʼaqil riʼ, kinsukʼumaj chuxeʼ kanoq ri numuqik.
Qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, xaq jawijeʼ neʼ kbʼix na ri Utzalaj Tzij pa ronojel ri uwachulew, xoqujeʼ kbʼix na waʼ ri xubʼan we areʼ riʼ, arech jun naʼtisabʼal rech ri areʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chkech ri ekabʼlajuj, ri kbʼix Judas Iskariʼote chrech, kbʼe kukʼ ri enimaʼq chuchqajawibʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «¿Jas ri kiwaj kiya chwech, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in kinjach ri areʼ chiwech?». Ri eʼareʼ kkitoj juwinaq lajuj saq pwaq chrech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi are ubʼi chiʼ riʼ, ri areʼ kutzukuj jun utz kajbʼal arech kujach ri areʼ chkech.
Pa ri nabʼe qʼij rech kaxlanwa man kʼo ta uchʼamil (Azimos), ri etijoxelabʼ keqibʼ rukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jawichiʼ kawaj che kqasukʼumaj chawech arech katij ri alaj chij rech Qʼaxebʼal?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Jix pa ri tinamit pa ri rachoch ri jun achi, kʼatekʼuriʼ chibʼij chrech: “Ri ajtij kubʼij chawech: Naqaj chik kʼo wi ri nukajbʼal, pa ri awachoch, ri in kinnimaqʼijarisaj wi ri Qʼaxebʼal kukʼ ri enutijoxelab”».
Ri etijoxelabʼ kkibʼano jeʼ jas xubʼij ri Jesus chkech, e kkisukʼumaj ri Qʼaxebʼal.
Aretaq chiʼ kqaj ri qʼij, kkʼojiʼ cho ri mexa kukʼ ri ekabʼlajuj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ tajin kewaʼik, ri Jesus kubʼij: «Qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, che jun chixoʼl ri ix kinujach na ri in».
Ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj kebʼisonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel chkijujunal kkibʼij chrech: «¿La in ne lo, Ajawxel?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «¡Ri jun che kuya ri uqʼabʼ wukʼ ri in pa ri plato, are riʼ ri kinujach na!
Ri ukʼojol ri achi kbʼek jeriʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik chrij ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼut, sibʼalaj kʼax rech riʼ ri jun achi che kjachow ri ukʼojol ri achi. Are sibʼalaj utz riʼ chrech ri achi riʼ weta mat xalax na choqʼijsaq!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri Judas, ri kjachow na ri areʼ, kuta chrech: «¿La in ne lo Rabʼbʼi?». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «¡Jeʼ, at katbʼin weriʼ!»
E aretaq chiʼ tajin kewaʼik, ri Jesus kukʼam ukoq ri kaxlanwa, e kutewchiʼj, kupiro, e aretaq kuya chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kubʼij: «Chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ, chitijaʼ bʼaʼ, are waʼ we nubʼaqil».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kukʼam ukoq ri jun pajbʼal amajaʼ e aretaq kbʼantaj ri jun maltyoxinik, kuya chkech e kubʼij chkech: «Chiqumuj iwonojel,
rumal rech che are waʼ we nukikʼel rech ri chapbʼal qʼabʼ, che kqʼejej na rumal kech sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq jeʼ jas sachbʼal ri jetaq makaj.
E ri in kinbʼij chiwech, che man kinqumuj ta chi waʼ we uwaʼl ri uwach ri vid, chi kʼateʼ na ri jun qʼij chik, che kʼakʼ chik kinqumuj iwukʼ ri ix pa ri rajawibʼal ri Nutat».
Aretaq chiʼ kkibʼixoj taq ri bʼixobʼal, keʼel bʼik e kebʼe pa ri juyubʼ Olivo.
Chi chanim kubʼij ri Jesus chkech: «Iwonojel waʼ ri ix kixtzaq na waʼ chaqʼabʼ kamik riʼ, rumal wech ri in. Rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: Ri in, kinsok na ri ajyuqʼ, e ri taq chij kkijubʼuj na kibʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kinkʼastaj na, kinnabʼej na chiwach ri ix kinbʼe pa Galileʼa».
Ri Luʼ kchʼawik e kubʼij chrech: «Kneʼbʼa konojel ketzaqik rumal awech ri at, ri in xas man kintzaq ta riʼ».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Qastzij kinbʼij chawech: Che chi chaqʼabʼ kamik riʼ, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ na koqʼ ri amaʼ ekʼ, ri at oxmul chi riʼ abʼim che man awetaʼm ta nuwach».
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Kneʼbʼaʼ kinkam na awukʼ, ri in man kinbʼij taj che man wetaʼm ta awach». E xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kkibʼij konojel ri etijoxelabʼ.
Kopan ri Jesus kukʼ pa jun kʼolibʼal che ubʼiʼ Getsemani, e kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Chixkanaj kan waral, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in kinchʼaw na rukʼ ri Dyos jelaʼ apanoq».
Keʼukʼam ubʼi rukʼ ri areʼ, ri Luʼ e ri kebʼ eʼukʼojol ri Sebʼedeʼo, e kumajij unaʼik sibʼalaj xibʼarikil e bʼisobʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri wuxlabʼal sibʼalaj kbʼisonik jeʼ jas kopan cho kamikal, chixkanaj kan waral e chixkʼasal wukʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ kbʼek knabʼej apan jubʼiqʼ, jupalik ktzaq uwach cho ri ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ jewaʼ ri chʼawem kubʼan rukʼ ri Dyos: «¡Nutat, we kuyaʼo, oj bʼaʼ naj chwech ri in we qumubʼal riʼ! Kʼatekʼut, man are ta chbʼantajoq ri kinwaj ri in, xane are chbʼantajoq ri kawaj ri at!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe uloq kukʼ ri etijoxelabʼ, e ewarinaq keʼuriqaʼ ri eʼareʼ. Kubʼij chrech ri Luʼ: «¡Jeʼ nakʼut, ri ix man kʼo ta ichuqʼabʼ arech kixkʼasiʼ jun kajbʼal wukʼ ri in!
Chixkʼasaloq e chixchʼawoq rukʼ ri Dyos, arech man kixqaj ta pa ri itzelal; rumal rech che ri uxlabʼal usukʼubʼam chi ribʼ, kʼatekʼut ri bʼaqilal man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ».
Kbʼe chi jumul, arech pa ukamul chik kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, jewaʼ kubʼij: «Nutat, we man kuyaʼo che mat kinqumuj we qumubʼal che petinaq uloq riʼ, are chbʼantaj bʼaʼ ri arayibʼal ri at!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpetik, e jumul chik ewarinaq keʼuriqaʼ ri eʼareʼ, rumal rech che kʼax kiwoqʼoch che ri kiwaram.
Keʼuya kan ri eʼareʼ, kbʼe chi jumul, arech pa urox mul chik kchʼaw chi rukʼ ri Dyos e kuroxmulij ubʼixik ri tzij ubʼim kanoq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe uloq kukʼ ri etijoxelabʼ e kubʼij chkech: «We chanim riʼ kuya chik kixwarik e kixuxlanik. Xopan ri kajbʼal: Che ri ukʼojol ri achi kjachitaj na pa kiqʼabʼ ri eʼajmakibʼ.
¡Chixwaʼlijoq! ¡Joʼ bʼaʼ! Ri jun che kinujach na ri in, naqaj chik kʼo wi».
Aretaq chiʼ tajin na kchʼawik, kopan ri Judas, jun chkech ri ekabʼlajuj, e epetinaq uloq rukʼ juqʼat ewinaq che kukʼam kichʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj rachiʼl taq cheʼ. Epetinaq uloq rumal che etaqom uloq kumal ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e kumal ri enimaʼq taq winaq.
Ri jun itzel rachiʼl ri areʼ che kujach na chkech ri eʼareʼ uyaʼom chkech, we jun kʼutbʼal riʼ: «Ri jun che kinya jun tzʼumanik chrech, are riʼ ri areʼ. Chichapaʼ bʼaʼ ri areʼ».
Chi chanim kqibʼ koq rukʼ ri Jesus e kubʼij chrech: «¡Utz awach Rabʼbʼi!», e kutzʼumaj ukoq.
Kʼatekʼut ri Jesus kubʼij: «Wachiʼl, chabʼanaʼ ri rumal at petinaq uloq». Kʼatekʼuriʼ kepetik e kkikoj kiqʼabʼ chrech ri Jesus e kkichapo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chkech ri ekʼo rukʼ ri Jesus, kukʼam koq ri uchʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj, kresaj uloq e kusok ri upatanijel ri nim chuchqajaw, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuqʼat ubʼi ri uxikin.
Chi chanim kubʼij ri Jesus chrech: «Chayaʼaʼ ri achʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj pa ri ukʼolibʼal; rumal rech che ronojel ri jun che kuchap na chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj, kkam na rukʼ ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoj.
On ¿la kachomaj che man kinkowin ta ri in kinta chrech ri Nutat, e chi chanim riʼ kuya chwech, ekʼi na chuwach kabʼlajuj jumulaj eʼanjel?
¿Jas kʼut ri ubʼanik riʼ ri Tzij che kubʼij che kbʼantaj na jeʼ jas we kbʼantajik riʼ?».
Chi chanim ri Jesus kubʼij chkech ri winaq: «¿La jacha chrij jun elaqʼom xixel uloq che nuchapik rukʼ taq chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj e rukʼ taq cheʼ? Ronojel taq qʼij, ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ pa ri rachoch ri Dyos. Xinkʼut ri tzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ man xinichap taj».
Jeʼ nakʼut kkʼulmatajik ronojel weriʼ, arech kbʼantajik ri tzʼibʼatalik kumal ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel ri etijoxelabʼ kkiya kan utukel ri areʼ, e keʼanimajik.
Ri kechapow ubʼi ri Jesus kkikʼam ubʼi pa ri rachoch ri Kaʼifas ri Nimalaj Chuchqajaw, jawiʼ neʼ kimulin chi kibʼ ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri enimaʼq taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Luʼ naj wi uterneʼm ubʼi ri areʼ, chi kopan pa ri nim rachoch ri nim Chuchqajaw. Kok ubʼik e ktʼuyiʼ kukʼ ri eʼajpatanijelabʼ arech krilo ri kukʼisbʼej kan weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri enim taq chuchqajawibʼ e konojel ri Sanedrin kkitzukuj kkiyak chrij ri Jesus jun qʼatbʼaltzij che man tzij taj, arech kkikamisaj ri areʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kkiriq taj, kneʼbʼaʼ sibʼalaj ekʼiʼ ri eyakal taq tzij xepetik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ukʼisbʼalil kanoq kepe uloq kebʼ,
che kkibʼij: «We jun achi riʼ xubʼij: ri in kinkowin che uwilixik ri rachoch ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ kʼakʼ chik kinyako pa oxibʼ qʼij».
Ktakʼiʼk ri Nim Chuchqajaw e kubʼij chrech: «¿La man kʼo ta jun tzij kabʼij? ¿Su waʼ we kkibʼij we winaq chawij at riʼ?».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Jesus man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij. Ri Nimalaj Chuchqajaw kubʼij chrech: «Pa ri ubʼiʼ ri kʼaslikaj Dyos chabʼij bʼaʼ chqech, we at, at ri Kristo, ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «At katbʼin weriʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼij chiwech: Chi chanim ubʼik riʼ kiwil na ri ukʼojol ri achiʼ tʼuyulnaq pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri kowinem, e che petinaq uloq pa taq ri usutzʼ ri kaj».
Chi chanim, ri Nimalaj Chuchqajaw kuroqpij ri ratzʼyaq e kubʼij: «Ri areʼ xubʼij jun itzel tzij puwiʼ ri Dyos! ¿La rajawaxik na nikʼaj chik qʼatbʼaltzij chqech? ¡Ri ix, kʼateriʼ xito, ri itzel tzij puwiʼ ri Dyos!
¿Su kichomaj puwiʼ?». Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij: «Taqal ri kamikal chrij».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkimajij uchubʼaxik e uchʼayik chupalaj. E kʼo nikʼaj chik kkichʼayo
e kkibʼij chrech: «Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ at qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, chachʼobʼoʼ ampe Kristo, chabʼij chqech, ¿jachin tajin katchʼayowik?»
Kʼatekʼuriʼ arechiʼ tajin weriʼ, ri Luʼ tʼuyul apanoq cho ja. Kqibʼ ukoq jun mokom rukʼ ri areʼ e kubʼij chrech: «Ri at, xoqujeʼ at kʼo rukʼ ri Jesus che ri jun Ajgalileʼa».
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ, jayiʼ, kcha chkiwach konojel ri winaq e kubʼij: «Man wetaʼm taj su ri kabʼij».
Rumal che kel apanoq cho ri uchiʼja, jun mokom chik kril ri areʼ e kubʼij chkech ri winaq che ekʼo chilaʼ: «We areʼ riʼ, jun rukʼ ri Ajnasareno».
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ, jumul chik, jayiʼ, kchaʼ, kujikibʼaʼ ri utzij: «Ri in man wetaʼm ta uwach we jun achi riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri winaq ekʼo chilaʼ, chi chanim keqibʼ ukoq e kkibʼij chrech ri Luʼ: «Qastzij nakʼut, che ri at, at jun kukʼ ri eʼareʼ: kʼatekʼuriʼ xoqujeʼ ri achʼabʼal katuqʼalajisaj».
Xa jeʼkʼuriʼ, xujikibʼaʼ chi ri utzij kubʼij: «Ri in, man wetaʼm ta uwach ri achi riʼ». E chi chanim koqʼ jun ama ekʼ.
E ri Luʼ, knaʼtajik chrech ri tzij xubʼij ri Jesus chrech: «Majaʼ na koqʼ ri amaʼ ekʼ, oxmul chi riʼ abʼim, che ri at, man awetaʼm ta nuwach ri in». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ kel ubʼik, e kumajij sibʼalaj oqʼej.
Aretaq chiʼ ksaqarsan uwachulew, konojel ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri enimaʼq taq winaq chik, kkimulij kibʼ rumal ri Jesus arech kkikamisaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiximo, kkikʼam ubʼik e kkijach puqʼabʼ ri Pilato.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Judas, ri xjachowik, aretaq chiʼ krilo che xqʼat tzij puwiʼ ri areʼ, xchaptaj ri ranimaʼ rukʼ kʼax, kutzalij ri juwinaq lajuj pwaq chkech ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e chkech ri enim taq winaq chik;
kubʼij: «Ri in xinmakunik rumal rech che xinjach ukikʼel jun sukʼlaj winaq». Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿La kʼo puch qech uj chrech? At laʼ katilowik».
Chi chanim kukʼyaq kan taq ri pwaq pa ri rachoch ri Dyos, kel ubʼik, kbʼek e kuʼjitzʼaj ribʼ.
Ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ kkimulij taq ri pwaq kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij: «Man yaʼtal taj kya pa ri kʼolibʼal pwaq, rumal rech che rajil ukikʼel winaq».
Aretaq chiʼ xchomatajik kumal, kkiloqʼ rukʼ we pwaq riʼ, «ri rulew ri jun ajbʼanal bʼoʼj», arech chilaʼ kemuq wi ri winaq che man ekiwinaqil taj.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, we jun ulew riʼ kbʼix chrech: «rulew ukikʼel winaq», xoqujeʼ chi kbʼix na kamik riʼ.
Xa jeʼ kʼuriʼ, chanim qastzij xbʼantaj ri utzij ri Jeremiʼas ri qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos: kkimulij ri juwinaq lajuj pwaq, ri pwaq che jeriʼ rajil ri jun che sibʼalaj nim rajil, che xkikojo enikʼaj eralkʼuwaʼl ri Israʼel che uloqʼik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ weriʼ xkiloqʼ ri rulew ri ajbʼanal bʼoʼj, jeʼ jas xtaqan ri Ajawxel chwech.
Ri Jesus kkʼam ubʼi chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij e ri qʼatbʼaltzij kuta chrech ri areʼ: «¿La at riʼ, at ajawinel chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo?». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Jeʼ nakʼut, at katbʼin weriʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri enim taq winaq chik kkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ, man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi chanim ri Pilato kubʼij chrech: «¿La man kata taj ronojel ri jastaq kkibʼij chawij?».
E ri Jesus man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij chrech ri kbʼix puwiʼ ri areʼ. Xa jeʼ kʼuriʼ ri Pilato sibʼalaj ksach ukʼuʼx chrech.
Pa chjujunal nimaqʼij, ri qʼatbʼaltzij kutzaqapij chkiwach ri siwantinamit, jun chkech ri ekʼo pa cheʼ, ri jun che kkaj ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼo kʼut pa cheʼ, jun winaq che sibʼalaj etaʼmatal uwach che ubʼiʼ Bʼarrabʼas.
Ri Pilato kubʼij chkech ri winaq che kkimulim kibʼ chilaʼ: «¿La kiwaj che are kintzaqapij bʼi chiwach ri Bʼarrabʼas, on ri Jesus che Kristo kbʼix chrech?».
Rumal rech che ri areʼ retaʼm che xkijach ri areʼ, rumal tiʼtik kkinaʼ chrech.
Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kʼolik jawijeʼ kbʼan wi ri qʼatbʼaltzij, ri rixoqil ktaqan che ubʼixik chrech ri areʼ: «Xaq jun chatkʼol wi rukʼ we sukʼlaj winaq riʼ, rumal rech che miʼer, sibʼalaj kʼax xinriqo pa jun wichikʼ, rumal ri areʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri enimaʼq taq winaq kkikoj kikʼuʼx ri winaq arech are kkitaʼo che are ktzaqapaxik ri Bʼarrabʼas e arech are kkitaʼo che are kchup uwach ri Jesus.
Ri qʼaxel qʼatbʼaltzij kubʼij chkech: «¿Jachinchike le ekebʼ che are kiwaj kintzaqapij ubʼi chiwach?». Kkibʼij: «¡Are le Bʼarrabʼas!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «E su kʼu waʼ kinbʼan na chrech ri Jesus, ri kbʼix Kristo chrech?». Konojel junam kkibʼij: «¡Chripabʼaʼxoq ri areʼ cho ri ripabʼal!».
Kubʼij: «¿Su ri kʼax ubʼanom?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj ko kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «¡Chripabʼaʼxoq ri areʼ cho ri ripabʼal!».
Ri Pilato, aretaq chiʼ krilo che man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kkowinik, are ne sibʼalaj kechʼuʼjirik chi na, kukʼam ukoq ri jaʼ e kuchʼaj ri uqʼabʼ chkiwach ri winaq e kubʼij: «Ri in, man kʼo ta wech, ma kʼo ta numak chrech we ukikʼel we jun riʼ. Ix laʼ kixilowik!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri siwantinimit kkibʼij: «¡Qaj puch ri ukikʼel paqawiʼ ri uj e pakiwiʼ ri eqalkʼuwaʼl!».
Chi chanim kutzaqapij ubʼi ri Bʼarrabʼas chkech, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kujach ubʼi ri Jesus pa kiqʼabʼ arechiʼ xchʼiyitajik rukʼ asyar, arech kkiripabʼaʼ cho ri ripabʼal.
Chi xaqbʼiʼ ri eʼuxoltato ri qʼatbʼaltzij kkikʼam ubʼi ri Jesus pa ri nimalaj ja, ri Pretoriʼo, e kesikʼix konojel ri kohorte chrij.
Kkichʼanabʼaʼ ri areʼ e kkichʼuq chrech jun kyaqlaj atzʼyaq.
Kkipachʼuj ri kʼix, kkibʼan jun ketakik chrech e kkikoj cho ri ujolom, e kkikoj jun aj pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kexukiʼ chuwach ri areʼ, kketzʼabʼej uwach, e kkibʼij: «¡Utzalaj awach at, at ajawinel kech ri ajjudiʼo!».
Aretaq chiʼ kchubʼataj uwach, kkikʼam ukoq jun aj e kkiqʼosij ri ujolom rukʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ketzʼabʼetaj uwach kumal ri eʼareʼ, kkesaj ri jun kyaqlaj atzʼyaq chrech e kkikoj chi ubʼi jumul ri ratzʼyaq ri areʼ, e kkikʼam ubʼik, arech kkiripabʼaʼ cho ri ripabʼal.
Aretaq chiʼ keʼel ubʼik, kkiriq jun achi Ajsirene. Simon ri ubʼiʼ e kkitaq ri areʼ arech kukʼam ubʼi ri uripabʼal.
Aretaq chiʼ keʼopan pa ri jun kʼolibʼal che Golgota ri ubʼiʼ, e weriʼ kubʼij: kʼolibʼal rech jolomaj,
kkiya ri amajaʼ chrech, che yujtalik rukʼ ri kʼa arech kuqumuj; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ knaʼtajik rumal, man kraj taj kutijo.
Aretaq chiʼ ripatajinaq chik, xketzʼabʼej ubʼi ujachik ri ratzʼyaq chkiwach.
E ketʼuyiʼ kan chilaʼ arech kkilaqʼbʼej ri areʼ.
Ajsik chrech ri ujolom kkikojo jawijeʼ tzʼibʼatalik wi ri qʼatojtzij xbʼan puwiʼ: «Are waʼ we Jesus, ri ajawinel kech ri ajjudiʼo»..
Chi junam rukʼ ri areʼ keripabʼaxik ekebʼ elaqʼomabʼ, jun pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ e jun pa ri umox.
Ri winaq che keqʼax ukoq chilaʼ, kke-tzelaj uwach e kkijichʼijaʼ ri ujolom.
Kkibʼij: «¡Ri at che kakʼis tzij puwiʼ ri rachoch ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ kayak chi jumul pa oxibʼ qʼij, chakoloʼ bʼaʼ awibʼ ri at, we at ukʼojol ri Dyos, e chaqasaj uloq awibʼ cho ri ripabʼal!».
Xoqujeʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ, ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri enimaʼq taq winaq ketzʼabʼej uwach chkixoʼl, eʼareʼ kkibʼij:
«¡Ri areʼ xeʼukol nikʼaj chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kkowin ta chrech ukolik ribʼ areʼ! Areʼ, ajawinel chrech ri Israʼel: chqaj bʼaʼ uloq chanim riʼ cho ri ripabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ kujkojon laʼ chrech!
Ukubʼaʼm ukʼuʼx chrij ri Dyos, chutzaqopij bʼaʼ ri Dyos kamik riʼ, ¡we qastzij che kuloqʼaj uwach! Rumal rech che ubʼim nakʼut: ¡In, inukʼojol ri Dyos!».
Xoqujeʼ sibʼalaj kʼax ketzelaj uwach ri eʼelaqʼomabʼ eripabʼam rukʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kopan ri uwaq kajbʼal, kqʼequʼmarik ronojel ri uwachulew kʼateʼ ri ubʼelej kajbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ri ubʼelej kajbʼal, ri Jesus ko kuraqaqej uchiʼ: «Eli, Eli ¿lema sabaktani?». Weriʼ kubʼij: «Nudyos, Nudyos, ¿jasche kinawonbʼaʼ kanoq?».
Ejujun chkech ri ekʼo chilaʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkita ri utzij, kkibʼij: «¡Chech ri Eliʼas ksikʼin we areʼ riʼ!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun chkech ri eʼareʼ kutij anim kbʼek, e kumubʼaʼ uloq jun woʼs pa vinagre. Kukoj chech utzaʼm jun aj e kuya chrech arech kuqumuj.
Kʼatekʼut, ri enikʼaj chik kkibʼij chrech: «¡Chayaʼaʼ kanoq! ¡Chqilaʼ na we kpe ri Eliʼas chech ukolik!».
Kʼatekʼut, chi chanim chik ri Je-sus ko kuraqaqej uchiʼ e kujach ri ranimaʼ.
Pa taq weriʼ, kuroqpij ribʼ ri usuʼt ri nim rachoch ri Dyos pa kebʼ uchʼaqapil, chi ajsik uloq kʼa chuxeʼ; kbʼirir ri ulew, kuraqij ribʼ taq ri abʼaj,
kujaq ribʼ ri kijul ri kaminaqibʼ, e sibʼalaj ekʼi bʼaqilal kech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq kkʼastaj uwach kʼakʼ kikʼaslemal:
Keʼel ubʼik pa taq ri jul aretaq kʼastajinaq chi kiwach, keʼopan pa ri tyoxlaj tinimit, kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj winaq keʼilowik ri eʼareʼ
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal e ri enikʼaj achijabʼ chik che ekʼo rukʼ chech uchajixik ri Jesus, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri kabʼraqan e ronojel ri jastaq kbʼantajik, sibʼalaj kkixibʼij kibʼ e kkibʼij: «Qastzij nakʼut, we areʼ riʼ Ukʼojol ri Dyos!».
Ekʼo chilaʼ ekʼi ixoqibʼ che naj kekaʼy uloq, ri eʼareʼ che xkiterneʼbʼej uloq areʼ, aretaq chiʼ kʼo Galileʼa arech xkipatanij;
chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, kʼo ri Mariʼy Mataʼl, ri Mariʼy che are kinan ri koʼlik Santiʼago e ri Jose, e ri kinan ri eʼukʼojol ri Sebʼedeʼo.
Aretaq chiʼ kqaj uwach ri qʼij, kpe jun qʼinom achiʼ Ajarimateʼa, Jose ri ubʼiʼ, che xoqujeʼ okinaq utijoxel ri Jesus.
Kpetik rukʼ ri Pilato e kuta ri ubʼaqilal ri Jesus chrech. Ri Pilato, chi chanim ktaqanik arech kjach chrech.
Ri Jose kukʼam ubʼi ri ubʼaqilal, kubʼotzʼ pa jun saq atzʼyaq rech kamikal,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kumuq kan pa jun kʼakʼ jul, che rech ri areʼ bʼanom cho ri abʼaj; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukoj kan jun nimalaj abʼaj chuwach ri rokibʼal ri jul, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xbʼek.
Ekʼo chilaʼ, ri Mariʼy Mataʼl e ri jun Mariʼy chik, etʼuyul chuwach ri jul.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, ri jun qʼij chuwach chi apan ri Sukʼumanik, ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri efariseʼo, junam kebʼe pa ri rachoch ri Pilato.
E kkibʼij chrech: «Ajaw, ri uj kqanaʼtaj che ri jun subʼunel riʼ, xubʼij aretaq chiʼ kʼas na: “Chi chanim, pa oxibʼ qʼij kkʼastaj na nuwach”.
Chattaqan bʼaʼ arech kalaqʼabʼexik ri ujul chi pa ri urox qʼij na, weneʼ kebʼekelaqʼaj ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chik chkech ri winaq: “Ri areʼ ¡xkʼastaj ubʼi uwach chkixoʼl ri kaminaqibʼ!”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kʼisbʼal subʼunik are nim riʼ chuwach ri nabʼe».
Ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix kʼo juqʼat echajinelabʼ iwukʼ; jix bʼaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ chijikabʼaʼ uchajixik jeʼ jas kiwaj ri ix».
Keʼel ubʼik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkichajij ri jul, kkitzʼaqaqej ri jun abʼaj e kkikoj ri juqʼat echajinelabʼ.
Okʼowinaq chi ri qʼij sabʼado, aretaq chiʼ ksaqar uwach ri nabʼe qʼij chech ri xmano, ri Mariʼy Mataʼl e ri jun chik Mariʼy kekilaʼ ri jul.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi chanim kubʼan jun nimalaj kabʼraqan: ri anjel rech ri Ajawxel kqaj uloq chikaj e kubʼalkatij ubʼi ri jun abʼaj e ktʼuyiʼ puwiʼ.
Ri uwachbʼal ri areʼ jeʼ jas jun kuypaʼ, e ri ratzʼyaq, saq, jeʼ jas ri saq tew.
Ri juqʼat echajinelabʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri areʼ kebʼirbʼit rumal ri xibʼrikil e kekanajik jeʼ jas ekaminaqibʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ri anjel keʼuchʼabʼej ri ixoqibʼ e kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix, mixibʼij iwibʼ: ri in wetaʼm che are kitzukuj ri Jesus, ri Xripabʼaxik.
Man kʼo ta waral; rumal che ri areʼ xkʼastaj ubʼi uwach, jeʼ jas xubʼij. Chisaʼj jiwilaʼ ri ukʼolibʼal jawijeʼ ri xkanaj wi.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim, jix, jibʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: “Ri areʼ, xkʼastaj ubʼi uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ e knabʼej chiwach pa ri Galileʼa; jelaʼ na riʼ kiwil na uwach ri areʼ”. Xbʼitajik weriʼ chiwech, wumal ri in».
Chanim keʼel ubʼik pa ri ukʼolbʼal ri jul, rukʼ xibʼrikil e rukʼ nimalaj kiʼkotemal, kexakʼinik chrech ubʼixik ri jastaq riʼ chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus keʼuriqaʼ ri eʼareʼ, e kubʼij chkech: «¿La utz iwach?». Ri ixoqibʼ keqibʼ rukʼ, kkichap ri raqan, e kkiqasaj ri kijolom cho ri ulew chuwach ri areʼ chrech uqʼijilaxik.
Chi chanim ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Mixibʼij iwibʼ, jix bʼaʼ, jibʼij chkech ri eʼiwachalal arech kebʼe pa Galileʼa, e chilaʼ kinkil na wi riʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ ebʼenaq ubʼi ri eʼareʼ, ejujun chkech ri juqʼat echajinelabʼ, kebʼe pa ri tinimit che ubʼixik ronojel we jastaq riʼ chkech ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ riʼ kkimulij kibʼ kukʼ ri enimaʼq taq winaq, e aretaq chiʼ kbʼantaj ri kichomanik, kkiyaʼ sibʼalaj pwaq chkech ri exoltato,
chi nabʼe kkibʼij we tzij chkech riʼ: «Are chibʼij weriʼ: Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ xepe chaqʼabʼ e xkelaqʼaj bʼik aretaq chiʼ ujwarinaq ri uj».
E we kopan we jastaq ri utzijol weriʼ rukʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij, ri uj kutzijon na rukʼ ri areʼ e kqakoj na pa ujolom arech man kʼo ta jun kʼax kpe chiwach ri ix».
Ri eʼareʼ kkikʼam ubʼi ri pwaq, e jeriʼ kkibʼano jeʼ jas ri xbʼix chkech, e ri eʼajjudiʼo jeriʼ ubʼixik kkibʼan na we tzij riʼ xas cho taq we qʼij na kamik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri juʼlajuj etijoxelabʼ, kebʼe pa ri Galileʼa cho ri juyubʼ che ubʼim chi kan ri Jesus chkech.
Aretaq chiʼ kkil uwach, kkiqasaj ri kijolom cho ri ulew. E ekʼo jujun chkech kubʼan kebʼ kikʼuʼx.
Ri Jesus kqibʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ e jewaʼ we tzij kubʼij chkech riʼ: «Ronojel kowinem yaʼom chwech chikaj e cho ri uwach ulew.
Jix bʼaʼ, e chibʼanaʼ etijoxelabʼ chkech konojel ri winaq chuwachulew, chibʼanaʼ kiqasnaʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Tatxel, pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Kʼojolxel, e pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel,
chikʼutuʼ chkiwach ri ukʼolik pa kanimaʼ ronojel ri jastaq che xinbʼij chiwech. Kʼatekʼuriʼ chiwilaʼ weriʼ, che ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ ronojel qʼij chi kʼateʼ na ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uwach ulew».
Umajibʼal ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Jesus Kristo, Ukʼojol ri Dyos.
Jeʼ jas tzʼibʼatalik pa ri uwuj ri Isaʼiʼas ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos: Jeʼ, kintaq ubʼi ri nupataninel chawach arech kusukʼumaj ri abʼe.
Uchʼawibʼal ri kuraqaqej uchiʼ pa ri tzʼinalik ulew: Chisukʼumaj ri ubʼe ri Ajawxel, chibʼanaʼ jikom chrech ri ubʼe.
Ri Xwan ri Qasaljaʼ xbʼe pa ri tzʼinalik ulew, kuya ubʼixik jun qasnaʼ rech kʼexoʼj kʼuʼx e sachbʼal makaj.
Kepetik, keʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ, ri winaq rech ri Judeʼa, ri winaq rech ri Jerusalem. Kubʼan ri kiqasnaʼ ri eʼareʼ e kkisol ri kimak.
Ri Xwan ukojom jun utzʼumal kameyo; e kutzuq ribʼ rukʼ taq sakʼ e rukʼ uwaʼlcheʼ.
E kubʼij: «Petinaq uloq chwij ri in, jun chik che are ko chi na chnuwach ri in. Ri in man taqal ta chwij kinmej wibʼ chuwach e che kinturu ri uxajabʼ.
Ri in, xinbʼan ri iqasnaʼ rukʼ jaʼ, kʼatekʼut ri areʼ kubʼan na riʼ ri iqasnaʼ pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa taq we qʼij riʼ, ri Jesus kpe uloq chi pa ri Nasaret rech ri Galileʼa, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Xwan kubʼan uqasnaʼ pa ri Jordan.
E aretaq chiʼ kpaqiʼ uloq pa ri jaʼ, krilo che kjaqataj ri kaj e ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel jeʼ jas jun palomax che kqaj uloq puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chʼabʼal kpe uloq pa ri kaj: «At ri at loqʼalaj nukʼojol, at ri kʼo ronojel nutoqʼobʼ awukʼ».
Xas uchanim riʼ, ri Uxlabʼaxel kuchʼikmej ubʼi ri areʼ pa ri tzʼinalik ulew.
E kkʼojiʼ pa ri tzʼinalik ulew kawinaq qʼij. Ri Satanas kutaqchʼij ri areʼ che ri makaj. Ri areʼ kʼo chkixoʼl ri chikop, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼanjel kkipatanij ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ, xjachitaj ri Xwan, ri Jesus kpe uloq pa ri Galileʼa, kuya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Dyos:
«Ukamik riʼ xtzʼaqat ri kajbʼal, ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos naqaj chik kʼo wi: Chikʼexaʼ bʼaʼ ri ikʼuʼx e chixkojon bʼaʼ chrech ri kʼakʼ Utzalaj Tzij».
Aretaq chiʼ tajin kasutin chuchiʼ ri polow ri Galileʼa, keril ri Simon e ri Atrix, che rachalal ri Simon, tajin kkikʼyaq ri kʼat pa ri polow. Ri eʼareʼ eʼajchapal taq kär.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Chiniterneʼbʼej ri in, e kinbʼan na chiwech, ix chapal taq kär chkech ri winaq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim kkiya kan ri kikʼat e kkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ.
Kbʼin chi apanoq jubʼiqʼ e keril ri Santiʼago ukʼojol ri Sebʼedeʼo, e ri Xwan che rachalal areʼ. Xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ ekʼo pa ri jukubʼ e tajin kkisukʼumaj ri kikʼat.
Chi chanim keʼusikʼij. Ri eʼareʼ kkiya kan ri kikat Sebʼedeʼo pa ri jukubʼ kukʼ ri erajchakibʼ e kkiterneʼbʼej bʼi ri areʼ.
Keʼokik pa ri Kafarnaʼum. Arechiʼ qʼij sabʼado, kok pa ri ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal kʼatekʼuriʼ, katijonik chrech ri tzij.
Utz kkita ri utzij, rumal che ktijonik jeʼ jas jun winaq che kʼo reqleʼn, man junam ta kukʼ ri etzʼibʼanel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa ri sinagoga kʼo jun achi che chapom rumal jun itzel uxlabʼal, xumajij kuraqaqej uchiʼ
e kubʼij: «¿Jas kawaj chqech ri uj, Jesus at Ajnasaret? ¿La xatpetik arech kakʼisaʼ tzij paqawiʼ ri uj? In wetaʼm at jachin ri at: at ri at tyoxlaj uwinaq ri Dyos».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kuyajyatej ri areʼ: «Makʼo jun tzij mabʼij, chatel uloq rukʼ ri areʼ».
Ri areʼ sibʼalaj kutzuytzaʼ ri itzel uxlabʼal, sibʼalaj kuraqaqej uchiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kel uloq rukʼ ri areʼ.
Konojel ri winaq kkixibʼij kibʼ e kkita chkibʼil kibʼ: «¿Jas waʼ weriʼ? ¡Jun kʼakʼ tzij che kuya ubʼixik rukʼ reqleʼn! ¡Xoqujeʼ ktaqan chkech ri itzel taq uxlabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ keniman chrech!».
Kbʼe utzijol we jastaq riʼ pa ronojel ri rulew ri Galileʼa.
Arechiʼ kel uloq pa ri ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal, kpe kukʼ ri Santiʼago e ri Xwan pa ri rachoch ri Simon e ri Atrix.
Ri ujiʼ chichuʼ ri Simon kʼo pa chʼat rumal kʼo jun nimalaj qʼaqʼ chrij. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkitzijoj weriʼ chrech ri Areʼ.
Kqibʼ ukoq rukʼ ri areʼ, kuchap koq ri uqʼabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuwaʼlisaj. Ri nimalaj qʼaqʼ kel chrij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xok che kipatanaxik.
Aretaq chiʼ kqaj ri qʼij, kkʼam ubʼi chrech konojel ri eyawabʼibʼ, xoqujeʼ ri winaq che echapom rumal ri itzel uxlabʼal.
Konojel ri siwantinamit ekʼo ukoq chuchiʼ ri ja.
Keʼukunaj sibʼalaj iyawabʼibʼ winaq, e keʼukʼyaq ubʼi sibʼalaj eʼitzel. Man kuya ta bʼe chkech ri eʼitzel che kechʼawik, rumal che ketaʼm uwach ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kpakak uloq ri uxeʼ kaj, kwaʼlajik, kel ubʼik e kbʼe pa jun tzʼinalik ulew. Chilaʼ kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri Simon e ri erachiʼl kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kkiriqo, kkibʼij chech: «Konojel ri winaq katkitzukuj».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Joʼ pa jun kʼolibʼal chik, pa taq ri nikʼaj tinimit chik, arech, xoqujeʼ kintijonik chech ri tzij chilaʼ; ¡xa rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ inpetinaq uloqʼ!».
Kbʼe pa ronojel ri Galileʼa, ktijonik chrech ri tzij pa taq ri ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal e keʼukʼyaq ubʼi ri eʼitzel.
Jun winaq che tajin kaqʼiy ri utzʼumal, kpe rukʼ ri areʼ, kuta toqʼobʼ chrech, kxuliʼ chuwach e kubʼij chrech: «Weta kawaj, kuyaʼ waʼ kinakunaj ri in».
Ri Jesus kel ukʼuʼx chrech, ri areʼ kulikʼ ri uqʼabʼ, kuchapo ukoq kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech: «Kinwaj, chatkunatajoq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim chʼajchʼoj chik ri utzʼumal e kkunatajik.
Kujach ubʼi ri areʼ e kuqʼat uwach, arech man kubʼij ta weriʼ,
kubʼij chrech: «Man kʼo ta jun tzij kabʼij: are jat kʼut e jakʼutuʼ awibʼ chuwach ri chuchqajaw. Jaʼsujaj ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ rumal rech che at utz chik, jacha xtaqan ri Moʼises, arech jun ilabʼal chkiwach».
Ekʼut ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ xel ubʼik, sibʼalaj rukʼ kiʼkotemal kok che ubʼixik we jasach riʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ ri Jesus man kkowin ta chik utz rokibʼal kubʼan pa jun tinamit. Are kkanaj kanoq pa ri taq tolonik kolibʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri winaq kepe uloq rukʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kok chi jumul pa ri Kafarnaʼum, etaʼmatalik chik che ri areʼ kʼo cho ja.
Sibʼalaj winaq kepetik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta chi kʼolibʼal chuwach ri uchiʼja. Ri areʼ kuya ubʼixik ri tzij chkech.
Kkʼam ubʼi chuwach, jun chi che cheʼrinaq ubʼaqil, kʼamom ubʼi kumal ekijebʼ achijabʼ.
Man kekowin taj keʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ rumal rech che ekʼo sibʼalaj winaq, kkipaqabʼaʼ puwiʼ ri uxotal ri ja jawichiʼ kʼo wi ri areʼ. Kkibʼan jun teqʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkiqasaj ri chʼat jawiʼ qʼoyol wi ri kaminaq ubʼaqil achi.
Ri Jesus kril ri kikojonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech ri kaminaq ubʼaqil achi: «Walkʼuwaʼl, ksachitaj ri amak».
Etʼuyul chilaʼ enikʼaj ajtzʼibʼanel che kkichomaj pa kanimaʼ:
«¿Jasche che we achi riʼ kubʼij we tzij riʼ? Tajin kubʼij itzel tzij yoqʼabʼal rech ri Dyos! ¿Jachin kkowinik kusach ri makaj? Xaq xuwi ri Dyos».
Xas chanim, ri Jesus kunaʼ ri jastaq che kkichomaj pa ri kanimaʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech: «¿Jasche kichomaj weriʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ?
¿Jachinchike man kʼax ta ubʼixik: ksachitaj ri amak, on chatwaʼlijoq, chakʼamaʼ ukoq ri achʼat, kʼatekʼuriʼ chatbʼinoq?.
Xa jekʼuriʼ arech kiwetaʼmaj che ri ukʼojol ri achi kʼo ri ukowinem arech kusach ri makaj chuwachulew,
kintaqan chawech –kubʼij chrech ri kaminaq ubʼaqil achi– chatwaʼlijoq, chakʼamaʼ ubʼi ri achʼat, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jat cho ri awachoch».
Kwaʼlajik ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chanim kukʼam ubʼi ri uchʼatʼ e kel uloq chkiwach ri winaq. Ri winaq ksach kikʼuʼx kʼatekʼuriʼ, nim kkil wi ri Dyos, kkibʼij: «Man kʼo ta jumul qilom jun jasach che jeʼ jas weriʼ».
Kel chi ubʼi jumul chuchiʼ ri polow, kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri winaq kepe rukʼ ri areʼ, ri areʼ kukʼut ri tzij chkiwach.
Kbʼek, kʼatekʼuriʼ kril ri Levi, ri ukʼojol ri Alfeʼo, che tʼuyul pa ri jun kʼolbʼal jawiʼ kmol wi ri alkabʼal. Kubʼij chrech: «Chinaterneʼbʼej ri in». Ri areʼ kwaʼlajik e kuterneʼbʼej ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kʼo cho ri mexa pa ri rachoch ri Levi, sibʼalaj eʼajtoqʼinel pwaq e eʼajmakibʼ ekʼo cho ri mexa rukʼ ri Jesus e ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, rumal rech che sibʼalaj ekʼi ri kkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ.
Ri ekitzʼibʼanelabʼ ri efariseʼo, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri areʼ che kwaʼ kukʼ ri ajmakibʼ, kukʼ ri eʼajtoqʼinel pwaq, kkibʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «¿Suche? ¿La kwaʼ kukʼ ri eʼajtoqʼinel pwaq e kukʼ ri ajmakibʼ?».
Ri Jesus kuta weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri winaq kʼo kichuqʼabʼ man rajawaxik ta jun ajkunanel chkech, are rajawaxik chkech ri eyawabʼibʼ winaq. Ri in man inulpetinaq taj, arech keʼinulsikʼij ri esukʼ winaq, are kʼut inulpetinaq che kisikʼixik ri eʼajmakibʼ».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ri Xwan e ri efariseʼo tajin kemewajik. Rumal kʼuriʼ ekʼo jujun kebʼekibʼij chrech ri areʼ: «¿Suche, che ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ri Xwan e ri ekitijoxelabʼ ri efariseʼo kemewajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼatijoxelabʼ ri at man kemewaj taj?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «¿La kuyaʼo che ri erachil ri chʼabʼ ala kemewajik aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kʼo kukʼ? Aretaq chiʼ ri chʼabʼ ala kʼo kukʼ ri areʼ man kuya ta riʼ kemewajik.
Kʼatekʼut, kpe na riʼ nikʼaj taq qʼij aretaq chiʼ ri chʼabʼ ala kesax ubʼi chkech ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kemewaj bʼaʼ riʼ pa we jun qʼij riʼ.
Man kʼo ta jun kukʼajij jun qʼel atzʼyaq rukʼ uchʼaqapil jun kʼakʼ atzʼyaq. We jeriʼ, ri chʼaqap kʼakʼ atzʼyaq kujikʼej riʼ ri qʼel atzʼyaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kunimarisaj riʼ ri utelbʼalil.
Man kʼo ta jun kuya pa kʼolik ri kʼakʼ amajaʼ pa qʼeʼl taq tzʼum; we jeriʼ, ri amajaʼ kuraqij riʼ ri tzʼum. Kchachiʼ riʼ ri amajaʼ xoqujeʼ ri taq tzʼum kʼolibʼal rech. ¡Are kʼutʼ, ri kʼakʼ amajaʼ rajawaxik kkʼolik pa kʼakʼ taq tzʼum!».
Pa jun sabʼado, bʼenaq pa ri tikbʼal triko. Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkimichʼ ri triko arech kkibʼan jun bʼe.
Ri efariseʼo kkibʼij chrech: «¡Chawilampeʼ! ¿Suche kkibʼano ri man yatal taj kbʼanik pa ri qʼij sabʼado?».
Kubʼij chkech: «¿La man isikʼim taj ri jastaq xubʼan ri David e ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ rajawaxik chkech e aretaq chiʼ xkinaʼ numik,
jas rokik xubʼan pa ri rachoch ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ are nim chuchqajaw ri Abʼiʼatar, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xutij ri taq kaxlanwa rech ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ, che xuwi ri echuchqajawibʼ kuyaʼo kkitijo. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ xuya ri kaxlanwa chkech ri erachiʼl?».
