Kubʼij chkech jun tzijobʼelil: «Kʼo jun qʼinom achi, ri rulew xuya sibʼalaj uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kuchomaj pa ruxlabʼal: “¿Jas kinbʼan waʼ che weriʼ? Man kʼo ta nukʼujaʼ rech kinkʼolo”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij: “Kinbʼan na weriʼ: kintukij na ri taq nukʼuja, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinyak na nikʼaj taq nimaʼq taq kʼuja chik. Kinkʼol na waral ronojel ri nutriko xoqujeʼ ronojel ri numebʼil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinbʼij na chrech ri wuxlabʼal: Wuxlabʼal, kʼo sibʼalaj amebʼil akʼolom arech katkʼasiʼ kʼi junabʼ. Chatuxlanoq, chatwoʼq, chatqumunoq, chabʼanaʼ ri nimaʼq taq nimaqʼij waʼim”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Dyos kubʼij chrech: “¡Chʼuʼj alaj winaq! we chaqʼabʼ kamik riʼ ktayix na chawech ri chʼuʼjalaj awuxlabʼal. Ri jastaq che xakʼolo, ¿jachin riʼ ajchaqʼeʼ kanoq?”.
Jewaʼ, ri jun winaq che kumulij ujastaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kqʼinomar ta chuwach ri Dyos».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Rumal kʼu waʼ kinbʼij chiwech: Mahoman ikʼuʼx che ri ikʼaslemal, jas ri kitijo, jas ri iwatzʼyaq kikojo.
Ri ikʼaslemal are nim uqʼijil chuwach ri iwa, ri ibʼaqil are nim ubʼanik chuwach ri iwatzʼyaq.
Chiwilampeʼ ri taq joj, man ketikon taj, man kkiyak ta uwach tikoʼn, man kʼo ta kikʼuja, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos keʼutzuqu. ¡Ri ix sibʼalaj nim chi na ri iqʼijil chkiwach ri chikop rech uwokaj!
¿Jachin chiwech ri ix kkowinik rumal ri uchomanik kutiq apanoq jun qʼij rech ri ukʼaslemal?
We man kixkowin taj kiya uwiʼ alaj taq jastaq, ¿Jas che kchoman ikʼuʼx chrech ri nikʼaj chik?
Chiwilampeʼ ri saq taq kotzʼiʼj, man ketaman taj, man kekemen taj. Kinbʼij chiwech che ri Salomon rukʼ ronojel ri ukowinem, man xkʼojiʼ ta ratzʼyaq che jeriʼ jas jun chkech ri kotzʼiʼj riʼ.
We pa ri ulew, ri Dyos kuya utz taq atzʼyaq che ri qʼayes che kʼo kamik kʼatekʼuriʼ, chweʼq kkʼyaq ubʼi pa ri qʼaqʼ, e ta kʼu lo kubʼan na weriʼ chiwech ri ix, ¡che ix winaq che xa jubʼiqʼ ikojobʼal kʼolik!
Xa jekʼuriʼ ri ix, mixtzukun bʼaʼ che jas ri kitijo, jas ri kiqumuj; mixchoqchotik bʼaʼ.
Jeriʼ nakʼut, are waʼ kkitzukuj chuwach we ulew riʼ, ri man kekojon taj jacha ri uj. Ri itat retaʼm chik che rajawaxik weriʼ chiwech.
Jeriʼ bʼaʼ, are chitzukuj ri rajawibʼal tekʼuriʼ kyaʼtaj na riʼ weriʼ chiwech.
Mixibʼij iwibʼ alaj jupuq chij, rumal che ri itat xraj xuya chiwech ri ajawibʼal».
«Chikʼayij ri imebʼil, kʼatekʼuriʼ chiyaʼaʼ chkech ri emebʼaʼibʼ. Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ taq ichim che man kjar taj, jun jeʼlik mebʼil jelaʼ chikaj, jawiʼ ma kʼo ta elaqʼom, ma kʼo ta ixjut che kuwebʼej.
Rumal rech che jawiʼ kʼo wi ri jeʼlik imebʼil, xoqujeʼ chilaʼ riʼ kʼo wi ri iwanimaʼ».
«Chixkanaj kan bʼaʼ rukʼ iwatzʼyaq e rukʼ ri tzijtalik bʼa kanoq.
Chixkanaj bʼaʼ, ix jeriʼ jacha ri winaq che kkeyeʼj ri kajaw aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ ktzalej uloq pa ri ukʼulanem, arech kkijaq ri uchiʼ ja arechiʼ kkʼorkʼotik uloq ri areʼ.
Utz kech ri eʼajpataninel che ekʼaslik keʼbʼeriqatajoq arechiʼ kpe ri ajaw. Qastzij kinbʼij in chiwech, che ri areʼ kukʼamaʼ na riʼ ri atzʼyaq rech ajpatan e keʼupatanij riʼ. Keʼukoj na riʼ cho ri mexa, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ kerulaʼnisaj na riʼ.
¡We kpe chaqʼabʼ on pa usaqaribʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ we jeriʼ kuriqaʼ ri jastaq, sibʼalaj utz kech riʼ ri eʼareʼ!
Utz uchʼobʼik chibʼanaʼ weriʼ: Weta retaʼm ri rajaw ri ja jas kajbʼal kpe ri elaqʼom, man kuyaʼ ta bʼe riʼ che kjaq ri utapiyil ri rachoch.
Xoqujeʼ, ri ix chixkʼasaloq, rumal che pa ri jun kajbʼal che man kʼo ta naʼtal chiwech, kpe na riʼ ri Ukʼojol ri achi».
Kubʼij ri Pedro: «Ajawxel, ¿la kabʼij we tzijobʼelil riʼ chqech ri uj, on chkech konojel ri winaq?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Ajawxel kubʼij: «¿Jachin riʼ utz pataninel che ri ajaw krokisaj na kʼamalbʼe chkech ri uwinaq arech kujach ri triko che rajawaxik chkech eʼareʼ?».
Utz rech we ajpataninel riʼ che aretaq chi kpe ri rajaw, kuriqaʼ ri areʼ che tajin kubʼan weriʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, krokisaj na riʼ ri areʼ kʼamalbʼe chrech ronojel ri ujastaq.
Kʼatekʼut we ri ajpataninel riʼ kubʼij pa ranimaʼ: «Ri wajaw kbʼiytajik riʼ che kpetik», kʼatekʼuriʼ kok che kichʼayik ri ajpataninelabʼ, kok che waʼim, kok che uchobʼik sibʼalaj amajaʼ,
ri rajaw ri pataninel kpe riʼ pa ri jun qʼij che ri areʼ ma kreyeʼj taj, e pa ri kajbʼal che man retaʼm taj. Ri areʼ kukʼyaq ubʼi riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ krokisaj riʼ chkixoʼl ri eʼitzel winaq.
Ri ajpataninel che retaʼm ri urayibʼal ri rajaw, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man usukʼumam ta apanoq jun jas uwach, man ubʼanom ta apanoq ri urayibʼal ri rajaw, sibʼalaj kchʼay na riʼ.
Jachin kʼu ri man retaʼm taj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼan nikʼaj jastaq che taqal chʼayikil chrech, xa jubʼiqʼ riʼ kchʼayik. Jachin ri sibʼalaj kʼo kya chrech, sibʼalaj kʼo na ri kchʼaʼ chrech, jachin ri sibʼalaj xkubʼisax kʼuʼx chrij, sibʼalaj kʼo uwiʼ riʼ ri kta na chrech.
Inpetinaq che ukʼyaqik jun qʼaqʼ chuwach ri ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ ¡sibʼalaj kinwaj weta kʼatinaq chik!
Ri in kbʼan na nuqasnaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ¡sibʼalaj mayibʼal inkʼolik chi kʼateʼ kbʼantajik weriʼ!
«¿La kichomaj che xinpetik arech kinkoj ri nimalaj utzil chuwachulew? ¡Man je ta riʼ! kinjikbʼaʼ chiwech, are kʼut kinkojoʼ ri jachoj ibʼ.
Rumal che chi kamik riʼ, pa jun ja kech ejobʼ winaq, kijachom kibʼ riʼ, oxibʼ kkikʼuleʼlaj ri ekebʼ, ekebʼ kkikʼuleʼlaj ri eʼoxibʼ.
Kkijach na kibʼ, ri tatxel kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri ukʼojol, ri kʼojolxel kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri utat, ri nanxel kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri ral, ri alxel kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri unan, ri chichuʼ alibʼatz kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri ralibʼ, ri alibʼatz kukʼuleʼlaj na riʼ ri chichuʼ ralibʼ».
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij chkech ri winaq: «Aretaq chiʼ kiwil jun sutzʼ che kpe uloq pap ri uqajibʼalqʼij, xaqbʼiʼ kibʼij: kpe ri jabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ma are wi jeriʼ kbʼantajik.
Aretaq chiʼ kpe jun kyaqiqʼ pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri relbʼal qʼij, ri ix kibʼij che kpe na ri qʼaqʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ma are wi jeriʼ kbʼantajik.
Ix winaq kebʼ ipalaj taq winaq, ri ix iwetaʼm kinikʼoj ri uwach ri ulew, ri uwach ri kaj, ¿jas kʼu che, man kinikʼoj ta bʼaʼ we jetaq qʼij rech taq we kamik riʼ?».
«¿Suche che ix ta bʼaʼ kibʼan qʼatoj- tzij puwiʼ ri utzil?
Jeriʼ kʼut, aretaq chiʼ at bʼenaq rukʼ ri akʼulel chuwach ri qʼataltzij, pa ri bʼe chakojoʼ bʼaʼ achuqʼabʼ arech katutzir ubʼik rukʼ ri areʼ, weneʼ katuchororej chuwach ri qʼataltzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri qʼataltzij katukʼam ubʼi ri at chuwach ri ajchʼimiʼy, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ajchʼimiʼy katukoj pa ri cheʼ.
Kinbʼij chawech, che man katel ta uloq riʼ chilaʼ chi kʼateʼ na katoj ri kisbʼal ameʼr akortil».
Pa ri jun uchanim riʼ kepe nikʼaj winaq che kkiya ubʼixik ri xkʼulmatajik kukʼ ri eʼajgalileʼos, che are ri Pilato xbʼanowik; che xukoj ri kikikʼel enikʼaj eʼajgalileʼo rukʼ ri tabʼal taq kitoqʼobʼ.
Kubʼij chkech: «¿La kichomaj ix che ri eʼajgalileʼo riʼ, eʼareʼ sibʼalaj eʼitzel winaq chi na chkiwach ri enikʼaj eʼajgalileʼos chik?
Man je ta riʼ, qastzij weriʼ kinbʼij chiwech; ekʼu ri ix, we man kikʼex iwibʼ, jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ ri ikamikal kiriqo.
On ri ewajxaqlajuj winaq che xeʼukamisaj ri keqʼteʼ rech ri Siloʼe aretaq chiʼ xwilij uloq, ¿la kichomaj che ri winaq riʼ are, nim chi na ri kimak chkiwach ri winaq che ejeqel pa ri Jerusalem?
Man je ta riʼ, kinjikbʼaʼ ubʼixik chiwech; we man kikʼex iwibʼ ri ix, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ ri ikamikal kiriq na».
Kubʼij chik jun tzijobʼelil chkech: «Jun achi kʼo jun ucheʼal wikox utikom pa ri rulew. Kbʼe che utzukuxik uwach kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta uwach kuʼriqaʼ.
Kubʼij chrech ri rajchak pa ri ulew: “Chi oxibʼ junabʼ chi uloq kinul che utzukuxik uwach we jun wikox riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta uwach kinriqaʼ ta; chachoyoʼ bʼa ubʼik; rumal che xaq kukʼis uchoqʼabʼ ri ulew”.
Ri rajchak pa ri ulew kubʼij chrech: “Ajaw chakoloʼ na we jun junabʼ riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinjaq na ri ulew chuxkut, e kinya na mes chuxeʼ.
¿Weneʼ kuya na uwach? We man kuyaʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ xas kachoy ubʼi waʼ”».
Kukʼut ri tzij pa ri ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal pa jun qʼij Sabʼado.
Kʼo jun ixoq che kʼo jun uxlabʼal chrech, che uyabʼirisam wajxaqlajuj junabʼ uloq. Ri areʼ qʼusul rij, tekʼuriʼ man kkowin taj kusukʼubʼaʼ ribʼ.
Arechiʼ ri Jesus kril ri areʼ, kusikʼij, e kubʼij chrech: «Chattoʼtajoq chrech ri ayabʼil».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukoj ri uqʼabʼ pa ri ujolom. Xaqbʼiʼ chanim kel ubʼi ri uxlabʼal, tekʼuriʼ ri ixoq kusukʼabʼaʼ ribʼ, e nim uqʼijil ri Dyos kuyaʼo.
Ekʼut ri kʼamalbʼe rech ri ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal, itzel krilo rumal che ri Jesus kubʼan jun kunanik pa ri qʼij Sabʼado. Kubʼij chkech ri winaq: «¡Kʼo waqibʼ qʼij rech kixchakunik. Chixpet bʼaʼ pa taq we qʼij riʼ arech kixkunaxik, are mixpetik pa qʼij Sabʼado!».
Kʼatekʼut ri Ajawxel kubʼij chrech:«Kebʼ taq ipalaj; chi jujunal ri ix ¿la man kikir ta ri ix pa qʼij Sabʼado ri iwakax on ri ibʼurix arech kkitijaʼ kukʼyaʼ?
E kʼu waʼ we jun winaq riʼ, che umiʼal ri Abʼraham, che xyuttajik rumal ri Satanas wajxaqlajuj junabʼ kamik riʼ, ¿la man kwaj ta kʼuriʼ kinkir ri areʼ pa qʼij Sabʼado!».
Arechiʼ Kubʼij we taq tzij riʼ, konojel ri eʼukʼulel sibʼalaj kʼixbʼal kekanaj kanoq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel ri winaq kekiʼkot rumal ronojel ri utz taq mayibʼal jastaq che kubʼan ri areʼ.
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij: «Jas ri kjunamataj rukʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos? ¿Jas kʼuriʼ ri kinjunamtaj rukʼ?
Ri areʼ jeʼ jas jun alaj ijaʼ che jun achi kutik pa ri rulew. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkʼiyik e kubʼan jun cheʼ, ri chikop re uwokaj kejaqiʼ cho taq ri uqʼabʼ».
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij: «¿Jas rukʼ kinjunamatisaj ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos?
Ri areʼ jeʼ jas ri ukʼuʼx kaxlanwa che jun ixoq kukoj pa oxibʼ pajbʼal rech kʼaj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel ksipoj uwach».
Kbʼin pa taq alaj e nimaʼq taq tinamit, kukʼut ri tzij arechiʼ bʼenam kubʼan pa ri Jerusalem.
Jun achi kubʼij chrech:«Ajawxel, ¿la eʼejatalik ri kekoltajik?». Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech:
«Chikojoʼ ichoqʼabʼ arech kixok pa ri latzʼ uchiʼja. Sibʼalaj ekʼi ri kkaj keʼokik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kekowin ta riʼ».
«Aretaq chiʼ ri rajaw ri ja kwaʼlaj uloq che utzʼapixik ri uchiʼja, ri kixkanaj kanoq chrij kixkʼorkʼot na riʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ, kibʼij na riʼ: “Ajawxel, chajaqaʼ chqech”, kʼatekʼuriʼ kutzalej ubʼixik riʼ chiwech: “Man wetaʼm taj jawiʼ kixpe wi ri ix”.
Kʼatekʼut kibʼij riʼ ri ix: “Ri uj, ujwoʼqinaq, ujqumuninaq awukʼ, atkʼutuninaq pa taq ri qakʼayibʼal”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chi na riʼ chiwech: “Man wetaʼm taj jawiʼ kixpe wi ri ix, chitasaʼ apan iwibʼ chwech ri in, ri ix che ixbʼanal rech ri etzalaj.”
Chilaʼ riʼ kʼo wi ri kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx e ri quchʼinik wareyaj, arechiʼ kiwil ri Abʼraham, ri Isaʼak ri Jakobʼ, e konojel ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, arechiʼ ri ix naj kixkʼyaq ubʼi wi.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kepe nikʼaj riʼ pa ri relbʼal qʼij, pa uqajbʼal qʼij, kepe nikʼaj riʼ pa rikqʼabʼ relbʼalqʼij, pa umox relbʼalqʼij, kʼatekʼuriʼ ketʼuyiʼ riʼ cho ri mexa che waʼim pa ri unimaqʼij ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ekʼo nikʼaj winaq riʼ che are kekʼisbʼan kanoq, tekʼuriʼ, are enabʼe riʼ; ekʼo nikʼaj winaq riʼ che enabʼe, kʼatekʼuriʼ, are kekʼisbʼan kan riʼ».
Pa ri uchanim riʼ xepe nikʼaj efariseʼo, che kkibʼij chrech: «Chatel ubʼik, jat ubʼi waral, rumal rech che ri Herodes kraj katukamisaj».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Jix, jiʼbʼij chrech we yak riʼ: Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in keʼinpaqchiʼj ri eʼitzel e keʼinkunaj ri eyawabʼibʼ, chi kamik riʼ e xoqujeʼ chweʼq; tekʼuriʼ pa ri urox qʼij inkʼisinaq chik!
Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, chweʼq e kabʼij, are utz che kinterneʼbʼej ri nubʼe. Rumal che man yaʼtal taj che jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos kkamik naj chech ri Jerusalem».
«Jerusalem, Jerusalem, ri at che keʼakamisaj ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos e kkʼyaq abʼaj chkij ri etaqom uloq chawech. Sibʼalaj nurayim weta enumulim ri eʼawalkʼuwaʼl jeʼ jas jun tʼuʼq ekʼ che keʼumulij ri ral chuxeʼ ri uxikʼ, ¡kʼatekʼuriʼ man iwam ta weriʼ!
Jeriʼ bʼaʼ, kyaʼtaj na kanoq ri iwachoch chiwech. Jeriʼ kinbʼij chiwech, man kiwil ta chi nuwach waʼ, chi kʼateʼ kopan na ri qʼij che kibʼij na: “Tewchuʼtalik ri kpetik pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel!”»
Kpe pa ri rachoch jun kanimal ri fariseʼo pa jun qʼij Sabʼado arech kwaʼik. Ri eʼareʼ kilawchim ri areʼ.
Kʼo chilaʼ chuwach ri areʼ jun iwabʼ achi sipojinaq ubʼaqil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kukʼot kichiʼ ri eqʼatal taq tzij e ri efariseʼo: «¿La yaʼtalik kbʼan kunanik pa ri qʼij Sabʼado on man yaʼtalik taj?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kkimemarisaj kibʼ. Ri areʼ kuchap ri jun yawabʼ, kukunaj e kujach ubʼik.
Chkech ri eʼareʼ kubʼij: «¿Jachin chiwech ri ix che ktzaq ubʼi ri ukʼojol, on ktzaq ubʼi ri uwakax pa jun kʼuwaʼ, pa jun qʼij Sabʼado, e man aninaq taj kresaj?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta chi jun tzij kekowinik kkibʼij chuwach weriʼ.
Kubʼij jun tzijobʼelil chkech, rumal rech che krilo che ri winaq, are kkitzukuj ri nabʼe taq kʼolibʼal che ri tem, kubʼij:
«Aretaq chiʼ jun katusikʼij pa jun kʼulanem, matkʼojiʼ cho ri nabʼe tem, weneʼ kʼo chi na jun xsikʼixik che kʼo nim reqleʼn chawach ri at,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kpetik ri xsikʼin che ri areʼ e chawech ri at e kubʼij chawech: “Chayaʼaʼ kanoq we kʼolibʼal riʼ chrech we jun riʼ”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ rukʼ akʼixbʼal katbʼe riʼ pa ri kʼisbʼal tem.
Man je ta riʼ, aretaq chiʼ katsikʼixik, jat pa ri kʼisbʼal tem, arech aretaq chiʼ kpe ri winaq che xatusikʼij ri at, kubʼij chawech: “Wachʼil, chatpaqal chi na ajsik”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ nim aqʼijil riʼ chkiwach ri winaq che ekʼo awukʼ cho ri mexa.
Ri jun che kupaqibʼaʼ ribʼ, kqasax na riʼ, ri jun che kuqasaj ribʼ, kpaqbʼax na riʼ».
Kubʼij chrech ri jun winaq che xsikʼin rech ri areʼ: «Aretaq chiʼ kabʼan jun nimaqʼijalaj waʼim, meʼasikʼij ri eʼawaʼchiʼl, meʼasikʼij ri eʼawachalal, meʼasikʼij ri eʼawachalaxik, meʼasikʼij ri eqʼinom taq eʼakʼulja. Chaxibʼij awibʼ chkech, weneʼ katkisikʼij ri at e junam ri jastaq kkiya chawech.
Aretaq chiʼ kabʼan jun nimaqʼijilaj waʼim, are cheʼasikʼij ri emebʼaʼibʼ, ri etakmaʼy, ri emoy.
¡Utz awech ri at rumal che man kekowin ta riʼ che uyaʼik jun junam ukʼaxel chik chawech! We jastaq riʼ kyaʼtaj na ukʼaxel chawech aretaq chiʼ kekʼastaj uloq ri ejikom taq winaq».
Aretaq chiʼ kubʼij we tzij riʼ, jun chkech ri kʼo pa ri nimaqʼij kubʼij: «¡Utz rech riʼ ri kawaʼ na pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos!».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «Jun achi kubʼan jun nimalaj waʼim rech xreʼqal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, keʼusikʼij sibʼalaj winaq.
Pa ri kajbʼal rech ri waʼim, keʼutaq ubʼi ri eʼupataninel arech kkibʼij chkech ri winaq che xesikʼixik: “Chixpetoq, sukʼumatalik chik juntir ri jastaq”.
Konojel, chkijujunal xkimajij utayik sachabʼal kimak rumal che man kebʼe taj. Ri nabʼe kubʼij: “Xinloqʼ jun ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ rajawaxik kinwilaʼ na; chasachaʼ numak”.
Jun chik kubʼij: “Xinloqʼ jobʼ jukʼulaj wakax, kinwilaʼ na, chasachaʼ numak”.
Jun chik kubʼij: “Kamik riʼ xinkʼuliʼk, rumal kʼuriʼ man kinkowin taj kinbʼek”.
Aretaq chiʼ ktzalij ri ajpataninel kubʼij ronojel ri tzij chrech ri rajaw. Ri rajaw kpe royowal, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech ri upataninel: “Jat pa ri kʼayibʼal, jat xoʼl taq bʼe pa ri tinamit, kʼatekʼuriʼ cheʼakʼamaʼ uloq ri emebʼaʼibʼ, ri emoy, ri etakmaʼy”.
Kubʼij ri ajpataninel: “Ajawxel xbʼantajik ri ataqanik, kʼatekʼuriʼ jamal na”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ajtij kubʼij chech ri ajpataninel: “Jat pa taq ri bʼe, puwiʼ taq ri tapya, kʼatekʼuriʼ cheʼataqʼij uloq keʼokik ri winaq arech knojisaj ri wachoch.
Kinbʼij chiwech che man kʼo ta jun chkech ri xesikʼix, kkinaʼ riʼ ri nuwaʼim”».
Sibʼalaj winaq kebʼe rukʼ ri areʼ, keril ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech:
«We kʼo jun kpe wukʼ ri in tekʼuriʼ man xa ta jubʼiqʼ kuloqʼej ri utat, ri unan, ri rixoqil, ri eralkʼuwaʼl, ri rachalal, xoqujeʼ man xa ta jubʼiq kuloqʼej ukʼaslemal ri areʼ, man kkowin ta riʼ kokik nutijoxel.
Jachin ri man krukʼaj ta ri uripbʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kpe ta uloq wukʼ ri in, man kkowin ta riʼ kokik nutijoxel».
«¿Jachin chiwech ri ix che kraj kuyak jun keqʼteʼ, che we man are nabʼe ktʼuyiʼk arech krajilaj ri rajil kukʼam ubʼik arech krilo we kʼolik e we kukʼisaʼ ri chak?
Kuxibʼij ribʼ riʼ, we kumajij ubʼanik kʼatekʼuriʼ ma kukʼisaʼ ta ri chak, konojel riʼ keʼilowik kketzʼebʼej uwach riʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij riʼ:
“¡We jun achi ri xuchap jun chak, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kkowin taj kukʼiso!”.
Xoqujeʼ ¿la kʼo jun ajawiʼel che kubʼan chʼoʼj rukʼ jun ajawinel chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, we man are nabʼe ktʼuyiʼk arech krilo we kkowin kukʼ lajuj mil achijabʼ arech keʼel uloq chuwach ri jun chik che petinaq uloq kukʼ juwinaq mil che ukʼulaxik ri areʼ?
Wema kkowinik, aretaq chiʼ naj na kʼo wi, keʼutaq ubʼi nikʼaj eʼupataninel riʼ arech kkita ri jaʼmaril chrech ri jun chik.
Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kʼut, xaq jachin chiwech ri ix che man kuya ta kanoq ronojel ri ujastaq, man kkowin taj kokik nutijoxel in».
«Utz ri atzʼam. Kʼatekʼut we ri atzʼam ksach ri utzayil, ¿jas ktzalinik ri kutzalij ri utzayil?
Man utz ta riʼ we kokisax pa ri ulew, on pa ri mes, naj kkʼyaq ubʼi wi riʼ. Ri jun che kʼo uxikin rech ktatbʼenik, chutatbʼej bʼaʼ we tzij riʼ».
Konojel ri eʼajtoqʼil pwaq e ri eʼajmakibʼ, keqibʼ ukoq rukʼ arech kkitatabʼej ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri efariseʼo, ri etzʼibʼanelabʼ kewixwatik, kkibʼij: «¡We jun achi riʼ, keʼukʼulaj ri eʼajmakibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kwaʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech we jun tzijobʼelil riʼ:
«¿Jachin chiwech ri ix, che we ekʼo jun okʼal uchij, kʼatekʼuriʼ ksach jun chkech, ¿la man keʼuya ta kanoq ri jumuchʼ bʼelej lajuj pa ri tzʼinalik ulew arech kbʼe che utzukuxik ri jun che xsachik chi kʼateʼ na kuriq uloq?
Aretaq chiʼ kuriqo, kuya uloq cho ri utelebʼ rukʼ kiʼkotemal.
Aretaq chiʼ ktzalij cho rachoch, keʼumulij konojel ri erachiʼl xoqujeʼ ri eʼukʼulja, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech: “Chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ wukʼ, rumal rech che ri in xinriq ri jun nuchij che xsachik”.
Kinbʼij chiwech, che xoqujeʼ jeriʼ, kʼo nimalaj kiʼkotemal chi na chikaj rumal xa jun ajmak che kukʼex ukʼuʼx, chuwach jumuchʼ bʼelej lajuj eʼutz taq winaq che man rajawaxik taj kkikʼex kikʼuʼx».
«On ¿jachin jun ixoq che kʼo lajuj upwaq drakma, kʼatekʼuriʼ we kusach jun, che man kutzij ta ri ukantil, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kumes ta ri rachoch, tekʼuriʼ ma sibʼalaj kutzukuj taj chi kʼateʼ na kuriqo?
Aretaq chiʼ kuriqo, keʼumulij ri erachiʼl e ri eʼukʼulja, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: “Chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ wukʼ, rumal rech che xinriq ri jun nupwaq che xinsacho”.
Rumal kʼuriʼ kinbʼij chiwech, kaʼlax ri kiʼkotemal chkiwach ri eʼanjel erech ri Dyos rumal xa jun ajmak che kukʼex ukʼuʼx».
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij: «Jun achi ekʼo kebʼ ukʼojol.
Ri chaqʼxel kubʼij chrech ri utat: “Tat, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri nujastaq che wechbʼal ri in kʼolik”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri tataʼ kujach ri ujastaq.
Ri chaqʼxel kumol bʼi ronojel ri jastaq rech, e kbʼe ubʼik pa jun naj tinamit e man utz ta usachik kubʼan ri ujastaq».
«Aretaq chiʼ sachitajinaq chi ronojel ri jastaq rech rumal, kpe jun wiʼjal pa we tinimit riʼ, kumajij uraqik kʼax.
Kbʼe che upatanaxik jun achi che kʼo pa ri tinamit riʼ, ri areʼ kutaq ubʼi pa taq ri rulew arech keʼuyuqʼuj jetaq aq.
Ri areʼ kraj weta kunojisaj upam rukʼ ri taq om che kkitij ri taq aq, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun kyaʼoʼw chrech ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa rech wi kuchomaj pa ri ranimaʼ: “¡Ejoropaʼ neʼ ri eʼupataninel ri nutat che kʼo sibʼalaj kiwa, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in waral riʼ kinkam che numik!
Ri in kinwaj kinwaʼlaj ubʼik, kinbʼe na rukʼ ri nutat; kʼatekʼuriʼ kinbʼij na riʼ chech: Tat, xinmakun chuwach ri kaj e chawach ri at;
kamik riʼ man taqal ta chik chwij che kabʼij akʼojol chwech, chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ chwech ri in, in jun chkech ri eʼapataninel”.
Kwaʼlajik, kel ubʼik, kbʼe ubʼi rukʼ ri utat. «Aretaq chiʼ naj kʼo wi, kril uloq ri utat, kroqʼej uwach ri ukʼojol; kxakʼinik, kukʼyaq ribʼ chuqul kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj kuqʼaluj.
Ri ukʼojol kubʼij chrech: “Tat xinmakun chuwach ri kaj e chawach ri at, kamik riʼ man taqal ta chwij kabʼij akʼojol chwech”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri utat kubʼij chkech ri eʼupataninel: “Aninaq chikʼamaʼ uloq jun utzalaj atzʼyaq e chikojoʼ chrech ri areʼ, chikojoʼ jun mulqʼabʼ cho ri uqʼabʼ, chikojoʼ uxajabʼ chrech ri raqan.
Chikʼamaʼ uloq jun alaj chom wakax, chichʼoloʼ, chujwoʼq bʼaʼ, chqabʼanaʼ nimaqʼij.
Rumal che we jun nukʼojol riʼ kaminaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkʼastaj uloq; ri areʼ sachinaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ xriqitajik chi jumul!”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xmajtaj ri nimaqʼij.
«Ri nabʼeʼal ukʼojol kʼo pa ri ulew. Aretaq chiʼ ktzalij uloq e naqaj chik kʼo wi che ri ja, kuta ri qʼojom, kuta ri xojoj.
Kusikʼij jun chkech ri eʼajpataninel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuta chrech jas ri tajin kbʼanik.
Ri ajpataninel kubʼij chrech: “Ri achaqʼ xulik. Ri atat xukamisaj ri jun alaj chomalaj wakax, rumal rech che xuriq chi na ri areʼ e utz uwach”.
Ri areʼ kpe royowal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kraj taj kokik. Ri utat kel uloq che ubʼochixik arech kok ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ kubʼij chrech ri utat: “Chi sibʼalaj junabʼ chik, ri in katinpatanij ri at, man kʼo ta jumul che ri in man nunimam ta ri atzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jumul ayaʼom chwech jun alaj wakax arech kinbʼan jun nimaqʼij kukʼ ri ewachiʼl.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we jun akʼojol riʼ che ktzalij kamik riʼ, che xusach ri jastaq awech kukʼ ri ixoqibʼ che kech nim chʼutiʼn, ¡xakamisaj chech ri areʼ ri jun alaj chomalaj wakax!”
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri utat kubʼij chrech: “Ri at, nukʼojol, ronojel mul at kʼo wukʼ, ronojel ri jastaq che wech ri in, xoqujeʼ awech ri at.
Kʼatekʼut, rajawaxik che xinbʼan jun nimaqʼij, xinwaj kujkiʼkotik, rumal che ri achaqʼ che kaminaq, xkʼastaj uloq; ri areʼ sachinaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xriqitajik!”»
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Jun qʼinom achi, kʼo jun upataninel. Kbʼix chrech ri qʼinom achi, che ri upataninel kusach ri jastaq rech ri areʼ.
Ri areʼ kusikʼij ri upataninel, tekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech: “¿Jas ri kinto kbʼix chawech ri at? Chakʼamaʼ rij ri achak chnuwach, rumal che man kuya ta chik katchakun wuk”.
Ri ajpataninel kuchomaj pa rech wiʼ: “¿Jas kʼu kinbʼan waʼ, rumal rech che ri wajaw kresaj ri nuchak? ¿La kinchakuj ri ulew? Man kʼo ta chi nuchoqʼabʼ. ¿La kinbʼan in ajmolonel kinok che utayik nurajil? Ri in kinkʼixik.
Xchʼobʼitaj wumal jas ri kinbʼan na, arech aretaq chiʼ kinesax ubʼi pa we nuchak, ekʼo jujun kinkikʼulaj pa ri kachoch”.
«Keʼusikʼij ri eʼachijabʼ che kʼo kikʼas rukʼ ri rajaw. Kubʼij chrech ri nabʼe: “¿Joropaʼ ri akʼas rukʼ ri wajaw?”.
Kubʼij: “Okʼal pajbʼal aseʼite”. Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: “Chakʼamaʼ we awuj jawiʼ tzʼibʼatalik ri akʼas, chattʼuyuloq, aninaq chatzʼibʼaj kawinaqlajuj”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech ri jun chik: “Ri at ¿joropaʼ akʼas rukʼ ri wajaw?”. Kubʼij: “Okʼal pajbʼal triko”. Kubʼij chech: “Chakʼamaʼ ri wuj jawiʼ tzʼibʼatalik ri akʼas, kʼatekʼuriʼ chatzʼibʼaj jumuch”.
«Ri ajaw nim kril wi we itzel ajpataninel riʼ rumal che ri areʼ qastzij utz xubʼan che uchomaxik ri xubʼano. Ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri uwachulew are sibʼalaj utz chi na uchomaxik ri jastaq kkibʼano, chkiwach ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri saqil».
«Ri in kinbʼij chiwech: Chikʼyarisaj ri eʼiwachiʼl rukʼ ri man sukʼ pwaq taj, arech, arechiʼ man kʼo ta chi irajil, kixkʼulaxik pa ri junalik ja kʼolibʼal.
Jachin utz rukʼ ri xa jubʼiq, xoqujeʼ utz ri rukʼ ri sibʼalaj nim. Jachin itzel rukʼ ri xa jubʼiqʼ xoqujeʼ itzel riʼ rukʼ ri sibʼalaj nim.
We ri ix, ix itzel rukʼ ri man sukʼ taj pwaq, ¿jachin kukubʼaʼ ukʼuʼx ri chiwij puwiʼ ri utzalaj taq jastaq?
We ri ix, man ix kubʼal kʼuʼx taj rukʼ ri jastaq che man iwech taj ¿jachin kyaʼow riʼ chiwech ri jastaq iwech ri ix?
«Man kʼo ta jun ajpataninel kkowin che kpatanexik ekebʼ ajawabʼ. Rumal che kutzaq kan jun riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuloqʼaj riʼ ri jun chik. On kuyut na ribʼ rukʼ jun, tekʼuriʼ, kuxtuj riʼ ri jun chik. Man kixkowin taj kipatanij ri Dyos, e kipatanij ri Pwaq».
Ri efariseʼo che kkiloqʼaj ri pwaq, tajin kkita we tzij riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kketzʼebʼej uwach ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix kikʼut iwibʼ jeʼ jas ix utz chkiwach ri winaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Dyos retaʼm, kuchʼobʼ uwach ri iwanimaʼ, rumal che ri jikom chkiwach ri winaq, kretzelaj uwach ri Dyos.
«Ri pixabʼ e ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos kopanik chi rukʼ ri Xwan. Chilaʼ kamajtaj upetik uloq ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel rukʼ choqʼabʼ kkaj keʼokik.
«Are man kʼax ta uqʼaxik ri uwachulew e ri kaj chuwach che ktzaq jun utortʼik ri tzʼibʼ.
«Ri achi che kujach ubʼik ri rixoqil, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkʼuliʼ rukʼ jun chik, kok riʼ pa ri mak rukʼ ixoq. Jun achi che kkʼuliʼ rukʼ jun ixoq che jachom kanoq rumal ri rachajil, kokik pa ri mak rukʼ ixoq.
«Jun qʼinom achi kʼo utzalaj taq ra- tzʼyaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel qʼij kubʼan utzalaj taq waʼim.
Jun mebʼaʼ ubʼiʼ Lasaro, qʼoyol chunaqaj ri uchiʼ rachoch, ronojel ri utzʼumal tajin kqʼiyik.
Sibʼalaj kraj knoj che ri jastaq che ktzaq uloq chuxeʼ ri umexa ri qʼinom achi. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kepe ri tzʼiʼ kkiriqʼaʼ ri utzʼumal.
Ri mebʼaʼ kkamik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkʼam ubʼi kumal ri eʼanjel erech ri Dyos pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri Abʼraham. Xoqujeʼ kkam ri qʼinom achi e kmuqik.
«Arechiʼ kʼo pa ri Hades pa qʼoxom, kuwaʼlisaj apanoq ri uwoqʼoch tekʼuriʼ naj kril apanoq ri Abʼraham, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Lasaro kʼo pa ri ukʼolibʼal.
Kuraq apan uchiʼ chrech: “Tat Abʼraham, chatoqʼobʼisaj nuwach, chataqaʼ ubʼi ri Lasaro arech kuchʼaqeqisaj ri utzaʼm uwiʼ uqʼabʼ pa ri jaʼ arech kuʼjororisaj ri waqʼ, rumal rech che qʼoxom in kʼolik pa we qʼaqʼ riʼ”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Abʼraham kubʼij chrech: “Walkʼuwaʼl, chanaʼtisaj che xariq ri amebʼil pa ri akʼaslemal, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Lasaro xuriq ri qʼoxom. Waral kamik riʼ, ri areʼ kubʼisam ukʼuʼx, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri at qʼoxom at kʼolik.
Panikʼaj chqech ri uj e ri ix kʼo jun nimalaj siwan, rumal kʼuriʼ jachin ri kkaj kiqʼax apan iwukʼ ri ix man kekowin taj, xoqujeʼ man kekowin taj keqʼax uloq waral jachin ri kkaj keqʼax uloq qukʼ ri uj”.
«Kubʼij: “Kinta chawech, tat, chataqaʼ ubʼi ri Lasaro pa ri rachoch ri nutat;
rumal rech che ekʼo jobʼ wachalal, arech kukʼam ubʼi chkech ri tzij, arech man kepe ta ri eʼareʼ pa we jun ukʼolibʼal qʼoxom riʼ”.
Ri Abʼraham kubʼij chrech: “Kʼo ri Moʼises, ekʼo ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos, chkita ri kitzij ri eʼareʼ”.
Kubʼij ri areʼ: “Jayiʼ tat Abʼraham, we kʼo jun chkech ri ekaminaqibʼ kbʼe kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, kkikʼex riʼ ri kikʼuʼx.”
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: “We man kkita ta ri utzij ri Moʼises e ri kitzij ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ kkʼastaj jun chkech ri ekaminaqibʼ, man kkikʼam ta riʼ ri utzij”».
Kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Man kbʼan ta kowinem riʼ che mata ktzaq ri noʼjibʼal, ¡Kʼax rech ri winaq che rumal ktzaq ri noʼjibʼal!
Are utz riʼ chrech, che koʼksax jun nim abʼaj chuqul kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkʼyaq ubʼi pa ri polow, chuwach che kutzaq ri uchomanik jun chkech ri chʼutiʼn riʼ.
¡Chikʼoloʼ iwibʼ ri ix chbʼil aqʼan iwibʼ ix!
We wuqubʼ mul kmakun chawach pa jun qʼij, kʼatekʼuriʼ wuqubʼ mul ktzalij awukʼ ri at, e kubʼij chawech: “Kqʼutut nukʼuʼxʼ rumal ri xinbʼano”. Chasachaʼ ri umak ri areʼ».
Ri eʼutaqoʼnelabʼ kkibʼij chrech ri Ajawxel:«Chanimarisaj ri qakojonik».
Ri Ajawxel kubʼij: «Weta kʼo ri ikojonik ri ix, jeriʼ jacha jun alaj ijaʼ, ibʼim chi waʼ che we ucheʼal tzima riʼ: “Chabʼoqoʼ ubʼi awibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jaʼtetikitajoq pa ri polow”, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ ixuniman chi na kʼuriʼ!
«¿Jachin chiwech ri ix, che kʼo jun upataninel che tajin kuchakuj ri ulew on che tajin keʼukʼol ri chikop, kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ ktzalej uloq pa ri chak kubʼij chrech: “Chatok cho ri mexa, chanim chatwoʼqʼ?”.
¿La man kubʼij ta na chrech: “Chasukʼumaj jun nuwa, chakojoʼ ri ratzʼyaq ajpataninel. Aretaq chiʼ ri in xinwaʼlej e xqumtaj ri jaʼ, chi kʼateʼ na kʼuriʼ kuyaʼo che ri at katwaʼik e katqumunik?”.
Ri areʼ ¿la rajawaxik riʼ kumaltyoxij chrech ri pataninel rumal che xubʼano ri xtaq chrech?
Xoqujeʼ ri ix, aretaq chiʼ xbʼantaj iwumal ronojel ri xixtaq chrech, chibʼij bʼaʼ: ¡Ri uj ujajpataninel man kʼo ta chi qapatan, xbʼantaj qumal ri chak che rajawaxik xqabʼano!»
Bʼenaq pa ri ubʼe ri Jerusalem, kqʼatan naqaj chrech ri Samariʼa e ri Galileʼa.
Kok pa jun tinamit. Keʼel uloq che ukʼulaxik ri areʼ lajuj winaq che tajin kaqʼiy ri kitzʼumal, naj ketakʼi wi uloq.
Kkiraqaqej kichiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij: «Jesus, Ajtij, chatoqʼobʼisaj qawach».
Aretaq chiʼ keʼrilo, kubʼij chkech: «Jix jikʼutuʼ iwibʼ chkiwach ri echuchqajawibʼ». Tekʼuriʼ kkʼulmatajik, aretaq chiʼ ibʼenaq, ri eʼareʼ utz kkanaj ri kitzʼumal.
Jun chkech, aretaq chiʼ krilo che ri areʼ utz chik, ktzalej uloq pa raqan, kʼatekʼuriʼ nim kril wi ri Dyos.
Kumej ribʼ e kuyaʼ ri uwach chuwach ri raqan ri Jesus e kmaltyoxin chrech ri areʼ. We jun winaq riʼ, ri areʼ jun ajsamaritano.
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «¿La man elajuj taj ri xeʼutzirik? E kʼu ri ebʼelejebʼ chik, ¿jawiʼ ekʼo wi ri eʼareʼ?
¡Xaq xuwi we kaxlan achi riʼ xtzalej uloq arech nim kril ri Dyos!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech: «Chatwaʼlijoq, jat; are ri akojonik xatkolow ri at».
Ri efariseʼo kkita chrech ri areʼ, ¿Chi kʼateʼ jumpaʼ kpe na ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos? Kubʼij chkech: «Ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos man kilitaj taj, ri upetbʼal man kuyaʼ ta ribʼ pa naʼik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ma kbʼix ta na: “¡Kʼolik waral!”. “¡Kʼolik jelaʼ!”, rumal rech che ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos kʼo chik chixoʼl ri ix».
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Kpe na nikʼaj taq qʼij riʼ che ri ix kiwaj weta kiwilo kneʼbʼaʼ xa jun che ri uqʼij ri ukʼojol ri achi, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kiwil ta riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kbʼix na riʼ chiwech: “¡Chiwilampeʼ waral riʼ, chiwilampeʼ jelaʼ!”. Mixbʼe bʼaʼ, mixxakʼin chrij.
Jeriʼ jas ri kuypaʼ che kchupqʼanik pa ri jun ujutzʼ ri kaj, e pa ri jun ujutzʼ chik e ksaqarisanik, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kux na ri ukʼojol ri achi pa ri uqʼij.
Kʼatekʼut, are nabʼe rajawaxik che kuqʼaxej na ri qʼoxom e ketzelax kan uwach kumal we jun mayilqʼijsaq riʼ.
«Jachaʼ xkʼulmatajik pa ri taq uqʼij ri Noʼe, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ pa taq ri uqʼij ri ukʼojol ri achi.
Kewaʼik, keqʼabʼarik, xekʼuliʼk rukʼ ixoqʼ, rukʼ achi, chi kʼateʼ na ri qʼij che ri Noʼe xok pa ri jukubʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, xpe ri nimalaj jabʼ che xeʼukamisaj konojel ri eʼareʼ.
Xoqujeʼ ri xkʼulmatajik pa taq ri uqʼij ri Lot, kewaʼik, keqʼabʼarik, keloqʼomik, kekʼayinik, ketikonijik, kkiyak ri jetaq ja.
Kʼatekʼut pa ri jun qʼij che ri Lot xel ubʼi pa ri Sodoma, ri Dyos xujabʼarisaj uloq ri qʼaqʼ e ri asufre, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xeʼukamisaj konojel ri eʼareʼ.
Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kkʼulmataj na riʼ pa ri jun qʼij che kuqʼalajisaj na ribʼ ri Ukʼojol ri achi.
«Pa ri jun qʼij riʼ, ri jun winaq che kʼo puwiʼ ri rachoch, kʼatekʼuriʼ kʼo ri ujastaq pa ja, maqaj uloq che ukʼamik. Xoqujeʼ ri winaq che kʼo pa ri tikonbʼal ulew, matzalej uloq.
Chinatisaj ri rixoqil ri Lot.
Jachin ri winaq kraj kukʼol ri ukʼaslemal, kutzaq na riʼ, jachin ri kutzaqo are kukʼol na riʼ.
Ri in kinbʼij chiwech: Pa ri jun chaqʼabʼ riʼ, ekʼo kebʼ riʼ cho ri chʼat: jun kkʼam bʼi riʼ, e kʼu ri jun chik kya kanoq riʼ.
Ekʼo kebʼ ixoqibʼ riʼ junam tajin kikeʼnik, jun kkʼam ubʼi riʼ, ekʼu ri jun chik kyaʼ kanoq riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jawichiʼ Ajawxel?». Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Jawichiʼ kʼo ri bʼaqilal, xoqujeʼ chilaʼ riʼ kkimulij wi kibʼ ri kʼuch».
Chkixoʼl ri efariseʼo, kʼo jun achi, Nikodemo ri ubʼiʼ, jun nimalaj winaq kech ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Chʼaqʼabʼ, kbʼe ubʼik rukʼ ri Jesus kuriqaʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Rabbʼi, qetaʼm che atpetinaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos jeʼ jas at jun Ajtij: Rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun riʼ kkowinik chrech ubʼanik ri jetaq kʼutbʼal che kabʼan ri at, we man kʼo ta ri Dyos rukʼ».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chawech, we jun winaq man kaʼlax ta chi jumul man kkowin taj kril ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos».
Ri Nikodemo kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas ubʼanik kuyaʼo kubʼan jun winaq arech kaʼlaxik aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ riʼj winaq chik? ¿La kkowin puch kok chi jumul chusantil rukʼ ri unan e kaʼlax chi jumul?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chawech, we jun winaq man kaʼlax ta ubʼi pa ri jaʼ e pa ri Uxlabʼxel, man kkowin taj kok pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Ri alaxinaq pa ri bʼaqilal, bʼaqilal riʼ, ri alaxinaq pa ri Uxlabʼxel, uxlabʼal riʼ.
Maxibʼij awibʼ, che xinbʼij chawech: Rajawaxik che ri ix kixalax chi na jumul:
Ri kyaqiqʼ kjumumik jawijeʼ kraj wi e kata ri uchʼawibʼal kʼatekʼut man awetaʼm taj jawijeʼ petinaq uloq e jawijeʼ bʼenaq wi. Jeriʼ jas weriʼ, ri kaʼlax pa ri Uxlabʼxel».
Ri Nikodemo kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas kʼu ubʼanik waʼ weriʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri at, at Ajtij pa ri Israʼel, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kachʼobʼ ta we jastaq riʼ?
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chawech,ri uj kqatzijoj ri jastaq che qetaʼm, e kqabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri qilom; kʼatekʼut ri ix, man kikʼam ta uqʼabʼ ri qʼatojtzij kqabʼan ri uj.
We ma kixkojonik aretaq chiʼ kintzijoj ri ujastaq ri uwachulew chiwech, ¿la kixkojon kʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ kintzijoj ri ujastaq ri kaj chiwech?
Man kʼo ta jun paqalnaq chikaj, xuwi ri qajinaq uloq chikaj ri ukʼojol ri achi.
E jeʼ jas uwaʼlajisaxik ri kumatz xubʼan ri Moʼises pa ri tzʼinalik ulew, rajawaxik che xoqujeʼ jeriʼ uwaʼlajisaxik kbʼan na ri ukʼojol ri achi
arech ronojel ri kkojon chrech ri areʼ kkʼojiʼ jun junalik ukʼaslemal rumal ri areʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Dyos sibʼalaj kuloqʼoqʼej ri uwachulew uyaʼom chrech ri xa jun chi ukʼojol, arech ronojel ri kkojon chrech ri areʼ man kusach ta ribʼ, arech kkʼojiʼ jun junalik ukʼaslemal.
Rumal rech che ri Dyos man utaqom ta uloq ri ukʼojol chuwachulew, arech kubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ, utaqom uloq arech kkoltaj ri uwachulew rumal ri areʼ.
Jachin ri kkojon chrech ri areʼ, man kbʼan ta qʼatojtzij puwiʼ; kʼatekut ri jun che man kkojon ta chrech ri areʼ, xbʼantaj qʼatojtzij riʼ puwiʼ, rumal rech che man kojoninaq ta chrech ri Ubʼiʼ ri ukʼojol ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri qʼatbʼaltzij riʼ kʼolik rumal weriʼ: xpe ri chäj chuwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri winaq are sibʼalaj kkiloqʼoqʼej ri qʼequʼm chuwach ri chäj, rumal rech che xas itzel ri kichak.
Kʼatekʼut jachin kubʼan ri itzel kretzelaj uwach ri chäj, e man kpe ta rukʼ ri chäj, arech man kkʼuttaj ta ri itzel taq uchak,
kʼatekʼut, jachin kubʼan ri saqalaj tzij kbʼe rukʼ ri chäj, arech kkʼuttajik che ri uchak bʼantajinaq pa ri Dyos».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kbʼe ubʼi kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ pa rulew ri Judeʼa, kkanaj kan kukʼ e kubʼan ri qasnaʼ.
Xoqujeʼ, ri Xwan tajin kubʼan ri qasnaʼ pa ri Aʼinon, naqaj chrech ri Salim, rumal rech che kʼo sibʼalaj jaʼ chilaʼ e ri winaq sibʼalaj kepetik e kkikʼam ri kiqasnaʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Xwan majaʼ kkʼyaqtaj pa ri cheʼ.
Kwaʼlaj jun chʼoʼj kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ri Xwan rukʼ jun ajjudiʼo, puwiʼ ri chʼajchʼobʼenik rukʼ ri jaʼ.
Kkiriqaʼ ri Xwan, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «Rabʼbʼi, ri jun che kʼo awukʼ, chʼaqap chrech ri Jordan chik, ri jun che utzalaj qʼatojtzij xabʼan puwiʼ, ri areʼ tajin kubʼan qasnaʼ, e konojel kebʼe bʼi rukʼ ri areʼ!».
Ri Xwan kubʼij: «Jun winaq man kkowin taj kubʼan jun jas uwach, we man yaʼom chrech rumal ri kaj.
Ri ix, ix qʼataltzij chwech ri in, che xas in xinbʼinik: “Man in taj ri Kristo, ri in, are intaqom uloq chuwach ri areʼ”.
Ri jun che kʼo ri chʼabʼ ali rukʼ are ri chʼabʼ ala, kʼatekʼut ri rachiʼl ri chʼabʼ ala che kʼo rukʼ ri areʼ, ri kupatanij e kutatabʼej ri areʼ, kkiʼkotik kuta ri uchʼabʼal ri chʼabʼ ala. Are kʼu waʼ ri xutzʼaqatabʼej ri nimalaj nukiʼkotemal.
Rajawaxik che kkʼiy uqʼijil ri areʼ e knitzʼarik nuqʼijil ri in.
Ri jun che petinaq uloq chikaj kʼo pakiwiʼ konojel; ri jun che kel pa ri uwachulew rech ri uwachulew e ktzijonik jeʼ jas jun che rech ri uwachulew. Ri jun che petinaq uloq chikaj
kubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ rin jastaq che rilom e utom, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun winaq kkʼamow ri uqʼatbʼaltzij.
Ri jun winaq che kukʼamo ri uqʼatbʼal-tzij, qastzij ktʼiqtaj rumal, che saqalajtzij ri Dyos;
rumal rech che ri jun utaqom uloq ri Dyos kutzijoj taq ri utzij ri Dyos, rumal rech che man kukʼam ta rij ri usipanik ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Ri Tatxel kuloqʼoqʼej ri Kʼojolxel e uyaʼom ronojel ri jastaq pa ri uqʼabʼ.
Ri jun che kkojon chrech ri Kʼojolxel, kʼo ri junalik ukʼaslemal; ri jun che man kkojon ta chrech ri Kʼojolxel, man kril ta riʼ ri Kʼaslemal; kʼatekʼut are kkanaj riʼ ri royowal ri Dyos puwiʼ ri areʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus retaʼm chik che ri efariseʼo kitom chi utzijol che ri areʼ tajin kekʼyarik ri eʼutijoxelabʼ e are sibʼalaj kubʼan chi na ri qasnaʼ chuwach ri Xwan
kneʼbʼaʼ chi man are ta ri Jesus kbʼanow ri qasnaʼ, eʼare ri eʼutijoxelabʼ,
kel ubʼik pa ri Judeʼa e ktzalij chi ubʼi jumul pa ri Galileʼa.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi rajawaxik wi kqʼax pa ri Samariʼa.
Kopan bʼaʼ pa jun tinamit rech ri Samariʼa, Sikar ri ubʼi, naqaj chrech ri rulew ri Jakobʼ che xuyaʼ chrech ri ukʼojol Xep.
Chilaʼ kʼo wi ri ukʼyaʼnbʼal jaʼ rech ri Jakobʼ. Ri Jesus kosinaq rumal ri bʼinem, tʼuyul naqaj ri ukʼyaʼnbʼal jaʼ. Je neʼ kʼo pa ri uwaq kajbʼal.
Jun ixoq Ajsamariʼa kopanik chila arech kresaj ubʼi ujoron. Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Chayaʼaʼ nujoron arech kinqumuj».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ebʼenaq pa ri tinimit che uloqʼik kiwa.
Ri ixoq Ajsamariʼa kubʼij chrech: «¿Jasche, ri at at ajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ kata ajoron chwech ri in che in jun ixoq in ajsamariʼa?». (Rumal rech che ri eʼajjudiʼo ma kʼo ta utzil chkixoʼl kukʼ ri eʼajsamariʼa).
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Weta awetaʼm ri at ri usipanik ri Dyos e jachin ri kbʼin chawech: Chayaʼaʼ nujoron, at ta ne riʼ ri xata awech chrech e ri areʼ xuya ta na riʼ chawech ri kʼuwaʼlaj jaʼ!»
Kubʼij ri ixoq chrech: «Ajawxel, man kʼo ta kawesbʼej ri jaʼ, e we ukʼyaʼnbʼal jaʼ riʼ sibʼalaj naj upam bʼenaq, ¿jawijeʼ bʼaʼ ayaʼom wi ri kʼuwaʼlaj jaʼ?
¿La are at nim puch chuwach ri qatat Jakobʼ; che xuya chqech we ukʼyaʼnbʼal jaʼ riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xequmum chrech we jaʼ riʼ ri areʼ e ri eralkʼuwaʼl xoqujeʼ ri umebʼil?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri jun che kuqumuj we jaʼ riʼ kchaqij chi na jumul uchiʼ;
kʼatekʼut ri jun che kuqumuj ri jaʼ che kinya na ri in chech man kʼo ta chi jumul kchaqij uchiʼ; ri jaʼ che kinyaʼ na in chrech kubʼan jun ukʼiybʼal kʼuwaʼ pa ri areʼ che kbʼulbʼutik chech junalik kʼaslemal».
Ri jun ixoq kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chwech ri joron riʼ, arech ma kchaqij ta chi nuchiʼ e ma kinpe ta chi waral che resaxik».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «Jat, jasikʼij uloq ri awachajil kʼatekʼuriʼ chattzalij uloq waral».
Ri jun ixoq kubʼij chrech: «Ri in man kʼo ta wachajil». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Utz ri xabʼij: “Ri in man kʼo ta wachajil”,
rumal rech che ri at eqʼaxinaq ejobʼ awachajil e ri jun che kʼo awukʼ kamik riʼ, man awachajil taj; e weriʼ qastzij ri kabʼij».
Ri ixoq kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ri in kinwilo che ri at, at jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Ri eqanan eqatat xkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos puwiʼ we juyubʼ riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix kibʼij: Pa ri Jerusalem kʼo wi ri kʼolibʼal jawijeʼ rajawaxik wi konojel kkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Chakojoʼ ri nutzij, ixoq, che petinaq ri kajbʼal jampaʼ na, che man puwiʼ ta chi we jun yuyubʼ riʼ, xoq man puwiʼ ta chi ri Jerusalem jawiʼ ri kixqʼijilan na chrech ri Tatxel.
Ri ix kiqʼijilaj ri man iwetaʼm ta uwach; ri uj kqaqʼijilaj ri qetaʼm uwach, rumal rech che ri kolotajem petinaq kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Kʼatekʼut, ri kajbʼal petinaq chik –are we ukamik riʼ– che qas utz uqʼijilaxik kbʼan ri Dyos kqʼijilaxik na ri Dyos pa ri Uxlabʼaxel e pa saqalaj tzij, rumal rech che ejeriʼ ri winaq keʼutzukuj ri Tatxel.
Uxlabʼxel ri Dyos, e ri keqʼijilam chrech ri Dyos, rajawaxik che kkiqʼijilaj pa ri Uxlabʼaxel e pa ri saqalaj tzij».
Ri ixoq kubʼij chrech: «Ri in wetaʼm che kpe na ri Mesiʼas, ri kbʼix Kristo chrech. Aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri areʼ, kuya na ubʼixik riʼ chiwech ronojel jastaq».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «In riʼ ri tajin kchʼaw awukʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi we uchanim riʼ kepe ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ksach kikʼuʼx, man kkichʼobʼ taj we kchʼaw rukʼ jun ixoq. Kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta jun kʼo kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas katzukuj?», on: «¿Jas katzijoj rukʼ?».
Ri jun ixoq, chi xaqbʼiʼ kuyaʼ kan ri uqʼebʼal chilaʼ, kutij anim kbʼe pa ri tinamit e kubʼij chkech ri winaq:
«Chisaʼj, jiwilaʼ jun achi che xubʼij chwech ronojel ri nubʼanom pa ri nukʼaslemal. ¿La man are ta kʼu neʼ lo ri Kristo?».
Ri eʼareʼ keʼel ubʼi pa ri tinimit, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiriqaʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkichʼijej e kkibʼij chrech: «Rabʼbʼi, chatwoʼq».
Kʼatekʼut kubʼij chkech: «Ri in kʼo jun wa kintijo che man iwetaʼm ta ri ix».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chbʼil kibʼ: «¿La kʼo jun winaq lo xuyaʼaʼ uwa?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Are waʼ ri nuwa: che kinbʼan ri rajawanik ri intaqowinaq uloq e utz ukʼisik ri uchak kinbʼano.
¿La man kibʼij ta puch ri ix: Kraj na kijebʼ ikʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kok riʼ ri qʼatoj? Utz bʼaʼ riʼ, ri in kinbʼij chiwech: Chiwaʼlisaj ri ikaʼybʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chixkaʼy chrech taq ri tikonbʼal che qʼan chik chrech ri qʼatoj.
Ri ajqʼatoj kyaʼtaj chrech ri tojbʼal uqʼij kʼatekʼuriʼ, kumol uloq riʼ ri taq uwach ri junalik kʼaslemal, xa jekʼuriʼ kʼut, ri ajtikonel junam kkiʼkotik rukʼ ri ajqʼatoj.
Xa jekʼuriʼ che pa weriʼ qastzij kelik ri tzij: jun riʼ ri ajtikonel, jun chi riʼ ri ajqʼatoj
ri in ixintaqom ubʼi chrech qʼatoj jawijeʼ man iyaʼom ta kan ikosibʼal ri ix; enikʼaj chik xekosik, e ri ix kiwechbʼej kan ri kikosibʼal ri eʼareʼ».
Sibʼalaj ekʼi eʼajsamariʼa che eʼajpatinamit riʼ kekojon chrech ri areʼ rumal ri utzij ri jun ixoq kubʼij: «Ri areʼ xubʼij chwech ronojel ri nubʼanom pa ri nukʼaslemal».
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼajsamariʼa keʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ, kkita chrech arech kkanaj kan kukʼ. Ri areʼ kkanaj kan kebʼ qʼij chilaʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj nim kekojon chrech ri areʼ, rumal ri utzij,
e kkibʼij chrech ri jun ixoqʼ riʼ: «Chanim riʼ man kujkojon ta chrech ri areʼ rumal ri atzij at; rumal che chi uj xqatayij ri utzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ qetaʼm che ri areʼ qastzij are ri kolonel rech ri uwachulew».
Aretaq chiʼ okʼowinaq chi ri kebʼ qʼij riʼ, kel ubʼik, kbʼe ubʼi pa ri Galileʼa.
Rumal rech che xas are ne ri Jesus xujikibʼaʼ ubʼixik, che jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, man nim taj kil wi pa ri utinimit.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kopan pa ri Galileʼa, ri eʼajgalileʼa sibʼalaj utz ukʼulaxik kkibʼano, rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ xkil ronojel ri xubʼan pa ri Jerusalem pa ri nimaqʼij, rumal che ri eʼareʼ xoqujeʼ xepe pa ri nimaqʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktzalij kʼut pa ri Kana che utinimit ri Galileʼa, jawijeʼ xukʼex ri joron pa amajaʼ. Kʼo jun upatanijel ri ajawinel che yawabʼ ri ukʼojol kʼo pa ri Kafarnaʼum.
Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kuta utzijol che ri Jesus petinaq uloq pa ri Judeʼa e che xopan pa ri Galileʼa, kbʼek e kuriqaʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuta chrech arech kxuliʼ ubʼik che ukunaxik ri ukʼojol, rumal rech che kamikal chik kʼolik.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «¡Ri ix, we man kiwil ta nikʼaj taq kʼutbʼal e mayibʼal, ma kixkojon taj!».
Ri upatanijel ri ajawinel kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, chatxulun ubʼik aretaq chiʼ maja kkam ri walkʼuwaʼl».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Jat ubʼik, xas kʼaslik ri akʼojol». Ri jun achi kkojon chrech ri tzij xubʼij ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ kbʼek.
Aretaq chiʼ xulunem kubʼan ubʼik, ri eʼupatanijel kkikʼuluʼ ri areʼ e kkibʼij chrech che kʼaslik ri ukʼojol.
Ri areʼ kuta chkech ri kajbʼal aretaq chiʼ xutzirik. Kkibʼij chrech: «Iwir, pa ri wuqubʼ kajbʼal xel ubʼi ri qʼaqʼ chrij».
Ri jun tatxel riʼ xretaʼmaj che are we jun kajbʼal riʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus xubʼij chrech: «Kʼaslik ri akʼojol», kʼatekʼuriʼ kkojon ri areʼ e konojel ri eʼuwinaq pa ri ja ukʼolbʼal.
We jun kʼakʼ kʼutbʼal riʼ che ukabʼ kʼutbʼal, xubʼan ri Jesus aretaq chiʼ xtzalij ubʼi pa ri Judeʼa e kbʼe pa ri Galileʼa.
Chuwach chi aqʼanoq weriʼ, kʼo jun kinimaqʼij ri eʼajjudiʼo e ri Jesus kpaqiʼ uloq pa ri Jerusalem.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri Jerusalem kʼo jun kʼotom jaʼbʼal, che jun kʼolibʼal ubʼiʼ pa griʼego Probʼatika, e Bʼetesda ubʼiʼ pa ri hebʼreʼo, kʼo jobʼ utzaltmal ja chrech.
Chuxeʼ taq we utzaltmal ja riʼ eqʼoyol sibʼalaj eyawabʼibʼ, emoyibʼ, echʼokoʼibʼ, ekaminaq taq kibʼaqil, che keyeʼm che kuchuqʼchaʼ ribʼ ri jaʼ,
rumal rech che ri anjel rech ri Ajawxel, xaq kʼa jumpa na kqaj uloq pa ri kʼotom jaʼbʼal e kuchuqʼchaʼ ri jaʼ, e ri nabʼe che kok pa ri jaʼ aretaq chiʼ xuchuqʼchaʼ ribʼ, kkuntajik chrech ri uyabʼil.
Kʼo chilaʼ, jun achi, che juwinaq wajxaqlajuj chi junabʼ yawabʼ ri areʼ.
Ri Jesus aretaq chiʼ kril ri areʼ che qʼoyolnaq chilaʼ e che retaʼm che kʼi taq junabʼ jewaʼ ubʼanom, kubʼij chrech: «¿La kawaj katkunataj chrech ri abʼaqil?».
Ri yawabʼ achi kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ri in man kʼo ta jun nuwinaq arech kinukʼyaq ubʼi pa ri jaʼ aretaq chiʼ kuchuqʼchaʼ ribʼ; aretaq chiʼ inbʼenaq ri in, jun chik kqaj nabʼe chnuwach».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Chatwaʼlijoq, chakʼa maʼ ubʼi le achʼat e chatbʼinoq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi xaqbʼiʼ utz chik ri achi; kukʼam ubʼi ri uchʼat e kumajij bʼinem. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, Sabʼado we jun qʼij riʼ.
Rumal kʼuriʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech ri achi che ri xkunaxik: «Sabʼado we kamik riʼ, man yaʼtal ta chawech che kakʼam ubʼi le achʼat».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri jun che xinkunanik, xubʼij chwech: Chakʼamaʼ ubʼi le achʼat e chatbʼinoq».
Ri eʼareʼ kkikʼot uchiʼ: «¿Jachin ri jun achi che xubʼij chawech: Chʼakʼamaʼ ubʼi le achʼat e chatbʼinoq?».
Kʼatekʼut, ri kunatajinaq achi, man retaʼm taj jachinoq, xa neʼ ri Jesus xsach ubʼi uwach chkixoʼl ri winaq, rumal rech che ekʼo sibʼalaj winaq chilaʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kuriqaʼ chi na pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos e kubʼij chrech: «Chawilampeʼ, at utzirinaq chik; matmakun chi bʼaʼ, arech man kpe ta jun nimalaj ilo chik pawiʼ».
Ri jun achi kbʼe che ubʼixik chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo, che are ri Jesus xkunan ri areʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ, ri eʼajjudiʼo koqataj ri Jesus, rumal che xubʼan weriʼ pa qʼij sabʼado.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «kʼateʼ waʼ kamik riʼ kchakun ri Nutat e xoqujeʼ ri in kinchakunik».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajjudiʼo nimalaj kichoqʼabʼ kkikojo arech kkikamisaj ri areʼ, rumal rech che man xaq ta matkuchajij ri Sabʼado, xane xoqujeʼ kubʼij Utat chrech ri Dyos e kujunamatisaj ribʼ rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri Jesus, jumul chik kchʼawik e kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, ri Kʼojolxel man kkowin taj xaq pa utukel wi kubʼan jun jas uwach xuwi kkowin che ubʼanik, ri krilo che kubʼan ri Tatxel; ri jastaq che kubʼan ri areʼ xoqujeʼ kubʼan ri Kʼojolxel.
Rumal rech che ri Tatxel kuloqʼoqʼej ri Kʼojolxel e kukʼut chuwach ronojel ri kubʼan ri areʼ; kʼatekʼut, kukʼut chi na chuwach nikʼaj nimalaj taq chak chi na, chuwach we nikʼaj riʼ, arech ri ix sibʼalaj ksach na ikʼux.
Jeʼ jas ri Tatxel che kuwaʼlijisaj kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ e kukʼasbʼaʼ kiwach e kuya ri kikʼaslemal, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ ri Kʼojolxel, kuya ri kʼaslemal chkech ri kraj ri areʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Tatxel man kubʼan ta qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun winaq; xane uyaʼom ronojel ri qʼatbʼaltzij chrech ri Kʼojolxel,
arech konojel ri winaq nim rilik kkibʼano ri Kʼojoloxel jeʼ jas nim rilik wi kkibʼan chrech ri Tatxel. Ri jun che man nim ta rilik kubʼan ri Kʼojolxel xoqujeʼ man nim ta rilik kubʼan ri Tatxel che ri taqowinaq uloq ri areʼ.
Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, jachin kuta ri nutzij ri in e kkojon chrech ri intaqowinaq uloq kʼo ri junaliklaj ukʼaslemal e man kpe ta riʼ chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij, xaneʼ are elenaq ubʼi pa ri kamikal e opaninaq chi pa ri kʼaslemal.
Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, petinaq ri kajbʼal –e kʼo chi ukamik riʼ– che ri ekaminaqibʼ kkitayij na ri uchʼabʼal ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos, e jachintaq kkitayij ri areʼ, kekʼasiʼ riʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Tatxel chi kʼo wi ri ukʼaslemal pa rech wi ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ chi uyaʼom chrech ri Kʼojolxel ri ukʼaslemal pa rech wi ri areʼ
kʼatekʼuriʼ uyaʼom ri kowinem chech ri areʼ arech kubʼan ri qʼatojtzij, rumal rech che ri are areʼ Ukʼojol ri achi.
Mixibʼij iwibʼ chrech weriʼ: Petinaq ri kajbʼal kʼa jampa neʼ che konojel ri winaq che ekʼo pa taq jul kkitayij na ri uchʼabʼal,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, keʼel na uloq riʼ ejachin taq xkibʼan ri utzil, arech kkʼastaj kiwach pa ri kʼaslemal e jachin taq ri xkibʼan ri itzel kkʼastaj kiwach pa jun qʼatojtzij.
Ri in, man kinkowin taj kinbʼan jun jas uwach xaq pa wech wi ri in. Ri in kinbʼan qʼatojtzij jeriʼ jas ri jastaq kinto: e saqalajtzij riʼ ri nuqʼatojtzij, rumal rech che man are ta kintzukuj ri wajawanik ri in, xane are kintzukuj ri rajawanik ri intaqowinaq uloq.
Weta xas ri in, are kinbʼan qʼatojtzij chi panuwiʼ ri in, ma utz ta ne riʼ ri nuqʼatojtzij.
Jun chik riʼ ri kbʼanow qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in, e wetaʼm ri in che utz ri uqʼatojtzij ri kuya panuwiʼ ri in.
Ri ix, xeʼitaq ubʼi nikʼaj winaq rukʼ ri Xwan, e ri areʼ xuya qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri saqalajtzij.
Ri in, man are ta kinkʼam uqʼatojtzij jun winaq; xane are kinbʼij waʼ weriʼ arech kixkoltaj ri ix.
Are areʼ ri kantil che nikilik e kuya ri chäj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix xiwaj xixkiʼkot jun kajbʼal rukʼ ri uchäj.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in are kʼo wukʼ jun nimalaj qʼatojtzij chi na chuwach ri qʼatojtzij rech ri Xwan: rumal che ri jetaq chak kinbʼano, are kyaʼow ri qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in, che xas are ri Tatxel intaqowinaq uloq.
E ri Tatxel che intaqowinaq uloq, are areʼ yaʼowinaq ri qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in. Ri ix, man kʼo ta jumul itom ri uchʼabʼal, ri ix man kʼo ta jumul iwilom ri uwachbʼal,
e ri utzij man kjeqiʼ ta kan iwukʼ, rumal rech che man kixkojon ta chrech ri in taqowinaq uloq ri in.
Ri ix sibʼalaj kinikʼoj rilik ri Tzij, rumal rech che kichomaj che kʼo junalik ikʼaslemal rukʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, are ri Tzij kyaʼow ri qʼatowtzij panuwiʼ;
¡kʼatekʼut, ri ix, man kiwaj taj kixpe wukʼ arech kkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemal!
Ri nuqʼijil ri in man nukʼamom ta kumal ri winaq;
kʼatekʼut, ri in wetaʼm iwach: ri ix man kiloqʼoqʼej ta ri Dyos pa ri ikʼuʼx;
ri in, in petinaq pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Nutat kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kinikʼulaj taj ri ix; weta kpe chi jun xas pa ri ubʼiʼ aqʼan ribʼ ri areʼ, xas kikʼulaj riʼ ri jun riʼ.
¿La kixkowin ri ix kixkojon chrech ri Dyos, che are kikʼulaj ri iqʼijil chibʼil aqʼan iwibʼ, e man kitzukuj ta ri qʼijil che kpe rukʼ ri xa jun chi Dyos?
Michomaj, che ri in kinbʼan na qʼatojtzij piwiʼ chuwach ri Tatxel. Ri qʼataltzij piwiʼ ri ix, are ri Moʼises, ri areʼ, che xikubʼaʼ ronojel ri iweyeʼbʼal chrij.
Rumal rech che, weta kixkojon ix chrech ri Moʼises, xoqujeʼ kixkojon ix laʼ chwech ri in, rumal rech che ri areʼ xutzʼibʼaj ri tzij panuwiʼ ri in.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, wema kixkojon chrech ri utzʼibʼanik, ¿la kixkojon kʼuriʼ chrech ri nutzij riʼ?»
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus, kbʼe chʼaqap chrech ri polow Galileʼa, on chrech ri Tibʼeriʼades.
Sibʼalaj winaq kkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ, rumal rech che kkil ri jetaq kʼutbʼal kubʼan kukʼ ri yawabʼibʼ.
Ri Jesus kpaqiʼ puwiʼ ri juyub e katʼuyiʼ chilaʼ kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ.
Petinaq chik ri Qʼaxebʼal (Paskuʼa) ri nimaqʼij kech ri ajjudiʼo.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus kkaʼy chikaj e keril jun sibʼalaj winaq che epetinaq uloq rukʼ ri areʼ, kubʼij chrech ri Aliʼp: «¿Jawijeʼ kqaloqʼ na wi ri wa arech kewaʼ we winaq riʼ?».
Kubʼij weriʼ chkech arech keʼukoj ri eʼareʼ pa ri kʼax, rumal rech che ri areʼ retaʼm ri kubʼan na.
Ri Aliʼp kubʼij chrech: «Kebʼ okʼal pwaq man kutzqa ta laʼ arech chkijujunal kkitij jun chʼaqap kech».
Jun chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, ri Atrix che rachalal ri Simon Pedro, kubʼij chrech:
«Kʼo chiriʼ, jun alaj akʼal che kʼo jobʼ wa rukʼ bʼanom rukʼ salwaʼt e kebʼ kar; kʼatekʼut ¿jas upatan waʼ weriʼ chkech konojel we ekʼilaj taq winaq riʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Cheʼitʼuybʼaʼ ri winaq». Kʼo sibʼalaj qʼayes pa we jun kʼolibʼal riʼ. Ketʼuyiʼ ne lo ejobʼ mil achijabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus kukʼam ukoq ri jetaq wa, kumaltyoxij chrech ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kujach chkech ri winaq che etʼuyulik; xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kubʼan chrech ri jetaq kar; kkitijo ronojel ri kkaj.
Aretaq chiʼ xkiwaʼlej, kubʼij chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ: «Chimoloʼ ri taq uchʼaqapil che xtoʼtaj kanoq arech man kʼo ta ri kubʼan kʼax».
Kkimol ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kabʼlajuj chakach kkinojisaj rukʼ ri taq uchʼaqapil wa bʼanom rukʼ salwaʼt che xkitoʼ kan ri winaq aretaq xkiwaʼlej.
Aretaq chiʼ ri winaq kkil we jun kʼutbʼal xbʼantaj rumal, kkibʼij: «¡Are waʼ ri qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos ri kpe na cho ri uwachulew!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kuchʼobʼo che kepe na chrech ukʼamik ubʼik arech kkiʼuxisaj ajawinel, kanimaj ubʼik, kbʼe chi bʼi jumul utukel pa ri juyubʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kqaj qʼij, ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kexuliʼ uloq chuchiʼ ri polow,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, keʼaqʼan ubʼi pa jun jukubʼ. Kkisukʼubʼaʼ ubʼi chʼaqap chrech ri polow, pa ri Kafarnaʼum. Okinaq chi ri aqʼabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus majaʼ keʼuriqaʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Kwaʼlaj ri polow rumal rech che kajumumik jun nimalaj kyaqiqʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kbʼinsam chi ri jukubʼ, juwinaq on juwinaqlajuj estadiʼos neʼ, kkil ri Jesus che kbʼin puwiʼ ri polow e ktajin kqibʼ uloq rukʼ ri jukubʼ, kkixibʼij kibʼ ri eʼareʼ».
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «In, mixibʼij iwibʼ».
Kkaj weta kkikʼam ubʼik pa ri jukubʼ, kʼatekʼut chi aninaq kuriqaʼ ri ulew ri jukubʼ, jawiʼ ri kisukʼubʼam ubʼi wi.
Chukabʼ qʼij chik, ri winaq che ekʼo kan chʼaqp chrech ri polow, xkilo che ri areʼ man xaqʼan ta ubʼi pa ri jukubʼ kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, xa ne kitukel ri eʼutijoxelabʼ xebʼe ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼut, kopan nikʼaj taq jukubʼ rech ri Tibʼeriʼades naqaj chrech ri kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ xkitij wi ri wa bʼanom rukʼ salwaʼt.
Aretaq chiʼ kkil ri winaq che man kʼo ta ri Jesus chilaʼ, e xoqujeʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, keʼaqʼan uloq pa taq ri jukubʼ che utzukuxik ri Jesus pa Kafarnaʼum.
Aretaq chiʼ kkiriqaʼ ri areʼ chʼaqap chik che ri polow, kkibʼij che: «Rabʼbʼi ¿jampaʼ xatopan waral?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri ix kinitzukuj ma rumal rech taj che iwilom ri kʼutbʼal xa ne rumal rech che xixwaʼik e sibʼalaj xixnojik.
Mixchakun bʼaʼ arech kʼo ri iwa che kkʼisik, xane are chixchakunoq arech kʼo ri iwa che kʼo pa ri junalik kʼaslemal, ri wa che kuya na chiwech ri Ukʼojol ri achi, rumal rech che are waʼ we areʼ, ri tʼiqatalik rukʼ ri tʼiqbʼal rumal ri Tatxel Dyos».
Chi xaqbʼiʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas rajawaxik kqabʼan na arech kujchakun pa ri uchak ri Dyos?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Ri uchak ri Dyos, are waʼ, che ri ix kixkojon chrech ri jun che utaqom uloq ri Areʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas jun kʼutbʼal kabʼan ri at, arech aretaq chiʼ kqil ri uj, kujkojon chawech? ¿Jas ri chak kabʼano?
Ri ojer taq qatiʼt qamam xkitij ri mana pa ri tzʼinalik ulew jacha tzʼibʼatalik: Xuya ri wa chkech che petinaq chikaj».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, man are ta ri Moʼises xyaʼow ri wa chiwech che xpe chikaj; are ri Nutat ri kyaʼow chiwech ri qastzij are wa che kpe chikaj;
rumal rech, che are waʼ ri wa rech ri Dyos che kqaj uloq chikaj e kuya ri kʼaslemal chuwachulew».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ro-nojel mul, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ we wa chqech riʼ».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «In ri in wa rech kʼaslemal. Ri jun che kpe uloq wukʼ ri in, man kʼo ta chi jumul kanum riʼ; ri jun che kkojon chwech ri in man kchaqiʼj ta uchiʼ riʼ.
Kʼateʼkut, xbʼitaj chiwech wumal ri in: iniwilom chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kixkojon ta chwech.
Ronojel ri kuya ri Tatxel chwech kpe na wukʼ ri in, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kpe wukʼ ri in man kinkʼyaq ta ubʼik;
rumal rech che ri in inqajinaq uloq chikaj, man are ta kulinbʼana ri wajawanik in, xane are kulinbʼanaʼ ri rajawanik ri jun intaqowinaq uloq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jewaʼ ri rajawanik ri areʼ che intaqowinaq uloq, che ri in man kʼo ta jun kintzaqo chrech ronojel ri uyaʼom ri areʼ chwech, xa neʼ kinwaʼlajisaj uwach pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij.
Jeʼ nakʼut, are waʼ ri rajawanik ri Nutat, che ronojel ri kilow uwach ri Kʼojolxel e kkojon chrech ri areʼ kkʼojiʼ junalik ukʼaslemal, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinwaʼlajisaj uwach ri areʼ pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kewixwat chrij ri areʼ, umal rech che xubʼij: «In ri in wa che inqajinaq uloq chikaj».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij: «¿La man are ta waʼ ri Jesus ri ukʼojol ri Xep, e ri eʼunan eʼutat, ri uj qetaʼm kiwach? ¿Jas kʼu che kubʼij chanim riʼ: In ri inqajinaq uloq chikaj?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Mixwixwat chibʼil iwibʼ
man kʼo ta jun kpe wukʼ ri in, we man kjikʼ ta uloq rumal ri Tatxel che inutaqom uloq; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kwaʼlajisax na nuwach pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij.
Tzʼibʼatalik pa taq ri qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos: Konojel winaq ketijox na rumal ri Dyos. Ronojel winaq che kutatbʼej ri utzij ri Tatxel e kretaʼmaj, kpe wukʼ ri in.
Man xa ta kʼo jun ilowinaq ri Tatxel xuwi ne ri jun che petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos: ri jun riʼ rilom ri Tatxel.
Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri jun che kkojon chrech ri Dyos, kʼo junalik ukʼaslemal.
In ri in wa rech kʼaslemal.
Ri ojer taq iwatiʼt imam, xkitij ri mana pa ri tzʼinalik ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ xekamik;
are waʼ we wa ri kqaj uloq chikaj, arech, ri ketijowik man kekam taj.
In ri in kʼasliklaj wa che in qajinaq uloq chikaj. Ri winaq che kutij na we wa riʼ, kʼo junalik ukʼaslemal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri wa che kinya na in chrech, are ri nutiʼojil, arech kkʼasiʼ we uwachulew riʼ».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo sibʼalaj kkikʼot rij chkixoʼl; kkibʼij: «¿Jas uyaʼik laʼ kubʼano arech kuya pa tijik chqech ri utiʼojilal?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri ix, wema kitij ri utiʼojilal ri ukʼojol ri achi e wema kiqumuj ri ukikʼel, man kʼo ta kʼaslemal iwukʼ.
Ri winaq che kutij ri nutiʼojilal e kuqumuj ri nukikʼel kʼo junalik ukʼaslemal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinwaʼlajisaj na uwach ri areʼ pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij.
Rumal rech che ri nutiʼojilal qastzij che wa e ri nukikʼel qastzij che ukʼyaʼ.
Ri winaq che kutij ri nutiʼojilal e kuqumuj ri nukikʼel, kkanaj kan riʼ pa ri nukʼuʼx ri in, e ri in pa ri ukʼuʼx ri areʼ.
Xoqujeʼ, jacha ri Tatxel che kʼaslik, che ri inutaqom uloq e ri in che kʼo ri nukʼaslemal rumal ri Tatxel, xoqujeʼ ri jun che kinutijo, kkʼasiʼ na wumal ri in.
Are waʼ ri wa che qajinaq uloq chikaj; man jeriʼ taj jacha ri xkitij ri ojer taq iwatiʼt imam, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xekamik; ri winaq che kutij we wa riʼ kʼo junalik ukʼaslemal».
We tzij riʼ, xubʼij aretaq ktijon pa jun ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal pa ri Kafarnaʼum.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkita weriʼ, kkibʼij: «¡Kʼax utayik we tzij riʼ! ¿Jachin kkowin chutatbʼexik?».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Jesus retaʼm pa rech wi che ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kewixwat puwiʼ weriʼ, kubʼij chkech: «¿La kʼax kubʼan weriʼ chiwech?
¿E jas kubʼan riʼ chiwech aretaq chiʼ kiwil na ri ukʼojol ri achi che kpaqiʼk jawijeʼ kʼo wi ojer kanoq?
Are ri uxlabʼxel kyaʼow ri kʼaslemal; ri tiʼojilal man utz taj, man kʼo ta upatan. Uxlabʼxel ri tzij che xinbʼij chiwech, xoqujeʼ kʼaslemal.
Kʼatekʼut, ekʼo nikʼaj chixoʼl che man kekojon taj». Ri Jesus, chi retaʼm, aretaq chiʼ xkimajij jachin taq ri man kekojon ta chrech ri areʼ e jachin ri kjachow na ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij: «Rumal kʼu waʼ xinbʼij chiwech che man kʼo ta jun kuyaʼo kpe wukʼ we man kuyaʼ ta ri Tatxel chrech weriʼ».
Chi pa we jun qʼij ubʼik, sibʼalaj ekʼi chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ketzalij chkij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kkiterneʼbʼej ta chik ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chkech ri ekabʼlajuj: «¿La xoqujeʼ ri ix kiwaj kixbʼek?».
Ri Simon Pedro kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿jachin rukʼ kujbʼe wi? Ri at kʼo ri atzij rech junalik kʼaslemal.
Ri uj kqakojo e kqilo che at ri attyoxlaj winaq rech ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «¿La man in taj ri xinsikʼin iwech ri ix ri ixkabʼlajuj?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chixoʼl ri ix, jun Kʼaxtok».
Are ri Judas ri kutzijoj che ukʼojol ri Simon Iskariʼote, rumal rech che are ri areʼ kjachow na ri areʼ, jun chkixoʼl ri ekabʼlajuj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kbʼin pa ri Galileʼa; man kraj taj kbʼin pa ri Judeʼa, rumal rech che ri ajjudiʼo kkaj kkikamisaj ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, petinaq chi ri nimaqʼij ri kbʼix kabʼal chrech (tzʼum taq ja).
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri erachalal kkibʼij chrech: «Chatel ubʼi waral jat ubʼi pa ri Judeʼa, arech xoqujeʼ ri eʼatijoxelabʼ kkil ri taq chak kabʼano:
man kʼo ta jun winaq kchakun pa awalkil aretaq chiʼ kraj kilitajik. We kabʼan weriʼ, chakʼutuʼ awibʼ chuwach ri uwachulew».
Xa ne rumal rech che xoqujeʼ ri erachalal man kekojon ta chrech ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Majaʼ kopan ri nukajbʼal, kʼatekʼut ri ikajbʼal ri ix xaq apachike kajbʼal.
We uwachulew man kkowin taj kretzelaj iwach, kʼatekʼut, ri in kretzelaj nuwach, rumal rech che kinbʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri itzel taq uchak ri uwachulew.
Chixpaqal ubʼi ri ix pa ri nimaqʼij; ri in man kinpaqiʼ taj pa we jun nimaqʼij riʼ rumal rech che man tzʼaqatinaq ta ri nukajbʼal».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, kkanaj kan pa ri Galileʼa.
Kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ ri erachalal epaqalnaq chi ubʼi pa ri nimaqʼij, xoqujeʼ kpaqiʼ ubʼi ri areʼ pa awalkil, man kuqʼalajisaj ta ribʼ chkiwach ri winaq.
Ri eʼajjujdiʼo kkitzukuj pa ri nimaqʼij e kkibʼij: «¿Jawijeʼ riʼ kʼo wi ri areʼ?».
Ri winaq sibʼalaj kewixwatik chrij ri areʼ. E kʼo nikʼaj kkibʼij: «Ri areʼ jun achi rech Utzil». E kʼo nikʼaj chik kkibʼij: «Man je ta riʼ, ri areʼ xa ne keʼusubʼ ri winaq».
Kʼatekʼut, ma kʼo ta jun winaq ktzijon puwiʼ ri areʼ chkiwach ri winaq rumal rech che kixibʼim kibʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Panikʼaj chik ri nimaqʼij, ri Jesus kapaqiʼ ubʼi pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukʼut ri Tzij.
Ri ajjudiʼo ksach kikʼuʼx e kkibʼij: «¿Jas retaʼmaxik waʼ ubʼanom we Tzij riʼ, xa ne man kʼutum ta neʼ chuwach?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Ri tzij kinkʼutu, man wech ta ri in, xa ne are ajchaqʼeʼ ri inutaqom uloq.
We kʼo jun winaq kraj kubʼan ri rajawanik, kril waʼ che we nutzij, la utzij ri Dyos, on kinchʼaw in xaq pa wech wi ri in.
Ri jun che kchʼaw xaq pa rech wi ri areʼ, chi are kutzukuj ri uqʼijil kʼatekʼut, ri jun che are kutzukuj ri uqʼijil ri intaqowinaq uloq, ri areʼ riʼ, sukʼ, saqalajtzij ri areʼ riʼ e man kʼo ta joʼs taq tzij pa ri ukʼuʼx.
¿La man are ta ri Moʼises xyaʼow ri Tzij chiwech? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun chiwech ri ix che qastzij kubʼan ri Tzij. ¿Jasche che kiwaj kinikamisaj?».
Ri winaq kkibʼij: «Ri at kʼo jun Itzel awukʼ! ¿Jachin kraj katukamisaj?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Xa jun jas uwach nubʼanom, kʼatekʼuriʼ, iwonojel mayibʼal ix kʼolik.
Ri Moʼises xixutaq chrech uqʼatik ri uwiʼ ikowil –man rukʼ ta kʼut ri Moʼises petinaq wi weriʼ, xane kukʼ ri ojer taq qatiʼt qamam– kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix pa jun qʼij sabʼado, kipus uwiʼ ukowil jun achi.
We kpus uwiʼ ukowil jun achi pa qʼij Sabʼado, arech man ketzelax ta ri Utzij ri Moʼises, ¿la kpe kʼu iwoyowal chwech rumal rech che ri in kinkunaj ronojel ri uwinaqil jun achi pa jun qʼij Sabʼado?
Mibʼan qʼatoj-tzij puwiʼ ri xaq jalum tzij, chibʼanaʼ qʼatoj-tzij rukʼ sukʼaliklaj chomabʼal».
Nikʼaj winaq che eʼajjerusalem, kkibʼij: «¿La man are ta waʼ we areʼ, ri kaʼjawaxik kkamisaxik?
¡We uchanim riʼ kchʼaw chkiwach ri winaq e man kʼo ta kbʼix chech! ¿La qastzij kʼuriʼ xkikʼam uqʼabʼ ri nimaʼq taq winaq che are areʼ ri Kristo?
Kʼatekʼut, we areʼ, qetaʼm jawijeʼ kel wi, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Kristo, aretaq chiʼ kpetik, man kʼo ta jun winaq riʼ retaʼm jawijeʼ kel wi».
Chi chanim, ri Jesus kukʼut ri Tzij pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, kuraqaqej uchiʼ, kubʼij: «Ri ix iwetaʼm nuwach ri in e iwetaʼm jawijeʼ kinel wi kʼatekʼut, ri in man inpetinaq taj xaq pa wech wi ri in xane qastzij are kintaqowik ri intaqowinaq uloq. Kʼatekʼut, ri ix man iwetaʼm ta uwach.
Ri in, wetaʼm uwach, rumal rech che ri in, in petinaq uloq rukʼ ri areʼ e are ri areʼ ri intaqowinaq uloq».
Chi uchanim riʼ, kkaj kkichap ubʼi ri areʼ, kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta jun kukoj uqʼabʼ chrech ri areʼ, rumal rech che majaʼ kopan ri ukajbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ekʼi chkixoʼl ri winaq kekojon chrech ri areʼ e kkibʼij: «Aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri Kristo, ¿la kʼo chi na nim taq kʼutbʼal kubʼan na riʼ chuwach we ubʼanom chi we jun riʼ?
kkita raqanil ri efariseʼo che ri winaq kkitzijoj weriʼ puwiʼ we areʼ, keʼkitaq bʼi enikʼaj ajchʼamiʼy arech kkichap ubʼi ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim kubʼij ri Jesus: «Kinkanaj chi na kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij iwukʼ, tekʼuriʼ kinbʼe rukʼ ri intaqowinaq uloq.
Ri ix kinitzukuj na riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kiniriq ta riʼ e jawijeʼ in kʼo wi ri in, man kixkowin taj kixbʼe ix chilaʼ».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chkibʼil kibʼ: «¿Jawijeʼ kbʼe wi laʼ le areʼ arech man kqariq ta chi ri uj? ¿La kbʼe laʼ kukʼ ri ekʼo pa taq ri kitinamit ri ajgriʼego arech kukʼutuʼ ri Tzij chkech ri ajgriʼego?
Jas waʼ we tzij xbʼitaj rumal: “Kinitzukuj na riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kiniriq ta riʼ, e jawijeʼ in kʼo wi ri in man kuya taj kixbʼe ix chilaʼ!”»
Pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij che nimaqʼij, ri jun qʼij che qas unimal nimaqʼij, ri Jesus takʼal uloq, kuraq uchiʼ: «¡We kʼo jun kchaqij uchiʼ, chpetoq wukʼ ri in e chaqumunoq,
ri kkojon chwech in!». Jacha kubʼij ri utzij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Jeʼ jas nimaʼ, pa ri uchuch upam kchojoj na riʼ kʼasliklaj jaʼ.
Weriʼ che kubʼij, are kutzijoj ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel che kkikʼam na ri kekojon chrech ri areʼ; xane majaʼ kʼo ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, rumal rech che ri Jesus majaʼ kqʼijilaxik.
Ekʼi chkixoʼl ri winaq, che xkita we tzij riʼ, kkibʼij: «¡Qastzij che are waʼ we areʼ ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos!».
Ekʼo nikʼaj chik kkibʼij: «¡Are waʼ we areʼ ri Kristo!». Kʼatekʼut, ekʼo chi nikʼaj kkibʼij: «¿La pa ri Galileʼa puch kel uloq ri Kristo?
¿La man kubʼij ta ri Tzij che ri Kristo pa ri rijaʼlil ri David kel uloq e pa ri Bʼelen, che utinimit ri David?».
Kwaʼlaj chʼoʼj chkixoʼl ri winaq, man xa ta jun kiwach rumal ri areʼ.
Ekʼo nikʼaj chkech we winaq riʼ kkaj kkichap ubʼi ri areʼ, kʼatekʼut man kʼo ta jun kukoj uqʼabʼ chrech ri areʼ.
Ri eʼajchʼamiʼy ketzalijik e kekiriqaʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri efariseʼo. We eʼareʼ riʼ, kkibʼij chkech: «¿Jasche ma xikʼam ta uloq?».
Ri taq ajchʼimiʼy kkibʼij: «¡Man kʼo ta jumul chʼawinaq jun winaq jacha kchʼaw we areʼ riʼ!».
Ri efariseʼo kkibʼij: «¿La xoqujeʼ ri ix xiyaʼ iwibʼ xixusubʼu?
¿La kojoninaq puch chrech ri areʼ, jun nim winaq on jun fariseʼo?
¡Kʼatekʼut, le winaq leʼ che man ketaʼm ta ri Tzij, ekyaqsaqlaj taq winaq!».
Ri Nikodemo che jun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, che ri petinaq kan rukʼ ri Jesus, kubʼij chkech:
«Ri qapixabʼ, ¿la kubʼan puch qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun winaq aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kutayij ri utzij e aretaq chiʼ maja retaʼm ri xubʼano?».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿La xoqujeʼ pa Galileʼa katel wi ri at? Chachʼobʼoʼ rij chi nojim, chatijoj awibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kawil na riʼ che man kʼo ta jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos kel uloq pa ri Galileʼa».
Tekʼuriʼ, chkijujunal kebʼe bʼi cho taq kachoch.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kbʼe ubʼi puwiʼ ri juyubʼ Olivo.
Kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ ksaqarik, kpe chi jumul pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, e konojel ri winaq kepe uloq rukʼ. Ri areʼ ktʼuyiʼk e kukʼut ri Tzij chkiwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ e ri efariseʼo kkikʼam ubʼi jun ixoq chuwach che xriqitaj pa umak rukʼ achi. Kkiya ri areʼ panikʼaj,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech ri Jesus: «Ajtij, we ixoq riʼ riqatajinaq uloq aretaq chiʼ tajin chrech ri makaj rukʼ achi.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktaqan ri Moʼises chqech pa ri Pixabʼ, che keqakamisaj che abʼaj we eʼixoqibʼ riʼ. Kʼatekʼut ri at, ¿jas kabʼij?».
Kkibʼij ronojel weriʼ arech kkikoj ri areʼ pa kʼax, arech kʼo jun jas uwach ri rumal kkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼut, ri Jesus kulukbʼaʼ ukoq ribʼ e kumajij tzʼibʼanik rukʼ ri uwiʼ uqʼabʼ pulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal che sibʼalaj kkikʼot uchiʼ puwiʼ weriʼ, kusukʼubʼaʼ ribʼ e kubʼij chkech: «Ri jun chixoʼl ri ix, che man kʼo ta jun umak, chukʼyaqaʼ ri nabʼe abʼaj chrech ri areʼ!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kulukbʼa chi jumul ribʼ e ktzʼibʼan pulew.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkita weriʼ, chkijujunal keʼel ubʼik, jun chrij ri jun chik, are kenabʼej ri eriʼj taq winaq chik; kʼatekʼuriʼ kkanaj kan utukel rukʼ ri ixoq che kʼo na panikʼyaj.
Ri Jesus kusukʼubʼaʼ ribʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ixoq, ¿jawijeʼ ekʼo wi? ¿La man kʼo ta jun xubʼan qʼatojtzij pawiʼ?».
Kubʼij ri areʼ: «Man kʼo ta jun, Ajawxel». Chi chanim ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri in, xoqujeʼ man kinbʼan ta qʼatojtzij pawiʼ, jat e chweʼq kabʼij, matmakun chik».
Ri Jesus, keʼuchʼabʼej chi jumul e kubʼij chkech: «In ri inuchäj inusaqil ri uwachulew. Ri jun che kinuterneʼbʼej ma kbʼin ta chi jumul riʼ pa ri qʼequʼmal, xane kkʼojiʼ ri usaqil kʼaslemal rukʼ».
Tekʼuriʼ, ri efariseʼo kkibʼij chrech: «Ri at kabʼan qʼatojtzij chbʼil awibʼ; ri qʼatoj atzij man utz taj».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in kinbʼan qʼatojtzij chbʼil wibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz ri nuqʼatojtzij, rumal rech, che ri in wetaʼm jawijeʼ in petinaq wi uloq e jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi; kʼatekʼut, ri ix ma iwetaʼm taj jawijeʼ in petinaq wi uloq e jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi.
Ri ix kibʼan qʼatojtzij rumal ri tiʼojilal ri in man kʼo ta jun kinbʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ;
kʼatekʼut, we kinbʼan qʼatojtzij, saqalajtzij ri nuqʼatojtzij, rumal rech che ri in man nutukel taj in kʼolik; xane in kʼo in e kʼo ri jun in taqowinaq uloq;
e pa ri ipixabʼ tzʼibʼatal wi che utz ri qʼatojtzij kkibʼan ekebʼ winaq.
In ri kinbʼan ri qʼatojtzij chbʼil wibʼ, e rumal kutoqʼobʼisaj nuwach ri Nutat, xoqujeʼ kubʼan qʼatojtzij ri areʼ che in taqowinaq uloq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri Atat?». Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri ix man kichʼobʼ ta nuwach ri in e man kichʼobʼ ta uwach ri Nutat, ri ix weta kichʼobʼ nuwach ri in, xoqujeʼ kichʼobʼ uwach riʼ ri Nutat».
Kubʼij we tzij riʼ jawiʼ kʼo wi ri ukʼolibʼal ri pwaq aretaq chiʼ kukʼut ri Tzij pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos. E man kʼo ta jun winaq kchapow ubʼi ri areʼ rumal rech che majaʼ kopan ri ukajbʼal.
Ri Jesus, xoqujeʼ kubʼij chi jumul: «Ri in, kinbʼe na waʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix kinitzukuj na riʼ e kixkam na riʼ pa ri imak. Jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi ri in man kuya taj kixbʼe ix chilaʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij: «¿La xa kukamisaj ribʼ laʼ rumal che kubʼij: “¿Jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi ri in, man kuya taj kixbʼe ix chilaʼ?”».
Tekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix, ix rech ikim; ri in, in rech ajsik. Ri ix, ix rech we uwachulew riʼ; ri in man in rech ta we uwachulew riʼ.
Xbʼitaj chiwech che ri ix kixkam waʼ pa ri imak. Rumal rech che we man kixkojon taj che IN RIʼ, kixkam waʼ pa ri imak».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿At jachin ri at?». Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Xas pa ri umajibʼal uloq nubʼim chiwech.
Ri in, kuyaʼo sibʼalaj kʼo kinbʼij piwiʼ e kuyaʼo kinbʼan qʼatojtzij piwiʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri intaqowinaq uloq man joʼs taj, areʼ saqalajtzij; e ri in kinya ubʼixik chrech we uwachulew ri jastaq che xinta rukʼ ri areʼ».
Man kkichʼobʼ taj che are katzijon puwiʼ ri Tatxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Aretaq chiʼ xwaʼlajisatajik ri ukʼojol ri achi iwumal, kiwetaʼmaj che IN RIʼ e che man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kinbʼano xaq pa wech wi ri in xane are kinbʼij ri ukʼutum ri Tatxel chnuwach,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in taqowinaq uloq, kʼo wukʼ ri in; man kinuya ta kan nutukel, rumal rech che ri in ronojel mul kinbʼan ri kraj ri areʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ jewaʼ kchʼawik, ekʼi sibʼalaj kekojon chrech ri areʼ.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo che xekojon chrech ri areʼ: «We qas kixjeqiʼ pa ri nutzij, qastzij riʼ ix nutijoxelabʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kiwetaʼmaj riʼ ri saqalaj tzij e ri saqalaj tzij kixutzaqopij na riʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj ujrijaʼlil ri Abʼraham e man kʼo ta jumul ujximital puqʼabʼ jun winaq. Xa jeʼ kʼuriʼ, ¿jas kʼu che, che ri at kabʼij: kixtzaqopitaj na?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri jun che kmakunik, ximitalik ne riʼ.
E ri jun che ximital puqʼabʼ jun chik, man jeqel ta riʼ pa ja kʼatekʼut, ri kʼojolxel chi jeqel riʼ chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Xa jeʼ kʼuriʼ, we kixutzaqopij ri Kʼojolxel, qastzij ixtzaqapatal riʼ.
Ri in wetaʼm, che ri ix ixrijaʼlil ri Abʼraham kʼatekʼut, are kiwaj kinikamisaj, rumal rech che ri nutzij man ktʼiqitaj ta pa ri ikʼuʼx.
Ri in kintzijoj ri jastaq che wilom rukʼ ri Nutat; e ri ix kibʼan ri itom rukʼ ri itat».
Kkibʼij chrech: «Ri qatat, are ri Abʼraham». Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «We ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri Abʼraham, ri ix kibʼan na kʼuriʼ ri uchak ri Abʼraham.
Kʼatekʼut, ri kamik riʼ, ri ix kiwaj kinikamisaj, ri in, che in jun achi, che nubʼim chiwech ri saqalaj tzij, che xintayij rukʼ ri Dyos. ¡Waʼ weriʼ, man xubʼan ta waʼ ri Abʼraham!
Ri ix, are kibʼan ri uchak ri itat». Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj man ujalaxinaq ta pa uchak ri kech nim chʼutiʼn. Ri uj xa jun Qatat: Chi are ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Weta are Itat ri Dyos, kiniloqʼoqʼej in waʼ rumal rech che ri in, in elenaq e inpetinaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos; ri in man in petinaq ta uloq xaq pa wech wi ri in; xane are ri areʼ in taqowinaq uloq.
¿Jasche man kikʼam ta uqʼabʼ we nutzij? Rumal rech che man loqʼ taj kitatabʼej we nutzij.
Ri ix, ix elenaq uloq pa ri Itzel, che are Itat, e are kiwaj kibʼano ri rajawanik ri itat. We areʼ riʼ, kamisanel xas pa ri majibʼal uloq kʼatekʼuriʼ, man xajeqiʼ ta pa ri saqalaj tzij rumal rech che man kʼo ta saqalajtzij pa ri areʼ: aretaq chiʼ kubʼan taq ri tzij, are kubʼij ri jastaq kel uloq pa ri areʼ rumal rech che ajbʼanal tzij e are utat ri bʼanoj tzij.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in man kinikoj taj, rumal rech che kinbʼij ri saqalaj tzij chiwech.
¿Jachin jun chixoʼl ri ix kkowinik kukʼutu che ri in kinmakunik? Ri in kinbʼij ri saqalaj tzij, ¿jasche man kinikoj taj?
Ri jun che kel uloq pa ri Dyos kutatbʼej ri utzij ri Dyos; ri ix, we man kitatbʼej ta weriʼ, man ix rech ta ri Dyos».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech: «¿La man qastzij ta neʼ ri kqabʼij uj aretaq chiʼ kqabʼij che ri at at jun ajsamariʼa e che kʼo jun Itzel awukʼ?»
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri in, man kʼo ta jun Itzel wukʼ; ri in, xane nim kinwil wi ri Nutat, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix kitzukuj retzelaxik nuwach.
Ri in, man kintzukuj ta nuqʼijil; kʼo chik ri ktzukuw rech, e ri kbʼanow qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri jastaq.
Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, we kʼo jun kukʼaslemaj ri nutzij, xas man riʼ kril ta riʼ ri kamikal».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech: «Kamik riʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che ri at kʼo jun Itzel awukʼ. Ri Abʼraham xkamik, xoqujeʼ ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri at kabʼij: “We kʼo jun kukʼaslemaj ri nutzij xas man kril ta riʼ ri kamikal”.
Ri at, ¿la are at nim puch chuwach ri Abʼraham ri qatat che xkamik? Xoqujeʼ, ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos xekamik. ¿At jachin at kakoj awibʼ?»
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri in, weta nim nuqʼij kinyaʼo, chi rumal aqʼan wibʼ ri in, ma kʼo ta upatan riʼ ri nuqʼijil, kʼatekʼut, are ri Nutat kyaʼow ri nim nuqʼijil ri in, ri areʼ, che kibʼij chrech: “Are areʼ ri Qadyos”,
kʼatekʼut, ri ix man iwetaʼm ta uwach, ri in, xane qastzij wetaʼm uwach; kʼatekʼuriʼ, weta ri in kinbʼij: “Ri in ma wetaʼm ta uwach”, in jun bʼanal tzij nakʼuriʼ, ix jacha ri ix. Kʼatekʼut, ri in wetaʼm uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinkʼaslemaj ri utzij.
Ri Abʼraham che are ri itat, sibʼalaj xkiʼkotik, aretaq chiʼ xuchomaj che kril na ri Nuqʼij. Xrilo, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkiʼkotik».
Chi chanim, ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech: «¡Ri at, majaʼ neʼ kʼo kawinaq lajuj ajunabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xawil ri Abʼraham!».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kaʼlax ri Abʼraham, In riʼ».
Chi chanim kkikʼam ukoq taq ri abʼaj, arech kkikʼyaq chrij ri areʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kukʼuʼ ribʼ chkiwach e kel bʼi pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ kokʼowik, kril jun moy che xas pa ralaxibʼal uloq jeriʼ.
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Rabʼbʼi, ¿jachin xmakunik, are ri areʼ on eʼare ri eʼunan eʼutat arech moy ri areʼ xaʼlaxik?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Man xmakun ta ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ man xemakun ta ri eʼunan eʼutat, xane arech kkʼuttaj rukʼ ri areʼ ri uchak ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ paqʼij na, rajawaxik kqachakuj ri uchak ri jun che inutaqom uloq; kok aqʼabʼ, aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta chi jun winaq kkowinik kchakunik.
Aretaq chiʼ ri in, in kʼo chuwachulew, in saqil rech ri uwachulew».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ rumal, kuchubʼaj ukʼaxaj chuwach ri ulew, kubʼan xoqʼol rukʼ ri ukʼaxaj e kukoj we xoqʼol riʼ cho taq ri uwoqʼoch ri jun moy,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Jat, jachʼajaʼ awach pa ri joron rech Siloʼe» –che pa qachʼabʼal kubʼij: Taqoʼm–. Ri moy kbʼek, kuchʼaj ri uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ ronojel chik krilo aretaq chiʼ ktzalij uloq.
Ri eʼukʼulja e ri winaq che kilom kanoq che areʼ sin molonel pwaq, kkibʼij: «¿La man are ta waʼ we areʼ che ktʼuyiʼ chrech umolik ri sin taq urajil?».
Ekʼo nikʼaj kkibʼij: «Are areʼ». Ekʼo nikʼaj chik kkibʼij: «Ma are taj, jun chi neʼ che junam kkaʼy rukʼ». Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij: «In riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas kʼu ujaqik ribʼ xubʼan le awoqʼoch?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «Ri jun achi che ubʼiʼ Jesus, xubʼan xoqʼol, xukoj cho ri nuwoqʼoch, kʼatekʼuriʼ xubʼij chwech: “Jat pa ri Siloʼe e chachʼajaʼ le awach”. Ri in xinbʼek, xinchʼaj ri nuwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ xinkaʼyik».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri areʼ?». Ri areʼ kubʼij: «Man wetaʼm taj».
Kkikʼam ubʼi ri moy kanoq chkiwach ri efariseʼo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa jun qʼij Sabʼado, aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus xubʼan ri xoqʼol e xujaq ri uwoqʼoch ri moy.
Xoqujeʼ, ri efariseʼo kkikʼot uchiʼ jas ubʼanik xubʼano che kkaʼy chik ri areʼ. Kubʼij chkech: «Xukoj xoqʼol cho ri nuwoqʼoch, xinchʼaj nuwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ ronojel chik kinwilo».
E kʼo jujun chkech ri efariseʼo che kkibʼij: «Waʼ we achi riʼ man elenaq ta uloq rukʼ ri Dyos, rumal rech che man kuchajijbʼej ta ri qʼij Sabʼado»; ekʼo chi ejujun kkibʼij: «¿Jas ubʼanik kubʼano jun ajmakunel ri taq kʼutbʼal jacha weriʼ?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼo jun jachoj ibʼ chkixoʼl.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chi jumul chrech ri moy: «E kʼu ri at, jas kabʼij chrij ri areʼ e puwiʼ ri jun che xujaq le awoqʼoch?». Kubʼij: «Ri areʼ jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo, aretaq majaʼ kekisikʼij ri eʼunan eʼutat, ma kkikoj taj che moy kanoq ri jun achiʼ riʼ che kkaʼy chik.
Kkikʼot kichiʼ eʼare: «¿La are waʼ we iwalkʼuwaʼl che kibʼij moy xaʼlaxik? ¿Jas kʼu che waʼ che kamik riʼ, ronojel chik krilo?».
Ri eʼunan eʼutat kkibʼij: «Ri uj qetaʼm che are waʼ we qalkʼuwaʼl, xoqujeʼ qetaʼm che moy xaʼlaxik.
Kʼatekʼut, jas kʼu che, che ronojel chik kril kamik riʼ, ri uj man qetaʼm taj, e jachin xjaqow ri uwoqʼoch, xoqujeʼ ri uj man qetaʼm taj. Chitaʼ bʼaʼ ku weriʼ chrech ri areʼ, tzʼaqat chi ujunabʼ, ri areʼ kkowin laʼ kchʼaw chi pa rech wi».
Ri eʼunan eʼutat jewaʼ kkibʼij, rumal rech che kkixibʼij kibʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo; rumal rech che ri eʼajjudiʼo xkibʼan jun qʼatojtzij e junam chi kiwach, che we kʼo jun kubʼij che ri Jesus are ri Kristo, kkikʼyaq uloq pa ri ukʼolbʼalchʼabʼal.
Xa rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ che ri eʼunan utat kkibʼij: «Ri areʼ tzʼaqat chi ujunabʼ; chitaʼ bʼaʼ ku weriʼ chrech».
Pa ukamul chik, ri eʼajjudiʼo kkisikʼij ri achi che moy kanoq, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¡Nim chawilaʼ wi ri Dyos! Ri uj qetaʼm, che we achi riʼ jun ajmakuninel».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «We ajmakuninel ri areʼ, ri in man wetaʼm taj, ri in, xa jun jas uwach ri wetaʼm: ri in che ri ubʼanom kanoq, in moy e kʼu kamik riʼ ronojel chik kinwilo».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿Jas kʼu xubʼan chawech? ¿Jas ujaqik xubʼan chrech ri awoqʼoch?».
Kubʼij chkech: «Weriʼ xbʼitaj chiwech, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix ma xinetatabʼej taj. ¿Jas kʼu che, che are kiwaj kita chi jumul weriʼ? ¿La xa xoqujeʼ kiwaj ix kixuxik ix utijoxelabʼ ri areʼ?».
Kketzelaj uwach we achi, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chech: «At ri atutijoxel ri jun achi riʼ; ri uj xane ujutijoxelabʼ ri Moʼises.
Ri uj qetaʼm che ri Dyos xuchʼabʼej ri Moʼises; kʼatekʼut, ri jun riʼ, man qetaʼm taj jawijeʼ wi elenaq uloq».
Ri achi, kubʼij chkech: «Are kʼu waʼ ri sachibʼal kʼuʼx: che ri ix man iwetaʼm taj jawijeʼ wi elenaq uloq ri areʼ, e che xujaq we jetaq nuwoqʼoch ri in.
Ri uj qetaʼm che ri Dyos man keʼutatabʼej ta ri eʼajmakibʼ, kʼatekʼut, we jun winaq kuxibʼij ribʼ chuwach ri Dyos e we kubʼan ri rajawanik, ri Dyos kutatabʼej ri jun winaq riʼ.
Man kʼo ta jumul tatajinaq, che jun winaq xujaq uwoqʼoch jun winaq chik, che moy uloq pa ri ralaxibʼal uloq.
We achi riʼ, weta mata elenaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kkowin riʼ kubʼano».
Kkibʼij chrech: «¡Ri at, chi at alaxinaq pa ri mak, kʼatekʼuriʼ kujatijoj ukoq!». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkikʼyaq uloq ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kretaʼmaj che xkikʼyaq uloq ri areʼ. Kuriqaʼ, e kubʼij chrech: «¿La katkojon chech ri ukʼojol ri achi?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «¿E jachin kʼu riʼ ri areʼ Ajawxel, arech kinkojon ri in chrech ri areʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri at awilom chik; ri jun che tajin kchʼaw awukʼ riʼ, are riʼ ri areʼ».
Chi xaqbʼiʼ ri areʼ kuqʼalajisaj, e kubʼij: «Kinkojonik, Ajawxel», kʼatekʼuriʼ kumej ribʼ chuwach ri areʼ.
Chi xaqbʼi, kubʼij ri Jesus: «Inpetinaq pa we uwachulew arech kbʼantaj jun qʼatbʼal tzij, arech ri man kekaʼy taj, kekaʼyik e ri kekaʼyik, kemoyirik».
E jujun fariseʼo che ekʼo rukʼ ri areʼ, kkita we tzij riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij: «¿La xoqujeʼ uj moyibʼ ri uj?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Weta ix moy man kʼo ta imak riʼ xane rumal kibʼij: ¡Ri uj ronojel kqilo! Ri imak kjeqiʼ kanoq».
«Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, ri jun winaq che ma kok ta pa ri uchiʼ kikral rech ri chij, e xane kaqʼan puwiʼ, we areʼ riʼ jun elaqʼom e jun itzel winaq.
Kʼatekʼut ri jun che kok pa ri uchiʼ kral, are ajyuqʼ riʼ chkech ri chij.
Ri ajtorol uchiʼ kral, kujaq riʼ ri kral chrech, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri chij kkitatabʼej ri uchʼabʼal. Chkijujunal keʼusikʼij ri eʼuchij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kerelsaj ubʼik e keʼukʼam ubʼik.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼesataj ubʼi konojel ri eʼuchij, knabʼej ubʼi chkiwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri chij kkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ, rumal rech che kkichʼobʼ uwach ri uchʼabʼal.
Man kkiterneʼbʼej ta ubʼi jun winaq riʼ che man chʼobʼtal ta uwach; xane keʼanimaj ubʼiʼ riʼ, rumal rech che man kichʼobʼ ta uwach ri uchʼabʼal ri jun winaq che man chʼobʼtal ta uwach».
Ri Jesus xubʼij chkech, we jun tzijobʼelil riʼ, kʼatekʼut ri eʼareʼ, man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼixkal we xubʼij chkech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chi jumul chkech: «Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, in ri in uchiʼ kral chkech ri chij.
Konojel ri epetinaq kan nabʼe chnuwach ri in, eʼelaqʼomabʼ xoqujeʼ eʼitzel taq winaq; kʼatekʼut ri chij man xkitatbʼej ta ri kichʼabʼal.
