In ri in uchiʼ kral. We kʼo jun kok ubʼi pa ri uchiʼ kral, che in nakʼut, kkoltaj na; kok ubʼiʼ riʼ e kel ubʼi riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuriq rechaʼ riʼ,
ri elaqʼom, kpetik arech xa kulbʼana elaqʼ, kulketaʼ qulaj e keʼukamisaj konojel. Ri in, in petinaq arech konojel kkʼojiʼ kikʼaslemal e kkʼojiʼk, sibʼalaj kikʼaslemal.
In ri in utzalaj ajyuqʼ. Ri utz ajyuqʼ kujach ri ukʼaslemal pakiwiʼ ri eʼuchij.
Ri jun che tojom rikʼilal, che ri man ajyuqʼ taj che ri man erech ta ri chij, aretaq chiʼ kril ri utiw keʼuyaʼ kan ri chij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kanimajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri utiw kuyaʼyitej chkech e keʼutukij ubʼik.
Rumal rech che ri areʼ tojom rikʼilal e man nim ta kiqʼij ri chij chuwach.
In ri in utzalaj ajyuqʼ; e ri in wetaʼm kiwach ri enuchij e ri enuchij ketaʼm nuwach ri in
jacha ri Tatxel che retaʼm nuwach in jeriʼ wetaʼm uwach in ri Tatxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinya ri nukʼaslemal chkech ri enuchij.
Ri in, ekʼo chi na nikʼaj nuchij che man ekʼo ta pa we ukʼolbʼal kral riʼ; xoqujeʼ we enikʼaj chik riʼ, rajawaxik che kinkʼam kibʼe; e ri eʼareʼ riʼ kkitatabʼej na ri nuchʼabʼal: kʼatekʼuriʼ, xa jun jupuq chij riʼ kʼolik, xa jun ri ajyuqʼ riʼ;
rumal kʼu weriʼ, kinuloqʼoqʼej ri Tatxel, rumal rech che kinya ri nukʼaslemal in e arech kyaʼtaj chi na jumul chwech.
Man kʼo ta jun kesan chwech, in ri kinyaʼowik rukʼ ronojel wajawanik. In kʼo nukowinem arech kinya ri nukʼaslemal xoqujeʼ kʼo nukowinem arech kyaʼtaj chi na jumul chwech; are waʼ ri pixabʼ uyaʼom uloq ri Nutat chwech».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jumul chik, man junam ta chi kiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, rumal rech we tzij riʼ.
Ekʼi chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij: «Kʼo jun Kʼaxtokʼ rukʼ; xoqujeʼ moxirinaq: ¿Jasche kitatbʼej ri utzij?».
Ekʼo chi nikʼaj kkibʼij: «Waʼ we tzij riʼ man kel ta uloq laʼ pa uchiʼ jun Kʼaxtokʼ. Jun itzel winaq, ¿la kkowin puch che ujaqik uwoqʼoch jun moy?»
Xokʼowisaxik pa ri Jerusalem ri nimaqʼij rech ri kʼakʼ Nim Rachoch ri Dyos. Sibʼalaj kʼax tew.
Ri Jesus kwaʼkat pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, chuxeʼ ri jun ja che rachoch ri Salomon.
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkisutij kibʼ chrij ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chrech: «¿Chi kʼateʼ jampaʼ na kabʼan na ri kʼax chrech taq ri quxlabʼal? We at ri at Kristo, chabʼij, chaqʼalisaj bʼa chqech».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Weriʼ, xbʼiʼtaj chiwech wumal ri in, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kikoj taj. Ri chak che kinbʼan pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Nutat are riʼ ri kbʼanow qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in;
kʼatekʼut, ri ix man kikoj ta weriʼ, xane rumal che ri ix man ix jun taj chkixoʼl ri enuchij.
Ri enuchij kkitatbʼej ri nuchʼabʼal, ri in wetaʼm kiwach e ri eʼareʼ kinkiterneʼbʼej;
ri in kinya junalik kʼaslemal chkech; kʼatekʼuriʼ, qastzij neʼ che kekam taj kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun riʼ che keʼutoqij ubʼiʼ pa nuqʼabʼ.
Ri Nutat, che xeʼuya chwech konojel, are nim chkiwach konojel ri eʼareʼ. E man kʼo ta jun kkowin chrech utoqixik jun jas uwach pa ri uqʼabʼ ri Tatxel.
Ri in e ri Tatxel xa jun qabʼanom».
Jumul chik, ri eʼajjudiʼo kkikʼam chi uloq nikʼaj abʼaj arech kkikʼyaq chrij ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Ri in nukʼutum chiwach kʼi utzalaj taq chak che petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Tatxel; ¿jachike ri chak riʼ che rumal kinikʼyaq chabʼaj?».
Re eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech: «Man kʼo ta jun utz chak che rumal katqakʼyaq chabʼaj, xane rumal jun itzel tzij kabʼij puwiʼ ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ rumal rech che ri at, at jun achi, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kakoj awibʼ at Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «¿La man tzʼibʼatalik ta pa ri Pixabʼ; in nubʼim: ix ix dyos.
We edyos kcha ri areʼ chkech ri jachin taq xbʼix ri utzij ri Dyos chkech –kʼatekʼuriʼ man loqʼ taj kkʼuleʼlax ri Tzij–
ri jun, che tyoxrisam e taqom uloq chuwachulew rumal ri Tatxel ri ix kibʼij chrech: “Ri at kabʼij jun itzel tzij puwiʼ ri Dyos”, rumal rech che ri in xinbʼij: “In, in Ukʼojol ri Dyos”.
We ri in, man kinbʼan ta ri uchak ri Nutat, mixkojon chwech;
kʼatekʼut, we kinbʼan in we chak riʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ man kixkojon ta chwech, chixkojon bʼaʼ rumal we chak riʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ kiwetaʼmaj e kichʼobʼo, che kʼo ri Tatxel wukʼ ri in e in kʼo in rukʼ ri Tatxel».
Jumul chik, kkaj kkichap ri areʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ xanimaj ubʼi pa kiqʼabʼ.
Jumul chik, kbʼe ubʼiʼ chʼaqap chik chrech ri Jordan jawijeʼ nabʼe kanoq xubʼan qasnaʼ ri Xwan, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ kkanaj kan chilaʼ.
Sibʼalaj ekʼi keʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij: «Ri Xwan, man kʼo ta jun kʼutbʼal xubʼano; kʼatekʼut, qastzij ronojel ri xubʼij ri Xwan puwiʼ we areʼ riʼ, ronojel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chilaʼ riʼ, ekʼi kekojon chrech ri areʼ.
Kʼo neʼ jun yawabʼ winaq, are ri Lasaro, ri Ajbʼetaniʼa che are kitinimit ri Mariʼy e ri rachalal Marta.
Ri Mariʼy, are ri xbʼanow ri jiʼonik rukʼ ri kʼokʼlaj kunabʼal e xuchaqijarisaj ri raqan rukʼ ri uwiʼ, ri uxibʼal Lasaro are areʼ, ri yawabʼ.
Ri kebʼ ranabʼ, ketaqan che ubʼixik chrech ri Jesus: «Ajawxel, ri jun che sibʼalaj loqʼ chawach ri at, yawabʼ kʼolik».
Rukʼ taq we tzij riʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij: «We yabʼil riʼ man kukʼam ta ubʼi pa ri kamikal, we yabʼil riʼ xa rech bʼanal toqʼobʼ chech ri uqʼijil ri Dyos: arech kqʼijilaxik ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus keʼuloqʼoqʼej ri Marta, ri rachalal e ri Lasaro.
Aretaq chiʼ kretaʼmaj che yawabʼ ri areʼ, kkanaj chi na kan kebʼ qʼij pa ri kʼo wi ri areʼ;
aretaq chiʼ okʼowinaq chi ri kebʼ qʼij, kubʼij chkech ri etijoxelabʼ: «Joʼ bʼaʼ, chujtzalij chi jumul pa ri Judeʼa».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Rabʼbʼi, majaʼ ne naj riʼ che ri eʼajjudiʼo xkaj xatkikʼyaq chabʼaj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, katbʼe chi jumul jelaʼ!».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «¿La man kabʼlajuj ta ri kajbʼal kʼo pa ri qʼij? We jun winaq kbʼin pa qʼij, man kuchaqʼij ta raqan, rumal rech che saq chuwach ri usaqil we uwachulew riʼ,
kʼatekʼut, we jun winaq kbʼin chaqʼabʼ, kuchaqʼij raqan, rumal rech che man kʼo ta ri saqil pa ri areʼ».
Kubʼij weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chik: «Ri jun qachiʼl Lasaro warinaq; kʼatekʼut, ri in kinbʼe che ukʼasuxik ri areʼ».
Ri etijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, we warinaq, kkoltaj na riʼ».
Ri Jesus are xutzijoj ri ukamikal, kʼatekʼut ri eʼareʼ are kkichomaj che katzijon puwiʼ ri waram.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus kusaqarisaj chkiwach, kubʼij chkech: «Ri Lasaro, xkamik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kinkiʼkot rumal iwech ix, che ri in man in kʼo ta jelaʼ arech kixkojonik. Kʼatekʼut, ¡joʼ bʼaʼ jawiʼ kʼo wi ri areʼ!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Max, ri kbʼix Didyme (Yoʼx) chrech, kubʼij chkech ri enikʼaj etijoxelabʼ chik: «Xoqujeʼ, joʼ bʼaʼ ri uj rukʼ ri areʼ arech kujekam rukʼ ri areʼ!».
Aretaq chiʼ kopan ri Jesus, kuriqaʼ ri Lasaro che kijebʼ qʼij chik muqutal chi pa ri jul.
Ri Bʼetaniʼa naqaj che ri Jerusalem, je neʼ jacha joʼlajuj estadiʼos,
e sibʼalaj eʼajjudiʼo xeʼopan kukʼ ri Marta e ri Mariʼy chrech ukubʼsaxik kikʼuʼx rumal ri kixibʼal.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Marta kretaʼmaj che petinaq uloq ri Jesus, kel ubʼi che ukʼulaxik, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Mariʼy tʼuyulik kkanaj kan paja.
Ri Marta kubʼij chrech ri Jesus: «Ajawxel, weta at kʼo ri at waral, man kaminaq ta riʼ ri nuxibʼal.
Kʼatekʼut, kneʼbʼaʼ, xoqujeʼ kamik riʼ, ri in wetaʼm che ronojel ri kata chrech ri Dyos, ri areʼ kuya na chawech».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri axibʼal kkʼastaj na uwach».
Ri Marta kubʼij chrech: «Ri in wetaʼm neʼ che kkʼastaj na uwach pa ri kʼastajibʼal, pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «In ri in kʼastajibʼal. Ri jun che kkojon chwech ri in, kneʼbʼaʼ kkamik, chi kʼaslik wi riʼ
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kʼaslik e kkojon chwech ri in xas man kkam ta wi. ¿La kakoj weriʼ?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «Jeʼ, Ajawxel in kinkojo che at ri at Kristo, at Ukʼojol ri Dyos, ri kpetik chuwachulew».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, kbʼe che usikʼixik ri rachalal Mariʼy, kʼatekʼuriʼ kajasjat ukoq pa ri uxikin, kubʼij chrech: «Ri Ajawxel kʼo jelaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, katusikʼij».
Ri are, xuwi kuta we tzij riʼ, chanim kwaʼlaj ubʼik e kbʼe che ukʼulaxik ri areʼ.
Ri Jesus majaʼ kopan pa ri tinimit xane kʼo na pa ri kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ xukʼuluʼ ri Marta.
Ri eʼajjudiʼo che ekʼo pa ja rukʼ ri Mariʼy, che tajin kkikubʼisaj ukʼuʼx, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri areʼ che chanim kwaʼlaj ubʼik e kel bʼik, kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ, rumal che kkichomaj che kbʼe cho ri jul che oqʼej.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Mariʼy kopan chuwach ri Jesus, aretaq chiʼ krilo, kperkʼatik ktzaq cho ri raqan, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, weta at kʼo at waral, man kaminaq ta riʼ ri nuxibʼal!».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus kril ri areʼ che koqʼik e xoqujeʼ keʼoqʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo rukʼ ri areʼ, kqʼatut ri ruxlabʼal e junwi kunaʼo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij: «¿Jawijeʼ xiya wi ri areʼ?». Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, tasaʼj uloq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kawil riʼ».
Ri Jesus kutzaqopij oqʼej.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij: «Chiwilampeʼ, sibʼalaj xuloqʼoqʼej ri areʼ!».
Kʼatekʼut, ejujun chkech kkibʼij: «Ri areʼ che xkowin chujaqik ri uwoqʼoch ri moy, ¿la man xoqujeʼ taj kkowin che ubʼanik weta mata xkam ri areʼ?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kqʼatut chi jumul ri ruxlabʼal e kbʼe cho ri jul. Ri jul jun pek, e kojom jun abʼaj chuwach.
Kubʼij ri Jesus: «¡Chiwesaj le jun abʼaj!». Ri Marta ri ranabʼ ri kaminaq, kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, kʼo chi ruxlabʼ laʼ, bʼenaq chi pa ri ukaj qʼij».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «¿La man nubʼim ta chawech che we kʼo ri akojonik ri at, kawil na riʼ ri uqʼijil ri Dyos?».
Kkesaj ubʼi ri jun abʼaj. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kkaʼy chikaj e kubʼij: «Tatxel, kinmaltyoxij chawech rumal rech che xatatabʼej ri nutzij.
Ri in wetaʼm chik che katatabʼej ri nutzij ronojel mul: kʼatekʼut, xinbʼij weriʼ kumal we winaq che ekʼo wukʼ ri in riʼ arech kkikojo che at ri inataqom uloq».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, ko kuraqaqej uchiʼ: «¡Lasaro chatel uloq!».
E ri jun kaminaq kel uloq, ximitalik ri raqan e ri uqʼabʼ chrech taq atzʼyaq, ri uwach pisom chrech jun ratzʼyaq kaminaq. Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Chikiraʼ ri areʼ e chiyaʼaʼ alaj chrech arech kbʼe ubʼik».
Ekʼi chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo che ri xepe rukʼ ri Mariʼy, aretaq chiʼ xkilo ri xubʼano, kekojon chech ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ejujun chkech ri eʼareʼ kebʼe kukʼ ri efariseʼo e kkibʼij chkech ri xubʼan ri Jesus.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri efariseʼo kkimulij kibʼ pa jun riqoj ibʼ. E kkibʼij: «¿Jas kqabʼano? We jun achi riʼ kubʼan kʼi taq kʼutbʼal.
We kqaya kan bʼe chrech, konojel riʼ kekojon chrech ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kepe na kʼuriʼ ri eʼajromano e kkitukij na riʼ ri tyoxlaj qakʼolbʼal e kkikʼis tzij riʼ pakiwiʼ ri qamaqʼ».
Kʼatekʼut, jun chkech ri eʼareʼ, ri Kaʼifas che are nim chuchqajaw pa we jun junabʼ riʼ, kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix man kʼo ta iwetaʼm,
man kichʼobʼ taj che are utz chiwech che kkam jun achi pakiwiʼ konojel ri tinamit e xa jeriʼ ma kekam ta konojel ri tinimit».
Weriʼ, ma xubʼij taj xaq pa rech wi, xane are areʼ nim chuchqajaw pa we junabʼ riʼ, xa xuqʼaxej ubʼixik ri utzij ri Dyos, che ri Jesus kkam na rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik kiwach ri amaqʼ
e man xuwi ta toqʼobʼ chkech ri amaqʼ, xane xoqujeʼ arech pa jun keʼumulij wi ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos che kijabʼum kibʼ.
E xas pa we jun qʼij riʼ, kkichomaj ubʼik che kkaj kkikamisaj ri areʼ.
Xa rumal kʼuwaʼ, chi we chanim ubʼik riʼ, ri Jesus man kbʼin ta chik chkixoʼl e ma kukʼut ta chi ribʼ chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, xane kbʼe ubʼi pa ri tinimit che kʼo chunaqaj ri tzʼinalik ulew, pa jun tinimit che Efraʼim ubʼiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkanaj kan jelaʼ kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ.
Naqaj chi uloq ri Kiqʼaxebʼal (Paskuʼa) ri eʼajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼiʼ eʼuwinaq ri amaqʼ epaqalnaq chi pa ri kulew uloq chi pa ri Jerusalem na, chuxeʼ kan ri Qʼaxebʼal arech kkichʼajchʼobʼej kibʼ.
Kkitzukuj ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chbʼil kibʼ aretaq chiʼ ekʼo pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos: «¿Jas kibʼij? ¿La man kpe ta lo ri areʼ pa ri nimaqʼij?».
Ri nimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri efariseʼo kiyaʼom chi we taqanik riʼ: We kʼo jun retaʼm jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri areʼ, rajawaxik kuya ubʼixik arech kchap ubʼi ri areʼ.
Waqibʼ qʼij chuxeʼ kan ri Qaxebʼal (Paskuʼa), ri Jesus kpe uloq pa ri Bʼetaniʼa, jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri Lasaro, ri jun che xukʼasbʼa uwach ri Jesus chkixoʼl ri kaminaqibʼ.
Jelaʼ riʼ kya uwa ri areʼ. Ri Marta, are kqʼaxin ri wa e ri Lasaro are jun chkech ri ekʼo rukʼ areʼ cho ri mexa.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Mariʼy kukʼam ubʼi jun pajbʼal kʼokʼlaj kunabʼal rech utzlaj nardo che sibʼalaj paqalik ri rajil, kujiʼonsaj ri raqan ri Jesus e kuchaqijarisaj rukʼ ri uwiʼ. E ri ukʼokʼal ri kunabʼal kbʼe pa ronojel ri upaja.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Judas Iskariʼote, che jun chkech ri etijoxelabʼ, ri jun che kujach na ri areʼ, kubʼij:
«¿Jasche man xakʼayix ta we kʼokʼlaj kunabʼal riʼ pa joʼlajujkʼal denariʼos e xyaʼ taneʼ chkech ri mebʼaʼibʼ?».
Kʼatekʼut, man kubʼij ta weriʼ rumal che kok il ri uchomanik chkech ri mebʼaʼibʼ, xane kubʼij rumal rech che ri areʼ jun elaqʼom, kʼatekʼuriʼ rumal che kʼo ri kʼolibʼal pwaq rukʼ, ri areʼ kurayij ri pwaq, e krelaqʼaj ukoq chilaʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij: «Chayaʼaʼ kan ri areʼ: rajawaxik che xukʼol we kʼokʼalaj kunabʼal riʼ rech ri jun qʼij aretaq chiʼ kinmuqik.
Xas ronojel qʼij waʼ, ekʼo mebʼaʼibʼ laʼ iwukʼ, kʼateʼ kʼut, ri in man ronojel qʼij ta waʼ in kʼo iwukʼ».
Sibʼalaj ekʼi eʼajjudiʼo kketaʼmaj che kʼo ri areʼ jelaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kepetik, man xuwi ta kkilaʼ ri Jesus, xane xoqujeʼ kkilaʼ ri Lasaro ri jun che xukʼasbʼaʼ uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Ri nim taq chuchqajawibʼ, xoqujeʼ kkaj kkikamisaj ri Lasaro,
xane rumal ri areʼ sibʼalaj eʼajjudiʼo kebʼe ubʼik e kekojon chrech ri Jesus.
Pa ri jun qʼij chi apanoq, ri winaq che kekichiwik xepe uloq pa ri nimaqʼij, kketaʼmaj che ri Jesus petinaq uloq pa ri Jerusalem;
kkiqʼip ubʼi uqʼabʼ taq pakaʼy e kebʼe che ukʼulaxik ri areʼ, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «¡Hosanna! ¡Tewchiʼtalik ri areʼ, che tajin petinaq uloq pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel e ri Rajawinel ri Israʼel!».
Ri Jesus xuriq jun alaj bʼurix, ktʼuyiʼ chrij jacha ri tzʼibʼatalik:
Maxibʼij awibʼ, at ral ri Siʼon: chawilampeʼ ri awajawinel che petinaq, aqʼaninaq chrij jun alaj ral jun atiʼt bʼurix.
Pa we jun uchanim riʼ, ri eʼutijoxelabʼ man kkichʼobʼ ta weriʼ, kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kqʼijilaxik ri Jesus pa ri uqʼij, knaʼtaj chkech che weriʼ tzʼibʼatalik puwiʼ ri areʼ e are waʼ ri xbʼan chrech.
Ri winaq che ekʼo rukʼ ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ xusikʼij uloq ri Lasaro pa ri jul, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xuya jun kʼakʼ kʼaslemal chrech, kkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ weriʼ.
Xoqujeʼ, rumal weriʼ, ri winaq kkikʼulaj ri areʼ, rumal rech che kitom che ri areʼ ubʼanom ri jun kʼutbʼal riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri efariseʼo kkibʼij chkixoʼl: «Ri ix kiwilo che man kixchʼakan taj; kamik riʼ, konojel ri winaq are kiterneʼbʼem ri areʼ».
Ekʼo chilaʼ, ejujun eʼajgriʼego, che kepaqiʼ uloq arech kkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos pa ri nimaqʼij.
Ri eʼareʼ kkiriqaʼ ri Aliʼp ri Ajbʼetsaʼida rech ri Galileʼa, e sibʼalaj kkitzʼonoj chrech: «Ajaw, ri uj kqaj kqil ri Jesus».
Ri Aliʼp kbʼe che ubʼixik weriʼ chrech ri Atrix; ri Atrix e ri Felipe, kebʼekibʼij weriʼ chrech ri Jesus.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Kamik riʼ, xopan ri kajbʼal jawijeʼ wi kya na ri uqʼijil ri ukʼojol ri achi.
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, we jun uwach triko xtzaq pa ri ulew e man kkam taj, kkanaj kan riʼ utukel, kʼatekʼut, we kkamik, kuya sibʼalaj uwach riʼ.
Ri jun che kuloqʼoqʼej ri ukʼaslemal, kutzaq riʼ e ri jun che kretzelaj uwach ri ukʼaslemal pa we uwachulew riʼ kukʼol na riʼ chrech ri junalik kʼaslemal.
We kʼo jun kinupatanij; chinuterneʼbʼej bʼaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jawijeʼ in kʼo wi ri in, xoqujeʼ chilaʼ riʼ kʼo wi ri nupataninel. We kʼo jun kinupatanij, ri Nutat nim kril na wi ri areʼ.
We chanim riʼ, kʼax kʼo ri wuxlabʼal. ¿E jas kʼu ri kinbʼij? ¡Tatxel, chatoʼ bʼaʼ chuwach we jun kajbʼal riʼ! Kʼatekʼut, rumal ne weriʼ che inopaninaq pa we jun kajbʼal riʼ.
Tatxel, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri uqʼijil ri abʼiʼ!» Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe uloq jun chʼabʼal chi pa ri kaj uloq: «Ri in, nuyaʼom ri uqʼijil are, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinya chi na jumul ri uqʼijil.»
Ri winaq che ekʼo chilaʼ e che xkita weriʼ, kkibʼij che jun kaqulja weriʼ; enikʼaj chik kkibʼij: «Xchʼabʼex rumal jun anjel».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «We jun chʼabʼal riʼ, man wumal ta ri in xpetik, xane iwumal ri ix.
Ukamik riʼ, are kbʼan qʼatojtzij che we uwachulew; kamik riʼ, kkʼyaq na ubʼi ikim ri nim ubʼantajik chuwachulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kinaqʼanisax na ubʼi ri in chuwach we ulew, keʼinkʼam na ubʼik konojel ri winaq wukʼ».
Kubʼij weriʼ, arech kuya ubʼixkal jas ri kamikal kukambʼej ri areʼ.
Ri winaq kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj, qetaʼm pa ri Pixabʼ che ri Kristo kubʼan kʼolem chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq. ¿Jas kʼu che, che ri at kabʼij: “Che rajawaxik kaqʼanisax ri Ukʼojol ri achi? ¿Jachin kʼuriʼ ri Ukʼojol ri achi?”.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Xaq qʼatal chi uqʼij ri chäj kʼo chixoʼl. Chixbʼin bʼaʼ aretaq chiʼ kʼo na ri chäj iwukʼ arech man kixuchap ta ri qʼequʼmal, ri jun che kbʼin pa ri qʼequʼm, man retaʼm taj jawijeʼ kbʼe wi.
Aretaq chiʼ kʼo na ri chäj iwukʼ chixkojon chrech ri chäj arech ri ix, ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri chäj». Aretaq xbʼitaj weriʼ, ri Jesus kbʼek e kukʼuʼ ribʼ chkiwach.
Kneʼbʼaʼ xubʼan ronojel we taq kʼutbʼal chkiwach riʼ, man kekojon ta chrech ri areʼ,
arech qastzij kbʼantaj ri tzij xubʼij ri Isaʼiʼas, ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos: Ajawxel, ¿jachin kkojon chrech ri qatzij?; e ri uchuqʼabʼ uqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel, ¿jachin xqʼalajisax chuwach?
Man loqʼ taj kekojon chrech ri Dyos, rumal rech che xoqujeʼ xubʼij ri Isaʼiʼas:
Umoyrisam ri kiwoqʼoch e ukowirisam ri kanimaʼ arech man kekaʼy ta rukʼ ri kiwoqʼoch, arech man kkichʼobʼ ta rukʼ ri kanimaʼ arech man kkisutij ta uloq kibʼ pa ri kikʼaslemal e arech man keʼinkunaj ta ri in.
Ri Isaʼiʼas xubʼij weriʼ, rumal rech che xril ri uqʼijil e xchʼaw puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Kneʼbʼaʼ, man rukʼ taneʼ weriʼ, qastzij che xoqujeʼ chkixoʼl ri enimaʼq taq winaq ekʼi xekojon chrech ri areʼ; kʼatekʼut, kumal ri efariseʼo man kkibʼij taj arech man kekʼyaq ta uloq pa ri kʼolbʼal chʼabʼal kumal ri eʼareʼ,
rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ are kkiloqʼoqʼej ri kiqʼijil ri winaq chuwach ri uqʼijil ri Dyos.
Ri Jesus kuraqaqej uchiʼ e kubʼij: «Ri jun che kkojon chwech ri in man kkojon ta chwech ri in, xane are kkojon chrech ri jun che intaqowinaq uloq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kinril ri in kril riʼ ri jun che intaqowinaq uloq.
In, che in chäj, inpetinaq uloq pa we uwachulew arech ronojel ri kkojon chwech ri in man kkanaj ta kan pa ri qʼequʼmal.
We kʼo jun che kuta ri nutzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kukʼaslemaj taj, ri in man kinbʼan ta qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ, rumal rech che ri in, man inpetinaq ta che ubʼanik qʼatojtzij puwiʼ we uwachulew xane inpetinaq che ukolik we uwachulew.
Jachin kinukʼyaq ubʼik ri in e ma kukʼaslemaj ta ri nutzij xas kʼo chi riʼ ri kbʼanow qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ, ri Tzij che nuyaʼom uchʼobʼik, are riʼ ri kbʼanow na qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ pa ri kʼisbʼal qʼij;
rumal rech che ri in, man inchʼawinaq ta pa wech wi ri in, xane are ri Tatxel che ri intaqowinaq uloq ktaqan chwech ri rajawaxik kinbʼij e kinkʼutu ri in;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in wetaʼm che ri upixabʼ ri areʼ, junalik kʼaslemal. Qastzij, ri kintzijoj ri in, jacha ubʼim ri Tatxel chwech jeriʼ utzijoxik kinbʼan ri in».
Chuxeʼ kan ri nimaqʼij rech ri Qʼaxebʼal (Paskuʼa), aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus retaʼm chik che xopan ri ukajbʼal che kel ubʼi pa we uwachulew e kqʼax chuwach ri Utat. Aretaq ri areʼ xeʼuloqʼoqʼej ri eʼuwinaq che ekʼo pa we uwachulew, keʼuloqʼoqʼej ri eʼareʼ chi pa ri ukʼisbʼalil na.
Pa ri waʼim rech ri xqʼeʼqal, aretaq chiʼ ri Kʼaxtokʼ uyaʼom chi pa ri ranimaʼ ri Judas Iskariʼote, ri ukʼojol ri Simon, ri chomanik che kujach na ri areʼ,
aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ retaʼm che ri Tatxel uyaʼom ronojel pa ri uqʼabʼ e che petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos e che ktzalij ubʼi rukʼ ri Dyos,
kwaʼlaj che ri waʼim, kuya kan ri ratzʼyaq, kujatʼij jun suʼt xeʼ upam.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuqeʼj jaʼ pa jun chʼajbʼal e kumajij uchʼajik ri kaqan ri etijoxelabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kusuʼ rukʼ ri jun suʼt che ujatʼim xeʼ upam.
Arechiʼ kopan rukʼ ri Simon-Pedro, ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿che at katchʼajow le waqan?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri jastaq che kinbʼan in riʼ, ri at, man kachʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal waʼ kamik riʼ, kachʼobʼ na waʼ chweqʼ kabʼij».
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Jayiʼ, man kʼo ta waʼ kachʼaj waʼ we waqan!». Ri Jesus kubʼij chech: «We man kinchʼaj ta ri awaqan, ri at man kʼo ta awechbʼal waʼ wukʼ ri in».
Ri Simon-Pedro kubʼij chrech: «¡Ajawxel, man xuwi ta bʼaʼ ri waqan, xane xoqujeʼ chachʼajaʼ bʼaʼ ri nuqʼabʼ e ri nujolom!».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri jun che atininaq, man rajawaxik ta chik kuchʼaj ribʼ ri areʼ, ronojel chik chʼajchʼoj. E ri ix ixchʼajchʼoj chik, kʼatekʼut ma iwonojel taj».
Rumal rech, che ri areʼ kuchʼobʼo jachin ri kjachow na ri areʼ; rumal kʼu waʼ kubʼij: «Man iwonojel ta ri ix ixchʼajchʼoj».
Aretaq chiʼ xchʼajtaj ri kaqan rumal ri areʼ e aretaq chiʼ xkojtaj chi ri ratzʼyaq e kʼo chi jumul cho ri mexa, kubʼij chkech: «¿La kichʼobʼo ri xbʼantaj wumal ri in iwukʼ ix?
Ri ix, Ajtij e Ajawxel kixcha chwech e utz ri kibʼij, rumal rech che qastzij in jeriʼ ri in.
Xa jeʼ bʼaʼ, we ri in che in Ajawxel e in Ajtij xinchʼaj ri iwaqan, xoqujeʼ ri ix, rajawaxik che kichʼaj ri iwaqan chbʼil iwibʼ.
Rumal rech che ri in xinya jun kʼambʼal noʼj chiwech, arech, xoqujeʼ ri ix, jeriʼ kibʼano jeʼ jas xinbʼan in chiwech.
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech ri pataninel man are ta nim chuwach ri rajaw, xoqujeʼ ri taqom uloq, man are ta nim chuwach ri xtaqow uloq ri areʼ.
Ri ix rukʼ che iwetaʼm chi weriʼ, sibʼalaj utz iwech riʼ we kibʼano pa ri ikʼaslemal.
Ri in, ma iwonojel taj kixinbʼij; ri in wetaʼm jachintaq ri xeʼinchaʼo; kʼatekʼut qastzij che rajawaxik kbʼantajik ri tzʼibʼatalik. Ri jun che kutij we nuwaʼ kuwaʼlajisaj ri ukux raqan chwij ri in.
Chi kamik ubʼik kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech chuxeʼ na aretaq chiʼ kkʼulmataj na ri jastaq arech, aretaq chiʼ kkʼulmatajik kixkojonik che IN RIʼ.
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, ri jun che kukʼulaj ri jun che kintaq na ubʼi ri in; in riʼ kinukʼulaj kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kinukʼulaj ri in, are kukʼulaj ri jun che intaqowinaq uloq».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus xubʼij weriʼ, xpe kʼax pa ri ruxlabʼal, tekʼuriʼ kubʼij: «Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, jun chixoʼl ri ix kinjachow na ri in».
Ri etijoxelabʼ kkikaʼyej kibʼ chkixoʼl, man ketaʼm taj jachin ri kbʼixik.
Jun chkech ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, qʼoyol chuwach ukʼuʼx ri Jesus, ri jun che sibʼalaj loq chuwach ri Jesus.
Ri Simon Pedro kubʼan jun kʼutbʼal chrech e kubʼij chrech: «Chataʼ ukoq chrech ¿jachin ri tajin kubʼij?».
Ri areʼ kuqʼoybʼaʼ ukoq ribʼ cho ri uwo ukʼuʼx ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿jachin kʼuriʼ ri jun riʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Are ri jun che kinya na ri wa chrech che kinrubʼ na pa ri qʼutum». Kurubʼ ri wa pa ri qʼutum, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuya chrech ri Judas, che ukʼojol ri Simon Iskariʼote.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ ri chʼaqap wa xya chrech, chanim kok ri Satanas pa ri areʼ. Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri kabʼan na, chi aninaq chabʼanaʼ».
Kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta jun chkech ri uwinaq kchʼobʼowik jasche kubʼij weriʼ chrech ri areʼ.
Rumal neʼ che rukʼ ri Judas kʼo wi ri pwaq, ekʼo jujun kkichomaj che ri Jesus tajin kubʼij chrech: «Chaloqʼoʼ ri jastaq che rajawaxik chqech pa ri nimaqʼij», on xaneʼ kʼo kuya chkech ri emebʼaʼibʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ktijtajik ri wa rumal, xas chanim kel ubʼik. Aretaq chiʼ weriʼ, chʼaqʼabʼ nakʼut.
Aretaq chiʼ kel ubʼi ri areʼ, ri Jesus kubʼij: «Kamik riʼ, qʼijilam ri Ukʼojol ri achi kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos qʼijilam pa ri areʼ.
We ri Dyos qʼijilam pa ri areʼ ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ kuqʼijilaj na ri areʼ chi pa ri areʼ, e chi aninaq riʼ kuqʼijilaj na.
Ixwalkʼuwaʼl qʼatalik chik che ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ. Ri ix kinitzukuj na riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jeʼ jas xinbʼij chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo: che jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi ri in, ri ix man kuya taj kixbʼek
Ri in kinya jun kʼakʼ pixabʼ chiwech: Chiloʼoqʼej chbʼil taq iwibʼ; jeʼ jas ixinloqʼoqʼem ri in jeriʼ chiloqʼoqʼej chbʼil taq iwibʼ ri ix.
E rukʼ weriʼ, konojel winaq kkil na riʼ che ri ix, ix nutijoxelabʼ: we ri ix, rukʼ ronojel ikʼuʼx kʼo ri iloqʼoqʼebʼal chbʼil taq iwibʼ».
Ri Simon Pedro kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿jawijeʼ katbʼe wi?». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Jawijeʼ ri kinbʼe wi ri in, ri at man kuya taj kinaterneʼbʼej bʼi pa we uchanim riʼ; kʼatekʼut, kinaterneʼbʼej na riʼ pa jun qʼij chi apanoq».
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «¿Jasche man kuya taj katinterneʼbʼej pa we uchanim riʼ? Ri in kinya kan riʼ ri nukʼaslemal rech toqʼobʼisabʼal awach ri at».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «¿Che kaya kanoq ri akʼaslemal ri at arech katoqʼobʼisaj nuwach ri in? Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chawech, che aretaq chiʼ majoʼq koqʼ ri amaʼ ekʼ, ri at oxmul chik abʼim che man awetaʼm ta nuwach».
«¡Mubʼan kebʼ ikʼuʼx, mubʼan kʼax iwanimaʼ! Ri ix che kixkojon chrech ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ chixkojon chwech ri in.
Pa ri rachoch ri Nutat, kʼo kʼyalaj taq kʼolibʼal ja, weta mata kʼolik, xinbʼij neriʼ chiwech; ri in kinbʼe che usukʼumaxik jun ikʼolbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ inbʼenaq chik e sukʼumatajinaq chi ri jun kʼolbʼal, kintzalij chi na uloq kʼatekʼuriʼ kixinkʼam bʼi wukʼ, arech, jelaʼ jawijeʼ inkʼo wi ri in xoqujeʼ ri ix, ix kʼo chilaʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ kinbʼe wi ri in, ri ix iwetaʼm ri bʼe».
Ri Max kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ri uj man qetaʼm taj jawijeʼ katbʼe wi ri at. ¿La qetaʼm kʼuriʼ ri bʼe?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «In ri in Bʼe, in ri in Saqalajtzij e in ri in Kʼaslemal. Man kʼo ta jun kbʼe chuwach ri Tatxel, wema wumal ri in.
Ri ix, we iwetaʼm nuwach in, xoqujeʼ iwetaʼm uwach riʼ ri Nutat; chi kamik riʼ iwetaʼm chi uwach e iwilom chi uwach ri areʼ».
Ri Aliʼp kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, chakʼutuʼ ri Tatxel chqawach e kubʼan na kʼuriʼ chqech».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Aliʼp, ¿jumpa qʼij chi neʼ in kʼo iwukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man awetaʼm ta nuwach? Ri jun che xinril ri in, rilom chi uwach ri Tatxel. ¿Jas kʼu che kakochʼo kabʼij: «Chakʼutuʼ ri Tatxel chqawach?».
¿La man kakoj taj che ri in, in kʼo pa ri Tatxel, tekʼuriʼ, ri Tatxel kʼo pa ri in? Ri jetaq tzij che kinbʼij in chiwech, man kinbʼij taj xaq pa wech wi ri in, e ri Tatxel che jeqel wukʼ ri in, are areʼ kbʼanow ri chak.
¡Chixkojon bʼaʼ chwech! Ri in, in kʼo pa ri Tatxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Tatxel kʼo pa ri in, wema kixkojon chwech, chixkojon neʼ kneʼbʼaʼ xuwi rumal we chak riʼ.
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chiwech, ri jun che kkojon chwech ri in xoqujeʼ kubʼan na riʼ ri areʼ, ri chak che kinbʼan ri in, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼan na nimalaj chak chi na chuwach we chak riʼ, rumal rech che ri in kinbʼe na chuwach ri Tatxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel ri kikʼomij ri ix pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in, ri in xas kinbʼan na arech, ri Tatxel kqʼijilaxik pa ri Kʼojolxel.
We kʼo jun jas uwach kikʼomij pa ri nubʼiʼ, ri in kinbʼan na riʼ weriʼ.
We kiniloqʼoqʼej ri ix, kikʼol riʼ ri nupixabʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinchʼaw na rukʼ ri Tatxel e kuya na riʼ chiwech jun chik Ajtoʼl iwech arech kʼo ri areʼ iwukʼ ronojel taq qʼij,
ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri saqalajtzij che ri uwachulew man kkowin ta chrech ukʼulaxik, rumal rech che man kril taj e man retaʼm ta uwach. Kʼatekʼut, ri ix iwetaʼm uwach ri areʼ, rumal rech che jeqelik iwukʼ ri ix.
Ri in, man ixminoribʼ taj kixinya kanoq. Kinpe chi na uloq iwukʼ.
Man naj ta chik, ri uwachulew man kril ta chi nuwach. Kʼatekʼut, ri ix kiniwil na, rumal rech che ri in kʼo ri nukʼaslemal e xoqujeʼ ri ix kkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemal.
Pa ri jun qʼij riʼ ri ix kiwetaʼmaj riʼ che ri in in kʼo pa ri Nutat e ri ix, ix kʼo pa ri in e ri in in kʼo pa ri ix.
Ri jun che kʼo ri nupixabʼ rukʼ e kukʼolo, are riʼ ri jun riʼ che kinuloqʼoqʼej; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kinuloqʼoqʼej ri in, ri Nutat kuloqʼoqʼej na riʼ ri areʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinloqʼoqʼej na ri areʼ, e kinqʼalajisaj na wibʼ chuwach ri areʼ».
Ri Judas –che man are ta ri Iskariʼote– kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿jasche, che kaqʼalajisaj na awibʼ chqawach uj e man are ta kaqʼalajisaj awibʼ chuwach ri uwachulew?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «We jun winaq kinuloqʼoqʼej kukʼol na riʼ ri nutzij e ri Nutat kuloqʼoqʼej na riʼ ri areʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ kujpe na riʼ rukʼ e kqabʼan qachoch riʼ pa ri areʼ.
Ri jun che man kinuloqʼoqʼej taj, man kukʼol ta ri nutzij; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri tzij che kitatbʼej, man wech ta ri in, xane utzij ri Tatxel che intaqowinaq uloq.
Xinbʼij weriʼ chiwech aretaq chiʼ in kʼo iwukʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Ajtoʼl iwech, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, che kutaq na uloq ri Tatxel pa ri nubʼiʼ ri areʼ kukʼut na riʼ ronojel ri jastaq chiwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kunaʼtisaj na riʼ chiwech ronojel ri nutzij nubʼim chiwech.
Kinya kan ri nimalaj utzil chiwech; ri utzil wech in kinya chiwech; man jeriʼ ta uyaʼik kinbʼano jeʼ jas uyaʼik kubʼan ri uwachulew. Mubʼan kʼax ri iwanimaʼ, mubʼan kebʼ ikʼuʼx, mixibʼij iwibʼ.
Ri ix itom ri jastaq che xinbʼij chiwech: Ri in kinbʼe na, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinpe chi na jumul iwukʼ. Weta kiniloqʼoqʼej ri ix, kixkiʼkotik na laʼ che kinbʼe rukʼ ri Tatxel, rumal rech che ri Tatxel are nim chnuwach ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech kamik riʼ, aretaq chiʼ majoʼq kkʼulmataj weriʼ, arech, aretaq chiʼ kkʼulmatajik, kixkojonik.
Kamik riʼ man kintzijoj ta chi kʼi jastaq iwukʼ, rumal rech che petinaq chi uloq ri unimal we uwachulew riʼ; panuwiʼ ri in man kʼo ta jun ukowinem.
Arech, che ri uwachulew kretaʼmaj che ri in kinloqʼoqʼej ri Tatxel, e che ri in kinbʼano jeriʼ jacha inutaqom uloq ri Tatxel chrech. ¡Chixtakʼaloq! ¡Chujel ubʼik!
«In ri in qas ucheʼal uva e are ri Nutat ri ajchak pa ri ulew.
Ronojel ri taq uqʼabʼ, che man kuya ta uwach pa ri in, kuchoy ubʼi ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel uqʼabʼ, che kuya uwach kujosqʼij, arech kuya chi na nikʼaj taq uwach.
Ri ix, ix josqʼim taq uqʼabʼ chik xas rumal ri tzij che nubʼim chik chiwech.
Chixjeqel pa ri in, jeriʼ jas nujeqebʼam wibʼ ri in pa ri ix. Jeriʼ jas ri jun uqʼabʼ cheʼ, che man kkowin taj kuya uwach pa utukel wi we man jeqel ta pa ri ucheʼal uva, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ ri iwech ri ix wema kixjeqiʼ pa ri in.
In ri in ucheʼal uva; ix ri ix uqʼabʼ. Ri jun che kjeqiʼ pa ri in e ri in che kinjeqiʼ pa ri areʼ ri jun riʼ kuya sibʼalaj taq uwach; we man ix jeqel ix pa ri in, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kixkowinik kibʼano.
We kʼo jun winaq man kjeqiʼ ta pa ri in kkʼyaq ubʼik, jeʼ jas ukʼyaqik ubʼi ri jun uqʼabʼ cheʼ e kchaqiʼjirik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kmol ubʼik, kkʼyaq pa ri qʼaqʼ e kkʼatik.
Ri ix, we kixjeqiʼ pa ri in e kjeqiʼ ri nutzij pa ri iwanimaʼ ri ix, chitaʼ bʼaʼ ri jastaq che kiwaj ri ix, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kyaʼtaj na riʼ chiwech ri ix.
Ri uqʼijil ri Nutat are riʼ che ri ix kiya sibʼalaj iwach e che ri ix, ix nutijoxelabʼ.
Jeriʼ jas nuloqʼoqʼexik ubʼanom ri Tatxel, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ iloqʼoqʼexik ri ix nubʼanom ri in. Chixjeqel bʼaʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal nukʼuʼx.
Ri ix, we kikʼol ri nupixabʼ, kixjeqiʼ riʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal nukʼuʼx, jeriʼ jas ukʼolik nubʼanom ri in ri upixabʼ ri Nutat e injeqel pa ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri areʼ.
Ri in kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech arech ri nukiʼkotemal kkʼojiʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ ri ix e ktzʼaqatik ri utzalaj ikiʼkotemal.
Are waʼ we nupixabʼ ri in: chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ ri ix jeriʼ jas iloqʼoqʼexik nubʼanom in.
Man kʼo ta jun winaq kʼo nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx chuwach ri jun winaq che kuya ri ukʼaslemal rumal kech ri erajchʼabʼeʼn.
Ri ix, ix wajchʼabʼeʼn, we kibʼano ri jastaq che kintaqan chiwech.
Kamik riʼ, ix nupataninel man kincha ta chik chiwech rumal rech che ri ajpataninel man retaʼm taj ri jastaq kubʼan ri rajaw; ri ix, ix wajchʼabʼeʼn inchoʼqinaq chiwech rumal rech che ronojel ri tzij nutom rukʼ ri Nutat, nukʼutum chiwach.
Man ix taj ri xinichaʼo; xane in xixinchaʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kixintaq ubʼik arech ri ix kixbʼek e kiyaʼa iwach kʼatekʼuriʼ kjeqiʼ ri iwach, xa jekʼuriʼ ronojel ri jas uwach kita chrech ri Tatxel pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in kuya chiwech.
Ri kintaqan in chiwech Are weriʼ, ri ix chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ.
We ri uwachulew kretzelaj iwach ri ix, chiwetaʼmaj che are nabʼe retzelam chi nuwach in majoʼq kretzelaj iwach ri ix.
Weta ri ix, ix rech ri uwachulew, ri uwachulew kuloqʼoqʼej na kʼuriʼ ri jastaq rech; kʼatekʼut, rumal rech che ri ix, man ix rech ta ri uwachulew ri in, aretaq xixinsikʼij, ixwesam cho ri uwachulew rumal kʼu weriʼ, ri uwachulew kretzelaj iwach.
Chinaʼtaj ri Tzij ri nubʼim chiwech: Ri pataninel man are ta nim chuwach ri rajaw. We xinkoqataj ri in, xoqujeʼ kixkoqataj na ri ix; we xkinikʼoj rij ri nutzij ri in, xoqujeʼ kkinikʼoj na rij riʼ ri itzij ri ix.
Kʼatekʼut, ronojel waʼ weriʼ, kkibʼan na waʼ chiwech rumal ri nubʼiʼ ri in, rumal rech che man ketaʼm ta uwach ri jun che intaqowinaq uloq ri in.
Weta mata xinpe ri in e mata xeʼinchʼabʼej, ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun kimak riʼ: kʼatekʼut, we kamik riʼ man kuya taj kkesaj kibʼ chuwach ri kimak.
Ri jun che kretzelaj nuwach ri in, xoqujeʼ kretzelaj uwach ri Nutat.
Weta mata xinbʼan ri chak chkiwach che man kʼo ta jun chik bʼanowinaq chkiwach, ri eʼareʼ, man kʼo ta jun kimak riʼ; kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ kilom chik kʼatekʼuriʼ kketzelaj qawach, ri in e ri Nutat.
Kʼatekʼut, weriʼ, rumal arech qastzij kbʼantajik ri tzij tzʼibʼatalik pa ri kipixabʼ ri eʼareʼ: Xketzelaj nuwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jas rumal rech.
Aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri Ajtoʼl iwech che kintaq na uloq ri in chi rukʼ uloq ri Tatxel ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri saqalaj tzij, che petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Tatxel, ri areʼ kubʼan na utzalaj qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in.
Kʼatekʼut, xoqujeʼ ri ix kibʼan na qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in rumal rech che ri ix, ix kʼo iwukʼ chi pa ri umajibʼal uloq.
«Xinbʼij weriʼ chiwech arech man kʼo ta kʼax kinaʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ.
Kixkikʼyaq na uloq riʼ pa ri taq ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ kpe na riʼ ri jun kajbʼal che ri jun kixukamisaj na, kuchomaj che kubʼan jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ chech ri Dyos.
Tekʼuriʼ, kkibʼan waʼ weriʼ rumal rech che man ketaʼmam ta uwach ri Tatxel e man ketaʼmam ta nuwach ri in.
(a) Xinbʼij weriʼ chiwech ri ix, arech, aretaq chiʼ kpe ri kajbʼal knaʼtaj chiwech, che ri in nubʼim chik chiwech. (4b) «Man xinbʼij ta weriʼ chiwech pa ri umajibʼal uloq, rumal rech che ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ukamik kintzalij bʼi rukʼ ri Jun che xintaqow uloq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun chiwech ri ix kuta chwech: “¿Jawijeʼ katbʼe wi?”.
Xane rumal rech che xinbʼij weriʼ chiwech sibʼalaj kʼax kinaʼ pa le iwanimaʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in kinbʼij ri saqalajtzij chiwech: are utz chiwech che kinel ubʼi ri in; rumal rech che wema kinbʼe ubʼi ri in, man kpe ta riʼ ri Ajtoʼl iwech iwukʼ; kʼatekʼut, we kinbʼe ubʼik, ri in, kintaq na uloq ri areʼ chiwech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kpe ri areʼ, kukʼut na riʼ chuwach ri uwachulew jachike ri itzel, ri makaj, jachike ri sukʼil jachike ri qʼatbʼal tzij,
jachike ri makaj rumal rech che man kixkojon ta chwech;
jachike ri sukʼil rumal rech che ri in kinbʼe ubʼi rukʼ ri Tatxel kʼatekʼuriʼ, ma kiniwil ta chiʼ nuwach riʼ;
jachike ri qʼatojtzij, rumal rech che ri unimal we uwachulew riʼ xbʼantaj ri qʼatojtzij chrij ri areʼ.
Kamik riʼ, kʼo na kʼi jastaq che rajawaxik kinbʼij ri in chiwech, kʼatekʼut, ri ix man kixkowin ta che uchʼobʼik, che ukʼamik ubʼi weriʼ kamik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri areʼ, ri Ruxlabʼal ri saqalaj tzij, kukʼam na ibʼe riʼ chi pa ri tzʼaqat saqalaj tzij; rumal rech che man kchʼaw ta riʼ xaq pa rech wi ri areʼ, xane kuya ubʼixik riʼ, ri jastaq che kutaʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuya ubʼixik riʼ chiwach ri ix ri jastaq che kpe na.
Ri are kuya na riʼ ri nuqʼijil chwech rumal rech che, kyaʼ taj na chech ri jastaq che wech ri in kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuya ubʼixik riʼ chiwach ri ix.
Ronojel ri jastaq kʼo rukʼ ri Nutat, kʼo wukʼ ri in. Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in xinbʼij: Kyaʼ taj na chrech ri jastaq che wech ri in kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuyaʼ ubʼixik riʼ ri areʼ chiwach ri ix.
«Ma naj ta chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kiwil ta chi nuwach waʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man naj ta chi kʼuriʼ kiwil chi na nuwach riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ejujun chkixoʼl ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chbʼil kibʼ: «¿Jas lo waʼ we kubʼij chqech: “ma naj ta chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ ma kiwil ta chi nuwach wa, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ma naj ta chi kʼuriʼ kiwil chi na nuwach riʼ”, e “Ri in kinbʼe ubʼi rukʼ ri Tatxel?”».
Kkibʼij: «¿Jas kʼu riʼ man naj ta chik? Ma qetaʼm taj jastaq ri kraj kubʼij ri areʼ».
Ri Jesus kuchʼobʼo che kkaj kkita chrech ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix kikʼotkʼaʼ ichiʼ chixoʼl puwiʼ ri jastaq che xinbʼij chiwech: “Man naj ta chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kiwil ta chi nuwach waʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man naj ta chi kʼuriʼ kiwil chi na nuwach riʼ”.
Qastzij, qastzij kinbʼij chiwech, che ri ix kixoqʼ na riʼ e kikʼis na ikʼuʼx riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uwachulew sibʼalaj kkiʼkot na riʼ; ri ix kixbʼison na riʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri ibʼisobʼal kkʼextaj na riʼ pa nimalaj kiʼkotemal.
Ri ixoq, aretaq chiʼ majoʼq kril uwach ri ral, kbʼisonik rumal rech che xopan ri ukajbʼal; kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xiltaj uwach ri akʼal, man knaʼtaj ta chi ri kʼax chrech rumal ri nimalaj kiʼkotemal che xiltaj uwach jun winaq chuwachulew.
Xoqujeʼ, ri ix kixbʼison we uchanim riʼ kʼatekʼut, kixinwil chi na jumul waʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ pa jun nimalaj kiʼkotemal kkʼojiʼ wi riʼ ri iwanimaʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ikiʼkotemal, man kʼo ta jun riʼ kresaj ubʼi chiwech.
Pa we jun Qʼij riʼ, ri ix man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kita riʼ chwech ri in. Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech, ri jas uwach che kita na chrech ri Tatxel, kuya na riʼ ri areʼ chiwech pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in.
E chi kamik riʼ, ri ix ma kʼo ta jun jas uwach itom pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in chitaʼ bʼaʼ jun jas uwach kʼatekʼuriʼ kyaʼtaj na riʼ, arech qas tzʼaqatlaj ri ikiʼkotemal.
Ronojel weriʼ, nubʼim chiwech pa kʼambʼal tzij. Petinaq ri kajbʼal jawijeʼ man kinbʼij ta chik chiwech rukʼ kʼambʼal tzij xane pa saqil ri kintzijoj na riʼ ri Tatxel chiwech.
Pa we jun qʼij riʼ, ri ix kita na jun jas uwach riʼ pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kinbʼij ta chiwech che kinchʼaw na piwiʼ rukʼ ri Tatxel,
rumal rech che xas are ri Tatxel kixuloqʼoqʼej, rumal rech che ri ix kiniloqʼoqʼej ri in e kixkojonik che ri in xinel uloq xas rukʼ ri Dyos.
Xinel uloq xas rukʼ ri Tatxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinpe uloq pa ri uwachulew. Ukamik riʼ kinel ubʼi pa we uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinbʼe ubʼi rukʼ ri Tatxel».
Ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¡Kamik riʼ utz katchʼawik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun kʼambʼal tzij kabʼij!
Ukamik riʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che ri at awetaʼm ronojel jas uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man rajawaxik taj che kʼo jun jas uwach kqata chawech. Rukʼ weriʼ kqakojo che atelnaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «¿La kixkojon chwech in ukamik riʼ?
Petinaq ri kajbʼal –tekʼuriʼ xopanik riʼ– che ri ix xaq jawijeʼ riʼ kijabʼuj na iwibʼ e chijujunal pa itukel kixbʼek tekʼuriʼ, xaq nutukel riʼ kiniya kanoq. Kʼatekʼut, ri in man nutukel taj in kʼolik: ri Tatxel kʼo wukʼ ri in.
Xinbʼij chiwech we jastaq riʼ, arech kʼo iwukʼ ri nimalaj wutzil ri in. Pa we uwachulew, ri ix kkʼojiʼ na sibʼalaj kʼax chiwach. Kʼatekʼut, ¡chixkowir bʼaʼ! Ri in xinchʼakan puwiʼ ri uwachulew».
Jeriʼ kchʼaw ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkaʼy chikaj e kubʼij: «Nutat, xpe ri kajbʼal: chayaʼa bʼaʼ ri uqʼijil ri Akʼojol arech ri Akʼojol kuyaʼ ri aqʼijil ri at,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kowinem che xaya at chrech ri areʼ puwiʼ konojel winaq chuya bʼaʼ ri junalik kʼaslemal chkech konojel ri winaq che xeʼaya at chrech ri areʼ!
Are wa ri junalik kʼaslemal: che ri eʼareʼ ketaʼmaj awach ri at ri at che at xuwi chi qastzij Dyos e ri jun che ataqom uloq at, Jesus-Kristo.
Ri in nuyaʼom ri aqʼijil ri at waral chuwachulew, rumal rech che utz ubʼanik ri chak nubʼanom ri xaya chwech arech kinbʼano.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, Nutatxel chayaʼa bʼaʼ ri nuqʼijil awukʼ ri at, rukʼ ri nuqʼijil che kʼolik aretaq in kʼo awukʼ chaxkut, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kmajtaj we uwachulew choqʼijsaq.
Nuqʼalajisam ri abʼiʼ chkiwach ri winaq, che ri xeʼakʼam ukoq cho ri uwachulew arech xeʼaya chwech ri in. Ri eʼareʼ eʼawech ri at, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at xeʼaya chwech ri in, e xkikʼol ri atzij.
Kamik riʼ ketaʼm chik che ronojel ri xaya chwech, petinaq chi awukʼ ri at;
rumal rech ri jetaq tzij che xaya chwech ri in, xinya chkech ri areʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ xkikʼulaj e qastzij xkikʼam uqʼabʼ che ri in xas awukʼ inelnaq uloq, e xkikojo che at ri inataqom uloq.
Pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ kinchʼaw chawech man kinchʼaw ta puwiʼ ri uwachulew, xane kinchʼaw pakiwiʼ ri xeʼaya at chwech rumal rech che eʼawech ri at,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel ri jastaq uwach che wech ri in, awech ri at e ronojel ri jastaq uwach che awech at, wech ri in e ri in, inqʼijilam pa ri eʼareʼ.
Ri ukamik riʼ, ri in ma kinkanaj ta kan cho we uwachulew; kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ chi ekʼo cho we uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼe awukʼ. Tyoxlaj Nutatxel, ri xeʼaya chwech, cheʼakoloʼ bʼaʼ pa ri abʼiʼ, arech junam kiwach ri eʼareʼ, uj jacha ri uj.
Aretaq chiʼ in kʼo in kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, ri in xeʼinkʼolo pa ri abʼiʼ ri at ri eʼayaʼom chwech. Enuchajin ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun chkech ri eʼareʼ sachinaq, xuwi sachinaq neʼ ri ralkʼuwaʼl sachinaqil arech qastzij kbʼantaj ri tzʼibʼatalik.
Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ naqaj kinbʼe wi chawech kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa we uwachulew kinbʼij wi weriʼ, arech qas ktzʼaqatik kukʼ ri eʼareʼ ronojel ri nukiʼkotemal.
Ri in xinya ri Atzij chkech kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uwachulew, xretzelaj kiwach, rumal rech che man eʼelnaq taj cho ri uwachulew jeʼ jas ri in, che man inelnaq taj cho ri uwachulew.
Man kinta ta chawech che keʼawesaj ubʼi cho ri uwachulew, xane kinta chawech che keʼakʼol chuwach ri Itzel.
Ri eʼareʼ, man rech ta we uwachulew ejeʼ jas ri in che ma in rech ta we uwachulew.
Cheʼatyoxrisaj ri eʼareʼ pa ri saqalajtzij: are ri atzij ri saqalajtzij.
Jeriʼ jas ri at xinataq uloq pa we uwachulew xoqujeʼ ri in xeʼintaq ubʼi ri eʼareʼ pa we uwachulew.
Pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ kintyoxrisaj wibʼ ri in, arech, xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ ketyoxrisax pa ri saqalajtzij.
Man xuwi ta pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ kinchʼawik, xane xoqujeʼ kinchʼaw pakiwiʼ ri enikʼaj chik, che rumal ri kitzij ri eʼareʼ kekojon na chwech ri in arech,
konojel ri eʼareʼ junam kiwach. Jeriʼ jas ri at Tatxel, che ri at at kʼo pa ri wanimaʼ ri in, e ri in in kʼo pa ri awanimaʼ ri at, xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ xa jun ta bʼaʼ kiwach qukʼ ri uj, arech ri uwachulew kkojonik che at inataqom uloq.
Ri in, nuyaʼom chkech ri nuqʼijil, ri xaya chwech ri in, arech ri eʼareʼ xa jun kiwach jeʼ jas ri uj che xa jun qawach:
ri in, in kʼo pa ri kanimaʼ ri eʼareʼ e ri at, at kʼo pa ri wanimaʼ ri in, arech, qastzij etzʼaqat pa ri xa jun kiwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, arech ri uwachulew kretaʼmaj che at ri inataqom uloq e che ri at, eʼaloqʼoqʼem ri eʼareʼ jeʼ jas inaloqʼoqʼem in.
Nutatxel, ri eʼareʼ che eʼayaʼom chwech ri in, ri in kinwaj che jawijeʼ kinkʼojiʼ wi ri in, xoqujeʼ kekʼojiʼ ri eʼareʼ wukʼ, arech kkimayij rilik ri nuqʼijil, che ayaʼom chwech ri in rumal rech che ri at xinaloqʼoqʼej aretaq chiʼ majoq kkʼiysax we uwachulew.
Sukʼlaj Nutatxel, ri uwachulew man retaʼmam ta awach kʼatekʼut, ri in wetaʼmam awach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, we eʼareʼ riʼ ketaʼmam che at ri inataqom uloq.
Ri in nukʼutum ri abʼiʼ chkiwach kʼatekʼuriʼ kintaqej na ukʼutik chkiwach, arech, rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx che xinaloqʼoqʼej ri in, chpet bʼaʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, xoqujeʼ ri in chinpet bʼaʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, ri Jesus junam kel ubʼi kukʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ keqʼax chʼaqap chrech ri nimaʼ Sedron. Jelaʼ kʼo jun tikonbʼal ulew, kok chilaʼ, xoqujeʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Judas, ri kjachow na ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ retaʼm we jun kʼolibʼal riʼ, rumal rech che kʼya taq mul chik, ri Jesus e ri eʼutijoxelabʼ kimulim kibʼ chilaʼ.
Ri Judas kukʼam kibʼe ri kohorte e ri eʼajchʼimiʼy che etaqom ubʼi kumal ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri efariseʼo. Kukʼaʼm bʼi chäj, kukʼam tzukʼbʼal qʼaqʼ, xoqujeʼ ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj.
Ri Jesus che retaʼm ronojel ri kkʼulmatajik, kel uloq, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «¿Jachin kitzukuj?».
Kkibʼij chech: «Are ri Jesus ri Nasareno (Ajnasaret)». Kubʼij chkech: «In riʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Judas, ri kjachow na, xoqujeʼ kʼo chilaʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «In riʼ», ketzalij pa kaqan kʼatekʼuriʼ ketzaq cho ri ulew.
Kuta chi jumul chkech: «¿Jachin kitzukuj?». Kkibʼij chrech: «Are riʼ Jesus ri Nasareno».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Xbʼitaj chiwech che in. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kinitzukuj ri in, chiyaʼa bʼe chkech we eʼareʼ riʼ, arech keʼel bʼik»,
xa jekʼuriʼ qastzij kbʼantaj ri bʼim: «Man kʼo ta jun chkech ri xeʼaya chwech nusachom kanoq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Simon-Pedro, che rukʼam bʼi jun chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj, kresaj e kusok ri upatanijel ri nim chuchqajaw, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuqʼat ubʼi ri rikyaqʼabʼ uxikin. Ri jun patanijel riʼ, Malkus ri ubʼiʼ.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech ri Luʼ (Pedro): «Cha- tzalij le chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj pa le ukʼolibʼal. Ri jun qumubʼal amajaʼ uyaʼom ri Tatxel chwech, ¿la man kinqumuj ta na?»
Tekʼuriʼ, ri jupuq exoltato (kohorte), ri ekinimal e ri ekajchʼimiyabʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo, kkichap ri Jesus, e kkiyutu.
Nabʼe, kkikʼam ubʼi pa ri rachoch ri Anas; ri areʼ riʼ, ujiʼ ri Kaʼifas, e are nim chuchqajaw pa we jun junabʼ riʼ.
Ri Kaʼifas, are areʼ xkojow kikʼuʼx ri eʼajjudiʼo, xubʼij chkech: «Are utz che xa jun chi achi kkam pakiwiʼ konojel ri siwan tinimit».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri Jesus, ri Simon-Pedro, xoqujeʼ jun chik tijoxel. We jun tijoxel riʼ, etaʼmatal uwach rumal ri nim chuchqajaw, kok ubʼi rukʼ ri Jesus pa ri uwoja rech ri nim chuchqajaw,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ, kkanaj kan naqaj chrech ri uchiʼja, man kok ta ubʼik. Ri jun chik tijoxel, ri areʼ che etaʼmatal uwach rumal ri nim chuchqajaw, kel uloq e kuchʼabʼej ri ajlaqʼbʼanel uchiʼja e kkowin che rokisaxik ubʼi ri Luʼ.
Ri jun ajlaqʼbʼanel uchiʼja, kubʼij chrech ri Luʼ: «Ri at, ¿la man xoqujeʼ taj atutijoxel le jun achi leʼ?». Kubʼij ri areʼ: «Ri in man in jun ta kukʼ».
Ri eʼajpatanijel e ri eʼajchʼimiy kiwokom jun qʼaqʼ, rumal rech che sibʼalaj kʼax tew. Kekanaj kan kukʼ chilaʼ e kkimiqʼ ukoq kibʼ. Ri Luʼ, xoqujeʼ kkanaj kan kukʼ chilʼa e kumiqʼ ribʼ.
Ri nim chuchqajaw kukʼot uchiʼ ri Jesus pakiwiʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ e puwiʼ ri utzij, ri ukʼutunik.
Ri Jesus, kubʼij chrech: «Nimalaj paqʼij inchʼawinaq chkiwach ri winaq, ronojel mul intijoninaq pa ri Ukʼolbʼal chʼabʼal e pa ri nim rachoch ri Dyos, jawijeʼ kkimulij wi kibʼ konojel ri eʼajjudiʼo e man pa awalkil taj intzijoninaq.
¿Jas kʼu che kakʼot nuchiʼ? Are chakʼotoʼ kichiʼ ri etowinaq ri nutzij nukʼutum chkiwach; ri eʼareʼ, ketaʼm jas ri nubʼim».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, jun chkech ri eʼajchʼimiy ekʼo chilaʼ, kuya jun qʼabʼ chupalaj ri Jesus e kubʼij: «¿Suche jewaʼ kabʼij chech we nim chuchqajaw riʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Wema utz xinchʼawik, chabʼij bʼaʼ chwech jachike ri man utz taj xinbʼij; kʼatekʼut, we utz xinchʼawik, suche rech kinachʼayo?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Anas yutum kutaq ubʼi chuwach ri Nim Chuchqajaw Kaʼifas.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Simon kanajinaq chilaʼ kumiqʼ ribʼ. Kkibʼij chrech: «¿la man at jun ri at chkixoʼl ri eʼutijoxelabʼ?». Ri areʼ kubʼij, che man jun taj, jewaʼ kubʼij: «Jayiʼ, ma in jun ta ri in kukʼ».
Jun chkech ri upatanijel ri nim chuchqajaw, jun rachalal ri jun che xqʼat ubʼi uxikin rumal ri Luʼ, kubʼij: «¿La man xatinwil ta rukʼ pa ri tikonbʼal ulew?».
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chi jumul che man jun ta kukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa we uchanim riʼ koqʼ ri amaʼ ekʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa ri rachoch ri Kaʼifas, kkʼam ubʼik ri Jesus chi pa ukʼolbʼal qʼatoj- tzij kech ri eʼajromano (Pretoriʼo). Nimalaj aqʼabʼil aretaq chiʼ weriʼ. Ri eʼareʼ man keʼok ta ubʼi pa ri Pretoriʼo, arech man kki- tzʼilobʼisaj ta kibʼ e xa jeriʼ kuyaʼo kkitij ri Qʼaxebʼal (Paskuʼa).
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato kel uloq, kpetik jawijeʼ ekʼo wiʼ ri eʼareʼ e kubʼij: «¿Jas qʼatbʼaltzij ikʼamom uloq puwiʼ we achi riʼ?».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Weta ri areʼ man jun ajbʼanal kʼax taj, ri uj ma xqakʼam ta uloq waʼ chawech».
Ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «Chikʼamaʼ ubʼi ri ix, kʼatekʼuriʼ chibʼanaʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jeʼ jas ktaqan ri ipixabʼ ri ix». Ri eʼajjudiʼo, kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj man yaʼtal ta chqech che kqakamisaj jun winaq»,
xa jekʼuriʼ qastzij kbʼantaj ri utzij xubʼij ri Jesus, aretaq chiʼ xuya ubʼixik jas uwach kamikal kuriq na.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato, xok chi ubʼi jumul pa ri Pretoriʼo; kusikʼij ri Jesus e kubʼij chrech: «¿La at, atkajawinel ri eʼajjudiʼo?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «¿La kabʼij weriʼ pa awech wi ri at on enikʼaj chik kibʼim weriʼ chawech panuwiʼ ri in?».
Ri Pilato kubʼij: «¿La in ajjudiʼo ri in? Ri eʼatinimit e ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ xatkijach pa nuqʼabʼ in. ¿Jas xabʼano?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ri wajawibʼal man kʼo ta pa we jun uwachulew riʼ. Ri wajawibʼal, weta kʼo pa we jun uwachulew riʼ, xechʼoʼjin ta bʼaʼ riʼ ri enuwinaq arech man kinjach ta pa kiqʼabʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo. Kʼatekʼut ri wajawibʼal man kʼo ta waral».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato kubʼij chrech: «¿At Ajawinel bʼaʼ ri at?». Ri Jesus kubʼij: «Jeʼ, jeriʼ jacha kabʼij ri at; ri in, in ajawinel. Are rumal waʼ xinalaxik e rumal waʼ xinulpe chuwachulew, arech kinulkʼutu ri saqalaj tzij. Ri jun che xel uloq chi rukʼ ri saqalaj tzij, kutatbʼej we nuchʼabʼal».
Ri Pilato kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas ri saqalaj tzij?». Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj we tzij riʼ, kel chi ubʼi jumul chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri in, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kinriqo che taqal qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix naqʼatal chiwech che kintzaqopij ubʼi jun winaq pa ri Qʼaxebʼal (Paskuʼa). ¿La kiwaj kʼut che kintzaqopij ubʼi ri kajawinel ri Eʼajjudiʼo?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiraqaqej chi jumul kichiʼ e kkibʼij: «¡Man are ta katzaqopij ri areʼ, are chatzaqopij ri Bʼarrabʼas!». Ri Bʼarrabʼas jun winaq ajbʼanal kʼax.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato, kukʼam ubʼi ri Jesus e ktaqanik arech kchʼay chech asyar.
Ri exoltato kkibʼan jun ketakik rukʼ kʼix, kkikoj cho ri ujolom; kʼatekʼuriʼ kkikoj jun kyaqlaj atzʼyaq chrech;
keqibʼ ukoq rukʼ e kkibʼij chrech: «Utz awach at ajawinel kech ri eʼajjudiʼo!». Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkichʼay chupalaj.
Kel chi uloq jumul ri Pilato, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: «Chiwilampeʼ, kinkʼam uloq ri areʼ chiwech, arech kiwetaʼmaj che man kinriq ta jun jas uwach che taqal qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ».
Xa jeriʼ kʼut, ri Jesus kel uloq, rukʼ ri jun ketakik kʼix cho ri ujolom e ri jun kyaqlaj atzʼyaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «¡Chiwilampeʼ, kʼo we jun winaq riʼ!».
Aretaq chiʼ ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri eʼajchʼimiyabʼ kkil ri areʼ, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ, kkibʼij: «¡Charipbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal! ¡Charipbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal!». Ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «Chikʼamaʼ ubʼi ri ix, kʼatekʼuriʼ chiripbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal; rumal rech che ri in, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kinriq rukʼ che taqal qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj kʼo jun qapixabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij we qapixabʼ riʼ, rajawaxik che kkamik rumal kukoj ribʼ Ukʼojol ri Dyos».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Pilato kuta we tzij riʼ, sibʼalaj kuxibʼij chi na ribʼ.
Kok chi jumul pa ri Pretoriʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech ri Jesus: «¿Jawijeʼ katel wi ri at?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato kubʼij chrech: «¿La man kinachʼabʼej ta ri in? ¿La man awetaʼm taj che ri in kʼo kowinem pa nuqʼabʼ arech katintzaqopij ubʼik on katinripbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri at man kʼo ta akowinem laʼ panuwiʼ, weta mata yaʼom chawech kʼa chikaj uloq; rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri jun che xinjachow chawech, are kʼo chi na sibʼalaj umak chawach».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pilato kraj kutzaqopij bʼi ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼut ri eʼajjudiʼo kkiraqaqej kichiʼ, kkibʼij: «We katzaqopij ubʼi ri areʼ, ri at man at rajchʼabʼen ta ri Sesar; ri jun che kurokisaj ribʼ ajawinel kkʼuleʼlan chrech ri Sesar».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Pilato kuta we jetaq tzij riʼ, kresaj uloq ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kutʼuybʼaʼ ribʼ cho ri qʼatbʼaltzij pa jun kʼolibʼal che kbʼix Tzʼaqom Abʼaj chrech; e pa ri chʼabʼal hebʼreʼo Gabʼbʼata.
Are ri jun qʼij rech Ksukʼumax ri Qaxebʼal (Paskuʼa); pa taq ri uwaq kajbʼal. Kubʼij ri Pilato chkech ri Eʼajjudiʼo: «Chiwilampeʼ le iwajawinel leʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «¡Chakamisaj! ¡Chakamisaj! ¡Charipbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal!». Ri Pilato kubʼij chkech: «¿Che kinripbʼaʼ ri iwajawinel?». Ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ kkibʼij: «¡Ri uj, man kʼo ta chi jun qajawinel chuwach ri Sesar!».
(a) Kʼatekʼuriʼ kujach ubʼi ri areʼ chkech arech kkiripbʼaʼ cho ri ripbʼal. (16b)Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkʼam ubʼi ri Jesus.
E ri areʼ kel ubʼi rukʼ ri uripbʼal, kusukʼ ubʼi pa ri jun ukʼolibʼal ubʼiʼ Jolomaj –pa ri chʼabʼal hebʼreʼo kbʼix Golgota chrech–
kʼatekʼuriʼ, chilaʼ kkiripbʼax wi, xoqujeʼ keripbʼax rukʼ ekebʼ winaq chik, ri Jesus panikʼaj kkanaj wi e ri eʼareʼ pa taq ri utzal.
Ri Pilato, xoqujeʼ kubʼan jun tzʼibʼanik e ktaqanik arech kokisax puwiʼ ri ripbʼal. Ri tzʼibʼanik jewaʼ kubʼij: «Jesus, ri ajnasareno, ri kajawinel ri eʼajjudiʼo».
We tzʼibʼatalik riʼ, sibʼalaj eʼajjudiʼo kkisikʼij uwach, rumal rech che ri jun kʼolibʼal jawijeʼ xripbʼax wi ri Jesus, naqaj kʼo wi chrech ri tinamit, xoqujeʼ tzʼibʼatalik pa chʼabʼal hebʼreʼo, pa chʼabʼal latino e pa chʼabʼal griʼego.
Ri enimaʼq taq chuchqajawibʼ kech ri eʼajjudiʼo kkibʼij chrech ri Pilato: «Matzʼibʼaj: “Ri kajawinel ri eʼajjudiʼo”, xane are chatzʼibʼaj: “We jun achi riʼ ubʼim: Ri in in kajawinel ri eʼajjudiʼo”».
Ri Pilato kubʼij: «Ri xtzʼibʼataj wumal, xtzʼibʼataj laʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ xripbʼataj ri Jesus kumal ri exoltato, kkechbʼej ri taq ratzʼyaq, kkibʼan kijebʼ chrech chkiwach, jujun taq kech ri xkibʼan kijebʼ chrech e xaq xuwi chi kanoq ri jun uqʼuʼ che kbʼe chrij. We jun uqʼuʼ kbʼe chrij riʼ, man kʼo ta utʼisbʼalil, chi xa jun ukemik chi ajsik e kopan ikim;
rumal kʼu waʼ kkibʼij chbʼil taq kibʼ: «Waʼ maqabʼitʼoʼ, xane chqetzʼabʼej uchʼakik arech kqilo jachin kriqowik»: arech qastzij kbʼantajik ri tzʼibʼatalik: Xkijach bʼi ri nuqʼuʼ chkiwach xketzʼabʼej uchʼakik ri nuqʼuʼ che kbʼe chrij ri watzʼyaq. Are waʼ ri xkibʼan ri exoltato.
Chuxeʼ ukoq ri ripbʼal rech ri Jesus, ekʼo ukoq ri unan e ri rachalal ri unan, ri Mariʼy rixoqil ri Kleʼofas e ri Mariʼy ri Ajmagdala.
Ri Jesus kril ri unan e chuxkut kril ri jun utijoxel che kuloqʼoqʼej, kubʼij chrech ri unan: «ixoq, kʼo le awal leʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech ri jun tijoxel: «Kʼo le anan leʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ chi pa we kajbʼal riʼ, ri jun tijoxel riʼ kukʼulaj ri areʼ pa ri rachoch.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Jesus retaʼm chik che ronojel xkʼis ubʼanik, arech qastzij kbʼantaj ri tzʼibʼatalik, ri areʼ kubʼij: «Kchaqij nuchiʼ».
Chilaʼ riʼ, kʼo jun kʼolbʼal, nojinaq chrech vinagre. Kokisax chutzaʼm jun uqʼabʼ kʼasis, jun woʼs che kmuʼmatik pa vinagre, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiqibʼisaj ukoq chuchiʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xtijtaj ri vinagre rumal, ri Jesus kubʼij: «Ronojel xbʼantajik», kʼatekʼuriʼ kuqasaj ri ujolom e xujach ri ruxlabʼal.
Xa rumal rech che are uqʼij ri Sukʼumanik, arech man kkanaj ta kan ri kibʼaqilal ri winaq cho taq ri ripbʼal pa ri Sabʼado –rumal rech che we jun Sabʼado riʼ, jun nimalaj qʼij– ri eʼajjudiʼo kkita chrech ri Pilato che kqʼajisax ri kaqan, kʼatekʼuriʼ keʼesax ubʼi chilaʼ.
Kepe ri exoltato, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiqʼajisaj ri raqan ri nabʼe, xoqujeʼ ri raqan ri jun chik che xkiripabʼa rukʼ.
Keʼopan rukʼ ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ kkilo, che ri areʼ kaminaq chik, man kkiqʼajisaj ta ri raqan,
xane jun chkech ri exoltato, rukʼ jun rabʼarik nimalaj chʼichʼ kuwor chutzaltmal ukʼuʼx, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi chanim kel uloq ukikʼel rachiʼl joron.
Ri jun che xilow weriʼ kuya ri utzij puwiʼ weriʼ –e qastzij ri kubʼij, e ri areʼ retaʼm che qastzij ri kubʼij– arech, xoqujeʼ ri ix kixkojon chrech weriʼ.
Ronojel weriʼ xkʼulmatajik arech qastzij kbʼantajik ri tzʼibʼatalik: Man kʼo ta jun ubʼaq kqʼajisax na riʼ.
Xoqujeʼ pa jun tzʼibʼatalik kubʼij: Kekaʼy na riʼ chrech ri jun che xkichoto.
Aretaq chiʼ okʼowinaq chi weriʼ, ri xep Ajarimateʼa, che jun utijoxel ri Jesus, kneʼbʼaʼ pa awalkil, rumal che kuxibʼij ribʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo, kuta chrech ri Pilato arech kuya bʼe chrech kukʼam bʼi ri ubʼaqil ri Jesus. Ri Pilato kuyaʼ bʼe chrech. Kepe na kʼut e kkikʼam bʼi ri ubʼaqil.
Ri Nikodemo –ri areʼ che xpe kanoq chaqʼabʼ rukʼ ri Jesus– xoqujeʼ ri areʼ kpetik, uxolom uloq okʼal pajbʼal mirra rukʼ jun kʼokʼlaj uwaʼlcheʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼotzʼ ri ubʼaqil ri Jesus pa taq atzʼyaq rukʼ ri kʼokʼlaj taq kunabʼal jeriʼ jacha rawasaxik kkibʼan ri eʼajjudiʼo che umuqik jun winaq.
Pa ri kʼolibʼal jawijeʼ xripabʼax wi ri areʼ kʼo jun tikoʼnbʼal ulew e pa we jun tikoʼnbʼal ulew riʼ kʼo jun kʼakʼ ujul kaminaq jawijeʼ man kʼo ta jun kaminaq muqum.
Rumal che are uqʼij ri Sukʼumanik kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, naqaj kʼo wi ri jul riʼ, chilaʼ kkimuq wi ri Jesus.
Pa ri nabʼe qʼij rech ri xmano, ri Mariʼy Ajmagdala, aretaq chiʼ kpakak chi uloq uxeʼ kaj, majaʼ neʼ ksaqar uwachulew, aninaq kbʼe pa ri jul, kʼatekʼuriʼ, krilo che esam chi ubʼi ri jun abʼaj.
Chi chanim kxakʼinik kbʼek, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuriqaʼ ri Simon Pedro e ri jun chik tijoxel che xuloqʼoqʼej ri Jesus e kubʼij chkech: «Xesax ubʼi ri Ajawxel pa ri jul e man qetaʼm taj jawijeʼ xya wi».
Kel ubʼi ri Luʼ e xoqujeʼ ri jun tijoxel chik e kkisukʼ ubʼi pa ri jul.
Junam kkitij anim chi ekebʼ. Kʼatekʼut, ri jun tijoxel chik kutij chi na sibʼalaj anim chuwach ri Luʼ, e nabʼe kopan pa ri jul.
Kulukbʼaʼ ukoq ribʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kril ri bʼotzʼibʼal taq atzʼyaq cho ri ulew; kʼatekʼut man kok ta ubʼik.
Xoqujeʼ kopan ri Simon-Pedro, che teren ubʼi chrij; kok pa ri jul, kril ri bʼotzʼibʼal taq atzʼyaq cho ri ulew,
xoqujeʼ ri chʼuqubʼal ujolom che man kʼo ta rukʼ ri taq bʼotzʼibʼal atzʼyaq, xane bʼaqʼatim kan utukel pa jun kʼolibʼal chi apanoq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ kok chi ubʼi ri jun chik tijoxel, ri jun che xopan nabʼe pa ri jul. Kril weriʼ e kkojonik.
Xa ne majaʼ uchʼobʼom chiʼ, che jacha kubʼij pa ri tzʼibʼatalik, che ri Jesus rajawaxik kkʼastaj uwach xas chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Ri etijoxel riʼ, ketzalij neʼ cho kachoch.
Ri Mariʼy man okinaq ta ubʼik, kʼo ukoq naqaj chrech ri jul, sibʼalaj tajin koqʼik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ tajin koqʼik, kulukbʼaʼ ukoq ribʼ chuchiʼ ri jul,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, keril ekebʼ anjel, rukʼ saqlaj taq ka- tzʼyaq, etʼuyulik jawijeʼ xmuq wi ri ubʼaqil ri Jesus, jun kʼo uloq jawiʼ xbʼe wi ri ujolom e ri jun chik pa raqan uloq.
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: Ixoq, ¿jasche katoqʼik?». Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Kinoqʼik rumal rech che xkʼam ubʼi ri Wajawxel, e man wetaʼm taj jawijeʼ xya wi».
Aretaq chiʼ kbʼitaj weriʼ rumal, kusutij ribʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, krilo che takʼal ukoq ri Jesus, kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ man retaʼm taj we are ri Jesus.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ixoq, ¿jasche katoqʼik? ¿Jachin katzukuj?». Ri areʼ chi kuchomaj na kʼut che are ri ajchak pa ri tikonbʼal riʼ, kubʼij chech: «Ajaw, we at xatkʼamow ubʼik, chabʼij bʼaʼ chwech jawijeʼ xayaʼaʼ wi, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinkʼam bʼi ri in».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Mariʼy». Ri areʼ kusutij ribʼ e kubʼij chrech pa chʼabʼal hebʼreʼo: «¡Rabʼbʼuni!». Weriʼ kubʼij: «Ajtij».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Minachapo, xane majaʼ kinpaqiʼ rukʼ ri Tatxel. Kʼatekʼut are jat kukʼ ri ewachalal e jabʼij chkech: Kinpaqiʼ rukʼ ri Nutat che Itat ri ix, kinpaqiʼ rukʼ ri Nudyos che Idyos ri ix».
Ri Mariʼy Ajmagdala kbʼek e kuʼbʼij chkech ri etijoxelabʼ «xinwil ri Ajawxel», e ri Areʼ xubʼij we tzij chwech riʼ.
Pa xqʼeʼqal chrech we jun qʼij riʼ, ri nabʼe qʼij chech we xmano riʼ, tzʼapitalik taq ri uchiʼja jawijeʼ ekʼo wi ri etijoxelabʼ, rumal che kixibʼim kibʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo; kpe ri Jesus e ktakʼiʼ panikʼaj chkech e kubʼij: «Nimalaj utzil iwukʼ ri ix!».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, kukʼut ri uqʼabʼ e ri utzaltmal ukʼuʼx chkiwach. Ri etijoxelabʼ, sibʼalaj kekiʼkotik aretaq chiʼ kkil uwach ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chi jumul chkech: «Nimalaj utzil iwukʼ ri ix! Jeʼ jas nutaqik uloq xubʼan ri Tatxel, xoqujeʼ ri in kixintaq ubʼik».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ, keʼuxutʼuj pakiwiʼ, tekʼuriʼ kubʼij chkech: Chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Ejachintaq kisach na ri jetaq kimak, ksachtaj na riʼ chkech; ejachintaq kiqʼatej na ri kimak kqʼattaj na kan riʼ chkech».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Max che jun chkixoʼl ri ekabʼlajuj, ri kbʼix Yoʼx (Didyme) chrech, man kʼo ta kukʼ aretaq chiʼ xpe ri Jesus.
Ri enikʼaj etijoxelabʼ chik, kkibʼij chrech: «¡Ri uj xilitaj ri Ajawxel qumal!». Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Ri in we man kinwil ri ukʼolbʼal ri klawux pa ri uqʼabʼ e pa ri raqan e we man kinnim we nuqʼabʼ pa ri utzaltmal ukʼuʼx, man kinkojon ta chrech weriʼ!».
Chi kʼa uqbʼix chi apanoq, ekʼo chi jumul ri etijoxelabʼ pa ja, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼo ri Max kukʼ. Ri Jesus kopan panikʼyaj chkech aretaq chiʼ tzʼapitalik ri uchiʼja, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij: «¡Nimalaj utzil iwukʼ ri ix!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chrech ri Max: «Chakʼamaʼ uloq le aqʼabʼ waral riʼ: chawilaʼ le nuqʼabʼ; chakʼamaʼ uloq le aqʼabʼ e chanimaʼ pa le utzaltmal nukʼuʼx, kʼatekʼuriʼ mabʼano che ma atkojonel taj, xane atkojonel chabʼanaʼ».
Ri Max kubʼij chrech: «¡Wajawxel e Nudyos!».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri at, rumal rech che xawil weriʼ, xatkojonik, sibʼalaj utz kech riʼ ri jachintaq man kkil ta weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kekojonik».
Ri Jesus, kʼilaj taq kʼutbʼal xubʼan chi chuwach kiwoqʼoch ri eʼutijoxelabʼ, che man tzʼibʼatal ta pa we wuj riʼ.
Weriʼ xtzʼibʼaxik, arech ri ix kixkojonik che ri Jesus are ri Kristo, ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos, e aretaq chiʼ kixkojonik, kkʼojiʼ ikʼaslemal pa ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ.
Okʼowinaq chi weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Jesus kukʼut chiʼ jumul ribʼ chkiwach ri etijoxelabʼ chuchiʼ ri polow Tibʼeriʼades. Jewaʼ ukʼutik ribʼ kubʼano.
Ri Simon-Pedro, ri Max kbʼix Yoʼx (Didyme) chrech, ri Natanaʼel ri Ajkana rech ri Galileʼa, ri eʼukʼojol ri Sebʼedeʼo, xoqujeʼ ri ekebʼ eʼutijoxelabʼ chik, junam ekʼolik.
Ri Simon-Pedro kubʼij chkech: «Ri in, kinbʼeʼinchapaʼ na kar». Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Xoqujeʼ ri uj kujbʼe awukʼ». Keʼaqʼan pa ri jukubʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun kar kkichapo pa we jun aqʼabʼ riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ksaqarik, ri Jesus kʼo chuchiʼ ri polow; kʼatekʼut, ri etijoxelabʼ man ketaʼm taj che we are ri Jesus,
ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Alabʼom, ¿la man kʼo ta wa iwukʼ arech ktijowik?». Kkibʼij chrech: «¡Ma kʼo taj!».
Kubʼij chkech: «Chikʼyaqaʼ le ikʼat pa le rikyaqʼabʼ le jukubʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ keriq na laʼ chilaʼ». Kkikʼyaqo, kʼatekʼuriʼ ma kekowin ta chik chech ujikʼik, rumal rech che sibʼalaj kar xkiriqo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri tijoxel che sibʼalaj xloqʼoqʼexik rumal ri Jesus, kubʼij chrech ri Luʼ: «¡Are ri Ajawxel!». Rukʼ we tzij riʼ: «¡Are ri Ajawxel!». Ri Simon-Pedro kukoj ratzʼyaq –rumal rech che chʼanalik ubʼanom– kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukʼyaq ubʼi ribʼ pa ri jaʼ.
Ri enikʼaj etijoxelabʼ chik, che man naj taj ekʼo wi chrech ri ulew, xane jeʼ jas lajujkʼal xkʼabʼ (codos) ekʼo wi, kepe uloq pa ri jukubʼ, kkichararej uloq jun kʼat kar.
Aretaq chiʼ keqaj pa rilew, kkil jun qʼaqʼ kuchum chilaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ saʼom jun kar e jun kaxlanwa chuwach.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Chikʼamaʼ uloq nikʼaj kar che kʼateriʼ xichapo».
Ri Simon Pedro kaqʼan pa ri jukubʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuchararej uloq ri kʼat cho ri ulew che nojinaq che chomalaj taq kar: wuqlajuj kʼal oxlajuj; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ rukʼ we kar riʼ, ri kʼat man xtʼubʼun taj.
Ri Jesus kubʼij chkech: «Chisaʼj, jiʼtijaʼ iwa». Man kʼo ta jun chkech ri etijoxelabʼ kukochʼo kuta chrech: «¿At jachin ri at?», ketaʼm che are ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus kukʼam ukoq ri kaxlanwa e kuya chkech; xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kubʼan chrech ri kar.
Are waʼ ri urox mul chik che ri Jesus kukʼut ribʼ chkiwach ri etijoxelabʼ, aretaq chiʼ kʼastajinaq chi uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xkiwaʼlej, ri Jesus kubʼij chrech ri Simon-Pedro: «Simon, ukʼojol ri Xwan, ¿la are sibʼalaj kinaloqʼoqʼej chkiwach we eʼareʼ riʼ?». Kubʼij ri areʼ chrech: «Jeʼ», Ajawxel, ri at awetaʼm che ri in katinloqʼoqʼej». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Cheʼayuqʼuj bʼaʼ ri nuchij».
Pa ukamul kubʼij chi jumul chrech: «Simon, ukʼojol ri Xwan, ¿la kinaloqʼoqʼej?». —«Jeʼ, Ajawxel –kacha chrech– ri at awetaʼm che ri in katinloqʼoqʼej». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Cheʼayuqʼuj bʼaʼ ri nuchij».
Pa uroxmul kubʼij chi jumul chrech: —«Simon ukʼojol ri Xwan, ¿la kinaloqʼoqʼej?». Ri Luʼ kqʼoxow chrech rumal rech che uroxmul xuta chrech: «¿La kinaloqʼoqʼej?», kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ri at awetaʼm ronojel jas uwach, ri at awetaʼm che in katinloqʼoqʼej». Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Cheʼayuqʼuj bʼaʼ ri enuchij.
Qastzij, qastzij, kinbʼij chawech, aretaq chiʼ ri at, at kʼojol ala na chi at xatximow ri aximbʼal kʼatekʼuriʼ katbʼek jawijeʼ kawaj katbʼe wi; kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ at riʼj winaq chik kalik na riʼ le aqʼabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun chi riʼ kuxim na riʼ ri aximbʼal e katukʼam na ubʼi riʼ jawijeʼ man kawaj ta ri at».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ktzijon puwiʼ ri uwach kamikal kuriqaʼ na ri Pedro che rukʼ kuqʼijilaj na uwach ri Dyos. Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj weriʼ kubʼij chrech: «Chinaterneʼbʼej ubʼik!».
Ri Pedro kkaʼy uloq chrij, kʼatekʼuriʼ krilo che eterneʼm ubʼi rumal ri jun tijoxel che xloqʼoqʼexik rumal ri Jesus, xoqujeʼ che xtzaliʼ cho uwach ukʼuʼx e xubʼij chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿jachin ri katjachow na?».
Aretaq chiʼ kril ri Pedro, kubʼij chrech ri Jesus: «Ajawxel, ¿e we jun riʼ?».
Ri Jesus kubʼij chrech: «Ri in, we are kinwaj che kkanaj kanoq kʼateʼ na aretaq chiʼ kinpe ri in, ¿jas awech at chrech? Ri at, chinaterneʼbʼej».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xbʼe utzijoxik chkixoʼl ri eʼachalaxik che we jun tijoxel riʼ, man kkam taj. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jesus man xubʼij ta chrech ri Pedro: «Man kkam ta ri areʼ», xane xubʼij chrech: «Ri in, we are kinwaj che kkanaj kanoq kʼateʼ na aretaq chiʼ kinpe ri in».
Are waʼ we tijoxel riʼ che kuya ubʼixik we jastaq riʼ, e are tzʼibʼaninaq weriʼ e ri uj qetaʼm che qastzij ri kuyaʼ ubʼixik riʼ.
Xoqujeʼ, kʼo sibʼalaj jastaq na xubʼan ri Jesus. We ta jun kutzʼibʼaj chjujunal ronojel weriʼ, ri in kinchomaj che ronojel le uwachulew man kutzaqaʼ ta laʼ chrech ukʼolik ronojel ri wuj ktzʼibʼaxik.
Teʼofilo; pa ri nabʼe nuwuj. xintzibʼaj ronojel ri jastaq che xubʼano e xubʼij ri Jesus pa ri umajibʼal uloq.
Chi kʼa pa ri qʼij, aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj kanoq ri upixabʼ chkech ri eʼutaqoʼnelabʼ, ri eʼareʼ che xeʼuriqo pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkʼam ubʼi pa ri kaj.
Xoqujeʼ, ri Areʼ, kawinaq qʼij, kʼaslik uwach xukʼut ribʼ chkiwach ri eʼareʼ rukʼ kʼi taq kʼutbʼal chuwach chi aqʼanoq ri ukamikal; xukʼut ribʼ chkiwach e xutzijoj chkech ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ, kʼo kukʼ pa jun waʼim, xtaqan chkech arech ri eʼareʼ man keʼel ta ubʼi pa ri Jerusalem, xane arech kkeyeʼj ri jastaq uwach che xubʼij ri Tatxel chkech: «Ri jastaq uwach che xas ri ix xixtowikchi rukʼ ri nuchiʼ.
Ri Xwan xubʼan ri qasnaʼ rukʼ ri jaʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri ix kbʼan na iqasnaʼ rukʼ ri Uxlabʼxel pa taq we qʼij riʼ».
Pa we jun mulin ibʼ riʼ, kkita weriʼ chrech: «Ajawxel, ¿la are kʼu chiʼ riʼ, che ri at kabʼan na jun kʼakʼ Rajawibʼal pa ri Israʼel?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Are utz che ri ix man iwetaʼm ta ri qʼij e ri kajbʼal che ri Tatxel ukʼaqom rij rukʼ ukowinem.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, kikʼam na riʼ jun chuqʼabʼ, ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel che kqaj na uloq riʼ piwiʼ ri ix. Ri ix, ix nuwinaq riʼ che kiya na ri itzij chwij pa ri Jerusalem, pa ronojel ri Judeʼa, e pa ri Samariʼa, chi kʼa pa ri ukʼisbʼalil uxkut ri uwachulew».
E rukʼ we tzij riʼ, kaqʼan ubʼi chkiwach e jun sutzʼ kuwaj ubʼi ri areʼ chuwach ri kiwoqʼoch.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ tajin kekaʼy pa ri kaj aretaq xbʼe ri areʼ; ekebʼ achijabʼ kikojom saq taq katzʼyaq ekʼo chkinaqaj ri eʼareʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chkech: «Achijabʼ ix ajgalileʼa, ¿jasche, che ri ix naj kkanaj kan ri iwoqʼoch che kaʼyem pa ri kaj? Ri areʼ che xkʼam ubʼi xas chiwach ix, waʼ we Jesus riʼ, kpe na waʼ jeʼ jas we ubʼik pa ri kaj riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa ri juyubʼ Olivo, ke- tzalej pa ri Jerusalem; ri bʼe, man naj taj; xa jeriʼ jas jun bʼinbʼal rech ri Sabʼado.
Keʼok ubʼi pa ri tinimit e kepaqiʼ pa ri jun kʼolbʼal puwiʼ ri ja jawijeʼ ejeqel wi kan ri eʼareʼ, ri Luʼ, ri Xwan, ri Santiʼago, ri Atrix, ri Felipe e ri Max, ri Bʼartolome e ri Mateʼo, ri Santiʼago rech ri Alfeʼo, ri Simon ri selotes e ri Judas rech ri Santiʼago.
Konojel junam kanimaʼ kekanaj pa ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, ekʼo kukʼ ri eʼareʼ ejujun taq ixoqibʼ, kʼo ri Mariʼy ri unan ri Jesus, e ri erachalal.
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ, ri Luʼ ktakiʼ panikʼaj chkech ri eʼachalaxik –xkimulij kibʼ oʼkʼal juwinaq– e kubʼij chkech:
«Eʼachalaxik, rajawaxik che qastzij kbʼantaj ri Tzij, che ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, xubʼij rukʼ ri uchiʼ ri David puwiʼ ri Judas, ri areʼ che xubʼan kʼamalbʼe chkech ri xechapow ubʼi ri Jesus.
Ri areʼ xkʼojiʼ ri ukʼolibʼal qukʼ e xukʼam utzʼaqatil ri qachak.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xuloqʼ rulew rukʼ ri rajil umak, e chʼikilik uwiʼ xtzaqik e xraqan pa unikʼajal e xtukin ri upam.
Konojel ri winaq pa ri Jerusalem ketaʼm weriʼ e xbʼix chrech we ulew riʼ Hakeldama, che pa qachʼabʼal kubʼij: “Ulew ukʼolibʼal kikʼel”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, tzʼibʼatalik pa ri uwuj ri jetaq bʼix: “Ri ulew kbʼantaj na tzʼinalikalaj ulew e man kʼo ta jun winaq kjeqiʼ pa ri areʼ.” Xoqujeʼ kubʼij: “Chukʼamaʼ jun chik ri uchak”.
Xa je kʼu waʼ, rajawaxik che chkixoʼl we achijabʼ riʼ, che xebʼin qukʼ ronojel taq qʼij aretaq chiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus xkʼasiʼ chqaxoʼl,
chi pa ri uqasnaʼ ubʼi ri Xwan, chi kʼa pa ri qʼij che xkʼam ubʼi chqaxoʼl ri uj; jun chkech ri eʼareʼ riʼ kux na jun qukʼ che kuya utzij chrij che ri Areʼ xkʼastaj uwach».
Xekichaʼ kebʼ winaq: jun ubʼiʼ Jose Bʼarsabʼas, che kojom ubʼiʼ, kbʼix chrech Justo, e ri Matiʼas.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jewaʼ ri chʼawem kkibʼan rukʼ ri Dyos: «Ri at, at Ajawxel, che awetaʼm konojel kanimaʼ ri winaq, chʼakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ chqawach jachinchike we ekebʼ riʼ kawaj at
arech kpatanijik pa kichak ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, pa ri ukʼexwach ri Judas, ri areʼ che xuya kanoq ri ukʼolbʼal arech kbʼe pa ri jun ukʼolbʼal che taqal chrech».
Kkil rij, e are kkʼeq rij ri Matiʼas e xok areʼ jun chkixoʼl ri ekabʼlajuj etaqoʼnelabʼ.
Pa ri qʼij rech ri Upetbʼal ri Uxlabʼxel (Pentekostes), konojel kkimulim kibʼ pa jun kʼolbʼal,
kʼatekʼuriʼ chi chanim kpe uloq pa ri kaj, kjanin jun nimalaj kyaqiqʼ, kunojisaj ronojel ri upaja jawijeʼ ekʼo wi ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkil ri ujuluw qʼaqʼ. Kketkobʼik, e jun kkʼojiʼ pakiwiʼ chjujunal chkech ri eʼareʼ.
Konojel enojinaq chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e kkichapleʼj kechʼaw pa nikʼaj taq chʼabʼal chik jeʼ jas kuya ri Uxlabʼxel chkech arech kechʼaw ri eʼareʼ.
E kʼo pa Jerusalem, enikʼaj etyoxlaj taq winaq che epetinaq chi pa ronojel tinimit che kʼo chuxeʼ ri kaj.
Rukʼ ri xjaninik, ri siwantinimit kkimulij kibʼ e man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal weriʼ: konojel ri winaq kkita ri kitzij pa ri kichʼabʼal.
Kkimayij uwach weriʼ e man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal, kkibʼij: «Waʼ we eʼachijabʼ riʼ, ¿la man konojel taj eʼajgalileʼa?
¿Jas kʼu che, che qonojel kqata ri kitzij chi pa ri qachʼabʼal?
Partos, Medas, e Elamitas; winaq rech ri Mesopotamiʼa, ri Eʼajjudeʼa, ri Eʼajkapadosiʼa, ri ewinaq Eʼajponto, ri Eʼajasiʼa,
ri Eʼajfrigiʼa, ri Eʼajpanfiliʼa, ri Eʼajegipto, ri ewinaq Eʼajlibʼya kʼulbʼat che ri Sirene, ri Eʼajromano che ekanajinaq waral;
ri Eʼajjudiʼo ri eʼareʼ che epetinaq kukʼ ri eʼajjudeyibʼ, ri Eʼajkreta e ri Eʼajarabʼiʼa, qonojel kqata pa ri qachʼabʼal ri Utzalaj taq jastaq rech ri Dyos!».
Konojel ri eʼareʼ kkimayij uwach weriʼ e kkita chkibʼil aqʼan kibʼ, kkibʼij: «¿Jas waʼ weriʼ?».
E nikʼaj chik, kketzʼebʼej kiwach, kkibʼij: «¡Ri eʼareʼ enojinaq chrech ri jeʼlik e kʼilaj amajaʼ!»
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ, takʼal kʼukʼ ri ejuʼlajuj, kuwaʼlisaj ri uchʼabʼal e kubʼij weriʼ chkech: «Winaq che ix ajjudeʼa e iwonojel ix siwantinimit che ixkanajinaq pa ri Jerusalem, qas chiwetaʼmaj weriʼ, utz utayik chibʼanaʼ we nutzij.
Jayiʼ, we winaq riʼ man eqʼabʼarelabʼ taj ekʼolik, jeʼ jas ri kichomaj ri ix; xane chanim kʼateʼ uj okinaq pa ri urox kajbʼal che we qʼij riʼ.
Xane jeʼ jas ri xubʼij ri qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos:
Pa ri kʼisbʼal taq qʼij, kcha ri Ajawxel, kinqʼejej na riʼ ri wuxlabʼal pakiwiʼ konojel winaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼiwalkʼuwaʼl, chi eʼalitomabʼ chi eʼalabʼom, ri eʼareʼ eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos. Ri eʼalabʼom kkil na riʼ jujun taq jastaq e ri enimaʼq taq winaq kkʼojiʼ na kichikʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, kinchojej na ri Wuxlabʼal pakiwiʼ ri enupataninel e ri enumokom.
Kinkʼut na riʼ, nimalaj taq jastaq cho ri kaj, e xoqujeʼ nimalaj taq kʼutbʼal cho ri uwachulew.
Ri qʼij kujal na qʼequʼm riʼ, e ri ikʼ kikʼ riʼ kujalo, aretaq chiʼ majoʼq kpe ri Uqʼij ri Ajawxel, ri jun Nimalaj qʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jachin kunaʼtisaj ubʼixik ri ubʼi ri Ajawxel kkoltaj na riʼ.
Ix winaq ix Ajisraʼel, qas chitatabʼej we tzij riʼ: Ri Jesus che ri Ajnasoreʼo ri jun achi, che qastzij are ri Dyos xbʼanowik, che xubʼan ri areʼ chiwach ri jetaq mayibʼal, ri nimalaj taq jastaq e ri jetaq kʼutbʼal che are ri Dyos xbʼanow chixoʼl rumal ri Areʼ, jeʼ jas ri utzalaj retaʼmaxik ibʼanom ix,
ri jun achi riʼ che xjachik jeriʼ jacha xraj ri Dyos e jacha retaʼm ri Dyos; ri ix xikʼam ubʼik e xikamisaj ri areʼ, xibʼajij cho ri ripibʼal chi rukʼ ri kiqʼabʼ ri winaq che man kʼo ta kikojonik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos, xuwaʼlisaj ri areʼ, xutoʼtajisaj uwach chuwach ri uxibʼirikil ri kamikal, rumal rech che man utz taj che ri areʼ kkanaj kan pa ri ukowinem ri kamikal;
rumal rech che ri David kubʼij puwiʼ ri Areʼ: Xinwil ri Ajawxel chnuwach ri in rumal rech che ri areʼ kʼo chunaqaj wikyaqʼabʼ, arech ri in man kubʼan ta kebʼ nukʼuʼx.
Rumal kʼuriʼ sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal kʼo ri wanimaʼ e sibʼalaj kkiʼkot ri waqʼ; e xoqujeʼ, ri nubʼaqil xas kkanaj na riʼ pa eyeʼbʼal
che man kaya ta kan riʼ ri wuxlabʼal pa ri Hades e man kaya ta bʼe riʼ che ri tyoxlaj awinaq ktzeletaj ri ubʼaqil.
Ri at, xakʼut chnuwach ri jetaq bʼe rech kʼaslemal, ri at kinanojisaj che kʼaslemal rukʼ ri awachbʼal».
«Eʼachalaxik, chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ bʼe chwech che kinbʼij we tzij chiwech riʼ: ri qatat David xkamik e xmuqik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa taq we qʼij riʼ ri ujul kʼo chqaxoʼl.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos e retaʼm che ri Dyos xuya utzij chrech che qastzij kok na che tʼuyulem cho ri utem jun rijaʼl ukikʼel,
majoʼq ri qʼij, xrilo e xchʼaw puwiʼ ri ukʼastajibʼal uwach ri Kristo, che ma xwonobʼax ta kan pa ri Hades, e ri ubʼaqil man xretaʼmaj taj ktzeletajik.
Ri Jesus riʼ, ri Dyos xuwaʼlajisaj uwach, xuchʼelej ri areʼ; e weriʼ ri uj xqilo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ nimalaj uqʼij pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos, e ukʼamom xas rukʼ ri Tatxel, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel che xjikibʼaxik ubʼixik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xutojij ri areʼ we jastaq riʼ che kiwilo e kita ri ix.
Rumal rech, che ri David man xpaqiʼ ta chikaj, kʼatekʼut ri areʼ kubʼij aqʼanchbʼil ribʼ: Ri Ajawxel xubʼij chrech ri Wajawxel: chattʼuyul pa ri wikyaqʼabʼ
chi kʼateʼ keʼinbʼano che ri eʼakʼulel keʼokik eʼutem ri awaqan».
«Qas utzalaj retaʼmaxik chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ ri rachoch ri Israʼel: Ri Dyos xubʼan Ajawxel e Kristo chrech ri Jesus riʼ, ri areʼ che ri ix xiripbʼa cho ri ripbʼal».
Aretaq chiʼ xkita weriʼ, kʼax kqʼatutik ri kanimaʼ e kkibʼij chrech ri Luʼ e chkech ri etaqoʼnelabʼ: «Eʼachalaxik, ¿jas rajawaxik kqabʼan ri uj?».
Ri Luʼ xubʼij chkech: «Chikʼexaʼ bʼaʼ ri ikʼaslemal, kʼatekʼuriʼ chi iwonojel chikʼamaʼ ri qasnaʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus Kristo, arech kyaʼtaj chi wech ri sachbʼal mak, e si kamik waʼ kikʼam ri usipanik ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Rumal rech che ri jikibʼam ubʼixik, chiwech ix yaʼom wi ubʼixik, xoqujeʼ jikibʼam ubʼixik chkech ri eʼiwalkʼuwaʼl e chkech konojel ri naj ekʼo wi e chkech konojel ri keʼusikʼij na ri Dyos».
Rukʼ sibʼalaj nikʼaj taq tzij chik keʼusikʼij e kubʼij chkech: «Chikolo bʼaʼ iwibʼ chkiwach we itzel taq ijaʼl riʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ che xkikʼam ri tzij, xqasax kijaʼ. Pa we jun qʼij riʼ xeʼok kukʼ eʼoxibʼ mil winaq.
Utzalaj utereneʼxik kkibʼano ri kitzij ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, kkikʼolo ri kkikochij, kkipiro ri wa triko e kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kokik e kʼo xibʼrikil pa ronojel kuxlabʼal ri winaq; rumal rech che ri etaqoʼnelabʼ kkibʼan kʼi taq kʼutbʼal e kʼi taq mayibʼal.
Konojel ri eʼareʼ che jun kikojonik, junam ukojik kkibʼano ronojel ri jastaq kech;
kkikʼayij ri kulew e ri jastaq kech, kkijach ri rajil chkixoʼl konojel jeriʼ jas ri rajawaxik chkech chkijujunal.
Ronojel taq qʼij kepe pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos rukʼ xa jun kanimaʼ, kkipir ri wa triko pa taq kachoch, rukʼ kiʼkotemal e rukʼ utzalaj kanimaʼ kkitij ri kiwa.
Nim kkil wi ri Dyos e ri eʼareʼ eʼutz chkiwach konojel ri winaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel taq qʼij, ri Ajawxel kerokisaj kukʼ ri Komon Tyox, ri kekoltaj na.
Ri Luʼ e ri Xwan kepe uloq pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos chuxeʼ kan ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos pa ri bʼelejebʼ kajbʼal.
Kkʼam ubʼi jun chʼokoʼ achi chi pa ri ralaxibʼal uloq, kya ronojel qʼij xas chuwach ukoq ri jun rokibʼal ri rachoch ri Dyos che ubʼiʼ Utzalaj Uchiʼja, arech aretaq chiʼ keʼok ubʼi ri winaq kel kikʼuʼx chrech ri areʼ.
Ri areʼ riʼ, keʼril ri Luʼ e ri Xwan aretaq chiʼ okem kkibʼan pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuta sin upwaq chkech.
Ri Luʼ utz rilik kubʼan areʼ, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kubʼan ri Xwan, e kubʼij chech: «Chujawilaʼ uloq».
Ri areʼ keʼukaʼyej e kuchomaj che xas kʼolik ri kukʼam na pakiqʼabʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ri in man kʼo ta saq nupwaq e qʼan nupwaq, kʼatekʼut, ri kʼo wukʼ kinya chawech: ¡pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus Kristo ri Ajnasoreʼo chatbʼinoq!».
Kukʼam ukoq che ri rikyaqʼabʼ uqʼabʼ e kuwaʼlisaj ri areʼ. Xas chanim utz ri raqan e ri ukux taq raqan;
kuxakʼpij uloq ribʼ, ktakʼiʼk, kʼatekʼuriʼ kumajij bʼinem. Kok ubʼi kukʼ ri eʼareʼ pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, tajin kbʼinik, tajin kutij anim e tajin nim kril wi ri Dyos.
Konojel ri winaq kkil ri areʼ che tajin kbʼinik e che tajin nim kril wi ri Dyos;
ketaʼm uwach ri areʼ, ketaʼm che qastzij are areʼ ri kuta sin taq upwaq, are areʼ ri ktʼuyiʼ ukoq chuwach ri Utzalaj uchiʼja. Kʼatekʼuriʼ xpe sibʼalaj xibʼrikil chkech e man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal we jastaq riʼ.
Rumal rech che ri areʼ man keʼuya ta chi kan ri Luʼ e ri Xwan; konojel enojinaq che xibʼrikil kkitij anim ubʼik kukʼ ri eʼareʼ cho ri uwija che ubʼiʼ Salomon.
Ri Luʼ, aretaq chiʼ kril weriʼ, kubʼij chkech ri winaq: «Achijabʼ ix ajisraʼel, ¿jas che kixibʼij iwibʼ chuwach weriʼ? ¿Jasche che kujikaʼyej jeʼ neʼ che rumal qachoqʼabʼ ri uj, on rumal qakojonik uj, xqabʼinisaj we achi riʼ?
Ri Udyos ri Abʼraham, ri Udyos ri Isaʼak e ri Udyos ri Jakobʼ, ri Dyos kech ri eqanan qatat xyaʼow ri uqʼij ri upataninel Jesus, ri areʼ che xijach ri ix, ri areʼ che xipaqchiʼj chuwach ri Pilato aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ uchomam chik che kutoʼtajisaj uwach.
Ri ix xipaqchiʼj ri Tyox ubʼantajik e ri utzalaj winaq; ri ix are xita ri toqʼobʼ puwiʼ ri jun kamisanel,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri ix are xikamisaj ri rajaw ri kʼaslemal, ri Dyos xuwaʼlajsaj ubʼi chkixoʼl ri kaminaqibʼ: ri uj xqil weriʼ.
E rumal ri kojonik chrech ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ, we jun achi riʼ, che kiwil ix, che iwetaʼm uwach, xyaʼtaj chrech ri uchuqʼabʼ; are ri kojonik che ri areʼ, ri xbʼanow utz che ri ubʼaqil we achi riʼ chiwach iwonojel ix.
«Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, ixachalaxik, ri in wetaʼm che xibʼan weriʼ rumal rech che man kichʼobʼ ta ri jastaq e xoqujeʼ ejeriʼ ri eʼinimal.
Ri Dyos, ri areʼ, xas xubʼan wi ri jastaq che xubʼij rumal ri kichiʼ konojel ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos; che ri Ukristo si kuqʼaxej na ri kʼax.
Chipaqchiʼj bʼaʼ ri imak e chikʼexaʼ iwibʼ, arech ksachitaj uwach ri imak,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ na kʼu waʼ weriʼ ri Ajawxel kukʼam na uloq riʼ ri qʼij che rech jaʼmaril. E kutaq na uloq riʼ ri Kristo iwech ri ix, che xas are ri Jesus,
ri areʼche kukʼol na ri kaj chi kʼateʼ na ri jun qʼij che kʼakʼ chi jumul ronojel kukʼol ronojel ri jastaq kʼo chuwach ulew; weriʼ, xubʼij ri Dyos rumal kichiʼ ri eʼutyoxlaj taq qaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Nabʼe, ri Moʼises xubʼij: Ri Ajawxel Dyos kuwaʼlajisaj na riʼ xas chkixoʼl ri eʼiwachalal ix, jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos jeʼ jas ri in, chitatabʼej ronojel ri tzij che kubʼij na riʼ chiwech.
Jachin ri man kutatabʼej ta we qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos riʼ, kkamisax riʼ xas chkixoʼl ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, xas xechʼaw riʼ chi rukʼ ri Samueʼl uloq e konojel ri xepetik jeʼ jas ri areʼ, xechʼaw puwiʼ we jetaq qʼij riʼ.
«Ix nakʼut, ri ix kikʼojol ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos e ix ukʼojol ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ rech ri Dyos ri xubʼan kukʼ ri inan itat aretaq chiʼ xubʼij chrech ri Abʼraham: Chi pa ri eʼawijaʼl ketewchiʼx na riʼ konojel ri ejuqʼat winaq rech ri uwachulew.
Qas chiwech ri ix xyaʼtaj nabʼe ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos che xukʼastajisaj uwach ri upataninel e xutaq uloq ri areʼ arech kixutewchiʼj we kipaqchiʼj ri iwetzelal ri ix».
Aretaq chiʼ tajin kechʼaw kukʼ ri winaq, kepe ri echuchqajawibʼ, ri kinimal ri echajil taq ri Nim rachoch ri Dyos e ri esaduseʼos,
sibʼalaj koyowal, man utz taj kkilo che ri eʼareʼ tajin kkikʼut ri tzij chkech ri winaq, e che kkibʼij ri kʼastajibʼal kiwach ri kaminaqibʼ chi pa ri uwinaqil ri Jesus.
Kekikʼam ubʼi ri eʼareʼ e kekikoj kan pa ri cheʼ chi kʼa pa ri jun qʼij chik, rumal rech che okinaq chi ri qʼequʼm.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼi chkech ri winaq che xetow ri kitzij, xekojonik chrech areʼ, e ri rejalabʼalil ri winaq che xekojonik, xaq xuwi ri achijabʼ, xopan pa jobʼ mil.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, kkimulij kibʼ pa ri Jerusalem, ri ekanimal ri ajjudiʼo, ri enim taq winaq e ri etzʼibʼanelabʼ.
Kʼo ri Anas, ri nimalaj chuchqajaw, kʼo ri Kaʼifas, ri Jonatan, ri Alejandro e konojel ri winaq che enim taq chuchqajawibʼ.
Kekiyaʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ panikʼaj chkech e kkita chkech: «¿Jas rumal kowinem on jachin pubʼiʼ kibʼan weriʼ ri ix?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ nojinaq chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kubʼij chkech: «Ix kinimal taq ri winaq e ri nim taq winaq,
