kamik riʼ, ri uj jeʼ jas uj kʼo chuwach jun qʼatbʼaltzij, rumal rech che ri uj xqabʼan ri utzil chrech jun yawabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, rajawaxik che kqabʼij jas ri ubʼantajik che utz xkanaj ri areʼ.
Utz che kiwetaʼmaj iwonojel, xoqujeʼ utz ketaʼmaj konojel ri winaq erech ri Israʼel: che pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesukristo ri ajnasoreʼo, ri areʼ che xiripabʼaʼ ri ix e che xukʼastajisaj uwach ri Dyos chkixoʼl ri kaminaqʼibʼ, pa ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ e man puwiʼ ta ubʼiʼ jun chik che we achi riʼ utz uwach kukʼut ribʼ chiwach.
Are areʼ ri abʼaj che ri ix, ix ajyakal taq ja man xiwaj ta uwach ri areʼ, e kamik riʼ are ri areʼ xokik che rajawalja.
Rumal rech che chuxeʼ ri kaj man kʼo ta chi jun bʼiʼaj che xyaʼtaj chkech ri winaq che kkowinik kujkoltaj rumal».
Ri winaq che eʼajsanedrin aretaq chiʼ kkil ri kichuqʼabʼ ri Luʼ e ri Xwan, kʼatekʼuriʼ ketaʼm che ri eʼareʼ ewinaq che man kiriqom taj kitijoj kibʼ e man nimalaj ta kibʼantajik, nimalaj ksach kikʼuʼx chkech. Ketaʼm che ri eʼareʼ xiltaj kiwach rukʼ ri Jesus,
xoqujeʼ kkil uwach ri jun achi che xkuntajik e takʼal chkinaqaj ri eʼareʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ man kekowin taj, man kuya taj kʼo jun tzij kkibʼij.
Xeʼkesaj ubʼi pa ri Sanedrin e kechoman chkij.
Kkibʼij chkixoʼl: «¿Jas ri kqabʼan na waʼ chkech we winaq riʼ? Xas kʼo wi jun nimalaj kʼutbʼal xbʼantaj kumal e sibʼalaj utz chkiwach konojel ri siwan tinimit rech ri Jerusalem, e ri uj man kujkowin taj kqabʼij chi jun jas uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, arech man kbʼe ta utzijol weriʼ chkixoʼl ri winaq, chqaqʼatej ri kitzij ri eʼareʼ rukʼ xibʼrikil, che michʼaw chi puwiʼ ri jun bʼiʼaj riʼ».
Keʼkisikʼij ri eʼareʼ e ketaqan chkech che man kechʼaw ta chik e man kekʼutun ta chi pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Luʼ e ri Xwan kechʼawik, kkibʼij chkech: «We are utz chuwach ri Dyos, che ri uj are kixqanimaj ix e are man kqanimaj ta ri Dyos; ri ix, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ weriʼ.
Ri uj man kujkowin taj che mat kqakʼutu ri jastaq che xqilo e che xqato».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiqʼatej chi ri kitzij rukʼ xibʼrikil; keʼkitzoqopij ubʼik rumal rech che man kkiriq taj jas jun kʼajisabʼal kiwach kkibʼano chi chkiwach ri winaq, rumal rech che konojel ri winaq nim kkil wi ri Dyos rukʼ ri jas uwach xbʼantajik.
Ri jun achi che xkunataj rukʼ ri jun mayibʼal wach riʼ, nim chik, kawinaq ujunabʼ chik.
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ ketzoqopitajik ubʼik, kepe uloq kukʼ ri ekiwinaq e kkibʼij chkech ronojel ri tzij ri xkibʼij ri enim taq chuchqajawibʼ chkech e ri xkibʼij ri enim taq winaq chkech.
Aretaq ktataj we tzij riʼ, konojel junam kkiyak ri kichʼabʼal chuwach ri Dyos e kkibʼij: «Ajaw, at xatbʼanow ri kaj, ri uwachulew, ri polow e ronojel ri kʼo chuwach;
ri at che abʼim rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri qatat David, ri apatanijel: ¿Jasche kkinimarisaj kibʼ ri jetaq eʼamaqʼ, jas che wa ri jetaq kichomabʼal ri enimalaj taq tinimit?
Ri eʼajaw rech we uwachulew kechʼoʼjinik, ri eqʼatbʼal taq tzij xa jun kiwach xkibʼano che ukʼuleʼlaʼx uwach ri Ajawxel e chukʼuleʼlaxik ri Kristo.
Jeʼ, qastzij nakʼut, che xa jun kiwach xkibʼan pa we tinimit riʼ, ri Herodes e ri Ponsiʼo Pilato kukʼ konojel ri jetaq amaqʼ che man kʼo ta kikojonik jacha ri uj, kukʼ ri winaq eʼajisraʼel, arech kechʼoʼjin rukʼ ri tyoxlaj apatanijel Jesus, ri xabʼan Akristo chrech,
arech, qastzij kbʼantaj ronojel ri jastaq uwach rukʼ ri achuqʼabʼ e rukʼ ri awetaʼmabʼal ri xas achomam kbʼantajik.
Kamik riʼ Ajawxel, qas chawilaʼ ri qʼilinik rukʼ xibʼrikil, ri xkibʼan chkech ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, qas chyaʼtaj bʼaʼ chkech ri eʼapatanijelabʼ, arech kkibʼij ri atzij rukʼ nimalaj kubʼal kʼuʼx,
chalikʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri aqʼabʼ arech kbʼantaj ri jetaq kunanik, ri jetaq kʼutbʼal e ri mayibʼal taq wach, chi pa ri ubʼiʼ ri tyoxlaj apatanijel Jesus».
Aretaq chiʼ tajin kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos; ri kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ kimulim wi kibʼ, sibʼalaj kbʼiririk; chi aninaq, konojel ri eʼareʼ enojinaq chi chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e kkiya ubʼixik ri utzij ri Dyos rukʼ nimalaj kubʼal kʼuʼx.
Ri tinimitlaj winaq che kʼo ri kikojbʼal, xa jun kanimaʼ kʼolik e xa jun kuxlabʼal. Man kʼo ta jun kubʼij rech che ri ujastaq kʼolik, xane ronojel ri jastaq, ri kimebʼil, kech konojel.
Rukʼ sibʼalaj kichuqʼabʼ; ri etaqoʼnelabʼ kkiya ubʼixik che xkilo ri kʼastajibʼal uwach ri Ajawxel Jesus. Konojel ri eʼareʼ, kʼo nimalaj toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach chkiwach ri winaq.
Chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun winaq che kʼo urajawaxik, rumal rech che konojel ri kʼo kulew, on ri kʼo kachoch, kkikʼayij e kkikʼam uloq chkixoʼl ri rajil,
kkiya xeʼkaqan kiqʼabʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ. Kkijach chkiwach konojel, chkijujunal kkiriqo jeʼ jas ri rajawaxik chkech.
Ri Xep, che Bʼernabʼe kecha ri etaqonelabʼ chrech, che pa qachʼabʼal kubʼij ukʼojol ri kulbʼal kʼuʼx, ri areʼ ajlevita, e ajchipre,
kʼo jun rulew, kukʼayij, kukʼam ubʼi ri pwaq e kuya xeʼkaqan kiqʼabʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ.
Jun achi, ubʼiʼ Ananiʼas, junam xkibʼan che ri kichomabʼal rukʼ ri rixoqil Safira; kukʼayij jun rulew;
kʼatekʼuriʼ kkanaj kan rukʼ nikʼaj chrech ri rajil ri ulew, e weriʼ retaʼm ri rixoqil; ri nikʼaj rajil chik kukʼam ubʼik e kuya xeʼkaqan kiqʼabʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ.
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Ananiʼas, ¿jasche che ri Satanas xunojisaj ri awanimaʼ arech kajaluj tzij chuwach ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e che katkanaj kan rukʼ nikʼaj rajil rech ri ulew?
Aretaq chiʼ kʼo ri ulew awukʼ; ri at, ¿la man kʼo ta ri akowinem puwiʼ e aretaq chiʼ xkʼayitaj awumal la man kuya taj kabʼan che ri rajil jas ri kawaj ri at? ¿Jasche xachomaj weriʼ pa ri awanimaʼ? Ri at, man chkiwach ta ri winaq xajaluj ri tzij, xane chuwach ri Dyos».
Aretaq chiʼ ktataj we tzij riʼ, ri Ananiʼas ktzaqik e kkamik. Konojel ri xetow we tzij riʼ keʼok pa nimalaj xibʼrikil.
Kepe ri ekʼojlabʼ, kkipis ri ubʼaqil pa jun atzʼyaq rech kaminaq e kkikʼam ubʼik arech kmuqik.
Qʼaxinaq chi oxibʼ kajbʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri rixoqil che man retaʼm ta weriʼ, qas kok ubʼik.
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Chabʼij chwech, ri ulew che xikʼayij ix, ¿la jeriʼ rajil xiyaʼo?». Ri areʼ kubʼij: «Jeʼ, jeriʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ kubʼij: «¿Jas ubʼanik xibʼan che ujunamtisaxik ri ichomabʼal arech kibʼan kʼax chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel? ¡Jeʼ! Jaʼleʼ, chuwach ri uchiʼja kʼo wi kan ri retal kaqan ri winaq ri xemuquw ri awachajil; xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ katkikʼam na ubʼi ri at».
Chi aninaq ktzaq cho ri raqan ri areʼ e xkamik. Keʼok ubʼi ri ekʼojlabʼ, kkiriq ri areʼ che kaminaq chik. Kkikʼam ubʼik e kkimuq chunaqaj ri rachajil.
Jun nimalaj xibʼrikil xchapow kanimaʼ konojel ri Komon Tyox xoqujeʼ konojel ri xketaʼmaj we jastaq riʼ.
Xas rumal ri etaqoʼnelabʼ xbʼantaj kʼilaj taq kʼutbʼal e kʼilaj taq mayibʼal chkiwach ri winaq. Kkimulij kibʼ konojel xa rukʼ jun kanimaʼ chuxeʼ ri uchiʼja rech ri Salomon,
kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta jun chkech ri enikʼaj winaq chik kʼo ri uchuqʼabʼ arech kbʼe kukʼ e arech xa jun kubʼan kukʼ eʼareʼ; ri winaq nim keʼkil wi ri eʼareʼ.
Ekʼo sibʼalaj winaq che kʼo ri kikojonik kebʼek, keʼok rukʼ ri Ajawxel; sibʼalaj ekʼi achijabʼ e ixoqibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas xeʼopan na che xekikʼam uloq ri eyawabʼibʼ pa taq ri bʼe, keʼkiya cho taq chʼat e cho taq tem, arech kneʼbʼaʼ xaq xuwiʼ ri umuʼj riʼ Luʼ, kbʼe puwiʼ jun chkech ri eʼareʼ.
Sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq kepe uloq pa taq ri tinimit che naqaj chrech ri Jerusalem, kekikʼam uloq ri eyawabʼibʼ e ri winaq che kʼo itzel taq uxlabʼal chkech; kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel keʼutzirik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kwaʼlaj ri nimalaj chuchqajaw, xoqujeʼ konojel ri eʼuwinaq, ri juqʼat kech ri esaduseʼo. Ri eʼareʼ kekam che koyowal.
Kkikoj kiqʼabʼ chkech ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e kekikʼyaq pa ri cheʼ kʼo pa ri tinimit.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ chaqʼabʼ, ri Anjel rech ri Ajawxel kujaq ri uchiʼja rech ri cheʼ, e aretaq chiʼ eʼukʼamom chi ubʼik, kubʼij chkech:
«Jix, jeʼibʼij rukʼ ichuqʼabʼ chkech ri winaq pa ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos, ronojel ri jastaq che rech we jun Kʼaslemal riʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ kkinimaj we tzij riʼ; keʼok pa ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ ksaqarsanik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkichapaleʼj ubʼixik ri tzij.
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼajchʼimiʼyabʼ keʼopan pa ri cheʼ, man kekiriqa taj. Ketzalijik e keʼkibʼij chkech:
«Ri uj, tzʼapatalik ri uchiʼja xqariqaʼ, e ri echajinel utz uchajixik kibʼanom, etakʼal chuwach ri uchiʼja rech ri cheʼ. E aretaq chiʼ, xqajaqo, man kʼo ta jun winaq xqariq chupam».
Ri ekinimal ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, e ri enim taq chuchqajawibʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkita we tzij riʼ, ksach kikʼuʼx, man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal weriʼ, e kkichomaj jas waʼ we kʼutbʼal riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kpe uloq jun winaq chkixoʼl e kubʼij chkech: «Ri eʼachijabʼ che xeʼiyaʼ ix pa ri cheʼ, chanim riʼ, ri eʼareʼ etakʼal pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos e tajin kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri Tzij chkech konojel ri winaq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri unimal chkech ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos kel ubʼi kukʼ ri eʼuwinaq e keʼukʼam uloq ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, e man kʼo ta kʼax kubʼan chkech, rumal rech che kkixibʼij kibʼ chkech ri winaq, rumal che kuyaʼo kekikʼyaq chaʼbʼaj.
Kekikʼam uloq e kekiyaʼ chkiwach ri Sanedrin. Ri nim chuchqajaw kuta chkech:
«Ri uj, xixqaqʼatej che kiya ubʼixik ri tzij pa ri ubʼi ri jun bʼiʼaj riʼ; ¡kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix xinojisaj ri Jerusalem chrech we itzij riʼ e ri ix kiwaj kichojej paqawiʼ ri uj ri ukikʼel ri achi riʼ!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ e ri enikʼaj etaqoʼnelabʼ chik kkibʼij: «Rajawaxik che are knimax ri Dyos chuwach che are kenimax ri winaq.
Ri jun Dyos che kech ri eqanan eqatat, xuwaʼlisaj uwach ri Jesus, ri areʼ, che xekamisaj ri ix aretaq chiʼ xibʼajij cho ri ripibʼal.
Che waʼ we jun winaq riʼ, ri Dyos xuwaʼlisaj rukʼ ri rikyaqʼabʼ, xrokisaj ri areʼ, kinimal e kolonel chkech ri winaq, arech rumal ri areʼ, ri Israʼel kupaqchiʼj ri umak e kukʼam ri nimalaj sachbʼal mak.
Ri uj xqilo, xqato ronojel we jastaq riʼ, weriʼ xoqujeʼ xrilo e xuto ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, ri areʼ che kuya ri Dyos chkech ri keniman chrech ri areʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkita weriʼ, kekam chrech koyowal e are sibʼalaj kkaj keʼkikamisaj ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun fariseʼo che ubʼiʼ Gamaliʼel, kwaʼlaj panikʼaj chkech ri Sanedrin; ri areʼ jun nimalaj ajtij chrech ri pixabʼ, e nim kilik kumal ri winaq. Ktaqanik arech keʼesax ubʼi jubʼiqʼ we eʼachijabʼ riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chkech ri Sanedrin: «Chi nimalaj iwonojel ix ajisraʼel, qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ ri kibʼan na chkech we winaq riʼ.
Kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij kanoq riʼ, xwaʼlaj uloq ri Teʼudas, ri areʼ che xubʼij che nimalaj ruxik chi winaq, e che xeʼumulij rukʼ areʼ juqʼoʼ (400) winaq. Xkamisax ri areʼ, e konojel ri eʼuwinaq che xkiterneʼbʼej, xeʼanimajik, e ma kʼo ta jun jas uwach xkanaj kanoq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa taq uqʼijil ri tzʼibʼan bʼiʼaj, xwaʼlaj ri Judas ri Ajgalileʼa, che ri kʼo sibʼalaj eʼuwinaq; xoqujeʼ xkamik e ri xkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ xeʼanimajik.
Kamik riʼ kinbʼij chiwech, kʼo mibʼan chkech we winaq riʼ, cheʼiyaʼaʼ kanoq. Rumal rech, we kkitzijoj riʼ, on we jun chak riʼ we petinaq kukʼ winaq, ksachataj na uwach waʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, we qastzij che petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Dyos, man kixkowin ta riʼ che usachik uwach. Mibʼan jun jas uwach, weneʼ ri ix tajin kixchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri Dyos». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkikʼam uqʼabʼ, utz xkita we tzij riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kekisikʼij chi jumul ri etaqoʼnelabʼ. Ketaqanik arech kerapux rukʼ asyar, keʼkiqʼatej arech man kechʼaw ta chi pa ri ubʼi ri Jesus, kʼatekʼuriʼ keʼkitzoqopij bʼik, kekiyaʼ kanoq.
Ri eʼareʼ keʼel ubʼik pa ri Sanedrin, rukʼ nimalaj kiʼkotemal kebʼe ubʼik rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ xeʼilik taqal chkij xkikʼaxkʼolij ri kʼax arech utz che ri Bʼiʼaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel taq qʼij, man ketaniʼ ta chrech ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo Jesus, pa ri Nimalaj Rachoch ri Dyos e pa taq ri ja.
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ, rumal rech che tajin kekʼyarik ri etijoxelabʼ, ri eʼajelenita xkikoj tzij chkij ri eʼajhebʼreʼo, rumal rech che ri emelkaʼn ixoqibʼ kech ri eʼajelenista man kelix ta pa ri kirajawaxik.
Ri ekabʼlajuj, kesikʼin chkech konojel ri etijoxelabʼ e kkibʼij chkech: «Man utz taj che ri uj kqatanabʼaʼ utzijoxik ri utzij ri Dyos rumal rech che are kujpatanajik cho taq ri mexa.
Rumal kʼu waʼ, chitzukuj chixoʼl ri ix, ix achalaxik, ewuqubʼ achijabʼ che eʼutz chkiwach nimalaj konojel, che enojinaq chrech ri Uxlabʼxel e chrech ketaʼmabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj keqakoj na waʼ chuwach we jun chak riʼ;
e ri uj kujkanaj kan waʼ chuwach ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos e chrech ri upatanaxik ri Tzij».
Utz kkita we tzij riʼ nimalaj konojel, xa jekʼuriʼ kkichaʼ ri Estebʼan, jun achi che nojinaq che ri ukojonik e che ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, xkichaʼ chi ri Felipe (Apal), ri Prokoro, ri Nikanor, ri Timon, ri Parmenas e ri Klax che Ajantiʼokiʼa, xane xpe uloq kukʼ ri Ajjudiʼo.
Xeʼkiyaʼ chkiwach ri etaqoʼnelabʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ tajin kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, kkikoj ri kiqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj kkʼiy ri Utzij ri Ajawxel. Sibʼalaj xekʼyarik ri etijoxelabʼ pa ri Jerusalem e sibʼalaj ekʼi chuchqajawibʼ xkinimaj ri kojonik.
Ri Estebʼan, nojinaq che utzil e chrech uchuqʼabʼ e kubʼan nimalaj taq mayibʼal e nimalaj taq kʼutbʼal chkixoʼl ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kepe uloq ri winaq rech ri jetaq Sinagoga ri kbʼix Libʼertas chkech, ri eʼajsirenense, e ri eʼajalejandrino, e kʼo jujun chik Eʼajsilisiʼa e Eʼajasiʼa. Kechʼaw tzurunem taq tzij rukʼ ri Estebʼan,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta kichuqʼabʼ chuwach ri unoʼjibʼal e chuwach ri ruxlabʼal ri areʼ.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, kkiya pwaq chkech ejujun taq achijabʼ, arech kkibʼij: «Ri uj xqato che ri areʼ xubʼij itzel taq tzij puwiʼ ri Moʼises e puwiʼ ri Dyos».
Kepe ri winaq chi nimalaj konojel, kepe ri enim taq winaq e ri eʼajtzʼibʼanelabʼ, man kʼo ta naʼtal chrech ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim kkiriqo, kkichapo e kkikʼam uloq chuwach ri Sanedrin.
Chilaʼ, ekʼo etzijtal taq winaq che kkiya ubʼixik weriʼ: «We jun winaq riʼ, man kataniʼ ta che ubʼixik itzel taq tzij puwiʼ we tyoxlaj kʼolbʼal riʼ e puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ.
Ri uj, qatom che kubʼij, che ri Je-sus, ri jun Ajnasareʼo, kuwilij na we kʼolbʼal riʼ e kujal na riʼ ri jastaq che uwuqxaʼnim kan ri Moʼises chqech».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri etʼuyul pa ri Sanedrin, kkikaʼyej ri areʼ, e kkil ri uwach che jeʼ jas ri uwach jun Anjel.
Ri nim chuchqajaw kuta chrech: «¿La tzij we tzij riʼ?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij. «Ix achalaxik e ix qatat, chitatbʼej weriʼ. Ri Dyos che rech ri qʼijil xukʼut ribʼ chuwach ri qatat Abʼraham, aretaq chiʼ kʼo ri areʼ pa ri Mesopotamiʼa, majoʼq kujeqebʼaʼ ribʼ pa ri Jaran,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chrech: Chayaʼaʼ kan ri atinimit e cheʼayaʼaʼ kan ri eʼawachalaxik, e jat pa ri tinimit che kinkʼut na riʼ ri in chawach.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ xuya kan ri kitinimit ri eʼajkaldeʼo e xjeqiʼ pa ri Jaran. Aretaq chiʼ xkam ri utat, ri Dyos xukʼam uloq chi jelaʼ uloq kʼa pa we tinimit riʼ jawijeʼ ix jeqel wi ix kamik riʼ.
Man kʼo ta jun chʼaqap rulew xuya pa we tinimit riʼ, man kʼo ta neʼ jawijeʼ kutakʼabʼa wi ri raqan, kʼatekʼut, xuya utzij che kuya na ri rulew, e xoqujeʼ kuya na kech ri erijaʼl, e aretaq chiʼ jeriʼ, ri areʼ man kʼo ta jun ralkʼuwaʼl.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos xubʼij chrech, che ri erijaʼl kekanaj kan riʼ pa jun chik ulew, e ri eʼareʼ keʼokisax na riʼ pa patanajik e kbʼan na sibʼalaj kʼax chkech pa juqʼoʼ (400) junabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼan na riʼ qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ ri jun tinimit riʼ, kcha ri Dyos. –E keʼel na uloq riʼ e keqʼijilan na riʼ chwech pa we jun kʼolibʼal riʼ.
Xoqujeʼ xuyaʼ chrech ri jun chapbʼalqʼabʼ rech ri pusinik uwiʼ kowilal, xajekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ xjeqebʼax ri Isaʼak rumal ri utat, ri Abʼraham xupus uwiʼ ri ukowil ri areʼ pa ri uwajxaq qʼij. Xoqujeʼ jeriʼ xubʼan ri Isaʼak chrech ri Jakobʼ, e ri Jakobʼ jeriʼ xubʼan chkech ri ekabʼlajuj enimalaj taq qatat.
Ri enimalaj taq qatat rumal che eʼachixom chrech ri Jose, xkikʼayij ubʼik arech kbʼe ubʼi pa Egipto; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos kʼo rukʼ ri areʼ,
xukol pa ronojel taq ri kʼax xuriqo, xuyaʼ ri nimalaj utzil chrech e ri nimalaj unoʼj chuwach ri Faraʼon, ri rajawinel ri Egipto, ri areʼ che xukojo qʼataltzij puwiʼ ri Egipto e puwiʼ ronojel ri rachoch.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xpe numik wiʼjal pa ronojel ri Egipto e pa ri Kanaʼan e xoqujeʼ xpe nimalaj kʼax; ri eqatat ma kʼo ta jun qas uwach kkiriqo arech kkitijo.
Aretaq chiʼ xketaʼmaj che kʼo wa pa ri Egipto, ri Jakobʼ xeʼutaq ubʼi nabʼe jumul;
pa ri ukamul, ri Jose xukʼut ribʼ chkiwach ri erachalal, e ri Faraʼon xretaʼmaj kiwach ri eʼuwinaq ri Jose.
Ri Jose xtaqan chech ukʼamik ri utat Jakobʼ e chkech konojel ri erijaʼl che kkibʼan oxkʼal joʼlajuj winaq.
Ri Jakobʼ xxuliʼ ubʼik pa ri Egipto e chilaʼ xkam wi e xoqujeʼ ri eqatat.
Xkʼam uloq ri kibʼaqil pa ri Sikem e xeya pa ri jun muqubʼal che uloqʼom kan ri Abʼraham rukʼ pwaq, chkech ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Jamor, ri utat ri Sikem.
«Aretaq chiʼ xnaqajqobʼik ri uqʼijil che qastzij kbʼantaj na ri tzij che xubʼij ri Dyos chrech ri Abʼraham, xekʼiyik ri siwantinimit e xpoqʼ kiwach pa ri Egipto.
Chi kʼateʼ aretaq chiʼ xok na jun kʼakʼ ajawinel che ma kʼo ta chi xnaʼtaj ri Jose chech.
We jun ajawinel riʼ itzel xchomanik pakiwiʼ ri eqanan qatat, chi xubʼan na arech ri eʼareʼ keʼkiwonbʼaʼ kan ri ekalkʼuwaʼl arech man kekʼasiʼ taj.
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ xaʼlax ri Moʼises; ri areʼ riʼ, kʼo nimalaj uchʼumilal chuwach ri Dyos. Oxibʼ ikʼ xkiʼysaxik, kʼo uwa pa ri rachoch ri utat;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xwonobʼax kanoq e ri umiʼal ri Faraʼon xusikʼ ubʼik e xukʼiysaj areʼ jeʼ jas ral.
Rukʼ weriʼ, ri Moʼises, xtijox pa ronojel ri kinoʼjibʼal ri eʼajegipto e xkʼojiʼ uchoqʼabʼ pa ri utzij e pa ri uchak.
«Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ, kʼo chi kawinaq ujunabʼ, xkʼastaj pa ri ujolom che keʼusolij na ri erachalal ri eʼajisraʼel.
Aretaq chiʼ xrilo che tajin kbʼan kʼax chrech jun chkech ri eʼuwinaq ri areʼ, xchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri jun ajegipto, e nimalaj utzil xubʼan chrech ri mebʼaʼ aretaq chiʼ xukamisaj ri jun ajegipto.
Ri areʼ xuchomaj, che ri erachalal kkichʼobʼ na riʼ, che ri Dyos kukʼam na uloq riʼ ri kolotajem chkech rumal ri uqʼabʼ ri areʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri erachalal man xkichʼobʼ ta weriʼ.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, xeʼrilo che tajin kechʼoʼjinik; kraj che junam kubʼan utz chkech. Kubʼij chkech: “xwachiʼl, ¿jasche che kibʼan kʼax chbʼil aqʼan taq iwibʼ?”.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che tajin kubʼan kʼax chrech ri rachiʼl, kpaqichiʼnik e kubʼij chrech: “¿Jachin xatbʼanow at atqanimal e atqatbʼaltzij paqawiʼ?
¿La xa kawaj kinakamisaj in, jeʼ jas ukamisaxik xabʼan ri jun ajegipto iwir?”.
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri Moʼises xanimaj ubʼik e xujeqebʼaʼ ribʼ pa ri tinamit Madiʼan, jawiʼ neʼ xekʼojiʼ ekebʼ ukʼojol.
Kawinaq junabʼ chik, jun anjel xukʼut ribʼ chuwach pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew che ujuyubʼal ri Sinaʼi, pa jun ujuluw qʼaqʼ, pa jun cheʼ che tajin kajininik.
Ri Moʼises, man xuchʼobʼ ta we jastasq riʼ. Aretaq chiʼ xqebʼ ukoq rukʼ ri cheʼ arech utz rilik kubʼan weriʼ, xuto ri uchʼabʼal ri Ajawxel:
“In ri Inkidyos ri eʼanan eʼatat, in ri Inudyos ri Abʼraham, ri Isaʼak e ri Jakobʼ”. Ri Moʼises kbʼirbʼitik chuwach weriʼ, e man kukochʼ taj kkaʼy apanoq chrech weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ajawxel kubʼij chrech: “Chawesaj le axajabʼ che le awaqan, rumal rech che we kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ attakʼal wi ri at, tyoxlaj ulew waʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in wilom ri kʼaxkʼol kkiriq ri enusiwantinimit pa ri Egipto, nutom ri kijuluwem e xinxuliʼ uloq chech kitoʼtajisaxik. Jat nakʼut, in katintaq ubʼi pa ri Egipto”.
«We Moʼises riʼ, ri are che xkikʼyaq apanoq aretaq chi xkibʼij chrech: ¿Jachin xatbʼanowik atqanimal e at qatbʼaltzij paqawiʼ ri uj? Ri Dyos xtaqow ubʼi ri areʼ jeʼ jas kinimal ri eʼareʼ e kolonel chkech, rumal ri jun anjel che xukʼut ribʼ chuwach pa ri alaj cheʼ.
Ri areʼ, xeʼeresaj ubʼik, rumal ri jetaq mayibʼal e ri jetaq kʼutbʼal xubʼan pa ri tinimit Egipto, ri xubʼan pa ri Kyaq Polow e pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew, chi pa kawinaq junabʼ.
Are waʼ ri Moʼises, ri areʼ che xubʼij chkech ri eʼajisraʼel: Ri Dyos kuwaʼlisaj na riʼ chkixoʼl ri eʼiwachalal jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos che jeriʼ jas ri in.
Pa ri mulin ibʼ pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew, ri areʼ xkʼojiʼ rukʼ ri Anjel, che xkʼamow ubʼik puwiʼ ri juyubʼ Sinaʼi e xkanaj kan kukʼ ri eqanan eqatat; ri areʼ che xukʼam ri tzij rech kʼaslemal arech kuqʼaxej chqech ri uj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eqanan qatat man xkaj taj xkinimaj utzij ri areʼ. Xane xkikʼyaq ubʼi ri areʼ, e pa kanimaʼ xas xetzalij pa ri Egipto,
kʼatekʼuriʼ xkibʼij chrech ri Aʼaron: Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ enikʼaj taq qadyos che kenabʼeʼaj chqawach; rumal rech, che ri Moʼises ri xujesan uloq pa ri Egipto, ri uj man kʼo ta qetaʼm puwiʼ jas xubʼano aretaq chiʼ xpaqiʼ puwiʼ le juyubʼ.
E xkitzʼaq jun alaj wakax pa taq we qʼij riʼ e xkibʼan jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ chuwach ri man tzij taj dyos, e xkikʼowisaj kiʼkotemal rumal ri jetaq kichak xkibʼan rukʼ kiqʼabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos xutas apan ribʼ chkech ri eʼareʼ e xeʼujach chuwach ri qʼijlanik rech taq ri chʼumil chikaj, jeriʼ jas tzʼibʼatalik pa ri kiwuj ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos: Ri ix, ¿la xiya chwech ri kaminaq taq chikop e ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ pa kawinaq junabʼ pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew, ri ix ix rachoch ri Israʼel?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix xikʼam ubʼi ri alaj ukabʼal ri Molok e ri uchʼumil ri dyos Refa xikʼam ubʼi jetaq wachibʼal che xibʼano arech kiqʼijilaj; xa jekʼu riʼ, ri in kixinkʼam na ubʼik, si naj chi na chrech ri Bʼabʼiloniʼa.
«Ri eqanan eqatat, pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew, kʼo ri Kabʼal kukʼ che rech ri Testimoniʼo, jeʼ jas xubʼij ri Jun che xchʼaw rukʼ ri Moʼises, aretaq chiʼ xtaqan chrech arech kubʼan ri areʼ, jeriʼ ri jastaq che xrilo.
Aretaq chiʼ xkikʼam chik, ri eqanan eqatat xkikʼam ubʼi aretaq chiʼ are kinimal ri Josuʼe e xkiʼokisaj pa ri amaqʼ che xechʼakan pakiwiʼ; we winaq riʼ, ri Dyos xeroqataj ubʼik chkiwach ri eʼareʼ; weriʼ jeriʼ chi kʼateʼ na pa taq ri uqʼijil ri David,
ri areʼ che utz chuwach ri Dyos e xuta ri toqʼobʼ arech kuriq jun ja arech kokik rachoch ri Jakobʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are ri Salomon ri xyakow ri jun rachoch.
Kneʼbʼaʼ, ri Nimalaj Ubʼantajik, man kjeqiʼ ta pa jun ja che bʼantajinaq rumal kiqʼabʼ winaq, jeʼ jas kubʼij ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos:
Ri kaj are nutem e ri uwachulew utoqʼbʼal waqan; ¿jas kʼu uwach ja riʼ kiyak na chwech? Kcha ri Ajawxel, on ¿jachike kʼolibʼal riʼ che nuwaribʼal?
¿La man are ta ri nuqʼabʼ xbʼanow ronojel weriʼ?
«Ri ix, man ktan ta ijolom, man tortobʼinaq ta ri ixikin e ri iwanimaʼ, chi amaqʼel kixxutun chuwach ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel; ejacha ri inan itat, xoqujeʼ ix jeriʼ ri ix!
¿Jachin jun ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos che man xkibʼan ta kʼax ri inan itat chrech? Xekikamisaj konojel ri xebʼinik ri upetbʼal ri Sukʼalaj winaq, ri Jun che pa taq we qʼij riʼ, ri ix xikamisaj,
ri ix che ikʼamom ri Pixabʼ rumal ri kichak ri anjelibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man xiterneʼbʼej taj».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, sibʼalaj kpe koyowal pa kanimaʼ e kkiquchʼuchʼej ri kiware puwiʼ ri Estebʼan.
Ri areʼ, nojinaq chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, kkaʼy chikaj, kril ri Uqʼijil ri Dyos e ri Jesus che takʼal pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij: «Ri in tajin kinwilo che tortobʼinaq ri kaj, e ri ukʼojol ri achi che takʼal pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos».
Kkiraqaqej kichiʼ e kkichʼuq ri kixikin, e pa junamam xebʼe chrij ri areʼ,
rukʼ chʼikimanik kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ tzaʼnja che ri tinimit e xkimajij ukʼyaqik che abʼaj. Ri xeʼilowik weriʼ, xkiyaʼ ri ratzʼyaq xeʼraqan uqʼabʼ jun ala che Saʼulo
Aretaq chiʼ tajin ukʼyaqik ri abʼaj chrij, ri Estebaʼan kubʼan we chʼawem riʼ: «Ajawxel Jesus, chakʼamaʼ paqʼabʼ we wuxlabʼal».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kqaj ri uchʼek e kubʼij pa jun nimalaj raqoj chiʼaj: «Ajawxel, makoj bʼaʼ we kimak riʼ pakiwiʼ». Aretaq xbʼitaj weriʼ, ri areʼ xwar ubʼik.
(a) Ri Saʼulo, ri areʼ, utz kril we kamisanik riʼ. 1(b) Chi pa we qʼij riʼ xmajtaj jun nimalaj kʼax puwiʼ ri Komon Tyox rech ri Jerusalem. Konojel keʼanimajik ubʼik, kebʼe pa taq ri Judeʼa, e pa taq ri Samariʼa, xuwi ri etaqoʼnelabʼ kekanaj kanoq.
Ejujun taq achijabʼ che kkiloqʼoqʼej ri Dyos, kkimuq ri Estebʼan e kkibʼan nimalaj oqʼej puwiʼ.
E ri Saʼulo, xubʼan nimalaj kʼax chrech ri Komon Tyox; xbʼe pa ronojel ja, xeʼukʼam ubʼi achijabʼ e ixoqibʼ rukʼ chuqʼabʼ e xeʼukʼyaq pa cheʼ.
Ri enikʼaj che xeʼanimajik, kebʼek e keʼkibʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij.
Xa jekʼuriʼ ri Felipe (Apal), xxuliʼ ubʼi pa jun tinimit rech ri Samariʼa, e kuyaʼ ubʼixik ri Kristo chkech ri winaq.
Ri winaq kkikʼulaj ri utzij xa rukʼ jun kanimaʼ, rumal rech che konojel kkita ri tzij puwiʼ taq ri kʼutbʼal xubʼano e ronojel ri kkilo.
Rumal rech che ekʼi ri itzel taq uxlabʼal keʼel ubʼi kukʼ ri winaq, ekʼi ri echaptal rumal ri itzel; e kkiraqaqej kichiʼ keʼel ubʼik. Xoqujeʼ sibʼalaj ekʼi ri kaminaq kibʼaqil e ri echʼokoʼ, kekunatajik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xkʼojiʼ sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal pa we jun tinamit riʼ.
Xas ojer chik kʼo pa we tinimit riʼ jun achi, Simon ri ubʼiʼ; ri areʼ kubʼan nimalaj taq subʼunik, e ri siwantinimit ekʼo pa ri Samariʼa xkil weriʼ jeʼ jas jun mayibʼal. Ri areʼ kubʼij che Nimalaj ri ubʼanik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel ri winaq, chi eʼalaj e chi enimaʼq kkiterneʼbʼem ri areʼ. Kkibʼij: «Waʼ we achi riʼ uchuqʼabʼalil waʼ ri Dyos, che Nimalaj kuchuxik».
Xas kkinimaj ri areʼ, rumal rech che kʼi qʼij utz xkil ri subʼanik kubʼano.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xekojon chrech ri Felipe che xubʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij chkech che rech ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos e rech ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus Kristo, xkimajij ukʼamik ri qasnaʼ chi achijabʼ e chi ixoqibʼ.
Xoqujeʼ ri Simon xkojon chrech weriʼ. Xukʼam ri qasnaʼ e xas man kuya ta chi kan ri Felipe; ri areʼ sibʼalaj utz kril ri kʼutbʼal e ri nimalaj taq mayibʼal xbʼantaj chuwach.
Aretaq chiʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ che ekʼo pa ri Jerusalem xkito che ri Samariʼa xkikʼam ri Utzij ri Dyos xeʼkitaq ubʼi ri Luʼ e ri Xwan kukʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ xexuliʼ uloq pa ri kitinimit ri eʼajsamariʼa, kʼatekʼuriʼ kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ, arech kyaʼtaj ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel chkech
rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ yaʼtajinaq chi chrech; xuwi kʼamatajinaq chi ri qasnaʼ kumal pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus.
Xa jeʼkʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ e ri Xwan kkikoj ri kiqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkikʼam ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Ri Simon, aretaq chiʼ krilo, che ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kyaʼtaj rumal rech ri ukojik kiqʼabʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, kuchiʼj ri pwaq chkech.
Kubʼij: «Xoqujeʼ chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ we kowinem riʼ chwech ri in, arech, ri jachin kinkoj na ri nuqʼabʼ puwiʼ xas kukʼamo ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Chakʼamaʼ ubʼi ri apwaq awukʼ, rumal rech che xachomaj che kaloqʼ ri usipanik ri Dyos rukʼ ri apwaq.
Pa we jastaq riʼ, ri at man kʼo ta awech chrech, xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta waʼ awechbʼal chrech, rumal rech che le awanimaʼ man sukʼ ta chuwach ri Dyos.
Chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ kan ri itzel achomabʼal riʼ e chatchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos arech kusach we jun chomanik riʼ che xel uloq pa ri awanimaʼ;
rumal rech, che ri in kinwilo che ri at, at kʼo pa ri kʼachaqijchiʼ e atyutulik pa ri itzel».
Ri Simon kubʼij: «Chixchʼawoq ix rukʼ ri Ajawxel panuwiʼ ri in, arech ma kpe ta panuwiʼ ri in ronojel ri jastaq che kibʼij riʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ, xyaʼtaj ubʼixik kumal ri jastaq che xkilo e aretaq xyaʼtaj ubʼixik ri Utzij ri Ajawxel; ketzelej ubʼik pa ri Jerusalem e kkibʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij pa kʼi taq kitinimit ri eʼajsamariʼa.
Ri anjel rech ri Ajawxel, kuchʼabʼej ri Felipe, kubʼij chrech: «Chatel ubʼik e jat chi pa ri kabʼlajuj kajbʼal pa ri bʼe che kxuliʼ ubʼik chi pa ri Jerusalem e kbʼe si kʼkusuk chi ubʼika pa ri Gasa; tzʼinalikalaj we kʼolibʼal riʼ».
Kel ubʼik e kbʼek; kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun menchoʼr ajetiʼopiʼa, che jun nimalaj qʼataltzij rukʼ ri Kandase, ri areʼ che ixoq ajawinel pa ri Etiʼopiʼa e che are takʼal puwiʼ ronojel ri upwaq ri tinimit; ri areʼ xubʼanaʼ jun ubʼinem chuwach ri Dyos pa ri Jerusalem,
tzalejem kubʼano, tʼuyulik cho ri uchichʼ e tajin kusikʼij ri Isaʼiʼas ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kubʼij chrech ri Felipe: «Jat e jariqaʼ le jun chʼichʼ leʼ».
Ri Felipe kutij anim xas rukʼ ubʼik ri areʼ, e kuto che ri menchoʼr achi, tajin kusikʼij ri Isaʼiʼas ri Qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos. Kuta chrech: «¿La kachʼobʼo ri jastaq che tajin kasikʼij?».
Ri areʼ kubʼij: «¿La kinkowin in che uchʼobʼik weriʼ, we man kʼo ta jun winaq kkʼutuw chnuwach?». Kʼatekʼuriʼ kumok ri Felipe arech kaqʼan ubʼik pa ri uchʼichʼ e ktʼuyiʼ chunaqaj ri areʼ.
Ri tzij che tajin kusikʼij ri areʼ are weriʼ: Jeriʼ jacha jun chij che xkʼam ubʼi pa ri kamsabʼal awaj, jeriʼ jacha jun alaj chij che mem chuwach ri tajin kusokaj rij, jeriʼ nakʼut ri areʼ, man kukʼabʼ ta uchiʼ che winik.
Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ wonobʼam kanoq, man xya ta bʼe chrech, arech utz sukʼil qʼatbʼaltzij kbʼan chrech. ¿Jachin kuriqaʼ na che kucholej ubʼixik weriʼ chkiwach ri erijaʼal? Rumal rech che ri ukʼaslemal xkʼam ubʼik, xbʼoq ubʼik pa ri uwachulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri menchoʼr achi kubʼij chrech ri Felipe: «Ri in kinta chawech, ¿jachin kʼuriʼ ri areʼ che kbʼix weriʼ puwiʼ rumal ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos? ¿Chi puwiʼ aqʼanchbʼil ribʼ ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos on puwiʼ jun chik winaq?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Felipe kutor ri uchiʼ, e rukʼ we tzij riʼ che rech ri Tyoxlaj Wuj, kuya ubʼixik chrech, ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Jesus.
Kkiterneʼm ubʼi ri bʼe, kʼatekʼuriʼ, keʼopan pa jun kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri jaʼ; ri menchoʼr achi kubʼij: «Waral kʼo jaʼ. ¿La kʼo jun jas uwach che kuqʼatej arech kqasax nujaʼ in?»
Kutakʼabʼaʼ ri chʼichʼ. Ekebʼ keqaj pa ri jaʼ, ri Felipe e ri menchoʼr achi. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kuqasaj ri ujaʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kel uloq pa ri jaʼ, ri Ruxlabʼxel ri Ajawxel kukʼam bʼi ri Felipe e ri menchoʼr achi, man kril ta chi jumul ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj kkiʼkotik xutaqej ri ubʼe.
Ri Felipe xopan pa ri Azoto; pa ri ubʼe, kubʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij pa ronojel tinimit che kuriqaʼ, e jeriʼ kopan pa ri Sesareʼa.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Saʼulo man kruxlabʼaj ta chi jun jas uwach, xane are ri itzel e ri kamikal pakiwiʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ri Ajawxel; kbʼek e kuriqaʼ ri Nim Chuchqajaw,
e kuta chrech nikʼaj taq wuj che tzʼibʼam uwach arech kukʼut pa taq ri Sinagogas kʼo pa ri Damasko, arech we kuriqaʼ jun winaq che rech ri Bʼe, chi achijabʼ on chi ixoqibʼ, eyutulik keʼukʼam ubʼik pa ri Jerusalem.
Kbʼe ubʼik, e aretaq chiʼ naqaj chik kʼo wi che ri Damasko; chi xatqeʼ jun chäj xpe uloq pa kaj e kusutij rij rukʼ ri usaqil.
Ktzaq cho ri ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuta jun chʼabʼal che kubʼij chrech: «Saʼulo, Saʼulo ¿jasche che ri at kabʼan kʼax chwech?».
Ri areʼ kuta chrech: «¿At jachin ri at Ajawxel?» Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «In ri in Jesus ri kabʼan kʼax at chrech.
Kʼatekʼut, chatwaʼlijoq, chatokoq pa ri tinimit e kbʼix na riʼ chawech jas uwach ri kabʼan na ri at».
Ri winaq che ebʼenaq rukʼ ri areʼ emem xetakʼiʼk pa ri bʼe rumal ri xibʼrikil; utz utatbʼexik ri chʼabʼal xkibʼano, kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta jun winaq kkil uwach.
Ri Saʼulo kwaʼlaj cho ri ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ ujaqom ri uwoqʼoch man kʼo ta jun jas uwach krilo. Xas che ri uqʼabʼ kkikʼam ubʼik ri areʼ e kokisaj ubʼik pa ri Damasko.
Oxibʼ qʼij man kkaʼy taj, man kwaʼ taj e man kʼo ta kuqumuj.
Kʼo kʼut pa ri Damasko jun tijoxel che Ananiʼas ri ubʼiʼ. Ri Ajawxel kusikʼij ri areʼ pa jun jas uwach che krilo: «Ananiʼas». kcha chrech. Kubʼij ri areʼ: «In kʼolik riʼ Ajawxel».
Ri Ajawxel kubʼij: «Chatel ubʼik e jat ubʼi pa ri sukʼ bʼe e chata ukoq utzijol pa ri rachoch ri Judas jun winaq che Saʼulo ri ubʼiʼ, e che ajtarso. Ri areʼ, tajin kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xril jun achi che ubʼiʼ Ananiʼas xok ubʼik e kukoj ri uqʼabʼ puwiʼ ujolom arech kutzalijsaj kʼakʼ taq uwoqʼoch chrech».
Ri Ananiʼas kubʼij: «Ajawxel, ri in sibʼalaj nutom utzijoxik we jun achi riʼ kumal ri winaq, xoqujeʼ nutom ronojel ri kʼax ubʼanom chkech ri etyoxlaj taq awinaq pa ri Jerusalem.
Ri areʼ kʼo waral kamik riʼ rukʼ nimalaj ukowinem kumal ri enimalaj taq chuchqajawibʼ, arech keʼuyut konojel ri kesikʼin chrech ri abʼiʼ».
Ri Ajawxel kubʼij chrech: «Jat na kʼut, rumal rech, che ri jun achi riʼ jun chukbʼal pa nuqʼabʼ arech kukʼam ubʼi ri nubʼiʼ chkiwach taq ri siwantinimit che man kʼo ta ri qakojonik kukʼ, chkiwach ri eʼajawibʼ e chkiwach ri eʼajisraʼel.
Ri in, kinkʼut na riʼ chuwach ronojel ri kʼax kuqʼaxej na ri areʼ arech nimalaj utz chrech ri nubʼiʼ in».
Ri Ananiʼas kel ubʼik, kok pa ri ja, kukoj ri uqʼabʼ puwiʼ ri Saʼulo e kubʼij chrech: «Saʼulo, wachalal, xinutaq uloq awukʼ ri Ajawxel, che are ri Jesus, che ri at xawil uwach pa ri bʼe jawijeʼ at petinaq uloq; xinutaq uloq arech ri at kkʼojiʼ kʼakʼ taq awoqʼoch e arech katnoj chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktzaq chi tza ri uwoqʼoch uloq jacha ukʼixal rij kar, e xkʼojiʼ kʼakʼ taq uwoqʼoch. E xas we uchanim riʼ xqasax ujaʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ kutij uwa e kkʼojiʼ kʼakʼ uchuqʼabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi uchanim kok chech ubʼixik ri Jesus pa taq ri sinagoga, kubʼij che ri Areʼ Ukʼojol ri Dyos.
Konojel ri ketowik ri areʼ ksach kikʼuʼx, man kkichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal weriʼ e kkibʼij: «¿La man are ta waʼ we jun winaq riʼ che pa ri Jerusalem sibʼalaj xubʼan kʼax chkech ri kkibʼij we jun bʼiʼaj riʼ, e la man xpe ta waral riʼ arech eyutulik keʼukʼam ubʼi ri eʼareʼ chkiwach ri enimalaj taq chuchqajawibʼ?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Saʼulo kʼo sibʼalaj uchuqʼabʼ e kuyojij kijolom ri eʼajjudeyibʼ che ekʼo pa Damasko aretaq chiʼ kukʼutu che ri Jesus are ri Kristo.
Sibʼalaj naj xkichʼij ri eʼajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkichomaj ukamisaxik.
Ri Saʼulo, kretaʼmaj weriʼ. Xoqujeʼ; xas laqʼabʼatal taq ri uchiʼ ri tinimit chi paqʼij e chaqʼabʼ arech kuyaʼo kkikamisaj ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri etijoxelabʼ, chi chaqʼabʼ kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ e kkiqasaj rukʼ kolobʼ pa jun chakach cho ri tapya.
Aretaq chiʼ xopan pa ri Jerusalem kraj kok kukʼ ri etijoxelabʼ, kʼatekʼut konojel ri eʼareʼ kkixibʼij kibʼ chech, ma kkikoj taj che ri areʼ xoqujeʼ jun tijoxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri Bʼernabʼe kukʼam ubʼik ri areʼ e kopan chkiwach ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e kubʼij chkech, jas rilik ri Ajawxel pa ri bʼe xubʼan ri Saʼulo e jas uchʼabʼexik xbʼanik, e ri utzalaj chʼawem xubʼan puwiʼ ri ubʼi ri Jesus pa ri Damasko.
Kbʼin kukʼ pa ri Jerusalem, rukʼ chuqʼabʼ kchʼawik pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel.
Kbʼe kukʼ ri eʼajhelenista e kujunamaj ri utzij kukʼ ri eʼareʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ kkaj kkikamisaj.
Ri etijoxelabʼ, aretaq chiʼ kketaʼmaj weriʼ, kkitzalejisaj ubʼik pa ri Sesareʼa e chilaʼ kkitaq ubʼik pa ri Tarso.
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ, ri Ekomon Tyox enojinaq che ri jaʼmaril pa ronojel ri Judeʼa, ri Galileʼa e pa ri Samariʼa; kkiyak kibʼ e kekʼiy che ri nimanik chrech ri Ajawxel e sibʼalaj enojinaq che ri ukubʼsibʼal ukʼuʼx ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Ri Luʼ, che xas kutzalij uwach ronojel kʼolibʼal, xoqujeʼ kqaj ubʼik pa ri kachoch ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri Lida.
Chilaʼ kuriq jun achi che ubʼiʼ Eneʼas, jilinik cho jun chʼat chi wajxaqibʼ junabʼ uloq; ri areʼ kaminaq ri ubʼaqil.
Ri Luʼ kubʼij chrech: «Eneʼas, ri Jesus Kristo katukolo. Chatwaʼlijoq e chabʼanaʼ utz che le achʼat». Xas chanim kwaʼlajik.
Konojel ri siwantinimit rech ri Lida e rech ri liʼaʼnik Saron, kkil ri areʼ e kkikʼex kikʼuʼx chuwach ri Ajawxel.
Kʼo pa ri Joppe chkixoʼl ri etijoxelabʼ jun ixoq che ubʼiʼ Tabʼita, pa ri chʼabʼal griʼego Dorkas kchaʼ. Ri areʼ sibʼalaj qʼinomalaj winaq, rumal ri utzalaj taq jastaq kubʼano e rumal ri pwaq che kuyaʼ pa sipanik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ kyabʼinik pa taq we qʼij riʼ e kkamik. Aretaq chiʼ xchʼajtajik, kya chikaj pa ri ukabʼ aqʼanbʼal ja.
Rumal che ri Lida naqaj kʼo wi chrech ri Joppe; aretaq chiʼ ri etijoxelabʼ kketaʼmaj che ri Luʼ kʼo chilaʼ, keʼkitaq ubʼi kebʼ achijabʼ arech kkita weriʼ chrech: «Saʼj chi kamik uloq pa we qatinimit».
Ri Luʼ, xas chanim kbʼe ubʼi kukʼ. Aretaq chiʼ kopanik, chi chanim kkikʼam ubʼik pa ri ukabʼ aqʼanbʼal ja, jawijeʼ ekʼo wi ri emalkaʼnibʼ ixoqibʼ che tajin keʼoqik, keqebʼ rukʼ e kkikʼut chuwach ri jetaq atzʼyaq e ri jetaq kʼul xubʼan ri Dorkas aretaq chiʼ kʼo ri areʼ kukʼ.
Ri Luʼ keʼeresaj uloq konojel ri winaq, kxukiʼk e kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkaʼy che ri kaminaq bʼaqilal e kubʼij: «Tabʼita, chatwaʼlijoq 143». Ri areʼ, kujaq ri uwoqʼoch, e aretaq chiʼ kril ri Luʼ ktʼuyiʼ uloq.
Ri Luʼ kuchap ukoq chrech ri uqʼabʼ e kuwaʼlisaj ri areʼ. Keʼusikʼij ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, ri emalkaʼnibʼ ixoqibʼ e kukʼut chkiwach che ri areʼ kʼaslikalaj winaq.
Weriʼ, xetaʼmaxik pa ronojel ri Joppe, e sibʼalaj ekʼi ri xekojon chrech ri Ajawxel.
Ri Luʼ kkanaj kan kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij pa ri Joppe, pa ri rachoch ri Simon che jun winaq ajqʼolol tzʼum.
Pa ri Sesareʼa, kʼo jun achi che Korneliʼo ri ubʼiʼ; ri areʼ kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal eʼajchʼoʼjabʼ pa ri Roma.
Ri areʼ kbʼe kukʼ ri ajjudiʼo che uterneʼxik ri Dyos, e xoqujeʼ jeʼ jas konojel ri eʼuwinaq, ri areʼ kuya sibʼalaj sipanik chrech ri kitinimit ri eʼajjudiʼo e sibʼalaj kubʼan uchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kril pa ri ubʼelej kajbʼal paqʼij, saqalaj rilik kubʼano che ri Anjel rech ri Dyos kok pa ri rachoch e kusikʼij ri areʼ: «Korneliʼo».
Ri areʼ kukaʼyej e sibʼalaj kuxibʼij ribʼ. Kubʼij: «¿Jas waʼ weriʼ Ajawaxel?». –Ri anjel kubʼij: «Ri achʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos e ri asipanik, xpaqiʼ ubʼik chuwach ri Dyos jeʼ jas jun naʼtisabʼal awech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ cheʼataqaʼ ubʼik enikʼaj achijabʼ pa ri Joppe, e chtaqaʼ ukʼamik uloq ri Simon ri kbʼix Luʼ chrech arech kpe waral.
Ri areʼ uwuqxaʼnim ribʼ pa ri rachoch jun achi ubʼiʼ Simon, ri areʼ ajqʼolol tzʼum che kʼo ri rachoch chuchiʼ ri polow».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼe ubʼi ri anjel che ri xchʼaw rukʼ, ri Korneliʼo keʼusikʼij ekebʼ upataninelabʼ e jun soldado che kbʼe kukʼ ri ajjudiʼo, we areʼ riʼ jun chkixoʼl ri epatanijel rech,
kuya ubʼixik chkech ronojel ri xrilo e keʼutaq ubʼi pa ri Joppe.
Pa ri jun qʼij chi aqʼanoq, aretaq chiʼ ebʼenaq e naqaj chik ekʼo wi chrech ri tinimit, ri Luʼ kaqʼan puwiʼ ri ja pa ri uwaq kajbʼal arech kubʼan ri uchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Xunaʼ numik e kraj kutij uwa. Aretaq chiʼ tajin kbʼan ri uwa xril weriʼ.
Krilo che jaqalik ri kaj, e kʼo jun nimalaj usuʼtal uwach mexa che yutʼulik che ri kijebʼ utzaʼm e che qajem kubʼan uloq chuwachulew.
Chuwach ri jun suʼt riʼ kʼo ronojel kiwach chikop che kijebʼ kaqan, ekʼo kumatz e ronojel kiwach ri chikop eʼajuwokaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chʼabʼal kubʼij chech: «Luʼ, chatwaʼlijoq, chakamisaj jun chkech ri chikop e chatijaʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Luʼ kubʼij: «¡Jayiʼ Ajawxel, rumal rech che ri in man kʼo ta jumul nutijom jun tzʼil e jun jas uwach che man sukʼ taj!».
Ri jun chʼabʼal pa ukamul kubʼij chrech: «Ri jastaq che usukʼubʼam ri Dyos, man bʼij bʼaʼ tzʼil at chrech».
Weriʼ, oxmul xbʼantajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ chi aninaq xpaqibʼax ri jun suʼt chikaj.
Ri Luʼ sibʼalaj sachinaq ukʼuʼx, man kuchʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal weriʼ e tajin kuchomaj jas ubʼeʼal riʼ ri xrilo; aretaq chiʼ ri achijabʼ che etaqom ubʼi rumal ri Korneliʼo, aretaq chiʼ tzukutajinaq chi kumal ri rachoch ri Simon, xeʼopan chuwach ri uchiʼja.
Kekʼorkʼotik ukoq e kkita koq la kʼo chilaʼ ri Simon ri kbʼix Luʼ chrech.
Rumal che ri Luʼ tajin kchoman puwiʼ ri xrilo, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kubʼij chrech: «Ekʼo chiriʼ enikʼaj achijabʼ che katkitzukuj.
Jat bʼaʼ, chatqaj ubʼik e utz che katbʼe ubʼi kukʼ, rumal rech che in eʼintaqowinaq uloq».
Ri Luʼ xqaj uloq kukʼ ri achijabʼ riʼ e kubʼij chkech: «In riʼ jun che kitzukuj ri ix. ¿Jasche che xixpe uloq waral?».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij: «Ri kʼamalbʼe Korneliʼo che jun sukʼlaj winaq e che utzalaj winaq chuwach ri Dyos, chi kʼamom uqʼabʼ che xas jewi ri areʼ; rumal rech che konojel ri tinimit eʼajjudiʼo jeriʼ kkibʼij; che xas utz wi ri areʼ; ri areʼ xukʼamowaj ri tzij chi chrech jun anjel arech ri areʼ kutaq asikʼixik ri at pa ri rachoch, arech kuta ri tzij che xas at wi rajawaxik katbʼinik».
Ri Luʼ kerokisaj pa ri rachoch e keʼupatanij. Pa ri jun qʼij chik, kwaʼlajik e kbʼe bʼi kukʼ, kebʼe ubʼi rukʼ ejujun eʼachalaxik che eʼajjope.
Pa ri jun chik qʼij kok pa ri Sesareʼa. Ri Korneliʼo ereyeʼm. Xeʼumulij ri erachalaxik e ri eʼutzalaj taq erachiʼl.
Aretaq chiʼ okem kubʼan ri Luʼ, ri Korneliʼo xukʼuluʼ, kqaj cho ri raqan e kuqʼijilaj ri areʼ.
Ri Luʼ kuwaʼlisaj e kubʼij chrech: «Chatwaʼlijoq. Ri in, xoqujeʼ xaq in jun winaq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ tajin ktzijon rukʼ kok ubʼik pa ja, kʼatekʼuriʼ keʼuriqaʼ ekʼi winaq che kimulim kibʼ;
kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix iwetaʼm che man yaʼtal ta chrech jun ajjudiʼo che kkʼojiʼ rukʼ jun kaxlan winaq e che kok pa ri rachoch. Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, ri Dyos xukʼut chnuwach ri in, che man kbʼix ta tzʼil on man sukʼ taj, chrech jun winaq.
Rumal kʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ xinsikʼixik man xubʼan ta kebʼ nukʼuʼx che kinpe uloq. Kinta bʼaʼ chiwech ¿jas rumal xitaq nusikʼixik?».
Ri Korneliʼo kubʼij: «Kubʼan oxibʼ qʼij kamik riʼ, ri in tajin kinbʼan ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos pa ri bʼelej kajbʼal pa ri wachoch, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi xaqteʼ xkʼojiʼ chnuwach jun achi che kʼo ratzʼyaq che kchubʼlinik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chwech: “Korneliʼo, xtataj ri achʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, e xnaʼtaj ri asipanik chuwach ri Dyos,
chattaqan bʼaʼ ubʼik pa ri Joppe arech kkʼam uloq ri Simon ri kbʼix Luʼ chrech; ri areʼ uwuqxaʼnim ribʼ pa ri rachoch ri Simon ri ajqʼolol tzʼum, chunaqaj ri polow”.
Chi aninaq xintaqan ubʼik che ri akʼamik uloq; e ri at, utz xabʼano che xatpetik. E kamik riʼ, qonojel ri uj, uj kʼo chawach at, arech kqata ri pixabʼ che bʼim chawech rumal ri Ajawxel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ kubʼij: «Qastzij nakʼut kinwilo, kinchʼobʼo che ri Dyos man kril ta na kiwach ri winaq,
xane pa ronojel tinimit, jachin kuxibʼij ribʼ chuwach ri areʼ e kubʼan ri sukʼil, utzalaj winaq riʼ chuwach ri Areʼ.
Ri areʼ xutaq uloq ri utzij chkech ri eʼajisraʼel, xuya ubʼixik chkech ri utzlaj tzij rech jaʼmaril rumal ri Jesukristo, ri areʼ che Ajawxel chkech konojel winaq.
Ri ix iwetaʼm ri xkʼulmataj pa ronojel ri Judeʼa. Ri Jesus che Ajnasaret, xuchapaleʼj ubʼanik pa ri Galileʼa, aretaq chiʼ ri Xwan xyaʼtaj ubʼixik rumal ri qasnaʼ,
jeʼ jas ri Dyos xuya chech ri areʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel rech ri uchuqʼabʼ, ri areʼ xqʼaxik e xubʼan ri utzil e xeʼukunaj konojel ri jachintaq kʼo ukowinem ri kʼaxtokʼ pakiwiʼ; rumal rech che kʼo ri Dyos rukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, uj ril rech, uj tal rech ronojel ri jastaq uwach che xubʼan pa ri kitinimit ri eʼajjudiʼo e pa ri Jerusalem. Ri areʼ, xkamisaxik, xokisax cho jun ripibʼal.
Ri Dyos xuwaʼlisaj ri areʼ pa ri urox qʼij e xuya chrech che kukʼut ribʼ.
Man chkiwach ta konojel ri winaq, xane chkiwach ri eʼareʼ ri eril rech ri etal rech che xas echaʼtal chi kanoq rumal ri Dyos, chqawach uj che xujwaʼ rukʼ e xujqumun rukʼ aretaq chiʼ waʼlajinaq chi ubʼi chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xtaqan chqech arech kqayaʼ ubʼixik chkech ri winaq; e kqakʼutu che ri areʼ okisam rumal ri Dyos qʼatbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ ri ekʼaskʼoj e pakiwiʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Konojel ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos kibʼim che konojel ri kekojon chrech ri Areʼ, kkikʼam na riʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ ri sachbʼal taq umak».
Aretaq chiʼ tajin kchʼaw ri Luʼ, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel xtzaq uloq pakiwiʼ konojel ri tajin kkita ri tzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel ri kʼo kikojonik che qʼatom uwiʼ ri kikowil, che epetinaq uloq rukʼ ri Luʼ, sachibʼal kʼuʼx kekanajik aretaq chiʼ kkilo che ri usipanik ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel xqʼejejexik pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ che man pusim ta uwiʼ ri kikowil.
Rumal rech che kkito che ri eʼareʼ kechʼaw pa taq kʼi chʼabʼal e che kkibʼij nimalaj taq utzil puwiʼ ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Luʼ kubʼij:
«¿La kʼo jun kkowinik che man kuya ta ri qasnaʼ chkech we eʼareʼ riʼ che xkʼamtaj ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kumal jeʼ jas ri uj?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktaqanik arech kya ri qasnaʼ chkech pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesukristo. Xas chanim kkita chrech, arech ri areʼ kkanaj kan kukʼ kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij.
Ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e ri eʼachalaxik che eʼajjudeʼa, ketaʼm che ri winaq che man pusim ta uwiʼ ri kikowil xkikʼam ri utzij ri Dyos.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Luʼ xpaqiʼ uloq pa ri Jerusalem, ri winaq che pusim uwiʼ kibʼaqil, kechʼoʼjin rukʼ 158.
Kkita chech: «¿Jasche, che ri at xatok kukʼ ri winaq che man pusim ta uwiʼ ri kikowil e xatwaʼ kukʼ?».
Ri Luʼ, chjujunal kubʼij chkech ronojel ri jastaq.
Kubʼij: «Ri in tajin kinchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pa ri tinimit Joppe aretaq chiʼ xinwil weriʼ pa ri wuxlabʼal: jun jas uwach kqaj uloq chi pa ri kaj uloq jeʼ jas jun suʼt uwiʼ mexa che yutʼulik pa ri kijebʼ utzaʼm, kʼatekʼuriʼ xopan chnuwach in.
Sibʼalaj xinkaʼyej weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xinwil chikop erech we uwachulew che kʼo kijebʼ kaqan, xinwil eʼawaj che erech ri juyubʼ, ri ekumatz e ri echikop ajuwokaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinta jun chʼabʼal che xubʼij chwech: “Luʼ, chatwaʼlijoq, chakamisaj jun awech e chatijaʼ”.
Ri in xinbʼij: “¡Jayiʼ, Ajawxel, rumal rech che man kʼo ta jumul okinaq jun tzʼil on jun man sukʼil taj pa nuchiʼ!”.
Pa ukamul chik ri jun chʼawibʼal chikaj xubʼij chwech: “Ri jas uwach che sukʼ kubʼan ri Dyos chrech, mabʼij at chrech che man sukʼ taj”.
Weriʼ si oxmul xubʼano, kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ukʼisbʼalil ronojel xbʼe chi chikaj.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim xeʼopan oxibʼ achijabʼ cho ri ja jawijeʼ ujkʼo wi ri uj; etaqom uloq chi pa ri Sesareʼa uloq.
Ri Ajawxel xubʼij chwech che utz kinbʼe in kukʼ. Ri ewaqibʼ eʼachalaxik che eʼajchilaʼ, xoqujeʼ xebʼe wukʼ e xujok pa ri rachoch ri achi riʼ.
Xubʼij chqech, jas rilik ri anjel xubʼano che xukʼut ribʼ pa ri rachoch e xubʼij chrech: “Chattaqan ubʼik che ukʼamik uloq pa ri Joppe ri Simon, che kbʼix Luʼ chrech.
Ri areʼ kubʼij na riʼ chawech ri tzij che kuya na ri kolobʼal chawech ri at e chkech konojel ri eʼawachalaxik”.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ nuchapleʼm ri nutzij in, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel xqaj pakiwiʼ, jeʼ jas uqajik xubʼan paqawiʼ ri uj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, xnaʼtaj chwech ri tzij che xubʼij ri Ajawxel: Ri Xwan xuyaʼ ri qasnaʼ rukʼ ri jaʼ, kʼatekʼut ri ix kqasax na ijaʼ pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Xajekʼuriʼ, we ri Dyos, junam uyaʼik xubʼan chkech jacha xubʼan chqech ri uj, rumal rech che xekojon chrech ri Ajawxel Jesukristo, ¿In jachin kʼu ri in arech kinkʼuleʼlan chrech ri Dyos?».
Utz xkita we tzij pa kanimaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, nim kkil wi ri Dyos e kkibʼij: «Xoqujeʼ, chkech ri winaq che man pusim ta uwi kikowil, ri Dyos xubʼano che kkikʼex ri kikʼuʼx arech kʼo ri kikʼaslemal!»
Ri winaq, che xeʼanimajik aretaq chiʼ xriqitaj ri kʼax rukʼ ri Estebʼan, kebʼe chi kʼateʼ na pa ri Fenisiʼa, pa ri Chipre e pa ri Antiʼokiʼa; e man kkiya ta ubʼixik ri tzij chkech enikʼaj winaq chik, xane xuwi chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Kʼatekʼut, ekʼo kukʼ ejujun taq eʼajchipre e eʼajsirene che epetinaq uloq pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, e ri eʼareʼ ketzijon kukʼ ri eʼajgriʼego e kkiya ubʼixik chkech ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Ajawxel Jesus.
Ri uqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel kʼo kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ekʼi ri xekojonik e xkikʼex kikʼuʼx rukʼ ri Ajawxel.
Ri Komon Tyox rech ri Jerusalem kkita utzijol weriʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ kkitaq ubʼik ri Bʼernabʼe pa ri Antiʼokiʼa.
Aretaq chiʼ kopan chilaʼ e kril ri nimalaj usipanik ubʼanom ri Dyos chilaʼ, kkiʼkotik e kuya kichuqʼabʼ konojel, arech qas rukʼ ukowil kanimaʼ kekʼojiʼk e qas esukʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel,
rumal rech che ri areʼ jun utzalaj achi, nojinaq chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e chrech ukojonik. Sibʼalaj winaq xeʼokik, xkimulij kibʼ rukʼ ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Bʼernabʼe kbʼe ubʼik che ukʼamik uloq ri Saʼulo chi pa ri Tarso uloq.
Kuriqaʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukʼam ubʼi pa ri Antiʼokiʼa. Xas ronojel jun junabʼ, junam kekanaj kan kukʼ ri Komon Tyox e kkiya ubʼixik ri tzij chkech sibʼalaj ewinaq. Waral pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, chi nabʼe mul, ri etijoxelabʼ xkikʼam ri jun bʼiʼaj «ekristiʼano».
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ, enikʼaj taq eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, kexuliʼ uloq chi pa Jerusalem uloq e keʼopan pa ri Antiʼokiʼa.
Jun chkech ri eʼareʼ, Agabʼo ri ubʼiʼ, kwaʼlajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, kuya ubʼixik che kpe na jun nimalaj wiʼjal pa ronojel ri uwachulew. We wiʼjal riʼ rukʼ ri Klaʼudiʼo kpe na wi.
Ri etijoxeʼlabʼ, xkichomaj che utz riʼ ktaq ubʼiʼ nikʼaj taq sipanik chkech ri eʼachalaxik ri ekʼo pa ri Judeʼa, ronojel ri kekowin chrech;
jeriʼ xkibʼano; xkitaq ubʼi ri sipanik chkech ri enim winaq kukʼ ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Saʼulo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kʼo weriʼ, ri ajawinel Herodes, kukoj uqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ ejujun taq winaq che erech ri Komon Tyox arech kubʼan kʼax chkech.
Kukamisaj ri Santiʼago rukʼ ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj, ri areʼ che rachalal ri Xwan.
Aretaq chiʼ krilo, che weriʼ kqaj chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, xoqujeʼ kuchap ri Luʼ. Weriʼ xkʼulmatajik pa jun qʼij rech ri kaxlanwa che man kʼo ta uchʼamilal.
Kubʼano che kchapik e kukʼyaq pa cheʼ. Kuya pakiqʼabʼ ekijebʼ juqʼat achijabʼ che erech chʼoʼj, ekijebʼ achijabʼ pa jujun taq juqʼat, arech kkilaqʼabʼej ri areʼ. Kraj che kukʼut ri areʼ chkiwach ri winaq aretaq kokʼow ri Qʼaxebʼal.
Aretaq chiʼ laqʼabʼatalik ri Luʼ pa ri cheʼ, ri Ekomon Tyox, sibʼalaj kechʼaw rukʼ Dyos puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are ri jun chaqʼabʼ chuxeʼ kanoq ri jun qʼij che ri Herodes kukʼut chkiwach ri winaq; ri Luʼ warinaq panikʼaj chkech ri achijabʼ che erech chʼoʼj; jattʼim rumal kebʼ chʼichʼ e chuwach ri uchiʼja, ekʼo chi kebʼ winaq che kilaqʼabʼem pa ri cheʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi xaqateʼ, ri anjel rech ri Ajawxel kpetik e knoj ri upaja che sibʼalaj saqil. Ri anjel kuya jun re ri Luʼ pa ri ukʼalkʼaʼx, kuwaʼlisaj e kubʼij chrech: «¡Xas chanim chatwaʼlijoq!». E ri utiqom ribʼ taq chʼichʼ ktzaq ubʼi che ri uqʼabʼ.
Ri anjel kubʼij chrech: «Chaximaʼ ri apam e chakojlaʼ ri axajabʼ»; ri areʼ kubʼan weriʼ. Kubʼij chik: «Chakʼeqalaʼ ri aqʼuʼ chawij e chinaterneʼbʼej ubʼik».
Ri Luʼ kel ubʼik, uterneʼbʼem ubʼi ri areʼ e man kuchomaj taj che we qastzij waʼ ronojel weriʼ, ri rumal che xpe ri anjel, xane kuchomaj che kʼo jun tajin krilo.
Kkiqʼaxej jun nabʼe kʼolibʼal che laqʼabʼatalik e xoqujeʼ ri ukabʼ; e keʼopan chuwach ri jun chʼichʼilaj uchiʼja che kbʼe chuwach ri tinimit. Ri uchiʼja kujaq ribʼ chkiwach. Keʼel uloq, kebʼek chi jawiʼ kkʼis wi ri jun bʼe, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri anjel kuya kan ri areʼ.
Chi chanim pa rax winaq kchoman ri Luʼ e kubʼij: «Chi kamik riʼ, ri in, qastzij xinwetaʼmaj che are ri Ajawxel xutaq uloq ri anjel e xinresaj ubʼi pa ri uqʼabʼ ri Herodes e pa ronojel ri kkaj ri eʼajjudiʼo».
Saq chi chuwach e retaʼm chik ri riqitajinaq wi, kbʼe pa ri rachoch ri Mariʼy, ri unan ri Xwan, che Markos kuchuxik ri jun chik ubʼiʼ, jawijeʼ kimulin wi kibʼ e tajin kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kkʼorkʼot ukoq che ri uchiʼja, e are jun mokom kpe uloq che utorik, che ubʼiʼ Rode.
Ri areʼ retaʼm ri uchʼabʼal ri Luʼ e rumal che sibʼalaj kkiʼkotik man xutor ta ri uchiʼja, xane xutij anim, xok ubʼik che ubʼixik, che ri Luʼ kʼo chik chilaʼ cho ri uchiʼja.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ri at, at mox», kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ chi utz ubʼixik kubʼano che qastzij weriʼ. Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij: «¿La are ne lo ri anjel rech areʼ?».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Luʼ, kkʼorkʼot chi jumul che ri uchiʼja. Aretaq chiʼ xkijaq ri uchiʼja, utz rilik xkibʼano e sibʼalaj xsach kikʼuʼx.
Ri areʼ rukʼ ri uqʼabʼ kuta chkech arech man kechʼaw taj, e xubʼij chkech jas resaxik xubʼan ri Ajawxel pa ri cheʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij: «Chiyaʼaʼ ubʼixik weriʼ chrech ri Santiʼago e chkech ri enikʼaj achalaxik chik». Kel ubʼik e kbʼe ubʼi pa jun kʼolibʼal chik.
Aretaq chiʼ ksaqar uwach ri qʼij, sibʼalaj kechʼuʼjar ri elaqʼabʼanelabʼ: ¿Jawijeʼ riʼ kʼo wi ri Luʼ?
Ri Herodes kuta chkech arech kkikʼam uloq ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kkiriq ta chik ri areʼ. Rumal rech che man kkiriq taj, ktaqan chkech ri ajchʼimiʼyabʼ arech kekamisax ri eʼareʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Herodes kxuliʼ ubʼik chi pa ri Judeʼa pa ri Sesareʼa, e chilaʼ kkanaj wi.
Ri Herodes, yakatajinaq nimalaj royowal kukʼ ri winaq eʼajtiro e ri eʼajsidon. Rukʼ ronojel kanimaʼ, ri eʼareʼ kepe uloq chuwach ri Herodes aretaq chiʼ chʼakatajinaq chi ri Bʼlasto kumal, ri areʼ che upataninel ri ajawinel, arech kkita ri jaʼmaril chrech; rumal rech che ri kamaqʼ xas chilaʼ wi, pa ri utinimit ri ajawinel kkikʼamaʼ wi ri kiwa.
Chi pa jun qʼij che xkichʼiko, ri Herodes ukojom taq ri ratzʼyaq rech ajawinel; tʼuyulik cho ri tem, e aretaq chiʼ kchʼaw chkiwach ri winaq,
ri eʼareʼ kkiraqaqej kichiʼ chrech: «¡Ri areʼ che tajin kchʼawik, jun Dyos, ri areʼ man jun achi taj!».
Kʼatekʼut xas we uchanim riʼ, ri anjel rech ri Ajawxel kuchʼayo ri areʼ, rumal rech che man nim ta xril wi ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jeʼ jas ri kiwa ri ixjut, xujach ri ruxlabʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri utzij ri Ajawxel xkʼiyik e kwachin uwach.
Ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Saʼulo, aretaq chiʼ xbʼantaj ri kichak pa ri Jerusalem, ketzalij ubʼik; kkikʼam ubʼik ri Xwan kukʼ, ri areʼ che Markos ri jun chik ubʼiʼ xkikoj ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ri Tyox rech ri Antiʼokiʼa ekʼo ejujun eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos e enim taq ajtijabʼ: ri Bʼernabʼe, ri Simeʼon che Niger ri jun chik ubʼiʼ, ri Lusiʼo ri ajsirene, ri Manaham ri junam xetubʼanik rukʼ ri Tetrarka Herodes, e ri Saʼulo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa jun qʼij aretaq chiʼ kkinimaqʼijarisaj ri Ajawxel e kemewajik; ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel kubʼij: «Cheʼitasaʼ kiwach ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Saʼulo iwukʼ ix, arech kkibʼan ri chak che nuchoman in chkech».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xemewajtajik e xechʼawtaj rukʼ ri Dyos, kkikoj kiqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ; kekiyaʼ kanoq arech kkikʼam uqʼabʼ ri kichak.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ xetaq rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel arech kkibʼan ri kichak, xa jekʼuriʼ keqaj ubʼi chi kʼa pa ri Seleʼusiʼa, e chi pa ri Seleʼusiʼa ubʼik kebʼe pa ri Polow kʼa pa ri Chipre.
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ keʼopan pa ri Salamina kkibʼij ri Utzij ri Dyos pa taq ri kisinagoga ri eʼajjudiʼo. Kʼo ri Xwan kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, che toʼbʼanel kukʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xebʼintaj pa ronojel ri chʼaqap ulew che kʼo pa ri polow, chi kʼa pa ri Pafos, kekiriqaʼ chilaʼ jun mago, che esalwach chkech ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, Bʼar Jesus ri ubʼiʼ;
ri areʼ jun chkixoʼl ri uwinaq ri prokonsul Sergiʼo Paʼulo, ri areʼ jun nim winaq nim retambʼal. Ri areʼ keʼusikʼij ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Saʼulo, rumal rech che kraj kutaʼ ri utzij ri Dyos.
Tekʼut ri mago Elimas kchʼaw kukʼ rumal rech che ma kraj taj che ri prokonsul kkojonik –si are waʼ ri kubʼij ri ubʼiʼ pa qachʼabʼal.
Tekʼuriʼ ri Saʼulo –xoqujeʼ Paʼulo ri jun chik ubʼiʼ– nojinaq chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, ko kukaʼyej ri areʼ.
Kubʼij chrech: «Ri at che atnojinaq che ronojel ri joʼs taq jastaq e che ronojel ri itzel taq jastaq, at ukʼojol ri kʼaxtok, ri kʼulel rech ri sukʼil, ¿la man kaya ta kan ubʼanik ri itzel taq kʼax chech ri utz taq ubʼe ri Ajawxel?
Kamik riʼ, xwilaʼ ri uqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel kʼo pawiʼ ri at. Moy katkanaj kanoq e man kawil ta chi ri qʼij pa jujun taq ikʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xaqbʼiʼ xpe ri sutz e ri qʼequʼm puwiʼ ri areʼ, kutzukuj jun winaq arech kukʼam ubʼe.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri prokonsul kril weriʼ, xkojonik e nim xril wi ri utzij ri Ajawxel.
Pa ri Pafos, ri Pabʼlo e ri erachiʼl keʼaqʼan pa jun jukubʼ; kebʼe chi kʼa pa ri Perge pa ri Panfiliʼa. Ri Xwan keʼuyaʼ kan ri eʼareʼ e ktzalej pa ri Jerusalem.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼareʼ keʼopan pa ri Antiʼokiʼa che rulew ri Pisidiʼa. Pa ri qʼij Sabʼado keʼok pa ri sinagoga e ketʼuyiʼk.
Aretaq chiʼ xsikʼitajik ri Pixabʼ e ri kitzij eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos; ri ekinimal ri sinogoga xetaqan chkech: «Eʼachalaxik, we kʼo jun tzij rech chuqʼabʼ che kixkowinik kibʼij chkech le winaq chibʼij bʼaʼ».
Ri Pabʼlo kwaʼlijik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼan jun kʼutbʼal rukʼ ri uqʼabʼ e kubʼij:
Ri Kidyos we winaq riʼ, ri Dyos kech ri Israʼel, xeʼuchaʼ ri eqatat e xubʼan nim chkech we winaq riʼ aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ naj ekʼo wi pa ri rulew ri Egipto. E rumal uchuqʼabʼ ri uqʼabʼ xeʼukʼam ubʼik arech keʼel ubʼik.
Pa kawinaq junabʼ xubʼan ri utzil chkech pa ri tzʼinalik ulew.
Aretaq chiʼ xekamisatajik wuqubʼ tinimit pa ri rulew ri Kanaʼan, xuya ri ulew chkech
pa juqʼoʼ lajuj (450) junabʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ xuya chkech ri enim taq winaq, chi kʼateʼ ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, Samueʼl.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkitaʼ jun ajawinel, e ri Dyos xuyaʼ ri Saʼul chkech che ukʼojol ri Sis, rech ri ujuqʼat ri Bʼenjamin, pa kawinaq junabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos xukʼyaq ubʼiʼ ri areʼ, e xuya ri David chkech jeʼ jas ajawinel. Puwiʼ ri areʼ xubʼij we tzij riʼ: Ri in xintzukuj ri David che ukʼojol ri Jesse, jun achi che utz kril ri wanimaʼ, ri areʼ kubʼij na riʼ ronojel ri jastaq che kinwaj in.
Chi pa ri rijaʼal ri areʼ, jeʼ jas kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik, ri Dyos, xuya ri Jesus chrech ri Israʼel jeʼ jas jun kolonel.
Ri Xwan che xpe kan nabʼe chuwach ri areʼ, xusukʼumaj ri ropanem aretaq chiʼ xuya ubʼixik jun qasnaʼ arech konojel ri eʼuwinaq ri Israʼel kkikʼex ri kikʼux.
Aretaq chiʼ xukʼis ri ubʼe, ri Xwan xubʼij: “Ri jun che kichomaj ix che in, man in taj; ri areʼ petinaq chwij ri in, e ri in man taqal ta chwij arech kinkir ri uxajabʼ”.
Achalaxik, ri ix che ix ralkʼuwaʼl rijaʼal ri Abʼraham, e ri ix che ix kʼo kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo, chiwech ri ix taqom uloq we tzij riʼ che rech kolotajem.
Ri eʼuwinaq ri Jerusalem e ri ekinimal, xkibʼan taq ri kitzij ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos che ksikʼix ronojel Sabʼado kneʼbʼaʼ man xkichʼobʼ taj.
Ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun jas uwach xkiriq puwiʼ ri areʼ che taqal ri kamikal chrij, kʼatekʼut xkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ e xkitaʼ ri ukamisaxik chrech ri Pilato.
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼantaj kumal ronojel ri tzʼibʼatalik puwiʼ ri areʼ, kulkiqasaj cho ri ripibʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkikoj pa ri muqubʼal.
Tekʼut, ri Dyos xuwaʼlisaj ri areʼ;
pa kiʼ taq qʼij, ri areʼ xukʼut ribʼ chkiwach ri xeʼpaqiʼ rukʼ chi pa ri Galileʼa kʼateʼ pa ri Jerusalem; ri eʼareʼ che we kamik riʼ, kkiyaʼ ubʼixik chkech ri winaq ri jastaq che xkilo e xkito.
«Xoqujeʼ ri uj, kqayaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij: ri tzij che xya ubʼixik chkech ri eqatit qamam,
ri Dyos xubʼan paqawiʼ ri uj ri ujrakʼuwal ri toqʼobʼ jeʼ jas ri utzij: ri areʼ xuwaʼlisaj ri Jesus, jeʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik pa taq ri bʼix: Ri at nukʼojol, ri in pa we qʼij riʼ xatinwalkʼuwaʼlaj.
Che ri Dyos xuwaʼlisaj xas chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ e man ktzalij ta chi jumul pa ri kamikal; utz ubʼixik ubʼanom weriʼ: ri in kinya na riʼ ri tyoxlaj taq jastaq rech ri David chiwech, kujkowinik utz ukojik kqabʼan we jastaq riʼ.
Rumal kʼuriʼ kubʼij pa jun chik kʼolibʼal: man kayaʼ ta bʼe riʼ che ri tyoxlaj awinaq kril na ri kamikal.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri David, ri areʼ che xubʼan pa ri ukʼaslemal ri xraj ri Dyos, ri areʼ xkamik, xokisax kukʼ ri eqatat, kʼatekʼuriʼ xril ri kamikal.
E kʼu ri jun, che xuwaʼlisaj ri Dyos, man xril ta ri kamikal.
«Utz uchʼobʼik bʼaʼ chibʼanaʼ weriʼ achalaxik, che rumal ri areʼ riʼ, xya ubʼixik ri sachbʼal mak chiwech ri ix; e ri tzaqatalaj sukʼil che man xya ta ubʼixik chiwech pa ri Upixabʼ ri Moʼises,
xaq apachin winaq che kkojonik, kyaʼtaj waʼ weriʼ chech rumal ri Areʼ.
«Qas chinaʼaʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ, weneʼ kixqaj pa ri tzij xya ubʼixik pa ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos:
¡Chiwilampeʼ ri ix, che kiwetzelaj uwach ronojel, chixibʼij bʼaʼ iwibʼ e chupoq bʼaʼ iwach ix! Rumal rech che pa taq ri iqʼij, ri in kinbʼan na jun jas uwach, che ri ix man kikoj ta riʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ kya ubʼixik chiwech».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ keʼel ubʼik, kkitaʼ chkech ri eʼareʼ, arech kkiya ubʼixik jun tzij puwiʼ weriʼ pa ri jun Sabʼado chik.
Aretaq chiʼ xkijach ubʼi kibʼ, ejujun taq ajjudiʼo e ejujun che ekʼo kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo che kkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos, xkiterneʼbʼej ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe; ri eʼareʼ kkitaʼ chkech che utz chekanajoq pa ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos.
Pa ri jun Sabʼado chik, konojel ri tinimit xkimulij kibʼ arech keʼkitaʼ ri utzij ri Dyos.
Ri eʼajjudiʼo sibʼalaj man utz taj kkinaʼo aretaq chiʼ kkil we sibʼalaj winaq riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkibʼij itzel taq tzij puwiʼ ri Dyos che ukʼuʼlelaxik taq ri utzij ri Pabʼlo.
Chi aninaq, ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe, rukʼ chuqʼabʼ kkibʼij: «Rajawaxik che nabʼe xya ubʼixik ri utzij ri Dyos chiwech ri ix; kʼatekʼut, rumal che ri ix xipaqchiʼj ri tzij e che ri ix kibʼan qʼatojtzij piwiʼ che man taqal ta chiwij ri junalik kʼaslemal; utz che ri uj kujbʼe kukʼ ri man kʼo ta kikojonik.
Rumal rech che jeriʼ xtaqan ri Ajawxel chqech: Ri in, katinkojo at saqil chkech ri jetaq amaqʼ, arech kakʼam ubʼi ri kolotajem chi pa taq ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uxkut uwachulew».
Ri winaq che man kʼo ta ri kikojonik, sibʼalaj kekiʼkotik rukʼ we tzij riʼ, e nim kkil wi ri utzij ri Ajawxel; konojel we winaq riʼ xekojonik, ri eʼareʼ taqal chkij ri junalik kʼaslemal.
Ri Utzij ri Ajawxel xbʼe utzijol pa ronojel ri jetaq tinimit.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼajjudiʼo xkikoj kikʼuʼx ri enim taq chuchuʼibʼ che kkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos e ri enim taq winaq rech ri tinimit; xkiwaʼlisaj kʼax pakiwiʼ ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe, e xekikʼyaq ubʼiʼ pa ri kitinimit.
Ri eʼareʼ xkikotaʼ kan pakiwiʼ ri ulew kʼo cho taq ri kaqan, kʼatekʼuriʼ xebʼe ubʼi pa ri Ikonyo.
Ri eʼachalaxik enojinaq chrech ri kiʼkotemal e chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Pa ri Ikonyo, xoqujeʼ xeʼok pa ri kisinagoga ri eʼajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ xechʼawik e rukʼ ri tzij xkibʼij sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq eʼajjudiʼo e eʼajgriʼego xekojonik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajjudiʼo che man xekojon taj, xeʼkiwaʼlisaj ri winaq che man kʼo ta ri kikojonik kech ri eʼareʼ, arech itzel kilik kkibʼan ri eʼachalaxik.
Ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe xekanaj kan jujun taq qʼij chilaʼ e enojinaq chech ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel; ri Ajawxel xubʼan taq ri kʼutbʼal e xubʼan taq ri mayibʼal rumal ri kiqʼabʼ eʼareʼ arech utz rilik kkibʼan ri winaq ri nimalaj utoqʼobʼ ri utzij ri Dyos.
Ri siwantinimit xkijach kiwach: Ejujun ekʼo kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo, e ri ejujun chik ekʼo kukʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ.
Ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj e ri eʼajjudiʼo, enabʼe ri ekinimal chkiwach, xkichomaj kkikʼyaq abʼaj pakiwiʼ,
kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xketaʼmaj weriʼ, xebʼek e xkijabʼuj kibʼ pa taq ri tinimit rech ri Likaʼoniʼa e pa ri Listra, pa ri Derbʼe e pa taq ri tinimit che ekʼo chunaqaj;
kʼatekʼuriʼ chilaʼ xkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij.
Kʼo chilaʼ, jun achi che tʼuyulik, cheʼrinaq taq ri raqan; xas jeriʼ aretaq chiʼ xalachik, man kʼo ta jumul bʼininaq.
Xutaʼ ri utzij ri Pabʼlo. Ri Pabʼlo utz rilik xubʼan ri areʼ e retaʼm che ri areʼ kʼo ukojonik arech kkunatajik.
Kubʼij chrech rukʼ jun kowlaj uchʼabʼal: «¡Chatwaʼlijoq, chattakʼaloq rukʼ ri awaqan!». Ri areʼ kchʼoplinik, kwaʼlijik e kbʼinik.
Ri winaq, aretaq chiʼ kkilo ri jas uwach che xubʼan ri Pabʼlo, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ pa ri chʼabʼal Likaʼoniʼo: «Ri edyos, jeʼ jas ewinaq, xeqaj uloq pa ri qatinamit».
Ri eʼareʼ, Seʼus xecha chrech ri Bʼernabʼe, e Hermes xecha chrech ri Pabʼlo, rumal rech che are ri areʼ rukʼam ubʼi ri tzij.
Ri echuchqajawibʼ rech ri Seʼus-che-kʼo-chuwach-ri-tinimit kkikʼam uloq chuwach ri uchiʼja rech ri tinimit ejujun amaʼ wakax rukʼ utzalaj taq jastaq chkij, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkisukʼumaj kibʼ kukʼ ri winaq, arech kkichiʼj jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Pabʼlo xketaʼmaj weriʼ, xkiraqatij ri katzʼyaq
«Eqachiʼl, ¿jasche che ri ix jelaʼ kibʼano? Ri uj xaq uj winaq, ri uj, junam ri qakʼaslemal kʼolik jeʼ jas ri ix, ri uj, ujwinaq che kqabʼij jun tzij chiwech arech ri ix kiya kanoq ronojel we man tzij taj edyos riʼ, arech ri ix kixbʼin chuwach ri kʼaslik Dyos ri xbʼanow ri kaj, ri uwach ulew, ri polow e ronojel ri kʼo pa ri areʼ.
E kukʼ taq ri eqamam eqatat, yaʼtalik rumal ri Dyos che konojel tinimit kebʼinik pa ri ubʼe;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz ukʼutik xubʼano che ri areʼ xuyaʼ ri utz taq jastaq chiwech, xuyaʼ ri kaj, ri jabʼ e ri utz taq qʼijil, xunojisaj ri iwanimaʼ che utzil e che kiʼkotemal».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, rukʼ kʼax xekiqʼatej ri winaq arech man kkiyaʼ ta jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ chkech eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kepetik chi pa ri Antiʼokiʼa uloq e pa ri Ikoniʼo ejujun eʼajjudiʼo che kkikoj kikʼux ri winaq. Kkikʼyaq abʼaj chrech ri Pabʼlo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ tzaʼn ri tinimit, kkichomaj che ri areʼ kaminaq chik.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼutijoxelabʼ ekʼo chunaqaj ri areʼ, kwaʼlijik e kok pa ri tinimit. Pa ri jun qʼij chik, ri areʼ kbʼe ubʼi pa ri Derbʼe rachiʼl ubʼik ri Bʼernabʼe.
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj rumal ri utzalaj tzij pa we tinimit riʼ e aretaq chiʼ ekʼo chiʼ sibʼalaj etijoxelabʼ, xebʼe chi jumul pa ri Listra, pa ri Ikoniʼo e pa Antiʼokiʼa.
Kkiyaʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri kanimaʼ ri etijoxelabʼ; kkibʼij taq ri tzij chkech arech kekanaj pa ri kikojonik: «Rajawaxik che ri uj kujqʼax pa ri kʼax arech kujok pa ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos».
Kkikoj kan ejujun taq nim winaq pa ronojel taq ri komon tyox e aretaq chiʼ kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos rukʼ mewajik, kekiya ri eʼareʼ pa ri uqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel, ri kekojon chrech ri Areʼ.
Kebʼe pa ri Pisidiʼa e keʼok pa ri Panfiliʼa.
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj ri tzij pa ri Perge, xexuliʼ ubʼi pa ri Ataliʼa.
Xas chilaʼ, ri kyaqiqʼ kukʼam ubʼi ri kijukubʼ pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, jawijeʼ wi ri eʼareʼ xeʼel ubʼik e xkikʼam ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos arech kkibʼan we chak riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼopanik, xekimulij ri Komon Tyox, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkibʼij chkech, ronojel ri jastaq che xubʼan ri Dyos kukʼ, xoqujeʼ jas ri ujaqik ri kojonik chubʼan chkiwach ri winaq che ma eʼajjudiʼo taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kekanaj jujun taq ikʼ kukʼ ri etijoxelabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xexuliʼk chi pa ri Judeʼa uloq ejujun taq winaq che xkibʼij chkech ri etijoxelabʼ: «We ri ix man kikʼam ta ri upusik ri uwiʼ ri ikowil che petinaq chi rukʼ ri Moʼises uloq, ri ix ma kixkolotaj taj».
Xechʼujarik e xchʼoʼjin ri kitzij kukʼ ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe, xa jekʼuriʼ, xkichomaj che ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe, xoqujeʼ ejujun winaq chik chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, kepaqiʼ pa ri Jerusalem kukʼ ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e kukʼ ri enim taq winaq, arech kkil rij we jastaq riʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ, rumal rech che etaqatalik kumal ri Komon Tyox, kebʼe pa ri Fenisiʼa e pa ri Samariʼa; kkiya ubʼixik che ri winaq ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj xkikʼex kikʼuʼx, kʼatekʼuriʼ rukʼ we tzij riʼ ri eʼachalaxik sibʼalaj kekiʼkotik.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼopan pa ri Jerusalem, ri komon tyox, ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e ri enim taq winaq xekikʼulaj ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼareʼ xkiyaʼ ubʼixik ronojel ri jastaq uwach che xubʼan ri Dyos kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ejujun chkech ri ujuqʼat ri efariseʼo che kʼo ri kikojonik, kechʼujarik e kkibʼij che xas rajawaxik wi che ri ma eʼajjudiʼo taj kpus ri uwiʼ ri kikowil e che keniman chrech ri Upixabʼ ri Moʼises.
Ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e ri enim taq winaq kkimulij kibʼ arech kkinikʼoj rilik we jastaq riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ naj xetzijontajik, ri Luʼ kwaʼlijik e kubʼij:
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos, ri areʼ che retaʼm taq ri animaʼ, xukʼut ri utoqʼobʼ pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ xuya ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel chkech jeʼ jas uyaʼik xubʼan chqech uj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xeril ri eʼareʼ jeʼ jas rilik xubʼan chqech ri uj, rumal rech che xusukʼubʼaʼ ri kanimaʼ rukʼ ri kojonik.
¿Jas kʼuche, che ri ix kibʼan kʼax chrech ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ kiwaj kikoj jun cheʼ pakiwiʼ ri etijoxelabʼ, che ri eqamam eqatat e xoqujeʼ ri uj man kʼo ta qachuqʼabʼ che ubʼanik weriʼ?
Ri uj kqachomaj, che rumal riʼ ri utoqʼobʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus kujkoltaj riʼ jeʼ jas ri eʼareʼ».
Konojel ri komon tyox man xechʼaw ta chik, e kkita ri utzij ri Bʼernabʼe e ri Pabʼlo che kkibʼij ronojel taq ri kʼutbʼal e ronojel taq ri mayibʼal che xubʼan ri Dyos chkixoʼl ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj.
Aretaq chiʼ xkikʼis ri kitzij, ri Santiʼago kubʼij: «Eʼachalaxik, chinitatabʼej.
Ri Simeʼon xukʼutu chqawach jeʼ jas ri xubʼan ri Dyos chi pa ri nabʼe qʼij uloq, arech ri winaq che man eʼajjudiʼo taj che xas etasal chrech ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ.
Weriʼ, utz rukʼ ri kitzij ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik:
Ri in kintzelej na riʼ e kinyak chi jumul na riʼ ri ukabʼal ri David che yojolik kanoq; kinyak chi na jumul che yojkaʼr ubʼanom, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinyak chi na jumul riʼ,
arech ri kikʼisbʼalil ri winaq kkitzukuj ri Ajawxel, xoqujeʼ konojel ri jetaq amaqʼ che etyoxrisam chrech ri Nubʼiʼ, jewaʼ kubʼij ri Ajawxel che kukʼut
we jastaq riʼ chi pa junalik.
«Rumal kuwaʼ weriʼ, ri in kinbʼan qʼatojtzij, che xas rajawaxik man kyaʼ ta ri kʼax chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, ri kkikʼex ri kikʼux chuwach ri Dyos.
Xuwi tzʼibʼax ubʼik chkech che kʼo xa kebʼ taqanik: makitij ri tiʼj che kech ri man tzij taj edyos, makibʼan taj ri man sukʼ kʼulanem taj, makitijo ri tiʼj che xa xejitzʼax ri awaj e makitijo ri kikʼel.
Rumal rech che xas ojer tzij riʼ, ri Moʼises ekʼo uwinaq pa ronojel taq tinimit arech kkisikʼij uwach weriʼ ronojel taq Sabʼado».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼtaqoʼnelabʼ e ri enim taq winaq, junam uchomaxik kkibʼan kukʼ konojel ri ekomon tyox, che utz che kechaʼik ejujun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ e utz che ketaq ubʼi ri eʼareʼ pa ri Antiʼokiʼa kukʼ ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe. Ri eʼareʼ, eʼare ri Judas ri kbʼix Bʼarsabʼas chrech, ri Silas, ri areʼ jun achi che utz kkil ri eʼachalaxik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiyaʼ ubʼik chkech ri eʼareʼ we jun wuj che xtzʼibʼaxik: «Ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e ri enim taq winaq, e ri eʼiwachalal, chkech ri eʼachalaxik che man eʼajjudiʼo taj, ri ekʼo pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, pa ri Siriʼa e pa ri Silisiʼa, kya apan jun rutzil kiwach.
Ri uj qetaʼm che ekʼo ejujun winaq chqaxoʼl ri uj che man etaqom ta ubʼik pa ri itinimit e xkibʼij nikʼaj tzij che xukoj ri kʼax chixoʼl e xubʼan kebʼ ikʼux pa ri iwuxlabʼal.
Ri uj junam uchomaxik xqabʼano che utz che keqasikʼij ejujun chqaxoʼl uj e keqataq ubʼi eʼareʼ kukʼ ri loqʼalaj Bʼernabʼe e ri Pabʼlo,
ri eʼareʼ che kijachom rukʼ toqʼobʼ ri kikʼaslemal chuwach ri ubʼiʼ ri Qajawaxel Jesukristo.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri uj keqataq ubʼi ri Judas e ri Silas, ri eʼareʼ kkikʼam na ubʼi waʼ weriʼ chiwech, xoqujeʼ kkikʼam ubʼi we tzij rukʼ ri kichʼabʼal.
Ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e ri uj xqabʼan qʼatojtzʼij puwiʼ weriʼ. Ri uj kqayaʼ chiwech xa jun taqanik puwiʼ weriʼ:
Mitij ri tiʼj che xkamisax chkiwach ri man tzij taj edyos, mitij ri kikʼel, mitij ri utiʼj awaj che xa xjitzʼaxik e mibʼan ri man sukʼ kʼulanem taj. ¡Utz kibʼano, we kikʼol iwibʼ chuwach weriʼ! Chʼabʼej chi bʼaʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri achijabʼ che xetaq ubʼik; kekichabʼej kan ri eʼareʼ e kexuliʼ ubʼik pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, chilaʼ xekimulij ri komon tyox, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkijach chkech ri wuj che tzʼibʼam ubʼi chkech.
Kkisikʼij uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ kekiʼkotik rumal ri tzij kubʼisabʼal kuʼx kubʼij.
Ri Judas e ri Silas, ri eʼareʼ che eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, xkiya ubʼixik nim ucholexik ri tzij chkech ri etijoxelabʼ arech kkʼojiʼ kichuqʼabʼ e kkubʼiʼ kikʼuʼx.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ okʼowinaq chi kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij, xechabʼex uloq rukʼ nimalaj utzil kumal riʼ eʼachalaxik, arech ketzalej uloq kukʼ ri xetaqow ubʼik.
Ri Pabʼlo e ri Bʼernabʼe xekanaj kan pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, e ekʼi achalaxik keʼachiʼlanik, kkikʼutu e kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij, ri Ttzij ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ pa jun qʼij chik, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij chrech ri Bʼernabʼe: «Chujtzalejoq e jeʼqilaʼ ri eʼachalaxik pa ronojel ri jetaq tinimit jawijeʼ wi ri xqabʼij wi ri utzij ri Ajawxel, arech kqilo jas ubʼeʼal ebʼenaq ri eʼareʼ».
Ri Bʼernabʼe kraj kukʼam ubʼi ri Xwan, ri kbʼix Markos chrech;
kʼatekʼut ri Pabʼlo man kraj taj kukʼam ubʼi ri areʼ, ri jun che xeʼuya kan ri eʼareʼ pa ri Panfiliʼa e man xchakun ta kukʼ.
Kechʼujarik, xajekʼuriʼ kkijach kibʼ. Ri Bʼernabʼe kukʼam ubʼi ri Markos rukʼ e pa jun jukubʼ kbʼe pa ri Chipre.
Ri Pabʼlo kusikʼij ubʼi ri Silas e kebʼe ubʼik, rumal taqom ubʼik ri areʼ pa ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos, kumal ri eʼachalaxik.
Kbʼe pa ri Siriʼa e pa ri Silisiʼa, jawijeʼ kuya wi ri kichuqʼabʼ ri Komon Tyox.
Xopan pa Derbʼe e pa Listra. Chilaʼ kʼo jun tijoxel che Timoteʼo ri ubʼiʼ, ral jun ajjudiʼa che kʼo ri ukojonik, e ri utat jun ajgriʼego achi.
Ri eʼachalaxik pa ri Listra e pa ri Ikoniʼo utz kkil ri areʼ.
Ri Pabʼlo kuqʼalajisaj chuwach che kraj kukʼam ubʼi ri areʼ. Kukʼam ubʼi ri areʼ e kupus ri uwiʼ ri ukowil, rumal rech che ekʼo nikʼaj eʼajjudiʼo pa we tinimit riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel ri winaq ketaʼm che ajgriʼego ri utat areʼ.
Pa taq ri tinimit jawijeʼ kebʼe wi, kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri jetaq tzʼibʼanik che xkitzʼibʼaj ri etaqoʼnelabʼ e ri enim taq winaq rech ri Jerusalem, e kkiya ubʼixik chkech che rajawaxik keniman chrech weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ekomon Tyox xkʼojiʼ kichuqʼabʼ pa ri kikojonik e ronojel taq qʼij kekʼyarik.
Keqʼax pa ri rulew ri Frigiʼa e pa ri kulew ri eʼajgalasiʼa, xane rumal rech che ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel xeʼuqʼatej che uyaʼik ubʼixik ri Tzij pa ri Asiʼa.
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ ekʼo chi chunaqaj ri Misiʼa, kkaj keʼok pa ri Bʼitiniʼa, kʼatekʼut man yaʼtal ta chkech rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Kebʼe pa ri Misiʼa e kexuliʼ pa ri Troʼada.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ chaqʼabʼ, ri Pabʼlo xril weriʼ: Jun ajmasedoniʼa kʼo chilaʼ, takʼalik xutaʼ weriʼ chrech: «Chatok bʼaʼ pa ri Masedoniʼa, saʼj uloq e chujakoloʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim kqaj kujok pa ri Masedoniʼa, rumal rech che kqachomaj che ri Dyos utz qasikʼixik kubʼano arech ri uj kqakʼam ubʼik ri utzalaj tzij pa we tinimit riʼ.
Kujel ubʼi pa jun kukubʼ rech ri Troʼada, e kujbʼe pa ri Samotrasiʼa, e pa ri jun qʼij chik kujbʼe pa ri Neʼapolis,
chi pa ri Neʼapolis kujbʼe ubʼi pa ri Filipos, che jun tinimit che xas are nabʼe nim ubʼantajik pa ri Masedoniʼa; pa we jun tinimit riʼ ekʼo eʼajromano. Kujkanaj kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij pa we tinimit riʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ri Sabʼado, xujel ubʼi pa ri uchiʼ ri tinimit, kujbʼe chuchiʼ jun nimaʼ, jawijeʼ kbʼan wi ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos. Aretaq chiʼ ri uj tʼuyulik, ri uj kqayaʼ ubʼixik ri tzij chkech ri ixoqibʼ che xkimulij kibʼ chilaʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun ixoq, che Lidiʼa ri ubʼi xuta ri qatzij; ri areʼ jun ajkʼay ajtiʼatira; xuqʼijilaj ri Dyos. Ri Ajawxel kujaq ri ranimaʼ arech ri areʼ utz kril taq ri utzij ri Pabʼlo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ e ri uwinaq xkikʼam ri qasnaʼ, kutaʼ weriʼ chqech: «We ri ix kichomaj che ri in, in utz chuwach ri Ajawxel, chisaʼj bʼaʼ e chixkanaj kanoq pa ri wachoch». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, weriʼ, jun taqanik ri xubʼan chqech.
Pa jun qʼij che ri uj xujbʼe pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, ri uj xqariq jun mokom che chapom rumal jun uxlabʼal Pitom. Ri erajaw xkichʼak sibʼalaj pwaq rukʼ ri utzij che kuya ubʼixik puwiʼ ri jastaq che kpe na.
Ri areʼ xujuterneʼbʼej, ri Pabʼlo e ri uj; sibʼalaj kuraqaqej uchiʼ: «We winaq riʼ eʼupataninel ri Dyos ri Nimalaj ubʼantajik; kkibʼij chiwech ri ubʼe ri kolotajem».
Jeriʼ xubʼan pa kʼi taq qʼij. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kpe royowal, kukaʼyej ri areʼ e kubʼij chrech ri uxlabʼal: «Kinya jun taqanik chawech pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus Kristo, arech ri at katel ubʼi pa we ixoq riʼ». Ri jun uxlabʼal chi aninaq xel ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri erajaw, aretaq chiʼ kkilo che xkitzaq ri sibʼalaj kipwaq, xkikoj kiqʼabʼ chkech ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas, e kekikʼam ubʼi ri eʼareʼ pa ri kʼaybʼal chkiwach ri eqʼatal taq tzij.
E kkibʼij aretaq chiʼ kekikoj ri eʼareʼ chkiwach ri estrategiʼos: «We winaq riʼ keʼkichʼuychʼaʼ ri qatinimit; waʼ we eʼareʼ riʼ, eʼajjudiʼo,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kkikʼut jujun jas taq uwach che man yataʼl ta kumal ri eʼajromano che kqakʼulaj e kqaterneʼbʼej uj weriʼ».
Ri winaq kkimulij kibʼ chqawach, e ri estrategiʼos xkibʼano arech kesax ri qatzʼyaq chqij, ketaqanik arech kujchʼayik rukʼ taq chʼimiy.
Aretaq chiʼ sibʼalaj xujchʼaytajik, xujkʼyaq pa ri cheʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkiyaʼ ubʼixik chrech ri jun che kchajin ri cheʼ che utz qachajixik kubʼano.
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri chajinel xeʼukʼyaq pa ri cheʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz uyutik ri kaqan kubʼano.
Pa ri kabʼlajuj kajbʼal rech ri chaqʼabʼ, ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas xechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, xkibʼixoj taq ri bʼix rech ri Dyos; ri ekʼo pa cheʼ xkita weriʼ.
Xas chanim xpe jun nim kabʼraqan, kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj kʼax xuriq ri ja. Xaqbʼi, ronojel taq ri uchiʼja xjaqatajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xtʼoqapinik ronojel ri jatʼibʼal kech ri ekʼo pa cheʼ.
Ri ajchajinel chech ri cheʼ xkʼastajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ krilo che jaqatalik ri uchiʼ taq ja, kukʼam ubʼi ri uchʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj e kraj kukamisaj ribʼ, rumal rech che kuchomaj che ri ekʼo pa cheʼ xeʼel ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Pabʼlo kuraq uchiʼ chech: «Mabʼan kʼax chech awibʼ, rumal rech che qonojel ujkʼo waral riʼ».
Ri ajchajinel chech ri cheʼ kutaʼ jun chäj, rukʼ bʼirbʼitem kutij anim xok ubʼik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kukʼyaq ribʼ chuwach ri kaqan ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas.
Kubʼano che ri eʼareʼ keʼel ubʼik e kubʼij: «Eʼajaw, ¿jas ri kinbʼan na riʼ ri in arech kinkolotajik?».
Kkibʼij chrech: «Chatkojon chrech ri Ajawxel Jesus e katkolotajik ri at e ri eʼawinaq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiya ubʼixik chrech ri utzij ri Ajawxel, e chkech konojel ri eʼuwinaq ekʼo pa rachoch.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim, ri ajchajinel, chaqʼabʼ keʼukam ubʼi ri eʼareʼ rukʼ; kuchʼaj ri sokotajinaq chkech, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas chanim xukʼam ri qasnaʼ ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ konojel ri eʼuwinaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼano arech ri eʼareʼ kepaqiʼ pa ri rachoch; kusukʼumaj ri mexa e kkiʼkot kukʼ konojel ri eʼuwinaq rumal rech che xkojon che ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ kopan ri qʼij, ri estrategiʼos keʼkitaq ubʼik ri liktores arech kbʼix chrech ri ajchajinel: «Cheʼawesaj ubʼik we winaq riʼ».
Ri ajchajinel kubʼij we tzij riʼ chrech ri Pabʼlo: «Ri estrategiʼos xekitaq uloq winaq arech kekibʼij chqech che kixqatzaqopij ubʼik. Chixel bʼaʼ ubʼik, e jix ubʼik».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij chkech ri liktores: «Ri eʼareʼ xkibʼano che ri uj xujchʼay chkiwach nimalaj konojel winaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta qʼatbʼaltzij xkibʼan paqawiʼ, ri uj che uj ajromano, kʼatekʼuriʼ xujkikʼyaq pa ri cheʼ, e kamik riʼ ¿la are kkaj che pa awatalik kujkesaj ubʼik? ¡Jayiʼ! Chepet bʼaʼ ri eʼareʼ che qesaxik ubʼik arech xas eʼareʼ kujkitzoqopij ubʼik».
Ri liktores kkikʼam ubʼik we tzij riʼ chkech ri estrategiʼos. Ri eʼareʼ kkixibʼij kibʼ aretaq chiʼ ketaʼmaj che eʼajromano ri eʼareʼ;
ri estrategiʼos xepetik e sibʼalaj xkitaʼ chkech arech kkiya kan ri tinimit.
Aretaq chiʼ keʼel ubʼik pa ri cheʼ, ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas kebʼe pa ri rachoch ri Lidiʼa; keʼkil chi na ri eʼachalaxik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkiya jun tzij chkech rech kichuqʼabʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ xebʼe ubʼik.
Kebʼe pa ri Anfipolis e Apoloniʼa e keʼopan pa ri Tesalonika, jawijeʼ kʼo wi jun kisinagoga ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Xoqujeʼ waral riʼ, ri Pabʼlo katzijon kukʼ ri eʼareʼ. Pa oxibʼ Sabʼado kchʼaw kukʼ puwiʼ ri Tzij.
Xukʼut ri saqalaj tzij chkiwach, che rajawaxik che ri Kristo kukʼaxkolij e kkʼastaj uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri areʼ kubʼij: «Ri Kristo, are ri Jesus che ri in kinbʼij chiwech».
Ejujun chkech ri eʼareʼ kkichomaj che utz we tzij riʼ e xeʼok kukʼ ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas, xoqujeʼ ekʼi chkech ri eʼokinaq kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo kebʼe kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, xoqujeʼ ekʼi eʼajgriʼego xeʼok kukʼ, xoqujeʼ ri ekʼi ekinimal ri ixoqibʼ xeʼok kukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo enojinaq che tiʼtik; kekikʼam ubʼi pa ri kʼaybʼal enikʼaj winaq che ebʼanal taq kʼax, ri eʼareʼ xekimulij ri winaq e kkikoj kikʼuʼx ri tinimit; kebʼe cho ri rachoch ri Jason, che kitzukuxik ri Pabʼlo e ri Silas arech kekikʼam uloq chkiwach ri siwantinimit.
Rumal kʼut che man kekiriqaʼ taj, kkikʼam ubʼi ri Jason e enikʼaj taq eʼachalaxik chik chkiwach ri eqʼatbʼaltzij e kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «We winaq riʼ kekojon kʼuʼx e kechʼuychʼaʼnik chech ronojel we uwachulew, e pa we uchanim riʼ ri eʼareʼ ekʼo waral riʼ,
e we Jason riʼ eʼukʼulam pa ri rachoch. Konojel we winaq riʼ, man esukʼ ta chuwach ri upixabʼ ri Sesar, rumal rech che kkiya ubʼixik che kʼo jun chik ajawinel, che are ri Jesus».
Chuwach we raqoj taq chiʼaj riʼ, kkixibʼij kibʼ ri winaq e ri eqʼatbʼaltzij,
kekitaʼ pwaq chkech ri Jason e ri enikʼaj chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kekitzoqopij ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa aninaqil, ri eʼachalaxik kkibʼano arech ri Pabʼlo kel ubʼik chaqʼabʼ e xoqujeʼ ri Silas, kekitaq ubʼik pa ri Bʼereʼa. Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ keʼopan jelaʼ, kebʼe pa ri sinogoga kech ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Ri eʼajjudiʼo ekʼo waral riʼ, kʼo jun kuxlabʼal che utz chi na chuwach ri eʼajtesalonika; chanim kkikʼam ri tzij. Ronojel taq qʼij ri eʼareʼ kkisikʼij taq ri tzij arech kkil rij we qas jeriʼ ronojel ri jastaq.
Ekʼi chkech ri eʼareʼ kekojonik, xoqujeʼ ri ekinimal ri ixoqibʼ che eʼajgriʼego, e ejujun taq achijabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo che ekʼo pa ri Tesalonika, kketaʼmaj che ri Pabʼlo, xas xoqujeʼ xubʼij ri utzij ri Dyos pa ri Bʼereʼa, kebʼe jelaʼ, keʼkikojoʼ kikʼuʼx e keʼkichʼuychʼaʼ ri winaq chilaʼ.
Pa aninaqil, ri eʼachalaxik kkibʼano che ri Pabʼlo kel ubʼik e kbʼe ubʼik, kusukʼ ubʼik pa ri polow; ri Silas e ri Timoteʼo kekanaj kan chilaʼ.
Ri xekʼamow ubʼi ri Pabʼlo kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ chi kʼa pa ri Atenas, kʼatekʼuriʼ ketzalej uloq rukʼ jun taqkil arech ri Silas e ri Timoteʼo xas chanim kebʼe ubʼi rukʼ ri Pabʼlo.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Pabʼlo ereyeʼm ri eʼareʼ pa ri Atenas, ri ruxlabʼal kpe royowal chuwach taq ri wachbʼal kech ri man tzij taj edyos, che nojinaq ri tinimit chrech.
Kchʼaw kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo e kukʼ ri kkiqʼijilaj ri Dyos pa ri sinagoga, e ronojel taq qʼij kchʼaw kukʼ ri winaq che ekʼo pa ri kʼaybʼal.
Xoqujeʼ, ekʼo jujun taq winaq che nimalaj kitijojbʼem kibʼ: ri epikureʼos e ri estoʼikos che xeʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ. Ejujun kkibʼij: «¿Jas kraj waʼ kuroqʼorotej we jun winaq riʼ?». Ejujun chik kkibʼij: «Ri areʼ kjunamatajik rukʼ jun che ktzijon pakiwiʼ ekaxlan taq dyoses», rumal rech che kuya ubʼixik ri Jesus e ri kʼastajibʼal uwach.
Kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ chuwach ri Aʼeropago e kkibʼij chrech: «¿La yaʼtalik chqech uj che kqetaʼmaj ri tzij che kakʼut ri at?
Rumal rech che ri uj man saq ta chqawach ri tzij che kabʼij ri at chqech. Ri uj kqaj qetaʼmaj ri jastaq che kubʼij we tzij riʼ».
Rumal rech, che konojel ri eʼajatenas e ri ekaxlan taq winaq che ri ekʼo chilaʼ, ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun chik kichak, xuwi ekʼo che utayik ri kʼisbʼal taq uwach jastaq elenaq uloq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pabʼlo, takʼalik panikʼaj chrech ri Aʼeropago kubʼij: «Ri ix, ix siwantinimit rech ri Atenas, ri in kinwilo, che ri ix sibʼalaj are nim ikojbʼal chkiwach konojel winaq.
Rumal rech, che aretaq chiʼ xinbʼin pa ri itinimit e xinwil ri etyoxlaj taq nim ja, ri in xinriq jun tabʼal rukʼ we tzij riʼ: “Chech ri man etaʼmatal ta uwach dyos”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, are kilinya ubʼixik chiwech ri jun che kiqʼijilaj ri ix e che man iwetaʼm ta uwach.
