«Ri Dyos che xbʼanow ri uwachulew e ronojel ri jas taq uwach, ri areʼ, are Ajawxel chrech ri kaj e chrech ri ulew, man kjeqiʼ ta pa jun ja che ktzʼaqik rukʼ kiqʼabʼ winaq.
Ri kiqʼabʼ ri winaq man kkipatanij ta ri areʼ, rumal rech che ri areʼ man rajawaxik ta jun patanajik chrech, ri areʼ che are kyaʼow ri kʼaslemal, ri kyaʼow ri uxlabʼal e ronojel ri jastaq.
Ri areʼ, xas pa jun umajibʼal uloq xeʼukʼisaj konojel ri winaq, arech kejeqiʼ pa ronojel ri uwachulew; xukoj ronojel uwach taq qʼij pa ri uwachulew jawijeʼ kejeqiʼ wi ri winaq.
Xubʼan weriʼ arech ri winaq kkitzukuj ri jastaq rech ri kaj, arech kekowinik kkiriq ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ man naj taj kʼo wi chqech ri uj.
Ri uj, pa ri areʼ kʼo wi ri qakʼaslemal, ri uj kujsilobʼik pa ri areʼ e ujkʼo pa ri areʼ. Waʼ weriʼ xbʼitaj kumal ejujun winaq che ekʼo chixoʼl ri ix: “Rumal rech che ri uj xas uj rijaʼlil ri areʼ”.
«Xa jekʼuriʼ, we uj rijaʼal ri Dyos, maqachomaj bʼaʼ che ri jastaq rech ri kaj, jeriʼ jas ri qʼan pwaq, ri saq pwaq on ri abʼaj, che kichakun ri winaq rukʼ jeʼlik taq chak e rukʼ ri noʼjbʼal.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, ri Dyos, xyupiʼ uwoqʼoch chuwach taq ri man ketaʼmam ta ri winaq, e kuya ubʼixik chkech konojel winaq pa ronojel kʼolibʼal, arech ri eʼareʼ kkikʼex kikʼuʼx
rumal rech che kukoj na jun qʼij che ri areʼ kubʼan na ri qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri uwachulew, jeʼ jas ri usukʼil ri areʼ, rumal ri jun achi che xukoj ri areʼ; xukʼut chkiwach konojel, che qastzij waʼ weriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xukol ri areʼ chuwach ri kamikal».
Aretaq chiʼ kkita we tzij riʼ puwiʼ ri kʼastajibʼal wachaj chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ekʼo nikʼaj kketzʼabʼej uwach, enikʼaj chik kkibʼij: «Ri uj kqakʼot na ri achiʼ riʼ pa jumul chik puwiʼ weriʼ».
Jeriʼ nakʼut, ri Pabʼlo xel ubʼik chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ.
Ejujun winaq keʼok rukʼ ri areʼ e kekojonik. Jun chkech, are ri Diʼonisiʼo Aʼeropagita, xoqujeʼ kʼo jun ixoq Damaris ri ubʼiʼ, e ekʼo nikʼaj chik.
Ri Pabʼlo kel bʼi naj che ri Atenas, kbʼe ubʼi pa ri Korinto.
Kuriqaʼ jun ajjudiʼo, Akila ri ubʼi, e che are ri Ponto utinimit, che kʼateriʼ xopan pa ri Italiʼa rukʼ ri rixoqil Prissila, rumal rech che xel jun Upixabʼ ri Klaʼudiʼo che ktaqanik, che konojel ri eʼajjudiʼo keʼel ubʼik pa ri Roma. Ri Pabʼlo kopan kukʼ ri eʼareʼ,
ri areʼ junam ri uchak kukʼ ri eʼareʼ e kkanaj pa ri kachoch e kchakun kukʼ ri eʼareʼ. Ri kichak are kkibʼan taq kabʼal.
Ronojel Sabʼado xkikʼam ubʼi pa ri sinagoga e ri areʼ sibʼalaj kraj kukoj uchoqʼabʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo e ri eʼajgriʼego, arech kekojonik.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Silas e ri Timoteʼo xeʼopan chi pa ri Masedoniʼa uloq, ri Pabʼlo, chi ronojel taq qʼij xok che ubʼixik ri tzij, xubʼij chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo che ri Jesus are ri Kristo.
Chuwach taq ri kʼax che xkibʼan chrech ri areʼ e chuwach ri itzel taq tzij xkibʼij, ri Pabʼlo kutotaʼ ri ratzʼyaq e kubʼij chkech: «¡Tzaq bʼaʼ ri ikikʼel piwi! Ri in in sukʼ chuwach weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa ri ukamik riʼ kinbʼe kukʼ ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj»,
Ri Pabʼlo kel ubʼi chilaʼ, kbʼe pa ri rachoch jun achi che Justo ri ubʼiʼ, ri areʼ jun winaq che kqʼijilan che ri Dyos; ri rachoch kʼo chunaqaj ri sinagoga.
Ri Krispo, ri areʼ che are kinimal ri sinagoga, xkojon che ri Ajawxel kukʼ konojel ri uwinaq. Ekʼi eʼajkorinto che xkitaʼ ri utzij ri Pabʼlo, xekojonik e xkikʼam ri qasnaʼ.
Chaqʼabʼ, pa jun wachbʼal, ri Ajawxel kubʼij chrech ri Pabʼlo: «Maxibʼij awibʼ. Chataqej ubʼixik ri tzij, matzʼapij achiʼ.
Rumal rech che ri in, in kʼo awukʼ, e man kʼo ta jun winaq kukoj na riʼ jun qʼabʼ chawech arech kubʼan ri kʼax chawech, rumal rech che ri in, xas ekʼo wi sibʼalaj enuwinaq pa we tinimit riʼ».
Xkanaj chilaʼ jun junabʼ rukʼ waqibʼ ikʼ, xukʼut ri utzij ri Dyos chkech ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Galiʼon ajqʼatbʼaltzij (prokonsul) pa ri Akaya; ri eʼajjudiʼo kekikʼyaq kibʼ puwiʼ ri Pabʼlo e kekikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltij,
e kkibʼij: «We jun winaq riʼ are kraj kukoj kikʼuʼx ri winaq arech kkibʼan nikʼaj jastaq che uqʼijilaxik ri Dyos che kukʼuleʼlaj uwach ri Pixabʼ».
Ri Pabʼlo kraj kujaq ri uchiʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Galiʼon kubʼij chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo: «Weta kʼo jun makaj on jun itzel jas uwach, ri in kinkʼam uqʼabʼ riʼ ri ichʼoʼj.
Kʼatekʼut, rumal rech che ri ix kixtzijon puwiʼ taq tzij, puwiʼ taq bʼiʼaj e puwiʼ ri ipixabʼ ri ix, ¡ix bʼa chixilowoq weriʼ! ¡Ri in, ma kinwaj taj in qʼataltzij puwiʼ weriʼ!».
E xeʼeresaj uloq pa ri qʼatbʼaltzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkichap ubʼi ri Sostenes, ri areʼ che kinimal ri winaq pa ri sinagoga, e chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij kkichʼay ri areʼ. E ronojel weriʼ xas man kʼo ta upatan chuwach ri Galiʼon.
Ri Pabʼlo kkanaj na kan chilaʼ pa ri Korinto kʼi taq qʼij, kʼatekʼuriʼ kel ubʼik chkixoʼl ri eʼachalaxik e kaqʼan ubʼi pa jun kukubʼ che kbʼe pa ri Siriʼa. Ri Prissila e ri Akila kebʼe ubʼi rukʼ. Ri Pabʼlo xusokaj ronojel ri uwiʼ pa ri Senkreʼas, rumal rech che xuyaʼ jun utzij chuwach ri Dyos.
Xeʼopan pa ri Efeso e chilaʼ xkijach kibʼ. Kbʼe pa ri sinagoga e kchʼaw kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Ri eʼareʼ, kkitaʼ chrech ri areʼ arech kkanaj kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij kukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ man xraj taj.
E aretaq chiʼ kel ubʼik, kubʼij chkech: «Ri in kinpe chi na waʼ iwukʼ we kraj ri Dyos». Kʼatekʼuriʼ kbʼe ubʼi pa ri Efeso pa ri polow.
Xqaj pa ri rulew ri Sesareʼa, e kuʼulya jun rutzil kiwach ri komon tyox, kʼatekʼuriʼ xxuliʼ ubʼi pa ri Antiʼokiʼa;
xkanaj kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij chilaʼ, kel ubʼik e kbʼe pa ri Galasiʼa e pa ri Frigiʼa, e kuya ri kichuqʼabʼ ri etijoxelabʼ.
Jun ajjudiʼo, Apolo ri ubʼi, ri areʼ ajalejandriʼa. Xpe pa ri Efeso; ri areʼ utz ukʼamik e utz retaʼmaxik ri Tzij xubʼano.
Xkʼut chuwach ri ubʼe ri Ajawxel, e rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Uxlabʼaxel, utzalaj ubʼixik e ukʼutik kubʼan ronojel ri jastaq puwiʼ ri Jesus, kʼatekʼut ri areʼ xuwi retaʼm ri qasnaʼ rech ri Xwan.
Ri areʼ utz ubʼixik ri Tzij kubʼan pa ri Sinagoga. Aretaq chiʼ ri Prissilla e ri Akila xkitaʼ ri areʼ, xkikʼam ubʼi kukʼ e kkikʼut chuwach ri utzlaj Bʼe.
Ri areʼ kraj kbʼe pa ri Akaya; xa jekʼuriʼ ri eʼachalaxik kkiya uchuqʼabʼ arech kbʼe chilaʼ, e kekitzʼibʼaj ubʼik ri etijoxelabʼ arech utz ukʼulaxik kkibʼan ri areʼ. Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ xopan jelaʼ, kkʼulaxik rukʼ utzil e jun nimalaj tobʼnik chkech ri ekojonelabʼ,
rumal rech che sibʼalaj utz ukʼutik xubʼan chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, che ri Jesus are areʼ ri Kristo; e weriʼ rukʼ ri Tzij kukʼutu.
Aretaq chiʼ kʼo ri Apolo pa ri Korinto, ri Pabʼlo kuqʼaxej ri nim taq juyubʼ e kok pa ri Efeso, jawijeʼ xeʼuriqaʼ wi ejujun taq tijoxelabʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kutaʼ chkech: «¿La xikʼam ix ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel aretaq chiʼ xixkojonik?». Ri eʼare kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj man xqata taj we kʼo ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «¿Jas kʼu uwach qasnaʼ xikʼam ri ix?». Kkibʼij: «Are ri uqasnaʼ ri Xwan».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ri Xwan xuya jun qasnaʼ rech kʼexebʼal kʼuʼx, aretaq chiʼ xubʼij chkech ri winaq, arech kekojon chrech ri jun che petinaq uloq chrij ri areʼ, che are ri Jesus».
Rukʼ taq we tzij riʼ, xkikʼam ri kiqasnaʼ pa ri ubʼi ri Ajawxel Jesus;
e aretaq chiʼ ri Pabʼlo kukoj ri uqʼabʼ pakiwiʼ, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kpe pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kechʼaw pa taq chʼabʼal e kkibʼan eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Ekabʼlajuj we eʼachijabʼ riʼ.
Ri Pabʼlo kbʼe pa ri sinagoga e pa oxibʼ ikʼ rukʼ chuqʼabʼ kchʼawik. Kuya ubʼixik ri tzij puwiʼ ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos e kraj che utz kqaj chkiwach weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ekʼo jujun che man xkikoj ta weriʼ, xkibʼij ri itzel puwiʼ ri Bʼe chkiwach ri winaq. Man kbʼe ta chi kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, keʼukʼam ubʼi ri etijoxelabʼ. Ronojel taq qʼij kuya ubʼixik ri Tzij chkech pa ri utijonbʼal ri Tirano.
Jeriʼ xubʼano pa kebʼ junabʼ, e konojel ri eʼajasiʼa, ri eʼajjudiʼo e ri eʼajgriʼego, xuyaʼo xkita ri Utzij ri Ajawxel.
Ri Dyos xubʼan nim taq mayibʼal rumal ri uqʼabʼ ri Pabʼlo,
xa jekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kokisax pakiwiʼ ri eyawabʼibʼ, jun payuʼ on jun suʼt che xukoj ri areʼ, ri yabʼil kel ubʼi chkech e xoqujeʼ keʼel ri eʼitzel taq uxlabʼal.
E jujun chkech ri eʼaʼeʼesal itzel ekʼo chkixoʼl ri eʼajjudiʼo che kebʼinkatik pa taq ri bʼe, xoqujeʼ kkaj kkibʼij ri ubʼi ri Ajawxel Jesus pakiwiʼ ri winaq che kʼo itzel taq uxlabʼal kukʼ. Kkibʼij: «Ri in kinya ubʼixik weriʼ chiwech pa ri ubʼi ri Jesus, ri jun che tajin kuya ubʼixik ri Pabʼlo».
Ekʼo ewuqubʼ ukʼojol ri Esseva, jun nim chuchqajaw ajjudiʼo, eʼare ri eʼareʼ kebʼanow weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri itzel uxlabʼal kubʼij chkech: «Ri in wetaʼm uwach ri Jesus, xoqujeʼ wetaʼm uwach ri Pabʼlo; kʼatekʼut, ¿Ix jachin ri ix?».
E ri achi che chapom rumal ri itzel uxlabʼal kukʼyaq ribʼ pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ, kchʼojin kukʼ e kubʼan kʼax chkech, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼareʼ, echʼanalik e esoktajinaq keʼel ubʼi pa we ja riʼ.
Konojel ri eʼajefesiʼo, ri eʼajjudiʼo e ri eʼajgriʼego, xketaʼmaj weriʼ. Konojel sibʼalaj xkixibʼij kibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, nim xkil wi ri ubʼi ri Ajawxel Jesus.
Ekʼi chkech ri eʼareʼ che xekojonik, kebʼe che ubʼixik ri kimak e kkikʼutu ri itzel kikʼaslemal.
Ekʼi chkech ri xkibʼan ri itzel taq jastaq kukʼ ri eʼitzel taq uxlabʼal, e xkikʼam ubʼi ri kiwuj e xkiporoj ri kiwuj chkiwach konojel. We wuj riʼ, rajil kawinaq lajuj mil saq pwaq.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, ri utzij ri Ajawxel kkʼiyik e kʼo sibʼalaj uchuqʼabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pabʼlo, xuchomaj che kbʼe pa ri Masedoniʼa e pa ri Akaya arech kopan pa ri Jerusalem. Ri areʼ kubʼij: «Aretaq chiʼ xinqʼaxitaj ri in chilaʼ, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik che ri in kinwil na ri Roma».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, keʼutaq ubʼi pa ri Masedoniʼa ekebʼ winaq che kechakun rukʼ ri areʼ, ri Timoteʼo e ri Erasto; e ri areʼ kkanaj kan kebʼ oxibʼ ikʼ pa ri Asiʼa.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kʼo jun chʼoʼj rumal ri Bʼe.
Jun winaq, Demetriʼo ri ubʼiʼ, ri areʼ ajchʼayil pwaq, kubʼan ri nim taq rachoch ri Artemis rukʼ saq taq pwaq, e rukʼ weriʼ kuya sibʼalaj kichak ekʼi ajchakibʼ.
Keʼumulij ri eʼareʼ e xoqujeʼ enikʼaj ajchakibʼ chik, e kubʼij chkech: «Ix wachiʼl, rumal we chak riʼ, ri ix kʼo jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix kiwilo e kito, che pa ri Efeso e xoqujeʼ pa ronojel ri Asiʼa, we Pabʼlo riʼ rumal ri utzij, kubʼano che sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq kkiterneʼbʼej ri areʼ, rumal rech che kubʼij che we qachak kqabʼan rukʼ we qaqʼabʼ, man edyos taj.
Weriʼ, man utz taj waʼ chrech we qachak, e kretzelaj uwach ri nim rachoch ri ixoq dyos Artemis, e kusach ri uqʼijil ri areʼ che kqʼijilax uwach pa ri Asiʼa e pa ronojel ri uwachulew».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj xpe koyowal e kkiriqaqej kichiʼ: «Nimalaj ubʼantajik ri Artemis kech ri eʼajefeso».
Xkʼojiʼ kʼax pa ronojel ri tinimit. Sibʼalaj kkitij anim kʼa ri ukʼolibʼal tzij, ekikʼamom ubʼik ri eʼajmasedoniʼo, ri Gayo e ri Aristarko, che xkachiʼlaj ri Pabʼlo pa ri ubʼe.
Ri Pabʼlo kraj kok ubʼik chkiwach ri kimulin kibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri etijoxelabʼ xkiqʼilo.
Ejujun winaq che eʼajsiʼarkas, che kkiloqʼoqʼej ri areʼ, sibʼalaj kkitaʼ chrech arech man kbʼe taj jawiʼ ekʼo wi ri winaq.
Enikʼaj winaq jun wi ri kkiraqaqej kichiʼ chrech, e enikʼaj chik, junwi chik kkiraqaqej kichiʼ. Ri winaq kimulin kibʼ, sibʼalaj kechʼuʼjarik, e areʼ sibʼalaj ekʼi ri man ketaʼm taj jasche kʼo ri mulin ibʼ.
Ejujun taq winaq kkibʼan che ri Alejandro –che ri eʼajjudiʼo, kkikoj nabʼe chikiwach–, kubʼij jun tzij chkech ri winaq. Kubʼan jun kʼutbʼal rukʼ uqʼabʼ e kraj kubʼij jun tzij chkech ri winaq.
Tekʼut aretaq chiʼ xketaʼmaj che ajjudiʼo ri areʼ, konojel xajunam uraqik kichiʼ kkibʼano kebʼ kajbʼal: «¡Nimalaj ubʼantajik ri Artemisa kech ri eʼajefeso!».
Aretaq chiʼ ri kinimal kkowinik kuqasaj kiwach, kubʼij chkech: «Ix ajefeso, ¿jachin man retaʼm taj pa we uwachulew, che ri tinimit rech ri Efeso areʼ kolowinaq ri nimalaj rachoch ri Artemis e ri uwachbʼal, che tzaqinaq uloq xas pa ri kaj uloq?
Rumal rech, che weriʼ qas saqalaj tzij, rajawaxik che ri ix kijaʼmarisaj iwach e mibʼan jun chʼuʼjalaj jas uwach.
Ri ix xeʼikam uloq we achijabʼ riʼ: Ri eʼareʼ ma kʼo ta jun kimak kibʼanom e man kʼo ta jun itzel tzij kibʼim puwiʼ ri ixoq dyos Artemis.
We ri Demetriʼo riʼ e ri eʼajchakibʼ che ekachiʼlam uloq ri areʼ, kʼo jun kichʼoj puwiʼ jun winaq, kʼo jun qʼatbʼaltzij e ekʼo ri enim keqleʼm (prokonsules): chkikʼamaʼ ubʼi ri kichʼoʼj chkiwach ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri ix kʼo chi na jun chik jas uwach, jeʼibʼij chkech ri nimalaj mulin ibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, kuyaʼo kchomaxik, che ri uj tajin kujchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri Sesar, rumal rech che man kʼo ta ubʼeʼal ucholajil we mulin ibʼ riʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ we tzij riʼ xutukij uwach we mulin ibʼ riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xkʼis uwach ri uraqik kichiʼ ri winaq, ri Pabʼlo keʼusikʼij ri etijoxelabʼ, e kuya jun kubʼisibʼal kʼuʼx chkech, e aretaq chiʼ xechʼabʼetaj kanoq, ri areʼ kel ubʼik e kbʼe pa ri Masedoniʼa.
Kbʼin pa we tinimit riʼ, e sibʼalaj kuya ubʼixik taq ri tzij rech chuqʼabʼ chkech ri kekojonik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kopan pa ri Gresiʼa,
chilaʼ kkanaj kan oxibʼ ik. Ri eʼajjudiʼo xkichomaj jun kʼax puwiʼ ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ uchomam chik che kbʼe na pa ri Siriʼa pa ri polow, kʼatekʼut rumal weriʼ ktzalej uloq pa ri Masedoniʼa.
Ri erachiʼl, eʼare ri Sopatros che ukʼojol ri Piro, ajbʼereʼa; ri Aristarko e ri Segundo, ri eʼareʼ eʼajtesalonika; ri Gayo che ajdobʼeres e ri Timoteʼo; xoqujeʼ ri eʼajasiʼa che eʼare ri Tikiko e ri Trofimo.
Ri eʼareʼ xenabʼeʼajik chqawach e xujkeyeʼj pa ri Troʼada.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kujel ubʼik chi pa ri Filipos e xujok pa ri polow, pa kʼisbʼal qʼij rech ri kaxlanwa che man kʼo ta uchʼamilal (Azimos); e pa jobʼ qʼij chik, xqiriq qibʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ pa ri Troʼada, chilaʼ kujkanaj kanoq wuqubʼ qʼij.
Ri nabʼe qʼij rech ri xmano, ri uj xqamulij qibʼ che upirik ri kaxlanwa; ri Pabʼlo che kel na ubʼik pa ri jun chik qʼij kchʼaw kukʼ ri eʼareʼ. Kchʼaw kukʼ ri eʼareʼ chi kʼateʼ pa nikʼaj aqʼabʼ.
Kʼo sibʼalaj taq chäj pa ri kʼolibʼal chikaj jawijeʼ ujkʼo wi ri uj.
Jun kʼojol ala, che ubʼiʼ Eʼutiko, kʼo puwiʼ ri uchiʼ wantana, ri areʼ sibʼalaj kʼax chi uwaram, aretaq chiʼ tajin kchʼaw ri Pabʼlo. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ xtzaq ubʼik xas pa ri urox aqʼanibʼal ja ubʼik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkichʼelej, xas kaminaq chi wi.
Ri Pabʼlo kqaj uloq, kulukubʼaʼ ribʼ puwiʼ ri areʼ, kuqʼaluj e kubʼij: «Mixibʼij iwibʼ, ri ruxlabʼal kʼo pa ri areʼ».
Aninaq kaqaʼn ubʼik, kupir ri kaxlanwa e kwaʼik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj kchʼaw chi kʼateʼ na xsaqarsanik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kel ubʼik.
Ri kʼojol ala kʼaslik; e weriʼ jun nimalaj kubʼiʼsabʼal kʼuʼx.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kujnabʼeʼaj ubʼi pa ri polow, kujbʼin rukʼ ri alaj jukubʼ kujbʼe ubʼik chunaqaj ri Asso, jawijeʼ kaqariqaʼ wi ri Pabʼlo, arech kqakʼamaʼ ubʼik ri areʼ; rumal rech che ri areʼ xuchomaj che chraqan kbʼe ubʼik.
Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ xujuriqaʼ pa ri Asso, ri uj kqakʼam ubʼi ri areʼ pa ri qajukubʼ, e kujbʼe pa ri Mitilene.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri jun chik qʼij, kujel ubʼik, e kujbʼe chuwach ri Kiʼos. Pa ri jun chik qʼij, xujqʼax chuwach ri Samos, xujchakiʼ pa ri Trogiliʼon, e pa ri jun chik qʼij, xujopan pa ri Mileto.
Ri Pabʼlo, xuchomaj che xaq xqʼax ubʼik pa ri Efeso, arech man xaq ta kubʼiy kan ribʼ pa ri Asiʼa. Xas chanim kbʼek, rumal rech che we kkowinik, kraj ri areʼ kʼo pa ri Jerusalem pa ri uqʼij ri Pentekostes.
Chi pa ri Mileto wi, ktaqan uloq arech ri enim winaq rech ri Komon Tyox pa ri Efeso, kepe rukʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ keʼopan ri eʼareʼ rukʼ, kubʼij chkech: «Ri ix iwetaʼm ri xinbʼan ri in iwukʼ chi pa ri nabʼe qʼij, aretaq chiʼ xinopan ri in pa ri Asiʼa,
kinpatanij ri Ajawxel, ri in kinwonanik, ri in kinoqʼik e ri in xinriq sibʼalaj kʼax rumal kech ri eʼajjudiʼo.
Ri ix iwetaʼm che ri in xinbʼan ronojel ri utzil chiwech, aretaq chiʼ rajawaxik che ri ix kʼo ri tzij iwukʼ, xinya ubʼixik, kneʼbʼaʼ pa ri kʼaybʼal on pa ri iwachoch,
xintaʼ chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo e chkech ri eʼajgriʼego arech kkikʼex kibʼ chuwach ri Dyos e kekojon chrech ri Jesus Qajawxel.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, ri in in jatʼalik rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, kinbʼe ubʼik pa ri Jerusalem, kʼatekʼuriʼ man wetaʼm ta ri jastaq che kpe panuwiʼ chilaʼ,
kʼatekʼut, pa ronojel tinimit, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel kubʼij chwech che inreyeʼm na sibʼalaj kʼax.
Kʼatekʼut ri in, man kinya ta jun uqʼijil we nukʼaslemal, ri in xuwi kinwaj kintij anim e kinbʼan ri nuchak che xuya ri Ajawxel Jesus chwech: rajawaxik che kinya ubʼixik ri utzil rech ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri usipanik ri Dyos.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, ri in wetaʼm, che ri ix iwonojel man kiwil ta chi jumul nuwach, ri ix, che xinkʼojiʼ chixoʼl e xinyaʼ ubʼixik ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in kamik riʼ, kinbʼij chiwach ri ix: ri in man kʼo ta jun numak rukʼ ri kikʼel nimalaj konojel winaq.
Rumal rech, che ri in, man xinxibʼij ta wibʼ, xinya ubʼixik ronojel ri jastaq che rajawaxik kinbʼij, xinbʼij ri urayibʼal ri Dyos chiwech.
«Ri ix, utz chiwilaʼ iwibʼ e cheʼiwilaʼ konojel ri ejuqʼat che ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel kixukoj ajyuqʼ pakiwiʼ, arech ri ix kixyuqʼunik chrech ri Utyox ri Dyos, che ri areʼ xuloqʼ rumal ri ukikʼel ri ukʼojol.
«Ri in wetaʼm, che aretaq chiʼ kinbʼe ubʼi ri in, kepe na riʼ chixoʼl ri ix ejujun taq utiw che kkibʼan na riʼ kʼax chkech ri juqʼat,
e xoqujeʼ xas chixoʼl ri ix, kewaʼlij na riʼ ejujun taq achijabʼ che kkitzijoj na riʼ xibʼibʼal taq tzij, arech kekichorej ubʼik ri etijoxelabʼ kukʼ.
Rumal weriʼ, utz rilik chibʼanaʼ ronojel, chnaʼtajoq chiwech che pa oxibʼ junabʼ, chi chaqʼabʼ e chi pa qʼij, ri in man xintaniʼ ta che ri iyajik iwonojel rukʼ oqʼej.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, kixinkoj chuwach ri Dyos e chuwach ri utzij ri usipanik, che kkowinik kuyak ri ja e che kkowinik kuya ri echbʼal chiwech chkixoʼl konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
«Ri in man xwaj ta pwaq, on qʼan pwaq, on atzʼyaq che rech jun chik:
ri ix iwetaʼm che aretaq chiʼ rajawaxik chwech ri in e chkech ri ewachiʼl, are we nuqʼabʼ riʼ xchakunik e xubʼan ri jastaq che rajawaxik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, xinkʼut weriʼ chiwech: rajawaxik che pa ri kʼax chak keqapatanij ri etuqaʼr winaq e knaʼtisaxik ri taq utzij ri Ajawxel Jesus, che xas are areʼ xbʼinik: are nim chi na ri kiʼkotemal kuyaʼo pa ri yaʼanik, chuwach ri ukʼamik».
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj rumal we tzij riʼm xxukiʼ kukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Konojel keʼoqʼik, kkikʼyaq kibʼ puwiʼ ri Pabʼlo, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkiqʼaluj ri areʼ e kitzʼumaj rukʼ ronojel kanimaʼ,
ri eʼareʼ kʼo kʼax pa ri kanimaʼ rumal rech che ri areʼ xubʼij che man kkil ta chi uwach riʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkachiʼlaj ubʼik chi kʼateʼ na pa ri jukubʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xechʼabʼetaj kanoq ri eʼareʼ, ri uj xujok pa ri polow, kʼatekʼuriʼ xujbʼe ubʼik chi pa ri Kos; pa ri jun chik qʼij, ri uj xujqʼax chuwach ri Rodos e ri Patara.
Xqariq jun jukubʼ che kbʼe ubʼik pa ri Fenisiʼa, ri uj xujaqʼan chupam e xujbʼek.
Aretaq chiʼ ri uj, uj kʼo apan chuwach ri Chipre, xqaya kanoq pa ri qamox, e ri uj kujbʼe ubʼi pa ri Siriʼa, kʼatekʼuriʼ xujopan pa ri Tiro, rumal rech che chilaʼ, ri jukubʼ rajawaxik kuya kan ri eqʼan.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼeqariqaʼ ri etijoxelabʼ, xujkanaj chilaʼ wuqubʼ qʼij. Rukʼ ri Uxlabʼaxel, ejujun chkech ri eʼareʼ xkibʼij chrech ri Pabʼlo arech man kapaqiʼ ta pa ri Jerusalem.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xkʼis ri wuqubʼ qʼij, ri uj xujel ubʼik. Ri uj xujkachiʼlaj konojel ri winaq, xoqujeʼ ri ixoqibʼ e ri akʼalabʼ. Tzaʼn ja che ri tinimit, xujxukiʼ chuchiʼ ri polow e xujchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xyaʼtaj ri rutzil qawach, ri uj xujaqʼan pa ri jukubʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri winaq xetzelej pa taq ri kachoch.
Ri uj pa ri jukubʼ, xujbʼe chi pa ri Tiro kʼa pa ri Tolemaʼida; ri uj xqayaʼ rutzil kiwach ri eʼachalaxik e xujkanaj kan jun qʼij kukʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xujel ubʼik pa ri jun qʼij chik chi kʼa pa ri Sesareʼa: Xujqaj pa ri rachoch ri Felipe ri jun che are yaʼl ubʼixik ri utzalaj tzij, ri areʼ jun chkixoʼl ri Wuqubʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xujkanaj kan pa ri rachoch.
Ri areʼ kʼo ekijebʼ qʼapoj umiʼal che kkibʼij ri tzij jeʼ jas ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri uj xujkanaj kan chilaʼ kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij; jun qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, Agabʼus ri ubʼiʼ, xqaj uloq chi pa ri Judeʼa.
Xpe qukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xukʼam ukoq ri ximbʼal upam ri Pabʼlo, xuxim ri raqan e ri uqʼabʼ e kubʼij: «Ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel kubʼij weriʼ: Ri achi che rech we ximbal riʼ; jewaʼ uximik ri areʼ kkibʼan na ri eʼajjudiʼo pa ri Jerusalem, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkikʼam na ubʼi ri areʼ chkiwach ri man kekojon taj».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri uj e ri winaq che eʼajchilaʼ, xqata chrech ri Pabʼlo arech man kpaqiʼ ta ubʼi pa ri Jerusalem.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ kubʼij: «¿Jasche, che ri ix kixoqʼik e kibʼan kʼax chrech ri wanimaʼ? Ri in kinkʼamowaj che kinyutik e xoqujeʼ che kinkamisaxik pa ri Jerusalem rumal ri ubʼi ri Ajawxel Jesus».
Rumal che man kraj taj kutaʼ ri qatzij chrech, kujtaniʼ che ubʼixik ri qatzij, e kqabʼij: «Chbʼantajoq bʼaʼ ri uraybʼal ri Ajawxel!».
Aretaq chiʼ xokʼow we jujun taq qʼij riʼ, kqasukʼubʼa ri rajawaxik, e kujpaqiʼ chi pa ri Jerusalem.
Ejujun tijoxelabʼ eʼajsesareʼa xebʼe qukʼ e xujkikʼam ubʼi pa ri rachoch ri Mnason che ajchipre jun ojer tijoxel pa ri nabʼe taq qʼij.
Aretaq chiʼ ri uj xujopan pa ri Jerusalem, ri eʼachalaxik xujkikʼulaj rukʼ sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, ri Pabʼlo kbʼe qukʼ pa ri rachoch ri Santiʼago, jawijeʼ xkimulij wi kibʼ konojel ri enim taq winaq.
Aretaq chiʼ xuyaʼ ri rutzil kiwach, kubʼij chkech, ronojel ri jastaq che xubʼan ri Dyos chkech ri man kekojon taj rumal ri uchak ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ nim xkil wi ri Dyos rumal ri tzij che xkito. Kʼatekʼuriʼ; kkibʼij chrech: «Chawilaʼ bʼaʼ ri at qachalal, che sibʼalaj eʼajjudiʼo xekojonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ konojel sibʼalaj eʼachixom chrech ri Pixabʼ.
Tatajinaq utzijol kumal ri eʼareʼ, che ri at akʼutum chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, ri ekʼo chkixoʼl ri man kekojon taj, che kkiyaʼ kan ri Moʼises, aretaq chiʼ abʼim chkech, che man kkipus ta chi ri uwiʼ ri kikowil ri ekalkʼuwaʼl e che man kkiterneʼbʼej ta chi ri Pixabʼ.
¿Jas kʼu kqabʼano? Ri winaq, xas kkimulij kibʼ riʼ, rumal rech che kkitaʼ na riʼ che ri at at kʼo waral riʼ.
Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri jastaq che ri uj kqabʼij chawech. Qukʼ ri uj ekʼo ekijebʼ achijabʼ che xkiya ri kitzij chrech ri Dyos.
Cheʼakʼamaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼi ri eʼareʼ, chabʼanaʼ ri chʼajchʼobʼenik kukʼ ri eʼareʼ e chatojoʼ bʼaʼ ri at rajil arech ksokax ri kiwiʼ. Xa jekʼuriʼ, konojel riʼ ri winaq, kketaʼmaj riʼ che man tzij ta riʼ ri tzij che xkitaʼ pawiʼ ri at, e xoqujeʼ, che ri at katerneʼbʼej ri Pixabʼ.
Ri winaq che nabʼe kanoq man kekojon taj e kamik riʼ kekojon chik, xtaqatajik ubʼixik ri qatzij: kaqʼil ibʼ che utijik ri tiʼj che rech tabʼal toqʼobʼ xya chkech ri eʼesal uwach dyos, kaqil ibʼ che utijik ri kikʼel, ri kitiʼj ri jetaq awaj che kejitzʼaxik, e kaqʼil ibʼ chrech ri jetaq kʼulanem che man utz taj».
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, ri Pabʼlo keʼukʼam ubʼi we achijabʼ riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kbʼe kukʼ chrech ri chʼajchʼobʼenik e kok pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, arech kuya ubʼixik jumpaʼ kkʼis taq ri qʼij rech ri chʼajchʼobʼenik, e jumpaʼ rajawaxik che kchiʼxik ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kech konojel ri eʼareʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kkʼis ri wuqubʼ qʼij, ri eʼajjudiʼo che epetinaq pa ri Asiʼa, kkil ri areʼ pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, kkibʼij ri kʼax puwiʼ ri areʼ chkech ri winaq e kkikoj kiqʼabʼ chrech ri areʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ kkiraqaqej kichiʼ: «¡Achijabʼ ix ajisraʼel, chujitoʼoʼ bʼaʼ! ¡Are waʼ we jun achi riʼ che kubʼij chkech konojel e pa ronojel kʼolbʼal, ri itzel puwiʼ ri qatinimit, puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ e puwiʼ we Kʼolbʼal riʼ! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ keʼukʼam ne uloq ejujun eʼajgriʼego pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos e xretzalaj we Tyoxlaj Kʼolbʼal riʼ».
Weriʼ, xa rumal rech, che xkil ri areʼ pa ri tinimit rukʼ ri Trofimo, ri areʼ che ajefeso, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkichomaj, che are ri Pabʼlo xkʼamow uloq ri areʼ pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos.
Konojel ri tinamit kechʼujarik, e ri winaq kepe uloq chi pa ronojel kʼolbʼal uloq. Kkikoj kiqʼabʼ chrech ri Pabʼlo e xkichorej ubʼi ri areʼ chi pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, e kkitzʼapij taq ri uchiʼ ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos.
Kkaj kkikamisaj ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ, xopan rukʼ ri nimalaj kʼamalbʼe chkech enikʼaj ekʼamalbʼe chik che erech chʼoʼj xopan rukʼ we tzij riʼ: «Xuwaʼlisaj ribʼ ronojel ri Jerusalem!».
Xas chanim, keʼukʼam ubʼi rukʼ ri areʼ ejujun taq soldados e ejujun taq senturiʼones, e kutij anim jawiʼ ekʼo wi ri winaq. Ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkil ri kinimal e ri jetaq esoldado, ketaniʼ che uchʼayʼik ri Pabʼlo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kinimal kaqit ukok rukʼ, kukʼam ubʼi ri areʼ e ktaqanik arech kjatʼix ri areʼ rukʼ kebʼ chʼichʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ kutaʼo jachin ri areʼ e jas xubʼano.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chkixoʼl ri winaq, enikʼaj jun wi ri kkiraqaqej kichiʼ, e ri enikʼaj chik jun wi chik kkiraqaqej kichiʼ. Pa we kʼax riʼ, man kbʼan ta kowinem che jun saq tzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ ktaqanik arech kkʼam ubʼi ri areʼ pa ri ja rech ri chʼoʼj.
Aretaq chiʼ kopan chuwach ri aqʼanibʼal, rajawaxik che ri jetaq exoltato kkitelej ri areʼ, rumal rech che ri winaq sibʼalaj kʼax tajin kkibʼano.
Sibʼalaj winaq kkiterneʼbʼem ubʼi ri areʼ, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ e kkibʼij: «Chikamisaj ri areʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ ri Pabʼlo kʼo chuwach ri uchiʼja rech ri chʼoʼj, kubʼij chrech ri kinimal: «¿La kuyaʼo kinbʼij jun tzij?». –Ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: «¿awetaʼm bʼa ri at ri griʼego?
¿La man at ta ri jun ajegipto che pa taq we qʼij riʼ xeʼuwaʼlisaj ekijebʼ mil itzel taq winaq e xeʼukʼam uloq ri eʼareʼ pa ri tzʼinalik ulew?».
–Ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ri in in ajjudiʼo, in ajtarso, jun utinimit ri Silisiʼa, e ri nutinimit kʼo jun utzalaj utzijoxik. Kintaʼ chawech, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chwech arech kinbʼij jun tzij chkech le siwantinimit».
Weriʼ xyataʼj chrech ri Pabʼlo. Ri areʼ takʼal cho taq ri aqanibʼal, kubʼan jun kʼutbʼal rukʼ ri uqʼabʼ. Man kʼo ta chi jun jas uwach ktatajik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ xeʼuchabʼej pa tzij Hebʼreʼo.
«Eʼachalaxik e eqatataxelabʼ, chitatabʼej we tzij, che kamik riʼ rajawaxik kinbʼij chiwech arech kintoʼ wibʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ kkito che kchʼaw kukʼ pa tzij hebʼreʼo, man kʼo ta chi jun kchʼawik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij:
«Ri in, in ajjudiʼo; ri in, xinalax pa ri Tarso che jun utinimit ri Silisiʼa, kʼatekʼut, ri in xinkʼiy pa we tinimit riʼ, e chuwach ri raqan ri Gamaliʼel, ri in, utz retaʼmaxik xinbʼano ri Pixabʼ kech ri eqatat, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in sibʼalaj inachixom chrech ri Dyos, ix jacha ri ix kamik riʼ.
Ri in xinwoqataj xas rukʼ kamikal we Jun Bʼe riʼ, ri in xinkoj ri jetaq chʼichʼ chkech ri achijabʼ e ri ixoqibʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xeʼinkʼyaq pa ri cheʼ,
jeriʼ jacha ketaʼm ri nim taq chuchqajawibʼ e konojel ri juqʼat kech ri enim taq winaq. Xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ riʼ xkiyaʼ ubʼi jujun taq wuj chwech kech ri eʼachalaxik ekʼo pa ri Damasko, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in, xinbʼek, xinsukʼ ubʼi pa we tinimit riʼ, arech rukʼ taq chʼichʼ eyutulik keʼinkʼam uloq in ri eʼareʼ pa ri Jerusalem, e xa jeriʼ kkʼajisax kiwach ri eʼareʼ.
«Ri in, aretaq chiʼ inbʼenaq pa ri bʼe naqaj chik chrech ri Damasko, chi, xaqteʼ, pa ri kabʼlajuj kajbʼal, kʼo jun nimalaj saqil xas pa ri kaj petinaq wi uloq, xusutij wij e xchubʼlinik.
Ri in xintzaq choʼ ri ulew e xintaʼ jun chʼabʼal che xubʼij chwech: “Saʼulo, Saʼulo ¿jas rumal rech che kinawoqataj?”.
Ri in xinbʼij: “¿At jachin ri at Ajawxel?”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chwech: “In ri in Jesus ri Nasoreʼo che ri at kawoqataj”.
Ri eʼareʼ che ekʼo wukʼ xkil ri saqil, kʼatekʼut, man xkitaʼ ta ri uchʼabʼal ri areʼ che xchʼaw wukʼ ri in.
Ri in xinbʼij: “¿Jas rajawaxik kinbʼan na, Ajawxel?ʼ Ri Ajawxel kubʼij chwech: “Chatwaʼlijoq. Jat ubʼiʼ pa ri Damasko. Jelaʼ kkibʼix na riʼ chawech ronojel ri jastaq che rajawaxik kabʼan na ri at”.
Ri in, man kinkaʼy ta chik rumal ri nimalaj saqil, jun chkech ri ewachiʼl, xinuyuqej ubʼi chrech ri nuqʼabʼ e xa jeriʼ xinopan pa ri Damasko.
«Chilaʼ kʼo ri Ananiʼas, jun utz achi chuwach ri Pixabʼ e konojel ri eʼajjudiʼo ekʼo pa ri tinimit, nim kkil wi ri areʼ;
xpe wukʼ in, e aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kʼo naqaj chwech, kubʼij chwech: “Saʼulo, wachalal, chatkaʼy bʼaʼ jumul chik”. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in, chi chanim xinwil ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij: “Ri Kidyos ri eqatat, xraj che ri at kawetamaʼj ri urayibʼal ri areʼ, arech ri at kawil ri Sukʼ winaq, e kataʼ ri uchʼabʼal che xas kel uloq pa ri uchiʼ;
rumal rech che rajawaxik, che ri at, utz che kabʼij chkiwach konojel ri jetaq winaq ri jastaq xawilo e xataʼo.
¿Jas jun chik tzij kaweyeʼj na kqabʼij? ¡Chatwaʼlijoq! Chakʼamaʼ ri qasnaʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ chachʼajaʼ ri amak pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Areʼ”.
«Aretaq chiʼ ri in inkʼo chi jumul pa ri Jerusalem, pa jun qʼij aretaq chiʼ kinchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pa ri Nim Rachoch, ri in kʼo jun nuwichikʼ.
Ri in, xinwil ri Ajawxel che xubʼij chwech: “¡Xas chanim riʼ, chatel ubʼik pa we Jerusalem, rumal rech che man kkʼulax ta riʼ ri atzij panuwiʼ ri in!”.
Ri in kinbʼij: “Ajawxel, ri eʼareʼ ketaʼm, che ri in, pa taq ri sinagoga xeʼinkʼam ubʼik e xeʼinkʼyaq pa ri cheʼ e xintaqanik arech kejichʼix rukʼ asyar, ri jachintaq xekojon chawech;
e aretaq chiʼ xkichikej ri ukikʼel ri Estebʼan, ri yaʼl tzij pawiʼ, ri in, in kʼo chilaʼ, xoqujeʼ ri in, utz xeʼinwilo ri jachitaq xekamisanik ri areʼ e in ri xinkʼolow ri katzʼyaq ri eʼareʼ.”
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xubʼij chwech: “Jat; ri in kinwaj naj katintaq ubʼik, katintaq ubʼi kukʼ ri man kekojon taj”».
Xkitatabʼej ri areʼ chi kʼateʼ na we tzij riʼ. Kʼatekʼut rukʼ taq we tzij riʼ, kkiraqaqej kichiʼ e kkibʼij: «Chiwesaj ubʼi cho ri uwachulew we jun winaq riʼ. Ri areʼ man utz taj che kʼo ri ukʼaslemal».
Kkibʼan sibʼalaj kʼax, e kkikʼyaq ri katzʼyaq, kkikʼyaq ri poqlaj pa taq kyaqiqʼ.
Ri kinimal kubʼano che kkʼam uloq ri areʼ pa ri ja rech ri chʼoʼj e ktaqanik arech kkikʼot uchiʼ ri areʼ rukʼ ri xikʼay, arech ketaʼmaj jasche kkiraqaqej kichiʼ ri winaq puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kjatʼim ri areʼ, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij chrech ri kʼamalbʼe chkech eʼokʼal winaq: «¿La yataʼl chiwech arech ri ix kijichʼij jun ajromano che man kʼo ta jun qʼatbʼaltzij xbʼan puwiʼ?».
Rukʼ taq we tzij riʼ ri jun kʼamalbʼe kbʼe rukʼ ri kinimal arech kubʼij chrech: «¿Jas kabʼan na riʼ? We jun achi riʼ ri areʼ jun ajromano».
Ri kinimal kpetik e kutaʼ chrech ri Pabʼlo: «Chabʼij chwech, ¿la at ajromano ri at?». –Kubʼij: «Jeʼ nakʼut ri in, in ajromano».
Ri kinimal kubʼij: «Ri in sibʼalaj pwaq xinyaʼo che uloqʼik arech kinokik in ajromano». –Ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ri in, in ajromano chi pa ri walaxibʼal uloq».
Ri winaq che xepe uloq che utayʼik che ri areʼ, keʼel ubʼik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kinimal kuxibʼij ribʼ rumal rech che xretaʼmaj che xujatʼij ri chʼichʼ chrech jun ajromano.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, kraj kretaʼmaj jas ri qas kkibʼij ri eʼajjudiʼo puwiʼ ri areʼ. Kubʼano che kkirik ri areʼ e ktaqanik arech kkimulij kibʼ ri enim chuchqajawibʼ e konojel ri Sanedrin. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kukʼam uloq ri Pabʼlo e kuya ri areʼ chkiwach.
Ri Pabʼlo keʼukaʼyej ri Sanedrin e kubʼij: «Eʼachalaxik, ri in inbʼenaq chuwach ri Dyos rukʼ jun utz chomanik chi kʼateʼ pa we jun qʼij riʼ».
Kʼatekʼut, ri nim chuchqajaw Ananiʼas xas ktaqanik arech kwaqʼalexik pa ri uchiʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij chrech: «Ri Dyos katuchʼay na riʼ ri at, che at jun tapya asaqarisam awibʼ! Ri at, ¡la at tʼuyulik arech kabʼan ri qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ rukʼ ri Pixabʼ, e kawetzelaj uwach ri Pixabʼ aretaq chiʼ kattaqanik che nuchʼayik ri in!».
Ri eʼajchʼimiyabʼ kkibʼij chrech: «¿La kabʼij itzel taq tzij puwiʼ ri nim chuchqajaw rech ri Dyos?».
Ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ix wachalal, man wetaʼm taj, we are nim chuchqajaw riʼ ri areʼ. Rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: Mawetzelaj uwach ri kinimal atinimit».
Ri Pabʼlo retaʼm che kʼo ri juqʼat kech ri esaduseʼo, e xoqujeʼ ri juqʼat kech ri efariseʼo. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuraq uchiʼ pa ri Sanedrin: «Eʼachalaxik, ri in, in fariseʼo, in ralkʼuwaʼl jun fariseʼo. Ri in, in kʼo chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij riʼ rumal rech che ri uj kqeyeʼj ri kʼastajibʼal kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ».
Rukʼ we tzij riʼ xas chanim kechʼoʼjin ri efariseʼo kukʼ ri esaduseʼo e ri komon xkijach kiwach.
Rumal rech che ri esaduseʼo kkibʼij che man kʼo ta ri kʼastajibʼal, man kʼo ta eʼanjel, man kʼo ta eʼuxlabʼal, kʼatekʼut ri efariseʼo kkikoj weriʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xmajtaj jun nimalaj kʼax. Ejujun etzʼibʼanelabʼ kech ri ekijuqʼat ri efariseʼo, kewaʼlijik e sibʼalaj kekʼulelaʼn che we jastaq riʼ: «Ri uj man kqariq ta jun itzel jas uwach puwiʼ we achi riʼ. ¿La jun uxlabʼal lo xchʼaw rukʼ? ¿On jun anjel ne lo?».
E chanim xwaʼlaj jun nimalaj chʼoʼj chkixoʼl. Ri kinimal, kuxibʼij ribʼ we ri winaq kkimuch ri Pabʼlo. Xa jekʼkʼuriʼ keʼutaq ri exoltato arech keqaj uloq e kkikʼam ubʼi ri areʼ pa ri ja rech ri chʼoʼj.
Pa ri ju chaqʼabʼ chik, ri Ajawxel kuluriqaʼ ri areʼ e kubʼij chrech: «¡Chkubʼi bʼaʼ akʼuʼx! Jeriʼ jacha qas utz ubʼixik xabʼan panuwiʼ ri in pa ri Jerusalem, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik che jeriʼ, utz ubʼixik kabʼano panuwiʼ ri in pa ri Roma».
Aretaq chiʼ ksaqarsan uwach ri qʼij, ri eʼajjudiʼo kkimulij kibʼ xechomanik e xkijikibʼa kitzij xas rukʼ ri anatema che man kewaʼ ta na e man kequmun ta na chi kʼateʼ na kkikamisaj ri Pabʼlo.
Ri eʼareʼ che xkichomaj weriʼ ekʼi chi na chuwach ri kawinaq.
Keʼopan chkiwach ri enim taq chuchqajawibʼ e ri enim winaq e kkibʼij chkech: «Ri uj kqabʼij xas rukʼ ri anatema che ri uj man kqatij ta na ri qawa e ri qukʼyaʼ chi kʼateʼ na ri uj kqakamisaj ri Pabʼlo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix chanim riʼ, kukʼ ri Sanedrin, chibʼij chrech ri kinimal, che rajawaxik che kkʼam uloq ri areʼ iwukʼ waral, arech ri ix utz rilik kibʼano ri ubʼantajik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kopanik, kqakamisaj na riʼ pa ri bʼe».
Ri ral ri ranabʼ ri Pabʼlo xretaʼmaj weriʼ. Kbʼek ubʼik chi pa ri ja rech ri chʼoʼj, kok ubʼik e kubʼij weriʼ chrech ri Pabʼlo.
Ri Pabʼlo kusikʼij jun chkech ri kʼamalbʼe chkech oʼkʼal e kubʼij chrech: «Chakʼamaʼ ubʼik we akʼal riʼ chuwach ri kinimal; rajawaxik che kubʼij jun tzij chrech ri areʼ».
Ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal kukʼam ubʼi ri areʼ e kukʼam ubʼik chuwach ri kinimal. Kubʼij: «Ri Pabʼlo che kʼo pacheʼ, xinusikʼij e xutaʼ chwech arech kinkʼam uloq we akʼal riʼ chawech, rumal rech che kʼo kraj kubʼij chawech».
Ri kinimal kukʼam ubʼi ri akʼal chrech ri uqʼabʼ, kukʼuʼ ribʼ rukʼ e kutaʼ chrech: «¿Jas ri kawaj kabʼij at chwech?».
Kubʼij: «Ri eʼajjudiʼo xkimulij kibʼ e kkaj kkitaʼ chawech arech kakʼam uloq ri Pabʼlo chuwach ri Sanedrin chweʼq, arech utz unikʼoxik kkibʼan ri ubʼantajik areʼ.
Makoj kitzij ri eʼareʼ, ekʼi chi na chuwach ri kawinaq ri kkiyeʼj ri areʼ, xkibʼij rukʼ ri anatema che man kkitij ta na kiwa kukʼyaʼ chi kʼateʼ na kkikamisaj ri areʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chanim riʼ keyeʼm che ri at kayaʼ bʼe chkech che ubʼanik weriʼ».
Ri kinimal kuya kan ri akʼal e kuchilbʼej kanoq chrech we tzij riʼ: «Mabʼij chrech jun winaq che xabʼij chwech we jastaq riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuri, keʼusikʼij ekebʼ ekʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal e kubʼij chkech: «Pa ri oxibʼ kajbʼal chaqʼabʼ, pa aninaqil cheʼel ubʼik chi pa ri Sesareʼa ekebʼ okʼal exoltato, oxkʼal lajuj kkikejbʼej ri kej, e ekebʼ okʼal achijabʼ rukʼ ri kijastaq rech chʼoʼj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ejujun kej arech kukoj ri Pabʼlo e utz ukʼamik ubʼik ri areʼ chibʼanaʼ chi kʼateʼ rukʼ ri Qʼataltzij Felix».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kutzʼibʼaj jun wuj:
«Ri Klaʼudiʼo Lisiʼas kuyaʼ jun rutzil uwach chrech ri utzalaj Qʼataltzij Felix!
Ri eʼajjudiʼo xkichap we achi riʼ, e xkaj xkikamisaj ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ xinopan kukʼ ri exoltato e xintoqij ri areʼ pa kiqʼabʼ, rumal rech che wetaʼm che ri areʼ jun ajromano.
Ri in xinwaj xinwetaʼmaj jas ri itzel xbʼix puwiʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinkʼam uloq ri areʼ chuwach ri Kisanedrin.
Xinwilo che ri eʼareʼ kechʼoʼjin puwiʼ ri Kipixabʼ, e man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che kuyaʼo kkamisax rumal on che kaxim rukʼ taq ri chʼichʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ wetaʼm che kkichomaj ri itzel puwiʼ we achi riʼ, chi chanim kintaq ubʼi ri areʼ chawech, kʼatekʼuriʼ xinbʼij chkech ri winaq riʼ, ri kebʼin ri itzel puwiʼ ri areʼ, che rajawaxik kkikʼam ubʼi ri kichoʼj chawach ri at».
Jeʼ jas ri taqanik xya chkech, ri exoltato kkikʼam ubʼi ri Pabʼlo e chaqʼabʼ kkikʼam ubʼik ri areʼ pa ri Antipatrida.
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, keʼkiyaʼ kan ri kikejenik arech eʼare kekʼamow ubʼi ri areʼ, e ri eʼareʼ ketzalej pa ri ja rech ri chʼoj.
Aretaq chiʼ xeʼopan pa ri Sesareʼa, ri kikejenik kkiya ri wuj chrech ri Qʼataltzij e kkiya ri Pabʼlo chuwach.
Aretaq chiʼ xusikʼij ri wuj, ri qʼataltzij kutaʼo jachikeʼ ri utinimit ri areʼ. Aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kretaʼmaj che ri areʼ ajsilisiʼa,
kubʼij chrech: «Katintatabʼej na riʼ aretaq chiʼ kepetik ri xekojon ri tzij pawiʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ xtaqanik arech kokisax ri areʼ pa ri rachoch ri Herodes.
Pa ri jobʼ qʼij chiʼ aqʼanoq, ri nim chuchqajaw Ananiʼas kqaj uloq kukʼ ejujun taq enim winaq e jun chʼawel pakiwiʼ winaq, Tertulo ri ubʼi, e chuwach ri Qʼataltzij kkikoj jun chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri Pabʼlo.
Kkisikʼij ri areʼ, e ri Tertulo kuchaplej ri chʼoʼj, jeriʼ kubʼij: «Maltyox che ri utzalaj jaʼmaril ri kʼo qukʼ uj awumal ri at, e xoqujeʼ, maltyox che ri jastaq che xakʼex ri at pa we qatinimit riʼ,
ri uj sibʼalaj qamaltyoxij pa ronojel e ronojel kʼolbʼal chawech ri at, utzalaj Felix.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in, man kinwaj taj kinbʼan nimalaj kʼax chawech, kintaʼ chawech che katatabʼej jubʼiqʼ ri nutzij rukʼ ri utzil che kʼo awukʼ at.
Ri uj xqilo che we achi riʼ jun nimalaj bʼinnelyabʼil, ri areʼ kubʼan ri kʼax chkixoʼl konojel ri eʼajjudiʼo pa ronojel ri uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ jun joʼs kʼamalbʼe chkech ri kijuqʼat ri eʼajnasoreʼo.
Xoqujeʼ ri areʼ xraj kretzelaj uwach ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, e ri uj xqaqʼatej ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at, katkowinik kakʼot uchiʼ arech kawilo che ri kqabʼij uj puwiʼ, chi qastzij wiʼ».
Ri eʼajjudiʼo xkitoʼo e xkibʼij che qastzij ronojel weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri qʼataltzij kubʼan jun kʼutbʼal chrech ri Pabʼlo arech ri kuyaʼo kchʼawik, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij:
Ri at, katkowinik kawetaʼmaj weriʼ: man ubʼanom ta kabʼlajuj qʼij che ri in xinpaqiʼ uloq pa ri nimalaj rachoch ri Dyos pa ri Jerusalem;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, on pa taq ri sinagoga, on pa ri tinimit, man in riqom taj che tajin kinbʼan ri kʼax chkech ri winaq aretaq chiʼ kinchʼaw kukʼ.
Kamik riʼ, man kekowin ta chech usaqarisaxik chawach ri jastasq che kamik kkibʼij panuwiʼ.
«Kʼatekʼut, kinqʼalajisaj weriʼ chawach: ri in kinpatanij ri Kidyos ri enutat aretaq chiʼ kinterneʼbʼej ri Bʼe, nukʼolom ri nukojonik pa ronojel ri jastaq che kʼo pa ri Pixabʼ e pa ronojel ri tzʼibʼatalik pa ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos,
kineyen che ri Dyos ejachaʼ ri eʼareʼ, che kʼo jun kʼastajibʼal kiwach ri esukʼalaj taq winaq xoqujeʼ ri eʼajmakibʼ.
Rumal kuwaʼ, xoqujeʼ ri in kinwaj che kʼo jun utzalaj nuchomanik chuwach ri Dyos e chkiwach ri winaq.
«Aretaq chiʼ, kʼo chi sibʼalaj nujunabʼ, ri in xinkʼam uloq jujun taq pwaq chrech we tinimit riʼ e xinchiʼj jujun taq tabʼal toqʼobʼ:
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinkiriqaʼ pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ tajin kinbʼan weriʼ chuwach chi aqʼanoq ri in xinbʼan ri chʼajchʼobʼenik xinbʼano e ri in man kʼo ta kʼax xinbʼano arech ri winaq xkimulij kibʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ejujun eʼajjudiʼo eʼajasiʼa – ¡eʼare riʼ ri eʼareʼ ri rajawaxik che kepe chawach e kkikoj jun chʼoʼj panuwiʼ, we kʼo jun jastaq uwach panuwiʼ ri in!
¡Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we eʼareʼ riʼ, che ri ekʼo waral riʼ, chkibʼij bʼaʼ ri numak che xkiriq panuwiʼ ri in aretaq chiʼ in kʼo chkiwach ri Sanedrin!
¿La xuwi rumal rech, che in xinraqaqej nuchiʼ chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ e xinbʼij: ri in, kamik riʼ kbʼan qʼatbʼaltzij panuwiʼ ri in rumal rech ri kʼastajibʼal kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ».
Ri Felix utz retaʼmaxik ubʼanom ronojel we jastaq puwiʼ ri Bʼe, e kuya kan ri qʼatbʼaltzij pa jun chik qʼij aretaq chiʼ kubʼij: «Aretaq chiʼ ri kʼamalbʼe Lisiʼas, kxuliʼ uloq, ri in kinbʼan na riʼ nuqʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ ri kibʼij».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktaqan chrech ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal arech kuya ri areʼ pa cheʼ e arech kuya bʼe chrech arech tzoqopitalik jubʼiq xoqujeʼ man keqʼil ta ri erachiʼl arech kkipatanij ri areʼ.
Okʼowinaq chi kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij, ri Felix kpe rukʼ ri rixoqil Drusila, che ri areʼ ajjudiʼa. Ktaqanik arech kkikʼam uloq ri Pabʼlo e kutaʼ ri areʼ chrech arech kchʼaw puwiʼ ri kojonik chrij ri Kristo Jesus.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kchʼaw puwiʼ ri sukʼil, ri qʼilik ibʼ, ri qʼatojtzij che kpe na, ri Felix kuxibʼij ribʼ e kubʼij: «Kamik riʼ kuyaʼo ri at katbʼek. Ri in katinsikʼij chi na riʼ jumul chik».
Xoqujeʼ kreyeʼj che ri Pabʼlo kuyaʼ na riʼ chrech nikʼaj pwaq; rumal kʼuriʼ sibʼalaj ktaqan che ukʼamik uloq ri areʼ arech kchʼaw rukʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ okowinaq chiʼ kebʼ junabʼ, ri Felix kʼo jun ukʼexwach chik, are ri Porsiʼo Festo; rumal rech che are kraj utz kkanaj chkiwach ri eʼajjudiʼo, ri Felix kuya kan ri Pabʼlo pacheʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Festo kʼo chi oxibʼ qʼij pa ri tinimit, ri areʼ kpaqiʼ chi pa ri Jerusalem.
Ri enim chuchqajaw e ri enim winaq kech ri eʼajjudiʼo, kkikoj jun chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri Pabʼlo. Kkikoj tzij
puwiʼ ri areʼ, kkitaʼ chrech jun toqʼobʼ, arech kkʼam ubʼik ri areʼ pa ri Jerusalem; e xa jekʼuriʼ loqʼ kkisukʼumaj jun kʼax chrech pa ri bʼe e kkikamisaj ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ri Festo kubʼij, che rajawaxik che ri Pabʼlo laqʼabʼem kkanaj pa cheʼ pa ri Sesareʼa, e che ri areʼ xas usukʼubʼam chi ribʼ arech kbʼe ubʼik jelaʼ.
Kubʼij: «¿Jachin taq ri kekowinik kexuliʼ ubʼik wukʼ ri in kebʼe ubʼik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri achi riʼ kʼo jun umak, jachintaq kʼo keqlem chkikojoʼ bʼaʼ jun chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri areʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ xqʼaxtaj wajxaqibʼ on lajuj qʼij chkixoʼl, kqaj ubʼik chi pa ri Sesareʼa, xtʼuyiʼ pa ri qʼatbʼaltzij pa ri jun chik qʼij: ktaqanik che ukʼamik uloq ri Pabʼlo.
Aretaq chiʼ ri Pabʼlo xpetik, ri eʼajjudiʼo che xeqaj uloq pa ri Jerusalem, kkimulij kibʼ chrij ri areʼ, e kkibʼan nimalaj chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri areʼ, e man kekowin ta che ukʼutik la qastzij ri kitzij.
Ri Pabʼlo xutoʼ ribʼ e kubʼij: «Ri in, man kʼo ta jun numak xinbʼan puwiʼ ri kipixabʼ kech ri eʼajjudiʼo, e xoqujeʼ puwiʼ ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos on puwiʼ ri Sesar».
Rumal che kraj ri Festo kubʼan ri kiraybʼal ri eʼajjudiʼo, kubʼij chrech ri Pabʼlo: «¿La kawaj katpaqiʼ chi pa ri Jerusalem arech ri at kbʼan ri qʼatbʼaltzij pawiʼ chnuwach ri in?».
Kʼatekʼut, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ri in, in kʼo chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar; e rajawaxik che ri in chiriʼ kbʼan wi ri qʼatbʼaltzij panuwiʼ. Ri in, man kʼo ta jun itzel jas uwach xinbʼan chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo, ri at utz retaʼmaxik abʼanom weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in qastzij kʼo jun numak, we xinbʼan jun jas uwach che taqaqalik ri kamikal chwech, ri in man kinpaqchij ta ri kamikal. Kʼatekʼut, we man kʼo ta jun jas uwach pa ri chʼoʼj che tajin kkibʼan we winaq chwij riʼ, man kʼo ta jun kkowinik kinuya chkech ri eʼareʼ. Ri in kintaʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij chrech ri Sesar».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Festo, ktzijon kukʼ ri eʼuwinaq e kutzalejisaj ri utzij: «Ri at kataʼ ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar, ri at katbʼe na riʼ chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar».
Okowinaq chi kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij, ri ajawinel Agripa e Bʼerenise, kepe pa ri Sesareʼa che uyaʼik jun rutzil uwach ri Festo.
Rumal che kekanaj kan kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij chilaʼ; ri Festo kuya ubʼixik chuwach ri ajawinel ri ukʼulmam ri Pabʼlo, kubʼij: «Kʼo jun achi waral che ri Felix xutzʼapij kanoq pa ri cheʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri in, in kʼo pa ri Jerusalem, ri enim chuchqajaw e ri enim winaq kech ri eʼajjudiʼo xkikoj jun chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri areʼ, e xkitaʼ qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ.
Ri in xinbʼij chkech, che ri eʼajromano, man kuya taj kkijach jun winaq we man kʼo ta jun chʼoʼj puwiʼ, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik che jachin taq xekojow ri chʼoʼj, junam kepetik chuwach ri areʼ, e ri areʼ kuyaʼo kutoʼ ribʼ puwiʼ ri chʼoʼj.
Ri eʼareʼ xepe waral wukʼ ri in, kʼatekʼuriʼ chi pa aninaqil, pa ri jun chik qʼij che xintuyiʼ pa ri nuqʼatbʼaltzij, xintaqanik arech kkʼam uloq ri achi.
Chuwach ri areʼ, ri winaq che xekojow ri chʼoʼj puwiʼ, man xkibʼij ta puwiʼ ri areʼ, jun chkech ri mak che xinchomaj ri in.
Ri eʼareʼ, xuwi kechʼojinik puwiʼ ri kikojonik e puwiʼ jun Jesus, che xkamisaxik, e ri Pabʼlo kubʼij che ri areʼ kʼaslik.
Ri in, rumal che man wetaʼm taj jas kinbʼan chuwach we tzij riʼ, xintaʼ chrech ri areʼ we kraj kbʼe pa ri Jerusalem, arech kbʼan ri qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Pabʼlo, xutaʼo che are utz kbʼe chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri emperador, kʼatekʼuriʼ xintaqanik arech klaqʼabʼaxik ri areʼ chi kʼateʼ na, kintaq na bʼi ri in ri areʼ chuwach ri Sesar».
Ri Agripa kubʼij chrech ri Festo: «Ri in, xoqujeʼ kinwaj kintaʼ we achi riʼ». –Kubʼij: «Chweʼq, ri at, kataʼ na riʼ ri utzij ri areʼ».
Pa ri jun qʼij chik, ri Agripa e ri Bʼerenise kepe rukʼ nimalaj kiqʼij, e kebʼe chi pa ri ja jawiʼ kbʼan wi ri tzij, kukʼ ri ekinimal e ri enim taq winaq kech ri tinimit. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Festo ktaqanik arech kkʼam uloq ri Pabʼlo.
Ri Festo kubʼij: «Ajawinel Agripa e iwonojel ri ix che ix kʼo waral qukʼ, ri ix, kiwil we achi riʼ, ronojel ri kijuqʼat ri eʼajjudiʼo xepe uloq wukʼ pa ri Jerusalem, kʼatekʼuriʼ, waral riʼ, xkiraqaqej kichiʼ e xkibʼij che ri areʼ man taqal ta chik chrij che kʼaslik.
Ri in xinwilo che man kʼo ta xubʼano che rumal taqal ri kamikal chrij, kʼatekʼut rumal che ri areʼ xutaʼ ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri emperador, ri in xinbʼij che kintaq na riʼ ri areʼ jelaʼ.
Ri in, man kʼo ta jun utz tzij wetaʼm puwiʼ ri areʼ che kinkowinik kintzʼibʼaj ubʼik puwiʼ chrech ri Ajawxel, rumal kʼuriʼ, ri in xintaqanik arech kkʼam uloq ri areʼ chiwach ri ix, e nabʼe chawach at, ajawinel Agripa, arech, che aretaq chiʼ xtataj ri areʼ awumal, ri in kuyaʼo kʼo jun jas uwach kintzʼibʼaj.
Ri in kinchomaj che jun moxil riʼ, we ri in kintaq ubʼik jun winaq pacheʼ e man kinbʼij ta ubʼik jas uwach ri umak».
Ri Agripa kubʼij chrech ri Pabʼlo: «Ri at yaʼtal chawech che katoʼ awibʼ». Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kulikʼ ri uqʼabʼ e kubʼij:
«Puwiʼ ronojel ri numak che kkikoj panuwiʼ ri eʼajjudeyibʼ, ri in sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik kamik riʼ, ajawinel Agripa, rumal rech che ri in kinkowinik kintoʼ wibʼ chawach,
e sibʼalaj nim, rumal rech che ri at awetaʼm ronojel ri kipixabʼ e ri kitzij ri eʼajjudiʼo. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinta chawech arech kataʼtabʼej ri nutzij rukʼ kochʼonik.
«Konojel ri eʼajjudiʼo, ketaʼm nuwach e ketaʼm ri nukʼaslemal, chi aretaq chiʼ ri in, in ala na, e chi aretaq chiʼ xinmajij nukʼolem pa ri nutinimit Jerusalem.
Ri eʼareʼ ketaʼm nuwach chi sibʼalaj qʼij uloq e kekowinik kkibʼij we kkaj, che ri in xinterneʼbʼej pa ri nukʼaslemal ri ujuqʼat ri nimalaj sukʼ kech ri efariseʼo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kamik riʼ, we ri in, in kʼo pa ri uqʼabʼ ri qʼataltzij, xane rumal rech, che ri in kinweyej ri tzij che xubʼij ri Dyos chkech ri eqatat,
e, ri ekabʼlajuj juqʼat xas keyeʼm weriʼ; aretaq chiʼ amaqʼel kkipatanij ri Dyos chi chaqʼabʼ e chi pa qʼij, keyeʼm ri utzalaj ukʼisbʼalil. Rumal kʼuwaʼ, che kinweyeʼj weriʼ, ajawinel, ri eʼajjudeyibʼ xkikoj jun chʼoʼj panuwiʼ ri in.
¿Jas che, che man kikoj ta ri ix, che ri Dyos keʼuwalisaj ri ekaminaqibʼ?
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, xinchomaj, che kinbʼan ronojel jastaq uwach, arech kinchʼoʼjij rukʼ ri ubʼi ri Jesus ri ajnasoreʼo.
E ri in xinbʼan weriʼ pa ri Jerusalem, ri in xeʼinkʼyaq pa ri cheʼ esibʼalaj tyoxlaj taq winaq, ri in xinkʼam we kowinem riʼ chi pa ri kitaqanik ri enim chuchqajawibʼ, e aretaq chiʼ xeʼkikamisaj ri eʼareʼ, utz xinwil in weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ amaqʼel, ri in xinbʼe pa ri jetaq sinagoga, e xinwaj che rukʼ taq kʼax, ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij jujun taq itzel tzij puwiʼ ri Jesus, e sibʼalaj woyowal chkech ri eʼareʼ, keʼinwoqataj xoqujeʼ chi pa ri kaxlan taq tinimit.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, xinbʼe pa ri Damasko, rukʼ ronojel kowinem e rukʼ kitaqanik ri enim chuchqajawibʼ.
Pa ri bʼe, aretaq chiʼ are kabʼlajuj kajbʼal rech pa qʼij, xinwilo; ajawinel, jun saqil che kpe chi pa ri kaj uloq e sibʼalaj kchʼubʼlin chuwach ri qʼij e kjuluw panuwiʼ ri in e pakiwiʼ ri jachintaq ekʼo wukʼ.
Qonojel xujtzaq cho ri ulew, e xintaʼ jun chʼabʼal che xubʼij chwech pa ri tzij hebʼreʼo: “Saʼulo, Saʼulo, ¿Suche rech che kinawoqataj? Kʼax kanaʼo aretaq chiʼ katchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri chʼichʼ”.
Ri in xinbʼij: “At jachin ri at Ajawxel?”. Ri Ajawxel kubʼij: “In ri in Jesus, che ri kawoqataj ri at.
Chatwaʼlijoq, e chattakʼaloq. Rumal rech che ri in xinkʼut wibʼ chawach, katinkoj na at pataninel rech, al tal rech e at bʼil rech ri xqʼalajanik chawach, jawiʼ ri xinkʼut wibʼ chawach, xoqujeʼ pa ri jetaq che kinqʼalajsaj chi na wibʼ chawach.
Rumal weriʼ, katintoʼtajisaj na riʼ pa ri kiqʼabʼ ri siwan tinimit e chkiwach taq ri siwan taq tinimit che man kekojon taj, che jawiʼ katintaq na ubʼik ri in
arech ri at kajaq ri kiwoqʼoch, e ri eʼareʼ keqʼax na riʼ chi pa qʼequʼmal chi kʼa pa ri saqil, e keqʼax chi pa ri rajawibʼal ri Satanas chi kʼa pa ri Dyos, arech ri eʼareʼ kkʼojiʼ ri kikojonik, ksachataj ri kimak, e kkʼojiʼ ri kechbʼal kukʼ ri etyoxlaj taq winaq”.
«Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ajawinel Agripa, ri in man xinbʼan ta ri kʼax chrech ri xkʼut chnuwach che rech ri kaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xane are nabʼe chkech ri eʼajdamasko, chkech ri eʼajjerusalem e pa ronojel ri jetaq utinimit ri Judeʼa, ri in, xinya ubʼixik che rajawaxik che kkikʼex kikʼux e ketzalej rukʼ ri dyos e che kkibʼan utz taq kichak jachaʼ kuta ri kʼexoj kʼaslemal.
Rumal weriʼ, ri eʼajjudiʼo, xkikoj kiqʼabʼ chwech pa ri Nim Rachoch ri Dyos, e xkaj xinkikamisaj.
Rukʼ ri uchoqʼabʼ ri Dyos, ri in, chi kʼa pa we qʼij riʼ, xinbʼij ri tzij chkech eʼalaj e enim taq winaq, e man xinbʼij ta jun tzij che man xkibʼij ta ri Moʼises e ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos:
che ri Kristo, kukʼaxkʼolij na riʼ kʼax e are nabʼe riʼ ri areʼ che kkʼastaj na uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, e kubʼij na riʼ ri saqil chkech ri siwantinimit e chkech taq ri amaqʼ che ma kekojon taj.
Aretaq chiʼ, tajin kubʼij weriʼ ri Pabʼlo rech tobʼal ribʼ areʼ; ri Festo rukʼ jun kowlaj uchʼabʼal kubʼij: «Ri at, at jun chʼuʼjlaj winaq, Pabʼlo; are ri nim taq chomabʼal ubʼanom kʼax chrech ri ajolom».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Ri in, man in mox winaq taj, utzalaj Festo, ri in tajin kinbʼij saqalaj tzij e utzalaj taq tzij.
Ri ajawinel, utz retamaʼxik rumal ri areʼ ronojel waʼ weriʼ, ri areʼ che tajin kuta we nutzij riʼ, e chuwach ri areʼ rukʼ chuqʼabʼ kinchʼaw, rumal rech, che ri in, kinchomaj, che man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che man ta saq chuwach ri areʼ. Rumal rech che ronojel weriʼ man pa awatalik taj petinaq wi.
¿La katkojon chkech ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, ajawinel Agripa? Ri in, wetaʼm che ri at katkojon chkech ri eʼareʼ».
Ri ajawinel Agripa kubʼij chrech ri Pabʼlo: «Uchanim riʼ, rukʼ taq ri atzij kabʼij, kraj neʼ lo, kabʼan chwech kinokik in jun ajkristiʼano!».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kubʼij: «Kraj ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos, kneʼbʼaʼ we rukʼ jubʼiqʼ on rukʼ nim, che ri at katkojonik e xoqujeʼ konojel ta bʼaʼ ri tajin kkita we nutzij kamik riʼ, iwonojel ta bʼaʼ ri ix kixuxik in jachaʼ ri in, kʼatekʼut xuwi ta neʼ, mata kkʼojiʼ chiwech we jetaq chʼichʼ riʼ».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kwaʼlijik ri ajawinel, ri qʼatbʼaltzij, ri Bʼerenise, e konojel ri eʼareʼ che etʼuyul kukʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ tajin keʼel ubʼik, kkibʼij chkibʼil taq kibʼ: «We jun achi riʼ, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach xubʼano che taqal ri kamikal chrij on che taqal chrij kok pa cheʼ».
Ri Agripa kubʼij chrech ri Festo: «Kujkowin na riʼ che kqatzoqopij kan we achi riʼ we ta ri areʼ man ta xuta ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar».
Aretaq chiʼ, xchomaxik che kujbʼe chi pa Italiʼa, xyaʼ ubʼi ri Pabʼlo e enikʼaj winaq chik che ekʼo pa cheʼ pa uqʼabʼ jun kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal winaq rech ri kohorte Aʼugusta, Juliʼo ubʼiʼ ri areʼ.
Ri uj kujaqʼan pa jun kukubʼ rech ri Adramitiʼo che kbʼe chi pa ri Asiʼa e kujok pa ri polow. Kʼo qukʼ ri Aristarko jun ajmasedoniʼa che rulew ri Tesalonika.
Pa ri jun chik qʼij, ri uj ujkʼo pa ri Sidon. Ri Juliʼo, utz winaq xubʼan rukʼ ri Pabʼlo, xuya bʼe chrech arech ri areʼ kopan kukʼ ri erachiʼl arech kkipatanij ri Pabʼlo.
Xujel ubʼik chilaʼ, xujqʼax chuchiʼ ri rulew ri Chipre, rumal rech che ri kyaqiqʼ petinaq uloq chqawach.
Ri uj kujbʼe ubʼi pa ri polow rech ri Silisiʼa e pa ri polow rech ri Panfiliʼa, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼateʼ xujopan pa Mira rech ri Lisiʼa pa joʼlajuj qʼij.
Chilaʼ, ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal xuriq jun jukubʼ rech ri Alejandriʼa che xas kbʼe pa ri Italiʼa e ri areʼ xujraqʼanisaj ubʼi chupam.
Pa kʼi taq qʼij, ri uj nojimal xujleʼw puwiʼ ri polow, sibʼalaj kʼax xqariqo arech ri uj xujopan chuwach ri Gnido. Rumal ri kyaqiqʼ, ri uj man kuya taj kujok chilaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, are xqaterneʼbʼej ri rulew ri Kreta chunaqaj ri Salmone,
e, rukʼ taq kʼax, ri uj xujopan chuwach jun ukʼolbʼal jukukubʼ ubʼiʼ Puertos-Bʼuenos ri ubʼiʼ, chunaqaj kʼo wi ri tinimit Lasaya.
Okʼowinaq chi kʼi taq qʼij, e ri qabʼe pa ri polow sibʼalaj kʼax, rumal rech, che xoqujeʼ xqʼaxtaj ri mewajik. Ri Pabʼlo, kubʼij chkech ri winaq:
«Ixwachiʼl, ri in kinwilo, che kʼax ri bʼe pa ri polow e kʼo kʼax kuriq ri taq eqaʼn e xoqujeʼ le jukubʼ, e xoqujeʼ kʼax kaqariq ri uj, uj winaq».
Ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal, are xukubʼisaj ukʼuʼx chrij ri kitzij ri kinimal ri jukubʼ e ri kitzij ri ajkʼayibʼ che ekʼo pa ri jukubʼ, chuwach ri utzij ri Pabʼlo;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal rech che ri jun kʼolibʼal riʼ ma utz taj che kkiqʼaxej ri qʼalaj chilaʼ, xkichomaj che are utz riʼ che kujkanaj chuqʼaxexik ri qʼalaj pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri Fenisiʼa, pa ri Kreta, che kkaʼy pa ri umox relbʼalqʼij e pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ qʼij.
Rumal rech che kubʼan jun alaj kyaqiqʼ chi pa ri umox qʼij, xkichomaj che kuyaʼo kkibʼan weriʼ. Xkibʼoq ubʼik ri jetaq uchakalbʼal ri jukubʼ e kebʼin chunaqaj ri rulew ri Kreta.
Kʼatekʼut, chi aninaq, pa ri ulew uloq xpe jun nimalaj kyaqiqʼ, jun sutkʼum, Eʼuroʼakila ri ubʼiʼ.
Ri kyaqiqʼ xujukej ubʼi ri jukubʼ e man kujkowin taj kʼo jun jas uwach xqabʼano; kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta chi ubʼe ri jukubʼ xrukʼaj.
Aretaq chiʼ, ujkʼo chi chunaqaj jun alaj chʼaqap ulew, che Klaʼuda ri ubʼiʼ; ri uj rukʼ kʼax xqachʼelej ri jukubʼ rech tobʼal qech.
Aretaq chiʼ xqachʼelej ri jukubʼ, ri uj kujchakunik rukʼ taq ri jastaq che rech tobʼal qibʼ: xqasutij rij ri jukubʼ rukʼ taq chʼichʼ; e rumal rech che ri uj kqaxibʼij qibʼ che weneʼ kbʼe ri jukubʼ cho ri ulew rech ri Sirte, kqakoj pa ri jaʼ ri jun uchakalbʼal che kaleʼw puwiʼ ri polow. Xa jekʼuriʼ, rumal weriʼ, ri jukubʼ kbʼe puwiʼ ri polow.
Pa ri jun chik qʼij, rumal rech che ri jun nimalaj kyaqiqʼ sibʼalaj kujuchʼikmej, kqakʼyaq ubʼi ri jastaq qech pa ri polow.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri urox qʼij chik, ri eʼajbʼinsanel che ri jukubʼ kkikʼyaq ubʼik ri jetaq jatʼibʼal jukubʼ pa ri polow.
Kʼi taq qʼij, man xkaʼy ta ri qʼij e man xeʼel ta uloq ri chʼumil, xuwi kukoj uchoqʼabʼ paqawiʼ ri jun nimalaj kyaqiqʼ; e ri uj, man kʼo ta chi jun qayebʼal che kujkoltajik.
Ri uj, kʼi taq qʼij chik kubʼano che man uj woʼqinaq ta chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo, xtakʼi chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ e kubʼij chkech: rajawaxik che ri ix, weta xitatabʼej ri nutzij e weta xujkanaj kanoq pa ri Kreta, kamik riʼ, man kʼo ta na kʼuriʼ waʼ we kʼax riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kintaʼ chiwech kamik riʼ che mubʼan bʼaʼ kebʼ ikʼuʼx, chkojiʼ ta bʼaʼ ichoqʼabʼ, rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun waʼ chqech kutzaq kan ri ukʼaslemal, xuwi waʼ we jukubʼ kqatzaq kanoq.
Rumal rech che pa we jun chaqʼabʼ riʼ, xukʼut chnuwach in jun anjel rech ri Nudyos, ri areʼ che kinpatanij ri in,
e xubʼij weriʼ chwech: «Maxibʼij awibʼ Pabʼlo. Rajawaxik, che ri at katopan na chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar. E ri Dyos, xuya na ri kikʼaslemal konojel we winaq riʼ che ebʼenaq pa ri polow awukʼ ri at».
Chkubʼiʼ bʼaʼ ikʼuʼx ixwachiʼl, ri in kinkojon chrech ri Dyos che kubʼan na riʼ, jeriʼ jas ri xubʼij chwech.
Ri uj, kujopan waʼ pa jun chʼaqap ulew pa we polow.
Kajlajuj chaqʼabʼ chik che ri uj ujbʼenaq pa ri polow Adriʼatiko e man qetaʼm taj ri bʼe qukʼam; aretaq chiʼ kabʼlajuj kajbʼal rech ri chaqʼabʼ, ri eʼajbʼinsanel jukubʼ xkinaʼo che ri uj uj kʼo chi chunaqaj jun chʼaqap ulew.
Xketaj ri upam ri polow, kʼo juwinaq etabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ jubʼiq chi aqʼanoq xketaʼj juʼlajuj etabʼal.
Ri eʼareʼ kkixibʼij kibʼ we ri uj kujbʼe puwiʼ taq abʼaj; xa jekuriʼ kkikʼyaq ri jetaq uchakalbʼal tza pa ri popa ubʼik; e sibʼalaj kkeyeʼj che ksaqarisaʼn uwach ulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajbʼinsanel rech ri jukubʼ, kkaj keʼanimajik pa ri alaj jukubʼ rech tobʼal qibʼ. Kkikoj ri jukubʼ rech tobʼal qibʼ pa ri polow, e kkibʼij chqech che ri eʼareʼ are kkaj kechakun chrech taq ri uchakalbʼal rech ri popa.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pabʼlo kubʼij chrech ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal e chkech ri exoltato: «we man kekanaj ta kan pa we jukubʼ riʼ le winaq leʼ, ri ix ma ktoʼtaj ta iwach laʼ».
Xa jekuriʼ ri exoltato, kkiramij ri yutʼbʼal rech ri alaj jukubʼ rech tobʼal ibʼ e xkikʼyaq ubʼi pa ri polow.
Aretaq chiʼ keyeʼm che ksaqarisanik, ri Pabʼlo kchʼawik arech konojel kkitij kiwa, e kubʼij: «Kajlajuj qʼij kamik riʼ, che ri ix kixmewajik, e man kʼo ta jun wa itijom.
Ri in kintaʼ chiwech arech kixwaʼik, rumal rech che weriʼ, are waʼ ri rumal kixtoʼtajik. Man kʼo ta jun chixoʼl ri ix che kutzaq na xa jun chrech ri uwiʼ».
Aretaq chiʼ kubʼij weriʼ, xukʼam ukoq jun kaxlanwa, kmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos chkiwach konojel; kupiro e kutijo.
Xa jekuriʼ ri enikʼaj chik, xkikochʼo xkitij kiwa.
Ekʼo chupam we jukubʼ riʼ lajujkʼal waqlajuj winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ xtijtaj qawa, kqakʼyaq ri triko pa ri polow arech ri jukubʼ man kjutjubʼ ta ubʼi pa ri polow.
Aretaq chiʼ xsaqarisanik, ri eʼajbʼinsanel rech ri jukubʼ, man ketaʼm taj jawiʼ ulew ujkʼo wi; xuwi kkil ri sanyebʼ chuchiʼ ri polow e kkichomaj kkikʼam ubʼi ri jukubʼ chilaʼ.
Kkikir taq ri uchakalbʼal ri jukubʼ che kikojom pa ri polow, xoqujeʼ kkikir ri yutʼubʼal rech taq ri bʼinsabʼal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ kkikoj ri nimalaj vela rech ri artimon (vela especial), arech ri kyaqiqʼ kukʼam ri jukubʼ pa ri sanyebʼ.
Kʼatekʼut xkiriqaʼ jun kʼolibʼal jawijeʼ naj upam ri polow, kkiya kan chilaʼ ri jukubʼ. Ri proʼa kkanaj kan pa ri sanyebʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri popa sibʼalaj ksilobʼik e chanim kqʼajik.
Ri exoltato, kkaj kekikamisaj ri winaq che ekʼo pacheʼ, rumal rech che kkixeʼj kibʼ weneʼ kʼo jun kanimaj bʼik aretaq chiʼ kemuxnik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri kʼamalbʼe chkech okʼal, ri kraj kutoʼ ri Pabʼlo keʼuqʼil chrech weriʼ; ktaqanik, che jachin taq kekowinik kemuxinik, are nabʼe kkikʼyaq kibʼ pa ri polow arech kekiriqaʼ ri ulew;
e ri enikʼaj chik kebʼe puwiʼ ri polow puwiʼ jujun taq tzʼalam on puwiʼ taq ri ukʼisbʼal kanoq ri jukubʼ che kʼo na. Xa jekuriʼ, qonojel bʼaʼ utz qawach xujopan cho ri ulew.
Aretaq chiʼ ri uj xujkoltajik, xqetaʼmaj che ri ulew riʼ, ubʼiʼ Malta.
Ri winaq che eʼajchilaʼ, sibʼalaj utz xkibʼan chqech, xujkikʼam ubʼi chunaqaj jun qʼaqʼ che xkikuch ri eʼareʼ, rumal rech che kʼo sibʼalaj jabʼ e sibʼalaj tew.
Ri Pabʼlo kukʼam uloq jun qʼaluʼn chaqij xikʼay e kukʼyaq pa ri qʼaqʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun itzel kumatz kel uloq rumal rech xunaʼ ri qʼaqʼ e kubʼalqʼatij ribʼ pa ri uqʼabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼajwinaq chilaʼ kkil ri chikop pa ri uqʼabʼ, kkibʼij chkibʼil taq kibʼ: «Waʼ we jun achi riʼ qas jun kamisanel waʼ. Ri areʼ loqʼ xanimaj chuwach ri polow, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri royowal ri Dyos man kuya ta bʼe chrech arech kkʼasiʼk».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kukʼyaq ri chikop pa ri qʼaqʼ e man kʼo ta jun kʼax xubʼan chrech ri areʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ kkichomaj che ri areʼ ksipojik on ktzaq ubʼik e kkamik. Aretaq chiʼ qʼaxinaq chi kebʼ oxibʼ kajbʼal, e kkilo che man kʼo ta jun kʼax kuriqo, kkikʼex ri kichomabʼal e kkibʼij, che ri areʼ jun dyos.
Kʼo chunaqaj we kʼolbʼal riʼ, jun ulew che rech ri kinabʼeʼal ri eʼajchilaʼ, ri areʼ ubʼi Pubʼliʼo. Ri areʼ kujukʼam ubʼi pa ri rachoch e kujkanaj chilaʼ oxibʼ qʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri utat ri Pubʼliʼo kʼo pa ri chʼat rumal qʼaqʼ e rumal pomaj. Ri Pabʼlo kbʼe che rilik, kukoj uqʼabʼ puwiʼ e kukunaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, enikʼaj chik eyawabʼibʼ che eʼajchilaʼ kepe uloq rukʼ ri Pabʼlo e kekumatajik.
Rumal weriʼ, sibʼalaj utz qilixik xkibʼano; e aretaq chiʼ xujbʼe ubʼik, xkiya ubʼi chqech ronojel uwach jastaq che rajawaxik chqech.
Aretaq chiʼ xokʼow oxibʼ ikʼ, ri uj xujbʼe ubʼik, e xujok pa ri polow pa jun jukubʼ rech Alejandriʼa che xkanaj kanoq chilaʼ pa ri qʼälaj, rukʼam ri kʼutbʼal rech ri Diʼoskuros.
Kujopan pa ri Sirakusa e kujkanaj kan chilaʼ oxibʼ qʼij.
Xas chilaʼ ubʼik kujbʼe chuchiʼ ri polow chi pa ri Regiʼo. Pa ri jun qʼij chik, kwaʼlajik ri kyaqiqʼ pa ri umox relbʼalqʼij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa kebʼ qʼij kujopan pa ri Possuʼoli.
Ri uj, chilaʼ xeʼbʼeqariqaʼ wi nikʼaj eʼachalaxik e xkubʼiʼ qakʼuʼx e kujkanaj kan wuqubʼ qʼij kukʼ. E jeriʼ, ri uj xujopan pa ri Roma.
Ri eʼachalaxik rech we tinimit riʼ, aretaq chiʼ xketaʼmaj che ri uj xujopanik, xujkikʼuluʼ chi pa ri Foro Apiʼo pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri Oxibʼ Tavernas. Aretaq chiʼ keʼrilo ri Pabʼlo, kmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos e xkʼoji kʼakʼ uchuqʼabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xujopan pa ri Roma, kyaʼ bʼe chrech ri Pabʼlo, arech ri areʼ kkʼojiʼ pa jun ja rech jun winaq e kkʼojiʼ jun xoltato rukʼ arech kuchajij.
Okʼowinaq chi oxibʼ qʼij, keʼusikʼij ri ekinimal ri eʼajjudiʼo. Aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ kkimulij kibʼ, ri areʼ kubʼij chkech: «Eʼachalaxik, ri in man kʼo ta jun retzalal xinbʼan pakiwiʼ ri eqawinaq e puwiʼ ri kipixabʼ ri eqatat, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in xinchapik pa ri Jerusalem e xinkiya pa kiqʼabʼ ri eʼajromano.
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼan rilik wij, ri eʼareʼ xekanajik che kinkiya kanoq rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun jas uwach panuwiʼ che taqal chwij ri kamikal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ rumal rech che ri eʼajjudiʼo man xkaj ta weriʼ, rajawaxik che ri in xinta ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Sesar, kʼatekʼut, ri in rukʼ weriʼ, man kinwaj taj kinkoj chʼoʼj puwiʼ ri nutinimit.
Rumal kuwaʼ weriʼ, xintaʼo, arech ri in kixinwil ri ix, arech kinchʼaw iwukʼ; xane rumal ri reyebʼal ri Israʼel kʼo we taq chʼichʼ chwech riʼ».
Ri eʼareʼ kkibʼij chrech: «Ri uj man kʼo ta jun wuj qakʼamon pawiʼ ri at che petinaq uloq pa ri Judeʼa, e man kʼo ta jun chkech ri eʼalaxik petinaq uloq waral che ubʼixik man utz tzij taj pawiʼ ri at.
Kʼatekʼut, ri uj kqaj kqata chi pa ri achiʼ ri at ri achomanik; rumal rech che ri uj qetaʼm che pa ronojel kʼolibʼal, ri at ariqom kʼax puwiʼ ri atzij».
Kkichʼik kan jun qʼij, e sibʼalaj winaq keʼopan pa ri rachoch ri areʼ. Pa ri utzij kubʼij ri utzil chkech puwiʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos e kutzukuj ubʼanik arech utz kichoman puwiʼ ri Jesus, chi pa ri upixabʼ ri Moʼises e pa ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos; jeriʼ kubʼano chi pa ri aqabʼil ubʼik chi kʼateʼ ri chaqʼabʼ.
Ekʼo jujun kqaj chkiwach ri utzij, ekʼo jujun chik man kkikoj ta ri utzij.
Aretaq chiʼ elem chik kkibʼano e man kʼo ta jun utz kichomaj, ri Pabʼlo kubʼij we tzij riʼ: «Qastzij nakʼut che ri tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel xubʼij chkech ri itat xas rumal ri uchiʼ ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, ri Isaʼiʼas:
Jeʼariqaʼ we winaq riʼ e jeʼabʼij chkech: Ri ix, kitana, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kichʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal riʼ ri ix kiwil na riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kixkaʼy ta riʼ.
Rumal rech che sipojinaq ri kanimaʼ we siwan tinimit riʼ, kitzʼapim ri kixikin e kiyubʼam ri kiwoqʼoch, arech man kekaʼy ta rukʼ ri kiwoqʼoch arech man kkita ta rukʼ ri kixikin arech man kkichʼobʼ ta pa ri kanimaʼ arech man ketzalej ta rukʼ ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, weneʼ keʼinkunaj ri eʼareʼ.
Ri ix, chiwetaʼmaj bʼaʼ weriʼ: chkech ri winaq che man kekojon taj xtaq wiʼ ri ukʼolibʼal ri Dyos. Ri eʼareʼ qas kkitaʼ waʼ».
Ri Pabʼlo xkanaj kebʼ junabʼ pa we jun ja riʼ che are areʼ xuqajo. Ri areʼ keʼukʼulaj konojel ri winaq che kkaj keʼopan rukʼ ri areʼ;
kuyaʼ ubʼixik ri tzij puwiʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos e kukʼut ronojel ri jastaq puwiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus rukʼ choqʼabʼalil e man kʼo ta kʼax kuriqo.
Ri Pabʼlo, ri upataninel ri Kristo Jesus, apostol rumal rech che xsikʼixik, in chaʼtalik arech ri in kinbʼij ri utzalaj utzij ri Dyos,
che pa ojer tzij, xunabʼisaj ubʼixik kumal ri eʼqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos pa ri Tyoxlaj taq Tzij,
puwiʼ ri ukʼojol, che rijaʼlil ri David xas rumal ubʼaqil winaq
xokisaxik Ukʼojol ri Dyos rukʼ ri uchoqʼabʼ ri tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, rumal rech ri ukʼakʼ atestajibʼal chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ ri Jesus Kristo Qajawxel
rumal rech ri areʼ che xqakʼam ri uj ri qasipanik e ri qachak, arech ri uj kqabʼij, ri uqʼijilaxik ri ubʼi, ri nimanik chech ri kojonik chkixoʼl ri jetaq amaqʼ che man kʼo ta ri kikojonik qukʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix, chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, ri Jesus Kristo xixusikʼij ri ix,
chiwech iwonojel ri ix, ri ix loqʼalaj taq rech ri Dyos pa ri Roma, chiwech ri ix, che ix tyoxlaj taq winaq rumal rech che xixsikʼixik; chiwech bʼaʼ ri ix ri nimalaj ubʼantajik usipanik ri Dyos e ri nimalaj utzil, rumal ri Dyos ri Qatatxel e rumal ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in are nabʼe kinmaltyoxij chrech ri Nudyos rumal ri Jesukristo, rumal rech che pa ronojel ri uwachulew kqʼijilaxik ri ikojonik.
Rumal rech che ri Dyos, ri in kinya jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ chech ri Areʼ pa ri uxlabʼal aretaq chiʼ kinya ubʼixik ri utzalaj utzij ri Ukʼojol; ri areʼ, utz krilo, che ri in ronojel qʼij kinchʼaw piwiʼ ri ix,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ronojel qʼij kintaʼ pa ri nuchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, arech pa jun qʼij, we ri Dyos kraj, che ri in kinbʼe iwukʼ.
Rumal rech che sibʼalaj kwaj kinwil iwach, arech ri in kinya chiwech jujun taq jastaq rech ri uxlabʼal, arech ri ix kkʼojiʼ ichuqʼabʼ,
on che kkʼojiʼ ri utzil chixoʼl, arech junam ri qakojonik, junam ri iwech ix rukʼ ri wech in.
Eʼachalaxik, ri in man kinwaj taj che ri ix man iwetaʼm taj, che ri in, sibʼalaj nuchoman chik, che ri in kinbʼe na riʼ pa ri itinimit –kʼatekʼut, man inkowininaq taj kʼateʼ we qʼij riʼ– arech ri in kinkʼamaʼ chixoʼl jujun taq wachinik jeriʼ jacha nubʼanom chik chkixoʼl ri enikʼaj chik che man eʼajjudiʼo taj.
Rajawaxik, che ri in, in ajgriʼego kukʼ ri eʼajgriʼego in jeriʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ che ri man kechʼaw ta pa ri griʼego, in jeriʼ kukʼ ri enim taq ketambʼal winaq, in jeriʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ ri man kʼo ta kinoʼj:
rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in sibʼalaj kinwaj kinkʼam bʼi ri Utzalaj Tzij chiwech ri ix, che ix ajromanos.
Rumal rech che ri in man kinkʼix ta chrech ri Utzalaj Tzij: ri areʼ jun uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos arech kekoltajik na konojel ri winaq che kekojon chrech ri areʼ, nabʼe ri ajjudiʼo, e pa ukʼabʼ ri ajgriʼego.
Rumal rech che pa ri areʼ kkʼuttajik ri usukʼil ri Dyos qas pa ri kojonik chi kʼateʼ pa ri kojonik chik 11.jeriʼ jacha tzʼibʼatalik: Ri sukʼalaj winaq kʼo ri ukʼaslemal pa ri kojonik.
Rumal rech che ri royowal ri Dyos kukʼut ribʼ chi pa ri nimalaj kaj, puwiʼ ronojel ri man sukʼ taj e puwiʼ ri man saq ta chkech ri winaq, ri eʼareʼ che kkitzʼapij ri saqalajtzij pa ri man sukʼil taj;
rumal rech, che ri utzalaj jastaq uwach che loqʼ ketaʼmaxik puwiʼ ri Dyos: ri Dyos ukʼutum chi waʼ weriʼ chkiwach.
Ri jastaq che man kekowin taj kkilo xas aretaq chiʼ xbʼan ri uwachulew, ri noʼjibʼal kkowinik kril weriʼ rumal taq uchak ri Dyos, kril ri junalik uchoqʼabʼ e kril ri tyoxlaj ubʼantajik, e rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ man kkuytaj ta ri kimak;
rumal rech che ketaʼmam uwach ri Dyos e man xkiya ta chrech ri areʼ, che jeʼ jas jun Dyos, ri uqʼijil e ri maltyoxinik, kʼatekʼut ri eʼareʼ xkisach ri kinoʼjibʼal pa ri kichomabʼal e xkisach ri unoʼj kanimaʼ pa ri qʼequʼmal;
rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ are xkaj ri noʼjibʼal, ri eʼareʼ xechʼujarik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkikʼex ri uqʼijil ri Dyos che man kqʼiy taj, rukʼ jun wachibʼal, jun wachibʼal che rech ri winaq che kqʼiyik, kech taq chikop aj uwokaj, kech taq chikop kijebʼ kaqan, che kech taq kumatz.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos uyaʼom chkech ri eʼareʼ jeriʼ jacha xkaj pa ri kanimaʼ, ri tzʼajtajinaq taq kʼolibʼal, jawiʼ ri eʼareʼ ketzelaj ri kibʼaqil;
ri eʼareʼ xkikʼex ri saqalaj utzij ri Dyos rukʼ ri man saqalajtzij taj, nim xkil wi jetaq wachibʼal chuwach ri Areʼ che xubʼan ri uwachulew; chrech ri areʼ ri tewchiʼnik chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq, Amen.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Dyos xeʼuya kan ri eʼareʼ pa ri itzel taq kirayibʼal: ri kixoqilal xkikʼex ri kibʼanik rukʼ ri jastaq che man kʼo ta ubʼeʼal ubʼanik;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri achijabʼ, xekiya kan ri ixoqibʼ e xkirayij kiwach chkibʼil taq kibʼ, xkibʼan ri itzel chi jun achi rukʼ jun chik achi e xkikʼam pa ri kibʼaqil ri utojbʼalil ri itzel taq kibʼe xkukʼaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal rech che man xkichomaj ta utz ukʼolik ri qas unoʼjibʼal ri Dyos, ri Dyos xeʼuya kan ri eʼareʼ pa ri kuxlabʼal che man kʼo ta retamabʼal, arech ri eʼareʼ kkibʼan ri jastaq che man utz taj:
enojinaq chrech ri man sukʼil taj chrech ri itzel, are kkaj ri pwaq, kʼo kebʼ kanimaʼ; kkaj ri kijastaq ri enikʼaj chik, ri eʼareʼ ekamisanel, ri eʼareʼ kkibʼan ri chʼoʼj; kkibʼan ri itzel, kkibʼan ri itzel jastaq, kkibʼij ri itzel taq tzij pakiwiʼ ri enikʼaj chik,
kkil ri retzalal ri jun chik, eʼukʼulel ri Dyos, kketzelaj uwach ri winaq, kkinimarisaj kibʼ, kkibʼij sibʼalaj taq tzij, kenoʼjinik pa ri itzel, man kekinimaj ta ri ekinan kitat,
man kʼo ta kinoʼj, man kkibʼan ta ri jastaq che xkibʼij, ma kʼo ta kanimaʼ, ma kkikʼaslemaj ta ri Dyos;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ utz retaʼmaxik kumal ri qʼatojtzij rech ri Dyos, che kubʼij, che weriʼ taqal ri kamikal chrij e ri eʼareʼ man xuwiʼ taj kkibʼan weriʼ, xane xoqujeʼ utz keʼkil wi ri kebʼanow weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at man kʼo ta sachbʼal amak, ri at che kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun chik. Rumal rech che aretaq chiʼ kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun chik, xas kabʼan qʼatojtzij pawiʼ ri at: rumal rech che ri at, xoqujeʼ kabʼan atbʼanal rech ri at, ri kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Dyos qas kpe na riʼ pakiwiʼ ri kebʼanow weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at che kabʼan ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri winaq, ri eʼareʼ che kkibʼan weriʼ e xoqujeʼ che ri at kabʼan weriʼ, ¿la kachomaj che katanimaj na chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Dyos?
On ¿Kawetzelaj uwach ri unimal, ri utzil, ri unimal ukochʼonik e man kawil taj che ri ru- tzilal ri Dyos kuta chawech arech ri at kakʼex akʼux?
Rumal rech che ri at man kata ta weriʼ, ri at kʼo jun itzel awanimaʼ, ri at kakoj pawiʼ sibʼalaj oyowal, pa ri qʼij rech ri oyowal jawiʼ kkʼuttaj na riʼ ri sukʼ uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Dyos,
ri areʼ kuya na riʼ chkech konojel winaq jeriʼ jacha ri uchak;
chkech ri winaq che ronojel qʼij, pa ri utzil kkitzukuj ri uqʼijil, kuya riʼ chkech nim kiqʼij, ri jastaq che man kqʼiy taj: ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal;
chkech ri enikʼaj chik, che ri eʼitzel taq uxlabʼaxel, ri man keniman ta che ri saqalaj tzij e che are keniman che ri man sukʼil taj: are kya na riʼ ri oyowal e ri nimalaj sachbʼal kʼuʼx chkech.
Ri kʼax e ri mayowik kyaʼtaj na chkech konojel ri kuxlabʼal ri winaq che kbʼan ri itzel, nabʼe kyaʼtaj chrech ri ajjudiʼo e pa ri ukabʼ kyaʼtaj chrech ri ajgriʼego;
kʼatekʼuriʼ nimalaj qʼijil, nimalaj bʼantajik e ri nimalaj utzil kya chech ronojel winaq che kubʼan ri utzil, nabʼe kya na chech ri ajjudiʼo e pa ri ukabʼ chech ri ajgriʼego;
rumal rech che ri Dyos man are ta kril ri ubʼantajik upalaj ri winaq.
Rumal rech che ri winaq che kmakunik e man kʼo ta ri Pixabʼ rukʼ, xoqujeʼ aretaq chiʼ kkamik, man kʼo ta riʼ ri Pixabʼ rukʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel ri winaq che kmakun chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ, rumal ri Pixabʼ riʼ kbʼan na qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ;
rumal rech che man eʼare ta ri winaq ri ketow ri Pixabʼ che esukʼ chuwach ri Dyos, eʼare riʼ ri winaq che kkibʼan ri Pixabʼ, eʼare esukʼ riʼ.
Rumal rech che aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta ri qakojonik kukʼ ri winaq, man kʼo ta riʼ ri Pixabʼ kukʼ, kʼatekʼut kkibʼan ri kuta ri Pixabʼ chi rumal ri kibʼantajik; we ewinaq riʼ, che man kʼo ta ri Pixabʼ kukʼ, xas kkikʼaslemaj wi ri Pixabʼ;
kkikʼutu ri saqalaj utzij we Pixabʼ riʼ che tzʼibʼatalik pa ri kanimaʼ, kukʼut weriʼ ri kichomanik, ri qʼatbʼaltzij kkibʼan puwiʼ ri itzel e puwiʼ ri utzil chkibʼil taq kibʼ …
weriʼ kbʼantajik pa ri qʼij aretaq chiʼ ri Dyos kubʼan na riʼ uqʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ ri awatalik taq kichomanik ri winaq, pa ri Utzalaj Nu-tzij rumal ri Jesus Kristo.
Kʼatekʼut, we ri at, che kabʼij awibʼ at ajjudiʼo, che kakoj ri Pixabʼ, che nim aqʼijil kawil pa ri Dyos
ri at che awetaʼm ri urayibʼal ri areʼ, che kawil ri utzil kukʼut ri Pixabʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at che kabʼij che at kʼamalbʼe chkech ri emoy taq winaq, che at chäj chkech ri kebʼe pa ri qʼequʼm,
che at ajtij chkech ri man kʼo ta kinoʼj, che at ajtij chkech ri man kʼo ta ketaʼmbʼal, rumal rech che chawach ri at, pa ri Pixabʼ kʼo wi ri uwachbʼal ri noʼjibʼal e ri saqalajtzij,
¡kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at che kakʼut weriʼ chuwach jun chik, man kakʼut ta weriʼ chawach ri at! Kabʼij: ¡Mawelaqʼaj jun jas uwach!, ¡e ri at katelaqʼanik!
Ri at kabʼij: ¡matmakunik rukʼ achi, rukʼ ixoq!, ¡e ri at kabʼan ri makunik rukʼ achi, rukʼ ixoq! Ri at kawetzelaj kiwach ri man tzij taj edyos kʼatekʼuriʼ keʼatzukuj pa taq ri kikʼolbʼal ri man kʼo kikojonik qukʼ
Ri at che kʼo ri aqʼijil pa ri Pixabʼ, aretaq chiʼ kabʼan ri itzel chuwach we Pixabʼ riʼ, tajin kawetzelaj uwach ri Dyos,
rumal rech che kubʼij pa ri Tzʼibʼatalik: rumal ri kibʼan ix, kyoqʼ rukʼ itzel taq tzij ri ubʼiʼ ri Dyos chkixoʼl ri man junam ta qakojonik kukʼ.
Utz chawech ri upusik uwiʼ akowil we ri at kabʼan ri Pixabʼ; kʼatekʼut, we ri at kabʼan ri itzel chuwach ri Pixabʼ rukʼ ri upusik uwiʼ akowil, junam riʼ che ri at mam qʼatom ta uwiʼ akowil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che man qʼatom ta uwiʼ ukowil, kʼatekut kukʼol ri Pixabʼ, junam na kʼuriʼ che qʼatom uwiʼ ukowil
Jachin ri man qʼatom ta uwiʼ ukowil e kukʼaslemaj ri Pixabʼ, kubʼan na qʼatojtzij riʼ pawiʼ ri at, ri at che rukʼ ri Tzij e rukʼ ri qʼatom uwiʼ kowilal kaxalqʼatij uwiʼ ri Pixabʼ.
Rumal rech che ri ajjudiʼo ubʼantajik ri winaq, man chrij ta kʼo wi e ri uqʼatik uwiʼ kowilal man pa ri bʼaqilal taj kʼo wiʼ
ri qastzij ajjudiʼo jun, pa ri uj kʼo wi e ri upusik uwiʼ ri kowilal, pa ri qanimaʼ kʼo wi, jeriʼ jacha ri kubʼij ri uxlabʼal e man jeriʼ taj jacha kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik: ri areʼ, man kpe ta uqʼijil riʼ kukʼ ri winaq, xane kpetik ri uqʼijil rukʼ ri Dyos.
¿Jachike kʼut ri rutzil ri jun ajjudiʼo? ¿Jachike kʼut ri rutzil ri uqʼatom uwiʼ ri ukowil?
Waʼ weriʼ nimalaj ubʼantajik pa ronojel jastaq. Chkech ri eʼareʼ, are nabʼe xuya ri Utzij ri Dyos.
We ekʼo jujun chkech che xkikʼex ri kitzij, weriʼ ¿la kuchup kʼu waʼ ri xuya utzij ri Dyos chrech?
Man je taj riʼ rajawaxik che saqalaj utzij ri Dyos e konojel ri winaq man saqalaj kitzij taj, jacha ri kubʼij ri Tzij: «Arech ri at, at sukʼ pa ri atzij e arech katchʼakanik pa ri qʼatbʼaltzij».
Kʼatekut, ri man qasukʼil ta ri uj are kukʼut ri usukʼil ri Dyos, ¿jas kʼu kqabʼij chi na riʼ? ¿La man sukʼ ta riʼ ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ kujuchʼay rukʼ ri royowal? Ri in kinchʼawik jacha jun winaq.
¡Man jeʼ ta riʼ! Rumal rech che ¿jas ubʼanik riʼ ri uqʼatbʼaltzij kubʼan na ri Dyos puwiʼ ri uwachulew?
Kʼatekʼut, we ri joʼs nutzij riʼ xukʼut ri saqalaj utzij ri Dyos, rech ri uqʼijil, ¿jas kʼuche, che ri in kqʼatex tzij panuwiʼ che ri in, in jun ajmakunel?
On, jeʼ jas retzalal ubʼixik kkibʼij enikʼaj. ¿La rajawaxik che ri uj are kqabʼan ri itzel, arech kpe ri utzil? taqal chkij ri kiqʼatbʼaltzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ¿jas kʼu keqakʼisbʼej? ¿La kujchʼakan riʼ? Man je taj. Rumal rech che qakʼutum che ri eʼajjudeyiʼo e ri eʼajgriʼego, qonojel uj kʼo chuxeʼ ri mak,
jeʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik: Man kʼo ta jun che sukʼ,
man kʼo ta jun che utz kchomanik, man kʼo ta jun che kutzukuj ri Dyos.
Konojel kkisach kibʼ, konojel kkibʼan ri itzel; man kʼo ta jun che kubʼan ri utzil, jayiʼ, man kʼo ta jun.
Ri upakiqul jun nimalaj muqubʼal ri kaqʼ kubʼan ri joʼs taq tzij. Ukʼaʼil kumatzʼ ri kʼo chuxeʼ ri upakichiʼ,
ri itzel taq tzij e ri chʼam taq jastaq uwach, kunojisaj ri kichiʼ.
Chi utz wi taq ri kaqan che uqʼejik ri kikʼel;
kamikal e mebʼaʼil kʼo pa ri kibʼe.
Man ketaʼm ta ri ubʼe ri nimalaj utzil,
ri kiwoqʼoch man nim ta kil wi ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm ronojel ri utzij ri Pixabʼ, weriʼ, kubʼij chkech ri eʼareʼ che ekʼo chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ, arech ktzʼapitaj ronojel chiʼaj e arech ronojel ri uwachulew ajmak chuwach ri Dyos,
rumal rech, che man kʼo ta jun che sukʼ chuwach ri areʼ che kkowinik kubʼan ri Pixabʼ: Xuwi rumal ri Pixabʼ qetaʼmaj uwach ri makaj.
Katekʼut, kamik riʼ, man uj kʼo ta pa ri Pixabʼ, ri usukʼil ri Dyos xukʼut ribʼ, jeriʼ jacha tzʼibʼatalik pa ri Pixabʼ e ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos,
ri usukʼil ri Dyos are ri kojonik chrech ri Jesus Kristo, chkech konojel ri eʼareʼ che kekojonik –rumal rech che man kʼo ta jalajoj chqaxoʼl.
Konojel xemakunik e man kʼo ta ri uqʼijil ri Dyos kukʼ–
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kʼo ri sukʼil kukʼ rumal rech che xyaʼtaj chkech ri usipanik rumal rech ri kolotajem che xpe rukʼ ri Kristo Jesus;
ri Dyos xukʼutu che ri areʼ, are tabʼal toqʼobʼ chrech ri makaj rumal ri ukikʼel e rukʼ ri kojonik, xraj xukʼut usukʼil, rumal rech che xubʼan qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ taq ri mak rech ojer tzij
aretaq chiʼ kʼo pa ri ukochʼonik ri Dyos; xraj xukʼut ri usukʼil chkech ri winaq che erech we kamik riʼ. Arech, qas sukʼ ri Areʼ, che kuya ri sukʼil chech ri jun che kubʼij che kkojon chech ri Jesus.
¿Jawiʼ kʼo wi ri utzil arech jun winaq kuyaʼo nim kril wi ribʼ? Man kʼo taj. ¿La rumal jun pixabʼ? ¿La rumal ri uchakuxik ri pixabʼ? Man je taj, xane rumal ri upixabʼ ri kojonik.
Rumal rech, ri uj are kqachomaj che sukʼ ri winaq rumal ri ukojonik e man rumal taj che kubʼan ri Pixabʼ.
¿On ri Dyos xuwi Dyos chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo e man Dyos ta chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj? Jeʼ nakʼut, ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ Kidyos ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj;
rumal rech, che xuwi jun Dyos kʼolik, che kuya na riʼ ri sukʼil chkech ri eʼareʼ che qʼatom uwiʼ ri kikowil rumal ri kojonik, xoqujeʼ chkech ri winaq che man qʼaʼtom ta uwiʼ kikowil xoqujeʼ rumal we kojonik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿la rumal ri kojonik kqesaj ri uqʼijil ri Pixabʼ? ¡Man je taj! Xa uj riʼ ri kujyaʼow ri uqʼijil!
¿Jas kʼu kqabʼij na riʼ puwiʼ ri Abʼraham, che qatat rumal ri bʼaqilal?
We ri Abʼraham, xkʼojiʼ ri usukʼil rumal taq ri uchak, ri areʼ kuyaʼo nim kril wi ribʼ. ¡Kʼatekʼut, man kuya taj kubʼan weriʼ chuwach ri Dyos!
Rumal rech che, ¿jas kubʼij ri Tzij? ¡Ri Abʼraham xkojon chrech ri Dyos e are waʼ weriʼ ri usukʼil!
Ri jun che kubʼan jun chak, rajawaxik che ktoj ri utojbʼalil;
kʼatekʼut, ri jun che man kchakun taj, e kkojon chrech ri Areʼ che kubʼan sukʼ riʼ chrech ri man sukʼ winaq taj, ri ukojonik are usukʼil riʼ.
Jeriʼ jas kubʼij ri David, utz rech ri winaq, che ri Dyos kuya ri sukʼil chrech, kʼatekʼuriʼ man are ta kril na ri uchak ubʼanom.
Utz kech ri winaq che xsach uwach ri retzalal e xchup uwach ri umak.
Utz rech ri winaq, che ri Ajawxel man kʼo ta jun umak krejalaj uwach.
Waʼ we utzalaj tzij riʼ ¿la xuwi kyaʼ ubʼixik chkech ri winaq che qʼatom uwiʼ kikowil, on xoqujeʼ kyaʼ ubʼixik chkech ri man qʼatom ta uwiʼ kikowil? Rumal rech che kqaya ubʼixik, che ri ukojonik ri Abʼraham xeʼjelaxik chrech ri areʼ jeʼ jas usukʼil.
¿Jas rejelaxik xbʼan chech ri areʼ? ¿La aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ xuqʼat uwiʼ ukowil on aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kubʼan weriʼ? Man aretaq chiʼ taj ri areʼ xuqʼat uwiʼ ri ukowil, xane aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kubʼano;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xukʼam ri ukʼutbʼalil ri uqʼatik uwiʼ ukowil jeʼ jas utʼiqbʼal ri usukʼil e ri ukojonik che kʼo rukʼ ri areʼ aretaq chiʼ man qʼatom ta uwiʼ ukowil; xa jekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ xokik tatxel chkech konojel ri kekojon na riʼ e ri man qʼatom ta uwiʼ kibʼaqil, arech, xoqujeʼ keʼjelaxik ri sukʼil chkech,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, are tatxel chkech ri winaq che kiqʼatom uwiʼ kikowil, che man xuwi ta kekiʼkotik che kiqʼatom uwiʼ ri kikowil, xane ebʼenaq pa ri ubʼe ri kojonik, che rukʼam ri qatat Abʼraham aretaq chiʼ majaʼ uqʼatom uwiʼ ukowil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man xa ta rumal jun pixabʼ che qastzij kpe ri chiʼnik xubʼan ri Dyos chkech ri Abʼraham e chkech ri rijaʼlil che kyaʼtaj na riʼ pa echbʼal chkech ri uwachulew, weriʼ rumal ri usukʼil ri kojonik.
We kʼo ri kechbʼal rumal rech ri Pixabʼ, man utz ta na kʼuriʼ ri kojonik e ri chiʼnik
rumal rech che ri Pixabʼ kuya ri oyowal, kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta pixabʼ, xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta makaj riʼ.
Ri echbʼal kpe uloq chi pa ri kojonik, arech ri areʼ jun sipanik, rukʼ we tajin kqabʼij riʼ, ri chʼinik kpe pakiwiʼ konojel ri ijaʼlil, man xuwi ta pakiwiʼ ri kekojon chrech ri Pixabʼ, xane xoqujeʼ pakiwiʼ ri kekojon chrech ri ukojonik ri qatat Abʼraham, che tatxel chqech qonojel,
jeʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri in xatinkojo at tatxel chkech sibʼalaj siwan taq tinimit – qatat chuwach ri Areʼ che xkojon chrech ri Areʼ, xkojon chrech ri Dyos che kuya ri kikʼaslemal ri ekaminaqibʼ e che ksikʼin chech ri man kʼo taj, arech kkʼojiʼk.
Ri areʼ xeyeʼnik, aretaq chiʼ sibʼalaj kʼax reyeʼxik; ri areʼ kʼo ri ukojonik, e rukʼ weriʼ, ri areʼ tat chkech sibʼalaj esiwantinimit, jeʼ jas xbʼix chrech ri areʼ: Jeʼ waʼ riʼ ri uwiʼ taq amam.
Rukʼ jun kowlaj ukojonik xrilo che ri ubʼaqil kaminaq chik –ri areʼ okʼal ujunabʼ chik– e ri ubʼaqil ri Sara, xoqujeʼ kaminaq chik;
ri areʼ ukubʼam ukʼuʼx chrij ri uchiʼnik ri Dyos, man xubʼan ta kebʼ ukʼuʼx e mawi xuya kan ri ukojonik e rukʼ uchuqʼabʼ ri ukojonik nim xril wi ri Dyos,
rumal rech che ri areʼ, xuchomaj che ri jastaq ubʼim ri Dyos, ri Areʼ, kʼo uchuqʼabʼ riʼ chech ubʼanik.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, ri ukojonik jeriʼ jacha sukʼil xeʼjelaxik chrech ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Tzij kubʼij, che ri ukojonik xejalaxik chrech ri areʼ, man xuwi ta rumal ri areʼ xejalaxik chrech, xoqujeʼ xejalaxik chrech rumal qech uj
ri uj che kejalaxik na riʼ ri qakojonik, kejalaxik na riʼ chqech uj che kqakojo, che ri Areʼ xuwaʼlisaj xas chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri Jesus Qajawxel,
ri areʼ, che xkam rumal ri qamak e xkʼastaj uwach, arech ri uj ujsukʼ taq winaq.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri uj xqakʼam ri qasukʼil rumal ri qakojonik, ri uj, nimalaj utzil ujkʼo rukʼ ri Dyos rumal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo;
ri areʼ, xusipaj chqech ri uj we jun sipanik riʼ rumal ri kojonik. Ri uj xujkanaj pa we sipanik riʼ e nim kqil wi qibʼ pa ri reyeʼbʼal e pa ri uqʼijil ri Dyos.
