¿Jas kinbʼij? Xoqujeʼ ri uj nim kqil wi qibʼ pa ri kʼax, rumal rech che qetaʼm, che pa ri kʼax kbʼantaj wi ri kochʼonik,
ri kochʼonik kuya ri jeqelikalaj kojonik e ri jeqelikalaj kojonik kuya ri eyeʼbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal ri eyeʼbʼal man kubʼan ta kebʼ qakʼuʼx, rumal rech che ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos xqʼejexik pa ri qanimaʼ rumal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel che xyaʼtaj chqech.
Aretaq chiʼ ri uj man kʼo ta ri qachuqʼabʼ, chi xas pa ri qʼij che chʼikitalik, ri Kristo xkamik, rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach ri man esukʼ taj
– rukʼ kʼax kraj ne lo jun winaq kkamik rumal toqʼobʼisaxik uwach jun sukʼ winaq; jeʼ nakʼut, weneʼ kʼo jun kraj ne lo kkamik,
kʼatekʼut, kʼutbʼal rech che ri Dyos kujuloqʼoqʼej; aretaq chiʼ ri uj uj ajmakibʼ, xkam ri Kristo rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik qawach uj.
Ri kamik riʼ nim ri qabʼantajik chuwach chi na weriʼ, rumal che ri uj ujsukʼ chik rukʼ ri ukikʼel, xa jekuriʼ kujkoltaj na waʼ chuwach ri royowal.
We ri uj aretaq chiʼ ujkʼulel, xujutzirik rukʼ ri Dyos rumal ri ukamikal ri ukʼojol; sibʼalaj nim qabʼantajik chi na kʼuwaʼ rumal che xujutzir rukʼ ri areʼ, ri uj kujkolotaj na rumal ri ukʼaslemal,
e man xuwi ta weriʼ, xane nim kqil wi qibʼ pa ri Dyos rumal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, che rumal rech ri areʼ kamik riʼ xujutzir rukʼ ri Dyos.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, che rumal xa jun winaq, ri makaj xpe pa ri uwachulew, e rumal ri makaj xpe ri kamikal e rumal weriʼ, ri kamikal xpe chkij konojel ri winaq, rumal rech che konojel xemakunik; –
aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kʼo ri Pixabʼ, xas kʼo chi wi ri makaj pa ri uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri makaj man kʼo ta kil apanoq aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kʼo jun pixabʼ;
kʼatekʼut, ri kamikal chi ajawinaq qas ri Adam uloq e kopan chi rukʼ ri Moʼises, xoqujeʼ ajawinaq pakiwiʼ ri man kibʼanom ta jun mak, jeʼ jas xubʼan ri Adam; ri areʼ che uwachibʼal ri Jun che rajawaxik wi kpe na.
Kʼatekʼut, ri sipanik man jeriʼ taj jacha ri makaj. We rumal ri umak xa jun winaq, sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq xekamik, sibʼalaj nim chi na riʼ chuwach weriʼ ri usipanik ri Dyos e ri qachʼakoj rumal ri usipanik xa jun chi winaq, ri Jesus Kristo; ronojel weriʼ sibʼalaj xtixex pakiwiʼ ekʼi winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri chʼakoj ma jeʼ ta riʼ jeʼ jas ri kukʼam uloq ri umak xa jun winaq: ri qʼatojtzij aretaq chiʼ kʼo xa jun makaj kuya riʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ, ri uchak ri sipanik, aretaq chiʼ kʼo sibʼalaj taq makaj kuya riʼ ri sukʼil.
We rumal ri umak xa jun winaq, xajawinik ri kamikal, xa rumal na kʼuriʼ, ri winaq che kekʼamow na ri nimalaj sipanik e ri uchʼakoj ri sukʼil, are nim chi na riʼ ri kkikʼam chuwach weriʼ, ri jachintaq keʼajawinik na pa ri kikʼaslemal xas rumal xa jun, ri Jesus Kristo.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, we ri umak xa jun chi winaq, xbʼanowik che konojel ri ewinaq xqʼat tzij pakiwiʼ, xoqujeʼ ri uchak ri usukʼil xaq jun chi winaq, xuya ri usukʼil kʼaslemal chkech konojel ri winaq.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, rumal rech, che man xniman ta xa jun chi winaq, chi nimalaj konojel winaq xeʼokik nimalaj eʼajmakibʼ, xoqujeʼ, aretaq chiʼ knimanik xa jun chi winaq, chi nimalaj konojel winaq xeʼokik esukʼ taq winaq.
Xpe ri Pixabʼ arech kkʼyar uwach ri makaj; e jawiʼ xkʼyar uwach ri makaj, sibʼalaj xpetik ri sipanik:
jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri makaj xajawinik pa ri kamikal, xoqujeʼ ri sipanik kajawinik na riʼ pa ri sukʼil arech kpe ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal rumal ri Jesus Kristo Qajawxel.
¿Jas kʼu kqabʼij na riʼ? ¿La rajawaxik che ri uj kujkanaj kan pa ri makaj arech kkʼyarik ri sipanik? ¡Man jeriʼ taj!
We xkam ri qamak, ri uj, ¿la kujkanaj na kʼu riʼ pa ri mak?
¿On la man iwetaʼm ta ri ix, ri uj che kʼo ri qaqasnaʼ pa ri Kristo Jesus, pa ri ukamikal wi ri areʼ, qonojel ri uj kʼo ri qaqasnaʼ?
Rumal kʼuriʼ, ri uj, ujmuqutalik rukʼ ri Areʼ pa ri ukamikal rumal ri qaqasnaʼ, arech, jeriʼ jas ri Kristo xkʼastaj uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ rumal ri uqʼijil ri Tatxel, ri uj, xoqujeʼ kʼo ri qakʼaslemal riʼ pa jun kʼakʼ kʼaslemal chik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, we ri uj, uj jeriʼ jachaʼ ri Kristo, aretaq chiʼ kʼo jun qakamikal jeʼ jas ri ukamikal areʼ, xoqujeʼ ri uj, kkʼastaj na qawach riʼ jeriʼ jacha ri areʼ xkʼastaj uwach;
utz uchʼobʼik xqabʼano, che ri qʼeʼl qawinaqil xripibʼaxik cho ri ripibʼal rukʼ ri Areʼ, arech, we jun bʼaqilal riʼ che rech ri makaj, man kʼo ta chi uchuqabʼ, arech ri uj man ujpataninel ta chi rech ri makaj.
Rumal rech che ri jun che xkamik, man kʼo ta chi riʼ chuxeʼ ri makaj.
We ri uj, xujkam rukʼ ri Kristo, ri uj kqakojo che ri uj ujkʼaslik rukʼ ri areʼ,
e qetaʼm, che aretaq chiʼ ri Kristo xkʼastaj uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri areʼ man kkam ta chi jumul riʼ, kamik riʼ, ri kamikal man kʼo ta chi ukowinem puwiʼ ri Areʼ.
Ri ukamikal jun kamikal chuwach ri makaj; e we kamikal chuwach ri makaj riʼ, xas pa junalik, e ri ukʼaslemal jun kʼaslemanik pa ri Dyos.
Ri ix, chichomaj bʼaʼ che xixkam chuwach ri makaj e che kʼo ikʼaslemal pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri makaj, man kajawinik ta chi bʼaʼ pa ri ibʼaqil che ri kkam na arech ri ix man kinimaj ta chi urayibʼal.
Mibʼan bʼaʼ chrech ri iqʼabʼ iwaqan jun chukbʼal rech ri man sukʼil taj, pataninel rech ri makaj; kʼatekʼut, chichiʼj bʼaʼ iwibʼ chrech ri Dyos ix jeʼ jas ixkʼaslik che xixtzalij chi ri kamikal uloq, e chibʼanaʼ rukʼ iqʼabʼ iwaqan jun chukbʼal rech ri sukʼil pataninel rech ri Dyos.
Rumal rech che ri makaj man kʼo ta ukowinem piwiʼ ri ix: ri ix man ix kʼo ta chi chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ, xane ix kʼo chuxeʼ ri Sipanik.
¿Jas kʼut? ¿Ri uj, la kujmakun na riʼ, rumal che man uj kʼo ta chi chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ, xane uj kʼo chuxeʼ ri Sipanik? ¡Man kujmakun ta chi riʼ!
Ri ix, ¿la man iwetaʼm taj che aretaq chiʼ kichiʼj iwibʼ chech jun ajaw jeriʼ jas ix upataninel, arech ri ix kinimaj ri areʼ, ri ix, ix pataninel riʼ chrech ri ajaw che kinimaj, on are kinimaj ri mak rech ri kamikal, on are kixniman che ri unimanik ri sukʼil?
Xane maltyox chrech ri Dyos; ri ix ojer ixpataninel rech ri makaj, ekʼu kamik riʼ, ri ix, utz chi unimaxik kibʼano ri tzij che xikʼamo,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, ri ix man ixpataninel ta chi rech ri makaj, xane ixpataninel rech ri sukʼil
–ri in, xinkʼam jun kʼambʼal noʼj chiwach rumal rech ri ituqaʼril–. Rumal rech, we ri ix ojer kanoq xiya ri iqʼabʼ iwaqan jeʼ jas pataninel rech ri man sukʼil taj e rech ri man utz taj, e xas xixopanik pa ri man utz taj; kamik riʼ chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri iqʼabʼ iwaqʼan chrech ri sukʼil, arech ix tyoxlaj taq winaq ri ix.
Aretaq chiʼ ri ix, ixpataninel rech ri makaj, ri ix man ix ximital taj chuwach ri sukʼil.
¿Jas taq kʼu iwach xiyaʼo rukʼ ri jastaq uwach che ri xibʼan ix, e kamik riʼ, ri ix, kixkʼix chrech weriʼ? Rumal rech, che ronojel weriʼ, chi pa ri kamikal kbʼe wi.
Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, ri ix, man ixpataninel ta rech ri makaj, xane ixpataninel rech ri Dyos, ri ix kiya iwach pa ri tyox ubʼantajik, e ronojel weriʼ chi pa ri junalik kʼaslemal kbʼe wi.
Rumal rech, che ri utojbʼalil ri makaj are ri kamikal e ri utojbʼalil ri usipanik ri Dyos, are ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal pa ri Kristo Jesus Qajawxel.
Eʼachalaxik, ri ix, ¿On man iwetaʼm taj –ri in kinchʼaw kukʼ ri jachin taq eʼajtijabʼ rech ri pixabʼ– che ri winaq xuwi kʼo chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ pa ri ukʼaslemal?
Jacha weriʼ, ri jun ixoqilal yutulik rukʼ ri rachajil rumal ri Pixabʼ aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ kʼaslik na cho ri uwachulew; kʼatekʼut, we kkam ubʼi ri achi, xas man ximitalik ta chi uwach riʼ rukʼ ri rachajil cho ri pixabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kʼaslik na ri rachajil, we ri jun ixoq riʼ, kkʼuliʼ rukʼ jun chik achi, nimalaj kmakun riʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kkam ubʼi ri rachajil, xoqujeʼ man ximatalik ta chik kkanaj kan chuwach ri Pixabʼ, ri areʼ man ajmakunel ta riʼ rukʼ nim chʼutiʼn we kokik rixoqil jun chik achi.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, ri ix, ixachalaxik, ri ix xixkam chuwach ri Pixabʼ rumal ri ubʼaqil ri Kristo arech ri ix, ix rech jun chik, kixkʼojiʼ, pa ri Areʼ che xuwaʼlisaj chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, arech ri uj kujwachin chech ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri uj uj kʼo pa ri itzel bʼaqilal ri rayibʼal taq makaj che xukʼasuj ri Pixabʼ, xubʼan chqech ri uj che xujwachin chrech ri kamikal.
Kamik riʼ, ri uj man uj kʼo ta chi pa uqʼabʼ ri Pixabʼ, rumal rech, che ri uj xujkam chuwach ri jastaq che ujuximom kanoq, arech are kujpatanajik chi rukʼ jun kʼakʼ quxlabʼal e man kujpatanajik ta chi rukʼ ri ojer tzʼibʼanik.
¿Jas kʼu kqabʼij na riʼ? ¿La kqabʼij riʼ che are makaj ri Pixabʼ? ¡Man je ta riʼ! Kʼatekʼut, ri in xinwetaʼmaj ri mak xuwi rumal ri Pixabʼ. Ri in man kʼo ta nurayibʼal riʼ kkʼojiʼk, weta mata xubʼij ri Pixabʼ weriʼ: ¡Marayij uwach ri man awech taj!
Kʼatekʼut rumal ri Pixabʼ, ri mak xubʼan chwech ri in arech sibʼalaj kinrayij uwach ri man wech taj, arech tiʼtik kinnaʼo: xane weta mata kʼo ri Pixabʼ, xas kaminaq riʼ ri makaj.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri ojer kanoq, man kʼo ta ri Pixabʼ; kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ xpe ri Pixabʼ, ri makaj xkʼojiʼ ukʼaslemal
e ri in xinkamik, e ri pixabʼ rech ri kʼaslemal xinukʼam ubʼik pa ri kamikal.
Rumal rech che ri makaj, rukʼ ri pixabʼ xubʼan chwech ri in che kkʼojiʼ sibʼalaj nurayibʼal chrech ri man wech taj, e are waʼ xinukamisaj ri in.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, tyoxlaj ri Pixabʼ e tyoxlaj ri taqanik, sibʼalaj sukʼ e sibʼalaj utz.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿la kukʼam uloq kamikal chwech in, jun jas uwach che utz? ¡Man je ta riʼ! Xane are ri makaj arech kqʼalajanik che qas makaj, xukoj jun jas uwach che utz arech kuya ri kamikal chwech; arech ri makaj kubʼan ronojel ri ukowin xas rumal ri pixabʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri uj qetaʼm, che uxlabʼal ri Pixabʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri in, in kʼo pa nubʼaqil, e ri nubʼaqil kʼo pa ri ukowinem ri makaj.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri jastaq uwach che ri in kinbʼano, man kinchʼobʼ ta ubʼeʼal, rumal rech che man kinbʼan taj ri jas uwach che ri in kinwaj kinbʼano kʼatekʼut, are kinbʼan ri jastaq uwach che kinwetzelaj uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in kinbʼan ri jastaq che ri in man kinwaj taj kinbʼano, ri in kinkʼam uqʼabʼ xas jeriʼ jacha kukʼutu ri Pixabʼ che utz ri Pixabʼ;
qastzij nakʼut, man in taj kinbʼano ri itzel taq jastaq, xane are ri makaj kbʼanowik che kʼo wukʼ ri in.
Rumal rech che ri in, wetaʼm che man kʼo ta ri utzil wukʼ in, kinbʼij neʼ, che pa ri nubʼaqil; rumal rech che ri in, kinkowinik kinwaj ri utzil, kʼatekʼut man kinkowin taj kinbʼano:
rumal rech che ri in, man kinbʼan ta ri utzil che ri kwaj kinbʼano e are ne kinbʼan ri itzel che ri in man kinwaj taj kinbʼano.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in kinbʼan ri jastaq che ri in man kinwaj taj kinbʼano, man in taj kinbʼanow ri jastaq, xane are ri makaj che jeqel wukʼ ri in.
Ri in kinriq jun pixabʼ che ktaqan chwech aretaq chiʼ ri in kinwaj kinbʼan ri utzil: xuwi ri itzel kukʼut ribʼ chnuwach ri in.
Rumal rech che ri in, nim kinwil wi ri Upixabʼ ri Dyos, ri xas kʼo wi pa ri winaq;
kʼatekʼut kinwil jun chik pixabʼ pa nuqʼabʼ waqan che kchʼojin rukʼ ri pixabʼ rech ri nuchomanik e kinuyutu rukʼ ri pixabʼ rech ri makaj, che kʼo pa nuqʼabʼ waqan.
¡Kʼax wech ri in che in winaq! ¿Jachin kinutoʼ na riʼ ri in chuwach we nubʼaqil riʼ che kinukʼam ubʼi pa ri kamikal?
¡Maltyox bʼaʼ chrech ri Dyos rumal ri Jesus Kristo Qajawxel! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas in wi, rumal ri nuchomanik ri in kinpatanij ri upixabʼ ri Dyos; kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ri nubʼaqil kinpatanij ri upixabʼ ri makaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, man kʼo ta chi jun qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri ekʼo pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri pixabʼ rech ri Uxlabʼaxel che kuya ri kʼaslemal pa ri Kristo Jesus, xatukiro pa ri upixabʼ ri makaj e pa ri upixabʼ ri kamikal.
Rumal rech, che ri jastaq uwach che man kkowin ta ri Pixabʼ chech rumal ri bʼaqilal; ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ xutaq uloq ri ukʼojol, ri ukʼojol riʼ rukʼ jun bʼaqilal jeriʼ jas ri qabʼaqilal ri uj e chuxeʼ ri makaj, xubʼan jun qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri makaj xas pa ri bʼaqilal,
arech ri utaqanik ri Pixabʼ kbʼantajik paqawiʼ ri uj kʼatekʼuriʼ, arech ri jastaq che kqabʼano man are ta kniman chrech ri bʼaqilal xane are kniman chrech ri uxlabʼxel.
Rumal rech che ri winaq, che kʼo ri kikʼaslemal chuxeʼ ri bʼaqilal are kkaj ri jastaq che rech ri bʼaqilal; kʼatekʼut, ri winaq che ekʼo chuxeʼ ri uxlabʼxell, are kkaj ri jastaq che rech ri uxlabʼxel.
Rumal rech che ri urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal are ri kamikal; kʼatekʼut, ri urayibʼal ri uxlabʼxel are ri kʼaslemal e ri utzil,
rumal rech che ri urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal, kukʼuleʼlaj uwach ri Dyos: man kkanaj ta kan chuxeʼ ri upixabʼ ri Dyos e xoqujeʼ man kkowin ta chrech,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri winaq che ekʼo pa ri bʼaqilal man kekowin ta riʼ che eʼutz kkibʼan chuwach ri Dyos.
Ri ix, man ix kʼo ta pa ri bʼaqilal, xane ix kʼo pa ri uxlabʼxel, rumal rech che ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri Dyos kʼo rachoch iwukʼ ri ix. Jachin ri man kʼo ta ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri Kristo rukʼ, ri areʼ man rech ta ri Kristo,
kʼatekʼut we ri Kristo kʼo iwukʼ ri ix, knʼebʼaʼ kaminaq chi ri bʼaqil rumal ri makaj, ri Uxlabʼxel kʼo ukʼaslemal rumal ri sukʼil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri Areʼ ri xukʼastaʼjisaj uwach ri Jesus chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, kʼo ri rachoch iwukʼ ri ix; xoqujeʼ kuya na riʼ ri kʼaslemal chrech ri ibʼaqil che kʼo chuxeʼ ri kamikal, rumal ri Uxlabʼxel ri kʼo rachoch iwukʼ ri ix.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, eʼachalaxik, ri uj kʼo qakʼas, kʼatekʼut, ri qakʼas man rukʼ ta ri qabʼaqil, rumal rech che weta jeriʼ, ri uj rajawaxik nakʼuriʼ che kujkʼaslemanik chuxeʼ ri bʼaqil.
Rumal rech, che ri ix, we kʼo ri ikʼaslemal chuxeʼ ri bʼaqilal, ri ix kixkam na riʼ. Kʼatekʼut, we ri Uxlabʼaxel kubʼano che kkam ri uchak ri ibʼaqil, ri ix kʼo ikʼaslemal riʼ.
Rumal rech, konojel ri winaq che keʼusilobʼisaj ri Uxlabʼaxel rech ri Dyos, ri eʼareʼ eralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix man xikʼam ta jun uxlabʼal che ximitalik arech ri ix kixtzaq chi jumul pa ri xibʼrikil; ri ix are xikʼam jun uxlabʼxel rech jun alkʼuwaʼlaxel, rumal ri kʼiytisaʼnik che xubʼan chqech ri uj, e rukʼ weriʼ, ri uj kuyaʼo kqaraq qachiʼ: ¡Abbʼa! ¡Tatxel!
Ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, ri areʼ kuriq ribʼ rukʼ ri quxlabʼal uj e kukʼut chqawach ri uj che uj ralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos.
Ujalkʼuwaʼlxel e xoqujeʼ ujajechebʼanel; ujajechebʼanel rech ri Dyos e ujajechebʼanel rukʼ ri Kristo, rumal rech che ri uj kujkʼojiʼ pa ri kʼax rukʼ ri Areʼ, arech ri uj kʼo ri qaqʼijil rukʼ ri Areʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri in kinchomaj, che taq ri kʼax rech we kamik riʼ, man nim ta riʼ chuwach ri qʼijil che kqʼalajin na riʼ qukʼ ri uj.
Rumal rech, che ronojel ri uwachulew, reyeʼm che keqʼalajin na ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos:
we ri uwachulew xkʼojiʼ chuxeʼ ri nimal –man xraj ta weriʼ, kʼatekʼut rumal ri areʼ che xukoj ri areʼ puwiʼ weriʼ– kʼatekʼuriʼ weriʼ rukʼ ri reyeʼbʼal
ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ kreyeʼj che ktoʼtajisax na riʼ chuwach ri qʼayinaq, arech kok pa ri tzoqopitajem rech ri kiqʼijil ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos.
Rumal rech che ri uj, qetaʼm che kʼateʼ pa we qʼij riʼ, ronojel ri uwachulew kuraqaqej na uchiʼ riʼ jacha rilik uwach ri akʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ man xuwi ta ri uwachulew; xoqujeʼ ri uj che kʼo ri nabʼe taq uwach ri Uxlabʼxel qukʼ, kaqarik qachiʼ pa ukʼuʼx qanimaʼ e kqeyeʼj ri ukolotajem ri qabʼaqil.
Rumal rech che kqeyeʼj ri qakolotajem e aretaq chiʼ kqil ri jastaq che qeyeʼm, man qeyeʼj ta chi na kʼu riʼ; we kqil jun jas uwach che qeyeʼm ¿jas kʼu reyeʼxik chi na kqabʼan chi jumul riʼ?
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kqeyeʼj ri jas jun uwach che man kqil taj, rukʼ chuqʼabʼalil riʼ kqeyeʼj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel kpe riʼ che qatoʼik; rumal rech che ri uj man qetaʼm taj jas kqataʼo, aretaq chiʼ ri uj utz kujchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos; kʼatekʼut, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, ri areʼ kchʼaw paqawiʼ rukʼ sibʼalaj oqʼej,
e ri Areʼ che kril taq ri qanimaʼ, retaʼm jas ri urayibʼal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel e ri uchʼawem pakiwiʼ ri etyoxlaj taq winaq jeriʼ jacha kril ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm, che jachintaq ri kkiloqʼoqʼej rukʼ kikʼuʼx ri Dyos, ri Dyos kchakun kukʼ pa ronojel utzil chkech eʼareʼ, arech kʼo ri utzil kukʼ, ri eʼareʼ che keʼusikʼij jacha kraj ri urayibʼal.
Rumal rech, che ri xeril ojer kanoq, xoqujeʼ xeʼukoj ri eʼareʼ ojer kanoq arech che ri eʼareʼ ejun uwachibʼal ri Ukʼojol arech ri areʼ, are nabʼeʼal chkech sibʼalaj eʼachalaxik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ che xeʼukoj ojer kanoq xoqujeʼ xeʼusikʼij ri eʼareʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri jachin xeʼusikʼij, xoqujeʼ xuya ri sukʼil chkech; e ri eʼareʼ che xuya ri sukʼil chkech xoqujeʼ, xuyaʼ ri qʼijil chkech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿jas kʼuriʼ kinbʼij chi na riʼ kamik? we kʼo ri Dyos qukʼ, ¿jachin kʼu riʼ qakʼulel?
Ri areʼ, che man xutas ta ri Ukʼojol pa ri kʼax xane xuya ri areʼ pa ri kʼax rech utzil chqech nimalaj qonojel, ¿la man kuya ta kʼu riʼ ronojel toqʼobʼ chqech ri uj?
¿Jachin kbʼanow na riʼ jun qʼatbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ che xeʼusikʼij ri Dyos? Are ri Dyos kyoʼw ri sukʼil.
¿Jachin kbʼanow na riʼ jun qʼatojtzij? Are ri Kristo Jesus che xkamik, ¿jas kʼu kinbʼij? ri Areʼ xkʼastaj uwach, kʼo pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos e kutaʼ toqʼobʼ paqawiʼ ri uj.
¿Jas kʼu ri kujach na qawach rukʼ ri Uloqʼoqʼebʼal ri kristo? ¿La are taq ri kʼax? ¿La are taq ri xibʼrikil? ¿La are ri oqatanem? ¿La are taq ri wiʼjal? ¿La are ri chʼanalik ij? ¿La are taq ri kʼax kpe chqij? ¿La are taq ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj?
Jacha ri kubʼij ri utzij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Awumal ri at, pa ronojel taq qʼij kujkamisaxik; ri uj uj jeriʼ jacha ri echij che kekamisaxik.
Kʼatekʼut, pa ronojel taq weriʼ ri uj kujchʼakanik, rumal ri areʼ che kujuloqʼoqʼej.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in utz kinchomanik, wetaʼm che ri kamikal, ri kʼaslemal, ri eʼanjelibʼ, ri taq ajawibʼal, ri kamik, ri chweʼq, ri taq chuqʼabʼalil,
ri ajsik, ri ikim on jun chik jas uwach, man kkowin ta riʼ kujach qawach rukʼ ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ri Dyos che xuqʼalajisaj ribʼ pa ri Kristo.
Ri in kinbʼij ri saqalajtzij pa ri Kristo, ri in man inbʼanal tzij taj –ri nuchomanik utz rilik kubʼan weriʼ rukʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel–,
kʼo jun sibʼalaj bʼis e jun nimalaj kʼax pa ri wanimaʼ.
Rumal rech che ri in kinwaj che xas in, in anatema, in tasatal rukʼ ri Kristo, arech utz ekʼo ri ewachalal, ri eʼareʼ che erech nujuqʼat rumal ri bʼaqilal,
ri eʼareʼ ri eʼajisraʼelita ri eʼareʼ che ekʼiytisaʼn jacha eʼalkʼuwaʼlxelabʼ, rukʼ ri qʼijil, rukʼ taq ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ, rukʼ ri Pixabʼ, rukʼ ri qʼijilanik, rukʼ taq ri chiʼnik bʼanom,
xoqujeʼ rukʼ ri ojer taq kimam; e xas rukʼ ri kibʼaqil xel uloq ri Kristo, ri areʼ che kʼo chikaj puwiʼ ronojel jastaq uwach; ¡tewchiʼtalik ri Dyos chubʼeqʼij, chubʼesaq! Amen.
Man xa ta xsach ri utzij ri Dyos. Rumal rech che man konojel ta ri erijaʼlil ri Israʼel eʼajisraʼel.
Kneʼbʼaʼ erijaʼlil ri Abʼraham, man konojel taj eralkʼuwaʼl, kʼatekʼut, rumal ri Isaʼak ri erijaʼlil kʼo jun ubʼiʼ,
weriʼ kubʼij: man eʼare ta ri eʼalkʼuwaʼlxel erech ri bʼaqilal eralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos, xuwi eʼejatalik eʼijaʼlil ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri tzij che jeqebʼam ubʼixik.
Are waʼ taq ri utzij ri tzij jeqebʼaʼm ubʼixik: pa taq we qʼij riʼ, ri in kinpe na riʼ e ri Sara kkʼojiʼ na jun ral riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, nim chi na chuwach weriʼ; ri Rebʼeka yawabʼ ixoq chik rumal xuwi jun achi, che are ri Isaʼak qatat;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kril kiwach, e aretaq chiʼ man kibʼanom ta ri utzil on ri itzel –arech kqʼalajinik che tzoqopitalik ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ kusikʼij jun winaq,
weriʼ, kubʼano rumal urayibʼal ri areʼ che kusikʼij jun winaq e man rumal ta ri uchak ri winaq–, xubʼij chrech ri Rebʼeka: ri nabʼeʼal kupatanij na riʼ ri chaqʼaxel,
jacha kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri in xinloqʼoqʼej ri Jakobʼ e xinxutuj ri Esaʼu.
¿Jas kʼu kinbʼij na riʼ? ¿La che man sukʼ ta ri Dyos? ¡Man je taj!
Rumal rech che ri Areʼ kubʼij chrech ri Moʼises: Ri in kintoqʼobʼisaj na uwach riʼ ri areʼ che ri in kinwaj kintoqʼobʼisaj uwach, e ri in utz kinwil ri areʼ che ri in kinwaj utz kinwilo.
Man are ta ri winaq ri kajawan jun jas uwach on che kajawan kutij anim, xane are ri Dyos ktoqʼobʼisan wachaj.
Xane ri tzij kubʼij chrech ri Faraʼon: Ri in katinkojo pa ri nuraybʼal arech ri in kinqʼalajisaj awukʼ at riʼ ri nuchuqʼabʼ e arech nim kilitaj wi ri nubʼi pa ronojel ri uwachulew.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, kutoqʼobʼisaj uwach jun winaq e kukoj ri itzel pa ri ranimaʼ jun chik winaq jacha ri kraj ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at kabʼij na riʼ chwech: ¿La kʼo lo jun itzelal pa ranimaʼ ri Dyos? ¿Jachin kkowinik, kchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri urayibʼal?
¡Ri at atwinaq! ¿At jachin ri at, che kuyaʼo katchʼojin rukʼ ri Dyos? ¿Ri jun jas uwach, la are kbʼin na riʼ chrech ri Areʼ, ri xbʼanowik ri areʼ: Jasche, jeriʼ xinabʼano?
Ri ajbʼanal taq bʼoʼj ¿la man are ta rajaw ri ulew, arech kubʼan rukʼ, chi jun utz jeʼlik bʼoʼj on jun itzel bʼoʼj kkaʼyik?
¡Jeʼ nakʼut! Ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ xuqʼalajisaj ri royowal e ri uchoqʼabʼ, sibʼalaj xuchʼijo ri jetaq bʼoʼj rech oyowal, e rech kibʼe pa ri man utz taj,
arech kuqʼalajisaj ri nimalaj uqʼijil rukʼ ri jetaq bʼoʼj che erech ri utoqʼobʼ, che chi ojer tzij uloq xusukʼumaj rech nimalaj qʼijil,
ri uj che xujusikʼij, man xuwi ta xsikʼin chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo, xane xoqujeʼ xsikʼin chkech ri e man eʼajjudiʼo taj.
Jacha ri kubʼij ri Oseʼas: kinbʼij na riʼ, nutinimit chech ri areʼ, ri jun che man nutinimit taj, e kinbʼij na nuloqʼ riʼ chech ri jun che man nuloqʼ taj.
E jawiʼ ri xbʼix wi chkech: «Ri ix man ix nutinimit taj», kbʼix na riʼ chiwech ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri kʼasliklaj Dyos.
Ri Isaʼiʼas kuraqaqej uchiʼ kutzʼonoj puwiʼ ri Israʼel: aretaq chiʼ ri kejalabʼalil ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Israʼel jeriʼ jachaʼ ri sanyebʼ rech ri polow, xuwi ekebʼ oxibʼ kekolotaj na riʼ:
rumal rech che xas kamik riʼ, ri Ajawxel utz ubʼanik na kubʼano ri utzij puwiʼ ri ulew.
E jekʼuriʼ, jas xubʼij ri Isaʼiʼas: Weta ri Ajawxel Sabʼaʼot, man xuya ta kan jun ijaʼ chqech ri uj; ri uj uj jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ jacha ri Sodoma e ri Gomorra.
¿Jas kʼuwaʼ ronojel weriʼ? Ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, che man xkitzukuj ta ri sukʼil, xkiriq jun sukʼil, ri sukʼil rech ri kojonik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Israʼel che xuterembʼej jun Pixabʼ rech sukʼil, ri areʼ man xubʼan ta ri Pixabʼ.
¿Jasche? Rumal rech che man xkeyeʼj ta pa ri kojonik, xane are xkeyeʼj pa ri kichak. Xkipotzʼij kibʼ cho taq ri abʼaj pa ri bʼe
jacha tzʼibʼatalik: Ri in kinkoj pa ri Siʼon jun abʼaj pa ri bʼe, e jun nimalaj abʼaj chik che ktzaqanik; kʼatekʼut, jachin kkojon na riʼ chrech ri Areʼ man kkʼix ta riʼ.
Eʼachalaxik, ri urayibʼal ri wanimaʼ e ri urayibʼal ri nuchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, are che ri eʼareʼ kekʼolotajik.
Rumal rech che ri in utz uyaʼik ri tzij kinbʼan pakiwiʼ ri jachintaq kkaj uwach ri Dyos, kʼatekʼut man utz taj uloqʼaxik ri Dyos kkibʼano.
Rumal rech, che ri eʼareʼ man ketaʼm ta ri usukʼil ri Dyos, are kkitzukuj ri sukʼil kech ri eʼareʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ man xkaj taj xekʼojiʼ chuxeʼ ri usukʼil ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che ri ukʼisbʼalil ri Pixabʼ, are ri Kristo, arech che ri kekojonik kkʼojiʼ ri kisukʼil.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri Moʼises xutzʼibʼaj puwiʼ ri usukʼil ri Pixabʼ che kʼiyinaq uloq pa ri pixabʼ, che jachin ri kubʼan na ri Pixabʼ, kkʼojiʼ riʼ ri ukʼaslemal rumal ri Pixabʼ,
kʼatekʼut, ri usukʼil ri kojonik kubʼij weriʼ: Mabʼij bʼaʼ pa ri awanimaʼ: ¿Jachin kpaqʼiʼ na riʼ chikaj? waʼ weriʼ kubʼij: arech kuqasaj uloq ri Kristo waral;
on: ¿Jachin kqaj bʼi riʼ pa ri nim siwan? waʼ weriʼ kubʼij: arech kuʼupaqbʼaʼ uloq ri Kristo waral chi chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
¡Jas kubʼij weriʼ! Ri Tzij sibʼalaj naqaj kʼo wi chawech ri at, cho ri achiʼ e pa ri awanimaʼ, chataʼ bʼaʼ: are ri tzij rech ri kojonik che ri uj kqaya ubʼixik.
Rumal rech, che we ri achiʼ kuya ubʼixik che ri Jesus Ajawxel, e we ri awanimaʼ kukojo che ri Dyos xuwaʼlajisaj uwach ri Areʼ xas chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri at katkolotaj na riʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri kojonik ri kʼo pa ri animaʼ kukʼam uloq riʼ ri sukʼil, e ri tzij rech ri kojonik che kʼo cho ri chiʼaj kukʼam uloq ri kolotajem.
¿La man kubʼij ta ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Jachin ti kkojon chrech ri Areʼ man kkʼix ta riʼ?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jalajoj chkixoʼl ri eʼajjudiʼo e ri eʼajgriʼego: konojel junam ri Kajawxel, e kuya ri uqʼinomal chkech konojel ri kesikʼin chrech ri Areʼ.
Rumal rech, ri jun che rukʼ ukʼojbʼal kusikʼij ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel, ri areʼ kkoltaj na riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ¿jas usikʼixik riʼ kqabʼan ri Areʼ we man are nabʼe kujkojon chrech ri Areʼ? Kʼatekʼut ¿jas kqabʼan che ukʼojik we man are nabʼe kqata ri Areʼ? ¿E jas utaʼyik ri areʼ we man kʼo ta jun winaq kuya ubʼixik?
Kʼatekʼut ¿jas ubʼixik ri tzij kqabʼano, we man are nabʼe ujtaqom uloq? jacha kuya ubʼixik ri utzij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: ¡Sibʼalaj jeʼlik ri kaqan ri kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri utzlaj taq tzij!
Kʼatekʼut, man konojel taj xkinimaj ri Utzalaj Tzij. Rumal rech che ri Isaʼiʼas kubʼij: Ajawxel, ¿jachin xukoj ri qatzij?
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri kojonik kpe rumal ri utzij ri kayoʼw ubʼixik ri tzij, e ri utzij ri kyow ubʼixik ri tzij kpe rumal ri utzij ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼan jun kʼotoj chiʼaj: ¿La man xkita ta ri eʼareʼ? ri kichʼabʼal xtaʼtajik pa ronojel ri uwachulew e ri kitzij xtatajik chi kʼateʼ pa ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uwachulew.
Kʼatekʼut, kinbʼan jun kʼotoj chiʼaj: ¿La man xuchʼobʼ ta ri Israʼel? Xbʼitaj rumal ri Moʼises: ri in, kixinwachixomaj na riʼ rumal jun che man amaqʼ taj, ri in kinyak na sibʼalaj oyowal riʼ chrij jun amaqʼ chik che man kʼo ta unoʼjibʼal.
Ri Isaʼiʼas xoqujeʼ xubʼij: ri eʼareʼ xinkiriqo kumal ri man xinkitzukuj taj, ri in xinqʼalajisaj wibʼ chkiwach ri eʼareʼ che man xkitaʼ ta chwech,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij puwiʼ ri Israʼel: Ronojel taq qʼij xinya ri nuqʼabʼ chkech jun tinimit che man kniman taj e che kekʼuleʼlaʼnik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in kinbʼan jun kʼotoj chiʼaj: Ri Dyos ¿La xuxutuj ubʼi ri utinimit? ¡Man je taj! Ri in ¿la man in jun israʼelita taj che in jun rijaʼl ri Abʼraham che ujuqʼat ri Bʼenjamin?
Ri Dyos man xuxutuj ta ubʼik ri utinimit che xuchaʼ ojer kanoq. On man iwetaʼm ta ri utzij ri Tzʼibʼatalik puwiʼ ri Eliʼas aretaq chiʼ kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos e kubʼan jun qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri Israʼel:
Ajawxel, xeʼkikamisaj ri eʼaqʼaxal atzij, xkitukij taq ri qakʼolbʼal rech tabʼal atoqʼobʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri in nutukel xinkanaj kanoq e kkaj che kinkikamisaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jas kubʼij ri utzij ri Dyos chrech ri Eliʼas? Ri in xeʼintas wuqubʼ mil (7.000) achijabʼ che man xkimej ta kibʼ chuwach ri Bʼaʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ kamik riʼ ekanajinaq kanoq kebʼ oxibʼ che eʼusikʼim rumal ri usipanik.
E weriʼ rumal ri sipanik, man rumal ta ri kichak; weta mata rumal ri sipanik riʼ, ri sipanik man sipanik ta chi riʼ.
¿Jas kʼu kinbʼij na riʼ? Ri jastaq che xutzukuj ri Israʼel, man xuriq taj; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jachintaq che xkiriqo, ri eʼareʼ xesikʼix riʼ. Ri enikʼaj chik, xkowirisaxik ri kanimaʼ,
jacha kubʼij ri utzij ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri Dyos xuya chkech jun warinaq uxlabʼal: ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta kiwoqʼoch arech kekaʼyik, man kʼo ta kixikin che utayik chi kʼateʼ pa we qʼij kamik riʼ.
Ri David xoqujeʼ kubʼij: Chkʼextajoq kimexa pa jun kʼambʼal e pa jun kolobʼ, arech keʼutzaqo, e are waʼ ri tojbʼal kech.
Chqʼequʼmaroq ri kiwoqoch arech man kekaʼy taj e ronojel taq qʼij chkiqʼusbʼa ri kij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼan jun kʼotoj chiʼaj: Ri eʼareʼ ¿la qastzij xetzaqik cho ri abʼaj? ¡Man je ta riʼ! Kʼatekʼut, ri itzel bʼinem xubʼan ri kaqan xuya ri kolotajem chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj arech ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj keʼachixomanik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¡we are ri itzel bʼinem xubʼan ri kaqan ri xyoʼw ri qʼinomal chrech ri uwachulew, e we are ri kituqaʼril ri eʼareʼ xyoʼw ri qʼinomal chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, nimalaj utz utzʼaqataxik riʼ chkech ri eʼareʼ!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼij chiwech, ri ix che man ix eʼajjudiʼo taj: ri in, in apostol chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in nim kinwil wi ri nuchak riʼ,
kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ kinbʼan weriʼ, are sibʼalaj kinweyeʼj kinbʼan achixom chkech ri eʼareʼ che junam nukikʼel kukʼ arech kwaj keʼinkol ejujun chkech.
Rumal rech, che aretaq chiʼ etasatal ri eʼareʼ, weriʼ jun utzil xubʼan chrech ri uwachulew, ¿jas kkʼulmataj riʼ aretaq chiʼ ketzalejik, we man are jun kʼastajibʼal wachaj chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ?
We etyox ri enabʼe taq wachinik, xoqujeʼ je na kʼuriʼ konojel ri enikʼaj chik; e we tyoxlaj taq ri erabʼ xoqujeʼ je na kʼu riʼ ri uqʼabʼ taq ri cheʼ.
We kʼo jujun uqʼabʼ ri cheʼ che qʼatom apanoq, e ri at, che at olivo at ujuyubʼal cheʼ, xatnakʼik puwiʼ ri olivo arech ri at kkʼojiʼ awukʼ ri ukikʼel ri nabʼe olivo,
man nim ta riʼ kawil awibʼ chuwach ri taq uqʼabʼ ri cheʼ apanoq. On we ri at, are kawaj nim kawil awibʼ, man at taj ri kʼo ri urabʼ awukʼ, are ri urabʼ at rukʼam ri at.
Ri at kabʼij na riʼ: kʼo jujun taq uqʼabʼ qʼatom apanoq arech ri in kʼo nukʼolbʼal puwiʼ ri cheʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut. Ejujun taq uqʼabʼ ri cheʼ eqʼatom apanoq, rumal rech che man kʼo ta kikojonik, e ri at are ri akojonik kbʼanowik che ri at, at kʼo puwiʼ ri cheʼ. Manimarisaj bʼaʼ awibʼ xane chaxibʼij bʼaʼ awibʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri Dyos we man xutoʼ ta kiwach ri enabʼe taq uqʼabʼ ri cheʼ, chawilampeʼ xoqujeʼ man kutoʼ ta awach at riʼ.
Chawilampeʼ, ri rutzilal e ri uchuqʼabʼ royowal ri Dyos: ri areʼ kʼo uchuqʼabʼ royowal chkiwach ri xetzaqik, utzil ranimaʼ riʼ awukʼ ri at we katkanaj kan pa ri utzilal, we man katkanaj ta kanoq, xoqujeʼ ri at kattas apanoq riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri eʼareʼ man kekanaj ta kanoq che man kekojon taj, kenakʼ na riʼ puwiʼ ri ucheʼal: ri Dyos sibʼalaj kʼo ukowinem che keʼunakʼ chi na jumul puwiʼ ri ucheʼal.
Rumal rech, we ri at xattas apanoq chrech ri qas acheʼal olivo e xatnakʼik puwiʼ jun utz olivo, che man acheʼal taj; ¡nimalaj kinakʼik chi na riʼ ri jetaq uqʼabʼ ri cheʼ chi puwiʼ ri kicheʼal wi!
Eʼachalaxik, rumal rech che ri in man kinwaj taj che ri ix mata iwetaʼm we awatalik taq jastaq riʼ, rumal rech che ri in kinxiʼbʼij wibʼ chiwech we ri ix nimalaj kiwil iwibʼ pa ri inoʼjibʼal: jun ujuqʼat chkech ri Israʼel kʼo jun kowlaj kanimaʼ riʼ, chi kʼateʼ na arechiʼ konojel ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj keʼok na
kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel riʼ ri Israʼel kekoltaj na riʼ jacha tzʼibʼatalik: Chi pa ri Siʼon kpe na wi riʼ ri ajkirinel, kukʼyaq na ubʼi riʼ ri man kojonik taj, pa ri unikʼajal kʼo wi ri Jakobʼ.
E are waʼ weriʼ ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ wech ri in kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kinkʼyaq na bʼi ri kimak.
Ri eʼareʼ, rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij chiwach ri ix eʼikʼulel, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼareʼ eloqʼoqʼem rumal rech che xesikʼixik rumal kech ri ekitat.
Rumal rech, aretaq chiʼ ri Dyos kuya ri usipanik e ksikʼinik, ri areʼ man kukʼex ta ri utzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jacha ri ix ojer, man kixniman ta chuwach ri Dyos e ri kamik riʼ ri ix xyaʼtaj ri sachbʼal mak chiwech, rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ man xeniman taj,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kamik riʼ man keniman taj, rumal rech che ri ix xsachatajik ri imak, arech ri eʼareʼ xoqujeʼ kamik riʼ ksachatajik ri kimak.
Ri Dyos xubʼano, che konojel ri winaq man keniman taj, arech ri Areʼ kuya ri sachbʼal mak chkech konojel.
¡Nimalaj taq siwan rech ri uqʼinomal, ri unoʼjibʼal e ri retambʼal ri Dyos! ¡Man kuya taj ketaxik ri upixabʼ, e man kchʼobʼtaj ta ubʼeʼal ri ubʼe!
Rumal nakʼut, ¿jachin xretaʼmaj jun qʼij uchomanik ri Dyos? ¿Jachin ri ajpixbʼanel chrech ri areʼ?
On ¿jachinoq kʼo uyaʼom nabʼe chrech ri areʼ, arech kuya ri Areʼ ri tojbʼal rech chech?
Rumal rech, che ronojel qas petinaq uloq rukʼ ri Areʼ, petinaq uloq xas rech ri Areʼ, e petinaq uloq chech ri Areʼ. ¡Chrech ri Areʼ ri qʼijil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaqʼ! ¡Amen!
Ri in, sibʼalaj kintaʼ chiwech ix achalaxik, pa ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos, chiyaʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ ri ix ix jacha jun tyoxlaj kaxlanwa utz chuwach ri Dyos rukʼ ri ikʼaslemal: are waʼ ri qastzij qʼijilanik rajawaxik kibʼan ri ix.
Kʼatekʼut, mibʼano jacha kubʼan we uwachulew kamik riʼ, are ta bʼaʼ ri kʼakʼ ichomanik kixukʼexo e kixubʼano, che ri ix, utz kiwil ri urayibʼal ri Dyos: ri utzilal, ri utz rilik, ri nimalaj tzʼaqat ubʼantajik.
Pa ri ubʼi ri sipanik ri xyaʼtaj chwech ri in; ri in kinbʼij chiwech iwonojel e chiwech chi jujunal: nim miwil bʼaʼ iwibʼ, xuwi riʼ ri rajawaxik; are nim chiwilaʼ wi iwibʼ iwonojel, jeriʼ jacha ri ikojonik xuya ri Dyos chiwech.
Xane rumal jacha ubʼanik ri qabʼaqil, kʼo jujun taq utzʼaqatil, e ronojel utzaqatil kʼo ri uchak,
xoqujeʼ ri uj, uj xa jun chi bʼaqilal pa ri Kristo Jesus, e qonojel chi utzʼaqatil ri bʼaqilal, uj kitzaqatil chkijujunal ri enikʼaj chik.
Ri uj kʼo jalajoj taq sipanik qukʼ, jeriʼ jacha ri sipanik yaʼtajinaq chqech, e we ri uj are kʼo ri sipanik rech uqʼaxexik utzij ri Dyos, chqabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri qachak jacha ri qakojonik kʼolik;
we ri uj are kʼo ri sipanik rech ri patanijik, chujpatanijoq bʼaʼ; we ri uj are kʼo ri sipanik rech ri tijonik, chujtijonoq;
we ri uj are kʼo ri sipanik rech ri utz kujchʼawik, chujchʼawoq. Ri jun che kyaʼowik muchomaj tojibʼal ukʼaxel; ri areʼ che ktaqanik utz bʼaʼ chtaqanoq; ri jun che ktoqʼobʼisan uwach ri mebʼaʼ chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal.
Ri ix makʼojiʼ kebʼ uloqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼux; chipaqchiʼj ri itzel, chiximaʼ iwibʼ rukʼ chuqʼabʼ pa ri utzil.
Chiloqʼoqʼej chbʼil taq iwibʼ, chiximaʼ iwibʼ pa ri achalaxik ibʼ, e iwonojel, chi jujunal are utz rilik chibʼana chi na ri enikʼaj chiwach ri ix.
Rukʼ jun utzalaj achixinik pa ri uchuqʼabʼ ri uxlabʼal, chipatanij bʼaʼ ri Ajawxel.
Rukʼ nimalaj kiʼkotemal pa ri eyebʼal; rukʼ jun nimalaj chuqʼabʼ pa ri kʼax; rukʼ ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos ronojel taq qʼij;
qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ ri rajawaxik chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq; chibʼanaʼ utzalaj kikʼulaxik ri enikʼaj chik.
Cheʼitewchiʼj ri kixkoqataj, cheʼitewchij mibʼij itzel pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ kukʼ ri kekiʼkotik, chixoqʼ bʼaʼ kukʼ ri keʼoqʼik,
Chixnoj bʼaʼ chrech ri utzil nimalaj iwonojel, mixkanaj kan pa ri nimal, chinitzʼarisaj iwibʼ, nim miwil iwibʼ pa inojbʼal.
Mibʼan ri itzel chech ri jun che xubʼan ri itzel chiwech, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ ri jastaq che utz chkiwach konojel ri winaq,
chixkʼol bʼaʼ pa ri nimalaj utzil kukʼ chi nimalaj konojel, we kixkowinik,
mibʼan iqʼatojtzij, ixloqʼalaj taq wachalal, chiweyeʼj che kpe ri oyowal; rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: in ri kinbʼanow na riʼ qʼatbʼaltzij, ri in kintojow na ri tojbʼalil, kchʼaw ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼut, we knumik ri akʼulel chayaʼ bʼaʼ ri uwa, we ri areʼ kchaqij uchiʼ chayaʼ bʼaʼ ri rukʼyaʼ; aretaq chiʼ kabʼan at weriʼ, kakoj riʼ ri qʼaqʼ puwiʼ ri ujolom.
Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che ri itzel man katuchʼak taj ri at, kʼatekʼut chachʼakaʼ bʼaʼ ri itzel rukʼ ri utzil.
Chenimanoq chkijujunal konojel winaq chkech ri enim taq winaq che kʼo ri keqeleʼn. Rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun kowinem che man petinaq ta chi rukʼ ri Dyos; e are ri Dyos xyokowik.
Ri jun che kchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri kowinem, xoqujeʼ kchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jachintaq man keniman ta chkech ri eʼareʼ, kʼo riʼ ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ.
Rumal rech, che man kʼo ta xibʼrikil riʼ chkiwach ri eqʼataltzij aretaq chiʼ kbʼan ri utzil, xane aretaq chiʼ kbʼan ri itzel. Ri at ¿la kawaj man kaxibʼij ta awibʼ chuwach ri kowinem? Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri utzil, e ri at kayaʼtaj na riʼ chawech utzalaj taq tzij kumal kech ri eʼareʼ;
rumal rech che rumal ri areʼ, ri Dyos kukʼam ri abʼe. Kʼatekʼut, chaxibʼij bʼaʼ awibʼ we ri at kabʼan ri itzel, rumal rech che ri areʼ man xaq ta loqʼ kʼo ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoj puqʼabʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ ri Dyos kubʼan ri qʼatbʼaltzij e kukʼajisaj uwach ri jun che kbʼanow ri itzel.
Kʼatekʼut, rajawaxik che jun winaq knimanik, man xuwi ta rumal ri xibʼrikil chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij, xane xoqujeʼ rumal ri uchomanik pa ranimaʼ.
¿La man rumal ta kʼuwaʼ weriʼ che ri ix kitoj ri alkabʼal? Rumal rech, che ekʼo eʼajpataninel kech ri tinimit, che kechakun rumal ri Dyos pa we chak riʼ.
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chkech chkijujunal ri eʼareʼ ri taqalik kya chkech: ri ajmolol alkabʼal, alkabʼal kya chrech; ri tojonik, kya chrech ri qʼatbʼaltzij; ri nimanik, kya chrech ri nim ubʼanik; ri uqʼijil kya chrech, ri nim qʼijil.
Mikʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ikʼas kukʼ ri winaq, xuwi chibʼanaʼ ikʼas rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx kukʼ. Rumal rech che ri jun che kuloqʼoqʼej ri jun chik xukʼaslemaj riʼ ri Pixabʼ.
Rumal rech, ri taqanik che kubʼij: Matmakun rukʼ ixoq achi, matkamisanik, matelaqʼanik, mawaj ri ujastaq jun winaq chik, e ronojel ri enikʼaj chik taqanik xa jun kubʼan pa we tzij riʼ: chaloqʼoqʼej ri jun chik jacha uloqʼoqʼexik awibʼ ri at kabʼano.
Ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx man kubʼan ta ri itzel chech ri jun chik. Ri tzʼaqat Pixabʼ are ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx.
Ri ix iwetaʼm jastaq ri qʼij ujkʼaslik wi kamik riʼ. Kamik riʼ rajawaxik che ri uj kujkʼastajik; kamik riʼ ri kolotajem, naqaj kʼo wi chi na chuwach ri jun qʼij aretaq chiʼ xqakʼam ri kojonik.
Kkʼis ri aqʼabʼ, petinaq chi uloq ri qʼij. Chiyaʼ bʼaʼ kanoq ri uchak ri qʼequʼmal e chqakojoʼ bʼaʼ jun atzʼyaq rech saqil.
Jacha ixkʼo pa qʼij, chkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemal pa ri utzil: misipojisaj ipam pa taq ri waʼim, mixqʼabʼarik, mixmakun rukʼ ixoq achi, mixchʼojinik on mixachixomanik.
Chixatzʼyaqinoq rukʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo e mixbʼison rukʼ ri ibʼaqil chrech ubʼanik taq ri urayinik.
Ri jun winaq che tuqaʼr pa ri ukojonik utz ukʼulaxik chibʼanaʼ, mikʼuleʼlaj taq ri uchomanik.
Jun kuchomaj che kkowinik kutij ronojel kʼi uwach ri katijowik, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri tuqaʼr winaq xuwi kutij ri ichaj:
ri jun che kwaʼik, maretzelaj uwach jun che man kwa taj, e ri jun che ri man kwa taj mubʼan bʼaʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri jun che kwaʼik; ri Dyos utz ukʼulaxik ubʼanom ri areʼ.
At ¿jachin ri at arech kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ jun ajpataninel rech jun chik? We ktakʼiʼk on ktzaqik, xuwi ri rajaw kʼo rech chrech; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ktakʼiʼ riʼ, rumal rech che ri Ajawxel kkowin riʼ kuya ri uchoqʼabʼ.
We kʼo jun winaq, nim kel wi jun qʼij chuwach, chuwach taq ri nikʼaj chik qʼij; jun chik winaq kuchomaj che junam ronojel taq ri qʼij: chayaʼ bʼaʼ kan konojel ri winaq pa ri kichomanik.
Ri areʼ che nim kril uwach ri qʼij, weriʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel kubʼan wi; e ri areʼ che kwaʼik, weriʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel kubʼan wi, rumal rech che kmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che man kwaʼ taj, weriʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel kubʼan wi e kmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos.
Rumal, che man kʼo ta jun kʼasal pa rech wi, man kʼo ta jun kkam pa rech wi;
we ri uj kʼo ri qakʼaslemal kujkʼasleman chrech ri Kristo, e we ri uj kujkamik, kujkam pa ri Ajawxel. Xa jekʼuriʼ, kujkʼasiʼk on kujkamik, ri uj, uj kʼo pa ri Ajawxel.
Rumal rech che ri Kristo xkamik e xkʼastaj uwach, arech ri areʼ kuxik Ajawxel chkech ri ekaminaqibʼ e chkech ri ekʼaslik.
Kʼatekʼut, at ¿jachin ri at, arech kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri awachalal? At ¿jachin ri at, che katzʼiʼlaj uwach ri awachalal? Ri uj qonojel kujbʼe na riʼ chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Dyos,
rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: Rumal ri nukʼaslemal, kcha ri Ajawxel, ronojel aqanaj kumej na ribʼ chnuwach ri in, e ronojel aqʼaj, kuya na nim uqʼij ri Dyos.
Weriʼ kubʼij, che chqajujunal kujopan na riʼ chuwach ri Dyos.
Maqabʼan qʼatojtzij paqawiʼ chqabʼil taq qibʼ: are ne utz ubʼanik chqabʼanaʼ ri qʼatojtzij ri rajawaxik, arech man kqakoj ta jun jas uwach chuwach ri qachalal rech utzaqik.
Ri in wetaʼm, qas wetaʼm pa ri Ajawxel Jesus, che man kʼo ta jun itzel jas uwach; xuwi na kʼo riʼ chuwach ri jun che kuchomaj che itzel ri wa; kʼatekʼut, we itzel chuwach ri areʼ, itzel na kʼu riʼ.
–Rumal rech, we xa rumal jun wa kʼax kmayowik ri awachalal ri at man kʼo ta loqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx. Makamisaj rumal ri awa, ri jun che rumal ri utoqʼobʼ ri Ajawxel xkam puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Mikoj bʼaʼ ri utz ichomanik chuwach ri itzel tzij.
Rumal rech che ri rajawibʼal ri Dyos man kʼo ta pa ri wa on pa ri ukʼyaʼ, xane are kʼo pa ri sukʼil, pa ri utzil e pa ri kiʼkotemal rukʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel.
Ri jun che jeriʼ kupatanij ri Kristo, utz chuwach ri Dyos e chkiwach ri winaq.
Are chqaterneʼbʼej ri jastaq che kuyaʼo ri nimalaj utzil e ri utz taq chomanik che utz chkech konojel winaq.
Matukij ri uchak ri Dyos xa rukʼ jun wa. Ronojel wa qas utz, kʼatekʼuriʼ, itzel na kʼu riʼ, aretaq chiʼ kwaʼ jun winaq we kubʼan kʼax chrech jun winaq chik.
Utz waʼ weriʼ, we kaya kan ri tiʼj e ri amajaʼ, e ronojel ri jas taq uwach ri kbʼanowik che ktzaq ri awachalal rumal on ktuqaʼrik rumal weriʼ.
Ri akojonik ri at, chakʼoloʼ bʼaʼ chuwach ri Dyos. Utz rech ri winaq ri man kubʼan ta qʼatojtzij puwiʼ, aretaq chiʼ kuchomaj jas ri kubʼan na.
Kʼatekʼut, ri jun che rukʼ kebʼ ukʼuʼx kwaʼik, kʼo uqʼatojtzij puwiʼ, rumal rech che ma kubʼan ta weriʼ jeʼ jas ri utz kojonik e ronojel ri jas taq uwach che man petinaq ta uloq chi pa ri utz kojonik, waʼ weriʼ xas makaj wi.
Ri uj, che ri uj ko taq winaq, rajawaxik kqakʼulaj ri kituqaʼril ri man eko taj, e maqatzukuj ri jastaq rech ri qarayibʼal.
Chi qajujunal ri uj, chqabʼanaʼ ri utzil chuwach ri ajiltzʼaqat, arech utz kukʼamaʼ uloq chrech ri jun chik.
Rumal rech che ri Kristo, man are ta xutzukuj ri urayibʼal ri areʼ; jacha ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri itzel taq tzij kech ri eʼareʼ che kketzelaj awach, xtzaq chwij ri in.
Xa jekʼuriʼ ronojel ri xtzʼibʼaxik ojer tzij kanoq, xtzʼibʼaxik rech qatijoxik ri uj, arech rukʼ ri chuqʼabʼ e rukʼ ri kubʼisibʼal kʼuʼx kuya ri Tzʼibʼatalik chqech, kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri qeyeʼbʼal.
Are ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos, rech ri chuqʼabʼalil, e rech ri kubʼisibʼal kʼuʼx kbʼanow bʼaʼ chiwech ri ix che kkʼojiʼ junam ri irayibʼal chbʼil taq iwibʼ, jacha ri Kristo Jesus,
arech ri ix, rukʼ junam iwanimaʼ e junam rukʼ ichiʼ nim kiwil wi ri Dyos, ri Utatxel ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Utz ukʼulaxik iwibʼ chibʼanaʼ, jeʼ jas utz ukʼulaxik ri ix xubʼan ri Kristo, arech kpetik ri uqʼijil ri Dyos.
Rumal rech che ri in kinbʼij, ri Kristo xokik ajyuqʼ kech ri eʼareʼ che qʼatom uwiʼ kikowil, arech kuya uwach rukʼ ri saqalaj utzij ri Dyos, arech kbʼantajik ri tzij che bʼim chkech ri eʼojer taq kamam ri eʼajjudiʼo,
arech, konojel ri amaqʼ che man eʼajjudiʼo taj, nim kkil wi ri Dyos, rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri areʼ, jeʼ jas kubʼij ri tzij Tzʼibʼatalik: Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ nimalaj katinwil wi chkixoʼl ri amaqʼ che man eʼajjudiʼo taj; e ri in kinbʼixoj na riʼ ri uqʼijil ri abʼiʼ;
e kubʼij pa ri Tzʼibʼatalik chik: ix Amaqʼ che man ixajjudiʼo taj, sibʼalaj chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ kukʼ ri eʼuwinaq;
e xoqujeʼ kubʼij chik: konojel amaʼq che man ix ajjudiʼo taj, nim chiwilaʼ wi ri Ajawxel, e konojel siwantinimit katkibʼixoj.
Xoqujeʼ ri Isaʼiʼas kubʼij: Katuxnik na riʼ ri utux ri Jesse, ri areʼ che kwaʼlajik arech ktaqan pakiwiʼ ri esiwan taq tinimit. Ri esiwan taq tinimit kʼo ri keyeʼbʼal rukʼ ri areʼ.
Ri Dyos rech ri eyeʼbʼal kuya ta bʼaʼ chiwech sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal e ri nimalaj utzil pa ri ikojonik, arech kkʼojiʼ ta bʼaʼ sibʼalaj eweyeʼbʼal rumal ri uchak ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel.
Ri in, qas utz kinchomaj piwiʼ, eʼachalaxik; che ri ix ix nojinaq chrech utz taq chomanik, che ri ix utz taq inoʼjibʼal kʼolik, e che ri ix, kixkowinik kisukʼumaj chbʼil taq iwibʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in xintzʼibʼaj chiwech nikʼaj ko taq tzij, arech ri ix utz unaʼtisaxik kibʼan weriʼ, rumal ri usipanik ri Dyos che xyaʼtaj chwech in
arech ri in, in jun ajpataninel rech ri Kristo Jesus chkixoʼl ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, in ajyuqʼ chrech ri utzalaj Tzij rech ri Dyos, arech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj ejun utzalaj tabʼal toqʼobʼ e etyox pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri in kʼo wi ri kuyaʼo nim kinwil wi wibʼ pa ri Ajawxel Jesus, puwiʼ ri uchak ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che man yaʼtal ta waʼ chwech ri in arech kinbʼij jun jas uwach, che ri Kristo man wumal ta ri in xubʼano, arech kenimanik ri jetaq amaqʼ chik, xas rukʼ ri kitzij e rukʼ ri kichak,
rumal ri uchak taq ri kʼutbʼal e taq ri maybʼal, e rumal ri uchak ri Ruxlabʼaxel ri Dyos: chi pa ri Jerusalem kʼateʼ pa ri Iliriko, xinbʼano arech che kbʼantajik ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri Kristo,
ri in kʼo nimalaj nuqʼijil rumal che ri in xinbʼan ri nuchak, xuwi pa taq ri tinimit jawiʼ man bʼim ta ri ubʼi ri Kristo arech ri in man kinwaʼlajisan ta puwiʼ uchak jun chik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in xinbʼan ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri jachintaq man bʼim ta weriʼ chkech, kkil na riʼ weriʼ e ri jachitaq che man kitom ta weriʼ kkichʼobʼ ubʼeʼal weriʼ.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, pa ronojel mul man yaʼtal ta chwech arech ri in kinbʼe pa ri itinimit.
Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, rumal rech che man kʼo ta chi jun nuchak pa taq we tinimit riʼ, e ri in chi pa kʼi junabʼ uloq sibʼalaj nurayim kinbʼe pa ri itinimit,
aretaq chiʼ ri in kinbʼe na pa ri España… Rumal rech che ri in kinweyej che kin wil na iwach aretaq chiʼ kinqʼax chilaʼ e che ri ix kikʼut na kʼuriʼ riʼ chnuwach ri ubʼe we amaqʼ riʼ, aretaq chiʼ xnaʼtajik wumal jun nimalaj kiʼkotemal rumal rech che xinwil iwach.
Kʼatekʼut, kamik kinbʼe pa ri Jerusalem arech keʼinpatanij ri etyoxlaj taq winaq:
rumal rech che pa ri Masedoniʼa e pa ri Akaya xkaj xkiya kikuchuj chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri Jerusalem, ri eʼareʼ che emeʼbʼaʼibʼ.
Jeriʼ xkaj, e rajawaxik che jeriʼ xkibʼano; we ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, kamik riʼ, kʼo kukʼ ri utzalaj taq kuxlabʼal ri eʼareʼ xoqujeʼ rajawaxik che ri eʼareʼ keʼkipatanij ri eʼareʼ rukʼ ri kimebʼil rech we uwachulew.
Aretaq chiʼ xintoʼtaj che we jastaq riʼ, e xyaʼtaj kan ri kuchuj, ri in kinel ubʼik waʼ kinbʼe pa ri España, kinqʼatan pa ri itinimit.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in wetaʼm che aretaq chiʼ kinok riʼ pa ri itinimit, innojinaq riʼ chrech taq ri utewchiʼbʼal ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in kintaʼ weriʼ chiwech, eʼachalaxik; rumal ri Qajawxel Jesus ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼux ri Uxlabʼaxel, chikojoʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ pa ri chʼawem e chita ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos panuwiʼ ri in arech ri in kinanimajik chkiwach ri man kʼo ta kikojonik pa ri Judeʼa, arech, ri kchuj che kinkʼam ubʼik pa ri Jerusalem, qas utz bʼaʼ kkilo ri etyoxlaj taq winaq,
e rukʼ weriʼ, ri in, kinbʼe bʼaʼ iwukʼ rukʼ kiʼkotemal, e kuya bʼaʼ ri Dyos chwech che ri in kinuxlanik iwukʼ.
¡Ri Dyos rech ri nimalaj utzil kkojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ nimalaj iwonojel! Amen.
Ri in, nimalaj kinchilibʼej chiwech, qas utz ukʼulaxik chibʼanaʼ ri qanabʼ Febʼe diʼakonisa chrech ri Komon Tyox rech ri Senkreʼas:
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chrech pa ri Ajawxel jun utzalaj upetibʼal jeʼ jas ri qas taqal chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq e chipatanij ri areʼ pa ronojel ri jastaq che kutaʼ chiwech; rumal rech che ri areʼ jun tobʼanel chqech uj, uj kʼi ternel rech ri Kristo e xoqujeʼ tobʼanel chwech ri in.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Priska e ri Akila, ri eʼareʼ, eʼajchakunel wukʼ ri in pa ri Kristo Jesus;
arech xkitoʼ uwach ri nukʼaslemal, ri eʼareʼ xaq kebʼ riʼ xkʼojiʼ wi ri kikʼaslemal e man xuwi ta ri in che kʼo nukʼas kukʼ, xane xoqujeʼ konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq che man eʼajjudiʼo taj:
xoqujeʼ chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri ekomon tyox che kkimulij kibʼ pa ri kachoch. Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri nuloqʼalaj Epeneto, ri nabʼe winaq pa ri Asiʼa che xyaʼ chech ri Kristo.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri Mariʼy che sibʼalaj xkosik rumal xutoqʼobʼisaj iwach.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Androniko e ri Juniʼa che ewachalal e ewachiʼl pa cheʼ ri eʼareʼ enimalaj taq apostol chech ri Kristo aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kinok in.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri Ampliʼato, ri nuloqʼalaj pa ri Ajawxel.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Urbʼano, ri areʼ kchakun qukʼ pa ri Kristo, e ri nuloqʼalaj eʼustakiʼo.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri Apeles, che xuqʼalajisaj ribʼ che utz pa ri Kristo. Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri eʼajuparachoch ri Aristobʼulo.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri Herodiʼon, ri areʼ che wachalal; chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri uwinaq ri rachoch ri Narsiso pa ri Ajawxel.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Trifena e ri Trifosa, che kekos pa ri Ajawxel, chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil uwach ri nuloqʼalaj Perside (ixoq) che sibʼalaj xkos pa ri Ajawxel.
Chiyaʼaʼ ri rutzil kiwach ri Rufo ri xsikʼix pa ri Ajawxel e ri unan che xoqujeʼ nunan ri in.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Asinkrito e ri Flegonta, ri Hermes, ri Patrobʼas, ri Hermas e ri eʼachalaxik che ekʼo kukʼ.
Chiyaʼaʼ rutzil kiwach ri Filologo e ri Juliʼa, ri Nereʼo e ri ranabʼ e xoqujeʼ ri Olimpiʼas (ixoq) e konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq ekʼo kukʼ.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil iwach chbʼil taq iwibʼ rukʼ ri tyoxlaj tzʼubʼanik. Konojel ri Ekomon Tyox rech ri Kristo kkiyaʼ jun rutzil iwach.
Ri in kintaʼ weriʼ chiwech, eʼachalaxik, chikʼoloʼ iwibʼ chkiwach chi we itzel taq winaq che kechʼoʼjinik e che kkibʼan ri itzel puwiʼ ri tzij che xikʼam ix; mixbʼe kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Rumal rech che we winaq riʼ man are ta kkipatanij ri Qajawxel Kristo, xane are kkipatanij kech wi eʼareʼ, e kkibʼij jeʼlik taq tzij che utz chkiwach ri winaq che etuqaʼr pa kanimaʼ.
Pa ronojel kʼolibʼal kya ubʼixik ri inimanik e ri in kinkiʼkotik iwumal ri ix; kʼatekʼut, ri in kinwaj che ri ix kixnoʼjinik pa ri utzil e che mixnoʼjinik pa ri itzel.
Ri Dyos che rech jaʼmaril, kamik riʼ kuqajbʼej ri Satanas chuxeʼ riʼ iwaqan. Ri usipanik Qajawxel Jesus Kristo kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ.
Ri Timoteʼo che kchakun wukʼ ri in kuyaʼ apanoq jun rutzil iwach e xoqujeʼ ri Lusiʼo, ri Jason e ri Sosipatro, che ewachalaxik.
Ri in kinya jun rutzil iwach pa ri Ajawxel, ri in, in Tersiʼo, che xintzʼibʼaj we tzʼibʼanik riʼ.
Ri Gayo kuya apan jun rutzil iwach, ri areʼ che kʼo pa wachoch ri in e che kʼo pa ri kachoch konojel ri Komon Tyox. Ri Erasto ri ajkʼolol upwaq ri tinimit kuya apan jun rutzil iwach, xoqujeʼ kuya apan jun rutzil iwach ri qachalal Kuʼarto.
Chrech ri Areʼ, ri Areʼ che kkowinik kuya ri ichuqʼabʼ jeriʼ jacha kuta ri Utzalaj Tzij che kinya ubʼixik ri in, che are kinya ubʼixik ri Jesukristo, are uqʼalajisaxik chiwach jun awatalik jastaq che bʼatzʼatalik pa ri matzalik, pa junalik chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq,
kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ xuqʼalarisaj ribʼ, rumal taq ri tzʼibʼatalik che xkiya ubʼixik ri upetik rumal ri junalik utaqanik ri Dyos, xuqʼalajisaj ribʼ chkiwach konojel ri jachintaq ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj arech ri eʼareʼ enimanel pa ri kojonik.
Chrech ri Dyos ri xuwiʼ nim retaʼmbʼal rumal ri Jesus Kristo, ¡chrech ri areʼ ri qʼijil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaqʼ! Amen.
Ri Pabʼlo, che sikʼim arech kuxik utaqoʼn ri Kristo Jesus rumal ri urayibʼal ri Dyos e rumal ri Sostenes che qachalal,
chech ri Ukomon Tyox ri Dyos che kʼo pa Korinto, chkech ri etyoxrinaq pa ri Kristo Jesus, esikʼitalik arech keʼux etyoxlaj taq winaq kukʼ konojel ri kkisikʼij ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus Kristo pa ronojel kʼolibʼal, Qajawxel, qech ri uj e kech ri eʼareʼ;
¡jun toqʼobʼ chiwech e nimalaj utzil pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Dyos, ri Qatat, e pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo!
Nim kinwil wi ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal iwumal ri ix, rumal rech ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos che xyaʼtaj chiwech pa ri Kristo Jesus;
rumal rech che sibʼalaj xikʼam pa ri areʼ ronojel qʼinomal, ronojel uqʼinomal ri Tzij, ronojel uqʼinomal ri etaʼmabʼal,
rumal ri chuqʼabʼ che kʼo piwiʼ rukʼ ri kʼambʼal noʼj rech ri Kristo.
Xa jekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta chi jun usipanik ri toqʼobʼ kraj na chiwech, pa ri kiweyeʼj na che kukʼut wi ribʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Ri areʼ sibʼalaj kixokowirisaj na riʼ chi kʼateʼ na pa ri kʼisbʼal, arech man kʼo ta jun itzel iwukʼ pa ri Uqʼij ri Qajawxel Jesus-Kristo.
Ri Dyos man kukʼex ta utzij, rumal ri areʼ ixsikʼitalik chrech ri nimalaj Komon ukʼamik ibʼ rukʼ ri Ukʼojol Jesus Kristo, Qajawxel.
Kinta chiwech achalaxik, pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, che chkʼoloq xa jun itzij; che man kkʼojiʼ ta jachow ibʼ chixoʼl, xaneʼ junam chiwukʼaj iwibʼ xa pa jun uxlabʼal e xa pa jun chomabʼal.
Rumal rech, ix wachalal, xtzijox chwech, piwiʼ ri ix kumal ri eʼuwinaq ri Kloʼe, che kʼo jachow ibʼ chixoʼl.
Are kinchomaj rumal weriʼ, che iwonojel kibʼij: «Ri in, in uwinaq ri Pabʼlo», –«E ri in, in uwinaq ri Apolo». –«E ri in, in uwinaq ri Sefas». –«E ri in, in uwinaq ri Kristo».
¿La pirtajinaq pa taq chʼaqapil ri Kristo? ¿La xkoj ri Pabʼlo cho ri ripbʼal rumal kutoqʼobʼisaj iwach ix? Ri ix, ¿la xikʼam ri iqasnaʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Pabʼlo?
Nim kinwil wi ri Dyos rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun winaq chixoʼl ri ix che xinbʼan uqasnaʼ, xaq xuwi neʼ ri Krispo e ri Gayo,
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri ix man kixkowin taj kibʼij che ri ix xbʼan iqasnaʼ pa ri nubʼiʼ ri in.
Jeʼ na kʼur ri in xinbʼan ri kiqasnaʼ ri erachalaxik ri Stefano. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man wetaʼm ta chi jun winaq, che xinbʼan uqasnaʼ ri in.
Rumal rech; che ri Kristo man xinutaq taj arech kinya ri qasnaʼ; xane are xinutaqo arech kinbʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij, e weriʼ man rukʼ ta ri retaʼmbʼal ri tzij, arech man kyaʼtaj ta kan ri uripibʼal ri Kristo.
Ri utzij ri ripibʼal; jun chʼuʼj tzij chkiwach ri kkisach kibʼ; kʼatekʼut, chkiwach ri kkikol kibʼ, chqawach ri uj, ri ripibʼal jun uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos.
Rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: kinkamisaj na ri ketaʼmabʼal ri nim ketaʼmabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri kichomabʼal ri echomanelabʼ, kinkʼyaq na ubʼik.
¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri nim retaʼmabʼal? ¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri chomanelalaj winaq? ¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri jun che kchoman pa we uwachulew riʼ? Ri Dyos, ¿la man xukoj ta ri moxil pa ri retaʼmabʼal we uwachulew riʼ?
We uwachulew, rumal che pa ri retaʼmabʼal, man xuriq ta ri retaʼmabʼal ri Dyos; xraj xeʼukol ri ekojonelabʼ rumal jun chʼuʼj tzij.
Ri eʼajjudiʼo kkaj jujun taq kʼutbʼal, ri eʼajgriʼego kkaj ri etaʼmabʼal,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kqakʼut jun Kristo che xripibʼax cho ri ripabʼal; ri eʼajjudiʼo ketzaq rumal weriʼ, e chkiwach ri kʼo jun chik kikojonik, weriʼ jun moxil chkiwach,
kʼatekʼut, chkiwach ri esikʼitalik, kneʼbʼaʼ eʼajjudiʼo on eʼajgriʼego, waʼ we areʼ riʼ are ri Kristo, che uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos e retaʼmabʼal ri Dyos.
Rumal rech che ri umoxil ri Dyos are nim retaʼmabʼal chuwach ri ketaʼmabʼal ri winaq, e ri utuʼqaril ri Dyos are nim uchuqʼabʼ chuwach ri kichuqʼabʼ ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, eʼachalaxik, chiwilaʼ chichʼobʼoʼ uxeʼ: Jachintaq xixsikʼixik, man ekʼi taj che ri nim ketaʼmabʼal chkiwach ri winaq, man ekʼi taj che enimalaj taq winaq, man ekʼi taj che xeʼalaxik chkiʼxoʼl winaq che nim kibʼantajik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri moxil pa we uwachulew, are waʼ ri xraj ri Dyos xuchaʼo arech kekʼixik ri winaq nimalaj taq ketaʼmabʼal; ri tuqaʼril pa we uwachulew, are waʼ xraj ri Dyos xuchaʼo, arech kekʼixik ri kʼo kichuqʼabʼ;
ri jun winaq che man kʼo ta nim ubʼantajik ri ralaxibʼal e ri winaq che ketzelax uwach pa we uwachulew, are waʼ ri xraj ri Dyos xuchaʼo; arech ksach kiwach ri nim kibʼantajik,
arech man kʼo ta jun bʼaqilal nim kril wi ribʼ chuwach ri Dyos.
Rumal rech Areʼ, ri ix, ix kʼo pa ri Kristo Jesus, chiwech ri ix xuxik retaʼmabʼal ri Dyos, are qasukʼil, are tyoxlaj qakʼaslemal e are qakiritajem
arech, jacha ri kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri winaq che ri nim kril wi ribʼ, nim chrilaʼ wi ribʼ pa ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xinbʼe in pa ri itinamit ix achalaxik, man xinbʼij ta ri kʼuʼtalik rech ri Dyos rukʼ uchuqʼabʼ ri tzij on rukʼ ri etaʼmabʼal.
¡Man je tariʼ! ri in, man kʼo ta jun chik jas uwach xinwaj xinwetaʼmaj chixoʼl, xaneʼ xuwi ri Jesus Kristo e ri ripitalik Kristo.
Xoqujeʼ ri in, xinbʼe chiwach, in tuqaʼr, nuxibʼim wibʼ e kinbʼirbʼitik,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri nutzij e pa ri nuchomanik man kʼo ta jun utzalaj tzij rech ri etaʼmabʼal; xaneʼ jun kʼutbʼal rech ri Uxlabʼaxel e ri uchuqʼabʼ
arech ri ikojonik, kʼo ri utikbʼalil puwiʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos e man puwiʼ ta ri ketaʼmabʼal ri ewinaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are kqabʼij jun etaʼmabʼal chkixoʼl ri eʼutzalaj taq winaq man are ta kqabʼij jun etambʼal rech we uwachulew, on retambʼal jun nim winaq rech we uwachulew che kkam na riʼ.
Xaneʼ are kqayaʼ ubʼixik ri retaʼmbʼal ri Dyos, che kʼuʼtalik e man kaqʼalajin taj, che ri areʼ xusukʼumaj chi ojer tzij uloq rech qaqʼijil ri uj,
man kʼo ta jun nim winaq chuwachulew, retaʼm waʼ weriʼ –rumal rech, che ri eʼareʼ, weta ketaʼm, man xkiripabʼaʼ ta riʼ ri Ajawxel rech ri qʼijil cho ri ripibʼal–.
Kʼatekʼut, jacha ri kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik, ri uj are kqabʼij ri jas taq uwach: che man xril ta ri woqʼochaj, man xuta ta ri xikinaj e man xopan ta pa ri ranimaʼ ri winaq, ronojel ri jastaq uwach che xusukʼumaj ri Dyos chkech ri winaq che kkiloqʼoʼej ri Areʼ.
Rumal rech, che chqech ri uj xukʼut wi ri Dyos weriʼ rumal ri Uxlabʼxel; xaneʼ rumal che ri Uxlabʼxel ronojel jastaq uwach kunikʼoj, chi kʼateʼ na pa ri nim kbʼe wi ri ubʼantajik ri Dyos.
Chkixoʼl ri winaq, ¿jachin retaʼm ri jastaq uwach kʼo pa ri ranimaʼ ri winaq, we man xuwi ri ruxlabʼal ri winaq che chi kʼo wi pa ri areʼ? Xoqujeʼ jenakʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun retaʼm ri jastaq uwach rech ri Dyos, xane xuwi ri Ruxlabʼxel ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj man are ta xqakʼam ri ruxlabʼal ri uwachulew, xaneʼ are xqakʼam ri Uxlabʼxel che chi rukʼ ri Dyos petinaq wi, arech ri uj qetaʼmaj ri jetaq sipanik toqʼobʼ che uyaʼom ri Dyos chqech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj man kqaya ta ubʼixik weriʼ rukʼ jetaq tzij che xukʼut retaʼmabʼal winaq chqawach, xaneʼ rukʼ jetaq tzij che are ri Uxlabʼxel xkʼutuw chqawach ri uj, xane xuya ubʼixik chqawach pa uxlabʼal taq tzij, pa uxlabʼal taq jastaq chqech.
Ri winaq che rech we uwachulew, man kukʼulaj ta ri jastaq uwach che rech ri Ruxlabʼal ri Dyos; xa chʼuʼjil moxil riʼ chuwach ri areʼ, e man kkowin taj kril weriʼ, rumal rech che xaq xuwi pa ri uxlabʼal kbʼan kowinem che rilik che kbʼan qʼatoj- tzij puwiʼ weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uxlabʼal winaq kkowinik kubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ronojel jastaq, e ri areʼ man kʼo ta jun winaq kbʼanow qʼatojtzij puwiʼ.
Rumal rech ¿jachin xretaʼmaj ri uchomanik ri Ajawxel arech kkowinik kukʼut chi ukoq chuwach ri Areʼ? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, kʼo ri uchomanik ri Kristo qukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, ix achalaxik, man xinkowin taj xixinchʼabʼej ri ix, ix jeʼ jas ix uxlabʼal taq winaq, xaneʼ xixinchʼabʼej ix jacha ix uwinaq ri uwachulew, ix jacha akʼalabʼ pa ri Kristo.
Tuʼ xinyaʼ chiwech arech kiqumuj, man are ta xinya ko wa chiwech; rumal che majaʼ kixkowinik che utijik. Xoqujeʼ, kamik riʼ man kixkowin ta che utijik
rumal rech che ri ix, ix rech na ri uwachulew. Rumal rech che kʼo achixom e chʼoʼj chixoʼl, ¿la man ix rech ta ri uwachulew riʼ e ri ichak jacha ri kichak ri winaq?
Aretaq chiʼ ri ix kibʼij: «Ri in, in uwinaq ri Pabʼlo», jun chik kubʼij: «Ri in, in uwinaq ri Apolo», ¿la man ix jeʼ ta riʼ jas ri uchak ri winaq?
¿Jachin kʼu ri Apolo? ¿E jachin kʼu ri Pabʼlo? ¡Ri eʼareʼ, eʼare eʼajpatanel che kumal eʼareʼ, ri ix xiriq ri kojonik! e chqajujunal kʼo qukʼ ronojel ri jastaq uwach che xuya ri Ajawxel chkech.
In ri xintik- oʼnijik, are ri Apolo xjaʼanik; kʼatekʼuriʼ are ri Dyos xkʼiyisanik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta nim uwinaqil ri xtikoʼnijik, man kʼo ta nim uwinaqil ri xjaʼanik, xaneʼ are kʼo nim uwinaqil ri xkʼiyisanik, che are ri Dyos.
Ri jun che ktikoʼnijik e ri jun che kjaʼanik xa ejunam, kʼatekʼut konojel riʼ kkikʼam na ri utojbʼalil ukʼaxel uwach kichak.
Rumal rech che ri uj, uj ajchakunelabʼ rech ri Dyos; e ri ix, ix rulew ri Dyos, ix, ri ix rachoch ri Dyos.
Rukʼ ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos che xyaʼtaj chwech, in xinkojow ri utikibʼalil; jun chi riʼ ri kyakow puwiʼ; kʼatekʼut konojel chikilaʼ jachike ri chak utz kkibʼano.
Rumal rech, che man kʼo ta jun kkowin che ukojik jun tikibʼalil chik chuwach ri kojom chik che are ri Jesus Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ we kʼo jun winaq, che puwiʼ we tikibʼalil riʼ kyakanik rukʼ qʼan pwaq, rukʼ saq pwaq, rukʼ utzalaj taq abʼaj, rukʼ cheʼ, rukʼ qʼayes, rukʼ kʼim,
ri chak kubʼan ronojel winaq, kqʼalajin na riʼ; kqʼalajin riʼ pa ri Qʼij rumal che kpe na riʼ pa ri qʼaqʼ, e ri qʼaqʼ kukoj riʼ pa ri kʼax ri uchuqʼabʼ ronojel uchak winaq.
We xyak ri chak puwiʼ ri tikibʼalil, kuchʼijo, kkanaj riʼ; e ri ajchak kukʼam na jun tojbʼal ukʼaxel riʼ;
we kkʼat ubʼi ri chak, ksach uwach riʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ajchak kkoltaj na, jeʼ nakʼuriʼ jacha jun che kqʼax pa ri qʼaqʼ.
¿La man iwetaʼm taj, che ri ix, ix nim rachoch ri Dyos, e che ri Ruxlabʼal ri Dyos kanajinaq kan iwukʼ ri ix?
We jun winaq kukʼis tzij puwiʼ ri nim rachoch ri Dyos kukamisaj na ri areʼ; rumal rech, che ri nim rachoch ri Dyos tyoxlaj ubʼantajik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we nim rachoch ri Dyos riʼ, ix na kʼuriʼ.
Musubʼ aqʼan ribʼ jun. We kʼo jun winaq kuchomaj che nim retaʼmabʼal chuwach we uwachulew riʼ, chumoxirisaj bʼaʼ chi aqʼan ribʼ, arech kkʼojiʼ ri retaʼmabʼal,
rumal rech, che ri retamabʼal we uwachulew riʼ, chʼuʼj chuwach ri Dyos. Xaneʼ jeriʼ tzʼibʼatalik: Ri Dyos keʼusubʼ ri enim taq ketaʼmabʼal winaq pa ri kisubʼunik eʼareʼ;
kʼatekʼuriʼ: Ri Ajawxel, retaʼm ri kichomabʼal ri enim taq ketaʼmabʼal winaq; retaʼm che man kʼo ta uchoqʼabʼ we kichomabʼal riʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, man kʼo ta jun winaq kuqʼijilaj aqʼan ribʼ kumal ri winaq; rumal rech che ronojel ri jastaq uwach iwech ri ix,
ri Pabʼlo, ri Apolo, ri Sefas, ri uwachulew, ri kʼaslemanik, ri kamikal, ri uchanim, ri chweʼq kabʼij, ronojel iwech ri ix;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, ix rech ri Kristo, e ri Kristo rech ri Dyos.
Qas chujkilaʼ bʼaʼ ri winaq jacha uj upatanijel ri Kristo e ujmortoʼm chrech ri kʼuʼtalik ujastaq ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri qas kta chkech ri eʼajmortoʼm are qas keriqitajik che man kkikʼex ta ri kitzij.
Chwech ri in man nim ta uqʼij, che ri ix kibʼan qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ, on kkibʼan qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ nikʼaj winaq chik. ¡Man kinbʼan ta neʼ qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ ri in!
Qastzij nakʼut che ri nuchomanik man kʼo ta kinuchap wi pa yajnik, kʼatekʼut man rumal ta weriʼ sukʼil kinkanaj in. Ri qʼatal- tzij panuwiʼ in are ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼut, mibʼan qʼatojtzij aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kopan ri qʼij. Chiweyeʼj ri upetbʼal ri Ajawxel; ri areʼ kutzij na riʼ ri chäj puwiʼ ri kʼuʼtalik pa ri qʼequʼm e kukʼut na riʼ ri kichak ronojel ri kanimaʼ ri winaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ konojel kkikʼam na riʼ ri kiqʼijil chi rumal ri Dyos.
Pa ronojel we jastaq riʼ, eʼachalaxik, ri in xinkoj wibʼ chiwach ix, in jun kʼambʼal noʼj, ri in e ri Apolo; arech kiwetaʼmaj qukʼ uj ri tzij che jewaʼ kubʼij: «Mix qʼax puwiʼ ri tzʼibʼatalik», arech ri ix man nimal taj kinaʼo aretaq chiʼ kiya iwach rukʼ jun e kikʼuleʼlaj jun chik
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿jachin jalajoj kubʼan chawech at?, ¿jas ri kʼo awukʼ che man xa ta yaʼom chawech? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we xa yaʼom chawech, ¿jas kʼuche che nimal kabʼano jacha man xa ta yaʼom chawech weriʼ?
¡Ri ix, ixnojinaq chik! ¡Ri ix, ixqʼinomalaj taq winaq chik! ¡Man qukʼ ta ri uj, xixuxik ix ajawinelabʼ! Jeʼ nakʼut, utz nakʼuriʼ weta kixajawinik arech xoqujeʼ ri uj, kujajawinik na kʼuriʼ iwukʼ.
Rumal rech, ri in kinchomaj ri xujuʼuxisaj ri Dyos, ri uj che ujtaqonelabʼ, xujyaʼo pa ri kʼisbʼal kʼolibʼal, uj jacha winaq che xbʼan qʼatojtzij paqawiʼ uj rech kamikal; xujyaʼik j uj rech kaʼyem rech ri uwachulew, uj rech kaʼyem kech ri eʼanjelibʼ e ri winaq.
Ri uj kʼax qachʼabʼexik, uj mox rumal uterneʼxik ri Kristo, kʼatekʼut ri ix, ix nim taq etaʼmanelabʼ chrech ri Kristo; ri uj ujtuqaʼr e ri ix kʼo ichuqʼabʼ; ri ix kʼo nimalaj iqʼijil kʼatekʼut ri uj etzelam qawach.
Chi kamik na riʼ, ri uj kujnumik, kchaqij qachiʼ, ujchʼanalik, kbʼan kʼax chqech, e ri uj ujbʼinel man kʼo ta qachoch;
ri uj sibʼalaj kujkosik aretaq chiʼ kujchakun rukʼ we qaqʼabʼ riʼ. We ke- tzelax qawach ri uj kujtewchuʼnik; we kbʼan kʼax chqech ri uj kqakochʼo;
we itzel qatzijoxik kbʼanik, ri uj kqakubʼaʼ ukʼuʼx ri winaq. Ri uj, uj mes rech ri uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ xas kamik riʼ uj ukʼolibʼal ri mes rech ri uwachulew.
Man kintzʼibʼaj ta weriʼ chiwech arech kel ikʼix, xaneʼ are kinwaj che ri ix kiwetaʼmaj weriʼ ix loqʼalaj taq walkʼuwaʼl.
We xekʼojiʼ lajuj mil iwajtij chech ri Kristo, man ekʼi ta itat xekʼojiʼk; rumal rech che ri in, rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij xixinwalkʼuwaʼlaj rukʼ ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri in sibʼalaj kinkʼomij weriʼ chiwech, chibʼanaʼ jacha ri in.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, nutaqom ubʼi ri Timoteʼo chiwech, che loqʼalaj nukʼojol e ri areʼ che man kukʼex ta ri utzij chrech ri Ajawxel; kunaʼtisaj riʼ chiwech ri jetaq nupixabʼ puwiʼ ri kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Kristo Jesus, jacha ri kintzijoj in pa ronojel kʼolibʼal jawiʼ kʼo wi ri Komon Tyox.
Pa ri ichomanik, ri in man kinopan taj pa ri itinimit, xa jekʼuriʼ ejujun winaq kinimarisam kibʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ri in, chi man naj ta chi waʼ kinopan na pa ri itinimit we jeriʼ kraj ri Dyos, e man kinbʼan ta qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri kitzij ri winaq che nimal kkibʼano, xaneʼ are kibʼan qʼatojtzij riʼ puwiʼ ri kichuqʼabʼ;
rumal rech che ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, man kkanaj ta kan pa ri tzij xanʼe are kkanajik pa ri chuqʼabʼ.
¿Jas ri kqaj chiwach ri ix, la are che ri in kinopan na pa ri itinimit rukʼ jun cheʼ, on rukʼ jun loqʼoqʼebʼalalaj kʼuʼx e jun kiʼlaj uxlabʼal?
Xuwi ktaʼtaj utzijoxik itzel kʼaslemal chixoʼl ix, kʼatekʼuriʼ jun itzelalaj kʼaslemal che man kʼo ta jeriʼ chkixoʼl ri winaq che man junam ta qakojonik kukʼ; xas xixujal chi na che kʼo jun winaq chixoʼl che xubʼan rixoqil chrech ri uchuchbʼal.
¡Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix sibʼalaj inimarisam iwibʼ, e man kʼaxkʼobʼinaq ta ri iwanimaʼ, arech kesax ubʼi chixoʼl ri jun winaq che bʼanal rech weriʼ!
Utz bʼaʼ riʼ, ri in, in elenaq uloq iwukʼ, man kʼo ta ri nubʼaqil iwukʼ, kʼatekʼut in kʼo chixoʼl rumal ri uxlabʼal, e xa jeriʼ xbʼantaj qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri jun che xbʼanow weriʼ jacha in kʼo in jelaʼ iwukʼ.
Rajawaxik che pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus, iriqom ta bʼaʼ iwibʼ ri ix pa junamal rukʼ ri wuxlabʼal rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus,
chqajachaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼi we jun winaq riʼ chrech ri kʼaxtokʼ, arech kkʼis tzij puwiʼ ri ubʼaqil, arech kkoltaj ri ruxlabʼal pa ri Uqʼij ri Ajawxel.
¡Man rumal ta waʼ nim qʼijil chiwech! ¿La man iwetaʼm taj che rukʼ jubʼiqʼ ukʼuʼxal ksipoj uwach ronojel ri qʼor?
Chikʼyaqaʼ ubʼi ri qʼaxinaq chi ukʼuʼxal, arech ri ix, ix kʼakʼ qʼor, rumal rech che ri ix, ix asimos.
Jeʼ nakʼut, chqaqʼaxbʼej bʼaʼ ri nimaqʼij, man rukʼ ta ri qʼaxinaq chi ukʼuʼxal, on rukʼ jun subʼunik ukʼuʼxal, on rukʼ jun itzel kʼaslemal, xaneʼ chqaqʼaxbʼej rukʼ chʼajchʼoj e saqalajtzij asimos.
Aretaq chiʼ xintzʼibʼaj ubʼi pa ri nuwuj chiwech, che ri ix mixkʼojiʼ kukʼ ri itzel taq winaq,
man are ta xinchoman chkech ri itzel taq winaq rech we uwachulew riʼ, on ri kkiloqʼoqʼej ri pwaq, on ri sibʼalaj kkaj uwach ronojel jastaq, on ri kʼo kʼi uwach Kajawxel; weta jeriʼ, rajawaxik na kʼuriʼ kixel ubʼi ri ix pa we uwachulew.
Man jet a riʼ, ri in xintzʼibʼaj chiwech, che ri ix, man kixkʼojiʼ ta rukʼ ri jun winaq che pa ri ubʼixik achalaxik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kʼo pa ri itzel kʼaslemal, che kuloqʼoqʼej ri pwaq, che kʼiʼ uwach kajawxel kʼolik, che kubʼij itzel taq tzij, che kqʼabʼarik, on che kraj ronojel jastaq, mixwaʼik rukʼ jun winaq che jeriʼ.
¿Jas kʼuche kinbʼan qʼatojtzij in puwiʼ ri winaq che man kʼo ta pa ri komon? ¿La man are ta ri winaq ri ekʼo pa ri Komon kibʼan qʼatojtzij ix pakiwiʼ?
Ri winaq che man ekʼo ta pa ri Komon, are ri Dyos riʼ kbʼanow na qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ. Chikʼyaqaʼ ubʼik, chiweʼsaj ubʼik pa ri ikomon ri winaq che ajbʼanal itzel taq kʼax.
Aretaq chiʼ kʼo jun chixoʼl che kʼo uchʼoʼj rukʼ jun chik, ¿la kraj lo kbʼe pa ri qʼatbʼaltzij chkiwach ri man esukʼ taj e la man are ta kbʼe chkiwach ri etyoxlaj taq winaq?
¿La man iwetaʼm ta ri ix che eʼare ri etyoxlaj taq winaq kibʼanow na riʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri uwachulew? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ix ri kixbʼanow qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri uwachulew, ¿la man ix utz ta kʼuriʼ che ubʼanik ri qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri jubʼiqʼ che man kʼo ta upatan?
¿La man iwetaʼm ta ri ix che uj riʼ ri kujbʼanow na ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri eʼanjelibʼ? ¿La man kqabʼan ta qʼatojtzij riʼ puwiʼ ri jastaq rech we jun kʼaslemal riʼ?
¡Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri ix, ix kʼo pa jujun taq chʼoʼj, kixbʼe chkiwach ri eqʼatal taq tzij, che ri Komon Tyox kretzelaj kiwach!
Kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech rech ikʼixbʼal; jeʼ, man kʼo ta jun winaq chixoʼl che nim retaʼmbʼal, che kkowinik kubʼan qʼatbʼaltzij chkixoʼl ri eʼachalaxik!
¡Man je ta riʼ, xaneʼ kixbʼe chkiwach ri eqʼatbʼaltzij e kixchʼoʼjinik jun achalaxik rukʼ jun achalaxik chik, e weriʼ, chkiwach ri winaq che man junam ta qakojonik kukʼ!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi jun itzel chi wi iwukʼ che kʼo uchʼoʼj jun rukʼ jun chik. ¿La man are ta utz riʼ che kaqariq na ri uqʼoxomal ri man sukʼ taj kbʼan chqech? on ¿jas che, che ri ix, man kiya taj kkaʼm ubʼik ri jastaq iwech?
Xane ix kixbʼanow ri man sukʼ taj, e ix ri kixkʼamow ubʼi ri jastaq kech ri nikʼaj chik e weriʼ chkech iwachalal kibʼan wi.
¿La man iwetaʼm taj che jachin ri man sukʼ winaq taj man kkechbʼej ta riʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos? ¡Misubʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ ix!, ri kkibʼan itzel pa ri uwinaqil kibʼaqil, ri kʼo molom taq Kajawxel, ri ekʼi taq ixoqibʼ achijabʼ kekʼojiʼ kukʼ, ri kʼo itzel kʼaslemal kukʼ, ri kibʼanom sibʼalaj kʼax
ri elaqʼomabʼ, ri are kkaj ronojel jastaq, ri eqʼabʼarelabʼ taq winaq, ri kkibʼij ri itzel taq tzij, man kkechbʼej ta riʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, waʼ weriʼ, eko jujun waʼ chixoʼl che xkibʼan waʼ, kʼatekʼut, xixchʼajtajik, xixtyoxrisatajik, xixsukʼubʼaʼtajik rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo e rumal ri ruxlabʼal ri Qadyos.
«Ronojel jastaq uwach yaʼtal chwech»; kʼatekʼut man ronojel ta jas uwach utz chwech. «Ronojel jastaq uwach yaʼtal chwech»; kʼatekʼut man kinya ta bʼe chrech jun jas uwach che kuqʼat tzij panuwiʼ.
Ri wa chqapam kbʼe wi e ri qapam kukʼulaj ri wa. E ri Dyos, kusach uwach riʼ ri qapam e ri qawa. Ri bʼaqilal man xbʼan taj arech kupatanij ri itzel kʼaslemal; xaneʼ xbʼanik arech kupatanij ri Ajawxel e ri Ajawxel are kupatanij ri bʼaqilal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos che xukʼastajisaj uwach ri Ajawxel, xoqujeʼ kukʼastajisaj na qawach uj riʼ rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ.
¿La man iwetaʼm ta ri ix, che ri ibʼaqil utzʼaqatil ri Kristo? ¿E la kinkʼam kʼu ubʼi in riʼ ri utzaqatil ri Kristo arech kuxik utzaqtil jun ixoq kech nim chutiʼn? ¡Man je taj, qastzij nakʼut che man je taj!
On ¿la man iwetaʼm taj che jachin kunim ribʼ rukʼ jun ixoq che kech nim chʼutiʼn, xa jun chi kibʼaqil riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ? Rumal rech che bʼim: Ri ekebʼ keʼuxik xa jun chi bʼaqilal.
Xa kʼu jeriʼ, ri junam krukʼaj ribʼ rukʼ ri Ajawxel, xa jun uxlabʼxel riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ.
¡Chixanimaj chuwach ri makaj rukʼ achi ixoq! «Ronojel mak che kubʼan jun winaq man kkanaj ta kan pa ri ubʼaqil»; kʼatekʼut ri jun che kmakun rukʼ achi ixoq, chi rukʼ ri ubʼaqil wi kmakun wi.
¿On la man iwetaʼm taj, che ri ibʼaqil jun nimalaj rachoch ri Uxlabʼxel che kʼo iwukʼ ix e waʼ weriʼ are ri Dyos uyaʼom chiwech e ri ibʼaqil qas man iwech ta ri ix?
¡Jeʼ na kʼut, ri ix utzalaj iloqʼik xbʼanik! Nim bʼaʼ chiwilaʼ wi ri Dyos pa ri ibʼaqil!
Puwiʼ ri jastaq che xitzʼibʼaj uloq chwech, utz we ri achi man kʼo ta rixoqil.
Kʼatekʼut, chuwach ri itzel kʼaslemal utz che ri achi kʼo rixoqil e ri ixoq kʼo rachajil.
Ri achajilal qas chukʼaslemaj bʼaʼ rukʼ ri rixoqil ri taqal chrij kubʼano e xoqujeʼ jeriʼ chubʼanaʼ ri ixoqilal rukʼ ri rachajil.
Ri ixoqilal man kʼo ta ukowinem puwiʼ ri ubʼaqil, are ri rachajil kʼo ukowinem puwiʼ. Xoqujeʼ, ri achajilal man kʼo ta ukowinem puwiʼ ri ubʼaqil, are ri rixoqil kʼo ukowinem puwiʼ.
Mipaqchiʼj iwibʼ, ri jun chrech ri jun chik, we kiwaj jeriʼ kibʼano, junam uchomaxik chibʼanaʼ, chichomaj jumpaʼ qʼij man kiwukʼaj ta iwibʼ, arech kuyaʼo kixok pa chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos; kʼatekʼuriʼ, jumul chik junam chiwukʼaj iwibʼ, arech ri kʼaxtokʼ man kupatanij ta ribʼ piwiʼ ix rumal che man kiqʼiʼ ta uqʼilik iwibʼ e kixukoj pa kʼax.
Waʼ we jastaq kinbʼij chiwech riʼ komon uchomaxik kibʼano, man jun taqanik taj.
Sibʼalaj kinwaj weta konojel ri achijabʼ ejeriʼ in jacha ri in; kʼatekʼut, konojel ri winaq kikʼamom chi pa ri Dyos uloq ri jun toqʼobʼ yaʼom chkech: nikʼaj winaq jaljoj ri kibʼantajik, nikʼaj winaq chik jun wi chik ri kikʼaslemal.
Kinbʼij chkech ri man ekʼulkʼuj taj e chkech ri emalkanibʼ chuchuʼibʼ che are utz chkech kekanajik in jacha ri in.
Kʼatekʼut, we man kiqʼiʼo kiqʼil iwibʼ, chixkʼulunoq; are utz riʼ kkʼuliʼ jun chuwach che kuporoj ribʼ.
Chkech ri ekʼulanik, kinbʼij weriʼ, man in taj kinbʼinik, xaneʼ are ri Ajawxel: ri ixoqilal muyaʼ kan ri rachajil
–kʼatekʼut we kuya kan ri areʼ, muloqʼoj jun chik, on chutzirisaj ribʼ rukʼ ri rachajil– e che ri achajilal, muya kan ri rixoqil.
Chkech ri enikʼaj chik, in ri kinbʼin chkech, man are ta ri Ajawxel: we kʼo jun achalaxik che ri rixoqil man kʼo ta ri qakojonik rukʼ e kraj kkanaj rukʼ, mupaqchiʼj ubʼi ri areʼ.
We kʼo jun ixoq che ri rachajil man kʼo ta ri qakojonik rukʼ e kraj kkanaj rukʼ, mupaqchiʼj ubʼi ri areʼ.
Rumal rech, ri achajilal che man kʼo ta qakojonik rukʼ, tyoxrisam chik rumal ri rixoqil, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ixoqilal, ri man kʼo ta qakojonik rukʼ, tyoxrisam chik rumal ri rachajil che kʼo qakojonik rukʼ. Weta mat jeriʼ, ri eʼiwalkʼuwaʼl man etyox ta riʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri kamik riʼ, ri eʼareʼ etyoxlaj taq winaq.
We ri jun che man kʼo ta qakojonik rukʼ, are kajawanik che kkijach kibʼ, chkijachaʼ bʼaʼ kibʼ, e weriʼ knʼebʼaʼ are ri achi achalaxik on are ri ixoq achalaxik man kʼo ta chi eʼunukʼum: ri Dyos xixusikʼij ri ix arech kixkʼaslemanik pa riʼ jaʼmaril.
Ri at, at ixoqilal ¿jas awetaʼm we at na riʼ katkolow ri awachajil? e ri at, at achajilal, ¿jas awetaʼm we at na riʼ katkolow ri awixoqil?
Konojel bʼaʼ ri winaq chekanajoq pa ri kikʼaslemal che uyaʼom ri Ajawxel chkech, chekanajoq jeriʼ jacha ri kibʼantajik arechiʼ xesikʼix rumal ri Ajawxel, are waʼ ri taqanik kinchʼik kanoq pa ronojel taq ri Komon Tyox.
¿La kʼo jun che xsikʼixik aretaq chiʼ qʼatom chi ri utzʼumal uwiʼ ri ukowil? Mukamulij bʼaʼ uqʼatik uwiʼ ri ukowil. ¿La kʼo jun che xsikʼixik aretaq majaʼ kqʼatik uwiʼ ri ukowil? Muqʼat bʼaʼ uwiʼ ri ukowil
Man are ta ri qʼatom uwiʼ ukowilal on ri man qʼatom taj ri kʼo nimalaj upatan; ri kʼo upatan are ri ukʼolik e ri ubʼanik ri upixabʼ ri Dyos.
Ronojel winaq chkanajoq pa ri kʼaslemal jawijeʼ xriqitaj wi rumal ri utzij ri Dyos.
¿La at jun ajchakunel patanijel chrech jun ajaw aretaq chiʼ xopan ri Tzij awukʼ? ¡Matok chuchomaxik weriʼ! Kneʼbʼaʼ katkowinik katoʼtajisaj awibʼ, sibʼalaj chatchakunoq jeʼ jas at jun ajchakunel at patajinel chrech jun ajaw.
Rumal rech che ri jun ajchakunel ajpatanijel chrech jun ajaw aretaq chiʼ xopan ri utzij ri Ajawxel rukʼ, ri areʼ riʼ toʼtajisam rumal ri Ajawxel; e ri jun che man kʼo ta puqʼabʼ jun ajaw aretaq chiʼ xopan ri Tzij rukʼ, ri areʼ rajchak ajpatanijel chrech ri Kristo.
Ri ix utz iloqʼik bʼanom! Mixokik ixkajchak ixkipatanijel winaq.
Achalaxik, chikanaj konojel winaq chuwach ri Dyos pa ri kʼaslemal jawijeʼ xriqitaj wi rumal ri Tzij.
Pakiwiʼ ri eqʼapojibʼ ekʼojolabʼ, ri in man kʼo ta jun utzij ri Ajawxel kinbʼij, xuwi kinbʼij jun nutzij in jacha jun winaq, che rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Ajawxel, in kubʼal kʼuʼx chkiwach ri winaq.
Ri in, kinchomaj, che waʼ weriʼ, utz, rumal ri kʼax chuwachulew, utz chech ri winaq che kkanaj jeriʼ.
Ri at, ¿we kʼo awixoqil? Mapaqchiʼj ubʼi ri areʼ. Ekʼu ri at, ¿We man kʼoʼ awixoqil? Matzukuj bʼaʼ awixoqil.
Kʼatekʼut, we katkʼuliʼk, ri at man katmakun taj: we kkʼuliʼ ri ali man kmakun taj; kʼatekʼut konojel riʼ ri winaq riʼ kkiriq na riʼ ri kʼax pa ri kibʼaqil, e ri in kwaj che weta mat kiriq weriʼ.
Kinbʼij bʼaʼ weriʼ chiwech ixachalaxik: xaq ubʼiʼ waʼ kokʼow ri jastaq. We uchanim riʼ, ri jun che kʼo rixoqil, chkʼasleman bʼaʼ jacha man kʼo taj;
ri nikʼaj che keʼoqʼik chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che man keʼoqʼ taj; ri nikʼaj che kekiʼkotik chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che man kekiʼkot taj; ri nikʼaj che kiloqʼoʼmik chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che man kʼo ta kʼo kukʼ;
ri nikʼaj che jeʼlik ukojik we uqʼinomal we uwachulew kkibʼano, chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che man jeʼlik ta ukojik kkibʼano. Rumal rech che we uwachbʼal we uwachulew riʼ tajin kkʼisik.
Ri in kinwaj weta mat kixmayow ix. Ri achi che man kʼulan taj, are chkmayowoq puwiʼ ri jastaq rech ri Ajawxel, chmayowoq jas ri kubʼano arech kqaj chuwach ri Ajawxel.
Ri achi che kʼulanik are chmayowoq chrech ri jastaq rech ri uwachulew, are chumayaʼ ri jastaq che kqaj chuwach ri rixoqil;
xa jekʼuriʼ uchʼaqapim ribʼ ri ukʼaslemal. Ri ixoq che man kʼo ta rachajil, xoqujeʼ ri ali are chumayaʼ ri jastaq rech ri Ajawxel; are chutzukuj che tyox ubʼantajik ri areʼ pa ri ubʼaqil e pa ri ruxlabʼal. Ri jun che kʼulanik, are chumayaʼ ri jastaq rech we uwachulew, ri jastaq che kqaj chuwach ri rachajil.
Ri in kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech rumal che utzil waʼ chiwech, man xa ta jun kʼaʼm kinkoj chiwech, xane are kinwaj kixinkʼam ubʼi pa ri kʼaslemal e pa ri utzalaj uchapik ximon ibʼ rukʼ ri Ajawxel.
We kʼo jun winaq che pa uchuqʼabʼ ri ukʼaslemal kuchomaj che kkowinik man utz taj ri tajin kubʼano rukʼ ri uchʼabʼ ali, rumal che kʼo pa ri ukʼojolil, chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri rajawaxik kbʼanik: ¡man kmakun ta riʼ, cheʼekʼulun bʼaʼ!
Kʼatekʼut, we kʼo jun chi pa ranimaʼ kraj ukʼamom uqʼabʼ rukʼ chuqʼabʼ, e ri areʼ man kojom ta ukʼuʼxʼ e chi rukʼ ri ukowinem kraj che nim kril wi ri uchʼabʼ ali, ri areʼ xoqujeʼ utz kubʼan riʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri jun che kkʼuliʼ rukʼ ri uchʼabʼ ali, utz ri kubʼano e ri jun che man kkʼuliʼ ta rukʼ, sibʼalaj utz chi na ri kubʼano.
Ri ixoqilal ximatalik kanajinaq rukʼ ri rachajil pa ronojel ri ukʼaslemal ri areʼ; kʼatekʼut we kkam ri rachajil, ri areʼ kkirtajik, kuyaʼo kkʼuliʼ rukʼ ri jun che kraj ri areʼ, kʼatekʼut, xuwiʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ, nimalaj kiʼkotemal riʼ kkʼojiʼk we kkanaj kanoq jeriʼ jacha ri kinchomaj in. Ri in kinchomaj che xoqujeʼ kʼo wukʼ in ri Ruxlabʼal ri Dyos.
Puwiʼ ri tiʼj che kchiʼx chkech ri imolom taq dyos «qonojel ri uj qetaʼm chik, rumal rech che kʼo qanoʼj». Kʼatekʼut, ri noʼjinik kuyaʼ nimal; ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx kuyak wachaj.
We jun winaq kuchomaj che kʼo chi retaʼmabʼal che jun jas uwach, majaʼ kretaʼmaj riʼ, jacha ri rajawaxik kretaʼmaj;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo jun winaq kuloqʼoqʼej uwach ri Dyos, ri Dyos xas retaʼm chi uwach we areʼ riʼ.
Puwiʼ ri utijik ri tiʼj che kchiʼx chkech ri emolom taq dyos, ri uj qetaʼm che «jun molom dyos man kʼo ta upatan chuwachulew» e «man kʼo ta chi jun Dyos, xuwi ri Areʼ Jun chi Dyos kʼolik».
Kneʼbʼaʼ keʼokisaxik edyos chikaj e chuwachulew, man qastzij ta riʼ edyos –xa jekʼuriʼ ekʼo sibʼalaj edyoses e sibʼalaj ekʼi ajawxel ekʼollik–,
chqawach ri uj, kʼo xa jun chi Dyos, are ri Tatxel, e chi rukʼ ri areʼ kpe wi ronojel jastaq, e rukʼ ri areʼ tajin kujbʼe wi, e kʼo xa jun chi Ajawxel, Jesus Kristo, rumal ri areʼ kbʼantaj ronojel ri jastaq kʼo choqʼijsaq, xoqujeʼ rumal, uj kʼo uj, e ri uj kujbʼin pa ri ukʼaselamal ri Areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man konojel ta winaq waʼ kʼo kinoʼj chrech weriʼ. Ekʼo nikʼaj winaq waʼ, rumal rech che pa taq ri qʼij kanoq xepe chkiwach ri imolom taq dyos, kʼamaninaq chkech kkitij ri tiʼj kchiʼx chkiwach, xa kʼu jeriʼ tzʼilobʼinaq ri kuxlabʼal eʼareʼ.
Man kʼo ta jun waʼ kujuqetsaj chunaqaj ri Dyos. We man kqatij uj weriʼ, man xa ta rumal riʼ nitzʼ qabʼantajik; kʼatekʼuriʼ we kqatij uj weriʼ, man rumal ta riʼ nim qabʼantajik.
Qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ, chinaʼaʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ chukojik ri ibʼantajik che ixtzoqopitalik, arech man jun kʼam bʼaʼ ta chkech ri etuqaʼr winaq e ketzaq rumal weriʼ.
Rumal rech, ri at che kʼo ri anoʼj, katril jun winaq at tʼuyul cho ri mexa pa ri rachoch ri emolom taq dyos; rumal che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ ri ruxlabʼal ri areʼ, ¿la man kuchomaj ta kʼuriʼ che yaʼtal chech kutij ri tiʼj che xchiʼtaj chkech ri emolom taq dyos?
¡Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri anoʼj kukamisaj riʼ ri winaq che ma kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ, ri achalaxik che xtoqʼobʼisax uwach e rumal areʼ xkam ri Kristo!
E aretaq chiʼ kixmakun jewaʼ chkiwach ri eʼiwachalal, aretaq chiʼ kisoko ri kuxlabʼal che man kʼo ta kichuqʼabʼ, ri ix kixmakunik chuwach kikʼuleʼlaj ri Kristo.
Xa jeʼkʼuriʼ, we xa rumal jun jas uwach, ktzaq ri wachalal, man kʼo ta chi jumul riʼ kintij ri tiʼj, arech man kinya ta bʼe che ktzaq ri wachalal.
¿La man intzoqopitalik ta ri in? ¿La man in jun taqoʼnel ta ri in? ¿La man wilom ta ri in ri Jesus Qajawxel? ¿La man ix taj ix nuchak pa ri Ajawxel?
We chkiwach enikʼaj chik, ri in man in taqoʼnel taj, chiwach ix, ri in, in jun taqoʼnel, rumal rech che ri ix, pa ri Ajawxel itʼiqom ri jetaq nuchak,
e are kʼu waʼ ri tobʼal wech chkiwach ri kkibʼan qʼatojtzij panuwiʼ.
¿La man yaʼtal ta chqech uj che kujwaʼik e kujqumunik?
¿La man yaʼtal ta chqech uj che kʼo jun ajkojonel qixoqil jeriʼ jacha ri enikʼaj etaqoʼnelabʼ chik e jeriʼ jacha ri erachalal ri Ajawxel e jacha ri Sefas?
¿On xaq xuwiʼ chqech ri uj, ri in e ri Bʼernabʼe, man yaʼtal ta chqech che man kujchakun taj?
¿Jachin jun kbʼe pa chʼoʼj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kutojbʼej ribʼ xas rukʼ upwaq areʼ? ¿Jachin ktikow jun tikbʼal uva kʼatekʼuriʼ man kutij ta uwach? ¿Jachin kyuqʼun chkech jupuq awaj kʼatekʼuriʼ man kutij ta ri uwaʼl kituʼ ri jupuq awaj?
¿La xaq utzij winaq weriʼ? on ri pixabʼ ¿la man kubʼij taj xoqujeʼ weriʼ?
Jeʼ nakʼut, pa ri upixabʼ ri Moʼises tzʼibʼatalik: «Makoj uchimal utzaʼm ri wakax che kubʼan yoqʼoj triko». ¿La kchoman ri Dyos chrech ri wakax?
¿La man paqawiʼ ta ri uj kchʼawik? Jeʼ nakʼut, weriʼ tzʼibʼatalik rumal qech uj: ri jun che kuchʼol ri ulew, rajawaxik che kubʼan ri chʼoloj rukʼ eyeʼbʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri jun che kupachʼlej ri triko, kupachʼlej rukʼ eyeʼbʼal che kʼo re riʼ ri areʼ kuriq ubʼik.
Ri uj we xqabʼan ri awex iwukʼ ix rukʼ ri jastaq che rech ri uxlabʼal, ¿la nim kʼuriʼ chiwach che kqamol chixoʼl ri jastaq rech ri uwachulew?
We ekʼo nikʼaj chik che kiyaʼom piwiʼ ix we pixabʼ riʼ, ¿la man are ta kʼu nim ri qech uj chuwach ri kech areʼ? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, man xqakoj ta chkiwach ri winaq we jun pixabʼ riʼ. Xaneʼ ronojel jas uwach kqakuyu, arech ri uj, man kʼo ta jun kʼax kqabʼan chrech ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo.
¿La man iwetaʼm taj, che ri eʼajchakibʼ chrech ri nim rachoch ri Dyos chi kʼo ri kipwaq che rech ri nim rachoch ri Dyos? ¿La man iwetaʼm taj che ri kechakun cho ri tabʼal ekebʼ riʼ chrij ri jastaq rukʼ ri tabʼal?
Xa jeʼkʼuriʼ, ri Ajawxel taqaninaq chkech ri kkiya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij, rukʼ ri Utzalaj Tzij riʼ kiwaʼ wi ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, man nukojom ta we pixabʼ riʼ chkiwach ri winaq, e man kintzʼibʼaj ta weriʼ arech jeriʼ kbʼan chwech ri in; are nim waʼ ri kamikal chuwach waʼ weriʼ. Man kʼo ta jun winaq riʼ kkamisan ri nuqʼijil in.
