Rumal rech che chwech ri in chi rajawaxik wi che kinya ubʼixik ri utzalaj Tzij, man xa ta rumal nuqʼijil; jeʼ nakʼut, itzel waʼ chwech ri in we man kinya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij!
We xaq kinbʼan we chak riʼ xaq pa wech wi ri in, kuyaʼ na kʼuriʼ che kinchʼaʼ ri utojbʼalil; weta mat jeriʼ, jun chak na kʼuriʼ che xa yaʼom chwech.
¿Jas kʼuriʼ ri utojbʼalil ukʼaxel? Are weriʼ ri utojbʼalil: kinya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta pwaq kinkʼamo, man kinkoj ta chkiwach ri winaq ri pixabʼ che uyaʼom kinkojo rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in, in tzoqopitalik chkiwach nimalaj konojel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, in pataninel kech konojel winaq arech keʼinchʼak ekʼi taq winaq.
Xinbʼan wibʼ in ajjudiʼo kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo arech keʼinchʼak ri eʼajjudiʼo; kukʼ ri winaq che erech ri pixabʼ ri in in rech ri pixabʼ –knʼebʼaʼ ri in man in rech ta pixabʼ– arech ri in keʼinchʼak ri winaq che erech ri pixabʼ.
Xinbʼan wibʼ in jun winaq che man kʼo ta ri pixabʼ wukʼ –ri in che kʼo jun Pixabʼ wukʼ che rech ri Dyos rumal rech che ri Pixabʼ kʼo wukʼ, rech ri Kristo– arech ri in, keʼinchʼak ri winaq che man kʼo ta ri pixabʼ kukʼ.
Ri in man kʼo ta nuchuqʼabʼ, xintuqeʼrisaj wibʼ kukʼ ri etuqeʼr winaq arech ri in keʼinchʼak ri etuqeʼr winaq. Ri in xinbʼan wibʼ jeʼ ejas konojel winaq arech, kneʼbʼaʼ rukʼ kʼax keʼinkol enikʼaj winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel weriʼ, ri in kinbʼano rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij arechaʼ ri in, kʼo ri chʼaqap wech.
¿La man iwetaʼm taj che aretaq chiʼ kexikʼinik pa ri etzʼanbʼal, konojel anaqil kexakʼinik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xa jun kriqowik, xa jun kkʼamowik ri kchʼakik? aninaqil chixxakʼin bʼaʼ arech ri ix kixchʼakanik.
Ri eʼajetzʼanelabʼ pa ri ketzʼanbʼal enimaʼq winaq kkiqʼil kibʼ che ronojel jastaq; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ xa rumal che kkaj kkichʼak jun ukeʼt kijolom che kqʼayik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj rumal jun che man kqʼay taj.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri in aninaqil kinxikʼinik, ri in man kinbʼe ta riʼ weta mat wetaʼm jawiʼ kinbʼe wi; kʼatekʼuriʼ, man xaq ta kinxikʼinik xaq jeriʼ.
Xane kinbʼan kʼax chrech we nubʼaqil e kinkoj pa chak; rumal che ri in xinya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij chkech ri enikʼaj chik, e weneʼ man utz taj kineʼeloq.
Achalaxik, ri in man kinwaj taj che ri ix mat iwetaʼm, che ri eqanan qatat konojel xekʼojiʼ chuxeʼ ri sutzʼ konojel xeqʼax pa ri polow,
konojel xbʼan kiqasnaʼ pa ri sutzʼ e pa ri polow rumal ri Moʼises,
konojel junam xkitij ri uxlabʼxel wa,
e konojel xkiqumuj ri uxlabʼxel ukʼya rumal rech che xequmunik chi pa ri jun uxlabʼxel abʼaj che xerachiʼlaj, kʼatekʼut, ri jun abʼaj riʼ, are ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we winaq man konojel taj eʼutz chuwach ri Dyos, rumal kʼuwaʼ ri kibʼaqil epopoj kanoq pa ri tzʼinalik ulew.
Xbʼantaj weriʼ rech jun kʼambʼal noʼj chqech ri uj arech man kqaj ta ri itzel jacha ri xkaj ri eʼareʼ.
Mixqʼijlanik chkech emolom taq dyos jacha kkibʼan ejujun chkech eʼareʼ, tzʼibʼatalik kʼut pakiwiʼ: «Ri winaq xetʼuyiʼ chrech ri waʼim e chrech ri qumunem, kʼatekʼuriʼ kewaʼlajik chech ri etzʼanem».
Xoqujeʼ maqabʼan ri itzel kʼaslemal rukʼ achi ixoq jacha xkibʼan nikʼaj chkixoʼl eʼareʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, e 23.000 xekamik chi pa jun qʼij.
Maqataqchiʼj ri Ajawxel chrech makaj jeriʼ jas xkibʼan ejujun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ xekam kumal taq ri kumatz.
Mixwixwatik jacha xkibʼan ejujun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xekamisax ubʼik rumal ri kamisanel.
Waʼ weriʼ xpe chkij jacha jun kʼambʼal noʼj, e tzʼibʼatalik kanoq arech ri uj kqetaʼmaj che naqaj uj kʼo wi che ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uwachulew.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kʼo uqʼijil rumal rech che kuchomaj che chi takʼal wi ri areʼ, chuxibʼij bʼaʼ ribʼ chrech we ktzaqik.
Man nim ta ri ikʼamjanik pa ri makaj xbʼan chiwech chuwach ri taqal chrij jun winaq. Man kukʼex ta utzij ri Dyos; ri areʼ man kuya ta bʼe riʼ arech ri ix kixkʼamjex pa ri makaj che nim chi na chuwach ri ichuqʼabʼ; xa rukʼ ri kʼax riʼ kuya na riʼ chiwech ri jastaq uwach arech ri ix kixpe uloq chi rukʼ ri areʼ e rukʼ ri ichuqʼabʼ, arech kixkowin che uqʼiʼik ri kʼamjanik.
Rumal kʼu weriʼ, ix loqʼalaj taq winaq, chixanimajoʼq chuwach ri emolom taq ajawxel.
Kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech ix winaq nim iwetaʼmaʼbʼal, ri ix, chibʼanaʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ we jastaq che kinbʼij chiwech.
Ri pajbʼal amajaʼ che kqatewchiʼj ri uj, ¿la man nimalaj ukʼaʼnik ibʼ taj rukʼ ri ukikʼel ri Kristo? Ri kaxlanwa che kqapir uj, ¿la man nimalaj ukʼaʼnik ibʼ taj rukʼ ri ubʼaqil ri Kristo?
Rumal rech che kʼo xa jun kaxlanwa, qonojel xa uj jun bʼaqilal, rumal rech che qonojel kʼo qech chrech we jun chi kaxlanwa riʼ.
Qas chiwilampeʼ, ri Israʼel che rech we uwachulew riʼ. Ri eʼareʼ che kkitij kech rukʼ ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ. ¿La man kʼo ta ri nimalaj ukʼaʼnik ibʼ rukʼ ri tabʼal?
¿Jas kʼu kubʼij weriʼ? ¿La che ri tiʼj che kchiʼx chkech ri emolom taq dyos are nim chqawach? ¿on eʼareʼ enim chqawach ri emolom taq dyos?
Waʼ weriʼ chkech ri kʼaxtokʼ kchiʼx wi, man che ta ri Dyos kchiʼx wi. E ri in, man kinwaj taj che ri ix nimalaj ukʼaʼnik kibʼan kukʼ ri jetaq Kʼaxtokʼ.
Man kuya taj kixqumun pa ri pajbʼal amajaʼ rech ri Ajawxel e pa ri pajbʼal amajaʼ kech ri ekʼaxtokʼ; ri ix, man kuya taj che ix kʼo cho ri umexa ri Ajawxel e cho ri kimexa ri ekʼaxtokʼ.
On ¿la xa are kqaj uj che ri Ajawxel kqaj pa ri achixom? ¿La are puch nim qachuqʼabʼ chuwach ri areʼ?
«Ronojel jastaq uwach yaʼtalik kbʼanik»; kʼatekʼuriʼ, man ronojel taj utz che kbʼanik. «Ronojel jastaq uwach yaʼtalik kbʼanik»; kʼatekʼuriʼ man ronojel taj kuyak uwach ri Komon Tyox.
Mutzukuj jun winaq xuwi ri utzilal chech ri areʼ, xaneʼ are chtzukux bʼaʼ ri utzilal chkech ri enikʼaj chik.
Chitijaʼ ronojel jastaq che kkʼayix pa ri kʼayibʼal, xaq bʼaʼ miqʼil iwibʼ rumal taq ri ichomanik;
rumal rech che ri uwachulew e ronojel ri jastaq che kʼo chuwach, rech ri Ajawxel.
We jun winaq che man kʼo ta ukojonik, kixusikʼij pa waʼim, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix kiwaj kixbʼe rukʼ, chitijaʼ bʼaʼ ronojel ri kyaʼ chiwech, miqʼil iwibʼ che ri wa rumal ri ichomanik pa iwech wi.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo jun winaq kubʼij chiwech: «Weriʼ xkamisaxik rech tabʼal toqʼobʼ», mitij bʼaʼ we wa riʼ rumal rech ri jun winaq che xuya ubʼixik weriʼ chiwech e rumal ri ichomanik ix pa iwech wi.
Aretaq chiʼ kinbʼij weriʼ man are ta kinbʼij ri ichomanik ix pa iwech wi, xaneʼ are kinbʼij ri uchomanik ri jun chik pa rech wi; ¿la kinximitajik puch ri in che in- tzoqopitalik, rumal ri uchomanik pa rech wi jun winaq chik?
We ri in kintij jun jas uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ kinmaltyoxij, ¿jas kʼuche kbʼan kʼax chwech rumal ri jas uwach xintijo che xinmaltyoxij?
Ri ix, we kixwaʼik, on kixqumunik on xaq jun jas uwach chik kibʼano, ronojel chibʼanaʼ rech uqʼijil ri Dyos.
Mibʼan bʼaʼ kʼax chkech ri eʼajjudiʼo, chkech ri eʼajgriʼego, chkech ri eʼukomon ri Dyos,
jacha ri in che kinkoj nuchuqʼabʼ arech in utz chkiwach konojel ri winaq, man are ta kintzukuj ri utzilal chwech in, xane are kintzukuj ri utzilal kech esibʼalaj winaq arech kekoltajik ri eʼareʼ.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ jacha kinbʼan ri in, che kinbʼano jacha ri Kristo.
Nim kixinwil wi, rumal rech che chi pa ronojel jas uwach ri ix kininaʼtisaj, kʼatekʼuriʼ ikʼolom ri pixabʼ jeriʼ jas uyaʼik xinya in chiwech.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri in kwaj kiwetaʼmaj ix weriʼ: ri ujolom uloq ri achi are ri Kristo e ri ujolom uloq ri ixoq are ri achi e ri ujolom uloq ri Kristo are ri Dyos.
Ronojel achi che kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos on che kuqʼaxej utzij ri Dyos e nim uwiʼ kʼolik, tajin kretzelaj uwach ri ujolom.
Ronojel ixoq che kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos on che kuqʼaxej utzij ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man chʼuqatal ta ri ujolom, tajin kretzelaj ri ujolom; kjunamatajik che ri areʼ tol ujolom, man kʼo ta uwiʼ.
¡We jun ixoq man kuchʼuq ta ujolom, chi chusokaj ubʼi ri uwiʼ! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼixbʼal chrech jun ixoq che tol ujolom, chuchʼuquʼ bʼaʼ ri ujolom.
Ri achi man rajawaxik taj kuchʼuq ri ujolom rumal rech che ri areʼ, are uwachbʼal e uqʼijil ri Dyos; e ri ixoq uqʼijil ri achi.
Ri achi man rukʼ ta ri ixoq elenaq wi, xaneʼ are elenaq ri ixoq rukʼ ri achi;
man xkʼiysax ta ri achi rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach chech ri ixoq, xaneʼ xkʼiyisax ri ixoq rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach chech ri achi.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, rajawaxik che ri ixoq kuchʼuq ri ujolom kʼutbʼal kech ri eʼanjelibʼ.
Xa kʼujeriʼ, pa ri Ajawxel, ri ixoq chi kʼo wi rukʼ ri achi, e ri achi xas rukʼ wi ri ixoq;
rumal nakʼut che ri ixoq xesaxik uloq rukʼ ri achi, xoqujeʼ ri achi rukʼ ri ixoq kaʼlax wi, kʼatekʼuriʼ ronojel petinaq uloq chi rukʼ wi ri Dyos.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ qʼatojtzij chi pa iwech wi ri ix. ¿La utz kʼuriʼ che ri ixoq kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos man chʼuqtal ta ujolom?
¿La man kʼukʼut ta ri uwachulew chqawach che kʼixbʼal chrech ri achi we kʼo nim uwiʼ,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, weriʼ are uqʼijil ri ixoq aretaq chiʼ kʼo nim uwiʼ? Xa ne jekʼuwaʼ, ri uwiʼ xyaʼtaj chrech ri ixoq arech chʼuqubʼal ujolom.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo jun winaq kraj kutzalijisaj uwach we tzij riʼ, chiwetaʼmaj bʼaʼ che weriʼ man je ta waʼ qapixabʼ, xoqujeʼ man je ta waʼ ri upixabʼ ri Komon Tyox rech ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kinya we pixabʼ riʼ, man nim taj kixinwil wi, rumal rech che ri mulin ibʼ kibʼano man kuya ta utzil chiwech, xaneʼ xa rech itzel chiwech.
Rumal rech che kbʼixik, che aretaq chiʼ kimulij iwibʼ kʼo chʼoʼj chixoʼl, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinkojo weriʼ.
Rajawaxik ri chʼoʼj chixoʼl arech keqʼalajanik jachin ri eʼutz taq winaq chixoʼl.
Aretaq chiʼ kimulij iwibʼ, man kitij taj ri waʼim rech ri Ajawxel.
Rumal rech, che aretaq chiʼ ri ix, ix kʼo cho ri mexa, iwonojel are nabʼe kitij iwa chijujunal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼo winaq knumik aretaq chiʼ, jun chik kqʼabʼarik.
¿La man kʼo ta iwachoch ix arech kixwaʼik e kixqumun chilaʼ? on ¿la kiwetzalaj ri ix uwach ri Ukomon Tyox ri Dyos e kiwaj kiwesaj kikʼixbʼal ri winaq che man kʼo ta kijastaq? ¿Jas kʼu kinbʼij na chiwech? ¿La xa nim kixinwil wi? ¡Puwiʼ weriʼ, man nim taj kixinwil wi!
Rumal rech, che ri in xas rukʼ wi ri Ajawxel xinkʼam wi
e aretaq chiʼ xbʼantajik ri maltyoxinik xupiro e xubʼij: «Are waʼ ri nubʼaqil iwech ri ix. Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ naʼtisabʼal wech ri in».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xbʼantaj ri waʼim, xukʼam ukoq ri jun pajbʼal amajaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xubʼij: «We pajbʼal amajaʼ riʼ are waʼ ri kʼakʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ pa ri nukikʼel; ronojel taq mul aretaq chiʼ kitij na ix, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ naʼtisabʼal wech ri in».
Ronojel mul, aretaq chiʼ ri ix kitij na we kaxlanwa riʼ e kixqumun na pa we pajbʼal amajaʼ riʼ, ri ix tajin kiya ubʼixik ri ukamikal ri Ajawxel chuxeʼ kanoq qas kʼateʼ na kpe ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che man utz taj e kutij ri kaxlanwa on kqumun pa ri pajbʼal amajaʼ rech ri Ajawxel, kbʼan na qʼatojtzij riʼ puwiʼ rumal ri ubʼaqil e ri ukikʼel ri Ajawxel.
Ronojel winaq chunikʼoj bʼaʼ ribʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ chutijaʼ bʼaʼ we kaxlanwa riʼ e chqumun bʼaʼ pa we pajbʼal amajaʼ riʼ;
rumal rech che jachin ri kwaʼik e kqumunik chrech ri Ubʼaqil ri Kristo, e man kupachij ta rij xas areʼ kutijo e kuqumuj ri qʼatojtzij chrij ri areʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ekʼo sibʼalaj eyawabʼibʼ e sibʼalaj echʼokmaʼy chixoʼl, kʼatekʼuriʼ ekʼi ri kekamik.
Weta kqil uj ri qachuqʼabʼ man kbʼan ta qʼatojtzij waʼ paqawiʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, rumal ri uqʼatojtzij kubʼan paqawiʼ, ri Ajawxel kukʼajisaj qawach, arech man kubʼan ta aʼatojtzij ri uwachulew paqawiʼ ri uj.
Xa kʼujeriʼ, ix wachalal, aretaq chiʼ kimulij iwibʼ chuxeʼ kan ri wa, chiweyeʼj bʼaʼ iwibʼ.
We kʼo jun winaq knumik, chwoʼq bʼaʼ cho rachoch, arech ri ix man kimulij ta iwibʼ rech jun qʼatojtzij piwiʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri nikʼaj jastaq uwach chik, kʼateʼ kinwil na riʼ aretaq chiʼ kinopan iwukʼ.
Puwiʼ taq ri utoqʼobʼ ri Uxlabʼxel; ix wachalal, man kwaj taj kixinwilo che ix kʼo pa ri qʼequʼm.
Aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kixkojon ri ix, iwetaʼm che ri ix sibʼalaj xixbʼe chkiwach ri ejoʼs taq dyos che man kechʼaw taj.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, kinbʼij chiwech: Man kʼo ta jun winaq che kchʼaw rukʼ ri Ruxlabʼal ri Dyos, kuyaʼo kubʼij: «Kamisaxoq ri Jesus», kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun winaq kkowinik kubʼij: «Ajawxel ri Jesus», we man kʼo ta ri areʼ rukʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Kʼo kʼi taq uwach ri utoqʼobʼ ri Uxlabʼxel, kʼatekʼut xas xa jun chi Uxlabʼxel;
kʼi kiwach ri eʼajchakibʼ pa ri Komon Tyox, kʼatekʼut xa jun chi Ajawxel;
kʼi taq ri chak, kʼatekʼut xa jun chi Dyos che kchakun pa ronojel winaq.
Pa ronojel winaq kukʼut wi ribʼ ri Uxlabʼxel rech utzil chech ri komon utzil.
Ri Uxlabʼxel, kuya chrech jun winaq ri tzij rech noʼjbʼal, chrech jun winaq chik kuya jun tzij rech etaʼmabʼal pa ri xa jun Uxlabʼxel,
chrech jun winaq chik kuya ri kojonik pa ri xa jun chi Uxlabʼxel; chrech jun winaq chik kuya ri toqʼobʼ arech kkunan ri areʼ pa ri xa jun chi Uxlabʼxel;
chrech jun chik kuya ri chuqʼabʼ arech kubʼan ri areʼ jujun taq maybʼal; chrech jun chik kuya ri toqʼobʼ arech kubʼan qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos; chrech jun chik kuya ri kowinem ubʼanik qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri Uxlabʼal; chrech jun chik kuyaʼ kubʼij kʼi uwach taq tzij, chech jun chik kuya ri toqʼobʼ arech ri areʼ kuchʼobʼo ri ubʼixkal we taq tzij riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ronojel weriʼ, are ri Uxlabʼxel kbʼanowik, kuya taq ri utoqʼobʼ chkech konojel winaq jacha uyaʼik kraj ri areʼ.
Jacha ri bʼaqilal xa junam, xa jun, kʼatekʼut, kʼo kʼi utzʼaqatil jeʼ nakʼut ronojel ri utzʼaqatil bʼaqilal; ronojel utzʼaqatil jun bʼaqilal kubʼano; jacha weriʼ, xoqujeʼ jewaʼ ri Kristo.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri uj, xa pa jun Uxlabʼxel xqakʼam wi ri Qasnaʼ, arech xa jun bʼaqilal kqawoko, ri uj judiʼos on ri uj griʼegos, ri uj ajchakibʼ on ri uj ajawibʼ; e chi nimalaj qonojel qakʼamom, ujqumuninaq pa jun chi Uxlabʼxel.
Xoqujeʼ, ri bʼaqilal, man kʼo ta xaq jun utzʼaqatil, xane kʼi ri utzʼaqatil kʼolik.
Weta kubʼij ri aqanaj: «Rumal rech che ri in, man in qʼabʼ taj, ri in man in bʼaqilal taj», rukʼ kʼuwaʼ we tzij riʼ, ri areʼ chi kʼo wi riʼ pa ri bʼaqilal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, weta kubʼij ri xikinaj: «Rumal rech che ri in man in woqʼochaj taj, ri in man in kʼo ta pa ri bʼaqilal», xoqujeʼ, rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri are chi kʼo wi riʼ pa ri bʼaqilal.
Weta xaq bʼaqʼwach ronojel ri bʼaqilal, ¿jawiʼ ri utanabʼalil ri xikinaj? Weta xaq xikinaj ronojel ri bʼaqilal, ¿jawiʼ kʼut kkanaj kan wi ri siqinik?
Kʼatekʼut, ri Dyos, xukoj taq ri utzʼaqatil pa ronojel ri bʼaqilal jacha ri xraj ri areʼ.
Weta ronojel xaq jun uwach utzʼaqatil, ¿jawiʼ kʼu riʼ kʼo wi ri bʼaqilal?
Xa jekʼuriʼ, kʼo kʼi utzʼaqatil, kʼatekʼut xa jun chi bʼaqilal.
Ri bʼaqʼwach man kuya taj kubʼij chrech ri qʼabʼaj: «Man at rajawaxik ta chwech in», xoqujeʼ ri jolomaj man kuya taj kubʼij chrech ri taq aqanaj: «Man ix rajawaxik ta chwech ri in».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri taq utzʼaqatil ri bʼaqilal che rilik che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ, xas rajawaxik wi chqech;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri utzʼaqatil ri bʼaqilal che kqetzelaj uwach ri uj, are ne kqaya nimalaj uqʼijil, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri utzʼaqatil ri qabʼaqil che nimalaj kujkʼix chrech, are ne jeʼlik taq uchʼuqik kqabʼano,
rumal che ri nimalaj taq utzʼaqatil ri qabʼaqil man kʼo ta jeʼlik taq jas uwach rajawaxik chrech. Kʼatekʼut, ri Dyos, kukoj ri bʼaqilal arech are kuya nim uqʼijil ri jetaq utzʼaqatil che man kʼo ta uqʼijil,
arech man kʼo ta jachʼow ibʼ pa ri bʼaqilal, xaneʼ are ri jetaq tzʼaqatil kkikʼut jun utzalaj ukʼaʼn ibʼ ri jun rukʼ ri jun chik.
¿La kʼax kʼo jun utzʼaqatilal ri bʼaqil? Ronojel ri utzʼaqatilal kʼax ekʼo rukʼ. ¿La kʼo uqʼijil jun utzʼaqatilal ri bʼaqil? Ronojel ri utzʼaqatilal kekiʼkot rukʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼuriʼ, ri ix, ix ubʼaqil ri Kristo e iwonojel ix, ix jun utzʼaqatil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri xeʼukojo ri Dyos pa ri Komon Tyox, are nabʼe ekʼo ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, pa ukabʼ ekʼo ri qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, pa urox ekʼo ri ajtijabʼ... Kʼatekʼuriʼ are kbʼe chi ukoq ri jetaq mayibʼal, ri jetaq toqʼobʼ rech kunanik, ri toʼbʼnik ri qʼatbʼaltzij ri jetaq kʼi uwach chʼabʼal.
¿La iwonojel puch, ix taqoʼnelabʼ? ¿La iwonojel puch, ix qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos? ¿La iwonojel puch ix ajtijabʼ? ¿La iwonojel puch kixkowinik kibʼan taq mayibʼal?
¿La iwonojel puch kʼo ri toqʼobʼ rech kunanik iwukʼ? ¿La iwonojel kixchʼaw pa taq ri chʼabʼal? ¿La iwonojel kixkowin che ri uchʼobʼik we chʼabʼal riʼ?
¡Are sibʼalaj chiwaj ri nimaʼq utzalaj taq toqʼobʼ! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinkʼut na chiwach jun bʼe che are nim chuwach ronojel bʼe.
Puneʼtaneʼ kinchʼaw na pa ronojel uwach chʼabʼal kech ri winaq e kech ri eʼanjelibʼ, we man kʼo ta ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx wukʼ, ri in xaq in jun qʼan chʼichʼ riʼ che ktzaninik on in jun kampana riʼ che kxojinik.
Puneʼtaneʼ kʼo ri toqʼobʼ wukʼ rech ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos e wetaʼm ronojel taq ri kʼutalik taq jastaq e ronojel taq ri etaʼmabʼal kneʼbʼaʼ kʼo ri tzʼaqatalaj kojonik wukʼ, che kkowin che ukʼamik ubʼik ri jetaq juyubʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri in, we man kʼo ta ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx wukʼ, ri in man kʼo ta jun wuxik riʼ.
Kneʼbʼaʼ kinya ronojel ri jastaq wech chkech ri emolonel, e kinjach we nubʼaqil pa ri ujuluwqʼaqʼ, we ri in man kʼo ta loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx wukʼ, weriʼ, man kʼo ta jun utzil kubʼanaʼ chwech.
Ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx kʼo uchʼuchʼujal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx kpatanijik; man kurayij ta uwach ri jastaq rech ri jun chik; ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx man kunimarisaj ta wi ribʼ, man nimal taj kubʼano;
man kubʼan ta ri etzelal, man utzil taj rech areʼ kutzukuj, man kkʼanar taj, man kuchʼaʼ ta ri etzalal;
man kkiʼkot ta chuwach ri man sukʼ taj, are kkiʼkot chuwach ri saqalaj tzij.
Ronojel mak kusacho, kkojon chrech ronojel, ronojel kreʼyej, ronojel kukuyu.
Ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx man kʼo ta ukʼisik. E kʼu ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos ksach na uwach. E kʼu ri jetaq chʼabʼal kmemerik na riʼ. E kʼu ri etaʼmabʼal ksach na uwach riʼ.
Rumal rech che xa jubʼiq ri qetaʼmabʼal, xoqujeʼ xa jubʼiqʼ ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos qukʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kpe na ri qas tzʼaqat, ksach na uwach riʼ ri xa jubʼiqʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri in, in akʼal, ri in kinchʼawik jacha jun akʼal, kinchomanik jacha jun akʼal; kinwil ri jastaq jacha rilik kubʼan jun akʼal; aretaq chiʼ ri in, in jun achi chik, xinya kan ronojel ri walkʼalil.
Rumal rech, che kamik riʼ, ri uj xa pa jun ilbʼal kujkaʼy wi, pa ri kʼuʼtalik, kʼatekʼut, pa ri chweʼq kabʼij kujkaʼy riʼ chrech ri woqʼochaj rukʼ woqʼochaj. Kamik riʼ, ri in xa jubʼiqʼ wetaʼm; kʼatekʼut, chweʼq kabʼij ri in kinwetaʼmaj uwach riʼ ri Areʼ jacha retaʼmaxik nuwach chuwach ri areʼ.
Kamik riʼ kʼaslik ri kojonik, ri eyeʼbʼal e ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, are wa we oxibʼ jastaq riʼ, kʼatekʼut ri nim chuxoʼl we oxibʼ riʼ, are ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx.
Chitzukuj ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx; kʼatekʼut xoqujeʼ chiwaj ri taq usipanik ri uxlabʼal, e are nimalaj chiwaj nabʼe ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che ri jun che kchʼaw pa taq ri chʼabʼal, man keʼutzijoj ta ri winaq, xaneʼ are kutzijoj ri Dyos; xa jekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun winaq kchʼobʼow ri tzij: pa ri Uxlabʼal kubʼij nikʼaj kʼuʼtalik taq jas uwach.
Kʼatekʼut, ri jun che kuqʼaxaj utzij ri Dyos kchʼaw kukʼ ri winaq arech kuyak ri komon, arech kukʼut ri utz bʼe, e kuya ri chuqʼabʼ.
Ri jun che kchʼaw pa taq ri chʼabʼal chi are kuyak ribʼ areʼ, ri jun che kuqʼaxaj utzij ri Dyos kuyak ronojel ri komon.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in, kinwaj che iwonojel kixchʼaw pa taq chʼabʼal; kʼatekʼut, are nabʼe kinwaj che are kiqʼaxaj ri utzij ri Dyos. Rumal rech che ri jun winaq che kuqʼaxaj utzij ri Dyos, are nim na ubʼantajik chuwach ri kchʼaw pa taq ri chʼabʼal, xuwi neʼ we ri areʼ kuqʼalajisaj ri ucholaj ri tzij arech kuyak ri Komon Tyox.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ ri ix achalaxik, weta ri in kinbʼe pa ri ikomon kʼatekʼuriʼ kinchʼaw chiwech pa taq chʼabʼal, ¿jas kʼu utzil riʼ kukʼam uloq weriʼ chiwech, we ri nutzij man kuya ta jun qʼalajisanik chiwech, on man kuya ta jun inoʼj, on jun qʼaxebʼal utzij Dyos, on jun kʼutbʼal?
Jewaʼ kkʼulmataj rukʼ taq ri qʼojom, ri suʼ on ri tun; we man kuqʼojomaj ri roqʼibʼal. ¿Jas retaʼmaxik kkibʼan ri winaq ri roqʼibʼal ri suʼ on jas roqʼibʼal ri tun?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri rukʼa wakax man qas ta utz ri roqʼibʼal kresaj, ¿jachin kʼu kusukʼumaj ribʼ riʼ chuxeʼ kan ri chʼoʼj?
Xoqujeʼ ri ix, we ri iwaqʼ man kresaj ta jun utz tzij, ¿jas retaʼmaxik kkibʼan ri winaq ri jas taq uwach kibʼij ix? Xa junam riʼ rukʼ che ri ix kixchʼaw pa kyaqiqʼ chikaj.
Pa ri uwachulew kʼo kʼi taq uwach chʼabʼal, e man kʼo ta jun che mata kʼo ucholajil.
We ri in, man wetaʼm ta ri uqʼijil ri chʼabʼal, in jacha jun winaq riʼ che xaq kroqʼrotik riʼ chuwach ri jun che kinuchʼabʼej, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri jun winaq che kinuchʼabʼej in jun kroqʼrotik riʼ chnuwach in.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri ix che kiwaj ri usipanik ri uxlabʼal sibʼalaj chitzukuj bʼaʼ unojisaxik iwibʼ chrech arech kiyak ri Komon Tyox.
Xa rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri jun che kchʼaw pa taq chʼabʼal, rajawaxik kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos arech kuta chrech che kkowin che uqʼalajisaxik ri utzalaj tzij ri areʼ.
Rumal rech che we ri in, kinchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pa chʼabʼal, kchʼaw na kʼuriʼ ri wuxlabʼal rukʼ ri Dyos, kʼatekʼut man kʼo ta upatan riʼ chrech ri nuchomabʼal.
¿Jas kʼu kinbʼan na waʼ? Ri in kinchʼaw waʼ rukʼ ri Dyos rukʼ ri wuxlabʼal, xoqujeʼ kinchʼaw waʼ rukʼ ri Dyos rukʼ ri nuchomabʼal. Kinbʼixoj na waʼ ri jetaq bʼix rukʼ ri wuxlabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ kinbʼixoj na waʼ rukʼ ri nuchomabʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri at xaq xuwi kattewchuʼnik pa ri uxlabʼal, ¿jas kʼu ubʼixik riʼ kubʼano ri jun che man retaʼm taj kubʼij «Amen» chrech ri atewchibʼal, rumal rech che man retaʼm ta ri atzij kabʼij?
Qastzij nakʼut, ri atewchibʼal utz, kʼatekʼut, man kuyak ta animaʼ ri jun winaq chik.
Kinmaltyoxij chech ri Dyos, che ri in kinchʼaw pa nimalaj taq chʼabʼal chiwach ix;
kʼatekʼut pa ri Komon Tyox, are utz, are kwaj che xa jobʼ tzij kinbʼij rukʼ ri nuchomabʼal, arech ri in keʼintijoj ri enikʼaj chik chrech ri jastaq uwach, are utz riʼ chuwach ubʼixik lajuj mil jastaq uwach pa chʼabʼal.
Eʼachalaxik, pa ri ichomanik; mibʼano jacha ix akʼalabʼ; are chibʼanaʼ jacha ix akʼalabʼ pa ri itzelal, xa ne are chibʼanaʼ qas ix riʼjabʼ chik pa ri utz taq ichomanik.
Tzʼibʼatalik pa ri Tzij: Kumal eriʼjabʼ winaq che kechʼaw pa jun chi wi chʼabʼal, e rumal ri kichiʼ ejun wi taq winaq chik keʼinchʼabʼej na we winaq riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ rukʼ weriʼ chi man kinkita ta wi, kcha ri Ajawxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri taq chʼabʼal, man kʼutbʼal ta chkech ri ekojonelabʼ, xa neʼ are kʼutbʼal chkech ri man kʼo ta kikojonik: kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos man kʼutbʼal ta chkech ri man kʼo ta kikojonik xa ne are kʼutbʼal chkech ri ekojonelabʼ.
We kimulij iwibʼ ri ix Ixkomon Tyox, kʼatekʼuriʼ kixchʼaw pa taq chʼabʼal, e kok ubʼi jun che man retaʼm ta weriʼ on jun che man kʼo ta ukojonik, ¿la man kkibʼij ta riʼ che ri ix, ix chʼuʼj taq winaq?
Kʼatekʼut, we konojel kkibʼij jun tzij rech qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ kok ubʼik jun che man kʼo ta ukojonik on kok ubʼi jun che man retaʼm ta weriʼ, konojel riʼ kyajanik chrech ri areʼ e konojel riʼ kkibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ;
ri areʼ kukʼut riʼ ri kʼuʼtalik kʼo pa ri ranimaʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuxulbʼaʼ riʼ ri uwach cho ri uwachulew, kuqʼijilaj riʼ ri Dyos e kubʼij riʼ che qastzij kʼo ri Dyos chixoʼl ix.
Jeʼ na kʼut achalaxik, ¿jas ukʼisik kinbʼan we tzij riʼ? Aretaq chiʼ kimulij iwibʼ ix, iwonojel kuyaʼo, kibʼan jun bʼix, jun tzij, kiqʼalajisaj jun jas uwach che kʼuʼtalik, kebʼ oxibʼ tzij pa jun chʼabʼal, jun tzij rech qʼaxebʼal tzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ chibʼanaʼ ronojel arech kyakataj ri Komon Tyox.
We kbʼan jun tzij pa jun chʼabʼal, chichʼaw bʼaʼ xa ekebʼ on xa eʼoxibʼ, chkijujunal kechʼawik, kchʼaw jun aretaq xchʼawtaj ri jun chik; kʼatekʼuriʼ xa jun ksolow uwach ri tzij.
We man kʼo ta jun qʼaxel tzij, mixchʼaw bʼaʼ matzalik bʼaʼ chixkanaj pa ri Komon, chixchʼaw bʼaʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, xa bʼaʼ ekebʼ on xa eʼoxibʼ chichʼawoq e ri enikʼaj chik chkibʼanaʼ ri qʼatojtzij.
We jun chkech ri etʼuyulik kʼo jun kʼuʼtalik jas uwach kraj kuqʼalajisaj; machʼaw bʼaʼ ri jun nabʼe.
Rumal rech che iwonojel kixkowinik kiqʼaxej utzij ri Dyos, kchʼaw jun aretaq xchʼawtaj jun chik, arech konojel kkʼojiʼ ri ketaʼmabʼal e kkʼojiʼ jun tzij rech saqarisabʼal pa ri qʼequʼmal.
Ri kuxlabʼal ri eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos chi keniman wi chkiwach ri eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos;
rumal rech che ri Dyos man jun Dyos taj rech chʼoʼj, xaneʼ Dyos rech ri jaʼmaril, jacha pa ronojel taq Komon Tyox kech ri eʼutz taq winaq.
Michʼaw ri ixoqibʼ pa taq ri komon, rumal rech che man yaʼtal ta chkech kechʼawik, are chenimanoq jacha kubʼij ri Tzij.
We ri eʼareʼ kkaj kʼo ketaʼmaj puwiʼ jun jas uwach, chkitaʼ chkech ri kachajil pa taq kachoch; rumal rech che man utz taj, itzel we kchʼaw jun ixoq pa Komon Tyox.
¿La pa ri Ikomon puch xel wi uloq ri Utzij ri Dyos? On, ¿la xaq opaninaq pa ri ikomon ix?
We kʼo jun winaq kuchomaj che ri areʼ jun qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos on che kʼo ri ukʼaslemal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel rukʼ, chrilaʼ, chukʼamaʼ uqʼabʼ pa we tzij che kintzʼibʼaj in chiwech riʼ che jun upixabʼ ri Ajawxel.
We man kretaʼmaj ta we tzij riʼ, xoqujeʼ ri Dyos man kretaʼmaj ta uwach ri areʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼuriʼ ixwachalal, chiwaj bʼaʼ ri sipanik che kixuʼuxirsaj ix qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ meʼiqʼatuj meʼiqʼil ri winaq che kechʼaw pa taq chʼabʼal.
Kʼatekʼut, ronojel utz chibʼanaʼ e pa nimalaj jaʼmaril.
Eʼachalaxik, kinnaʼtisaj chiwech, ri Utzalaj Tzij che xinbʼij chiwech e che xikʼam ri ix, e che utz ikʼolem ibʼanom chupam;
ri Utzalaj Tzij che xoqujeʼ kixukol na we qas kikʼolo pa ri iwanimaʼ jeriʼ jacha ubʼixik xinbʼij in chiwech, we man jeriʼ, man kʼo ta nu upatan riʼ che xixkojonik.
Nabʼe xinyaʼo, xinbʼij chiwech ri xinkʼam in: che ri Kristo xkamik rech toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach chuwach ri qamak jeʼ jas tzʼibʼatalik
che xmuqik, che xkʼastaj uwach pa ri urox qʼij jacha ri tzʼibʼatalik,
che xukʼut ribʼ chuwach ri Sefas, kʼatekʼuriʼ chkiwach chik ri ekabʼlajuj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, junam ukʼutik ribʼ xubʼano chkiwach ejobʼ oʼkʼal eqachalal rukʼ kebʼ oxibʼ uwiʼ –ekʼi chkech ri eʼareʼ ekʼo na kamik riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ ekʼo nikʼaj chik che ekaminaq chik–
kʼatekʼuriʼ chi are chi xukʼut ribʼ chuwach ri Santiʼago kʼateʼ chik chkiwach konojel ri etaqoʼnelabʼ.
E pa ri ukʼisbʼalil kanoq xoqujeʼ xukʼut ribʼ chnuwach ri in, che in jeriʼ jacha jun akʼal che ktzaq uloq cho ri uchuch upam ri unan.
Rumal rech, che ri in, are inlaj nitzʼ chkixoʼl ri etaqoʼnelabʼ; ri in che man taqal ta chwij che kbʼix taqoʼnel chwech, rumal rech che ri in xinwoqataj ri Ukomon Tyox ri Dyos.
Rumal ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos che jewaʼ ri nubʼantajik in kamik riʼ e ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos wachininaq pa ri nukʼaslemal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xanʼe are nim chi na ri nuchak chuwach ronojel ri kichak eʼareʼ: Man in ta kʼut, xane are ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos che kʼo wukʼ ri in.
Xa rumal kʼuwaʼ, ri eʼareʼ e ri in, are waʼ ri qakʼutunik. E weriʼ, ri ix xikojo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kbʼixik che xkʼastaj uwach ri Kristo chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ¿jas kʼu che, che ekʼo nikʼaj chixoʼl ri ix, che kkikochʼo kkibʼij che man kʼo ta kʼastajibʼal wach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ?
We man kʼo ta kʼastajibʼal wach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, xoqujeʼ man xkʼastaj ta kʼu uwach riʼ ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we man xkʼastaj ta uwach ri Kristo, man kʼo ta ukʼuʼx riʼ ri qatzij, xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta ukʼuʼx riʼ ri qakojonik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ na kʼuriʼ, ri uj, uj itzel taq qʼataltzij chuwach ri Dyos, rumal rech che xqaya ubʼixik puwiʼ ri Dyos che ri areʼ xuwaʼlisaj uwach ri Kristo, kʼatekʼuriʼ man xuwaʼlisaj ta kʼu uwach, we qastzij che man kkʼastaj ta kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Rumal rech, che we man kkʼastaj ta kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ, xoqujeʼ, ri Kristo, man xkʼastaj ta uwach riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we man xkʼastaj ta uwach ri Kristo, man kʼo ta ukʼuʼx riʼ ri ikojonik; e ixkaminaq na riʼ pa ri imak.
Xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ che xewar ubʼi rukʼ ri Kristo, xesach na kʼuriʼ.
Ri uj we xaq xuwi pa we qakʼaslemal riʼ qayaʼom ri qeyeʼbʼal chrij ri Kristo, nimalaj koqʼex qawach riʼ kumal konojel ri winaq.
¡Man jeriʼ ta kʼut! Ri Kristo xkʼastaj uwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, are nabʼe chkixoʼl ri xewarik.
Rumal rech, we ri kamikal xpetik rumal jun achi, xoqujeʼ, ri kʼastajibʼal wach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, kpe riʼ rumal jun achi.
Junam na kʼut, jeriʼ che konojel kekam pa ri Adam, xoqujeʼ, konojel kʼo jun kʼakʼ kikʼaslemal pa ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, konojel pa ri kikʼolbʼal: are nabʼe ri Kristo e xas eʼare chi ukoq ri eʼuwinaq ri Kristo pa ri Upetbʼal ri areʼ.
Eʼare chi ri ukʼisbʼalil chik, aretaq chiʼ kujach na ri Rajawibʼal chrech ri Tatxel, aretaq chiʼ xchʼakʼtaj rumal ri areʼ ronojel nabʼe kʼolbʼal, ronojel kowinem e ronojel chuqʼabʼ.
Rumal rech che rajawaxik kajawinik xas kʼateʼ na keʼukoj konojel ri eʼukʼulel chuxeʼ ri raqan.
Ri kʼisbʼal ukʼulel che kchʼakan na ri Areʼ puwiʼ, are ri kamikal riʼ;
rumal rech che kukoj ronojel jas uwach chuxeʼ raqan. Kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ kubʼij: «Ronojel xchʼaktajik uchanim riʼ», man kubʼij ta riʼ che kok ri Areʼ che are kchʼakan puwiʼ ronojel chuwach ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ, ronojel jas uwach kniman na chrech ri Areʼ, ri Kʼojolxel kniman na riʼ chrech ri Areʼ, che uchʼakom ronojel jas uwach arech kuxik rech ri Areʼ, arech ri Dyos, kuxik pa ronojel uwach ri ikʼas wi konojel ri winaq.
Weta mat jeriʼ, ¿jas kkichʼak riʼ ri eʼareʼ che kkikʼam ri qasnaʼ pa kitoqʼobʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ? We qastzij che man kkʼastaj ta kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ, ¿jas kʼu che kkʼam ri qasnaʼ pa ri kitoqʼobʼ ri eʼareʼ?
Xoqujeʼ ri uj, ¿jasche, che pa ronojel kajbʼal kqaya qibʼ pa ri kʼax?
Ronojel qʼij, ri in, in kʼo chunaqaj ri kamikal, qastzij na kʼut ix achalaxik, ix ri nuqʼijil pa ri Kristo Jesus, ri Qajawxel.
We rukʼ uchomanik winaq xinchʼoʼjin kukʼ ri echikop pa ri Efeso, ¿jas kʼu xinchʼako? We man kkʼastaj ta kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ, chujwoʼq bʼaʼ, chujqumum bʼaʼ, rumal rech che kujkam waʼ chweʼq kabʼij.
Mixsach bʼaʼ: «Ri itzel taq achiʼl kketzelaj uwach ri utz kʼaslemal».
Qas chixkʼastaj bʼaʼ e mixmakunik, rumal rech che ekʼo nikʼaj chixoʼl ix che man kʼo ta jun jas uwach ketaʼm puwiʼ ri Dyos. Kinbʼij weriʼ, rech ikʼixbʼal ri ix.
Kʼatekʼut, kʼo jun waʼ kubʼij na, ¿la che kkʼastaj kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ? ¿Jas rukʼ kibʼaqil ketzalijik?
¡Kʼaxalaj uchʼabʼexik waʼ! Ri ijaʼ che katiko, man kuya ta jun kʼakʼ kʼaslemal wema kkamik.
Ri ijaʼ che katik at, man are ta riʼ ri bʼaqilal kkʼiy uloq, xane junlaj ijaʼ riʼ, junlaj uwach triko on uwach jun chik tikoʼn.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos kuya jun bʼaqilal chrech jeriʼ jas kel pa ri ukʼuʼx, kuya chrech ronojel uwach ijaʼ jun bʼaqilal.
Ronojel taq bʼaqilal man junam taj, jun wi chi bʼaqilal ri winaq, jun wi chi kibʼaqilal ri echikop, jun wi chi kibʼaqilal ri echikop ajuwokaj, jun wi chi kibʼaqilal ri kar.
Xoqujeʼ ekʼo bʼaqilal rech ri kaj e ekʼo bʼaqilal rech ri uwachulew, kʼatekʼut jun riʼ ri kiqʼijil ri ebʼaqilal rech ri kaj e jun chi riʼ ri kiqʼijil ri bʼaqilal rech ri uwachulew.
Jun riʼ ri uqʼijil ri qʼij, jun chi riʼ ri uqʼijil ri ikʼ, jun chik ri uqʼijil ri taq chʼumil. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uqʼijil jun chʼumil man junam ta rukʼ ri uqʼijil jun chik chʼumil.
Xoqujeʼ, jeʼ nakʼuwaʼ pa ri kʼastajibʼal kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ: ktikik ri kqʼay uwach, kkʼastaj uwach pa ri man kqʼay ta uwach;
ktikik ri kʼixbʼal e kkʼastaj uwach pa ri nimalaj uqʼijil; ktikik ri tuqaʼril, kkʼastaj uwach pa ri chuqʼabʼalil;
ktikik jun winaq pa ri ukʼaslemal chuwachulew kkʼastaj uwach pa jun uxlabʼal bʼaqilal. We kʼo ukʼaslemal jun bʼaqilal rech uwachulew, xoqujeʼ kʼo jun uxlabʼal bʼaqilal.
Tzʼibʼatalik weriʼ: Ri nabʼe winaq, ri Adam, jun kʼaslikalaj chomanik; ri kʼisbʼal Adam, uxlabʼal che kuya ri kʼaslemal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man are ta ri uxlabʼal ri kpe nabʼe, xane are nabʼe kpe ri ukʼaslemal ri bʼaqilal chuwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ pa ukabʼ kpe ri uxlabʼal.
Ri nabʼe winaq, che kel ubʼi pa ri ulew, ri areʼ, rech ri uwachulew, ri ukabʼ, kpe chi pa ri kaj.
Jeʼ jas ri winaq rech ri uwachulew, xoqujeʼ kepe na riʼ ri eʼareʼ che erech ri uwachulew; jeʼ jas ri winaq rech ri kaj, xoqujeʼ kepe na riʼ ri eʼareʼ erech ri kaj.
Jeriʼ nakʼut, ri uj che xqukʼaj ubʼi ri uwachbʼal ri winaq rech ri uwachulew, xoqujeʼ ri uj kaqukʼaj na riʼ ri uwachbʼal ri winaq rech ri kaj.
Kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech, eʼachalaxik: ri bʼaqilal e ri kikʼel man kuya taj kechbʼej ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ ri kqʼayik man kuya taj krechbʼej ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ ri sachibʼal man kuya taj krechbʼej ri man sachibʼal taj.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in kinbʼij jun kʼuʼtalik jas uwach chiwech: Man kujkam ta waʼ qonojel, kʼatekʼut qonojel waʼ kujkʼextaj na.
Chi pa aninaq, chi chanim waʼ chi pa jun yubʼyatem woqʼochaj, pa ri ukʼisbʼal ri roqʼbʼal rukʼaʼ wakax, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkʼastaj kiwach riʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ e man keqʼay ta chi riʼ, e ri uj, kujkʼextaj na riʼ.
Rumal rech che rajawaxik, ri jun che kqʼayik kukoj ri ratzʼyaq ri man kqʼay taj; ri jun che kkamik kukoj ri ratzʼyaq ri man kkam taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ, we ubʼantajik ri bʼaqilal riʼ che kqʼay waʼ, kuratzʼyaqisaj ribʼ che ri man kqʼiy ta waʼ, e we jun ubʼantajik bʼaqilal riʼ che kkam na waʼ kuratzʼyaqisaj ribʼ che ri man kkam ta waʼ; chi ukamik, chi uchanim kʼuriʼ, qastzij kbʼantaj riʼ ri tzij tzʼibʼatalik: Ri kamikal xbʼiqʼitajik ubʼi pa ri chʼakanik.
Kamikal, ¿jawiʼ kʼo wi ri achʼakanik? Kamikal, ¿jawiʼ kʼo wiʼ ri achoqʼbʼal?
Ri uchoqʼbʼal ri kamikal, are le makaj e ri uchuqʼabʼ ri makaj are ri Qʼatojzij.
Kʼatekʼut, nimalaj maltyoxibʼal chrech ri Dyos, che kuya ri chʼakanik chqech rumal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo!
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, ix loqʼalaj taq wachalal, ko chixkʼoloq, mixkʼextajik, utz chixbʼinoq pa ri uchak ri Ajawxel, qas saq chiwach, qas iwetaʼm che ri ichak man xaq ta kkʼis ku uwach pa ri Ajawxel.
Puwiʼ ri kikuchubʼal ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, xoqujeʼ ri ix chibʼanaʼ ri tzij che xintaqan chkech ri Komon Tyox rech ri Galasiʼa.
Pa ri nabʼe qʼij rech ri xmano ronojel winaq chutasaʼ apanoq ri pwaq che xtoʼtajik pa ri rachoch, man are ta keyeʼxik uyaʼik ri kuchbʼal aretaq chiʼ kinopan in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ, in kʼo chixoʼl ri ix, kintaq na ubʼi riʼ jun wuj kukʼ ri winaq che xeʼichaʼ ix, arech kkikʼam ubʼi pa Jerusalem ri isipanik ix;
e we xoqujeʼ rajawaxik kinbʼe in, kebʼe na kʼu riʼ ri eʼareʼ wukʼ in.
Kinbʼe na riʼ pa ri itinimit, aretaq chiʼ xinqʼaxtaj kanoq pa ri Masedoniʼa; rumal rech, che ri in kinqʼatan na waʼ pa ri tinimit Masedoniʼa;
weneʼ kinkanaj na pa ri itinimit e weneʼ kinqʼaxaj ronojel ri qʼälaj iwukʼ, arech ri ix kinikʼam na ubʼik chi pa ri kʼolbʼal jawijeʼ rajawaxik che kibʼe na wi.
Rumal rech, che ri in, man kinwaj taj che xaq pa nuqʼaxebʼal kixinwil ubʼik; kinweyeʼj che kinkanaj kebʼ oxibʼ ikʼ pa ri itinimit, we jeriʼ kraj ri Ajawxel;
kʼatekʼut, chi kinkanaj kan wi pa ri Efeso chi kʼateʼ na ri Pentekostes;
rumal rech che nimalaj tortajinaq jun uchiʼja chnuwach arech kinchakunik, kneʼbʼaʼ sibʼalaj ekʼi ri eqakʼulel.
We kopan ri Timoteʼo iwukʼ, chichajij bʼaʼ ri areʼ, arech man kuxibʼij ta ribʼ chixoʼl, rumal rech, che xoqujeʼ ri areʼ kchakun pa ri uchak ri Ajawxel, jacha ri in.
Mata bʼaʼ kʼo jun winaq kretzelaj uwach ri areʼ. Chikʼamaʼ ubʼi ri areʼ pa ri jaʼmaril arech kpe wukʼ in, ri in, kinweyeʼj ri areʼ kukʼ ri eʼachalaxik.
Puwiʼ ri qachalal Apolo, ri in sibʼalaj nubʼim chrech ri areʼ che kwaj kbʼe kukʼ ri eʼachalaxik pa ri itinimit ix; kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, man kraj ta ri areʼ weriʼ; kbʼe na riʼ aretaq chiʼ loqʼ kbʼek.
Chixchajinoq, ko chixkʼol pa ri ikojonik, ri ix che ix achijabʼ qas ix ko taq achijabʼ.
Ronojel jas uwach, chibʼanaʼ rukʼ loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx pa ri itinimit.
Jun chik pixabʼ ix achalaxik. Ri ix, iwetaʼm che ri Estefanas e ri erachalal paja kʼolbʼal, eʼare nabʼe taq uwach ri Akaya xuyaʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼareʼ xeʼok che kipatanaxik ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Ri ix, xoqujeʼ chinimaj kitzij we achijabʼ riʼ e ri kitzij konojel ri kechakun kukʼ e ri kekos kukʼ.
Sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik rumal rech xepetik ri Estefanas, ri Fortunato e ri Akaʼiko aretaq chiʼ ixelenaq ubʼik ri ix.
Ri eʼareʼ xkiʼutzirisaj ri nuchomanik e ri ichomanik ri ix. Nim cheʼiwilaʼ wi we eʼachijabʼ riʼ.
Ri Komon Tyox rech ri Asiʼa kkiya chiwech jun rutzil iwach. Ri Akila e ri Priska, xoqujeʼ ri ewinaq che kkimulij kibʼ pa ri kachoch, kkiya ubʼi jun rutzil iwach.
Konojel ri eʼachalaxik, kkiya ubʼi jun ru- tzil iwach. Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil iwach chixoʼl rukʼ ri tyoxlaj tzʼubʼanik.
Ri jun rutzil iwach, kbʼe rumal ri nuqʼabʼ in, ri in che in Pabʼlo.
We kʼo jun che man kraj ta uwach ri Ajawxel, ¡ri areʼ anatema riʼ! «Marana tha».
Chakanaj bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri utoqʼobʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus.
Iwonojel kixinloqʼoqʼej pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri Pabʼlo, Apostol rech ri Kristo Jesus rumal ri urayibʼal ri Dyos; e ri Timoteʼo che jun achalaxik; chrech ri Ukomon Tyox ri Dyos che kʼo pa ri Korinto e chkech konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ronojel ri Akaya;
chiwech ix kqaya apanoq jun rutzil iwach rech ri Dyos che Qatatxel e jun rutzil iwach rech ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Tewchiʼtalik ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos, ri Utatxel ri Qajaw Jesus Kristo, ri Tatxel rech ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e Dyos rech ronojel kubʼisabʼal kʼuʼx
ri Areʼ che kubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx pa ronojel kʼax kqariqo, arech ri uj, rukʼ ri kuʼbʼisabʼal kʼuʼx riʼ che qakʼamom xas rukʼ ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ kqakubʼisaj kikʼuʼx enikʼaj chik pa ronojel kʼax kkiriqo.
Rumal rech che jeriʼ nakʼut che kʼo sibʼalaj kʼax rech ri Kristo rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik qawach, xoqujeʼ rumal ri Kristo, ri uj kʼo nimalaj kubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx.
¿La uj kʼo uj pa ri kʼax? Weriʼ, xa rajawaxik arech kpe kuʼbʼisabʼal ikʼuʼx e ri ikolotajem, ¿la kʼo kubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx uj? Weriʼ, rajawaxik arech kpe ri kubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx, che kuyaʼ ri chuqʼabʼ chiwech ri ix pa ri kʼax che xoqujeʼ kqakʼaxkʼolij ri uj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, qas qakubʼaʼm ri qeyeʼbʼal chiwij ix. Ri uj qetaʼm che we ix kʼo qukʼ pa ri kʼachaqijchiʼ, xoqujeʼ ix kʼo riʼ qukʼ pa ri kubʼisabʼal kʼuʼx.
Ri uj, man kqaj taj che ri ix mata kiwetaʼmaj, ix achalaxik: Ri kʼax che xqakʼulmaj pa ri Asiʼa are sibʼalaj nim chuwach ri qachuqʼabʼ kʼolik, xoqujeʼ man xqeyeʼj taj che kujkʼasiʼk.
Ri uj, qas kʼo ri qʼatbʼaltzij rech kamikal paqawiʼ, arech ri uj, qetaʼm che man kqajikibʼaʼ ta qakʼuʼx chbʼil qibʼ; are ne kqajikibʼaʼ qakʼuʼx chrij ri Dyos che kuwaʼlisaj kiwach ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Are areʼ, xutoʼ qawach chuwach ri kamikal e xoqujeʼ kutoʼ chi na qawach riʼ; rukʼ ri areʼ kʼo wi ri qeyeʼbʼal che kujutoʼ chi na jumul riʼ.
Ri ix, kixchakun na riʼ qukʼ ri uj xas rukʼ ri ichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos paqawiʼ ri uj, arech ri utzil kqariq ri uj kumal ekʼiʼ winaq, xoqujeʼ ekʼi winaq bʼaʼ chemaltyoxinoq paqawiʼ ri uj.
Ri rumal che nimal kqabʼan uj, are ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri qachomanik che rukʼam qabʼe pa we uwachulew; kʼatekʼuriʼ iwukʼ ix are ri tyoxil e ri utzil che petinaq uloq xas rukʼ ri Dyos, e man rukʼ ta ri unoʼjbʼal ri bʼaqilal, xane are rukʼ ri usipanik ri Dyos.
Ri uj, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach chik kqatzʼibʼaj chiwech, xane xuwi ri kixkowin che usikʼixik e che uchʼobʼik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinweyeʼj che qas tzʼaqat uchʼobʼik na kibʼano.
Ri ix ichʼobʼom chi jubʼiqʼ, che uj nakʼut are ri nim qiqʼijil iwukʼ e ri ix are nim iqʼijil qukʼ ri uj pa ri Uqʼijil ri Qajawxel Jesus.
Rukʼ we nujikibʼam riʼ, ri in are qas xinwaj kinopan nabʼe pa ri itinimit, arech ri ix kkʼojiʼ jun ukabʼ isipanik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas pa ri itinimit welik ubʼik, kwaj kinbʼe pa ri Masedoniʼa e pa ri nutzalijik chi uloq pa ri Masedoniʼa kwaj chi kinopan pa ri itinimit e kwaj che ri ix kinikʼam ubʼik chi pa ri Judeʼa.
Aretaq chiʼ jeriʼ xinchomaj. ¿La man utz taj ri xinchomaj? On pa ri bʼaqilal petinaq wi uloq ri nuchomanik, xa jekʼuriʼ kʼo wukʼ in ri jaʼe, e ri man jaʼe taj.
Jeriʼ jacha ri Dyos che man kukʼex ta ri utzij, ri qachʼawibʼal iwukʼ man kebʼ ta uwach: jaʼe e man jaʼe taj.
Rumal rech, che ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos ri Kristo Jesus, che xqayaʼ ubʼixik ri uj chixoʼl ri ix: ri Silbʼano, ri Timoteʼo e ri in; man kebʼ ta uwach: jaʼe e man jaʼe taj; pa ri Areʼ xuwiʼ xkʼojiʼ ri «Jaʼe».
Ronojel ri tzij ujikibʼam ubʼixik ri Dyos, pa ri Areʼ uriqom wi ri Jaʼe; e rumal kʼuriʼ ri Areʼ, ri uj kqabʼij «Amen» chrech ri Dyos arech kʼo nimalaj uqʼijil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are ri Areʼ ri kyaʼow qachuqʼabʼ ri uj e xoqujeʼ chiwech ri ix rukʼ ri Kristo, ri Areʼ che xujujiʼonsaj, ri Areʼ are ri Dyos.
Ri Areʼ che xujutʼiqo e xuya pa ri qanimaʼ ri nabʼe usipanik: ri Uxlabʼxel.
Ri in, kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech chuwach ri Dyos, arech man kinbʼan ta ri kʼax chiwech, che ri in, we man inbʼenaq ta chi jumul pa ri Korinto xane are rumal che ix ri kixinwil apanoq.
Ri uj, man xa ta are kqaj kujtaqan puwiʼ ri ikojonik; man jeʼ ta riʼ, ri uj xane are kujtobʼan rukʼ ri ikiʼkotemal rumal rech che kʼo ri ichuqʼabʼ pa ri ikojonik.
Pa wech wi ri in, xinchomaj che man rukʼ ta chik ri bʼis kintzalej pa ri itinimit.
Rumal rech che we wumal in kixbʼisonik, ¿jachin kʼu kkowin riʼ kuyaʼ nukiʼkotemal we man kʼo ta ri areʼ ri xinya ubʼis ri in?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ; we ri in xintzʼibʼaj ri jastaq chiwech che ri iwetaʼm, xinbʼano, arech ri in man kinbʼison taj aretaq chiʼ kinel ubʼik pa ri itinimit e xa rumal kech ri eʼare che xas rajawaxik wi kkiyaʼ ri nukiʼkotemal; ri in xas kinchomaj wi che ri nukiʼkotemal ri in, xoqujeʼ ikiʼkotemal iwonojel ri ix.
Jeʼ nakʼut, pa jun nimalaj kʼax e nimalaj bʼisobʼal pa wanimaʼ, ri in xixintzʼibʼaj rukʼ sibʼalaj oqʼej, e weriʼ man rumal taj arech kkʼojiʼ ibʼis ri ix, xane rumal, arech kiwetaʼmaj ri nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal nukʼuʼx kʼo chiwech ri ix.
We xa rumal jun winaq petinaq ri bʼis, man chwech ta ri in riʼ xuya wi ri bʼis; kʼatekʼut, waʼ weriʼ xas xiya waʼ jubʼiqʼ nubʼis iwonojel.
Chrech we jun achi riʼ xas xuwi taqal riʼ chrech ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri winaq,
kʼatekʼut, are utz riʼ che kisach ri umak e kiyaʼ uchuqʼabʼ, arech man katzaq ta pa jun nimalaj bʼisobʼal.
Sibʼalaj kinta bʼaʼ chiwech che rajawaxik che ri ix kkʼojiʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx rukʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ xixintzʼibʼaj, xinchomaj che xa kixinnaʼbʼej arech kixinwil ri ix we kixnimanik pa ronojel jas uwach.
Kʼatekʼut, chrech ri jun che ri ix kisach ri umak, ri in xoqujeʼ kinsach ri umak; rumal rech che ri mak xinsach uwach in, –we rajawaxik che ri in kinsach makaj– xane iwumal ri ix riʼ chuwach ri Kristo.
Rajawavik che ri uj, man kujsach ta pa uqʼabʼ ri Satanas, rumal rech che ri uj qas qetaʼm ri jetaq uchomanik ri areʼ.
Ri in xinopan pa ri Troada, arech kinyaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri Kristo, kneʼbʼaʼ che jaqatalik jun uchiʼja chwech pa ri Ajawxel,
ri wuxlabʼal man kʼo ta jun utzalaj uxlanem chrech, rumal rech che man xinriq ta ri wachalal Tito. Ri in xinya ri jun rutzil kiwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinbʼe pa ri Masedoniʼa.
Sibʼalaj maltyox bʼaʼ chrech ri Dyos; che pa ronojel mul kujukʼam ubʼi pa ri upetibʼal e che qumal ri uj kuqʼejej pa ronojel kʼolibʼal ri utzalaj kunabʼal rech ri unojibʼal.
Chuwach ri Dyos are uj, ri uj kʼokʼalaj ruxlabʼ ri Kristo chkixoʼl ri kekoltajik e chkixoʼl ri kkisach na kibʼ;
Chkech nikʼaj jun ukʼokʼal che ekʼo pa ri kamikal e keʼukʼam ubʼi pa ri kamikal, e chkech nikʼaj chik jun kʼokʼal che ekʼo pa ri kʼaslemal e keʼukʼam chi ubʼi pa ri kʼaslemal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿jachin kakowin chrech weriʼ?
Qastzij nakʼut, che ri uj, man uj jeriʼ taj ejeʼ jas ri sibʼalaj ekʼi che kkikʼayij ri utzij ri Dyos; ¡Man je ta riʼ! Xane kqabʼan pa ri utzil, jeʼ jas ujtaqom rumal ri Dyos e chuwach ri Dyos kqabʼij wi weriʼ pa ri Kristo.
¿La kujok chi jumul chrech ubʼixik ri utzil paqawiʼ ri uj? On rajawaxik che ri uj kqatzʼibʼaj utzalaj taq wuj chiwach rech uwuqxaʼnik qibʼ on rajawaxik che kqata chiwech ri ix?
Ix, ri ix qawuj tzʼibʼatalik pa ri qanimaʼ, che xas etaʼmatalik e sikʼim kumal konojel ri winaq.
Qastzij nakʼut, ix, ix jun uwuj ri Kristo che ixtzʼibʼatalik man rukʼ ta tzʼajbʼal, xane rukʼ ri Uxlabʼxel rech ri kʼaslik Dyos, man ix tzʼibʼatalik ta cho taq abʼaj, xane ix tzʼibʼatalik cho ri utzʼalamal ri tiʼj e pa taq ri animaʼ.
Are waʼ ri utzalaj kubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx kʼo chuwach ri Dyos rumal ri Kristo che naqaj kʼo wi chech ri Dyos.
Ri uj man kujkowin taj kqabʼij che qukʼ uj petinaq wi jun utz jas uwach, ¡Man je taj! ri qachuqʼabʼ petinaq rukʼ ri Dyos,
ri Areʼ che xujusukʼubʼaʼ, arech kujuxik ujajpatanel chrech jun kʼakʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ, che man rech ta tzʼibʼ, xane tzʼibʼatalik rukʼ ri Uxlabʼxel; rumal rech che ri tzʼibʼ kkamisanik kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Uxlabʼxel kuya kʼaslemal.
Kʼatekʼut, ri upatanajik ri kamikal, che xtzʼibʼax cho ri abʼaj, kʼo sibʼalaj uqʼijil e rumal na kʼuriʼ ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Israʼel man xekowin ta chik kkil ri upalaj ri Moʼises rumal ri uqʼijil ri upalaj che xaq kokʼowik.
¿La man are ta kʼu nim uqʼijil riʼ chuwach weriʼ ri uqʼijil ri patanajik rech ri Uxlabʼxel?
Xa jekʼuriʼ ¡we ri upatanajik ri qʼatbʼaltzij kʼo uqʼijil, nim chi na riʼ ri uqʼijil ri upatanijik ri sukʼil!
We are kqajunumaj ri nabʼe patanijik rukʼ we nimalaj qʼijil riʼ, ri uqʼijil ri nabʼe patanajik man qʼijil ta riʼ.
Rumal rech che we kʼo uqʼijil ri xa jubʼiqʼ kuchiʼjo, sibʼalaj nim chi na uqʼijil riʼ ri jun che kkanaj kan chuwach weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo waʼ we qeyeʼbʼal riʼ, sibʼalaj kʼo qachuqʼabʼ riʼ pa ri qakʼaslemal,
e ri uj man uj jeriʼ taj jeʼ jas ri Moʼises che xukoj jun payuʼ cho ri upalaj arech ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Israʼel man kkil taj ri kkʼis wi ri kʼo ukʼisik.
Kʼatekʼut, xnoj ri kichomabʼal pa ri qʼequʼm. Xa jekʼuriʼ, xas kʼateʼ pa taq we qʼij riʼ, aretaq chiʼ ksikʼix ri qʼeʼl Uchuch Wuj, we payuʼ riʼ xas kʼo na. We payuʼ riʼ majaʼ pakom; rumal rech che xuwiʼ ri Kristo kkowinik kukʼyaq ubʼi riʼ.
Xas kʼateʼ pa taq we qʼij kamik riʼ; ronojel taq mul aretaq chiʼ ksikʼix uwach ri Moʼises, xas kʼo wi jun payuʼ pa taq ri kanimaʼ.
Xuwi aretaq chiʼ jun kkojon chrech ri Ajawxel, kkʼyaqtaj ubʼi riʼ ri upayuʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Ajawxel are ri Uxlabʼxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jawiʼ kʼo wi ri Ruxlabʼ ri Ajawxel, chilaʼ kʼo wi riʼ ri kirbʼal ibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ; qonojel ri uj che man chʼuqatalik ta ri qawach, kqilo jacha rilik kqabʼano pa jun ilbʼal wachaj ri uqʼijil ri Ajawxel, ri uj kujkʼextajik, uj jeriʼ jacha we jun wachibʼal riʼ, kujbʼinik pa jun qʼijil e kujqʼax pa jun qʼijil chik: jeriʼ ri uchak ri Ajawxel, che Uxlabʼxel ri Areʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri uj kʼo we patanajik qukʼ riʼ, rumal riʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos, man kubʼan ta kebʼ qakʼuʼx,
kʼatekʼut, ri uj, xqakʼyaq kanoq ri jun kʼixbʼal che kqamemerisaj qibʼ, ri uj man uj kʼo ta pa ri itzel noʼjibʼal, xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta joʼs xqabʼan rukʼ ri utzij ri Dyos; xane rukʼ ri uqʼalajisaxik ri saqalaj tzij, ri uj, uj utz chuwach ri Dyos puwiʼ ronojel chomabʼal kech winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we chʼuqutal na rukʼ jun payuʼ ri Utzalaj Qatzij, xuwiʼ chʼuqutalik riʼ chkiwach ri winaq che esachinaq.
Chʼuqutalik riʼ chkiwach ri man kekojon taj, ri eʼareʼ che ri kinoʼjbʼal xumoyrisaj ri udyos we uwachulew riʼ xuqʼequʼmaʼrisaj ri kichomanik, arech man kkil taj ri uchubʼlinik ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri uqʼijil ri Kristo, ri Areʼ che uwachbʼal ri Dyos.
Ri uj, man kqayaʼ ta ubʼixik qibʼ uj, xuwi neʼ kqayaʼ ubʼixik ri Kristo Jesus che Ajawxel; ri uj xuwi uj ajpatanelabʼ iwech ix rumal ri Jesus.
Xane xas rumal ri Dyos che xubʼij: tza pa ri qʼequʼm kchuplin ri chäj are ri areʼ kchuplin pa ri qanimaʼ, arech kchuplin ri unoʼj ri uqʼijil ri Dyos che kʼo pa ri uwach ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we jun nimalaj qʼinomal riʼ, ri uj qakʼolom pa xoqʼol taq bʼoʼj, arech we jun nimalaj chuqʼabʼ riʼ, kqʼalajinik che uchak ri Dyos e man qachak ta ri uj.
Ri uj, uj kʼo pa ronojel uwach kʼax, kʼatekʼut man uj takʼalbʼem taj; nimalaj sachibʼal kʼuʼx ujkʼolik, kʼatekʼut, man kubʼan ta kebʼ qakʼuʼx chuwach ri qeyeʼbʼal.
Uj oqatalik, kʼatekʼut man ujwonobʼam ta kanoq; ujkʼyaqom pulew, kʼatekʼut man kʼisom ta tzij paqawiʼ.
Pa ronojel kʼolbʼal, pa ronojel qʼij, ri uj qukʼam pa qabʼaqil ri kʼax rech ri ukamikal ri Kristo, arech, ri ukʼaslemal ri Kristo xoqujeʼ kukʼut ribʼ pa ri qabʼaqil.
Knebʼaʼ, ri uj kʼo ri qakʼaslemal, pa ronojel qʼij kujyaʼtaj pa ri kamikal rumal ri Jesus, arech ri ukʼaslemal ri Jesus, xoqujeʼ kukʼut ribʼ pa ri qabʼaqil che rech kamikal,
xa jekʼuriʼ, ri kamikal kchakun paqawiʼ ri uj e ri kʼaslemal kchakun piwiʼ ri ix.
Kʼatekʼut, ri uj kʼo ri qakojonik rukʼ ri jun uxlabʼal riʼ jeʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri in xinkojonik e rumal kʼuriʼ xinchʼawik, xoqujeʼ ri uj kujkojonik e rumal na kʼuriʼ kujchʼawik,
qetaʼm che ri Areʼ, ri xuwaʼlisaj ri Ajawxel Jesus, xoqujeʼ kujuwaʼlajisaj riʼ ri uj rukʼ ri Jesus e junam qakojik riʼ kubʼano chunaqaj ri Are iwukʼ ri ix.
E weriʼ, ronojel iwumal ri ix, arech kyaʼ ri sipanik chiwech e xa jekʼuriʼ nimalaj maltyoxinik riʼ chrech ri uqʼijil ri Dyos.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, man knitzʼar ta ri qachuqʼabʼ. Kneʼbʼaʼ, ri qatiʼojijal kwilij ubʼik, ri qatiʼojilal, kkʼakʼarik ronojel taq qʼij.
Ri nitzʼalaj kʼax che xa rech jubʼiqʼ, kujusukʼumaj, e kuyaʼ jun nimalaj e jun junalikalaj qaqʼijil.
Chqech ri uj, che man are ta kqil ri jastaq che kqʼalajinik, e xane are kqil ri man kqʼalajin taj; ri jastaq uwach che kqʼalajinik xa jubʼiqʼ kuchiʼjo, e ri jastaq che man kqʼalajin taj xas pa junalik riʼ.
Ri uj qetaʼm, che we jun chijbʼal riʼ –che are qachoch pa we uwachulew riʼ– we kwilin ubʼik, kʼo jun qachoch che xubʼan ri Dyos: jun junalikalaj ja che kʼo chikaj, che man kichak ta kiqʼabʼ ri winaq.
Jeriʼ na kʼut, ri uj kujjiqʼjatik ukamik riʼ e sibʼalaj kqaj kqatzʼyaqij ri qachoch che kʼo chikaj,
kʼatekʼut, ¿jachin retaʼm we uj kʼo na pa we qatiʼojilal riʼ che kqʼiyik on weneʼ elenaq chi chqij?
Jeʼ nakʼut, pa we jun chijbʼaʼl riʼ, ri uj kujjiqʼjatik rukʼ kʼax; rukʼ weriʼ man xa ta kqaj che kqaya kan we qatzʼyaq riʼ, xane are kqaj che kokisax ri jun atzʼyaq chik riʼ chrij we jun riʼ, arech ri kamikal xas pa ri kʼaslemal ktzaq wi.
E ri xbʼanowik arech kʼo weriʼ chqech, are ri Dyos, ri Areʼ che xyaʼow chqech ri nabʼe taq usipanik ri Uxlabʼxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ronojel mul ujnojinaq che ri qachuqʼabʼ, qetaʼm che aretaq chiʼ uj kʼo na pa we qabʼaqilal riʼ, ri qakʼaslemal naj waʼ kʼo wi chrech ri Ajawxel,
rumal rech che kujbʼin pa ri qakojonik e man kujbʼin ta pa jun jas uwach che kilitajik uwach.
Ri uj, kʼo sibʼalaj qachuqʼabʼ e are kqaj kqayaʼ kan we jun bʼaqilal riʼ arech kujjeqiʼ naqaj chrech ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, we kujkanaj kan pa we jun qabʼaqil riʼ on we kqayaʼ kanoq, ri uj kqaj che uj utz chuwach ri Areʼ.
Rajawaxik che ri uj, uj chʼanalik kujkanaj chuwach ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Kristo, arech ronojel winaq chqajujunal kqakʼam ri utojbʼalil ri qachak xqabʼano aretaq chiʼ uj kʼo pa we qabʼaqil, we xqabʼan ri utzil on xqabʼan ri etzelal.
Ri uj che qetaʼm ri xibʼrikil chuwach ri Ajawxel, kqaj che utz kechoman ri winaq, rumal rech che chuwach ri Dyos, ri uj ujchʼanalik ujkʼolik, xoqujeʼ, ri in kinweyeʼj che pa ri iwuxlabʼal xoqujeʼ uj chʼanalik uj kʼolik.
Ri uj, man xa ta xqamajij chi ruqxaʼniʼxik qibʼ chiwach, ri uj xuwi are kqaj kaqaya chiwach jun bʼe arech nim kiwil wi iwibʼ qumal ri uj, xa jekʼuriʼ kixkowinik kitzalij uwach ri kitzij ri jachintaq nim kkil wi kibʼ, rumal ri jastaq che kqʼalajinik e man are ta nim kkil wi kibʼ rumal ri jastaq che kʼo pa ri kanimaʼ.
Jeriʼ nakʼut, we ri uj xsach ri qachomabʼal, waʼ weriʼ xa rumal ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos, e we kʼo ri qanoʼjbʼal, xa rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix.
Rumal rech, che are ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Kristo kbʼanow chqech che nimalaj qachomaj, we xa jun chi winaq xkamik rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik kiwach nimalaj konojel, konojel na kʼuriʼ xoqujeʼ xekamik.
Ri Areʼ xkamik pakiwiʼ nimalaj konojel, arech ri kʼo ri kikʼaslemal, man kʼo ta ri kikʼaselmal xaq pa kech wi ri eʼareʼ, xaneʼ kekʼasiʼ rumal ri Are che xkamik e xkʼastaj uwach kumal ri eʼareʼ.
Ri uj xas ukamik ubʼik riʼ, man kqil ta chi apan jun winaq xuwi rukʼ uchomabʼal winaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we jumul kanoq xqachomaj uwach ri Kristo rukʼ xaq uchomabʼal winaq, ukamik riʼ man jeriʼ ta chik uchomaxik kqabʼano.
Ri jun winaq che kʼo pa ri Kristo, ri areʼ jun kʼakʼ ubʼanik riʼ; ronojel ri riʼj winaq xqʼax riʼ, ri kʼakʼ winaq kʼo chik waral.
Ronojel weriʼ, xas rukʼ ri Dyos kpe wi, ri xbʼanowik che kujutzir rukʼ ri Areʼ rumal ri Kristo e xuyaʼ chqech ri patanijik rech ri kʼamow ibʼ.
Rumal rech che pa ri Kristo kʼo wi ri Dyos che xbʼanowik arech kutzir ri uwachulew rukʼ ri Areʼ. Ri areʼ man xril ta chi jumul ri kimak ri winaq, xane xukoj qukʼ ri uj ri utzij che rech kʼamow ibʼ.
Ri uj ujukʼexwach ri Kristo, je kelik che ri Dyos kubʼij ri utzij qumal ri uj. Ri uj, nimalaj kqata chiwech weriʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Kristo: Chujutzir bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri Areʼ che man retaʼm ta uwach ri makaj, ri Dyos xubʼan makaj chech Areʼ rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach ri uj, arech uj sukʼil rech ri Dyos pa ri Areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj che kujchakun rukʼ ri Areʼ, sibʼalaj kqata chiwech, arech man rukʼ ta itzel kikʼulaj ri usipanik ri Dyos.
Ri areʼ kubʼij: Pa ri utzalaj taq qʼij xatintatabʼej; pa ri uqʼij ri kolotajem xatinkolo. Chiwilampeʼ, kamik riʼ utz ri qʼij, kamik ri uqʼij ri kolotajem.
Man kʼo ta jun winaq kqayaʼ bʼe chrech arech kuriq ri kʼax, arech man kʼo ta itzel tzij kbʼix puwiʼ ri qapatanijik,
xane nimalaj kqawuqxaʼnij qibʼ chuwach weriʼ, che ri uj, uj ajpatanijel rech ri Dyos; rukʼ jun nimalaj chuqʼabʼ pa taq ri kʼax, pa ri tuqaʼril e pa ri bʼisobʼal;
pa taq ri chʼayinem chqech, pa ri cheʼ pa taq chʼoʼj, pa ri kosibʼal, pa taq ri man kujwar ta chaqʼabʼ, pa taq ri wiʼjal;
rumal ri sukʼil, ri noʼjibʼal, ri kochʼonik, ri utzilal pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel, pa ri qastzij loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx,
pa ri saqalaj tzij, pa ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos, rumal ri uchukbʼal ri sukʼil arech ri uj kqatoʼ qibʼ;
pa ri nim kujilitaj wi e pa ri itzel kujilitaj wi, pa ri jalum tzij e pa ri utz taq tzij kbʼix paqawiʼ; kujilitajik jeʼ jas uj joʼs taq winaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj xas kqabʼij wi ri saqalajtzij,
e kbʼan chqech che man chʼobʼtal ta qawach kneʼbʼaʼ konojel ketaʼm qawach; jeriʼ kbʼan chqech che uj winaq che uj kʼo chi pa ri kamikal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, uj kʼaslik taq winaq, kʼajisam qawach, kʼatekʼut man ujkamisam taj;
uj winaqʼ che kujbʼisonik, kʼatekʼut sibʼalaj kujkiʼkotik; uj mebʼaʼibʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj keqaqʼinomarisaj ekʼi winaq; uj winaq che man kʼo ta jun jas rech, kʼatekʼut ronojel kʼo qukʼ.
Ix, ix ajkorinto, ri uj rukʼ nimalaj qanimaʼ xujchʼaw iwukʼ; xqajaqo ri qanimaʼ chiwech.
Ri ix man ixyaʼl ta latzʼ pa ri qanimaʼ, ri uj xas uj yaʼl latzʼ waʼ pa ri iwech ix.
Junam bʼaʼ ukʼaxel chitzalij ix chqech uj; ri in kixinchʼabʼej ri ix jacha ix walkʼuwaʼl, xoqujeʼ bʼaʼ ri ix, chijaqaʼ bʼaʼ ri iwanimaʼ.
Mixbʼe bʼaʼ junam jacha kkibʼan kebʼ wakax che junam kiwach kibʼinik, kukʼ ri man kʼo ta ri kikojonik. ¿Jas ri ujunamtajil ri sukʼil rukʼ ri man kojonik taj? ¿Jas ujunamtajil ri chäj rukʼ ri qʼequʼm?
¿Jas ujunamtajil ri Kristo rukʼ ri Bʼeliʼar? ¿Jas ujunamtajil ri kkojonik rukʼ ri man kkojon taj?
Jas ujunamtajil ri Rachoch ri Dyos rukʼ ri rachoch ri molom taq dyos? Ri uj, uj Rachoch ri kʼaslik Dyos, jacha xubʼij ri Dyos: Ri in kkʼojiʼ na wachoch riʼ chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, e ri in kinbʼe na riʼ pa ri wachoch riʼ; in riʼ in Kidyos e ri eʼareʼ, eʼare enutinimit riʼ.
Rumal kʼuriʼ chixel ubʼik chkixoʼl we winaq riʼ e naj chixkʼol wi chkech ri eʼareʼ, jeriʼ kubʼij ri Ajawxel. Michap jun itzel jas uwach e ri in kixinkʼulaj riʼ.
In riʼ, in itat e ri ix, ix nukʼojol riʼ e ix numiʼal riʼ, jeriʼ kubʼij ri Ajawxel che kʼo sibʼalaj ukowinem.
Ix loqʼalaj taq wech in, rukʼ we taq tzij riʼ, chqachʼajchʼobʼej qibʼ chuwach ronojel itzel che rech bʼaqilal e che rech ri uxlabʼal e chqatyoxrisaj qibʼ pa ri xibʼrikil chuwach ri Dyos.
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ jun qakʼolibʼal pa ri iwanimaʼ. Ri uj, man kʼo ta itzel xqabʼan chrech jun winaq, ri uj man xqabʼan taj arech jun winaq kusach sibʼalaj upwaq, ri uj, man kʼo ta jun winaq xqelaqʼaj uchak.
Ri in, man kinbʼij ta weriʼ chiwech jacha jun qʼatbʼaltzij piwiʼ. Xane kʼateriʼ xinya ubʼixik chiwech che ri ix, ix kʼo pa ri wanimaʼ knebʼaʼ pa ri kʼaslemal on pa ri kamikal.
Ri in xas nukubʼan ri nukʼuʼx chiwij ri ix, ri in sibʼalaj nim kixinwil wi. Ri in, innojinaq che kubʼisabʼal kʼuʼx e innojinaq che sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal pa taq ri kʼax kqakʼowisaj.
Aretaq chiʼ, xujopan pa ri Masedoniʼa, ri qabʼaqil man xuxlan taj, xane pa ronojel kʼolibʼal kʼo sibʼalaj kʼax: jelaʼ kʼo taq ri chʼoʼj e waral riʼ kʼo ri xibʼrikil17.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Dyos che kukubʼisaj kikʼuʼx ri emochʼolik, kukubʼisaj qakʼuʼx ri uj rukʼ ri upetbʼal ri Tito.
Kʼatekʼut, man xuwi ta rumal ri upetbʼal ri areʼ, xane xoqujeʼ, rumal rech che xikubʼisaj ukʼuʼx ri areʼ. Ri are xubʼij chqech che ri ix, ix kʼo pa nimalaj irayibʼal pa ri ikʼuʼx, xubʼij chqech ri kʼax pa ri iwanimaʼ, ri nimalaj toqʼobʼisabʼal nuwach ri in e rukʼ weriʼ, kʼo nimalaj nukiʼkotemal.
We ri in, xinya ri bʼis chiwech rumal ri nuwuj xintzʼibʼaj, man kinoqʼ ta rumal waʼ weriʼ –ri in kinwilo, che we nuwuj riʼ, xuyaʼ jubʼiqʼ bʼisobʼal chiwech–
Kamik riʼ, sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik rumal weriʼ; man xa ta rumal, xixbʼisonik, xane xa rumal che are we bʼisobʼal riʼ xbʼanowik che xikʼex ikʼuʼx. Xixbʼisonik pa ri Dyos; kʼatekʼut rukʼ weriʼ, ri uj, man kʼo ta kʼax xqabʼan uj chiwech.
Ri bʼisobʼal che rumal ri Dyos, are kbʼanowik che jun winaq kukʼeʼx ri ukʼuʼx pa ri kolotajem; kʼatekʼut, ri bʼisobʼal rech we uwachulew are waʼ ri kyaʼow ri kamikal.
Chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ, ri jastaq xubʼan chixoʼl ri bʼisobʼal che rumal ri Dyos. ¡Nim xiwilij wi! ¡Nimalaj sachibʼal mak! ¡Nimalaj oyowal! ¡Nimalaj xibʼrikil! ¡Nimalaj rayibʼal qanimaʼ! ¡Nimalaj kʼajasaxik wachaj! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, xikʼut chqawach che pa ronojel weriʼ, ri ix, ix utz.
Kʼatekʼut, we ri in xixintzʼibʼaj, man rumal ta ri jun ri xbʼin ri itzel taq tzij e man rumal ta ri jun che xtow ri itzel taq tzij. Ri in are xinwaj che kukʼut ribʼ ri utzil chixoʼl chuwach ri Dyos che ri ix kitoqʼobʼisaj qawach uj.
Are waʼ weriʼ ri qas ukubʼisam qakʼuʼx. E xtzʼaqat chi na ri kubʼisabʼal nukʼuʼx rukʼ jun nimalaj kiʼkotemal rumal ri ukiʼkotemal ri Tito, che ri ruxlabʼal ri areʼ jaʼmaril xkʼojiʼk rumal nimalaj iwonojel ix.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in, nuyaʼom nim nuqʼijil chuwach ri areʼ iwumal ri ix, man kinkʼix ta chrech weriʼ. Jeriʼ jeʼ jas ubʼixik qabʼim chiwech pa ronojel jastaq, che are qabʼim ri saqalajtzij, xoqujeʼ nakʼut, aretaq chiʼ qayaʼom qaqʼijil chuwach ri Tito, qastzij nakʼut che xukʼut ribʼ ri saqalajtzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx chiwech ri ix are sibʼalaj nim chi na aretaq chiʼ knaʼtaj chrech che ri ix, ix nimanel chi nimalaj iwonojel; e che xikʼulaj ri areʼ rukʼ xibʼrikil e bʼirbʼitem.
Sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik ri in che kuyaʼo qas kinjikibʼaʼ nukʼuʼx chiwij ri ix.
Achalaxik, ri uj kqaj arech ri ix kiwetaʼmaj ri sipanik xuyaʼ ri Dyos chkech ri Ekomon Tyox rech ri Masedoniʼa.
Knebʼaʼ, kʼo sibʼalaj kʼax xkiriqo, ri eʼareʼ kʼo sibʼalaj kikiʼkotemal, kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ che sibʼalaj emebʼaʼibʼ sibʼalaj kʼi jastaq kech xkiyaʼo.
Ri in kinya ubʼixik che ri eʼareʼ, xkiyaʼo ri kekowin che uyaʼik, xoqujeʼ are nim chi na xkiyaʼo chuwach ri kekowin che uyaʼik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ ronojel kanimaʼ,
sibʼalaj xkikʼomij chqech arech ketobʼanik pa ri patanajik: ri sipanik, che jun utzil chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
E are nim chi na chuwach ri qeyeʼbʼal, ri eʼareʼ xkijach kibʼ, nabʼe chrech ri Ajawxel e pa ukabʼ chqech ri uj, rumal che jeriʼ ri urayibʼal ri Dyos,
xa jekʼuriʼ, xqata chrech ri Tito, arech utz umolik ri pwaq kubʼan chixoʼl ri ix, jeʼ jas xubʼan chixoʼl pa ri umajibʼal uloq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jeriʼ, che ri ix, ix utz pa ronojel: pa ri kojonik, pa ri tzij, pa ri noʼjinik, ri ix, ix aninaq pa ronojel, pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx che xqaqʼaxij chiwech, xoqujeʼ, utzalaj chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ kamik riʼ aretaq chiʼ kimol ri pwaq.
Weriʼ man jun taqanik ta chiwech, xuwi are kwaj chanim riʼ ri utzil chkech ri enikʼaj chik e are kwaj kinwilo we qastzij ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx.
Ri ix iwetaʼm ri usipanik ri Qajaw Jesukristo, ri Areʼ che qʼinom, rech toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix, xumebʼaʼrisaj ribʼ arech ri ix kixqʼinomarik rukʼ che mebʼaʼ ri areʼ.
Kinyaʼ jun pixbʼanik chiwech puwiʼ weriʼ; che xax are waʼ ri utz chiwech ix, rumal neʼ che junabʼir kanoq, ri ix, man xuwi taj che ix nabʼe che ubʼanik e che umolik ri pwaq, xane xoqujeʼ ix ri xixjaqow uchomaxik.
Kamik riʼ, qas utz ubʼanik chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, arech che pa ri ukʼisbʼalil, ri aninaq uchomaxik ubʼanik, qas jeʼ bʼaʼ che eloq, jacha ri kixkowin che uyaʼik.
Rumal rech che aretaq chiʼ aninaq kkʼiy pa ri ranimaʼ ri winaq, kkʼam riʼ ri jastaq kʼo rukʼ kukʼam uloq, e man kta ta riʼ chrech ri man loqʼ taj kuyaʼo.
Man utz ta riʼ che enikʼaj winaq chik kʼo ronojel jastaq kech, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix man kʼo ta chi ijastaq, are rajawaxik che junam ri ijastaq kʼolik.
Ri ukʼuʼx ri ijastaq iwech ri ix, cheʼutoʼ bʼaʼ apanoq ri kirajawaxik ri eʼareʼ pa we uchanim riʼ, arech xas jeriʼ, pa jun qʼij chi apanoq, ri ukʼuʼxal ri jastaq kech ri eʼareʼ kixutoʼ chi uloq ri ix pa ri irajawaxik e xa kʼu jeriʼ pa junamil kkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemal.
Jeʼ jas kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri jun che sibʼalaj kʼo jastaq xumolo, man kʼo ta xtoʼtaj rukʼ e ri jun che xa jubʼiqʼ xumolo, man kʼo ta xubʼan rajawaxik chrech.
Sibʼalaj maltyoxbʼal chrech ri Dyos, che kukoj pa ri ranimaʼ ri Tito ri jun nimalaj toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix,
xukʼam uqʼabʼ ri xqata chrech. Xas uchanim, pa ri uchomabʼal ri areʼ xbʼe pa ri itinimit.
Rukʼ ri areʼ, ri uj xqataq ubʼiʼ ri jun achalaxik che nim kiltaj wi pa ronojel ri Komon Tyox rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij.
E man xuwi ta weriʼ, xane xoqujeʼ eʼareʼ ri Ekomon taq Tyox xesikʼin chrech ri areʼ, arech kokik qachiʼl pa ri qabʼe pa we jun sipanik riʼ, jawiʼ ri kujpatanijik wi ri uj, arech nimalaj uqʼijil ri Ajawxel e che xkʼiy uloq pa ri qanimaʼ.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri uj, man kqaj taj che kujyoqʼik rumal we nimalaj pwaq riʼ che kʼo chqij kqachajij ri uj;
rumal rech, che ri uj kqaj ri utzil chuwach ri Dyos e xoqujeʼ chkiwach ri winaq.
Kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, xoqujeʼ ri uj, kqataq ubʼi ri jun qachalal; ri areʼ che kʼi taq mul e pa ri ubʼantajik, qilom chik che ri areʼ qastzij uyaʼom ri ranimaʼ; e uchanim riʼ qas rukʼ ronojel ranimaʼ kraj ktobʼanik, rumal che sibʼalaj ukubʼaʼm ukʼuʼx chiwij ri ix.
Ri Tito, ri areʼ wachiʼl ri in e wajchak chixoʼl ri ix; ri enikʼaj chik, eʼareʼ ri eʼachalaxik che etaqom ubʼik chkech ri Ekomon Tyox: Eʼare uqʼijil ri Kristo.
Chikʼutuʼ bʼaʼ chkiwach ri Ekomon Tyox ri utzalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx e chijikomaj bʼaʼ chkiwach ronojel ri utzil xintzijoj chiwech ri ix.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, puwiʼ we jun patanajik riʼ che rech utoqʼobʼisaxik kiwach ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, man rajawaxik taj kixintzʼibʼaj apanoq.
Ri in, wetaʼm ri raninaqil ri iwanimaʼ, che rumal nim nuqʼijil chkiwach ri eʼajmasedoniʼa, e kinbʼij chkech ri eʼareʼ: «Ri Akaya xas junabʼir riʼ kisukʼubʼam chi kibʼ», e ri raninaqil ri iwanimaʼ ix, jun nimalaj kʼutbʼal chkiwach sibʼalaj ekʼi winaq chik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas keʼintaq ubʼik ri eʼachalaxik iwukʼ, arech ri nimalaj qaqʼij che xas iwumal ri ix, man kchup ta uwach e arech qas kisukʼubʼaʼ apan iwibʼ jeʼ jas kinbʼij chiwech.
Weneʼ kebʼe ri eʼajmasedoniʼo wukʼ ri in e we man isukʼubʼaʼm ta iwibʼ ix, kixkiriqaʼ na kʼuriʼ, xajekʼuriʼ ri nimalaj qaqʼij iwumal ix kkʼextaj bʼaʼ riʼ pa jun nimalaj qakʼixbʼal e xoqujeʼ nimalaj ikʼixbʼal na kʼuriʼ ri ix.
Xajekʼuriʼ, ri in xinchomaj che rajawaxik kenabʼejik ubʼik ri eʼachalaxik pa ri itinimit, arech kkinabʼisaj usukʼumaxik apanoq ri nimalaj isipanik jacha ri ibʼim uloq, arech qas jun utzalaj sipanik kisukʼumaj apanoq e man je ta riʼ jacha jun xuʼyalaj sipanik.
Chixchoman puwiʼ weriʼ: ri jun che ktikojonik rukʼ xuʼyal, xoqujeʼ rukʼ xuʼyal riʼ kuyak na ri uwach; ri jun che nimalaj ktikonijik, rukʼ nimalaj riʼ kuyak na ri uwach.
Ronojel winaq chuyaʼ bʼaʼ ri jastaq che xuchomaj pa ri ranimaʼ, muyaʼ bʼaʼ pa ri oqʼej on che xa chʼijejem chrech, rumal rech che ri Dyos kuloqʼoqʼej riʼ ri areʼ che kuyaʼ ri jastaq rukʼ kiʼkotemal.
Ri Dyos, kʼo sibʼalaj uchuqʼabʼ arech kuyaʼ chiwech sibʼalaj kʼi taq sipanik, arech ronojel mul ri ix kʼo ri rajawaxik chiwech e ktoʼtaj na uchʼaqataʼq riʼ arech ri ix kixkowinik kibʼan ri utzil,
jeriʼ jas tzʼibʼatalik: Nojinaq uqʼabʼ chrech ri xusipaj; sibʼalaj xuyaʼ chkech ri emebʼaʼibʼ; ri usukʼil junalik kanajinaq kanoq.
Ri Areʼ che sibʼalaj kuyaʼ ri ijaʼ chrech ri ajtikonel e kuyaʼ ri uwa kutijo, xoqujeʼ kuyaʼ na riʼ sibʼalaj ri ijaʼ chiwech ri ix e kupoqʼisaj na riʼ ri uwach e kukʼiyisaj na riʼ ri uwach ri sukʼalaj isipanik.
Ix qʼinom riʼ pa ronojel jastaq, kixkowin na riʼ che kiyaʼ ronojel uwach sipanik e weriʼ kubʼan na riʼ chqech ri uj che sibʼalaj kujmaltyoxin chuwach ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che ri uchak we sipanik riʼ, man xuwi taj kchakun chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, xane xoqujeʼ jun kʼiybʼal rech maltyoxinik chrech ri Dyos.
Rukʼ we jun patanajik riʼ, kukʼutunisaj chiwach ix, ix jachin ri ix, kemaltyoxin riʼ chrech ri Dyos rumal rech che ri ix kixniman chuwach ri ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo e rumal ri nimalaj riqoj iwibʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ e kukʼ chi nimalaj konojel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ rukʼ ri kichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos piwiʼ ri ix, kukʼut ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx kiyaʼom chiwech ri ix, rumal ri sipanik xuqʼejejej ri Dyos piwiʼ ri ix.
Maltyox bʼaʼ chrech ri Dyos rumal ri nimalaj taq usipanik.
Xas in wi ri in Pabʼlo, ri kintow chiwech pa ri ujeʼlal e ri ukmeʼlal ri Kristo, ri in che kinwonej wibʼ chixoʼl ri ix, ri in che sibʼalaj xintij nuchuqʼabʼ iwukʼ aretaq chiʼ man in kʼo ta iwukʼ.
Ri in kinta chiwech: aretaq chiʼ in kʼo chi pa ri itinimit, mata bʼaʼ rajawaxik che ri in kinkoj ri nuchuqʼabʼ iwukʼ, jeriʼ jas ri kinchomaj ri in kukʼ ejujun che kkichomaj che are uj nimanel chrech ri bʼaqilal.
Qastzij nakʼut che ri uj ujkʼaslik pa ri qabʼaqil, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj man kujchʼojin taj chi rumal ri bʼaqilal.
¡Man jet a riʼ! ri jetaq qachukbʼal pa ri chʼoʼj man kʼo ta pa ri bʼaqilal, xane kʼo pa patanajik chech ri Dyos e kkowinik kuwilij ri kowlaj taq ja rech chʼoʼj. Ri uj kqawilij ri tzij che man utz taj,
ronojel nimal chuqʼabʼ che kkʼulelaʼn che ri retambʼal ri Dyos e ronojel chomanik, qokisaj pa qaqʼabʼ arech kqakʼam ubʼik pa ri nimanik chuwach ri Kristo.
E ri uj qasukʼumam qibʼ che ukʼajisaxik uwach ronojel ri man kniman taj, are taq chiʼ che utz ri inimanik ri ix.
Utz rilik, unikʼoxik chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ. We kʼo jun kuchomaj che ri areʼ rech ri Kristo; qas utz uchomanik bʼaʼ chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ pa rech wi weriʼ: we ri areʼ, rech ri Kristo, xoqujeʼ ri uj uj rech riʼ ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ ri in sibʼalaj utz utzijoxik kinbʼan puwiʼ ri uqʼijil ri qakowinem che xuyaʼ ri Ajawxel chqech, arech kqayak iwach ri ix, e man xa ta rumal arech kqakʼis tzij piwiʼ; ri in man kʼo ta kinkʼix riʼ.
Ri in, man kinwaj taj kixinxibʼij rumal taq we nuwuj kintzʼibʼaj chiwech.
Kbʼix nakʼut: «Ri jetaq wuj ktzʼibʼaxik sibʼalaj kʼax ktaqik e sibʼalaj kʼo uchuqʼabʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ubʼantajik ri ubʼaqil aretaq chiʼ kʼo waral xas tuqaʼr wi e ri utzij xas itzel ubʼantajik».
Chuchomaj bʼaʼ pa rech wi ri jun winaq riʼ: ri uj, uj jeriʼ rukʼ ri qatzij aretaq chiʼ kqatzʼibʼaj ri jetaq qawuj, aretaq chiʼ naj uj kʼo wi, xoqujeʼ uj jeriʼ we uj kʼo naqaj, e xas uj jewi pa ri qabʼantajik.
Qastzij nakʼut, ri uj man nimal ta chqech, on man kqajunamatisaj ta qibʼ kukʼ enikʼaj winaq che xas pa kech wi eʼareʼ utz taq utzijoxik kibʼ kkibʼano. Ri eʼareʼ kketaj kibʼ rukʼ ri kichomanik eʼareʼ e kkijunamatisaj aqʼan kibʼ xas kukʼ wi eʼareʼ: ri eʼareʼ, xas man kʼo ta kinoʼj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj man kqakʼut ta riʼ jun nimalaj qaqʼij, xane are qetaj qibʼ riʼ rukʼ ri jun etabʼal xuyaʼ ri Dyos chqech: che xuya chqech kujopan iwukʼ ix.
Rumal rech che man kqayaʼ ta uwiʼ che ubʼixik weriʼ, weta mata xujopan iwukʼ ri ix; ri uj qastzij xujopan iwukʼ rukʼ ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo.
Ri uj man nim ta qaqʼij kqakʼutu rumal kichak enikʼaj chik xkibʼano; xane are kaqeyeʼj rukʼ ri ukʼiyik ri ikojonik ix, kkʼiy chi na ri qaqʼijil uj jacha ri jun qetal xqabʼij kanoq,
che xqakʼam ubʼik ri Utzalaj Tzij chi naj chi na chrech ri itinimit ix; e man kqaj taj kujchakun pa jun kʼolbʼal jawiʼ chakuninaq chik jun chik, e man kqaj taj che kʼo qaqʼijil pa jun chak chik che sukʼumatajinaq chi rumal jun chik.
Ri jun che nimalaj uqʼij kukʼutu, chukʼutuʼ bʼaʼ ri nimalaj uqʼijil pa ri Ajawxel.
Man utz ta riʼ ri jun che nimalaj uqʼij kukʼutu chbʼil ribʼ, xane are nimalaj uqʼij riʼ ri jun che are ri Ajawxel kukʼut nimalaj uqʼij.
¡Kwaj neʼ che weta ri ix kixkowin che uchʼijik jubʼiqʼ che in jun winaq che kʼax nuchʼabʼexik! Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix qas tzij waʼ kiniqʼiʼo20.
Ri in, inachixom chiwech jeriʼ jacha kachixonik ri Dyos chiwech; rumal rech che ri in xinbʼan jun chʼabʼ ali chiwech xuwi rech jun achajilal, arech qas ix jun sukʼalaj qʼapoj ali chuwach ri Kristo21.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinxibʼij wibʼ, che jacha ri Eva, che ri Kumatz xusubʼu rukʼ ri itzel unoʼjibʼal, xoqujeʼ weneʼ ri ix ktzeletaj ri ichomanik e weneʼ kixbʼe naj e kisach ri mochʼochʼem ibʼ chuwach ri Kristo.
Rumal rech che we kpe chi jun winaq che kuya ubʼixik chi jun Jesus che man xinya ta ubʼixik in chiwech kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kikʼam jun chik Uxlabʼxel kʼextal chuwach ri ikʼamom chi ri ix, on kikʼam chi jun Utzalaj Tzij chik che kʼextal chuwach ri xkʼamtaj iwumal; ¡qastzij nakʼut che xaq jaʼe riʼ chiwech!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinchomaj che man in chʼutiʼn ta chkiwach we «enimalaj taq eʼapostol riʼ»22.
We ri in man qas ta kel ri nutzʼij, kʼo neʼ nimalaj taq nunoʼjibʼal, chkiwach konojel e pa ronojel jas uwach, ri uj qakʼutum weriʼ chiwach ri ix.
¿On xinmakun in waʼ, aretaq chiʼ xinyaʼ ubʼixik chiwech ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Dyos e man kʼo ta jun pwaq xinta chiwech, e xoqujeʼ xinqasaj wibʼ arech ri ix nimalaj iqʼij xinyaʼo?
Ri in, xinjol ri jastaq kech enikʼaj chik Komon Tyox, aretaq chiʼ ri in xinkʼam kebʼ oxibʼ pwaq che kech eʼareʼ, arech kixinpatanij ri ix.
E aretaq chiʼ ri in, in kʼo pa ri itinimit e ri in kʼo nurajawaxik, ri in xinwil wibʼ, man in eqaʼn ta chrech jun winaq xinbʼano; eʼareʼ ne ri eʼachalaxik che xepe pa ri Masedoniʼa ri xeyoʼw chwech ri nujastaq che rajawaxik chwech. Ri in man xwaj taj che in eqaʼn chrech jun winaq e xas man kinwaj ta wi weriʼ.
¡Weriʼ, xas rumal ri saqalaj utzij ri Kristo che kʼo wukʼ ri in! We nuqʼijil riʼ man ktoqix ta waʼ chwech pa ri tinimit Akaya.
¿Jas cheʼ? ¿La xa rumal che man kixinloqʼoj ta ri in? ¡Dyos waʼ retaʼm weriʼ!
E ri jastaq che kinbʼano, chi kintaqej na ubʼanik waʼ, arech ri in, kinwesaj ubʼi ronojel jas uwach chkech ri eʼareʼ che kkitzukuj e che are kkaj kejunamtaj qukʼ ri uj rukʼ ri knimarisaj kiqʼij.
Rumal kech, waʼ we winaq riʼ ejoʼs taq eʼapostol, eʼajsubʼunel taq ajpatanibʼ che kkikoj kibʼ jacha eʼapostol rech ri Kristo.
E weriʼ, man sachibʼal kʼuʼx taj, utz nakʼut. Ri Satanas, xoqujeʼ kukoj ribʼ jeriʼ jacha jun utzalaj anjel rech saqil.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, man sachibʼal kʼuʼx ta riʼ, che ri eʼajpataninelabʼ chrech areʼ, che kkikoj kibʼ jacha eʼajpataninelabʼ rech ri sukʼil. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ukʼisbʼal kech, jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ jacha ri kichak.
Ri in, kinbʼij chi jumul chiwech, michomaj bʼaʼ che ri in kʼax nuchʼabʼexik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ kʼax nuchʼabʼexik, chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ uqʼabʼ che in jeriʼ; rajawaxik che xoqujeʼ ri in kuyaʼo kinbʼij jubʼiqʼ ri nuqʼijil.
Ri tzij kinya na ubʼixik chiwech, man kinbʼij taj jeriʼ jacha kraj ri Ajawxel, xane kinbʼij na waʼ in jeriʼ jacha in jun chʼuʼj winaq, e xa jekʼuriʼ kinjikibʼaʼ nukʼuʼx che kʼo riʼ ri rumal xas kinya ri nuqʼijil.
Ekʼi nakʼut ri kkiyaʼ ri nimalaj kiqʼijil rumal ri kibʼaqil, xoqujeʼ ri in kinyaʼ na waʼ nimalaj nuqʼijil.
¡Ri ix sibʼalaj kiwaj keʼiqʼiʼo ri echʼuʼj taq winaq, ri ix che kʼo sibʼalaj inoʼjbʼal!
Ri ix, kiqʼiʼo che kbʼan kʼax chiwech pa ri ichak, che kixtijik, che kixeleqʼaxik, che ketzelax iwach, che kixchʼay cho ipalaj.
Ri in, kinbʼij weriʼ rech ikʼixbʼal ix; kraj ne lo, che ri uj, kujchuqmaʼyik kujkaʼy chiwach ix. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xaq pasach uwach neʼ kukʼut wi ri uchʼuqʼabʼ jun winaq –jun moxil waʼ ri kinbʼij– xoqujeʼ ri in nimal ukʼutik waʼ kinbʼano ri nuchuqʼabʼ.
¿Che ri eʼareʼ eʼajhebʼreʼo? Xoqujeʼ ri in, in ajhebʼreʼo, ¿che eʼajisraʼelita? Xoqujeʼ ri in, in ajisraʼelita, ¿che ri eʼare erijaʼlil ri Abʼraham? Xoqujeʼ ri in, in rijaʼlil ri Abʼraham.
¿Che erajpataninelabʼ ri Kristo? –Kinbʼij jun moxil waʼ– ri in, in nimalaj ajpataninel chi na chkiwach ri eʼareʼ. In nim chi na chkiwach rumal taq ri chak; in nim chi na chkiwach rumal che xintzʼapix pa cheʼ, in nim chi na chkiwach rumal taq ri chʼayinik bʼanom chwech, in nim chi na chkiwach rumal che naqaj inokʼowinaq chuwach ri kamikal.
Jobʼ mul chik, nuriqom pakiqʼabʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo juwinaq bʼelejlajuj chʼayinik rukʼ asyar.
Oxmul chik inchʼiyom rukʼ ri chʼimiʼy; jumul inkʼyaqom chech taq abʼaj; oxmul jutjubʼinaq ubʼi ri nujukubʼ pa ri jaʼ, jumul chik, xinkanaj jun qʼij rukʼ jun aqʼabʼ pa ri upanikʼajal ri polow.
Kʼilaj taq bʼinem; nim taq kʼax rumal ri nim taq jaʼ; nim kʼax kumal taq ri elaqʼomabʼ; kʼax kumal ri eʼnuwinaq; kʼax kumal ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj; kʼax pa taq ri nim taq tinimit; kʼax pa taq ri tzʼinalik taq ulew; kʼax pa taq ri polow; kʼax chkixoʼl ri ejoʼs taq achalaxik,
chak e kosik; kʼi taq aqʼabʼ che man kok ta nuwaram; xinnumik e xchaqij nuchiʼ; kʼi taq qʼij xinmewajik; xinqʼaxij tew e xinqʼaxij in sanalik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kinchʼaʼ taj ri kinchoman puwiʼ ronojel qʼij: ¡ri kinmayow pakiwiʼ konojel ri Ekomon Tyox!
We kʼo jun ktuqaʼrik, ¿la man xoqujeʼ taj kintuqaʼr ri in? We kʼo jun ktzaqik ¿la man kinporoj ta wibʼ ri in?
We rajawaxik che ri in kinkʼut nuqʼijil, kinkʼut bʼaʼ ri nuqʼijil pa ri nutuqaʼril.
Ri Udyos e ri Utatxel ri Qajawxel Jesus, sibʼalaj maltyoxibʼal chrech ri areʼ chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq; ri areʼ retaʼm, che ri in, man xaq ta xinjoʼsnik.
Pa ri Damasko, ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri ajawinel Aretas, xeʼukoj chajinel arech kkichajij ri kitinimit ri eʼajdamasko, arech kinkichapo ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa jun wantana e pa jun chakach, xinkiqasaj uloq ikim cho ri utapya ri tinimit, xa jekʼuriʼ xintoʼtaj pa kiqʼabʼ.
¿La rajawaxik che ri in kinkʼut nuqʼijil? –kneʼbʼaʼ, weriʼ man kʼo ta jun utz kukʼamaʼ uloq– kintzijon na waʼ puwiʼ taq ri jetaq ichiʼkʼ nubʼanom pa ri Ajawxel e ri jetaq uqʼalajisanik xubʼan ri Ajawxel chnuwach.
Ri in wetaʼm uwach jun achi pa ri Kristo, che kajlajuj junabʼ kamik riʼ –che, pa ri ubʼaqil on man pa ubʼaqil taj, man wetaʼm taj, are ri Dyos retaʼm waʼ weriʼ– we achi riʼ, xkʼam ubʼik xas pa urox kaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, wetaʼm, che we achi riʼ –pa ubʼaqil on man pa ubʼaqil taj, are ri Dyos retaʼm waʼ weriʼ–
Wetaʼm che xkʼam ubʼik xas pa ri kikʼolbʼal ri esukʼ winaq che kʼastajinaq chi kiwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ xuta nimalaj taq tzij, che man yaʼtal ta chrech jun achi kubʼij we tzij riʼ.
Kinkʼut na waʼ ri uqʼijil we jun achi riʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri in, xuwiʼ kinkoj na waʼ ri nimalaj nuqʼijil puwiʼ ri nutuqaʼril.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in kinwaj kinkʼut ri nimalaj nuqʼijil, man in jun chʼujlaj winaq bʼaʼ riʼ, qas kinya bʼaʼ ubʼixik riʼ ri saqalajtzij. Kʼatekʼut, kinqʼil wibʼ chrech weriʼ rumal rech che kinxibʼij wibʼ, weneʼ kʼo jun winaq che sibʼalaj utz chi na kuchomaj panuwiʼ chuwach ri krilo on chuwach ri nutzijoxik kbʼanik
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, arech man kkʼojiʼ ta nimalaj nuqʼijil rukʼ taq ri utzalaj taq jastaq che xqʼalajisax chnuwach, ri in xokisax jun kʼax pa ri nubʼaqil jun anjel rech ri Satanas che kinuchʼay cho nupalaj –arech ri in man kkʼojiʼ ta nim nuqʼijil.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, oxmul, nutom chrech ri Ajawxel, arech naj kukʼyaq ubʼi weriʼ chwech ri in.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ xubʼij chwech: «Kubʼan laʼ ri nusipanik nuyaʼom chawech, rumal rech, che ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos, kukʼut ribʼ pa ri tuqaʼril». Xa jekʼuriʼ, rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ, ri in, kinkʼut na waʼ ri nuqʼijil pa ri nutuqaʼril, arech kjeqiʼ wukʼ ri in ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Kristo.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ, ri in sibʼalaj utz kinnaʼo in kʼo pa taq ri nutuqaʼril, pa taq ri nuyoqʼik, pa taq ri kʼax, pa taq ri oqatanik e pa taq ri bʼis oqʼej, rumal rech che in kʼo pa ri utoqʼobʼ ri Kristo; rumal rech che aretaq chiʼ tuqaʼr inkʼolik, ri in kʼo ri nuchoqʼabʼ.
Xa jeriʼ kʼut, ¡chiniwilʼa bʼaʼ, ri in, in jun chʼuʼj winaq!; ix xixbʼanow chwech che inchʼuʼj winaq. Rajawaxik nakʼut weta xiniwuqxaʼnij ri ix che ubʼixik ri utzil panuwiʼ. Rumal rech che ri in man nitzʼ ta nubʼantajik riʼ chkiwach ri «enimalaj taq apostol». riʼ, knebʼaʼ che ri in xas man kʼo ta nubʼantajik.
Ri ubʼantajik jun apostol xas xbʼantajik wi chixoʼl wi ri ix: tzʼaqatalaj chuqʼabʼ pa taq ri kʼax, xoqujeʼ xbʼantajik pa taq ri kʼutbʼal e pa taq ri mayibʼal.
¿Jas ri man xyaʼ ta chiwech ix che xya chkech ri enikʼaj taq Komon Tyox chik? Xuwi neʼ, che ri in man xinta ta nurajil chiwech, ¡Chisachaʼ bʼaʼ we nimalaj numak riʼ!
Chiwilampeʼ, are waʼ ri uroxmul chik, che ri in, kinsukʼumaj wibʼ, arech kinbʼe pa ri itinimit, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta nurajil riʼ kinta chiwech; rumal rech, che man are ta kinwaj uwach ri ipwaq, xane are kinwaj iwach ri ix. Rumal rech, che man are ta taqal chkij ri eʼakʼalabʼ che eʼare kiyaʼow ri pwaq chkech ri enan tat, xane are ri enan tat keyaʼow chkech ri eʼakʼalabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ kinya na riʼ ronojel ri nukʼaslemal piwiʼ ri ix, rumal ri utoqʼobʼisaxik ri iwuxlabʼal ix. Rukʼ sibʼalaj kixinloqʼoqʼej ri in. ¿La man jeta kʼu riʼ ri nuloqʼoqʼexik ri in?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, qastzij nakʼut, ri in kinkowinik kinbʼij, che ri in, man kʼo ta nurajil xinta chiwech. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi rukʼ kebʼ nupalaj, ri in; achalaxik, xinkowinik xixinsubʼu.
¿La kʼo jun winaq che xintaq ubʼi in iwukʼ che xuta pwaq chiwech?
Ri in, xintaq ubʼi ri Tito iwukʼ e rukʼ areʼ, xintaq chi ubʼiʼ jun qachalal. ¿La kʼo pwaq xuta ri Tito chiwech? ¿La man xujbʼe ta pa xa junamlaj uxlabʼal? ¿La man junam ta ubʼanik xqabʼan ri jastaq?
Ojer chik, ri ix sibʼalaj kichomaj, che ri uj are kqaj kqatoʼ qibʼ chiwach. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kqabʼij weriʼ, chuwach ri Dyos pa ri Kristo. E ronojel weriʼ, ixloqʼalaj taq winaq chnuwach, arech ri ix kixyakatajik.
Ri in, kinxibʼij wibʼ, che aretaq chiʼ kinopan iwukʼ ri ix, kixinriqaʼ jacha ri man kinwaj ta in, kʼatekʼuriʼ, weneʼ ri ix, kiniriqo jeriʼ je jas ri ix man kiwaj taj: che kʼo ri chʼoʼj, ri kyaqrenik, ri achixom, ri jetaq chʼakanik, ri itzel taq tzij, ri jalum taq tzij chkixoʼl taq ri juqʼat, ri jetaq man, utz taj.
Kinxibʼij wibʼ, che weneʼ aretaq chiʼ kinopan pa ri jumul chik iwukʼ, ri Dyos kubʼan chwech che kinmochʼochʼej na wibʼ iwumal ri ix, e che xas rajawaxik che kinoqʼ na kumal enikʼaj che xemakunik, kʼatekʼuriʼ man xkikʼex ta ri kikʼuʼx chuwach ri man sukʼ ta wi ri kikʼaslemal pa taq ri makunik rukʼ ixoq achi e pa ri itzelalaj kʼaslemal.
Oxmul chi waʼ riʼ che ri in kinbʼe pa ri itinimit. Ronojel waʼ weriʼ, kʼo uqʼatbʼaltzij waʼ rukʼ ri kitzij ekebʼ on eʼoxibʼ taq echʼawe.
Xbʼitaj weriʼ chkech ri eʼareʼ che emakuninaq chi kanoq e xoqujeʼ chkech konojel ri enikʼaj chik; e kinkamulij chi ubʼixik weriʼ, kamik riʼ che ri in inelenaq uloq iwukʼ; jeriʼ nakʼuriʼ jacha pa ri ukamul che xinkʼojiʼ chixoʼl ix, we kinopan chi na jumul iwukʼ, kinbʼan riʼ ri nuchak rukʼ chuqʼabʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri ix, xas kiwaj jun kʼutbʼal, arech kiwilo, la qas are ri Kristo kchʼaw wukʼ ri in; ri Areʼ che man tuqaʼr ta iwukʼ, xane ri Areʼ kʼo uchuqʼabʼ chixoʼl ri ix.
Qastzij neʼ, che ri Areʼ xkoj cho ri ripibʼal rumal ri utuqaʼril, kʼatekʼut, kʼaslik rumal ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos. Jeriʼ kʼut, xoqujeʼ ri uj ujtuqaʼr rukʼ ri Areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼujkʼasiʼ riʼ rukʼ ri Areʼ rumal ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos che kutoqʼobʼisaj iwach ri ix.
Chinikʼoj bʼaʼ iwibʼ ix la qas ix kʼo pa ri kojonik. ¿La man kiwil taj che ri Kristo xas kʼo iwukʼ ix? Xuwi neʼ, we ri ix, xas kiwilo che qas ix itzel taq winaq wi.
Ri in, kinweyeʼj, che ri ix kiwilo che ri uj xas utz kujilik.
Ri uj, kujchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, arech ri ix man kʼo ta jun itzel kibʼano; man are ta kaqeyeʼj che are kujchʼakan pa ri kʼax, xane are kqaj kqilo kibʼan ri utzil, puneʼtaj are utz kixel ix chqawach ri uj.
Rumal rech che ri uj, man kʼo ta qakowinem chuwach ri saqalaj tzij, ri uj xuwi qayaʼom qawach rukʼ ri saqalaj tzij.
Qastzij nakʼut, che ri uj, kujkiʼkotik, aretaq chiʼ ri uj, uj tuqaʼr chiwach, e ri ix are kʼo ichuqʼabʼ chqawach. Ri kaqata ri uj pa ri qachʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, are che ri ix kʼo ichuqʼabʼ.
Rumal kuwaʼ, kintzʼibʼaj weriʼ chiwech, aretaq chiʼ ri in, inelenaq uloq chixoʼl; arech, aretaq chiʼ kinopan chixoʼl, man rajawaxik taj kinkʼut ri nuchuqʼabʼ che are ri Ajawxel xyaʼow chwech, arech ri in xa kinyakanik e man xa ta kinwilinik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ix achalaxik, chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ; chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri ichuqʼabʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ, chikubʼaʼ bʼaʼ taq ikʼuʼx; xa junam bʼaʼ chibʼanaʼ chrech ri ichomanik, chikʼaslemaj bʼaʼ ri nimalaj utzil; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos che are ajchʼaqʼeʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e ajchaqʼeʼ ri nimalaj utzil, kkʼojiʼ na riʼ iwukʼ.
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ ri jun rutzil iwach rukʼ jun tyoxlaj tzʼumanik. Konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, kkiyaʼ apan jun rutzil iwach.
Ri nimalaj usipanik ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo; ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos e ri ukʼaslemal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ nimalaj iwonojel.
Ri Pabʼlo, che apostol man kumal ta ri winaq on man rumal ta jun winaq, xane rumal ri Jesus Kristo e rumal ri Dyos che Tatxel, che xuwaʼlisaj ri Areʼ chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ,
xoqujeʼ, konojel ri eʼachalaxik che ekʼo wukʼ ri in, chkech ri Ekomon Tyox rech ri Galasiʼa.
Chiwech ri ix ri sipanik e ri utzilal rech ri Dyos Qatatxel e Utatxel ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo,
