ri Areʼ che xuya ribʼ chuxeʼ ri qamak arech kujubʼoq ubʼik chuwach we uwachulew rech we uchanim riʼ e che sibʼalaj itzel jeriʼ jas kraj ri urayibʼal ri Dyos Qatatxel,
¡chrech ri areʼ ri qʼijil chubʼeqij chubʼsaq! Amen.
Ri in sibʼalaj ksach nukʼuʼx, che ri ix xas chanim xiya kan ri Areʼ che xixusikʼij rumal ri usipanik ri Kristo, e chi aninaq xixbʼe chi rukʼ jun utzalaj tzij chik che jalajoj wi,
e weriʼ are waʼ weriʼ: xane ekʼo nikʼaj winaq che kkikʼyaq ri itzel chixoʼl e kkaj kkikʼex ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri Kristo:
—Jeʼ nakʼut, we xas uj wi on we jun anjel che pa ri kaj petinaq uloq e kubʼij chiwech jun chik utzalaj tzij, che kʼextalik chuwach ri qabʼim uj chiwech, ¡ri areʼ anatema!
Jeʼ jas qabʼim, xoqujeʼ kamik riʼ, ri in kinbʼij chi jumul: We kʼo jun kubʼij jun chik Utzalaj tzij chiwech, che kʼextalik chuwach ri xikʼam ri ix: ¡Anatema riʼ chrech!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ ¿la are kinwaj ri in kinchʼak ri kitoqʼobʼ ri winaq, on are kinwaj kinchʼak ri utoqʼobʼ ri Dyos? ¿On la are kinwaj che in utz kinkil ri winaq? We ri in, are kinwaj che in utz chkiwach ri winaq, ri in, man inupataninel ta chi riʼ ri Kristo.
Jun retaʼmaxik bʼaʼ kinbʼan chiwech ix achalaxik, ri Utzalaj Tzij che ri in xinya ubʼixik, man yataʼl taj kok retaxik kumal ri winaq,
ri in man xinkʼam taj, man xinwetaʼmaj taj rumal jun winaq, kʼatekʼut, xane rumal jun qʼalajisabʼal rech ri Jesus Kristo.
Ri ix, utz utayʼik nakʼut iwumal ri nukʼaslemal ri in jeʼ jas inajjudiʼo, ri in sibʼalaj xeʼinwoqataj ri Komon Tyox rech ri Dyos e sibʼalaj kʼax xinbʼan chkech,
e ri in, in utz pa ri Judaʼismo chkiwach ri enuwinaq che junam kijunabʼ jachaʼ ri in, e ri in sibʼalaj xinkʼol ri pixabʼ kech ri enutat.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ ri Areʼ ri xinukʼam ubʼik e xinusikʼij chi pa ri nusantil rumal ri usipanik ti Areʼ xraj
xuqʼalajisaj rukʼ ri nuwinaqil ri in ri Ukʼojol, arech ri in kinya ubʼixik ri areʼ chkixoʼl ri winaq che man eʼajjudiʼos taj, chi aninaq, ri in man are ta xinbʼe chuwach ri bʼaqilal e ri kikʼel,
e man xinpaqiʼ ta pa ri Jerusalem, arech ri in keʼinriqʼa wibʼ kukʼ ri eʼapostol, ri eʼareʼ che enabʼe chnuwach in; ri in bʼenam neʼ kinbʼan pa ri Arabʼiʼa kʼatekʼuriʼ xintzalej chi na ubʼik pa ri Damasko.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, okʼowinaq chi oxibʼ junabʼ, aretaq chiʼ xinpaqiʼ pa ri Jerusalem arech kinsolij ri Sefas e xinkanaj rukʼ ri areʼ joʼlajuj qʼij:
ri in ma kʼo ta jun apostol chik xinwil uwach, xane xuwi xinwil ri Santiʼago ri rachalal ri Ajawxel,
e aretaq chiʼ kintzʼibʼaj weriʼ, kinbʼij chuwach ri Dyos che ri in man inbʼanal tzij taj.
Kʼatekʼut, xinbʼe pa ri Siriʼa e pa ri Silisiʼa;
kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Ekomon Tyox pa ri Judeʼa rumal ri Kristo, man ketaʼm ta nuwach ri in;
xuwiʼ kitom «che ri areʼ nabʼe kanoq, xroqataj ri kojonik arech kukʼis uwach e kʼu kamik riʼ kuya ubʼixik ri kojonik»,
kʼatekʼuriʼ xemaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos wumal ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa kajlajuj junabʼ chik, xinpaqiʼ chi jumul pa ri Jerusalem, rukʼ ri Bʼernabʼe e ri in xinkʼam ubʼi ri Tito wukʼ.
Xinpaqiʼk, rumal rech jun qʼalajisabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ xinkʼut chkiwach ri utzalaj- tzij, che ri in xinbʼij chkixoʼl ri man eʼajjudiʼos taj – e weriʼ xinbʼij chkiwach ri enim taq winaq, rumal rech, che ri in xinxibʼij wibʼ weneʼ man utz taj che xintij anim on weneʼ ma kʼo ta upatan che xintij anim
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Tito che wachalal ajgriʼego, xoqujeʼ ma xta ta chech ri areʼ che kupus uwi ukowil.
Xane kumal ri eʼareʼ, che man eʼutz eʼachalaxik taj, che xepe chqaxʼol arech kkikʼakalej ri qatzoqopitajem pa ri Kristo Jesus, arech ri uj kujokik ujximitalik,
ri uj, chkiwach we winaq riʼ mawi ma xqaj taj xqakʼamowaj, arech ri uj, kqakʼol chiwech ri ix ri saqalajtzij rech ri Utzalaj Tzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri keʼilik che enim winaq –man kʼo ta upatan riʼ ri kibʼantajik; ri Dyos man are ta kril ri kibʼanik ri winaq– ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta uwiʼ xkikoj chrech ri utzalaj nutzij.
Xane aretaq chiʼ xkilo, che ri in xinchilbʼexik che ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼos taj, jeʼ jas xchilbʼex ri Luʼ kukʼ ri eʼajjudiʼo
–rumal rech che ri Areʼ, ri xbʼanowik che ri Pedro kokik apostol chkech ri pusim uwiʼ kikowil, xoqujeʼ, jeriʼ xubʼan chwech ri in pa ri kitoqʼobʼ ri man eʼajjudiʼos taj–
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xkikʼam uqʼabʼ ri sipanik che xyaʼtaj chwech ri in: ri Santiʼago, ri Sefas e ri Xwan, ri eʼareʼ che enim taq winaq, che eraqan taq ja; xkiya ri kiqʼabʼ chwech e chrech ri Bʼernabʼe, jeʼ jas jun kʼutbʼal rech ri komon riqoj ibʼ: ri uj kujbʼe kukʼ ri ma eʼajjudiʼo taj e ri eʼareʼ kebʼe kukʼ ri pusim uwiʼ kikowil;
xuwiʼ che rajawaxik chqech ri uj che keqachomaj ri emebʼaʼibʼ e ri in rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ kwaj kinbʼan weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xpe ri Sefas pa ri Antiʼokiʼa xinkʼuleʼlaj ri utzij ri areʼ chupalaj, rumal rech che kʼo jun itzel uwach xubʼano.
Rumal rech, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kepe enikʼaj winaq rech ri Santiʼago; ri areʼ xwaʼ kukʼ ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj; kʼatekʼut aretaq chiʼ xepe we winaq riʼ, ri areʼ xuwaj ribʼ chkiwach ri man eʼajudiʼo taj rumal rech che ri areʼ kuxibʼij ribʼ chkiwach ri pusim uwiʼ kikowil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri enikʼaj chik eʼajjujdiʼo xoqujeʼ jeriʼ xkibʼano, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ xubʼan ri Bʼernabʼe xuwaj ribʼ chikwach ri eʼareʼ arech man kilitaj taj.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq xeʼinwilo, che man utz taj ibʼenaq rukʼ ri saqalajtzij utzij ri Utzalaj Tzij, ri in kinbʼij chrech ri Sefas chkiwach konojel ri winaq: «We ri at, che at ajjudiʼo, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri akʼaslemal jeriʼ ma atjudiʼo taj, e man at judiʼo taj kabʼano, ¿jas kʼu kuya riʼ kataʼ chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, arech kekʼaslemanik jacha eʼajjudiʼo?».
«Ri uj, uj ajjudiʼo chi aretaq chiʼ xujalaxik uloq e ri uj man uj ajmakunelabʼ taj jeʼ jas ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj;
kʼatekʼut, ri uj qetaʼm, che ri winaq, man sukʼil taj rumal che kubʼan ri Pixabʼ, xaneʼ xuwiʼ rumal ri kojonik chrech ri Jesus Kristo, xoqujeʼ ri uj xujkojon chrech ri Jesus Kristo arech kkariq ri sukʼil pa ri kojonik chrech ri Kristo e man xa ta rumal che kqabʼan ri Pixabʼ, rumal rech, che man kʼo ta jun riʼ kuriq ri sukʼil rumal che kubʼan ri Pixabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri uj xqatzukuj ri qasukʼil pa ri Kristo, kʼatekʼuriʼ xoqujeʼ ri uj kʼo ri qamak jeʼ jas ri enikʼaj chik, ¿la patanijel kʼuriʼ ri Kristo chech ri qamak? ¡Jayiʼ!
Rumal rech, we kinyak chi jumul ri jastaq che ri in xinwilij, chi in wi riʼ xinkʼut wibʼ rukʼ ri numak.
Rumal rech, che rumal ri Pixabʼ, ri in xinkamik chuwach ri pixabʼ, arech ri in kkʼojiʼ nukʼaslemal rukʼ ri Dyos; ri in inkʼo cho ri ripibʼal rukʼ ri Kristo;
kʼatekʼut, man in taj kinkʼaslemanik, xane are ri Kristo kkʼaslemanik pa ri in. Ri nukʼaslemal uchanim riʼ che kʼo pa ri bʼaqilal, kinkʼaslemaj pa ri kojonik chrech ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos10 che xinuloqʼoqʼej e xuya ribʼ rech toqʼobʼisabʼal nuwach in.
Ri in man kinchup ta uwach ri usipanik ri Dyos; rumal rech, we ri sukʼil petinaq rukʼ ri Pixabʼ, man kʼo ta upatan riʼ ri ukamikal ri Kristo.
¡Ayum! Ri ix ixajgalata, che man kixnoʼjinik taj, ¿jachin xbʼanow chiwech arech kqaj chiwach kixwartisaxik iwach? Ri ix xkʼut chiwach ri wachibʼal rech ri Jesus Kristo che kʼo cho ri ripibʼal.
Ri in, xuwiʼ jun jas uwach kinwaj kinwetaʼmaj chiwech ri ix: ¿la rumal rech che ri ix xibʼan ri Pixabʼ xikʼam ri Uxlabʼaxel, on rumal rech che ri ix xixkojon chech ri tzij?
¿La chi man kixnoʼjin taj, ri ix che nabʼe ximajij pa ri uxlabʼal e kamik riʼ kikʼis pa ri bʼaqilal?
¿La man kʼo ta upatan ronojel ri jetaq toqʼobʼ che xikʼam ri ix? Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta upatan riʼ.
Ri jun che kyaʼow chiwech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel e kubʼan taq ri maybʼal chixoʼl ri ix, ¿la kubʼan weriʼ rumal rech che ri ix kibʼan ri Pixabʼ, on rumal rech che ri ix kixkojon chech ri tzij?
Jeʼ nakʼuriʼ ri Abʼraham xkojon chrech ri Dyos e weriʼ xejalax chrech ri areʼ che are waʼ ri usukʼil.
Qas chichobʼoʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ: ri winaq che kkichʼaʼ ri kojonik, eʼare riʼ ri eʼukʼojol ri Abʼraham.
Ri tzʼibʼatalik, xuchʼobʼo che ri Dyos kuya na riʼ ri sukʼil chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, xa jekʼuriʼ, ojer xubʼij chrech ri Abʼraham we utzalaj tzij riʼ: Pa ri at wi kitewchiʼx na konojel taq ri esiwantinimit.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ che kkichaʼ ri kojonik itewchiʼtalik riʼ rukʼ ri Abʼraham ri areʼ che xkojonik.
Konojel ri eʼareʼ che kkichʼaʼ ukʼaslemaxik ri pixabʼ, kkʼojiʼ riʼ ri jun itzelal pakiwiʼ. Rumal rech jewaʼ kubʼij ri tzʼibʼatalik: Itzel chrech ri areʼ, ri man kukʼol ta ronojel ri pixabʼ che tzʼibʼatalik pa ri uwuj ri Pixabʼ, arech kubʼan ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, che ri Pixabʼ, man kukoj ta jun winaq sukʼ chuwach ri Dyos, weriʼ saq chqawach rumal rech che ri sukʼ winaq kʼo ukʼaslemal riʼ pa ri kojonik;
kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Pixabʼ man petinaq ta xas rukʼ ri kojonik; xane ri winaq che kubʼan taq ri pixabʼ riʼ, ri areʼ kʼo ukʼaslemal rumal ri pixabʼ.
Ri Kristo xujuloqʼ ri uj chuwach ri itzel rech ri Pixabʼ riʼ, ri areʼ xretzelaj ribʼ arech kutoqʼobʼisaj qawach ri uj rumal rech che tzʼibʼatalik: «Itzel rech riʼ ri jun che xekel cho ri cheʼ»,
arech kopan kukʼ ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj, chi rumal ri Kristo Jesus, ri Tewchiʼbʼal rech ri Abʼraham e rumal ri kojonik, kyaʼtaj chqech uj ri Uxlabʼaxel rech ri chʼinik.
Eʼachalaxik, kinsol uwach chiwech jeʼ jas ri winaq: jun tzʼibʼanik bʼim kanoq che utz ubʼanik xbʼanik, ri areʼ che petinaq chi kukʼ ri winaq, man kchup ta uwach e man kʼo ta kkʼex chrech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xbʼix ri taq chiʼnik chrech ri Abʼraham e chkech ri rijaʼlil. Ri tzʼibʼatalik man kubʼij taj: «e chkech taq ri erijaʼlil», jeʼ neʼ che ekʼo ekʼi; xane xuwi jun kubʼij: chech jun awijaʼl, weriʼ kubʼij, are ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jeriʼ ri nuchomanik in: jun tzʼibʼatalik bʼim kanoq che utz ubʼanik xubʼan ri Dyos; ri Pixabʼ che kpe chi aqʼan kijebʼ ciʼent juwinaq lajuj junabʼ, man kkowin ta riʼ kuchup ri areʼ, e man kkowin ta riʼ che ubʼixik che man utz ta ri chiʼnik.
Rumal rech, che weta jun echbʼal chi tzuyul chrij ri Pixabʼ, man petinaq ta chi riʼ rumal ri chʼinik: kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal jun chʼinik, ri Dyos xuya ri utoqʼobʼ chrech ri Abʼraham.
Xa jekʼuriʼ ¿jas upatan ri Pixabʼ? Ri Pixabʼ jun tiqbʼal nakʼut arech kkʼojiʼ ri makaj, chi kʼateʼ kpe na ri ijaʼlil rech ri chiʼnik, xbʼix kumal ri eʼajpataninel kech ri eʼanjelibʼ e rumal ri uchak jun qʼaxeltzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun qʼaxeltzij riʼ aretaq chiʼ xa jun chi winaq kwonwatik, e ri Dyos xa jun chi Dyos.
Rukʼ weriʼ ¿la kkʼulelaʼn ri Pixabʼ chrech taq ri uchiʼnik ri Dyos? ¡Man kkʼuleʼlan taj! Rumal rech che weta xya chqech jun Pixabʼ che kkowinik kuya ri kʼaslemal, utz na kʼu riʼ che ri sukʼil kpe rukʼ ri Pixabʼ.
Kʼatekʼut ri Tzʼibʼatalik kutzʼapij ronojel jastaq chuxeʼ ri mak, arech ri chiʼnik, rumal ri kojonik chrech ri Jesus Kristo xyaʼtaj chkech ri kekojonik.
Aretaq chiʼ kpe ri kojonik, ri uj uj tzʼapitalik chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ; ri uj, uj kʼolom chrech ri kojonik che ri kpe na.
Xajekʼuriʼ, ri Pixabʼ are qajtij uloq chi kʼateʼ ri Kristo arech ri uj ujsukʼil taq winaq rumal ri qakojonik.
Kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ xopan ri kojonik, ri uj ma uj kʼo ta chi chuxeʼ jun ajtij chik.
Rumal rech che iwonojel ix, ixralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos rumal ri ikojonik chrech ri Jesus Kristo.
Iwonojel ri ibʼanom iqasnaʼ pa ri Kristo, xas iwatzʼyaqim ri Kristo:
man kʼo ta chi jun ajjudiʼo on ajgriʼego, man kʼo ta chi jun pataninel on ajaw, ma kʼo ta chi jun achi on ixoq; rumal rech, che ri ix, xuwiʼ ix jun chik pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Kʼatekʼut, we ri ix, ix rech ri Kristo, ri ix ix rijaʼlil riʼ ri Abʼraham e ix ixechbʼanelabʼ riʼ jeriʼ jacha ri chiʼnik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼij, aretaq chiʼ, ri echbʼanel akʼal na ri areʼ xas man jalajoj ta riʼ, chuwach jun ajpatanel.
Ri areʼ, kʼo riʼ chuxeʼ taq ri kitaqanik ri eʼutatbʼal e chuxeʼ ri eril rech ri jastaq rech, chi kʼateʼ na kopan ri qʼij che xubʼij ri Utat.
Xoqujeʼ nakʼut, ri uj uj jeriʼ arechiʼ che uj akʼalabʼ, uj kʼo chuxeʼ ri ukowinem ri jastaq che rech we uwachulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ, nimalaj xtzʼaqat ri qʼij ri Dyos xutaq uloq ri ukʼojol; xaʼlaxik chi rukʼ jun ixoq, xaʼlaxik chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ;
arech, che ri areʼ keʼukol ri ekʼo chuxeʼ ri ukowinem ri pixabʼ e arech, che ri uj kujuxik ujralkʼuwaʼl.
Ri kʼutbʼal, che ri ix, ix ralkʼuwaʼl, ri Dyos xutaq uloq pa ri qanimaʼ ri Ruxlabʼal ri Ukʼojol che kuraqaqej uchiʼ e kubʼij; ¡Abʼbʼa, Tat!
Xajekʼuriʼ, ri at man at jun ajpatanijel ta chik, xane at alkʼuwaʼlxel chik; e we at alkʼuwaʼlxel chik, at echbʼanel ri chi rumal ri Dyos.
Ojer kanoq, aretaq chiʼ ri ix, man iwetaʼm ta uwach ri Dyos, ri ix, ix kʼo chuxeʼ ri kikowinem ri qastzij che ma edyos taj;
kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, che ri ix iwetaʼm chi uwach ri Dyos, on are utzubʼixik che ri Areʼ retaʼm chi iwach ix, ¿jas kʼu che, kixtzalej pa taq ri jastaq che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ e che man utz taj; e ri ix, jacha ri ojer, kiwaj kikoj iwibʼ chuxeʼ ri ukowinem ronojel weriʼ?
Ri ix, kinikʼoj rij taq ri qʼij, taq ri ikʼ, taq ri junabʼ.
Ri ix, kibʼan chwech, arech ri in kinxibʼij wibʼ rumal rech, we man kʼo ta rutzilal ri nukosik iwukʼ.
Kinta chiwech, che ri ix, chixux bʼaʼ jeriʼ in jas ri in, rumal rech, che ri in, xinuxisaj wibʼ, jeriʼ ix jas ri ix; ixachalaxik, sibʼalaj rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ kinta weriʼ chiwech. Ri ix man xiwetzelaj ta nuwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, iwetaʼm che jun yabʼilal xyoʼw bʼe chwech, che ri in xinyaʼ ubʼixik chiwech ri Utzalaj Tzij chi pa ri nabʼe mul,
e rukʼ ri kʼax kuyaʼ chiwech ri jun yawabʼ bʼaqilal riʼ; ri ix, man xiniwetzelaj taj e man itzel taj xiniwilo; xane xinikʼulaj in jeʼ jas jun anjel rech ri Dyos; xinikʼulaj in jeʼ jas ri Kristo Jesus.
¿Jawijeʼ kʼo wi kamik, ri utzalaj taq tzij che kiyaʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ ri ix? Rumal neʼ, che ri in, kuyaʼo kinbʼij chiwech: Ri ix, xa makoʼl xixkowinik xikʼot ri iwoqʼoch arech kiyaʼ chwech ri in.
¿La xa puch xinjalo inikʼulel rumal rech che ri in qas kinbʼij ri saqalajtzij chiwech?
Ri kkaj chiwech ix man utz taj; are kkaj kixkitas ubʼi wukʼ ri in, arech kixkiyut kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Utz ri uyutik jun rukʼ jun chik we xa rumal kʼo ri utzil chi ronojel qʼij e man xuwi taj aretaq chiʼ ri in in kʼo naqaj chiwech ri ix,
ix alaj taq walkʼuwaʼl, iwumal ri ix, chi jumul chik kinkʼaxkʼolij ri uloqʼexik iwach chi kʼateʼ na aretaq chiʼ ri Kristo tzʼaqatinaq chi iwukʼ ri ix.
Kwaj neʼ che weta ri in, in kʼo naqaj chiwech ri ix kamik riʼ; arech utz ri nutzij iwukʼ ri ix; xa ne rumal rech che ri in, man wetaʼm taj jas ichʼabʼexik kinbʼano.
Chibʼij bʼaʼ chwech ri in, ri ix, che kiwaj kikoj iwibʼ chuxeʼ ri Pixabʼ ¿la xa man kita ta ri pixabʼ?
Pa ri tzʼibʼatalik kqilo, che ri Abʼraham xkʼojiʼ kebʼ ukʼojol: jun xkʼojiʼ rukʼ ri ajpatanel ixoq e ri jun chik xkʼojiʼ rukʼ ri tzoqopitalik ixoq;
ri jun che rech ri ajpatanel ixoq, xaʼlaxik jeriʼ jacha kuta ri bʼaqilal; kʼatekʼut ri jun che rech ri tzoqopitalik ixoq, xaʼlaxik rumal ri chiʼnik.
Waʼ weriʼ jun wachibʼal: we ekebʼ ixoqibʼ riʼ kkikʼut kebʼ chapbʼal qʼabʼaj; ri nabʼe ixoq are ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ pa ri Sinaʼi, kuloqʼaj ri ral jeʼ jas ajpatanel: ri areʼ, are ri Agar
(rumal rech che ri bʼiʼaj Sinaʼi kʼo pa Arabʼiʼa) e kamik riʼ, are ri Jerusalem, ri areʼ ajpataninel xoqujeʼ ri eral.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jerusalem chikaj are riʼ ri tzoqopitalik e ri areʼ, are na kʼu riʼ ri qanan;
rumal rech, che tzʼibʼatalik weriʼ: chatkiʼkotoq, ri at che man xatkowin taj kkʼojiʼ jun awal, ri at che man xaloqʼaj ta uwach jun awal; charaqaqej bʼaʼ achiʼ rumal kiʼkotemal; ri at, che man aweʼtam ta ri ukʼaxkʼolil ri uloqʼoxik jun akʼal; xane are ekʼi ri ral ri wonobʼaʼm kanoq chuwach ri qas ixoqilal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, ixachalaxik, che ix jeriʼ jas ri Isaʼak, ix na kʼuriʼ ix ral ri chiʼnik.
Kʼatekʼut, qas jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri ojer, ri alkʼuwaʼlxel rumal ri bʼaqilal, xroqataj ri ral ri Uxlabʼal, weriʼ jewaʼ xoqujeʼ kamik riʼ.
E jas kubʼij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: chakʼyaqaʼ bʼi ri ajpataninel ixoq rukʼ ri ral, rumal rech che man utz taj che ri ral ri ajpataninel ixoq kechbʼenik rukʼ ri ral ri tzoqopitalik ixoq.
Xa jekʼuriʼ ix achalaxik; ri uj, man uj ralkʼuwaʼl ta ri ajpataninel ixoq, xane ujralkʼuwaʼl ri tzoqopitalik ixoq.
Arech ri uj, ujkiritajinaq kujkanaj kanoq, are ri Kristo xujkirowik. Qas utz ikʼolik bʼaʼ chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ weriʼ; mikoj chi bʼaʼ iwibʼ chuxeʼ ri jatʼibʼal rech ri ajpataninel.
In ri in Pabʼlo, ri kbʼin weriʼ chiwech: We ri ix, kixtowik arech kpus uwiʼ ri ikowil, man kʼo upatan riʼ ri Kristo chiwech.
Kinbʼij chi jumul weriʼ chech ronojel winaq che kpus uwiʼ ri ukowil. Rajawaxik che ri areʼ, chi kubʼan wi riʼ ronojel ri Pixabʼ.
Ri ix, xitas apan iwibʼ chuwach ri Kristo, iwonojel ri ix, che are kitzukuj ri sukʼil pa ri Pixabʼ; ri ix, xitzaq apan iwibʼ, xitas apan iwibʼ chuwach ri sipanik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, rumal ri Uxlabʼxel kqeyeʼj pa ri qakojonik ri jastaq che rech ri sukʼil.
Rumal rech, che pa ri Kristo Jesus, man kʼo ta ubʼantajik ri pusim uwiʼ kowil on ri man pusim taj, xane xuwi kʼo ubʼantajik ri kojonik che kchakunik rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx.
Ri ix, qas utz uchapaleʼxik xibʼan ri ibʼe; ¿jachin xkojow kʼax pa ri ibʼe arech man kiterneʼj bʼe ta ri saqalajtzij?
Waʼ we jun chomanik riʼ, man petinaq ta rukʼ ri Areʼ ri kixsikʼinik.
Jubʼiqʼ uchʼamilal kaxlanwa kuwaʼlisaj uwach ronojel ri qʼor.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, kinkubʼaʼ nukʼuʼx, che ri ix, chi pa ri Ajawxel riʼ, man kʼo ta chi jun ichomanik chuwach weriʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ, che kkojow kʼax pa ri ichomanik, chi kʼo wi riʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ xaq apachin neʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix achalaxik, we ri in tajin na kinyaʼ ubʼixik ri pusinik uwiʼ kowil, ¿jas kʼu che kinoqatax chi jumul? Xkʼis na kʼu uwach riʼ ri kʼax rech ri ripbʼal.
¡Weta kkimuch kibʼ ri jachintaq kkinim ri kʼax pa ri iwuxlabʼal!
Ix achalaxik, xane ixsikʼitalik arech ri ixkiritajinaq; kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ we ixkiritajinaq chik, mikʼam bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ arech kiyaʼ chrech ri ibʼaqil; xane rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chikaj, chipatanij bʼaʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ.
Xane jun tzijobʼelil kubʼij ronojel ri Pixabʼ pa ri rutzilal: Ri at, chaloqʼoqʼej ri awajil atzʼaqat jeriʼ jas uloqʼoqʼexik awibʼ at kabʼano.
Kʼatekʼut, we ri ix, kikatzkaʼ iwibʼ e kitijej iwibʼ; qas chikʼoloʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ arech man kikʼis ta tzij piwiʼ ri ix.
Ri in, kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech: We are ri Uxlabʼxel kkʼamow ibʼe, ri ix, ma kixkowin ta riʼ kibʼan ri urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal.
Rumal rech, che ri bʼaqilal, are kraj ri itzel puwiʼ ri uxlabʼal e ri uxlabʼal, are kraj ri utzil puwiʼ ri bʼaqilal; ekebʼ, kechʼojinik, xa jekʼuriʼ, man kibʼan taj ri jastaq che kiwaj kibʼano.
We kʼo ri Uxlabʼxel iwukʼ ri ix, ri ix, man ix kʼo ta riʼ chuxeʼ ri pixabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz retaʼmaxik qabʼanom ronojel ri jastaq che kubʼan ri bʼaqilal: ri mak rukʼ ixoq achi, ri itzel taq jas uwach, ri qʼaxem uwiʼ pa ri kʼaslemal,
ri qʼijilanik chkech ri ejoʼs taq dyos, ri itzbʼal, ri kʼaxkʼol pa taq ri animaʼ, ri chʼoj, ri tiʼtem, ri oyowal, ri itzel taq tzij, ri itzel komon, ri tasoj ibʼ,
ri itzel taq rayibʼal, ri qʼaxem uwiʼ che ri wa, ri itzel taq uwach waʼim e ukyaʼ, e ronojel jas uwach che jeriʼ – Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinbʼij chiwech, jeʼ jas nubʼim chik chiwech, ri kebʼanow we jetaq mak riʼ, man kechbʼej ta riʼ ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uwach kuyaʼ ri Uxlabʼxel are weriʼ: ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, ri kiʼkotemal, ri jaʼmaril, ri kochʼonik, ri patanajik, ri man kubʼan ta kebʼ qatzij,
ri kmeʼlal, ri utz uchapik ri kʼaslemal; rukʼ weriʼ, man kʼo ta jun pixabʼ che kchʼojin rukʼ.
Rumal rech, ri eʼareʼ che erech ri Kristo Jesus, xkikoj riʼ ri kibʼaqil rukʼ taq ri urayibʼal e itzel taq chomanik cho ri ripbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri qakʼaslemal jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri Uxlabʼxel, xoqujeʼ ri Uxlabʼxel kubʼan riʼ ri uchak paqawiʼ ri uj.
Maqatzukuj bʼaʼ nimalaj qaqʼijil, aretaq chiʼ kujchʼojinik chqaxoʼl, e aretaq chiʼ kqaj che uj jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri jun chik.
Ix achalaxik xoqujeʼ, we kiwil jun che kmakunik, ri ix, che ix winaq ix rech ri uxlabʼal; chijikomaj bʼaʼ ri areʼ rukʼ jun kmeʼlalaj uxlabʼal, e ri at, chachajij bʼaʼ awibʼ, rumal rech, che xoqujeʼ riʼ ri at loqʼ riʼ katuchap ri itzel.
Chitoʼoʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ che ukʼamik ubʼik ri jetaq eqaʼn e xa jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ utz ubʼanik riʼ kibʼano ri Upixabʼ ri Kristo.
Rumal rech, we kʼo jun kuchomaj che ri areʼ kʼo unimal; e ri areʼ xas man kʼo ta wi unimal, chi are ri areʼ riʼ ksubʼuw ribʼ.
Ronojel winaq, chrilaʼ chunikʼoj ri ukʼaslemal, xa jekʼuriʼ xas kuriq na wi riʼ ri uqʼijil pa ri areʼ e man rajawaxik ta riʼ kutzukuj pa kech wi ri enikʼaj chik;
rumal rech, che rajawaxik, che chjujnal winaq krukʼaj ri reqaʼn.
Ri tijoxel, chuyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ronojel utz taq jastaq chrech ri jun ri kkʼutuw ri tzij chuwach.
Misubʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ; man kʼo ta jun winaq kretzʼebʼej uwach ri Dyos. Rumal rech, che ri jastaq che kutik jun winaq, are riʼ ri kuyak na uwach;
ri areʼ, che ktikonijik pa ri bʼaqilal che kqʼayik, kuyak na riʼ bʼaqilal che kqaʼyik; ri are che ktikonijik pa ri Uxlabʼal, kuyak na riʼ pa ri Uxlabʼal ri junalik kʼaslemal.
Mujtaniʼ bʼaʼ chrech ubʼanik ri utzil; rumal rech che kpe na riʼ ri uyakik uwach ri pa ri uqʼij we ri uj man kqachoʼpij ta qibʼ che ubʼanik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri uj, kujkowinik, xas chqabʼanaʼ wi ri utzil chkech konojel kʼatekʼuriʼ xas are chiqanabʼisaj ri eqachal che junam ri qakojonik kukʼ.
Chiwilampeʼ ri nimalaj taq nutzʼibʼ ri kutzʼibʼaj we nuqʼabʼ rech toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach.
Ri ejujun taq winaq che are kkaj utz keʼilik pa ri kibʼaqilal, eʼareʼ waʼ we winaq riʼ ri ketaqan chiwech arech kipus uwiʼ ri ikowil, are kkaj che man kʼo ta kʼax kpe pakiwiʼ rumal ri uripbʼal ri Kristo.
Waʼ we eʼareʼ riʼ, che kipusim uwiʼ ri kikowil, ri eʼareʼ, xoqujeʼ man kkibʼan taj ri kubʼij ri pixabʼ; xuwi are kkaj che rukʼ ri upusik uwiʼ ikowil ix, kkʼojiʼ nimalaj kiqʼijil eʼareʼ pa ri ibʼaqil ri ix.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, man kinwaj taj nimalaj nuqʼijil; xuwiʼ kwaj riʼ we pa ri uripbʼal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, ri areʼ, che xukoj ri uwachulew cho ri ripbʼal rumal wech in, e ri in xinukoj cho ri ripbʼal chkiwach ri uwachulew:
Rumal rech, che ma kʼo ta ubʼantajik riʼ we pusim uwiʼ ri kowil on we man pusim taj; ri rajawaxik, are riʼ, che ri uj, uj jun kʼakʼalaj winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chkech konojel winaq che kkiterneʼbʼej we jastaq uwach riʼ, jun nimalaj jaʼmaril bʼaʼ chkech e jun nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx bʼaʼ chkech; xoqujeʼ je waʼ chkech ri Israʼel che rech ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi pa we kamik ubʼik riʼ, makʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun winaq che kbʼanow kʼax chwech; xane wukʼam pa ri nubʼaqil ri jetaq utʼiqbʼal ri Jesus.
Ix achalaxik, ri usipanik ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, chkanaj kan bʼaʼ pa ri iwuxlabʼal ¡Amen!
Ri Pabʼlo, apostol rech ri Kristo Jesus, rumal urayibʼal ri Dyos, chkech ri etyox taq winaq e ri esukʼlaj taq winaq pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Chiwech ri ix, ri usipanik e ri rutzil ri Dyos e ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Tewchiʼm ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos e Tatxel rech Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, che xujutewchiʼj ri uj rukʼ ronojel uwach tewchiʼbʼal, chilaʼ chikaj, pa ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xujusikʼij pa ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kbʼantaj ri uwachulew, arech ri uj, uj tyox e uj sukʼlaj taq winaq chuwach ri areʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx
xujuʼuxisaj ri uj, uj ukʼojol pa ri Kristo Jesus jeʼ jas ri rutzilal urayibʼal,
e weriʼ jun bʼix rech ri uqʼijilanik ri usipanik che xuya chqech pa ri Loqʼalaj Ubʼantajik.
Pa ri Areʼ, ri uj kʼo ri qakolotajem rumal ri ukikʼel, kʼo ri sachibʼal makaj pa ri nimalaj usipanik,
che xuya chqech pa ronojel etaʼmabʼal e pa ronojel noʼjibʼal:
xubʼan chqech ri uj arech qetaʼmaj ri Awatalik urayibʼal we utzalaj chomabʼal riʼ che xuchomaj chuxeʼ ronojel jas uwach,
arech kubʼan ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ ktzʼaqat ri qʼij: aretaq chiʼ ronojel jastaq uwach kʼo chuxeʼ xaq jun chi Jolomaj, ri Kristo, ri jastaq kʼo chikaj xoqujeʼ ri jastaq kʼo chuwachulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri areʼ, ri uj ujtasatalik wi che ujsikʼitalik chi ojer kanoq, jeriʼ jas ri uchomabʼal ri Areʼ ri kbʼanow ronojel jastaq uwach jeʼ jas ri urayibʼal,
arech ri uj kujuxik uj yaʼl nim uqʼij ri uqʼijil ri uj che xas ojer kanoq qeyeʼm ri Kristo.
Pa ri Areʼ, xoqujeʼ ix kʼo ri ix aretaq chiʼ xitaʼ ri utzij ri saqalajtzij, ri Utzalaj tzij rech ri ikolotajem e xixkojon chech ri areʼ, ri ix, ix xixtʼiqik rumal ri ruxlabʼal rech ri chiʼnik, we Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel riʼ
che areʼ nabʼeʼal chrech ri iwechabʼal e kusukʼumaj ri kikolotajem ri winaq che keʼuloqʼ ri Dyos rech ubʼixoxik ri uqʼijil.
Xa rumal kʼuwaʼ che ri in aretaq chiʼ xinwetaʼmaj, ri ikojonik ri ix chrech ri Ajawxel Jesus xoqujeʼ aretaq chiʼ xinwetaʼmaj ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼux kukʼ konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq,
sibʼalaj kinmaltyoxinik piwiʼ ri ix e kixinnaʼtisaj ri ix aretaq chiʼ kinchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kinweyeʼj arech ri Dyos rech ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo ri Tatxel rech ri qʼijil, kuya chiwech ri ix jun uxlabʼaxelalaj noʼjibʼal e jun uxlabʼaxel etaʼmabʼal, arech kubʼan chiwech ri ix, che qastzij kiwetaʼmaj uwach ri areʼ.
Ri areʼ, kuya ta bʼaʼ ri usaqil uwoqʼoch ri iwanimaʼ, arech ri ix kiwil ri eyeʼbʼal che kuya chiwech aretaq chiʼ kixusikʼij e kiwil ri Uqʼinomal ri Uqʼijil ri rechaʼbʼal chkixoʼl ri etyoxlaj taq winaq,
e ri nimalaj ubʼantajik ri ukowinem rech uʼatoqʼobʼ isaxik qawach ri uj che kujkojonik pa ri nimalaj uchoqʼabʼ
che ri areʼ xukʼut pa ri uwinaqil ri Kristo, aretaq chiʼ ri xuwaʼlajisaj uwach ri areʼ chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ e xutʼuybʼaʼ pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ chilaʼ chikaj,
puwiʼ ronojel nimalaj Rajawibʼal, puwiʼ ronojel Chuqʼabʼ, puwiʼ ronojel Utzil, puwiʼ ronojel Nim Ubʼantajik e puwiʼ ronojel taq bʼiʼaj che ri ix kixkowinik kibʼij, man xuwi ta pa we uwachulew riʼ xoqujeʼ pa ri uwachulew che petinaq.
Xukoj ronojel jastaq chuxeʼ raqan e xukojo Ujolom ri komon tyox,
che are Ubʼaqil, ri Tzʼaqat Ubʼantajik areʼ che ronojel kunojisaj pa ronojel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix che ixkaminaq rumal ri iwetzelal e rumal ri imak,
e pa weriʼ, ri ix xkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemal jacha ri kubʼan we uwachulew riʼ, jacha ri Ajaw rech ri rajawibʼal ri kyaqiqʼ we uxlabʼal riʼ che kroqataj ri kichak ri kexutunik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ Qonojel ri uj ojer kanoq, uj jeriʼ ejacha ri eʼareʼ, ri uj kʼo ri qakʼaslemal pa ri urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal, ri uj are kqapatanij ri urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal e ri itzel taq chomabʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri uj, ejacha ri enikʼaj chik xujbʼe chuwach ri Royowal.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Dyos che qʼinom pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼux, rumal rech che sibʼalaj xujuloqʼoqʼej,
aretaq chiʼ ri uj ujkaminaqibʼ rumal ri qamak, xuya chqech jun kʼakʼ kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Kristo –rumal jun sipanik, ri ix xixkolotajik,
rukʼ ri areʼ xuwaʼlajisaj qawach e xujutʼuyubʼaʼ chikaj pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Rukʼ weriʼ, xukʼut chuwach ri uwachulew ri nimalaj uqʼinomal ri usipanik, rukʼ ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx chqech ri uj pa ri Kristo Jesus,
rumal rech che qastzij rumal ri usipanik xixkolotajik, rukʼ ri kojonik. We kolotajem riʼ man iwukʼ ta ix petinaq wi uloq, xane jun usipanik ri Dyos;
man petinaq ta rumal qachak uj, arech man kʼo ta jun kkowinik kubʼan nimalaj uqʼij.
Rumal rech che ri uj ujuchak, xujubʼan pa ri Kristo, arech ri uj kqabʼan ri utz taq chak che ri Dyos xusukʼumaj chi ojer uloq rech toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach.
Chnaʼtajoq bʼaʼ chiwech ri ix, che ojer kanoq, ri ix che man kʼo ta ri kikojonik ri eʼajjudiʼos iwukʼ, ri ix che xbʼix chiwech «man pusim ta kikowil», kumal ri winaq che kkibʼij che kibʼ «pusim uwiʼ kikowil», ¡rumal rech jun pusinik pa ri kikowil!
Chnaʼtajoq bʼaʼ chiwech, che ri ix, ojer kanoq man kʼo ta ri Kristo iwukʼ, xixpaqchiʼx ubʼik pa ri utinimit ri Israʼel, ix kʼaxlan taq winaq chuwach taq ri Chapbʼal qʼabʼ e ri jetaq Uchʼinik; ri ix man kʼo ta iweyeʼbʼal e man kʼo ta Idyos pa we uwachulew riʼ!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, pa ri Kristo Jesus, ri ix che ojer naj ix kʼo wiʼ, ri ix chunaqaj chik ix kʼo wi, rumal ri ukikʼel ri Kristo.
Rumal rech, che are ri areʼ ri qajamaʼril, ri areʼ che chuxoʼl kebʼ bʼantajik xa jun chi bʼantajik xubʼano, xuqasaj ri tapya che ujachom kiwach ri eʼareʼ, kuchupu rukʼ ri Ubʼaqil ri areʼ ri kitiʼtik,
xuqasaj taq ri utzij e taq ri upixabʼ ri Pixabʼ, arech, rukʼ ri ubʼaqil ri Areʼ, kubʼan kukʼ ri ekebʼ bʼaqilal xa jun chi kʼakʼ winaq e xajekʼuriʼ kbʼantaj ri jaʼmaril,
e xajekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ eʼutz rukʼ ri Dyos, pa jun chi Bʼaqilal rumal ri ripibʼal: rumal uripibʼal ri areʼ xukamisaj ri tiʼtik.
Ri areʼ xpe che uyaʼik ri utzil, ri utzil chiwech ri ix che naj ixkʼo wi apanoq, ri utzil chiwech ri ix che naqaj ix kʼo wi apanoq:
rumal ri areʼ, ri uj ujkebʼ ujkʼo pa jun chi Uxlabʼaxel kujkowinik kujbʼe chunaqaj ri Tatxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ ri ix kamik riʼ man ix kaxlan winaq ta chik; ri ix, ix rech ri kitinimit ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, ix rech ri rachoch ri Dyos.
Ri ja che ix kʼo wi ri ix, jeriʼ jas jun kitikibʼalil ri jetaq Apostol e ri Eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos e ri abʼaj pa ri rajawalja are ri Kristo.
Pa ri areʼ ronojel utz ja kkʼiyik, je kbʼantajik jun utzalaj tyox pa ri Ajawxel;
pa ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ ri ix, ix kʼo pa ri ja, arech ri ix ix jun rachoch ri Dyos pa ri Uxlabʼxel.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in, ri in Pabʼlo che in kʼo pacheʼ rumal ri Kristo iwumal ri ix che man ix ajjudiʼo taj…
We ri ix ichʼobʼom, jas uyaʼik xubʼan ri Dyos chwech ri jetaq sipanik rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix;
xyaʼtaj chwech pa jun waram ri unoʼjibʼal ri Awatalik taq jastaq che ri xbʼitaj pa jujun taq tzij wumal in ri kamik riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ksikʼitaj we nutzij ri in, kixkowin riʼ kiwil ri noʼjibʼal kʼo wukʼ ri in puwiʼ ri Awatalik rech ri Kristo.
We Awatalik riʼ, man xukʼut ta chkiwach ri eʼojer taq winaq jeʼ jas ri ukʼutik kubʼan ukamik riʼ chkech ri eʼuʼapostol e ri eʼuqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, rukʼ ri Uxlabʼaxel:
ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj xoqujeʼ kʼo ri kechbʼal, ri eʼareʼ eʼutzʼaqatil ri jun Bʼaqilal, kʼo ri chiʼnik kukʼ, pa ri Kristo Jesus rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in che in Ajchak chech we Utzalaj Tzij riʼ rumal ri sipanik che xuya ri Dyos chwech rukʼ jun nimalaj chuqʼabʼ:
chwech ri in, che in are in nitzʼalaj chkixoʼl konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, xuya chwech we sipanik riʼ, arech kinbʼij chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼo taj ri nimalaj uqʼinomal ri Kristo
e kuya pa nimalaj saqil ri usipanik che Awatalik: che xas awatalik uloq ri areʼ chi sibʼalaj junabʼ pa ri Dyos, ri Areʼ che kʼiysanel chech ronojel jastaq,
arech taq ri Ajawibʼal e taq ri Chuqʼabʼ rech ri kaj ketaʼmaj kamik riʼ, rumal ri Komon Tyox, ri nimalaj noʼjibʼal che xukoj ri Dyos
pa we junalik chomabʼal riʼ, che ri Areʼ xuchomaj pa ri Kristo Jesus Qajawxel,
che kuya chqech ri qachuqʼabʼ arech ri uj kujqebʼ rukʼ kubʼisabʼal kʼux pa ri ubʼe ri kojonik chunaqaj ri Kristo,
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in kinta chiwech ri ix mixtuqaʼrik rumal taq ri kʼax tajin kinriq in rech toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix; are waʼ ri iqʼijil ix!
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ kinmej ri nuchʼek chuwach ri Tatxel;
ronojel tatxel che kʼo pa ri kaj e pa ri uwachulew kʼo ri ubʼiʼ rukʼ ri Areʼ.
Arech ri Areʼ, rumal ri uqʼinomal ri uqʼijil, kuya bʼaʼ chiwech ri ichuqʼabʼ rumal ri Ruxlabʼaxel arech ri ix ko iwanimaʼ,
arech ri Kristo kjeqiʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ rumal ri ikojonik e arech che ri ikʼiybʼalil e ri itikibʼalil kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx.
Rukʼ weriʼ, ri ix kkʼojiʼ ri ichuqʼabʼ arech ri ix kichʼobʼo, kukʼ konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, ri urabʼarik, ri uwach, ri ajsik e ri cho,
ri ix kixkowin na riʼ chi retaʼmaxik ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ri Kristo che are sibʼalaj nim chuwach ronojel noʼjibʼal, e kixok na riʼ pa tzʼaqʼatalaj iwutzil pa ronojel ri tzʼaqatalaj Rutzil ri Dyos.
Chech ri Areʼ che ri uchuqʼabʼ kchakun paqawiʼ e kkowinik kubʼan sibʼalaj nim chi na chuwach ri jastaq uwach che kujkowinik kqato e kqachomaj,
chrech ri Areʼ ri uqʼijil, pa ri Komon Tyox e pa ri Kristo Jesus, pa ronojel ijaʼlil, chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq. Amen.
Ri in sibʼalaj kintaʼ bʼaʼ chiwech ri ix, ri in che in kʼo pacheʼ pa ri Kristo, arech ri ix kkʼojiʼ jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal, rumal rech che ri ix ixsikitalik:
Chiwonej bʼaʼ iwibʼ, rukʼ kmeʼlalajʼ ibʼantajik e rukʼ kochʼonik, cheʼikuyuʼ bʼaʼ ri enikʼaj chik rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼux;
chikojoʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ che xa jun iwach pa ri Uxlabʼaxel rumal ri nimalaj utzil.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ xa jun chi ibʼaqil e xa jun chi Uxlabʼaxel, e chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ xa jun chi iweyeʼbʼal pa ri ixsikʼitalik wi;
jun chi Ajawxel, jun chi qakojonik, jun chi qaqasnaʼ,
jun chi Dyos e Tatxel qech qonojel; ri Areʼ che kʼo pakiwiʼ chi nimalaj konojel, ri areʼ che kʼo kumal konojel e ri areʼ che kʼo pa konojel.
Kʼatekʼut, qonojel chi qajujunal qakʼamom jubʼiqʼ ri toqʼobʼisabʼal wachaj rech ri Dyos jeʼ jas ri retabʼal ri usipanik ri Kristo.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ kbʼixik: Xpaqiʼ chikaj e xeʼukʼam ubʼi ri ekʼo pacheʼ xuya taq ri sipanik chkech ri winaq.
«Xpaqiʼk», ¿jas kʼu waʼ weriʼ, we man xoqujeʼ kubʼij che xxuliʼ chuxeʼ ri uwachulew?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ che xxuliʼk, xoqujeʼ are ri areʼ che xpaqiʼ puwiʼ ronojel kaj, arech kunojisaj ronojel jastaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri areʼ «Xuya» chkech enikʼaj arech keʼuxik eʼapostol, chkech enikʼaj chik arech keʼuxikʼ eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, chkech enikʼaj chik arech keʼuxik etzʼibʼanel chech ri utzalaj tzij, chkech enikʼaj chik arech keʼuxik ajtijabʼ,
arech are waʼ ri ktaqan chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri chak, arech qas utz ri ja rech ri Ubʼaqil ri Kristo,
e rukʼ kʼu waʼ weriʼ ri uj junam kujbʼe qonojel pa ri kojonik e pa noʼjibʼal rech ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos e pa ri Tzʼaqatalaj Winaq, che pa ri ukowil ri ukʼaslemal kubʼano ri tzʼaqatalaj ukʼaslemal ri Kristo.
Rukʼ weriʼ, arech ri uj man ujakʼalabʼ ta chik, ri uj man kujbʼe ta chi rukʼ ronojel tzij e pa ronojel kyaqiqʼ, pa ri joʼs taq tzij kech ri winaq e pa ri ketzalal ri eʼareʼ che kekʼaman ubʼiʼk pa ri subʼunik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri uj chujkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ pa ri qakʼaslemal pa ri saqalajtzij e ri pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, chujkʼiy bʼaʼ pa ronojel ri Areʼ che are ri Qajolom, ri Kristo,
e che ri Areʼ, kuya ri junam riqoj ibʼ che ri Bʼaqil ri junam e nimalaj uwokoxik, rukʼ kʼi uwach taq urabʼ jawiʼ kutzuqu e kusilobʼisaj ri areʼ jeʼ jas ri chak kkibʼan chi kijujunal, kʼatekʼuriʼ rukʼ weriʼ kkʼiyik e kuyak ribʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼux.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kinbʼij chiwech e sibʼalaj kintaʼ chiwech pa ri Ajawxel, mibʼan jeriʼ ri ikʼaslemal jeʼ jas kkibʼan ri winaq che ma junam ta qakojonik kukʼ che kʼo ri itzel kichomabʼal,
ri eʼareʼ ekʼo pa ri qʼequʼm; ri eʼareʼ ekaxlan winaq chuwach ri ukʼaslemal ri Dyos, man ketaʼm ta ri saqalajtzij, rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ kʼo jun abʼajalaj kanimaʼ,
aretaq chiʼ man utz ta ri kinoʼj pa ri kikʼaslemal, ri eʼareʼ xkibʼan sibʼalaj itzel jas taq uwach e xkibʼan sibʼalaj tzʼil taq jas uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man are ta weriʼ ri xiwetaʼmaj ri ix, ri ix are xiwetaʼmaj ri Kristo,
we ri ix are ri areʼ xikʼam pa ri tzij e pa ri kʼutbʼal, jun kʼutbʼal che jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri saqalajtzij rukʼ ri Jesus,
rajawaxik che ri ix kiya kan ri nabʼe ikʼaslemal e kiya kan ri qʼeʼl winaq che kixukʼam ubʼi pa ri kamikal e pa ri itzel taq rayibʼal,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, rajawaxik che ri ix kkojiʼ jun kʼakʼ ichomabʼal
e rajawaxik che ri ix kiwatzʼyaqij ri kʼakʼ winaq, che bʼanom rumal ri Dyos, pa ri sukʼil, pa ri utyoxil ri saqalajtzij.
Kamik riʼ mibʼan tzij. Chibʼij ri saqalajtzij rukʼ ri ajiltzʼaqat, ¿la man ujkitzaqatil ta ri enikʼaj chik?
We xpe iwoyowal, mixmakunik; ri qʼij maqaj bʼaʼ uwach we iwoyowal na;
rajawaxik che miʼokisaj ri Kʼaxtok iwukʼ.
Ri winaq che kelaqʼanik, maʼelaqʼan chi bʼaʼ; xane are utz chubʼanaʼ uchak rukʼ taq ri uqʼabʼ, arech kkowinik kubʼan ri utzil e keʼutoʼ ri emebʼaʼibʼ.
Maʼel bʼaʼ uloq jun itzel tzij pa ri ichiʼ, xane are chibʼij ri utz tzij, arech kibʼan ri rajawaxik e kibʼan ri utzil chkech ri kixtatabʼenik.
Miya bʼis chrech ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel rech ri Dyos, ri areʼ che xixutʼiqo rukʼ ri utʼiqbʼal, rech ri jun qʼij arechiʼ kopam e ri kolotajem.
Ronojel bʼanoj, oyowal, nimalaj tzijtal, ri itzel taq tzij, waʼ ronojel weriʼ makʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri ix.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri utzil chixol ri ix e rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼux, chisachaʼ bʼaʼ ri imak chixoʼl jeʼ jas ri usachik ri imak xubʼan ri Dyos pa ri Kristo.
Chiterneʼj bʼaʼ uwach ri Dyos jeʼ jas ixloqʼalaj taq alkʼuwaʼlaxel,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, jix bʼaʼ pa ri ubʼe ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼux, jeʼ jas ri Kristo che xixuloqʼoqʼej e xujach ribʼ rumal xutoqʼobʼisaj qawach ri uj, xujach ribʼ chrech ri Dyos pa jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ che jeʼlikalaj ruxlabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri mak rukʼ ixoq achiʼ e ronojel uwach itzel, on ri loqʼoqʼobʼal chrech ri pwaq, mibʼij bʼaʼ weriʼ chixoʼl ri ix: are waʼ ri utz chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Xoqujeʼ ri itzel taq tzij, ri chʼuʼj taq tzij, ri mox taq tzij; ronojel weriʼ man utz taj, xane chixmaltyoxin chrech ri Ajawxel.
Rumal rech che utz retaʼmaxik chibʼanaʼ, ri jun che kubʼan ri mak rukʼ ixoqʼ achiʼ e ri areʼ che kubʼan ri itzel taq jastaq e ri areʼ che kuloqʼoqʼej ri pwaq –ri jun riʼ kʼo jun joʼs udyos man kok ta riʼ pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Kristo e pa ri Rajawabʼal ri Dyos.
Man kʼo ta bʼaʼ jun kixsubʼuwik rumal enikʼaj joʼs taq tzij; rumal kʼu waʼ ronojel weriʼ, ri itzel e ri royowal ri Dyos kpe pakiwiʼ ri winaq che man kkaj ta uwach ri Areʼ.
Mibʼan bʼaʼ junam iwach kukʼ we winaq riʼ.
Ojer kanoq, ri ix ix qʼequʼm, kʼatekʼut kamik riʼ, ri ix ix saqil pa ri Ajawxel; chixkʼasleman bʼaʼ jeʼ jas ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri saqil,
rumal rech che ri uwachinik ri saqil, are ri utzil, ri sukʼil e ri saqalajtzij.
Qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ ri jastaq che utz chuwach ri Ajawxel,
e mibʼan jun itzel chak che rech ri qʼequʼm, xane are chibʼanaʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ weriʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri jastaq che pa awal kkibʼan we winaq riʼ, ri uj kujkʼixik xuwi che ri ubʼixik;
kʼatekʼut, aretaq chiʼ kqabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ weriʼ, kqʼalajinik pa ri saqil;
ronojel ri jastaq uwach che kqʼalajinik, saqil riʼ. Rumal weriʼ kbʼixik: Chatkʼastajoq ri at che katwarik chawaʼlisaj awibʼ chkixoʼl ri kaminaqibʼ e kchʼubʼlin na riʼ pawiʼ ri usaqil ri Kristo.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, qas utz unikʼoxik chibʼanaʼ rilik ri ikʼaslemal: makʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun chʼuʼj ikʼaslemal, xane chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun noʼjibʼalalaj ikʼaslemal
utz bʼaʼ chbʼe ri ikʼaslemal pa we uwachulew riʼ, rumal rech che itzel taq we qʼij riʼ;
mibʼam ri chʼuʼj jastaq uwach, kʼatekʼut are qas chiwilaʼ jachike ri uraybʼal ri Dyos.
Mixqʼabʼarik; waʼ weriʼ xaq itzel kʼaslemal kukʼama uloq chiwech, xane areʼ chitzukuj ri tzʼaqatalaj utzil pa ri Uxlabʼaxel.
Chixoʼl ri ix chiyaʼa bʼaʼ ubʼixik ri jetaq salmos, ri jetaq himnos e ri taq bʼixobʼal pa ri iwanimaʼ; chibʼixoj e chinimaqʼijarisaj ri Ajawxel rukʼ ronojel iwanimaʼ.
Pa ronojel qʼij e pa ronojel jastaq uwach chixmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyox Tatxel, rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Chinimaj chbʼil taq iwibʼ pa ri uxibʼrikil ri Kristo.
Ri eʼixoqilal chkinimaj ri ekachajilal jeʼ jas ri unimaxik ri Ajawxel:
rumal rech che ri achajilal ri areʼ are ujolom ri rixoqilal, jeriʼ pa ri Kristo che are ujolom ri Komon Tyox, ri areʼ che xukol ri Bʼaqil;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Komon Tyox kunimaj ri Kristo, rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ rajawaxik che ri eʼixoqilal kekinimaj ri ekachajilal pa ronojel.
Eʼachajilal, chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ ri iwixoqilal jeriʼ jas uloqʼoqʼexik ri Komon Tyox kubʼan ri Kristo e xujach ribʼ rumal utoqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri areʼ,
arech kutyoxarisaj ri e kuchʼajchʼobʼej ri areʼ rukʼ ri jaʼ e rukʼ tzij;
rumal rech che are kraj che chʼajchʼoj e saqil chuwach ri Areʼ; arech man kʼo ta jun tzʼilobʼinaq chech on jun bʼachʼuy chech on jun chik jas uwach, xane tyoxlaj e chʼajchʼojalaj ri ubʼantajik.
Jekʼuriʼ jas weriʼ, rajawaxik che ri ix ix achajilal keʼiloqʼoqʼej ri iwixoqilal jeʼ jas uloqʼisaxik ri ibʼaqil ri ix. Jachin kuloqʼoqʼej ri rixoqil xas are wi ri areʼ kuloqʼoqʼej ribʼ.
Rumal rech che man kʼo ta jun winaq xretzelaj jumul ri ubʼaqil; xane kukʼiysaj ri areʼ e kubʼan ri utz chrech. Jeʼ jas kubʼan ri Kristo chech ri Ukomon Tyox:
¿La man uj ujtzʼaqatil ta ri Ubʼaqil?
Rumal kʼuriʼ ri achi keʼuya kan riʼ ri unan utat e kuyutʼ na ribʼ rukʼ ri rixoqil e chi ekebʼ riʼ e jun chi bʼaqilal riʼ:
Wa weriʼ jun nimalaj awatalik, in kwaj kinbʼij weriʼ puwiʼ ri Kristo e puwiʼ ri Komon Utyox.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech, iwonojel chiloqʼoqʼej ri iwixoqilal jeʼ jas uloqʼoxik iwibʼ ri ix e ri ixoqilal nim chrilaʼ wi ri rachajil.
Ix alkʼuwaʼlaxel chixniman chrech ri kitzij ri inan itat, pa ri Ajawxel; rumal che utz weriʼ.
Nim chiwilaʼ wi ri itat e ri inan, are waʼ weriʼ ri nabʼe pixabʼ che kʼo jun chiʼnik chrech,
arech ri at, at kiʼkotemal katkʼojiʼk e kkʼojiʼ jun nimalaj akʼaslemal choʼ ri uwachulew.
E ri ix, ix nan tat, mibʼan ri kʼax chkech ri eʼiwalkʼuwaʼl, are chikʼutuʼ ri utzil chkiwach, chikʼajisaj kiwach e chibʼij chkech jujun taq tzij jacha ri kraj ri Ajawxel.
Eʼajchakibʼ chinimaj kitzij ri eʼiwajaw chuwachulew rukʼ xibʼrikil, rukʼ jun utzalaj iwanimaʼ, jeriʼ jacha ri nimanik chrech ri Kristo;
mixnimanik rumal rech che are kiwaj utz kixkanaj chkiwach ri winaq, xane chibʼanaʼ che ix rajchakibʼ ri Kristo che rukʼ kanimaʼ kkibʼan ri urayibʼal ri Dyos.
Ri ichak ri ix, xas chuwach ri Ajawxel chibʼanaʼ wi e man chkiwach ta ri winaq,
ri ix, iwetaʼm che ronojel ri utojbʼalil kuya ri Ajawxel jeriʼ jas ri utz ubʼanik xibʼano, we ix ajchak on we ix ajaw.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix ix ajawibʼ, jeriʼ chibʼanaʼ ri ix kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, mibʼan ri kʼax chkech e chichomaj che ri ix e ri eʼareʼ kʼo ri Iwajaw pa ri kaj e che ri areʼ man are ta kril ri upalaj ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix chikojoʼ ichuqʼabʼ pa ri Ajawxel e pa ri ukowil ukʼaslemal.
Ri ix, chiwatzʼyaqij ri jetaq chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj rech ri Dyos, arech ri ix ix ko chuwach ri Kʼaxtok.
Rumal rech che ri uj man kujchʼojin ta kukʼ enikʼaj kʼulel rech kikʼel e ri bʼaqilal, xane kujchʼojin rukʼ taq ri Ajawibʼal, rukʼ taq ri Chuqʼabʼ, rukʼ taq ri eʼajaw che erech qʼequʼm ekʼo chuwachulew, rukʼ ri eʼuxlabʼal che ekʼo pa ri kaj.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, rajawaxik che ri ix kiwatzʼyaqij ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoj rech ri Dyos, arech, pa ri itzel qʼij ri ix kʼo ri ichuqʼabʼ, e aretaq chiʼ xkʼis ronojel weriʼ, ri ix qas ko kixkʼojiʼk.
Ri ixtakʼalik kanoq; ximitalik ri uxeʼ ipam rukʼ ri Saqalajtzij, iwatzʼyaqim ri sukʼil jeʼ jas iwatzʼyaq rech chʼoʼj,
are ixajabʼ ri achixom kikojo, arech kjubʼux uwach ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri Nimalaj Utzil,
che are kʼo pa ri iqʼabʼ ri chʼichʼ rech ri kojonik, arech rukʼ weriʼ ri ix kixkowin na riʼ che uchupik ri jetaq chʼabʼ che rukʼ qʼaqʼ utzijom ri Itzel;
xoqujeʼ, chikojoʼ piwiʼ ri ix ri chʼichʼ rech ri Kolotajem, e pa ri iqabʼ ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj rech ri Uxlabʼaxel che are ri Utzij ri Dyos.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri ikʼaslemal pa ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos amaqʼel chixchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, pa ronojel qʼij, utz ubʼanik chibʼanaʼ weriʼ, chixchʼawoq pa kitoqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chixchʼaw bʼaʼ panuwiʼ ri in rech toqʼobʼisabʼal nuwach, arech ri in kinkowinik che ubʼixik ri Tzij arechiʼ kinjaq ri nuchiʼ e arech kinkowinik rukʼ choqʼabʼ kinkʼutu ri kʼuʼtalik Utzalaj Tzij,
ri in che inyaʼl ubʼixik aretaq chi inximitalik pacheʼ; chuyaʼ bʼaʼ ri Dyos chwech arech ko kinya ubʼixik ri tzij.
Ri in kinwaj che ri ix kiwetaʼmaj, jas ri ubʼeʼal inbʼenaq e jas ri tajin kinbʼano; are ri Tikiko kubʼij na riʼ ronojel chiwech, ri are che loqʼalaj achalaxik e utz kchakun wukʼ pa ri Ajawxel.
Kintaq ubʼiʼ ri areʼ iwukʼ, arech kuya qatzijol chiwech e arech kuya uchuqʼabʼ ri iwanimaʼ.
Ri Dyos Tatxel e ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo, kkiya ri Utzil chkech ri eʼachalaxik, rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼux e rukʼ ri kojonik.
Ri Usipanik ri Dyos chkech konojel ri winaq che kkiloqʼoqʼej ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, pa ri kʼaslemal che makqʼiy taj.
Ri Pabʼlo e ri Timoteʼo, eʼupataninel ri Kristo Jesus, chkech konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri Kristo, ri eʼareʼ che eʼajfilipo kukʼ ri ekajyuqʼabʼ e kukʼ ri ekidiʼakonos.
Ri sipanik e ri nimalaj utzil chiwech ri ix, rumal ri Dyos Qatat e ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Kinmaltyoxij chrech ri Nudyos ronojel taq mul aretaq chiʼ ri in kinchoman piwiʼ ri ix;
ronojel taq qʼij, pa ronojel mul aretaq chiʼ kinchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos kintaʼ piwiʼ iwonojel ri ix rukʼ kiʼkotemal;
rumal rech che kinnaʼtisaj, che ri ix, utz ubʼanik ri chak kibʼano pa ri utzalaj tzij xas pa ri nabʼe qʼij chi kʼateʼ kamik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, qas are ri areʼ riʼ, che xuchapalej iwukʼ ri ix we utzalaj chak riʼ, kuterneʼbʼej na kʼuriʼ ri uchak chi kʼateʼ na pa ri Uqʼij ri Jesus Kristo.
Utz che ri in jewaʼ we nuchomanik chiwij riʼ, rumal rech che ri ix ixkʼo pa ri wanimaʼ, ri ix ixkʼo pa ri chʼichʼ inujatʼim pacheʼ, xoqujeʼ ixkʼo pa ri utoʼik e pa ri uyaʼik uchuqʼabʼ ri utzalaj tzij, ri ix ixkʼo wukʼ pa ri nusipanik.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri Dyos xinrilo, ¡che ri in sibʼalaj kixinloqʼoj iwonojel pa ri ranimaʼ ri Kristo Jesus!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are waʼ weriʼ kinta pa ri nuchʼawem: ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx, qas chnimar bʼaʼ; qas chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ utzalaj inoʼjibʼal e qas utz rilik unikʼoxik ronojel,
ri kyaʼ na riʼ chiwech arech qas kinikʼoj na ri utzil e ri sukʼil, e ri nim ubʼantajik, arech kixopanik qas chʼajchʼoj ri ikʼaslemal e man kʼo ta kixqʼiliwik pa ri uqʼij ri Kristo,
qas ix kʼo ta bʼaʼ pa ri utzalaj chak rech ri sukʼil che kʼo qukʼ rumal ri Jesus Kristo, rech uqʼijilaxik e umaltyoxixik ri Dyos.
Eʼachalaxik, ri in kinwaj che ri ix kiwetaʼmaj ri jastaq che ri xinkʼulmaj ri in, utz xukʼamaʼ uloq chrech ri Utzalaj Tzij,
rumal rech che pa ri Pretoriʼo e pa ronojel kʼolibʼal, sibʼalaj etaʼmatalik che inyutulik e inkʼo pa cheʼ rumal ri Kristo,
e sibʼalaj eʼachalaxik kʼo ri kichuqʼabʼ pa ri Ajawxel rumal che inyutalik riʼ; e ri eʼareʼ kʼo sibʼalaj kichuqʼabʼ e man kkixibʼij ta kibʼ che ubʼixik we tzij riʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ekʼo nikʼaj kkiya ubʼixik ri Kristo rukʼ ri kyaqreʼnik, rukʼ itzel taq uxlabʼal rech chʼoʼjinik; kʼatekʼut ekʼo enikʼaj chik, che rukʼ utzalaj chomanik kkiya ubʼixik ri Kristo.
Ri eʼareʼ, kkibʼan weriʼ rumal ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx; rumal rech che ketaʼm, che ri in rajawaxik kintoʼ uwach ri utzalaj tzij rukʼ weriʼ;
ri enabʼe, rukʼ jun itzel uxlabʼal rech chʼoʼjinik, kkiya ubʼixik ri Kristo; man sukʼ ta ri kichomanik; kkichomaj che rukʼ weriʼ kkiya chi na raʼlal ri jetaq chʼichʼ che inujatʼim.
Kʼatekʼut, ¿jas kʼut? Puneʼtaneʼ kumal ri kebʼ kiwach on kumal ri qastzij ekʼolik, xas kʼo jun tzij puwiʼ ri Kristo e ri in kinkiʼkotik rumal weriʼ e xas kuya na riʼ nukiʼkotemal,
rumal rech che ri in, qas wetaʼm che waʼ weriʼ kuya na ri nukolotajem rukʼ ri ichʼabʼal e rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Ruxlabʼal ri Jesus Kristo che kyataj na chwech,
weriʼ, che sibʼalaj kinweʼyej ri in: man kinkʼix ta riʼ chuwach jun jas uwach, xane kinkʼol na waʼ ronojel ri ukowil nukʼuʼx; e we jumul riʼ jena kʼuwaʼ jacha ronojel taq jumul chik, ri Kristo kqʼijilaxik waʼ pa ri nubʼaqil ri in, kneʼbʼaʼ we kinkʼasiʼk on we kinkamik.
Rumal rech, che chnuwach ri in, are ri Kristo ri kʼaslemal e ri kamikal xa jun chʼakoj.
Kʼatekʼut, we rukʼ ri nukʼaslemal pa we nubʼaqil riʼ, ri in kinkowinik kinbʼan jun nimalaj utzil, ri in man wetaʼm taj jachinchikech kinchaʼo.
Kʼatekʼut, rukʼ we jun kʼamal riʼ: ri in are nabʼe kinwaj kinbʼe rukʼ ri Kristo e qastzij nakʼut che waʼ weriʼ are sibʼalaj utz;
e pa ri ukʼabʼ, we ri in kinkanaj kan pa ri nubʼaqil are sibʼalaj utz waʼ chiwech ri ix.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, rukʼ weriʼ, utz chnuwach ri in we kinkanaj kan iwukʼ iwonojel arech kkʼiyik ri ikojonik e ri ekiʼkotemal
arech, aretaq chiʼ kintzalej chi uloq jumul, ri nukʼolem iwukʼ kuya jun kiʼkotemal chiwech e kuya jun nimalaj iqʼij pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal chuwach ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo arech ri in, we kinbʼe na che iwilik pa ri itinimit on we man kinbʼe taj, ri in kintaʼ na utzijol che ri ix ix kʼo pa ri uchuqʼabʼ xa jun chi uxlabʼal, che ri ix rukʼ xa jun iwanimaʼ kikoj ichuqʼabʼ arech kkʼiy ri kojonik chech ri Utzalaj Tzij;
ri ix mixibʼij bʼaʼ iwibʼ chkiwach ri ikʼulel: we man kixibʼij iwibʼ, jun utzalaj kʼutbʼal riʼ rech kʼax chkech ri eʼareʼ e chiwech ri ix ukʼutbʼal ikolotajem riʼ. E waʼ weriʼ petinaq uloq tza xas ri Dyos:
rumal ri utoqʼobʼ, xyaʼtaj chiwech ri ix man xuwi ta ri ikojbʼal chech ri Kristo, xane xoqujeʼ xyaʼtaj chiwech kiriq na ri kʼax pa ri utoqʼobʼ ri areʼ.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, ri ix chikojo bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ, jeriʼ jacha xiwil chwech ri in e kamik riʼ ri ix iwetaʼm che tajin na kinkoj na nuchuqʼabʼ ri in.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri in sibʼalaj kinkʼomij chiwech puwiʼ ronojel ri rajawaxik taq sikʼinik kubʼan ri Kristo, kinkʼomij chiwech rukʼ sibʼalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, rukʼ ri riqoj ibʼ pa ri Uxlabʼxel, rukʼ nimalaj toqʼobʼisabʼal kʼuʼx,
chinojisaj bʼaʼ ri nukʼaslemal rukʼ xa jun chi ichomanik, xa jun chi loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx, xa jun chi uxlabʼal, xa jun chi ichomabʼal;
makʼo jun jas uwach mibʼano rumal kʼulel iwibʼ e rumal nimal, chijujunal chichomaj che konojel winaq nimalaj kibʼantajik chiwach ri ix;
man xuwi taj kitzukuj ri utzil chiwech ri ix, xoqujeʼ chitzukuj ri utzil chkech ri enikʼaj chik.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri uchomabʼal ri Kristo Jesus:
Ri areʼ, che are uwachbʼal ri Dyos man xukoj taj ri taqal chrij che kbʼan chech jeriʼ jacha Dyos, ri ubʼantajik che junam rukʼ ri ubʼantajik ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Areʼ xubʼan ribʼ che xas ma kʼo ta wi ubʼantajik xruxisaj ribʼ che ximitalik xruxisaj ribʼ jachaʼ jun winaq, xchʼobʼtaj uwach pa ri ukaʼybʼal jeriʼ jacha jun winaq,
xunitzʼarisaj chi na ribʼ xnimanik chi kʼa pa ri kamikal e jun kamikal cho ri ripibʼal.
Rumal kʼu weriʼ, ri Dyos xunimarisaj ubʼantajik ri areʼ e xuya chech ri jun Bʼiʼaj che kʼo puwiʼ ronojel bʼiʼaj
arech, ronojel jas uwach, rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri Jesus, kexukiʼk konojel taq chʼeʼk, ri ekʼo pa ri nimalaj kaj ri ekʼo pa ri uwachulew, ri ekʼo chuxeʼ ri uwachulew
e ronojel aqʼaj kuya ubʼixik che ri Jesus Kristo are Ajawxel rech uqʼijilaxik ri Dyos Tataxel.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ix nuloqʼ jeriʼ nakʼut jacha ix nimaninaq pa ronojel mul, rajawaxik che ma xuwi taj aretaq chiʼ ri in inkʼo iwukʼ, xane sibʼalaj rajawaxik chi na chanim riʼ che ri in ma inkʼo ta iwukʼ, chixchakun bʼaʼ rukʼ xibʼim ibʼ e rukʼ bʼirbʼitkil rech ri ikolotajem:
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos kʼo waral riʼ, are areʼ kuchakuj iwukʼ ix ri ajawaxik e ri chakunem, che nimalaj utzil chrech ri utz taq uchomabʼal areʼ.
Chibʼanaʼ ronojel man rukʼ ta wixwitem e man rukʼ ta kʼuleʼlaʼn tzij,
e arech man kʼo ta jun jas uwach mak kchʼaʼ chiwech e arech sibʼalaj ixchʼojchʼoj, ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri Dyos chkixoʼl jun itzelalaj e kʼaxalaj ijaʼlil, che ri ix ma kʼo ta jun itzʼilal, chixchuplinoq bʼaʼ ix jeʼ jas jun yabʼal saqil pa we uwachulew riʼ,
rukʼ ri ukʼutik ri Tzij rech ri kʼaslemal. Rukʼ weriʼ, ri ix kisukʼumaj nimalaj wech ri in pa ri uqʼij ri Kristo, rumal rech che ri nubʼinem e ri xinkʼaxkʼolij man xaq ta ksach uwach riʼ.
We rajawaxik che xoqujeʼ kinqʼejej na ri nukikʼel rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik uwach ri ikojonik ri ix, ri in sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik e kinkiʼkotik iwukʼ iwonojel,
xoqujeʼ bʼaʼ ri ix chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ e chixjaʼjatoq wukʼ ri in.
Ri in kinweyeʼj pa ri Ajawxel Jesus, che kintaq na ubʼiʼ chiwech chi pa aninaqil, ri Timoteʼo, arech ri in kkubʼiʼ nukʼuʼx aretaq chiʼ kintaʼ itzijol ri ix.
Rumal rech, che ma kʼo ta jun winaq wukʼ ri in che jeriʼ jas ri areʼ, che kkowinik rukʼ jun utzalaj ranimaʼ kixril wi ri ix,
konojel nakʼut are kkitzukuj ri utz kech wi ri eʼareʼ e man are ta kkitzukuj ri utzil rech ri Jesus Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix iwetaʼm che utz ri uchak ri areʼ: ri areʼ jeʼ jas jun kʼojolxel che kʼo putzal ri utat, xupatanij wukʼ ri in ri utzalaj tzij.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri in kinwaj, che are areʼ kintaq na ubʼik iwukʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri in qʼalaj chik chnuwach ri kinriqitaj wi kamik.
Xoqujeʼ, ri in qas utz reyeʼxik kinbʼan pa ri Ajawxel che ri in chi ma naj ta chi waʼ ri in kinopan na waʼ iwukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in kinchomaj che kintaq na ubʼik iwukʼ ri Epafrodito, che wachalal, ri areʼ che wachiʼl pa ri nuchak e pa ri nuchʼoʼj e che ri ix, xitaq uloq wukʼ ri in arech ri areʼ kinulpatanij pa ri nurajawaxik.
Rumal rech che ri areʼ kixraj nimalaj iwonojel e sibʼalaj kixubʼisoj apanoq, rumal rech che ri ix iwetaʼm chik che ri areʼ yawabʼ kʼolik.
Qastzij nakʼut che ri areʼ xyabʼinik, e naqaj xkʼojiʼ ukoq chech ri kamikal; kʼatekʼut, ri Dyos xutoqʼobʼisaj uwach e man xuwi ta ri areʼ xutoqobʼisaj uwach xane xoqujeʼ ri in, arech ri in man kinkʼis ta nukʼuʼx pa ri bʼisobʼal.
Xa jeʼnakʼuriʼ, ri in aninaq kintaq na ubʼik ri areʼ iwukʼ, arech ri ix kixkiʼkotik aretaq chiʼ kiwil chi na uwach ri areʼ e xoqujeʼ arech ri in kintoʼtaj jubʼiq pa ri bʼisonik.
Qas chikʼulaj bʼaʼ ri areʼ pa ri Ajawxel rukʼ nimalaj kiʼkotemal e nim cheʼiwilaʼ wi konojel ri winaq che ejeriʼ jas ri areʼ.
Xane rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik uwach ri uchak ri Kristo, ri areʼ chunaqaj xkʼojiʼ ukoq chech ri kamikal, rumal rech, che ri areʼ kebʼ xkʼojiʼ wi ri ukʼaslemal aretaq chiʼ xinupatanij ri in, rumal rech che man xixkowin ta ri ix xibʼan we toqʼobʼ riʼ chwech ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, eʼachalaxik; chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ pa ri Ajawxel… Aretaq chiʼ ri in kinya ubʼixik weriʼ chiwech man kqʼaxow ta chwech ri in, xoqujeʼ jun sukʼabʼanik chiwech ri ix:
¡Chichajij iwibʼ chkiwach ri etzʼi taq winaq! ¡Chichajij iwibʼ chkiwach ri eʼitzel taq ajchakibʼ! ¡Chichajij iwibʼ chkiwach ri ewinaq che man qas ta tzij pusim uwiʼ kikowil!
Rumal rech, che ri uj qastzij pusim uwi ri qakowil, ri uj che kqaya ri qas toqʼobʼ jeʼ jas ri ruxlabʼal ri Dyos, e che kʼo qaqʼijil pa ri Kristo Jesus e che man kuʼl ta qakʼuʼx chrij ri qabʼaqil.
Puneʼtane, ri in kinkowinik kinjikibʼaʼ ri nukʼux chrij ri nubʼaqil; ¡we kʼo jun chik kuchomaj che kkowinik kujikibʼaʼ ukʼuʼx chrij ri ubʼaqil, ri in sibʼalaj nim kinkowin chi na chuwach ri areʼ!
Ri in pusim uwi ri nukowil chi pa ri uwajxaq nuqʼij; in rijaʼl ri Israʼel, in rech ri ujuqʼat ri Bʼenjamin, in ajhebʼreʼo e in ukʼojol jun ajhebʼreʼo; in fariseʼo chuwach ri Pixabʼ,
xinachixnik chkech ri eʼajkristo e xeʼinwoqataj; pa ri usukʼil ri Pixabʼ, ri in, in utzalaj winaq.
Kʼatekʼut ronojel ri utz taq jastaq wech ri in, ri in kinwilo che chuwach ri Kristo, weriʼ man utz taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kamik riʼ, ri in, ronojel itzel kinwilo chuwach ri nimalaj taq jastaq che xinwetaʼmaj chrij ri Jesus Kristo ri Wajawaxel. Rumal ri areʼ ri in kinkʼamowaj che ri in ronojel xintzaqo e ronojel xa jun mes chnuwach ri in, arech ri in kinchʼak ri Kristo.
E arech ri in kinriqitaj pa ri areʼ man rukʼ ta ri nusukʼil ri in, che jun sukʼil che petinaq pa ri Pixabʼ, xane pa ri sukʼil che kpe pa ri kojonik chrech ri Kristo, pa ri sukʼil che kpe rukʼ ri Dyos e che toqʼem rumal ri kojonik,
arech ri in kinwetaʼmaj uwach ri areʼ rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri ukʼastajibʼal uwach e rukʼ ri riqoj ibʼ rukʼ taq ri ukʼaxkʼol ri areʼ, arech ri in, in jeriʼ pa ri ukamikal jachaʼ ri areʼ,
arech ri in kyaʼtaj chwech kkʼastaj nuwach chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Ri in, majaʼ kinopan pa ri ukʼisbʼalil e majaʼ kinriqaʼ che in tzʼaqatalaj winaq; xane ri in kintij anim arech ri in kinriqaʼ, jeʼ jas uriqik xubʼan ri Kristo Jesus.
Eʼachalaxik, ri in man kinchomaj taj che xriqitajik wumal in, xane xuwi kinbʼij weriʼ: Ri in man kinchomaj ta chik ri bʼe che xbʼantaj wumal ri xkanaj kanoq chwij, xane are kinchomaj e kinkoj nuchuqʼabʼ chech ri kʼo chnuwach. Ri in kinbʼe rukʼ ronojel wuxlabʼal,
e ri in kintij anim arech kinopan pa ri ukʼisbʼalil, arech kʼo ri tojbʼal ukʼaxel chwech ri kujusikʼij wi ri Dyos chikaj pa ri Kristo Jesus, arech ri uj kqakʼamo.
Ri uj, che ri uj utzalaj taq winaq, rajawaxik che jeriʼ kujchomanik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo nikʼaj jastaq chik kichomaj ri ix, are ri Dyos riʼ kyaʼow na ri usaqil chiwech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ pa ronojel ri ujopaninaq wi, joʼ bʼaʼ pa we bʼe riʼ.
Eʼachalaxik, chibʼanaʼ ix jeriʼ jachaʼ ri in, qas utz kilik chibʼanaʼ ri eʼareʼ, ri kʼo jun kikʼaslemal che jeriʼ jachaʼ ri jun kʼambʼal noʼj kikʼamom qukʼ ri uj.
Rumal rech, che ekʼo sibʼalaj winaq ejeʼ jas eʼukʼulel ri uripibʼal ri Kristo, jachaʼ sibʼalaj nubʼim chik chiwech e kinbʼij chi jumul chiwech kamik riʼ rukʼ uwaʼl taq nuwach.
Pa ri ukʼisbʼal kech ri eʼareʼ kkiriq na ri sachibʼal ibʼ; ri eʼareʼ are kidyos ri kipam e are nim kkil wi ri kikowil ri achijabʼ; xuwi utz chkiwach ri jastaq uwach che rech we uwachulew riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri uj, ujuwinaqil ri kaj, e sibʼalaj qeyeʼm ri qakolonem pa ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo che kʼo chilaʼ chikaj;
ri Areʼ che kuya na riʼ ri uqʼijil we jun mesalaj qabʼaqil riʼ jacha ri uqʼijil ri ubʼaqil ri areʼ; kkowin riʼ che uyaʼik rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri areʼ kʼolik, che kkowinik kuya chuxeʼ raqan ronojel jas uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ixloqʼalaj taq achalaxik, ri ix ix nukiʼkotemal, ri ix ix utojbʼalil nuchak; chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ pa ri Ajawxel, ixloqʼalaj taq achalaxik.
Sibʼalaj kintaʼ chrech ri Evodiʼa e xoqujeʼ chrech ri Sintike, qas utz bʼaʼ ukʼaslemaxik chkibʼanaʼ chkibʼil kibʼ pa ri Ajawxel.
Xoqujeʼ, kinta chawech ri at at Sisigo, che qas at jun wachiʼl, kintaʼ chawech arech qas cheʼapatanij bʼaʼ ri ixoqibʼ riʼ, rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ ekʼo wukʼ aretaq chiʼ xinkoj nuchuqʼabʼ che utoqʼobʼisaxik uwach ri utzalaj tzij; jachaʼ xkibʼan ri Klemente e ri enikʼaj chik che xechakun wukʼ, che ri kibʼiʼ tzʼibʼatalik pa ri uwujil ri kʼaslemal.
Chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ ronojel taq qʼij pa ri Ajawxel, kinkamulij ubʼixik weriʼ chiwech: chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ.
Chketaʼmaj bʼaʼ chi nimalaj konojel winaq ri chʼuchʼujalaj inojibʼal. Naqaj chik kʼo wi ri Ajawxel.
Mamayow ikʼuʼx rukʼ ronojel jastaq uwach e aretaq chiʼ kʼo jun irajawaxik, chixchʼaw bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos, chitaʼ bʼaʼ chrech ri kiwaj e chixmaltyoxin chrech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri nimalaj rutzil ri Dyos che are nim chuwach ronojel noʼjibʼal, are areʼ riʼ ri kchajin na ri iwanimaʼ e ri ichomanik pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, eʼachalaxik ronojel ri kʼolik che qastzij, che qas nimalaj, che qas sukʼil, che qas chʼajchʼoj, che qas kmeʼl animaʼ e che ronojel ri utzil e ronojel nim uqʼijil, ronojel waʼ weriʼ qas chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ.
Ronojel ri jastaq uwach che xiwetaʼmaj, ri xikʼamo, ri xito e ri xiwilo xas pa ri in, qas chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ. Xa jekʼuriʼ ri Dyos che rech ri nimalaj utzil qas kkʼojiʼ ri iwukʼ ri ix.
Sibʼalaj xinkiʼkotik pa ri Ajawxel rumal rech che xinnaʼtaj chiwech, qas xinichomaj, kʼatekʼut xuwi man ixkowininaq ta che ukʼutik chnuwach.
Man kinbʼij ta weriʼ, rumal rech che ri in xa in mebʼaʼ, ri in xinwetaʼmaj kinkʼasik pa ronojel ri kinriqitaj na wi.
Ri in wetaʼm kinkʼaslemanik rukʼ xuwi jubʼiqʼ e rukʼ kʼi jastaq. Pa ronojel qʼij e pa ronojel kʼolibʼal, ri in xinwetaʼmaj kinwaʼik e xinwetaʼmaj kinriq wiʼjal, xinwetaʼmaj kinkʼasiʼ rukʼ taq ri numebʼil e pa ri nuchʼanalik.
Ri in ronojel kinkowin chech pa Ri Jun, che are kyaʼow ri nuchuqʼabʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix utz ri xibʼano che xiwukʼaj ri kʼaxkʼol xinriqo.
Ri ix iwetaʼm, ix ajfilipo: Aretaq chiʼ xmajtaj ubʼixik ri utzalaj tzij, aretaq chiʼ xinya kan ri Masedoniʼa, man kʼo ta jun komon tyox che xuya nikʼaj pwaq chwech, xaq xuwi ri ix,
ri ix, aretaq chiʼ, ri in in kʼo pa ri Tesalonika, kamul xitaq ubʼi chwech ri jastaq che rajawaxik chwech.
Ri in, man xa ta kintzukuj we taq sipanik riʼ; xane are kintzukuj ri utzil che kunimarisaj ri iwutzilal ri ix.
Kamik riʼ, ri in kʼo ronojel jastaq uwach wukʼ che ri rajawaxik chwech, e ktoʼtaj na; xas kkʼuʼxnik ri kʼo wukʼ chi aretaq chiʼ ri Epafrodita xuya chwech ri toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach xitaq uloq chwech che utzalaj uxlabʼal, jelikalij tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kukʼam ri Dyos e che sibʼalaj utz chuwach.
E ri Dyos, kuya na riʼ chiwech, ronojel ri jastaq uwach che rajawaxik na chiwech, rukʼ nimalaj ujachanik e rukʼ nimalaj uqʼinomal pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri qʼijil chrech ri Dyos, Qatatxel, chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq! Amen.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri Kristo Jesus. Ri eʼachalaxik che ekʼo wukʼ ri in kkiyaʼ apanoq jun rutzil iwach ri ix.
Konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, kkiyaʼ apanoq jun rutzil iwach, are sibʼalaj enabʼe kkitaq apan jun rutzil iwach ri ejun ja winaq ekʼo pa ri rachoch ri Sesar.
Ri usipanik ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo kuxta bʼaʼ pa ri iwuxlabʼal ri ix.
Ri Pabʼlo, apostol rech ri Kristo Jesus, rumal ri urayibʼal ri Dyos e ri Timoteʼo ri achalaxik,
chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq rech ri Kolosa, che eʼutzalaj taq achalaxik pa ri Kristo. Chiwech ri ix ri sipanik e ri utzil pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Dyos Qatatxel.
Sibʼalaj qamaltyoxij chech ri Dyos, ri Tatxel rech ri Qajawxel Jesukristo, aretaq chiʼ kujchoman piwiʼ pa ri qachʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos,
chi are taq chiʼ ri uj xqata utzijol ri ikojonik chech ri Kristo Jesus e ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chkech konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq,
rumal rech, che ri ix kʼo ri iweyeʼbʼal chilaʼ chikaj. E chrech we eyeʼbʼal riʼ, ri ix xixtijoxik rumal ri utzij ri saqalaj tzij, che are ri Utzalaj Tzij,
che xopan iwukʼ ri ix; e jeriʼ jas pa ronojel ri uwachulew, kuyaʼ uwach e kkʼiyik, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ pa ri itinimit, chi pa ri qʼij, aretaq chiʼ ri ix xiwetaʼmaj e xichʼobʼ uwach ri usipanik ri Dyos pa ri saqalaj utzij.
Ri Epafras, che kchakun qukʼ ri uj, are xkʼutuw weriʼ chiwach, ri areʼ che are nukʼexwach ri in; utzalaj ajchak rech ri Kristo,
are ri areʼ ri xbʼin chqech ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx ix pa ri Uxlabʼaxel.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri uj, tza pa ri qʼij aretaq chiʼ xqata utzijol weriʼ, sibʼalaj kujchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos piwiʼ e kqata chrech ri Dyos arech kuyaʼ chiwech ri ix ri utzalaj noʼjbʼal rech ri urayibʼal ri areʼ, e ronojel unoʼjibʼal e retambʼal ri Uxlabʼxel.
E rukʼ waʼ weriʼ, ri ix, kixkowin waʼ che kʼo jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal chuwach ri Ajawxel e sibʼalaj ix utz riʼ chuwach ri Areʼ pa ronojel jas uwach: ri ix sibʼalaj kiwachij utzalaj taq jastaq riʼ chuwach ri areʼ e kixkʼiy naʼ riʼ pa ri unoʼjibʼal ri Dyos.
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ pa ri uchuqʼabʼ uqʼijil Areʼ, arech qas kixkochʼonik pa ri kʼax e qas kichʼijej rukʼ kiʼkotemal;
arech kixmaltyoxin na riʼ chrech ri Tatxel che xixubʼano arech qas kʼo iwech kukʼ ri etyoxlaj taq winaq pa ri saqil.
Are ri areʼ xujbʼoqowik pa ri rajawibʼal ri qʼequʼmal e xujukʼam uloq pa ri Rajawibʼal ri loqʼalaj Ukʼojolxel,
che pa ri areʼ kʼo wi ri qakolotajem e ri sachibʼal qamak.
Ri areʼ, are uwachibʼal ri Dyos che man kujkowin taj kqil uwach, ri areʼ xalax nabʼe chuwach ronojel ri uwachulew,
rumal rech, che pa ri Areʼ xbʼan ronojel ri jastaq uwach, pa ri kaj e pa ri uwachulew, ri jastaq uwach che kqilo e ri jastaq uwach che man kqil taj, ri nimalaj taq tʼuybʼal, ri nimalaj taq ajawibʼal, ri nimalaj taq kowinem ronojel xbʼantajik rumal ri areʼ e chi rech wi ri areʼ ronojel.
Ri areʼ, chi are nabʼe kʼo uloq chuwach ronojel e ronojel jastaq kʼo pa ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ are ujolom ri ubʼaqilal che are ri Komon Tyox. Ri areʼ, are nimalaj ubʼantajik, ri areʼ che xaʼlax nabʼe chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ rajawaxik, che ri areʼ are nabʼe pa ronojel jastaq uwach,
rumal rech, che are utz che ri urayibʼal ri Dyos xubʼano pa ri areʼ, che ronojel utzil kkanaj kan pa ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal ri areʼ, ronojel winaq xubʼan sukʼ chuwach ri areʼ, cho ri uwachulew e xoqujeʼ cho ri kaj aretaq chiʼ xujaʼmarisaj ronojel rumal ri ukikʼel cho ri ripibʼal.
Xoqujeʼ ri ix, che ojer kanoq ix kaxlan taq winaq e ixkʼulel, rumal ri itzel taq ichomanik e ri itzel taq ichak,
ukamik riʼ, xixusukʼubʼa pa ri ubʼaqil aretaq chiʼ xuyaʼ pa ri kamikal, arech ri ix, chuwach ri areʼ ixtyoxlaj taq winaq, man kʼo ta xoqʼoʼlinaq iwach e man kʼo ta jun jas uwach itzel.
Xuwi rajawaxik, che ri ix kixkanaj kan pa ri kojonik, qas kʼo ichuqʼabʼ pa ri saqalaj tzij; e man kiya ta kan ri nimalaj iweyeʼbʼal ri xichʼobʼ uwach rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij che xitatabʼej ix, che xyaʼ ubʼixik chkech konojel winaq chi chuxeʼ ri kaj; e ri in che in Pabʼlo xinuxik in ajchak chrech.
Kamik riʼ, sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik rumal taq ri kʼax che kinchʼijej in rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik iwach ri ix, e ri in kintzʼaqatisaj ukojik pa ri nubʼaqil ri jetaq kʼax che kraj na pa taq ri ukʼaxkʼolil ri Kristo rech ri toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri ubʼaqil Areʼ, che are ri Komon Tyox,
e chrech we Komon Tyox riʼ, ri in in rajchak, chi jeriʼ jacha ri taqanik xuyaʼ ri Dyos chwech, arech wumal ri in, kbʼantaj pa ri itinimit ix ri Upetbʼal ri Utzij ri Dyos,
ri awatalik uwach chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq uloq e pa kʼi mayilqʼijsaq e kamik riʼ kuqʼalajisaj ribʼ chkiwach ri etyoxlaj taq uwinaq.
Ri Dyos, xraj che ketaʼmax uwach ri Uqʼij ri uqʼinomal we awatalik riʼ pa taq ri kitinimit ri eʼareʼ chen man kʼo ta ri qakojonik kukʼ, che are ri Kristo chixoʼl ri ix, ri areʼ che are reyeʼbʼal ri Qʼijil.
We Kristo riʼ, kqayaʼ ubʼixik ri areʼ kukʼ konojel winaq e rukʼ ronojel noʼjbʼal kqakʼutuʼ chkiwach konojel winaq, arech, chi konojel eʼutz chuwach ri Kristo.
Rumal kʼu waʼ, chi pa ri utoqʼobʼ waʼ weriʼ, ri in kinkosik chi rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Kristo che xas kchakun wi wukʼ ri in.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri in kinwaj, che ri ix kiwetaʼmaj ri kʼaxalaj chʼoʼj nutaqem rumal ri toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix, xoqujeʼ kumal utoqʼobʼisaxik kiwach ri winaq eʼajlaʼodiseʼa, xoqujeʼ kumal ri enikʼaj chik che man jumul kilom nuwach rukʼ ri kiwoqʼoch;
arech qas kkubʼiʼ kikʼuʼx e rukʼ junam uloqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx, kkiriq bʼa na sibʼalaj kinoʼjibʼal, arech keʼopan pa ri awatalik che rech ri Dyos,
che pa ri areʼ awatalik wi ronojel uwach noʼjbʼal e ronojel etaʼmanik.
Kinbʼij weriʼ chiwech arech man kʼo ta jun winaq kixsubʼuwik rukʼ ucholajil itzel taq tzij.
Qastzij nakʼut, che ri in, man in kʼo ta iwukʼ chi rukʼ ri nubʼaqil; kʼatekʼut, ri in, in kʼo iwukʼ rukʼ ri wuxlabʼal; sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik rumal rech che sibʼalaj kʼo utzil kiʼkotemal chixoʼl e rumal che kixkojon chrech ri Kristo.
Ri Kristo, che ri xikʼamo, ri Jesus, ri Ajawxel, rajawaxik che pa ri areʼ kujbʼe wi,
che kbʼe ri qakʼamal pa ri areʼ e che kujyakataj pa ri areʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, utz utoqʼlexik iwibʼ pa ri kojonik jeriʼ jas ukʼutik xbʼan chiwech e rukʼ nimalaj maltyoxinik.
Chikʼoloʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ arech man kʼo ta jun winaq kubʼan rajchakibʼ chiwech pa ri itzel taq tzij che xas rech taq noʼjibʼal, jun noʼjibʼal che xas rech wi winaq, xas rukʼ ri jastaq uwach rech ri uwachulew, e man je ta riʼ jacha ri uchomanik ri Kristo.
Rumal rech, che chi pa ri ubʼaqil ri Areʼ kanajinaq wi kanoq ronojel ri utzalaj tzʼaqat rech ri Dyos,
kʼatekʼuriʼ ri ix, pa ri Areʼ kiriq wi ronojel tzʼaqat utzil, ri Areʼ che are Jolomaj che ronojel Ajawibʼal e che ronojel Kowinem.
Ri ix, xoqujeʼ pa ri areʼ xpus uwiʼ ri ikowil, che man uqʼabʼ ta jun winaq xpusuwik, xane rumal che ri ix, xisach kan ri ibʼaqil che rech we uwachulew riʼ; ri jun upusik uwiʼ bʼaqilal rech ri Kristo:
ri ix, xixmuq rukʼ ri areʼ pa ri qasnaʼ e rukʼ ri Areʼ, ri ix xkʼastaj iwach, rumal che ri ix xikojo che are ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos xuwaʼlisaj ri Areʼ chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ.
Ri ix, che ixkaminaq rumal taq ri imak e rumal ri ibʼaqil che man pusim ta uwiʼ, ri Areʼ, xuyaʼ jun chi kʼakʼ ikʼaslemal chi rukʼ ri Areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ xusach ronojel ri qamak.
Xusach uwach ri ukowinem ri Pixabʼ, ri wuj jawiʼ kʼo ri qakʼas, ri kubʼan itzel chqech; weriʼ xusach uwach cho ri ripibʼal.
Xchʼakan pakiwiʼ ri Erajawibʼal e pakiwiʼ ri Ekowinem, e xuqʼalajisaj kiwach chuwach ri uwachulew, aretaq chiʼ xeʼukʼam ubʼik ri ajchʼakanelalaj upetbʼal.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, makʼojiʼ bʼa jun winaq che kʼax taq tzij kutzijoj piwiʼ rumal taq iwa on rumal taq iwukʼyaʼ on rumal taq nimaqʼij on rumal taq kʼakʼ ikʼ on rumal taq qʼij sabʼado.
Ronojel waʼ weriʼ, xaq are umuj waʼ ri jastaq uwach che kpe na; kʼatekʼut, ri kujriqitaj na wi riʼ are ri ubʼaqil ri Kristo riʼ.
Ma jun winaq bʼaʼ che kresaj weriʼ chiwech, aretaq chiʼ che kajawaxik krawasixik jun jas uwach, on aretaq chiʼ keqʼijilaxik ri eʼanjelibʼ rumal rech che kyaʼ ronojel rayibʼal chuwach ri jastaq che xiltajik, waʼ weriʼ xaq nimal waʼ pa ri chomanik rech bʼaqilal
kʼatekʼuriʼ, man are ta kjatʼix rukʼ ri Jolomaj, jawijeʼ wi, ronojel ri Bʼaqilal, kuriq wi ri uwa e ri utiqbʼalil, rumal taq ri yutbʼal e ri taq bʼatzʼ, arech kkʼiy rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri ix, we xixkam chuwach taq ri jastaq rech ri uwachulew rukʼ ri Kristo ¿jas kʼu che, che ri ix kixniman na chuwach taq ri pixabʼ jacha ix kʼo na pa ri ikʼaslemal pa ri uwachulew riʼ?
«Makʼam ubʼi weriʼ, matij weriʼ, machap weriʼ».
Ronojel waʼ weriʼ, ksach uwach waʼ aretaq chiʼ kqakojo, che kipixabʼ e che kinoʼjibʼal winaq.
Ri uj, kqil we taq pixabʼ riʼ che nimalaj taq noʼjibʼal rumal rech che kukʼutinsaj che kʼo re ri Dyos chrech, e ri mochʼochik ibʼ che kubʼan kʼax che ri bʼaqilal; kʼatekʼut, man kʼo ta ubʼantajik chuwach ri unimal bʼaqilal.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, we ri ix, xixkʼastaj rukʼ ri Kristo, chitzukuj bʼaʼ ri jastaq che rech chikaj, jawijeʼ kʼo wi ri Kristo, che tʼuyulik pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos.
Are chixchoman chrech ri jastaq che rech chikaj, mixchoman chrech ri jastaq che rech ri uwachulew,
rumal rech, che ri ix xixkam rukʼ ri Kristo e ukamik riʼ, ri ikʼaslemal awatalik rukʼ ri Kristo pa ri Dyos:
Aretaq chiʼ, ri Kristo kuqʼalajisaj na ribʼ, che are areʼ ikʼaslemal, xoqujeʼ ri ix, nimalaj iqʼijil riʼ kqʼalajinik rukʼ ri Areʼ.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, chiqʼilaʼ bʼaʼ ri jetaq utzʼaqatil ri ibʼaqil chrech ri jastaq uwach rech we uwachulew riʼ: ri makunik rukʼ ixoq achi, ri man chʼajchʼoj taj, ri itzel taq rayibʼal, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chrech ri pwaq jun qʼijlanik chech ri man dyos taj;
ronojel waʼ weriʼ, kukʼamaʼ uloq ri royowal ri Dyos pakawiʼ ri eʼareʼ che ri man keniman taj.
Xoqujeʼ xibʼan ix weriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ix kʼo kukʼ eʼareʼ.
Kamik riʼ, chikʼyaqaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼik ronojel weriʼ: ri oyowal, ri kʼaʼnal, ri itzel taq chomabʼal, ri kʼax taq tzij, ri itzel taq tzij; rajawaxik, che weriʼ, man kʼo ta pa ri ichʼawibʼal ri ix.
Mibʼan taq tzij chbʼil taq iwibʼ. Ri ix, chiyaʼa bʼaʼ kan ri ojer winaq rukʼ taq ri uchak,
chiwatzʼyaqij bʼaʼ ri kʼakʼ winaq, ri areʼ che pa taq bʼiqʼal kbʼek chi kʼateʼ kopan na pa ri qas tzʼaqatalaj noʼjibʼal e kux kʼakʼ, jeʼ jas ri uwachbʼal ri xbʼanow ri areʼ.
Pa weriʼ, man kʼo ta ajgriʼego, man kʼo ta ajjudiʼo, man kʼo ta pusinik uwiʼ ukowil on man pusinik ta ukowil, man kʼo ta kaxlan winaq, man kʼo ta ajessita, man kʼo ta ajpatanel on ajaw; xane ronojel are ri Kristo e ri areʼ kʼo pa ronojel.
Ri ix, xixsikʼix rumal ri Dyos, arech ixtyoxlaj taq winaq e ixuloqʼ ri areʼ; chikojoʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ jun chomabʼal rech utzil, nim chiwilaʼ wi ri jun chik, chiwonoʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ; chkʼol bʼaʼ ri jaʼmaril e ri kochʼonik iwukʼ;
chikuyuʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ we kʼo taq ri kichʼaʼ chixoʼl. Ri Ajawxel xusach ri imak ix, xoqujeʼ ri ix jewaʼ chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ kamik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri sibʼalaj nim chuwach ronojel weriʼ, are riʼ, che ri ix kʼo ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx; rukʼ weriʼ, kʼo ronojel utzil.
Rukʼ ronojel weriʼ, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri ujaʼmaril ri Kristo pa ri iwanimaʼ, rumal rech che ri ix ixsikʼitalik, arech xa jun bʼaqilal kiwoko. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri ikʼaslemal, nim chiwilaʼ wi ri Dyos.
Chkanaj kan bʼaʼ ri Utzij ri Kristo pa ri itinimit; chikʼutuʼ bʼaʼ ri noʼjibʼal e ri utzalaj taq tzij chbʼil taq iwibʼ. Chibʼixoj bʼaʼ taq maltyoxibʼal rech ri Dyos rukʼ ronojel iwanimaʼ, nikʼaj taq salmos, himnos e utzalaj taq bʼix.
E ronojel jas uwach che kibʼij on che kibʼano, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus e rumal ri areʼ chixmaltyoxin bʼaʼ chrech ri Dyos Tatxel.
Ix ixoqibʼ, chixniman bʼaʼ chrech ri iwachajil, jeriʼ jacha qas utz pa ri Ajawxel.
Ix ixachajilal chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ ri iwixoqil e mibʼan kʼax chrech.
Ix ixalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ, chixniman bʼaʼ pa ronojel chkech ri inan itat, waʼ weriʼ, utz pa ri Ajawxel.
Ix ixnan tat, mibʼan kʼax chkech ri ewalkʼuwaʼl, arech ri eʼareʼ man kubʼan ta kebʼ kikʼuʼx.
Ix ixajpataninel, chixniman pa ronojel chkech ri iwajabʼ che erech we uwachulew riʼ, man xuwi ta rumal kixkil ri winaq, xane rukʼ jun utzalaj animaʼ, pa ri xibʼrikil chuwach ri Ajawxel.
Xaq apachichike ri ichak kibʼano, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ ronojel iwanimaʼ, jeʼ jas jun chak chuwach ri Ajawxel e man rumal taj kixkil ri winaq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, qas iwetaʼm che ri Ajawxel kuyaʼ na riʼ chiwech ri utojbʼalil, aretaq chiʼ kuyaʼ na riʼ chiwech ri echbʼal. Ri Ajaw che kipatanij ix, are ri Kristo,
ri jun che kubʼan ri man sukʼil taj, kyaʼtaj na riʼ chrech ri utojbʼalil che xas ma sukʼil ta riʼ. Ri Ajawxel, man are ta kril na riʼ ri uwachbʼal ri winaq.
Ix ixajaw, chiyaʼa bʼa chkech ri iwajchakibʼ ri qas utz e ri qas usukʼil, kʼatekʼuriʼ, qas iwetaʼm che ri ix xoqujeʼ kʼo jun iwajaw chikaj.
Qas chixkanaj pa ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, ri kixbʼanow ko pa ri maltyoxinik.
Chixchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pa nimalaj paqawiʼ ri uj, arech ri Areʼ kujaq utz taq tinimit chqawach chech ri saqalajtzij, e xoqujeʼ arech kujkowin chech ubʼixik ri awatalik rech ri Kristo, che rumal areʼ, ri in inkʼo pacheʼ;
arech, kinkowinik kinyaʼ ubʼixik qas jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri rajawaxik.
Qas chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ inoʼjibʼal kukʼ ri jachitaq man ekʼo ta qukʼ; chiwetaʼmaj resaxik ri utzil chech ri jastaq che rech we uchanim riʼ.
Qas chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ utz taq tzij pa ri itzijonem, nikʼaj taq tzij che rech taq noʼjibʼal; chibʼij bʼaʼ utz alaj taq tzij chech utzalijik uwach ri tzij aretaq chiʼ kixchʼaw kukʼ eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri nuwiʼ ri in, ronojel riʼ kubʼij na ri Tikiko chiwech, ri areʼ che jun loqʼlaj achalaxik, jun sukʼalaj ajchak e jun achalaxik wachiʼl pa ri chak rukʼ ri Ajawxel.
Ri in, kintaq ubʼi ri areʼ iwukʼ, arech kuyaʼ jun qatzijol chiwech e kukubʼaʼ ikʼuʼx.
Rukʼ ri areʼ, kintaq ubʼik ri Onesimo, ri areʼ che sukʼ e loqʼlaj achalaxik e che ajitinimit. Eʼareʼ waʼ ri eʼareʼ kebʼin na chiwech, ronojel ri jastaq uwach che kqakʼulmaj waral.
Ri Aristarko, ri areʼ che kʼo wukʼ pa cheʼ, kutaq ubʼi jun rutzil iwach, xoqujeʼ ri Markos ri areʼ che rachalal ri Bʼernabʼe e puwiʼ ri areʼ xkʼamtaj iwumal kebʼ oxibʼ taq tzij. We kopan ri areʼ pa ri itinimit qas utz ukʼulaxik chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri areʼ.
Ri Jesus che xoqujeʼ ubʼi Justo, xoqujeʼ ri areʼ kutaq ubʼi jun rutzil iwach. Ri eʼareʼ e xuwi ri pusim uwiʼ kikowil che xechakun wukʼ pa ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ are xekubʼisan nukʼuʼx.
Ri Epafras che ewinaq, kutaq jun rutzil iwach; ri are riʼ rajchak ri Kristo Jesus, ri areʼ, kukoj uchuqʼabʼ piwiʼ ri ix pa ri uchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, arech ri ix, qas ix ko kixkanaj pa ronojel utzil e usukʼil e pa ronojel urayibʼal ri Dyos.
Jeriʼ kinbʼij puwiʼ ri areʼ, rumal rech che ri in, wilom ri nimalaj chak kubʼano rech toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix, xoqujeʼ rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach ri winaq rech Laʼodiseʼa e ri winaq rech Hiʼerapolis.
Ri ix, kutaq ubʼi rutzil iwach ri Lukas, ri loqʼalaj ajkunel, xoqujeʼ ri Demas.
Chiyaʼa bʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri eʼachalaxik che erech Laʼodiseʼa, xoqujeʼ ri Ninfas e ri Komon Tyox che kkimulij kibʼ pa ri rachoch.
Aretaq chiʼ xsikʼitaj we wuj riʼ pa ri itinimit, xoqujeʼ chibʼana bʼaʼ, arech ksikʼix uwach pa ri Komon Tyox rech Laʼodiseʼa; e xoqujeʼ ri ix, chisikʼij bʼaʼ ri wuj che ktaq uloq chiwech chi pa ri Laʼodiseʼa uloq.
Chibʼij bʼaʼ chech ri Arkipo: «Qas chawilij ri chak che ri at xakʼamo chi pa ri Ajawxel e qas utz ubʼanik bʼaʼ chabʼanaʼ».
Ri in, kinya ubʼik ri rutzil iwach chi rukʼ ri nuqʼabʼ, ri in che in Pabʼlo. Chinaʼtisaj bʼaʼ ri jetaq chʼichʼ kojom chwech pa ri cheʼ. ¡Ri sipanik chkʼojiʼ bʼa ʼ iwukʼ!
Ri Pabʼlo, ri Silbʼano e ri Timoteʼo, chkech ri Komon Tyox kech ri eʼajtesalonika, che Komon Tyox pa ri Dyos Tatxel e pa ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo. Kqaya apan jun rutzil iwach e nimalaj utzil chiwech.
Pa ronojel kajbʼal, nim kqil wi ri Dyos piwiʼ; kixqanaʼtisaj pa ronojel ri qachʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kqanaʼtisaj chuwach ri Qadyos e Qatatxel ri ichak, ri ikojonik, ri ichak pa ri iloqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼux, ri nimalaj uchoqʼabʼ ri iweyeʼbʼal che petinaq rukʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Loqʼalaj taq achalaxik rumal ri Dyos, qetaʼm che ri ix, ixchaʼtalik.
Rumal rech che ri Utzalaj Qatzij man xopan ta iwukʼ xaq rukʼ taq ri tzij, xane xoqujeʼ xopan iwukʼ rukʼ uchoqʼabʼ e rukʼ sibʼalaj uchak ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix iwetaʼm jas ubʼanik xqabʼan ri qachak chixoʼl ix.
Pa iwech wi, ri ix xibʼano ix jeriʼ, uj jacha ri uj e jacha ri Ajawxel, aretaq chiʼ pa kʼilaj taq kʼax xikʼulaj ri Tzij, xikʼulaj rukʼ ukiʼkotemal ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel:
Tekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, ix jun kʼamabʼal noʼj chkiwach konojel ri ekojonelabʼ ekʼo pa ri Masedoniʼa e rech ri Akaya.
Ri Utzij ri Ajawxel sibʼalaj naj xel ubʼi pa ri itinamit, man xaq ta pa ri Masedoniʼa e pa ri Akaya, xane pa ronojel kʼolbʼal, xoqujeʼ ri ikojonik chrech ri Dyos, xa jekʼuriʼ ma rajawaxik taj che kujchʼaw puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Jelaʼ wi, ri eʼareʼ kkitzijoj ubʼixik jas ri qokibʼal ri uj xqabʼan pa ri itinamit e jas ri ukʼexik iwibʼ chuwach ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ xiya kan ri joʼs taq dyoses arech are kipatanij ri kʼaslik e ri qastzij Dyos.
Xoqujeʼ ri reyeʼxik kibʼano ri Ukʼojol che kpe na riʼ pa ri kaj, ri areʼ che xkʼasbʼaʼx uwach chi chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri Jesus che kujutoʼtajisaj chuwach ri oyowal che petinaq uloq.
Achalaxik, ri ix iwetaʼm che ri qokibʼal pa ri itinimit, kʼo wi ri upatan.
Ri ix, iwetaʼm che ri uj kʼo ri sibʼalaj kʼax xqakʼaxkʼolij xoqujeʼ kʼo sibʼalaj itzel taq tzij xqakʼaxkʼolij pa ri Filipos, kʼatekʼut ri Qa-dyos xuya ri qachoqʼabʼ arech ri uj pa taq ri kʼax kqaya ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij chiwech.
Ri qatzij kqaya ubʼixik chiwech, man petinaq ta rukʼ ri joʼs jastaq, man petinaq taj rukʼ ri itzel jastaq e man kqaj taj kixqasubʼu.
Xaq xuwi ri Dyos xyaʼow chqech ri Utzalaj Tzij, aretaq chiʼ xujrilo che ri uj, uj utz pa ri kʼax, xajekʼuriʼ kqabʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij e man are ta kqaj che ri winaq, utz kujkilo, xane are kqaj che utz kujril ri Dyos, ri areʼ che kril ri animaʼ pa ri kʼax.
Man kʼo ta jun joʼs tzij xqabʼij, ri ix iwetaʼm, man are ta xqachomaj ri pwaq, ri Dyos qʼatbʼaltzij chrech weriʼ;
man xqatzukuj ta qaqʼijil chkiwach ri winaq, chkiwach ri siwan itinamit on qaqʼij pa jun chik kʼolbʼal,
puneʼtaneʼ uj taqoʼnelabʼ rech ri Kristo, ri uj kujkowinik weta xqakoj ri qaʼlal piwiʼ. Kʼatekʼut, ri uj uj utz taq winaq xqabʼan chixoʼl xqabʼano jeʼ jas jun nan che kuya ri wa chkech ri eral e kubʼan ri rajawaxik chkech,
xa jeriʼ nakʼut, sibʼalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal qakʼuʼx chiwech, xqaj xqaya chiwech pa junamam, ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri Dyos e ri qakʼaslemal, rumal rech che nim ri iqʼij chqawach.
Achalaxikʼ, ri ix knaʼtaj chiwech ri qachak e ri qakosik: chi chaqʼabʼ e chi paqʼij, xujchakunik arech man kʼo ta jun kuya jun jas uwach chqech, aretaq chiʼ ri uj xqabʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij chiwech.
Ri ix, ix qʼatbʼaltzij puwiʼ weriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri Dyos, che ri uj xqabʼan ri tyoxlaj taq jastaq, ri utzalaj taq jastaq e man taqal ta yajkil chqech ri uj.
Jeʼ jas ubʼanik jun tatxel kukʼ ri eralkʼuwaʼl, ri ix iwetaʼm che iwukʼ ix iwonojel, ri uj
xqaya jun tzij rech ichoqʼabʼ, xqaya jun tzij rech qʼaʼlbʼal ikʼuʼx, xqatzʼonoj chiwech arech ri ix kkʼojiʼ jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal chuwach ri Dyos che ixusikʼim arech kixpe pa ri rajawibʼal e ri uqʼijil.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri uj nim kqil wi ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal, rumal rech che aretaq chiʼ xikʼam ri utzij ri Dyos che xqaya ubʼixik chiwech, man xikʼam taj jeʼ jas kitzij ri winaq, xane xikʼamo jeʼ jas ri saqalaj ubʼeʼal, che are Utzij ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we tzij riʼ kchakun iwukʼ ri ix, ri ix kojonelabʼ.
Rumal rech che ri ix, ix achalaxik, xibʼano jeriʼ jeʼ jas taq ri etyox winaq rech ri Dyos pa ri Kristo Jesus pa ri Judeʼa: ri ix kʼo kʼax xiriqo rumal kech ri iwinaq jeriʼ jas ri xkiriq ri eʼareʼ kumal ri eʼajjudiʼo:
Eʼare waʼ we winaq riʼ ri xkikamisaj ri Ajawxel Jesus e ri eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, eʼare waʼ ri xkibʼan kʼax chqech ri uj, ri Dyos, man eʼutz taj kerilo; ri eʼareʼ ekikʼulel ronojel winaq,
aretaq kujkiqʼatej ri uj che uyaʼiʼk ubʼixik ri Tzij chkech ri winaq che man junam ta qakojonik kukʼ, arech kʼo ri kikolotajem; xajekʼuriʼ, rumal weriʼ pa ronojel kajbʼal tajin kkitzʼaqatisaj ri nimalaj kimak; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Royowal xqaj pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ arech kukʼis tzʼij pakiwiʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, achalaxik, aretaq chiʼ ujachom ribʼ qawach iwukʼ, kʼatekʼut man ujachom ra ribʼ ri qanimaʼ, rukʼ ronojel qanimaʼ sibʼalaj xqaj xqil chi jumul iwach.
Rumal kʼu waʼ, xqaj xujbʼe iwukʼ –xoqujeʼ, chi in wi in Pabʼlo, kʼi taq mul xinkoj nuchoqʼabʼ che kinbʼek– kʼatekʼuriʼ, xujuqʼatej ri Satanas.
Jeʼ na kʼut, ¿jachike kʼuriʼ ri qeyeʼbʼal, ri qakiʼkotemal, ri ukʼutbʼal qanimal chuwach ri Qajawxel Jesus aretaq chiʼ kpe ri areʼ, weta mata ix kʼo ri ix?
Jeʼ nakʼut, ix ri ix qaqʼijil e ix ri ix qakiʼkotemal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal che man kqaqʼiʼ ta chik che kqeyeʼj chi jumul weriʼ, kqaj xqakʼam uqʼabʼ che qatukel kujkanaj kan pa ri Atenas
e kqataq ubʼi le Timoteʼo iwukʼ, che qachalal uj e toʼbʼanel rukʼ ri Dyos pa ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Kristo, arech, ri areʼ, kuyaʼ uchoqʼabʼ e ukowil ri ikojonik,
arech man kʼo ta jun chiwech che kubʼan kebʼ ukʼuʼx pa taq ri kʼax. Ri ix qas iwetaʼm che are waʼ ri qechbʼal:
Aretaq chiʼ ri uj, uj kʼo chik chixoʼl, ri uj xqaya ubʼixik chiwech che kqariq na sibʼalaj taq kʼax, kʼatekʼuriʼ xpe na kʼut kamik riʼ, jeriʼ jacha iwetaʼm chik.
Xakʼu jeriʼ, rumal che ri in man kinqʼiʼ ta chik kinweyeʼj chi jumul weriʼ, kintaq ubʼi ri areʼ arech krilaʼ ri ikojonik. Kinweyeʼj che ri kojol ikʼuʼx mata bʼaʼ ixutzaqom pa ri itzel, xa jekʼuriʼ ri qachak weneʼ man utz ta chik ubʼanom.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we uchanim riʼ, ri Timoteʼo kʼateriʼ kulik chi pa ri itinimit uloq, kʼatekʼuriʼ kuya utzalaj taq utzijol chqech puwiʼ ri ikojonik e puwiʼ ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx: kubʼij che ri ix ikʼolom jun utzalaj chomanik paqawiʼ ri uj, xoqujeʼ che ri ix, kiwaj kiwil qawach jeʼ jas ri uj che kqaj kqil iwach.
Achalaxik, rukʼ ri ikojonik, ri uj kkʼojiʼ jun qachoqʼabʼ pa ronojel qaxibʼrikil e pa ronojel kʼax kqariqo.
