Kamik riʼ, ri uj kʼo jun kʼakʼalaj qakʼaslemal, rumal rech che ri ix sibʼalaj utz ix kanajinaq pa ri Ajawxel.
¿La qas kʼu kujkowin waʼ che utzalaj umaltyoxinik kqabʼan chrech ri Dyos piwiʼ ri ix, rumal rech ronojel ri kiʼkotemal kiya ix chqech chuwach ri Qadyos?
Chi chaqʼabʼ, chi paqʼij kqataʼ chrech, arech ri uj kqil chi na iwach e xa jekʼuriʼ kqaya na, kqatzʼaqatisaj na ri kraj na pa ri ikojonik.
Chi are ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos, Qatatxel e Qajawxel Jesus, kkʼamow ubʼi ri qabʼe chi iwukʼ ix.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, ri Ajawxel, kukʼiyirisaj ta bʼaʼ e kixujunamaj ta bʼaʼ pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chi rubʼilom taq iwibʼ e ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx kukʼ konojel jeʼ jas ri loqʼoqʼebʼal qakʼuʼx ri uj chiwech ix:
arech kkʼojiʼ uchoqʼabʼ ri iwanimaʼ pa ri tyoxlaj kʼaslemal chuwach ri Dyos, ri Qatatxel, pa ri upetbʼal uloq ri Ajawxel Jesus kukʼ konojel ri eʼutyoxlaj taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, achalaxik, ri uj kqata chiwech e kqakoj qachoqʼabʼ pa ri Ajawxel Jesus: ri ix xikʼulaj ri Qatzij puwiʼ ri kʼaslemal che kqaj chuwach ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, chixkʼaslemanoq jeʼ jas weriʼ; chnimar ta bʼaʼ uwach weriʼ pa ri ikʼaslemal.
Ri ix, utz retaʼmaxik ibʼanom ri upixabʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus che xqaqʼaxej chiwech.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are waʼ ri urayibʼal ri Dyos: ri utyoxrisaxik iwibʼ; mibʼan ri itzel taq jastaq,
rajawaxik che iwonojel ix kiwetaʼmaj ukʼamik ubʼi ri ibʼaqil pa ri tyox e utzalaj kʼaslemal,
e mixtzaq pa ri itzel kʼaslemal jeʼ jas kkibʼan ri enikʼaj chik che kʼo chi jun kikojonik che ma ketaʼm ta uwach ri Dyos;
chixoʼl ri ix, mata bʼaʼ kʼo jun kqʼaʼx puwiʼ ri rachalal on che kusubʼu ri rachalal. Ri Ajawxel kuya na ukʼoqabʼal waʼ weriʼ, jeʼ jas xyaʼtaj ubʼixik chiwech, e xoqujeʼ xqakojojej qachoqʼabʼ chech ubʼanik weriʼ.
Rumal rech che ri Dyos man xujusikʼij ta pa ri itzel kʼaslemal, xaneʼ xujusikʼij pa ri tyoxlaj kʼaslemal.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, we kʼo jun kretzalaj kukʼyaq ubʼi weriʼ, man kretzelaj taj, man kukʼyaq ta ubʼi jun winaq, xane are kretzelaj, are kukʼyaq bʼi ri Dyos che kubʼan sipanik chiwech pa ri Tyoxlaj Ruxlabʼxel.
Man rajawaxik taj, che ri uj kujtzʼibʼan chiwech puwiʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chkixoʼl ri eʼachalaxik, rumal rech che ri ix xiwetaʼmaj weriʼ chi qas rukʼ ri Dyos,
kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj utz ubʼanik kibʼan weriʼ kukʼ konojel ri achalaxik eʼajmasedoniʼa. Kʼatekʼut, kqata chiwech achalaxik, che qas chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, qas chixnabʼeʼajoq pa ri utzil,
chitzukuj iqʼijil pa ri jaʼmarilalaj kʼaslemal, rukʼ kixok il chech ubʼanik ronojel ichak, chixchakun bʼaʼ rukʼ ri iqʼabʼ, jeʼ jas ujtaqaninaq chiwech.
Rukʼ kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri ix kkʼojiʼ jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal riʼ chkiwach ri winaq che man ekʼo ta iwukʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta jun winaq riʼ rajawaxik chiwech.
Achalaxik ri uj man kqataj taj che man kʼo ta iwetaʼm pakiwiʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ. Maqʼoxow iwanimaʼ jeʼ jas ri enikʼaj taq winaq chik che man kʼo ta keyeʼbʼal.
Rumal che we kqakojo che ri Jesus xkamik, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkʼastaj uwach; xoqujeʼ, ri ewinaq che kewar pa ri rutzil ri Jesus, ri Dyos keʼukʼam ubʼi na riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ.
Rajawaxik kqabʼij weriʼ chiwech puwiʼ ri Utzij ri Ajawxel. Ri uj, ri uj winaq che kujkʼasiʼk, ri uj kʼo na aretaq chiʼ kpetik ri Ajawxel, man kujnabʼeʼaj ta riʼ chkiwach ri ekaminaq nabʼe chqawach.
Rukʼ ri kʼutbʼal che kuya na ri uchʼabʼal ri arkanjel, e rukʼ ri kʼutbʼal che kuya na ri utum ri Dyos, ri Dyos kxuliʼ uloq riʼ chi pa ri kaj uloq e ri xekam rumal ri Kristo, are kkʼastaj kiwach riʼ nabʼe;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, uj chi na kʼuriʼ, ri ujwinaq che uj kʼas na, ri uj kʼo na kanoq, kqamulij qibʼ riʼ kukʼ e kujkʼam bʼi riʼ puwiʼ taq sutzʼ arech kqakʼulaj ri Ajawxel pa ri kyaqiqʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, je na kʼuriʼ ri qakʼolem rukʼ ri Ajawxel chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Chiyaʼa bʼa ichoqʼabʼ chi rubʼilom taq iwibʼ rukʼ taq we chomanik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, puwiʼ taq ri kajbʼal e puwiʼ taq ri qʼij man rajawaxik taj kintzʼibʼan chiwech puwiʼ weriʼ achalaxik.
Ri ix, iwetaʼm che ri Uqʼij ri Ajawxel kpe riʼ jeʼ jas jun elaqʼom che kpe chaqʼabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri winaq kkibʼij na: ¡Nimalaj Utzil e man kʼo ta kok chqech! Chi pa we kajbʼal riʼ ktzaq na pakiwiʼ ri itzel, jeʼ jas taq ri qʼoxom kuriq ri ixoq che kril na uwach ri ral, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kekowin ta riʼ keʼanimajik ubʼik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix achalaxik, man ix kʼo ta pa ri qʼequʼm, arech che ri jun qʼij riʼ kixuriqaʼ jeʼ jas kubʼan jun elaqʼom:
rumal rech che iwonojel ri ix, ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri chaj saqil e ix ralkʼuwaʼl ri qʼij. Ri uj, man uj rech ta ri chaqʼabʼ e man uj rech ta ri qʼequʼmal.
Xajekʼuriʼ, rumal weriʼ mujwar bʼaʼ jeʼ jas kkibʼan ri enikʼaj taq winaq chik, xaneʼ chujkʼasaloq e chqachajij qibʼ chuwach ri jastaq.
Ri kewarik, chaqʼabʼ riʼ kewarik e ri keqʼabʼarik, chaqʼabʼ riʼ keqʼabʼarik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri uj che uj rech ri paqʼij, chqaqʼilaʼ bʼaʼ qibʼ chrech ri jastaq; chqakojoʼ bʼaʼ ri ukowil ri kojonik e ri ukowil ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e chqakojoʼ bʼaʼ ri ukowil ri eyeʼbʼal chrech ri kolotajem.
Ri Dyos man ujuyaʼom ta chuwach ri oyowal, xaneʼ ujuyaʼom arech kqariq ri kolotajem rumal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo,
che xkamik rumal nimalaj toqʼobʼ chqech ri uj, arech, puneʼtaneʼ ujkʼaslik on ujwarinaq, ri uj chi ujkʼaslik riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ.
Rumal kʼu weriʼ, rajawaxik che kiyaʼ ichoqʼabʼ chrech rubʼilom taq iwibʼ e che kiya kʼambʼal taq noʼj chiwach jeʼ jas kibʼan chi ukamik riʼ.
Kqata chiwech, achalaxik qas utzalaj kilik kibʼano ri kechakunik e kekos chi- xoʼl ri ix. Ri eʼareʼ eʼare ekʼamal taq bʼe chiwech chuwach ri Ajawxel e che ri eqʼilik chrech ri man utz taj.
Cheʼiwilij rukʼ sibʼalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal rumal ri kichak kkibʼano. Chikʼaslemaj utzil chixoʼl.
Xoqujeʼ, kqata chiwech achalaxik, cheʼiqʼilaʼ bʼaʼ ri xaq ksach kikʼuʼx, chiyaʼaʼ kichoqʼabʼ ri xaq xibʼiribʼ ekʼolik, chikubʼaʼ kikʼuʼx ri xaq kebʼ kanimaʼ kibʼanom, cheʼiqʼilaʼ bʼaʼ konojel ri winaq.
Qas chiwilij che man kʼo ta jun kutzalij ukʼaxel jun etzalal rumal jun etzalal chik, are nabʼe qas chixok il rech ri utzil chi rubʼilom taq iwibʼ e chrech ri utzil chkech konojel.
Qas amaqʼel chixkiʼkotoq.
Qas chixchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal.
Pa ronojel kʼolibʼal chixmaltyoxin chrech ri Dyos. Are waʼ ri urayibʼal ri Dyos chiwech pa ri Kristo Jesus.
Michup bʼaʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel,
miwetzelaj uwach ri jetaq usipanik ri qʼaxem utzij ri Dyos,
xaneʼ are chinikʼoj ronojel jas uwach: Kʼatekʼuriʼ are chikʼoloʼ jachike ri utz;
chikʼoloʼ iwibʼ, chiqʼilaʼ iwibʼ chrech ronojel itzel.
Qas chi xutyoxirisaj bʼaʼ ri Udyos ri nimalaj utzil, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel ri ixkʼas wi, ri iwuxlabʼal, ri ukʼuʼx iwanimaʼ e ri ibʼaqil, kikʼol chuwach ri itzel chi kʼa pa ri Upetibʼal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Ri areʼ, ri kixsikʼinik, man kukʼex ta ri utzij: e are Areʼ kbʼanow na weriʼ.
Achalaxik, xoqujeʼ chixchʼawoq, chita paqawiʼ chrech ri Dyos.
Chiyaʼaʼ jun nimalaj rutzil kiwach konojel ri achalaxik rukʼ jun tyoxlaj tzʼumanik.
Sibʼalaj rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ kinta chiwech, che chisikʼij we wuj riʼ chkiwach konojel ri eʼachalaxik.
¡Chkanaj ta bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri utoqʼobʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo!
Ri Pabʼlo, ri Sivano e ri Timoteʼo, chkech ri Komon Tyox Eʼajtesalonika, pa ri Dyos Tatxel e pa ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Are ta bʼaʼ ri Dyos Tatxel e ri Ajawxel Jesukristo, keyaʼow ri toqʼobʼ e ri utzil chiwech ri ix.
Ri uj, rajawaxik che nim kqil wi ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal rumal iwech ix achalaxik, jeʼ jas ri qas usukʼil, rumal rech che sibʼalaj tajin kkowir ri ikojonik e kkʼiy ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx iwonojel ix e chijujunal chixoʼl ix,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kʼo nimalaj qaqʼijil iwumal ix chkixoʼl taq ri ekomon Tyox rech ri Dyos, rumal ri ichoqʼabʼ e ri ikojonik pa taq ri kʼax e pa ri itzel che tajin kiqʼiʼo.
Rumal kʼu weriʼ, kukʼut na ribʼ ri sukʼilalaj uqʼatbʼaltzij ri Dyos chiwach, pa ri kiriq na wi ri ix ri rutzilal ri Rajawibʼal ri Dyos, arech kpetik, che ma rumal na kʼu waʼ tajin kiriq ri kʼax.
Rumal rech, che chi rech wi ri usukʼil ri Dyos, che kuya ri kʼax chkech ri keyoʼw ri kʼax chiwech ri ix,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, chiwech ri ix che ichʼijijem ri kʼax, kuya na ri chiwech ri jaʼmarilalaj kʼaslemal jacha ri uyaʼom chqech ri uj aretaq chiʼ kukʼut na ribʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus chi chikaj wi kukʼ ri eʼanjelibʼ e rukʼ ri uchoqʼabʼ,
pa jun ujuluw qʼaqʼ kʼatekʼuriʼ kukʼajisaj na kiwach ri man ketaʼm ta uwach ri Dyos e ri man keniman ta chrech ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Qajawxel Jesus.
Ri eʼareʼ kkʼajisax na kiwach rukʼ jun kʼaxkʼolil chubʼe qʼij chubʼe saq, naj ketas apanoq chrech ri uqʼijil e ri uchoqʼabʼ ri Ajawxel
aretaq chiʼ kpe na pa ri jun qʼij che ukʼamik na ri uqʼijil kukʼ ri eʼutyoxlaj taq winaq e arech nim kil na wi kumal konojel ri xekojon chrech ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix xixkojon chrech ri qatzij ri uj. Je na kʼuriʼ pa we jun qʼij riʼ.
Rukʼ waʼ we chomanik riʼ, xoqujeʼ, ri uj kujchʼaw piwiʼ rukʼ ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal, arech ri Areʼ, utz kubʼan chiwech pa ri usikʼinik, arech utz kubʼan chrech ronojel ri irayibʼal rukʼ ri uchoqʼabʼ ri areʼ, arech ri ix kibʼan ri utzil e qas ix sakʼaj pa ri ikojonik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ rumal kʼu weriʼ, ri ubʼiʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus kqʼijilaxik iwumal ri ix e ri ix kixqʼijilax na xa rumal ri areʼ, jeʼ jas ri kraj ri utoqʼobʼ ri Qadyos e ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Achalaxik ri uj kqata weriʼ chiwech puwiʼ ri Upetbʼal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo e puwiʼ ri qamulin ibʼ rukʼ ri Areʼ,
mixchʼuʼjarik, mixeʼj iwibʼ chuwach jujun taq uqʼalajisabʼal uwach ri Uxlabʼxel, chuwach jujun taq tzij, on chuwach jun wuj tzʼibʼam che ksikʼix uwach e kbʼixik che qech uj, e che rumal, ri ix kichomaj che ri Uqʼij ri Ajawxel, xas petinaq chik.
Mata bʼaʼ kʼo jun winaq kixsubʼuwik pa jun jas uwach neʼ. Chuxeʼ na kanoq, kpaqchiʼx na ri ikojbʼal e kuqʼalajisaj na ribʼ ri Itzelalaj Achi, ri Ukʼojol ri Sachbʼal ibʼ,
ri jun che are, ri Kʼulel, ri kuwaʼlisaj na ribʼ puwiʼ ronojel jas uwach che rukʼam ri ubʼiʼ ri Dyos, on ronojel ri kqʼijilax uwach, e che kopan na ri areʼ ktʼuyiʼ pa ri tyoxlaj ukʼolibʼal ri Dyos e kukʼut na ribʼ che xas Dyos wi ri areʼ.
Qas utz unaʼtisaxik chibʼanaʼ che ri in xinbʼij waʼ weriʼ chiwech aretaq chiʼ xinkʼojiʼ iwukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix iwetaʼm jas ri ximowinaq ri areʼ kamik riʼ arech qas kuqʼalajisaj na uwach riʼ chi pa ri ukajbʼal.
We uchanim riʼ, awatalik ri itzel uchak kubʼano. Kʼatekʼuriʼ xaq aretaq chiʼ kkʼam ubʼi ri ximowinaq rech,
kukʼut ribʼ riʼ ri Itzel e ri Ajawxel kusach na uwach ri areʼ rukʼ ri uxutʼbʼal kyaqiqʼ uchiʼ e kukʼis na tzij puwiʼ, aretaq chiʼ kuqʼalajisaj na ribʼ pa ri Upetbʼal.
Ri upetbʼal ri Itzel, kilitaj na riʼ rumal ri uchak ri Satanas kilitajik riʼ rukʼ ronojel chak rech choqʼabʼ, joʼs taq kʼutbʼal e maybʼal
jeriʼ jas ronojel ri joʼs taq jastaq rech ri itzel, che keʼukʼamij na ri kkisach na kibʼ, rumal rech che man xkikʼulaj ta ri loqʼoqʼebʼalalaj ukʼuʼx ri saqalaj tzij che xkowin neʼ chkikoloxik.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri Dyos kutaq jujun taq chomanik chkech arech keʼusubʼu e kbʼan chkech che kkikoj ri joʼs taq jastaq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal weriʼ, kbʼan na qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ konojel ri man xkaj taj xekojon chrech ri saqalaj tzij, xaneʼ are xkaj uwach ri itzel.
Ri uj, rajawaxik che nim kqil wi ri Dyos pa ronojel kajbʼal iwumal ri ix, achalaxik ri ix che ixloqʼ rumal ri Ajawxel, rumal rech che ri Dyos chi pa ri umajibʼal uloq xixusikʼij arech kixkoltaj rumal ri Uxlabʼxel e rumal areʼ kutyoxirisaj ri ikojonik pa ri saqalaj tzij:
xixusikʼij chrech weriʼ rumal ri Utzalaj Qatzij, arech kixkowin chech uriqik ri uqʼijil ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Rukʼ kʼu weriʼ achalaxik, qas chixkʼoloq, qas utz ukʼolik chibʼanaʼ ri kʼutunik che xiwetaʼmaj qukʼ ri uj, rumal neʼ ri qachʼawibʼal on rumal neʼ ri qatzʼibʼanik.
Are ta bʼaʼ ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo e ri Dyos Qatatxel, che xas ujuloqʼoqem, ujuyaʼom rumal nimalaj toqʼobʼ, ukubʼisam qakʼuʼx pa ronojel qʼij e uyaʼom ri eyeʼbʼal chqech,
kukubʼisaj bʼaʼ ri ukʼuʼx iwanimaʼ, kuyaʼ bʼaʼ ri uchoqʼabʼ ri iwanimaʼ chech ubʼanik ronojel utzalaj chak e utzalaj tzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ukʼisbʼal kanoq, kqabʼij chiwech achalaxik, chixchʼaw paqawiʼ ri uj, chuwach ri Dyos chita bʼaʼ arech kbʼe raqanil ri utzij ri Ajawxel, arech qas kkʼojiʼ ri uqʼijil, jacha xkʼojiʼ pa ri itinimit ri ix,
xoqujeʼ, arech kujtoʼtaj pa kiqʼabʼ ri winaq che esachinaq e che eʼitzel taq winaq –rumal, rech che man xyaʼtaj ta ri kojonik chkech konojel ri ewinaq.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Ajawxel, ri areʼ man kukʼex ta ri Utzij: ri areʼ qas kuya na ri ichoqʼabʼ e qas kixukʼol na chuwach ri Itzel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj qakubʼaʼm ri qakʼuʼx chrech ri Ajawxel, utz ujikibʼaxik qabʼanom: che ronojel ri jastaq uwach kujtaqan chiwech, ri ix tajin kibʼano e chi kibʼan na waʼ.
Qakubʼaʼm qakʼuʼx che are ri Ajawxel kkʼutuw ri ubʼe ri iwanimaʼ chi kʼa pa ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos e kʼa pa ri uchoqʼabʼ ri Kristo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo, kujtaqan chiwech achalaxik, chitasaʼ iwibʼ chrech ronojel achalaxik che man rukʼam ta jun sukʼilalaj kʼaslemal e che man uterembʼem ta ri tzij che xiwetaʼmaj ix chi qukʼ ri uj.
Rumal rech che utz retaʼmaxik ibʼanom che ri ix rajawaxik kitaqej ri bʼe jeʼ jas xqabʼan ri uj che man xaq ta apas uwach kʼaslemal xqabʼano,
xoqujeʼ ma xaq ta loqʼ xyaʼtaj jun qawa kumal ri winaq, xaneʼ chi paqʼij chi chaqʼabʼ chujchakunik, xqakojoʼ qachoqʼabʼ e xujkosik, arech ma kʼo ta jun winaq chixoʼl ri ix che kʼo jun jas uwach kuya chqech:
ri uj taqal chqech, yaʼtal chqech weriʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, are kqaj che kqakʼut chiwach che ri uj, uj kʼambʼal noʼj chiwech, arech kujiterembʼej.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ uj kʼo chixoʼl, uj kʼo iwukʼ, ri uj xqaya we pixabʼ chiwech riʼ: we kʼo jun winaq che man kraj taj kchakunik, xoqujeʼ mawaʼik.
Rumal che ri uj, xqata raqanil, xqata utzijol che ekʼo jujun chixoʼl che man sukʼil taj ri kkibʼano, man kechakun taj. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel jas uwach keʼok ilo chrech.
Pa ri Ajawxel Jesukristo kqabʼan jun sikʼinik e kqata chkech we winaq riʼ, chechakun bʼaʼ rukʼ jaʼmaril arech chi eʼare kechʼakow ri kiwa kkitijo.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix, ix achalaxik, mitanabʼaʼ mixkosik che uchakuxik ri utzil.
We kʼo jun winaq che man kunimaj ta we pixabʼ kqabʼij chiwech pa we wuj riʼ, chitzʼibʼaj ri ubʼiʼ, e arech kel ukʼix, chitasaʼ iwibʼ chrech ri areʼ;
kʼatekʼut, mibʼan ikʼulel chrech ri areʼ, xaneʼ chiyajaʼ bʼaʼ jeʼ jacha uyajik jun achalaxik.
Are ta bʼaʼ ri Areʼ ri Rajawxel ri jaʼmaril kyaʼow ri jaʼmaril chiwech ronojel qʼij e pa ronojel jas uwach. Kkʼojiʼ ta bʼaʼ ri Ajawxel iwukʼ.
We rutzil iwach riʼ chi pa ri nuqʼabʼ kel ubʼi wi, pa ri nuqʼabʼ ri in in Pabʼlo. Are waʼ ri retal nuqʼabʼ che kukʼut ronojel wuj kintzʼibʼaj. Jewaʼ kintzʼibʼanik.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri utoqʼobʼ ri Ajawxel Jesuskristo.
Ri Pabʼlo, Apostol rech ri Jesus Kristo, rumal ri utaqanik ri Dyos Qakolonel e rumal ri Kristo Jesus che qeyeʼbʼal,
chrech ri Timoteʼo, ri areʼ che qastzij walkʼuwaʼl pa ri kojonik, chrech ri areʼ ri sipanik, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e ri nimalaj utzil rech ri Dyos Tatxel e rech ri Kristo Jesus Qajawxel.
Aretaq chiʼ ri in xinmajij nubʼe kinbʼe pa ri Masedoniʼa, xinta chawech arech katkanaj kan pa ri Efeso, arech ri at kattaqan chkech enikʼaj taq winaq che man kkikʼut ta chik nikʼaj tzij che kaxlan taq tzij,
e mikojon chrech nikʼaj tzij che ejoʼs taq tzij e mikojon chrech nikʼaj mayilqʼijsaq che man kʼo ta ukʼisik; e weriʼ, xas xuwi kubʼan kʼax e man kʼo ta chrech kupatanij ri urayibʼal Dyos, che tikitajinaq pa ri kojonik.
Ri kraj we taqanik riʼ, are nabʼe kraj ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx che petinaq pa jun utzalaj animaʼ, petinaq pa jun utzalaj chomanik, e pa jun qastzijalaj kojonik.
Enikʼaj winaq, che man xekanaj ta kan pa weriʼ, xeqaj pa nikʼaj joʼs taq tzij;
ri eʼareʼ, kkichomaj che enim taq ajtij chrech ri Pixabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man ketaʼm ta ri jastaq kkibʼij, e xoqujeʼ, man ketaʼm ta ri jastaq che eʼajtijabʼ chrech.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri uj qetaʼm chik, che ri Pixabʼ xas utz wi, we utz ukojik kqabʼano.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, qas chnaʼtaj bʼaʼ chqech che ri Pixabʼ man xbʼan taj rumal kech ri eʼutz taq winaq xane xbʼanik rumal kech ri man enimanel taj e ri eʼajchʼojabʼ, rumal kech ri man kekojon taj, ri eʼajmakibʼ, ri eʼareʼ che ketzelaj uwach ri Tyox e ri Dyos, ri eʼareʼ che kkikamisaj ri kinan kitat, ri eʼareʼ che ekamisanel,
ri kemakun rukʼ achi ixoq, ri eʼareʼ che kekikʼayij ri winaq, ri ejoʼs taq winaq, ri eʼareʼ ri ma kekojon ta chrech ri tzij kkʼutik,
ri tzij che utz chnuwach ri Utzalaj Tzij rech ri uqʼijil ri Dyos che ri areʼ utzalaj ubʼantajik, e ri tzij che xya chwech ri in.
Kinmaltyoxin chrech ri Areʼ, ri xyaʼow chwech ri in, ri nuchuqʼabʼ, ri areʼ che are ri Kristo Jesus Qajawxel, che in utz xinrilo e xinusikʼij arech kinuxik in rajchak,
ri in, che ojer kanoq, xinbʼij ri itzel puwiʼ ri Dyos, in bʼanal kʼax chrech ri Komon Tyox, in bʼil re ri itzel puwiʼ ri Tyoxlaj. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in xkuytaj uwach ri numak, rumal rech, che ri in, man wetaʼm taj ronojel ri xinbʼano, ri in, in kaxlanlaj winaq chuwach ri kojonik;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri usipanik ri Qajawxel sibʼalaj xkʼojiʼ uwiʼ wukʼ ri in e xoqujeʼ jeriʼ ri kojonik e ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx rech ri Kristo Jesus.
Qastzij na kʼut we tzij riʼ e xas taqalik kkʼam uqʼabʼ we kjikibʼaxik ubʼixik: Ri Kristo Jesus, xpe pa we uwachulew che kikoloxik ri eʼajmakibʼ; e in ri in nabʼe chkech ri eʼajmakibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri in xinriq kuybʼal numak, weriʼ xbʼantajik arech chi pa ri in kuqʼalajisaj nabʼe ri ukochʼonik ri Jesus Kristo, arech jun kʼutbʼal chkiwach konojel ri chi rajawaxik wi che kekojon na chrech ri areʼ, arech kkʼojiʼ ri junalikalaj kikʼaslemal.
Chrech ri Ajawinel, chech ri ajaw chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq, ri areʼ che qastzij Dyos, ri man kilitaj taj, ri areʼ che xuwi jun chi Dyos, ¡chrech ri areʼ utzalaj taq tzij, chech areʼ ri qʼijil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq! ¡Amen!
Are waʼ we tzij riʼ, che ri in kinbʼij chawech ri at, at Timoteʼo, che at walkʼuwaʼl; ri tzij xbʼix pawiʼ che junam bʼenaq rukʼ ri kitzij ri eqʼaxel taq utzij ri Dyos. Rukʼ si we tzij riʼ, utzalaj bʼaʼ ri chʼoʼj chabʼanaʼ.
Qas chajeqebʼaʼ awukʼ ri kojonik e ri utzalaj chomabʼal; ekʼo nikʼaj che rumal che man xkikʼol ta weriʼ kukʼ, xkibʼan itzel pa ri kikojonik,
chkixoʼl we nikʼaj winaq riʼ, ekʼo ri Himeneʼo e ri Alejandro, ri eʼareʼ che xeʼinya chech ri Satanas, arech kketaʼmaj che man kkibʼij ta chi jumul itzel taq tzij puwiʼ ri Dyos.
Ri in, nabʼe, are qas kinchilbʼej, che chiwech qas chita bʼaʼ e chixchʼaw bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos, qas chitzʼonoj bʼaʼ chech ri Dyos e qas chixmaltyoxin chech ri areʼ rech toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach konojel ri winaq;
pakiwiʼ ri eʼajawinel, pakiwiʼ ri kʼo kikowinem arech, kkʼojiʼ jun jaʼmarilalaj qakʼaslemal qukʼ, rukʼ tabʼalalaj kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Dyos, e che qas taqal chqij ri uj.
Are waʼ weriʼ, ri qas utz chuwach ri Dyos Qajawxel e jewaʼ ri qas urayibʼal ri areʼ.
Ri areʼ, kraj keʼukol konojel winaq e che konojel kebʼe pa ri saqalajtzij.
Rumal rech che ri Dyos, xa jun chi Dyos e xa jun ri kchʼaw paqawiʼ ri uj ujwinaq rukʼ ri Dyos, che are ri Kristo Jesus che jun achi ri areʼ,
xujach ribʼ arech jun tojbʼal kech konojel ri winaq. Are waʼ ri utzalaj qʼatbʼaltzij chrij chi pa we ukamik riʼ,
e chrech weriʼ, ri in xinokisax in ajtij e in apostol – ri in kinbʼij ri saqalajtzij ma xa ta inbʼanaltzij, ri in in ajtij chkech ri man eʼajjudiʼos taj, chi pa ri kojonik e chi pa ri saqalajtzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, kinwaj che chi nimalaj konojel winaq chechʼaw bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos pa ronojel kʼolbʼal, e chkiwaʼlisaj bʼaʼ ri kiqʼabʼ chikaj, e ma ta bʼaʼ kʼo ri oyowal e ri chʼoʼj.
Ri eʼixoqibʼ, chkikojoʼ bʼaʼ ri katzʼyaq e kkinaʼ kibʼ che ri uwiqik kibʼ e utz ukʼolik kibʼ rukʼ ri katzʼyaq; makipachʼuj ri kiwiʼ rukʼ qʼan taq pwaq on rukʼ jelikalaj taq abʼaj, on rukʼ utzalaj taq payuʼ.
Xane chkatzʼyaqij kibʼ rukʼ utzalaj taq chak jacha ri taqal chkij ri eʼixoqibʼ che kechakun pa ri ukʼaslemal ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ kyaʼ ri tijonik ibʼ, rajawaxik che ri ixoq, man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij, xaq jaʼe choʼq chrech ri kbʼixik.
Ri in, man kinyaʼ ta bʼe chrech ri ixoq che kkʼutun chech ri tzij, xoqujeʼ che ri areʼ kubʼij jun pixabʼ chech ri achi. Xas rajawaxik wi che ri areʼ, man kʼo ta jun tzij kubʼij.
Rumal rech che are nabʼe xbʼan ri Adam e kʼateʼ xbʼan chi ri Eva.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man are ta ri Adam xsubʼik, xane are ri ixoq xsubʼik e xubʼan ri ma yaʼtal taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ kkoltaj na riʼ rumal rech kuxik nanxel we ri areʼ kuwonej ribʼ e we kkanaj pa ri kojonik, pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx pa ri tyoxlaj kʼaslemal.
Tzij na kʼut, che utz we tzij riʼ: ri jun che kraj kubʼan ajyuqʼ, waʼ we chak riʼ, jun utzalj chak.
Xa je kʼuriʼ, rajawaxik che man kʼo ta jun etzelal pa ri ukʼaslemal, rajawaxik che rachajil xa jun ixoq, man sibʼalaj amajaʼ taj kutijo, xuwi kchʼawik ri rajawaxik, utz kukʼ ri winaq, utz kikʼulaxik ri winaq kubʼano, kkowin che ukʼutik ri tzij,
man kutij ta ri amajaʼ, man ajchʼoʼj taj, rajawaxik che kmeʼl winaq, ajtzukul ri utzil, man are ta kuloqʼoqʼej ri pwaq.
Rajawaxik che utzalaj ajqʼataltzij pa ri rachoch e kubʼano che ri eralkʼuwaʼl keniman chrech ri utzij jacha ri taqal chkij.
Rumal rech, we jun, man kʼo ta qʼatal utzij pa ri rachoch, ¿la kkowin kʼuriʼ chech ubʼanik utz kukʼ ri Komon rech ri Dyos?
Rajawaxik che ri areʼ, man jun kʼakʼ winaq ta pa ri kojonik, rumal rech che we jeriʼ, weneʼ ri nimal kkowin chrech ri areʼ e ri areʼ kbʼe pa ri uqʼatbʼaltzij ri kʼaxtok.
Xoqujeʼ, rajawaxik che ri man ekʼo ta qukʼ, utz kkil ri areʼ, arech man ketzelaj ta uwach e che ri areʼ, man ktzaq ta pa ri jetaq kʼambʼal kukoj ri Kʼaxtok.
Ri ediʼakonos, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik eʼutz taq achijabʼ, kkikʼol kitzij, man kkitij ta sibʼalaj amajaʼ, e man itzel taj kkibʼan che utzukuxik ri pwaq.
Chkikʼoloʼ bʼaʼ ri awatalik rech ri kojonik pa jun utzalaj chomabʼal.
Nabʼe, utz kilik na riʼ kbʼanik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, we man kʼo ta jun itzel kilitaj chkech, kyaʼ bʼaʼ riʼ chkech ri chak rech diʼakono.
Ri eʼixoqibʼ, xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ, rajawaxik che eʼutz, makibʼij ri itzel tzij pakiwiʼ ri winaq, xoqujeʼ makitij sibʼalaj amajaʼ, pa ronojel makikʼex bʼaʼ ri kitzij.
Ri ediʼakonos, rajawaxik che xa jun ri kixoqil e utzalaj qʼataltzij kkibʼan chkixoʼl ri eralkʼuwaʼl e pa ri kachoch.
Ri eʼareʼ, che eʼutz kkibʼan pa we chak riʼ, kkichʼak jun utzalaj kʼolibʼal riʼ e kkichʼak kichuqʼabʼ riʼ pa ri kojonik chrech ri Kristo Jesus.
Aretaq chiʼ kintzʼibʼaj weriʼ, xas weyeʼm wi che aninaq waʼ kinopan na riʼ awukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kinbʼiytajik, rajawaxik che ri at, awetaʼm ri qas utz kʼaslemal pa ri rachoch ri Dyos –che are ri Komon Tyox rech ri kʼaslik Dyos, che are raqanja e are utikbʼalil ri saqalajtzij.
Jeʼ nakʼuriʼ, nimalaj ubʼantajik waʼ ri Awatalik chrech ri ukʼaslemaxik ri Dyos: Xqʼalajisaxik pa ri bʼaqilal, xsukʼubʼaxik pa ri Uxlabʼxel, xilitaj uwach kumal ri eʼanjelibʼ, xyaʼ ubʼixik chkech ri jetaq amaqʼ, xkojon ri uwachulew chrech xyakik e xyaʼ nimalaj uqʼijil.
Jeʼ na kʼut, ri Uxlabʼxel saqalaj ubʼixik kubʼij, che pa ri ukʼisbʼalil ri uwachulew ekʼo enikʼaj winaq riʼ che kkipaqchiʼj na uwach ri kojonik e kkijatʼij na kibʼ riʼ rukʼ joʼs taq uxlabʼal e rukʼ taq utzij ri Kʼaxtok,
rumal rech che utz kkita riʼ ri kitzij ri kebʼ kipalaj taq winaq che tʼiqom ri qʼaqʼalaj chʼichʼ pa ri kichomabʼal;
we winaq riʼ kkiqʼil ri kʼulanem, kkiqʼil ri jetaq wa che utijik rij xbʼan rumal ri Dyos e arech rukʼ maltyoxibʼal chrech ri Dyos kkitij ri ekojoninaq e ri ketaʼm ri saqalajtzij.
Rumal rech, che ronojel ri jastaq xubʼan ri Dyos, xas utz wi e yaʼtalik ktijik we ri winaq kutij rukʼ maltyoxinik.
Ri Utzij ri Dyos e ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, are ktyoxrisan rech weriʼ.
We ri at, kakʼut weriʼ chkiwach ri eʼachalaxik; ri at, al jun utzalaj rajchak riʼ ri Kristo Jesus, at tzuqum riʼ rukʼ ri tzij rech ri kojonik e rukʼ ri utzalaj tzij che ri at aterneʼbʼem jeʼ jas at jun utzalaj tijoxel chkixoʼl nimalaj konojel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ; ri jetaq tzij che rech we uwach ulew e ri jetaq molom tzij che kech ri riʼj taq chuchuʼibʼ, chapaqchiʼj bʼaʼ uwach. Chakojoʼ bʼaʼ achuqʼabʼ pa ri kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Dyos.
Ri ukojik chuqʼabʼ rukʼ ri bʼaqilal man qas ta kʼo upatan; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Dyos utz chrech ronojel, rumal rech che rukʼam ri chiʼnik rech ri kʼaslemal, jun kʼaslemal che rech we uwachulew riʼ e jun kʼaslemal che kpe na riʼ chweʼq kabʼij.
Qastzij na kʼut we tzij riʼ, xoqujeʼ kujkowinik kqakojo.
We ri uj, kʼo ri kʼax kqariqo e kqakoj ri qachuqʼabʼ rumal rech che kʼo ri qeyebʼal chrij ri kʼaslik Dyos, ri areʼ che kolonel chi nimalaj qonojel, e are sibʼalaj kolonel chkech ri kekojonik.
Chayaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼixik e chakʼutuʼ bʼa weriʼ.
Mkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun, che kretzelaj awach rumal rech che majaʼ katriʼjobʼik. Kʼatekuriʼ, chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, at jun wachbʼal kʼutbʼal chkiwach ri kekojonik, rukʼ ri atzij, rukʼ ri akʼaslemal, rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx, rukʼ ri at sukʼil pa ronojel.
Chi aretaq chiʼ, majaʼ kinopan awukʼ, chatok bʼaʼ il chrech usikʼixik uwach ri tzʼibʼatalik, chrech ri pixbʼanik kukʼ ri winaq e chakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ ri tzij chkiwach.
Matzoqopij bʼaʼ ri usipanik ri Uxlabʼaxel uyaʼom chawech, ri xyaʼtaj chawech rumal ri tzij rech jun qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos e rumal che ri eqariʼjabʼ xkikoj kiqʼabʼ pawiʼ ri at.
Rukʼ ronojel awanimaʼ chawilij e chabʼanaʼ weriʼ, arech chi nimalaj konojel kkilo, che ri at, utz at bʼenaq.
Chawila awibʼ at e qas chawilaʼ ri ukʼutik ri tzij, qas bʼaʼ chatkanaj pa we jun bʼe riʼ. Rukʼ weriʼ, kakol na awibʼ at riʼ e keʼakol riʼ ri kkita ri atzij.
Mabʼan bʼaʼ kʼax chrech jun riʼj tataʼ rukʼ kʼax taq tzij, chabʼij bʼaʼ kebʼ oxibʼ tzij chrech, jacha chrech jun tatxel; e chkech ri eʼakʼojol chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ chkech jacha eʼawachalal,
chkech ri eriʼj taq chuchuʼibʼ, jacha jas enanaxel; e chkech ri alitomabʼ, jacha jas eʼawanabʼ pa ronojel sukʼil.
Nim cheʼawilaʼ wi ri emalkaʼn taq ixoqibʼ –ri in are kinbʼij, ri eqas malkaʼn–
We jun malkaʼn ixoq ekʼo ral on ekʼo riʼ taq umam, rajawaxik, che ri akʼalabʼ chketaʼmaj ukʼaslemaxik ri Dyos nabʼe kukʼ ri ekachalal e chketaʼmaj bʼaʼ utojik chkech ri ekinan tat ri xkibʼan che kikʼiyisaxik ri eʼareʼ. Weriʼ, utz chuwach ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che qastzij melkaʼn e man ekʼo ta chi rachalal, ri are kʼo ri reyeʼbʼal chrij ri Dyos e chi paqʼij e chi chaqʼabʼ kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos e chi kchoman puwiʼ ri utzij ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri malkaʼn ixoq che xuwi kchoman chrech taq ri urayibʼal, puneʼtaj kʼaslik, chi kaminaq chi wi riʼ.
Xoqujeʼ; waʼ weriʼ chbʼij bʼaʼ, arech ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun etzelal kriqitaj kukʼ.
We kʼo jun winaq, ma kubʼan ta ri utzil chkech ri erachalaxik pa rachoch, ri areʼ riʼ, xupaqchiʼj na kʼu riʼ ri ukojonik e sibʼalaj itzel chi na chuwach jun che man kʼo ta ukojonik.
Pa ri kijuqʼat ri emalkanibʼ, xuwi ktzʼibʼax kibʼi ri ixoqibʼ che oxkʼal chi kijunabʼ e che erixoqil xa jun chi achi kanoq.
Rajawaxik, che ri areʼ kukʼutuʼ che utz xubʼan pa ri ukʼaslemal: xeʼukʼiyisaj ri eral, utz kikʼulaxik ri winaq ubʼanom, xeʼuchʼaj ri etyoxlaj taq winaq xubʼan ri utzil chkech ri winaq che kiriqom kʼax e utz xukʼaslemal pa ronojel.
Ri emalkaʼn che majaʼ eriʼjabʼ, matzʼibʼaj kibʼiʼ chkixoʼl ri emalkaʼn, rumal rech, ri eʼareʼ aretaq chiʼ kpe chkech ri nikʼaj taq kirayibʼal che kukʼuleʼlaj uwach ri Kristo, ri eʼareʼ kkaj kekʼuliʼ chi jumul.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, kʼo qʼatbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ rumal rech che man xkikʼol taj ri xkiya kitzij chrech nabʼe kanoq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kkibʼano, kebʼe pa ronojel taq ja; e man xuwi taj che man kʼo ta jun jas kkibʼano, xane xoqujeʼ keʼok chech ubʼanik sibʼalaj tzij, keʼok che rilik e che unimik kibʼ pa ri man kʼo ta kech chech e keʼok che ubʼixik ri jastaq che man utz taj.
Ri in, are kwaj, che ri emalkaʼn che majaʼ eriʼj, chkibʼanaʼ chi bʼaʼ jumul ri kikʼaslemal, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ kalkʼuwaʼl, chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ qʼatbʼaltzij pa ri kachoch, xa jeriʼ waʼ, ri kikʼulel man kkowin ta riʼ kubʼij jun tzij pakiwiʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ekʼo ejujun chik che ekʼo chi rukʼ ri Satanas.
We kʼo jun ixoq che kʼo ukojonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kʼo jun malkaʼm ixoq chkixoʼl ri erachalal, chi chubʼanaʼ ri utzil chrech ri areʼ, arech man kuyaʼ ta jun eqaʼn chkech ri Komon Tyox, e xa jeriʼ, ri Komon Tyox, kkowin riʼ chkilixik ri qastzij emalkaʼnibʼ.
Ri eqariʼjal, che utz ubʼanik kkibʼan ri kichak, utz riʼ che eʼareʼ kamul kitojbʼal kkiriqo; e chech weriʼ, xas are enabʼe ri kkiriq kʼax aretaq chiʼ kkiyaʼ ubʼixik e kkikʼut ri Tzij.
Ri tzʼibʼatalik, jewaʼ neʼ kubʼij: Makoj bʼaʼ tzʼapibʼal uchiʼ ri amaʼ wakax che kupochʼ ri triko, xoqujeʼ, ri ajchak, rajawaxik che kʼo ri tojbʼal uchak.
Chakojoʼ bʼaʼ, ri tzij kbʼix puwiʼ jun qariʼjal, we ekebʼ on eʼoxibʼ winaq kebʼinik.
Ri eʼareʼ che kbʼix ri tzij pakiwiʼ, cheʼayajaʼ chkiwach konojel, arech ri enikʼaj chik kkʼojiʼ kixibʼrikil.
Ri in, kinta chawech chuwach ri Dyos, chuwach ri Kristo Jesus e chkiwach ri eʼutz taq anjelibʼ echaʼom: Qas utz ubʼanik chabʼanaʼ we pixabʼ riʼ e xaq are mawilo ri kibʼantajik ri winaq.
Xaq aninaq makoj aqʼabʼ puwiʼ jun winaq. Chʼakʼoloʼ awibʼ e maya awach rukʼ ri umak jun winaq chik. At chʼajchʼoj ukʼolik awibʼ chabʼanʼa.
Matij chi bʼaʼ xaq utukel joron. Chatijaʼ bʼa ri amajaʼ chech ri apam e chech ri jetaq ayabʼil.
Si chanim waʼ kilitajik ri kimak ejujun winaq aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kbʼan qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kimak ejujun chik chi kʼateʼ naʼtam kilitajik;
ri jeʼlikalaj taq kbʼanik xas kilitaj wi riʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kʼo ri man utz taj kqabʼano, man awatalik ta riʼ kkanajik.
Konojel ri eʼajchakibʼ rukʼ jun ajaw, rajawaxik nim kkil wi ri ekajaw, arech man kʼo ta itzel puwiʼ ri ubʼiʼ ri Dyos e ri Tzij.
(a) Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ekʼo kajaw che kʼo kikojonik, maketzelaj bʼaʼ kiwach eʼareʼ rumal rech che kachalal kibʼ; xane are sibʼalaj utzalaj kipatanaxik chi na chkibʼanaʼ, rumal rech che ri keʼkipatanij junam ri kikojonik kʼolik e erachiʼl ri Dyos. 2(b) Rajawaxik, che ri at, kayaʼ ubʼixik e kakʼut weriʼ.
We kʼo jun winaq kubʼij jun chik tzij e ma kkanaj kan ta rukʼ we tzij riʼ, ri Utzij ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo, che jun tzij che are ri kbʼe rukʼ ri kʼaslemanik pa ri Dyos,
ri jun winaq riʼ, umoyrisam ri nimal, man kʼo ta unoʼjbʼal: xane are kutzukuj nikaj taq chomabʼal chik che man utz taj, e kutzukuj ri choʼj rukʼ taq ri tzij; rukʼ weriʼ, kpe ri itzel taq rayibʼal, ri chʼoʼj, ri kʼax, ri itzel chomabʼal puwiʼ ri winaq,
ri nimalaj taq chʼoʼj che man kʼo ta ukʼisik e weriʼ chi kech wi ri winaq che man utz ta kichomabʼal kʼolik e che ri man ekʼo ta pa ri saqalajtzij; ri eʼareʼ kkichomaj, che ri kʼaslemanik rukʼ Dyos xa rech chʼakoj pwaq riʼ.
Jeʼ na kʼut, ri kʼaslemanik rukʼ ri Dyos, utz riʼ chrech ri jun winaq che ma kraj ta chi nim jastaq rech chuwach ri kʼolik.
Rumal rech, che ri uj, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach xqakʼam uloq chuwach we uwachulew, xoqujeʼ nakʼut, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kqakʼam bʼiʼ waʼ chuwach ri areʼ.
We kʼo qawa e we kʼo qatzʼyaq, ri uj chqachomaj bʼaʼ che utz qabʼanom riʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ, che are kkaj kʼo sibʼalaj kiqʼinomal, ketzaq pa ri itzel, pa ri kʼat, pa ri sibʼalaj itzel rayibʼal e weriʼ, keʼukʼam ubʼi ri winaq pa ri uchupik kiwach.
Rumal rech, che ri urabʼ ronojel itzel, are ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chrij ri pwaq. Ekʼo jujun winaq, che xkiloqʼoqʼej ri pwaq, naj xebʼe wi chrech ri kikojonik, e ri kalmaʼ xmayowik rumal sibʼalaj kʼax.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at, che at achi at rech ri Dyos, chatel ubʼik rukʼ anim chech weriʼ, are chawoqotaj ri sukʼil, ri kʼaslemanik rukʼ ri Dyos, ri kojonik, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, ri kochʼonik, ri kiʼal.
Utz uchʼojixik chʼabʼanaʼ ri chʼoʼj rech ri kojonik, chabʼochiʼj ri junalik kʼaslemal ri at sikʼim wi e che xajikibʼa ri atzij chrij chkiwach sibʼalaj winaq.
Ri in, kinta chawech chuwach ri Dyos, ri areʼ che kuyaʼ ri qakʼaslemal nimalaj qonojel e chuwach ri Kristo Jesus, che pa taq uqʼijil ri Ponsiʼo Pilato, xukʼut ri jun utzalaj kʼutbʼal,
chakʼoloʼ bʼaʼ ri pixabʼ chi pa sukʼil e pa ri chʼajchʼojil chi kʼateʼ na pa ri Uqʼalajisanik ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo,
jun qʼalajisanik che xas kukʼut wi riʼ pa taq ri qʼij che chʼikom kanoq ri utzalaj rech e ri xa jun chi Ajawinel, ri Ajawinel kech ri eʼajawinel e ri ajawxel kech ri eʼajawxel
ri xuwi areʼ che kʼo junalikalaj ukʼaslemal, ri areʼ che kʼo pa jun saqil jawiʼ man loqʼ taj kuyaʼ kbʼe wi jun, che man kʼo ta jun winaq rilom, xoqujeʼ man kkowin taj krilo chech ri areʼ ri qʼijil, ri chuqʼabʼalil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq: Amen.
Chkech ri eqʼinomabʼ rech we uwachulew riʼ, chʼabʼij bʼaʼ chkech, che man kkibʼan ta qʼatbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ ri enikʼaj chik chi pa ri kibʼantajik uloq ri eʼareʼ, man kkikubʼa ta kikʼuʼx chrech ri jetaq qʼinomal che kjaʼr ubʼik, xane are chkikubʼaʼ kikʼux chrij ri Dyos, ri areʼ che sibʼalaj kuyaʼ chqech ronojel jas uwach, arech tzʼaqat ukojik kqabʼano.
Chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri utzil, cheqʼinomar bʼaʼ rukʼ ri utz taq kichak; chkiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri jastaq rukʼ jun utzalaj kanimaʼ; chketaʼmaj bʼaʼ ujachik uwach ri jastaq kech,
e rukʼ waʼ weriʼ, kkichʼak na riʼ jun utzalaj kiyakbʼal, e rukʼ na kʼu riʼ, kekowin na riʼ kkiloqʼ ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal.
¡Ayum! Timoteʼo, qas bʼa chakʼoloʼ ri ukʼolibʼal ri tzij; chaqʼilaʼ bʼaʼ awibʼ chrech ri xaq tzij che man rech ta ri kojonik, xoqujeʼ chaqʼilaʼ awibʼ chech ri kʼuleʼlan tzij kubʼan ri man tzij taj noʼjinik.
Ekʼo neʼ ejujun winaq che xkiya kan ri kikojonik rumal rech che are xebʼe rukʼ weriʼ. Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri usipanik ri Dyos iwukʼ.
Ri Pabʼlo, apostol rech ri Kristo rumal ri urayibʼal ri Dyos, arech, ri in kinyaʼ ubʼixik ri chiʼnik rech kʼaslemal pa ri Kristo Jesus,
chrech ri Timoteʼo, ri loqʼalaj walkʼuwaʼl, chech areʼ ri usipanik ri Dyos, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, ri utzil rumal ri Dyos Tatxel e rumal ri Kristo Jesus Qajawxel.
Kinmaltyoxij chrech ri Dyos che ri in, in rajchak, jacha ri enunan nutat aretaq chiʼ chi paqʼij e chi chaqʼabʼ, rukʼ jun sukʼalaj chomabʼal, katnaʼtaj chwech pa ri nuchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Aretaq chiʼ knaʼtaj chwech ri uwaʼl taq awach sibʼalaj kinwaj katinwil chi jumul, arech kinnoj chrech sibʼalaj kiʼkotemal.
Ri in, kinmayow chech ri unaʼtisaxik ri akojonik kʼolik che man sachinaq ta pa ri ubʼe, ri kojonik, che nabʼe xjaqiʼ pa ri ranimaʼ ri awatiʼt Loʼis e pa ri ranimaʼ ri anan eʼunise e xoqujeʼ kinchomaj che xoqujeʼ xjaqiʼ pa ri awanimaʼ ri at.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ; ri in kinta chawech, chakojoʼ bʼaʼ achuqʼabʼ chupam ri usipanik ri Uxlabʼal che xukoj ri Dyos pa ri awanimaʼ ri at, aretaq chiʼ xokisax ri qʼabʼaj pawiʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri Dyos man xuyaʼ ta chqech jun uxlabʼal rech xibʼrikil xane xuyaʼ chqech jun uxlabʼal rech chuqʼabʼ, rech loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, rech kowinem.
Matkʼix bʼaʼ rumal ri utzij ri Qajawxel che kayaʼ na ubʼixik, on matkʼix bʼaʼ chwech ri in che in tzʼapital pa cheʼ rumal areʼ, xane chatkʼol bʼaʼ wukʼ pa ri kʼax rech toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri utzalaj tzij rukʼ ri uqʼabʼ ri Dyos,
che xujukʼolo e xujusikʼij rumal jun tyoxlaj tzij, man xa ta rumal qachak ri uj, xane rumal ri uchomabʼal ri areʼ e rumal ri usipanik, che xuyaʼ chqech pa ri Kristo Jesus, aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kʼo we uwachulew riʼ.
E we sipanik riʼ, kamik xukʼut ribʼ pa ri upetbʼal ri Qajawxel ri Kristo Jesus, ri areʼ che xukʼis tzij puwiʼ ri kamikal e che xubʼano arech kchubʼlin ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal rumal ri utzalaj tzij.
Ri in, xinokisaxik in jun ajchak chech we Utzalaj Tzij riʼ, jeʼ jas in ajtoqoʼntzij, in apostol e in nimalaj ajtij chrech.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in wetaʼm uchʼijik we kʼax riʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in man kinkʼix ta rumal weriʼ; rumal rech, che ri in qas wetaʼm jachin ri xinkojon chrech, e ri in, chi utz wi ri kinchomaj, che ri areʼ, kkowin riʼ kukʼol ri nukʼolibʼal chi kʼa pa ri jun Qʼij na riʼ.
Qas utz rilik chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri usukʼil taq ri nutzij puwiʼ ri qakojonik e puwiʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Jesus Kristo, che ri xato.
Utz ukʼolik chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri kʼolibʼal yaʼom chqech; rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel che xas jeqel wi qukʼ ri uj.
Ri at, awetaʼm chik, che ri winaq eʼajasiʼa, konojel xinkipachiʼj e chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ riʼ, kʼo ri Figelo e ri Hermogenes.
Ri Ajawxel, chpax bʼaʼ ri ukʼuʼx chkech ri erachal ri Onesiforo, rumal rech che ri areʼ sibʼalaj xuyaʼ nuchuqʼabʼ e man xkʼix ta chech ri jetaq chʼichʼ che inujatʼim pa cheʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ, xpe pa ri Roma, ri areʼ xinutzukukej e chi xinuriq wi.
Ri Ajawxel, chuyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx chrech areʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel pa ri jun Qʼij riʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri nupatanaxik xubʼan ri areʼ chwech pa ri Efeso, ri at utz chi na retaʼmaxik waʼ weriʼ chnuwach ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at, atwalkʼuwaʼl, ri at, chatkʼol bʼaʼ pa ri uchuqʼabʼ ri usipanik ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri tzij che xawetaʼmaj xas rumal wech ri in e chkiwach sibʼalaj winaq, chayaʼa bʼaʼ chkech ejujun eʼachijabʼ che qas kekowinik che ukʼutik chkech enikʼaj chik.
Ri at, chachʼijaʼ bʼaʼ ri kʼax jeriʼ jas ronojel winaq che rajchʼoj ri Kristo Jesus.
Jun che are uchak ri chʼoʼj, man kʼo ta jastaq uwach chik kuchomaj pa ri ukʼaslemal we qastzij are kraj utz kilitaj rumal ri xsikʼin rech.
Xoqujeʼ, jeriʼ ri winaq che kchakun pa ri estadiʼo, ri areʼ kchʼakanik xuwi we utz uchʼoʼjixik xubʼano jeʼ jas kubʼij taq ri upixabʼ ri estadiʼo.
Rajawaxik riʼ, che ri uwach ri tikoʼn kyakik, are nabʼe kyaʼ chech ri jun ajchak che sibʼalaj xchakunik.
Chʼachʼobʼoʼ bʼaʼ ri jastaq, che ri in kwaj kinbʼij. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ajawxel, kubʼan na riʼ arech ri at kachʼobʼ ronojel weriʼ.
Qas chnaʼtaj chawech che ri Jesus Kristo xkʼastaj chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, ri areʼ che rijaʼal ri David, jeʼ jas kubʼij ri utzalaj nutzij.
Pa ri utoqʼobʼ, ri in in kʼo pa ri kʼax, chi jacha in jun ajbʼanal kʼax in kʼo pa cheʼ rukʼ taq chʼich. Kʼatekʼut, ri utzij ri Dyos ma jatʼim ta rukʼ chʼichʼ rech jun rukʼ kʼo pacheʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri in kinqʼiʼ ronojel kʼax rech toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach konojel ri esikʼim, arech xoqujeʼ kʼo ri kilotajem pa ri Kristo Jesus rukʼ ri junalikalaj qʼijil.
Qastzij nakʼut, we tzij riʼ: We ri uj xujkam rukʼ ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ kʼo riʼ qakʼaslemal rukʼ ri areʼ.
We rukʼ qachuqʼabʼ, kujkanaj kan rukʼ ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ uj ajawinel riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ. We ri uj, kqapaqchiʼj ri areʼ xoqujeʼ kujupaqchiʼj na riʼ ri areʼ.
We ri uj, kubʼan kebʼ ri qatzij, ri areʼ man kubʼan ta kebʼ ri utzij, rumal rech che man kupaqchiʼj ta riʼ ri utzij.
Chabʼij bʼaʼ jumul chik ronojel weriʼ e chabʼij bʼaʼ chuwach ri Dyos che xas makʼojiʼ wi ri chʼoʼj rukʼ taq ri tzij, che xuwi kkowin chkisachik ri ketowik.
Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ronojel, arech ri at qas at utz chuwach ri Dyos e che ri at man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che kresaj akʼixbʼal, xane qas at jun utz rajchak ri tzij che saqalajtzij.
Ri tzij che man kʼo ta ucholaj rukʼ ri qakojonik chapaqchiʼj ubʼik. Ri eʼareʼ che kkibʼij we taq tzij riʼ kebʼe riʼ pa ri man kʼaslemal ta rukʼ Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kitzij, kubʼan kʼax riʼ jeriʼ jas jun yabʼil rech ri qatzʼumal. Ri Himeneʼo e ri Fileto, ejujun na kʼut chkech we eʼareʼ riʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ naj xebʼe wi chrech ri saqalajtzij, aretaq chiʼ kkijikibʼaʼ che ri kʼastajibʼal chi bʼantajinaq chik; xa jekʼuriʼ, xkibʼan kʼax chrech ri kikojonik ejujun taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼut, ri utzalaj utikbʼalil che xukoj ri Dyos xas kʼo wi ri nimalaj uchuqʼabʼ, e xas tʼiqitalik rukʼ taq we tzij riʼ: Ri Ajawxel, retaʼm kiwach ri eʼuwinaq e chupaqchiʼj bʼaʼ ubʼik ri itzel ri winaq che kubʼij ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel.
Pa jun nimalaj ja, ma xuwi ta kʼo qʼan pwaq taq kʼolbʼal riʼ on saq pwaq taq kʼolbʼal, xane xoqujeʼ, kʼo jun riʼ che cheʼ kʼolbʼal on xqʼol kʼolbʼal. Kʼo nikʼaj riʼ kokisax chech jastaq che nimalaj taq ubʼantajik e kʼo chi nikʼaj riʼ che kokisax chech ri tzaqibʼal qatzʼilal.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, we jun winaq, man kʼo ta jun makaj kubʼano, che ri xinbʼij in, ri areʼ, jun utzalaj laq riʼ, tyoxlaj laq riʼ e utzalaj laq riʼ chuwach ri Ajaw, e xas utz wi riʼ chrech ronojel chak chuwach ri Ajaw.
Chatanimajoq chuwach ri jetaq urayibʼal ri akʼojolil. Chatzukuj bʼaʼ ri sukʼil, ri kojonik, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, ri jaʼmaril, chi pa junamam kukʼ konojel ri chi rukʼ jun saqalaj kanimaʼ kkibʼij ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel.
Chapaqchiʼj ubʼik ri chʼuʼj e ri man utzalaj chomabʼal taj. Ri at, awetaʼm, che weriʼ chi kakʼaman ubʼi pa ri chʼuʼjil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rajawaxik, che ri upatanijel ri Ajawxel, chi man kchʼuʼjar taj, xane rajawaxik che ri areʼ keʼukʼulaj konojel ri winaq, kukʼut ri tzij e kukochʼ ri kʼax,
rajawaxik, che rukʼ chʼuchʼujil kyajan chkech ri eʼukʼulel. Rajawaxik kuchomaj, che weneʼ ri Dyos kuyaʼ na chkech arech kkikʼex kibʼ e weneʼ kketaʼmaj na ri saqalajtzij
e weneʼ ketzalij pa jun utzalaj noʼjibʼal, weneʼ naj kekʼojiʼ wi chrech ri ukʼat ri kʼaxtokʼ che eʼutzʼapim ri eʼareʼ pa cheʼ e che eʼajpatanijel chrech ri urayibʼal.
Ri at, qas utz retaʼmaxik chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, che pa ri kʼisbʼal taq qʼij, kʼo na sibʼalaj kʼax kpetik.
Ri winaq exuʼy riʼ, kbʼe riʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx chrij ri pwaq, kkibʼij nimalaj taq tzij riʼ, nimal riʼ kkibʼano, sibʼalaj itzel riʼ kkibʼij pakiwiʼ ri winaq; man keniman ta riʼ chkech ri ekinan kitat, man kkimaltyoxij ta riʼ ri utzil, kkibʼan na riʼ ri itzel chrech ri Dyos,
man kʼo ta kanimaʼ riʼ, man kʼo ta loqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx riʼ, kkibʼij riʼ sibʼalaj itzel, man kʼo ta jun utzil riʼ pa ri kikʼaslemal, man kkibʼan ta riʼ ri utzil, ri eʼareʼ si ekʼulel riʼ chrech ri utzil.
Ekojol taq tzij, kkijikibʼaʼ tzij che man tzij taj, emoy rumal ri xuwi kanimal riʼ kkilo, erachiʼl riʼ ri itzel kʼaslemal e man erachiʼl ta riʼ ri Dyos,
ri eʼareʼ je kilik riʼ che ewinaq kikojonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkipaqchiʼj ri uchuqʼabʼ ri qakojonik. Ri at, chaqʼilaʼ awibʼ che katbʼe kukʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ riʼ, ekʼo riʼ chkixoʼl ri nikʼaj che keʼok cho taq ja e kechubʼlin riʼ chkiwach ri man eʼutz taq ixoqibʼ taj che kʼo sibʼalaj kimak, kʼo sibʼalaj itzel taq kirayibʼal e kʼatekʼuriʼ
ronojel qʼij kkitijoj kibʼ e chi ma kekowin ta chrech retaʼmaxik ri saqalajtzij.
Jeʼ jas ri Jannes e ri Jambʼres che xechʼoʼjin rukʼ ri Moʼises, xoqujeʼ jewaʼ kkibʼan ri eʼareʼ riʼ kechʼoʼjin rukʼ ri saqalajtzij, eʼachijabʼ che kʼo itzel taq kichomabʼal, chi man eʼutz ta pa ri kikojonik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man naj ta riʼ kibʼe wi, rumal rech che ri kimoxil kqʼalajisaxik riʼ chkiwach nimalaj konojel, jacha xqʼalajisaxik ri kimoxil ri ekebʼ kanoq riʼ.
Ri at, chi xinaterneʼbʼej pa ri nutzij, pa ri nukʼaslemal, pa ri nuchomabʼal, pa ri nukojonik, pa ri nukochʼonik, pa ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal nukʼuʼx, pa ri nuchuqʼabʼ,
pa ri inoqatalik, pa ri kʼax xpe panuwiʼ pa ri Antiʼokiʼa, pa ri Ikoniʼum, e pa ri Listra. Ri in, sibʼalaj kʼax xpe panuwiʼ. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ajawxel, xas xutoʼ nuwach chuwach ronojel.
Jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ ri kikʼaslemal konojel ri kekojon chrech ri Kristo chi pa ri kʼaslemal rukʼ ri Dyos, ri eʼareʼ xas kkiriq wi riʼ ri kʼax.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼajmakibʼ e ri winaq che ekʼo rukʼ ri man utz tzij taj, chi pa ronojel qʼij kebʼe na riʼ pa ri itzel, rukʼ che kkiyaʼ ri man saqalajtzij taj chkech ri enikʼaj chik e xoqujeʼ chbʼil aqʼan kibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at, chakʼoloʼ bʼaʼ ri tzij che xawetaʼmaj e che ri qas xatkojon chrech. Ri at, awetaʼm ejachin taq ri eʼawajtij chrech weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi aretaq chiʼ at akʼal na, ri at xawetaʼmaj ri tyoxlaj taq tzʼibʼ; waʼ weriʼ, kkowinik kuyaʼ ri anoʼjibʼal che kuyaʼ ri kolotajem chawech chi rumal ri akojonik chrech ri Kristo Jesus.
Ronojel tzibʼ, rukʼ ri Ruxlabʼal ri Dyox petinaq wi e kʼo upatan chrech ri tijoj ibʼ, utz che utzalijisaxik uwach tzij, arech kkʼut ri kolom bʼe, arech ktijox ukʼutik ri sukʼil;
rukʼ weriʼ, ri utz achi che rech ri Dyos chi usukʼubʼam ribʼ riʼ che ubʼanik ronojel utz chak.
Nimalaj kinkʼomij chawech, xas chuwach ri Dyos e chuwach ri Kristo Jesus, ri areʼ che kubʼan na riʼ ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri ekʼaslik e pakiwiʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ, pa ri ubʼi, ri Upetbʼal e ri Rajawibʼal.
Chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼixik ri tzij xas amaqʼel; chakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ jachike ri joʼs taq tzij, chatyajan bʼaʼ chrech ri ma utz taj, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ jun tzij rech chuqʼabʼ rukʼ kochʼonik e chakʼutuʼ ri tzij.
Chi kpe na riʼ nikʼaj taq qʼij, jawijeʼ, ri winaq man kkichʼij ta riʼ ri tzij; e xa rumal ri jetaq kirayibʼal riʼ kkʼojiʼ chi kixikine ekʼi kajtij riʼ keʼokik.
Kkitas apan riʼ ri kixikin arech man kkita ta ri saqalajtzij e are kkitatbʼej riʼ ri tzij che man utz taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri at, rukʼ sibʼalaj anojibʼal chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ronojel, chachʼijaʼ bʼaʼ ri kʼax, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij, utz ubʼanik chabʼanaʼ ri achak.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, chi kinokisax waʼ jeriʼ in jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ e ri welik ubʼik chi xopanik.
Ri in utzalaj uchʼojixik xinbʼano chi pa ri ukʼisbʼalil; ri in xinkʼisaʼ ri nubʼe, ri in chi xinkʼol wi ri nukojonik.
Xas kamik ubʼik riʼ, ksukʼumaxik chwech ri wiqibʼal nujolom che are ri sukʼil, jun tojbʼal chwech che kuyaʼ na riʼ ri Ajawxel chwech pa ri jun qʼij riʼ, ri areʼ che sukʼlaj Qʼatbʼal Tzij; e ma xuwi ta riʼ chwech ri in kuyaʼo, xane xoqujeʼ kuyaʼ na chkech konojel ri eʼareʼ che rukʼ ronojel uloqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx xkiyeʼj na che ri Areʼ xas kuqʼalajisaj wi ribʼ riʼ.
Chakowij bʼa uloq ri apetik wukʼ,
rumal rech che ri Demas xinuwonobʼaʼ kanoq, rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx chrech we uwachulew riʼ, ri areʼ xbʼe pa Tesalonika; ri Kressente, xbʼe pa Galasiʼa; ri Tito xbʼe pa Dalmasiʼa.
Ri xuwi kʼo wukʼ are ri Lukas. Chakʼamaʼ uloq ri Markos awukʼ rumal che ri areʼ utz riʼ chwech pa ri nuchak.
Ri in, xintaq bʼi ri Tikiko pa ri Efeso.
Aretaq chiʼ katpetik, chakʼamaʼ uloq ri jun watzʼyaq che ri in xinyaʼ kan pa ri Troada pa ri rachoch ri Karpo; xoqujeʼ chakʼamaʼ uloq ri jetaq nuwuj, ri are sibʼalaj kwaj che kakʼam uloq are ri jetaq nutzʼibʼanik rukʼ nuqʼabʼ.
Ri Alejandro, ri areʼ che ajchʼiyil pwaq, ubʼanom sibʼalaj itzel chwech. Ri Ajawxel, kuyaʼ na utojbʼalil riʼ chrech jeriʼ jas ri uchak.
Xoqujeʼ ri at, chawilaʼ awibʼ chuwach ri areʼ, rumal rech che ri areʼ xujal jun nimalaj kʼulel chrech ri nutzij.
Pa ri nabʼe mul che xinkʼojiʼ chuwach jun qʼatbʼaltzij, man kʼo ta jun winaq xintoʼwik, konojel bʼaʼ xinkiyaʼ kanoq. Kwaj neʼ man kʼo ta itzel ukʼaxel chkech rumal weriʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi are ri Ajawxel xinutoʼo, xuyaʼ sibʼalaj nuchuqʼabʼ, arech xas ri in kinya ubʼixik ri Tzij e kkitatbʼej ri winaq che man eʼajjudiʼos taj. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinkoltajik chuwach ri upuchiʼ ri koj.
Ri Ajawxel, kutoʼ na chuwach riʼ chuwach ronojel itzel e kinukol riʼ aretaq chiʼ kinukʼol chrech ri Rajawibʼal chikaj. ¡Chrech bʼaʼ ri are ri Nimalaj Qʼijil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq! ¡Amen!
Chayaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri Priska e ri Akila, xoqujeʼ chkech ri rachalaxik ri Onesiforo.
Ri Erasto xkanaj kan pa ri Korinto. Ri Trofimo, yawabʼ xinyaʼ kan pa ri Mileto.
Chi chanim chatpet uloq aretaq chiʼ majaʼ kpe ri qʼälaj. Ri Eʼubʼulo, ri Pudente, ri Lino, ri Klaʼudiʼa e konojel ri eʼachalaxik, kkiyaʼ apan jun rutzil awach.
¡Ri Ajawxel kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ ri awuxlabʼal! ¡Ri usipanik ri Dyos kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ ri ix!
Ri Pabʼlo, upataninel ri Dyos, apostol rech ri Kristo Jesus, arech ri in, keʼinkʼam ubʼi ri esikʼitalik rumal ri Dyos, pa ri kojonik e che uchʼobʼik ri saqalajtzij che xas jeriʼ jas ri kʼaslemanik pa ri Dyos,
rukʼ ri jun weyeʼbʼal chrij ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal, ri xuyaʼ ubʼixik ri Dyos, ri areʼ che man kʼo ta tzijtal kubʼij; e xubʼij xas pa kʼi junabʼ uloq,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Areʼ, aretaq chiʼ utz xrilo, xukʼut ri utzij chi wumal ri in jeriʼ jacha ri utaqanik ri Dyos ri Qakolonel;
chrech ri Tito, ri qastzij walkʼuwaʼl pa ri komon qakojonik, chech ri areʼ, ri usipanik e ri nimalaj rutzilal ri Dyos Tatxel e xoqujeʼ ri rutzilal ri Jesus Kristo ri Qakolonel.
We ri in, xatinyaʼ kan pa ri Kreta, xa rumal riʼ, arech ri at kakʼis uwokoxik ri Komon Tyox e arech keʼakoj pa ronojel tinimit ejujun taq eriʼjabʼ jeriʼ jas xinbʼij chawech.
Chkijunal ri eʼareʼ, rajawaxik che xas eʼutz pa ronojel, rachajil xa jun chi ixoq, kekojonik ri eralkʼuwaʼl e man kʼo ta jun itzel kriqitaj pa ri kikʼaslemal, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik che enimanel.
Rumal rech che ri ajyuqʼ, ri areʼ che ajpataninel chrech ri Dyos, rajawaxik che ri areʼ utz pa ronojel: ri areʼ man nimal taj kubʼano, man kpe ta royowal, man kutijej ta ri amajaʼ, man ajchʼoj taj, ma kʼo ta pwaq itzel uchakuxik kubʼano,
xane utz kikʼulaxik ri winaq kubʼano, chi utz kikʼulaxik ri winaq kubʼano, utz uchomaxik ri jastaq kubʼano, sukʼlaj winaq, chi kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos, chi ajaw chrech aqʼan ribʼ ri areʼ.
Uyaʼom uwach rukʼ ri saqalajtzij, jacha ri utzalaj kʼutunik, arech kkowinik kuya ri choqʼabʼ rukʼ ri utzalaj tzij, e arech kusach kiwach e kutzalij ri kitzij ri kkikʼuleʼlaj ri utzij.
Rumal rech, che ekʼo ekʼiʼ eʼitzel taq uxlabʼal che man keniman taj, che kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri ma utz taj, ebʼanal taq tzij, e ri eʼareʼ riʼ chi are enabʼe ekʼo chkixoʼl ri pusim uwiʼ kikowil.
Ri eʼareʼ riʼ, rajawaxik ktzʼapix kichiʼ; we winaq riʼ, kkibʼan kʼax chkech konojel ri enikʼaj ajupaja winaq aretaq chiʼ kkikʼut ri man utz taj, rumal che are kkaj uwach ri pwaq.
Jun chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, ajqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, xubʼij: «Ri eʼajkreta, chi amaqʼel ebʼanal taq tzij, eʼitzel taq awaj, saqʼorilalaj kipam».
Waʼ we tzij riʼ, chi qastzij wi; rumal kʼu waʼ, sibʼalaj cheʼayajaʼ bʼaʼ ri eʼareʼ, arech utz ukʼolik chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri qakojonik,
e makil apanoq ri joʼs taq tzij kech ri eʼajjudiʼos, xoqujeʼ ri jetaq kipixabʼ ri winaq che chi kkitas apan kibʼ che ri saqalajtzij.
Ronojel jas uwach, sukʼ riʼ chkiwach ri esukʼ taq winaq. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chkiwach riʼ ma esukʼ winaq taj, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach riʼ che sukʼ chkiwach. Xoqujeʼ na kʼuriʼ, man sukʼ ta riʼ ri kuxlabʼal e ri kichomabʼal.
Kkibʼij che ketaʼm uwach ri Dyos, kʼatekʼut pa ri kikʼaslemal kkipaqchiʼj uwach ri Areʼ, sibʼalaj eʼitzelalaj taq winaq, man enimanel taj, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che utz kekowin chech ubʼanik.
Ri at, are chakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ ri usukʼ e ri qas utz tzij.
Ri eriʼjabʼ, makitij bʼaʼ ri amajaʼ, chkikʼaslemaj bʼaʼ jun utzalaj kʼaslemal, utz uchomaxik chkibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ronojel jas uwach; qas chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ kichuqʼabʼ pa ri kikojonik, pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx e pa ri kochʼonik.
Xoqujeʼ, ri eriʼj ixoqibʼ, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun utzalaj kikʼaslemal jeriʼ jas ri taqal chkij ri etyoxlaj taq ixoqibʼ: makiqʼabʼaj bʼa tzij chkij ri winaq, makitij bʼa sibʼalaj amajaʼ; chkikʼutuʼ bʼaʼ ri qas utz taq pixabʼ,
rukʼ waʼ weriʼ, kkikʼut na kʼuriʼ chkiwach ri alitomabʼ ri uloqʼexik ri kachajilal e ri ekalkʼuwaʼl,
ri ixoqibʼ chkikʼoloʼ kibʼ, chekowin chech uqʼilik ri kirayij, utz ubʼanik kkibʼan ri kichak pa ja, ekmeʼl taq winaq, enimanel chkech ri ekachajil arech man kʼo ta itzel tzij kbʼix puwiʼ ri utzij ri Dyos.
Xoqujeʼ, chata bʼaʼ chkech ri alabʼom, arech utz kkibʼan chrech ri kikʼaslemal pa ronojel
chakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ pa ri akʼaslemal che at jun kʼamabʼal tzij rech ri utzalaj kʼaslemal: at sukʼ che ri atzij e at sukʼ che ri akʼaslemal,
utzalaj ri atzij, man kʼo ta kchʼaʼ chech, arech, ri kʼulel man kkowin taj kʼo jun kubʼij paqawiʼ ri uj e xa jeriʼ sibʼalaj kkʼix riʼ.
Ri eʼajpatanijelabʼ, cheniman pa ronojel chrech ri kajaw; are qas chitzukuj bʼaʼ ubʼanik ri utz chkiwach ri eʼareʼ, makibʼij bʼaʼ jun kʼax tzij chkech rʼareʼ.
Makibʼan jun itzel jas uwach chkiwach ri eʼareʼ, man kikʼex bʼa ri kitzij chkiwach: rukʼ waʼ weriʼ, xas kkiyaʼ riʼ pa ronojel ri uqʼijil ri Utzij ri Dyos, ri areʼ che Qakolonel.
Rumal rech, che xkʼuttajik ri usipanik ri Dyos, che ukʼiybʼalil ri kolotajem chkech konojel ri winaq,
kukʼut chqawach, arech ri uj, kqayaʼ kan ri kʼaslemal che man kkojon taj, xoqujeʼ kqayaʼ kan ri urayibʼal we uwachulew riʼ, arech ri uj, kujkanaj kan pa ri sukʼ kʼaslemal chi pa we uchanim riʼ, pa ri qʼatbʼaltzij e pa ri kojonik,
e jeriʼ, ri uj kqeyeʼj ri utzalaj Upetbʼal ri Uqʼijil ri Nimalaj Qadyos e nimalaj Qakolonel che are ri Kristo Jesus,
che xuyaʼ ribʼ pa toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach ri uj, arech kujuloqʼ ri uj chuwach ronojel makaj e kusukʼumaj jun siwantinimit che eʼare uwinaq ri areʼ e che eʼachixom chrech ubʼanik ri utz taq chak.
Jeriʼ, rajawaxik che ri at kakʼut ri tzij, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri chuqʼabʼ e chatyajan bʼaʼ rukʼ utzalaj aweqeleʼn. Makʼojiʼ bʼa jun winaq che kretzelaj awach.
Chabʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, chkech konojel arech knaʼtaj chkech, che rajawaxik keniman chkech ri eqʼatbʼaltzij e chkech ri enim winaq; utz we enimanel e chi aninaq bʼaʼ chkibʼanaʼ ri utzil pa ronojel,
makibʼij bʼaʼ ri itzel taq tzij chrech jun chik winaq, michʼojin bʼaʼ, utz bʼaʼ chkilaʼ ri enikʼaj chik e ekmeʼl bʼaʼ chkibʼanaʼ kukʼ konojel winaq.
Rumal rech6, ojer kanoq, xoqujeʼ ri uj man kʼo ta qanoʼjibʼal, man kʼo ta qakojbʼal, xuwi qaterneʼbʼem ri qarayibʼal e ri kuta ri qabʼaqil chqech, itzel qabʼantajik, tiʼtik kqanaʼo, qiwal e kqabʼan qiwal chbʼil taq qibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri qʼij, aretaq chiʼ, xukʼut ribʼ ri rutzilal ri Dyos ri Qakolonel e aretaq chi xukʼut ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx xas rumal loqʼoqʼisabʼal kiwach ri winaq,
ri areʼ man are ta xril ri chak, ri sukʼilalaj qʼatbʼaltzij xqabʼano, xane xuwi rumal ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, rumal ri jaʼ che rech kʼakʼ kʼaslemal e kʼakʼ uxlabʼal, pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel.
Ri Uxlabʼal riʼ sibʼalaj xutoxej paqawiʼ ri uj xas rumal ri Jesus Kristo ri Qakolonel,
arech ri uj, aretaq chiʼ uj sukʼ chi rumal ri usipanik ri Kristo Jesus, kkʼojiʼ ri qeyeʼbʼal pa ri junalikalaj kʼaslemal.
Qastzij waʼ we tzij riʼ; e kwaj che pa we riʼ kkʼojiʼ ri achuqʼabʼ ri at, arech ri kekojon chrech ri Dyos, kkaj kqʼalajinik ri utzalaj kichak. Wa weriʼ utz e kubʼan utzil chkech ri winaq.
Ri utzukuxik ri mox taq chomanik, ri jetaq utzukuxik ri ijaʼlil, ri chʼoʼjinik, ri kʼuleʼlanik tzij puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ, chayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ kanoq, rumal rech, che weriʼ man utz taj e man kʼo ta jun utzil kuyaʼ kanoq.
Ri jun winaq che kʼo pa juqʼat, aretaq chiʼ xyajtaj jumul e xyajtaj ukamul, chatasaʼ bʼaʼ awibʼ chrech.
Ri at awetaʼm, che we jun winaq riʼ xas jun itzel winaq riʼ e chi ajmakunel riʼ, xas are wi ri areʼ kbʼanow qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ, kintaq ubʼi ri Artemas on ri Tikiko awukʼ; xas chakowij uloq katpe wukʼ pa ri Nikopolis. Ri in, nuchoman che kinqʼaxij jelaʼ ri qʼälaj.
Qas chawilaʼ ronojel ri rajawaxik chkech pa ri kibʼinem, ri qʼatbʼaltzij Senas e ri Apolo, arech man kʼo ta jun jas uwach kajawtaj na chkech.
Rajawaxik, che ri eqawinaq, kketaʼmaj ubʼanik ri utzil pa ronojel chak, arech kekowinik ketobʼnik chuwach ri nimalaj taq rajawaxik kʼolik, xa jekʼuriʼ man ejun ta riʼ chkixoʼl ri winaq che man kʼo ta kipatan.
Ri at, kkiyaʼ apan jun rutzil awach, konojel ri ekʼo wukʼ. Chayaʼaʼ apanoq jun rutzil kiwach konojel ri kujkiloqʼaj pa ri qakojonik. ¡Chi nimalaj sipanik, chkʼojiʼ ta bʼaʼ iwukʼ iwonojel!
Ri Pabʼlo, ri tzʼapital pa cheʼ rumal ri Kristo Jesus e ri Timoteʼo ri achalaxik, chrech ri loqʼalaj qachiʼl Filemon, ri areʼ che kchakun qukʼ,
xoqujeʼ chrech ri qanabʼ Apfiʼa, chrech ri Arkipo ri areʼ che qachiʼl pa ri chʼoʼj, xoqujeʼ chrech ri Komon Tyox che kkimulij kibʼ pa ri awachoch.
Chiwech ri ix, ri nimalaj usipanik e ri rutzil ri Dyos Qatatxel, ri usipanik ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Sibʼalaj kinmaltyoxij chrech ri Dyos chi amaqʼel, aretaq chiʼ kinchoman pawiʼ pa ri nuchʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos,
rumal rech, che ri in, nutom utzijol ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx e ri akojonik che ukubʼisaʼm akʼuʼx, rech ta bʼaʼ ri Ajawxel Jesus, xoqujeʼ rech ta bʼaʼ utoqʼobʼisaxik kiwach konojel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Utz we kojonik riʼ, kuyaʼ waʼ chawech ri uxlabʼal e ri tzʼaqatalaj saqil arech kachʼobʼo ronojel ri utzil kʼo qukʼ ri uj e ri katkowin che ubʼanik rumal ri toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri Kristo.
Ri in, sibʼalaj kinkiʼkotik e kʼo ri nuchuqʼabʼ rumal rech che xinta utzijol ri loqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx: bʼim chwech wachalal, che akubʼam kikʼuʼx ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, puneʼtaj, rumal ri Kristo Jesus, saq wukʼ ri in ri tzij e ri rajawaxik che loqʼ kintaq ubʼixik chawech, ronojel ri taqal chawij kabʼano,
ri in are kwaj kintaʼ apan chawech pa ri ubʼiʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal akʼuʼx jun jas uwach. Ri jun che kbʼin weriʼ chawech, are ri Pabʼlo, ri areʼ che riʼj winaq chik e kamik riʼ tzʼapital pacheʼ xa rumal ri Kristo Jesus.
Ri kinta chawech, are puwiʼ ri walkʼuwaʼl, ri areʼ che xinwalkʼuwaʼlaj xas rukʼ taq chʼichʼ che inujatʼim pacheʼ: are ri Onesimo,
che ojer kanoq, ri areʼ man kʼo ta upatan chawech, kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, nimalaj upatan chawech, jacha nimalaj upatan chwech ri in kamik riʼ.
Ri in, kintzalejisaj, kintaq ubʼi ri areʼ chawech, ri areʼ che xas wanimaʼ wi ri areʼ.
Xinwaj, che ri areʼ kkanaj kan wukʼ, arech kinupatanij aretaq chiʼ injatʼilik pa taq we chʼichʼ riʼ rumal ri Utzalaj Tzij;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, man xwaj taj xinta weriʼ chawech, arech ri utzil kabʼano man xata kattoqʼix chrech, xane are utz riʼ chex xas pa ri awanimaʼ kpe wi.
Ri Onesimo, weneʼ xesax awukʼ pa kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij, arech ri at chi pa junalik kakʼulaj chi na jumul.
E ri areʼ man jun ajpataninel taj kabʼan chrech, xane are nim na chuwach jun ajpataninel, xane jun loqʼalaj achalaxik; we wachalal chnuwach ri in, are sibʼalaj nim chi na waʼ chawach ri at, e man xuwi taj cho we uwachulew riʼ xane xoqujeʼ pa ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri at nim e utz kinawil wi ri in, chakʼulaj bʼaʼ ri areʼ jacha in ri areʼ.
We xubʼan kʼax chawech, on weneʼ kʼo ukʼas awukʼ chakojoʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ chwij ri in.
Ri in, in Pabʼlo, kintzʼibʼaj rukʼ nuqʼabʼ weriʼ: In riʼ kintojow na weriʼ chawech. Ri in, man kinchʼa ta ri akʼas at wukʼ ri in, rumal neʼ che chi at wi ri at kʼasaj wukʼ ri in.
Jeʼ nakʼut wachalal, kinweyeʼj chawech ri at we jun toqʼobʼ riʼ chi pa ri Ajawxel; chajororisaj bʼaʼ ri wanimaʼ chi pa ri Kristo.
Ri in, kintzʼibʼaj weriʼ chawech rukʼ ronojel kubʼal kʼuʼx chawij e rukʼ ri nuchuqʼabʼ kinweyeʼj che katnimanik; ri in wetaʼm, che ri at, nim chi na kabʼano chuwach ri kinta chawech.
Xoqujeʼ, chasukʼumaj apan jun ja chwech; rumal rech, che ri in kinweyeʼj che rukʼ taq ri ichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos, ri in kinkʼojiʼ chi na jumul riʼ chixoʼl.
Ri at, kutaq ubʼi rutzil awach ri Epafras, ri wachiʼl intzʼapital pa cheʼ rumal ri Kristo Jesus,
xoqujeʼ kkitaq rutzil awach ri Markos, ri Aristarko, ri Demas e ri Lukas, ri eʼareʼ che kechakun wukʼ.
¡Kkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri usipanik ri ajawxel Jesus Kristo rukʼ ri awuxlabʼal!
Kʼi taq mul e pa ronojel ubʼanik, ri Dyos xchʼaw chkech ri Eqatat kumal ri eqʼaxel utzij,
pa taq we qʼij ukamik riʼ, che kʼisbʼal taq qʼij chʼawinaq chqech rumal ri Ukʼojol; ri areʼ che xrokisaj echbʼanel chech ronojel jas uwach, e xoqujeʼ, rumal ri Areʼ, xubʼan ri uwachulew.
We Kʼojolxel riʼ, kʼo sibʼalaj uqʼijil e areʼ uwachbʼal ri Dyos; ri Areʼ utoqʼem ri uwachulew rukʼ ri utzij che kʼo sibʼalaj uchuqʼabʼ; aretaq chiʼ xbʼantaj ri chʼajchʼonʼenik rukʼ taq ri makaj, xtʼuyiʼ pa rikyaqʼabʼ ri Nimalaj Ubʼantajik chikaj,
ri Areʼ, ukamik riʼ, are nimalaj chkiwach ri eʼanjelibʼ rumal ri bʼiʼaj xyaʼtaj chrech e xoqujeʼ rumal che echbʼanel; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri jun bʼiʼaj xyaʼtaj chech, are nimalaj chi na chuwach ri kibʼiʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ¿jachin jun anjel, che ri Dyos xubʼij chrech: at, at nukʼojol, pa we jun qʼij riʼ, ri in xatinwalkʼuwaʼlaj? Xoqujeʼ: ri in, inutat, e ri areʼ nukʼojol.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xuyaʼ ri nabʼe ralkʼuwaʼl pa we uwachulew kubʼij: Ri Areʼ, chkiqʼijilaj konojel ri eʼuʼanjelibʼ ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, pakiwiʼ ri eʼanjelibʼ kubʼij: Kubʼan kyaqiqʼ chkech ri eʼuʼanjelibʼ, kubʼan nimalaj qʼaqʼ chkech ri eʼupatanijelabʼ;
puwiʼ ri Ukʼojol kubʼij: ¡Ayum! Dyos, ri Atem kkanaj chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq: e ri uchʼimiʼyal ri rajawibʼal, uchʼimiʼyal ri ujunamilal.
Ri at, xaloqʼoqʼej ri sukʼil e xapaqchiʼj ri man kʼaslemal ta rukʼ Dyos, rumal kʼuriʼ, ri Dyos, ri Adyos, xutoxej pawiʼ jun oleʼo che rech kiʼkotemal, are xutoxej pawiʼ ri at chkiwach ri eʼawachalal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ: Ri at, Ajawxel; che xas pa ri umajibʼal uloq xakoj ri utikbʼalil ri uwachulew; e ri kaj xas uchak wi ri aqʼabʼ at.
Waʼ weriʼ, kʼo ukʼisbʼal waʼ, kʼatekʼut, ri at katkanaj kan waʼ; ronojel waʼ weriʼ, kqʼalebʼik jeʼ jas jun atzʼyaq;
jeʼ jas jun manta kabʼalqʼatij waʼ, jeʼ jas jun atzʼyaq; e xa jeriʼ waʼ, kkʼexajik. Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri at, at jewi chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq, ri ajunabʼ pa junalik man kʼo ta ukʼisik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ; ¿jachin jun anjel, che ri areʼ kubʼij chrech: Chattʼuyul pa wikyaqʼabʼ, xas kʼateʼ keʼinkoj na ri eʼakʼulel ejacha jun toqʼbʼal chuxeʼ ri awaqan?
¿La man konojel ta ri eʼareʼ eʼuxlabʼal, che kʼo jun kichak xetaq chrech, arech kekipatanij ri kkechbʼej na ri kolotajem?
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ rajawaxik, che ri uj kqakoj qachuqʼabʼ pa taq ri tzij xqato, arech ri uj, man kqasach ta chbʼil taq qibʼ.
We ri tzij che xkibʼij ri eʼanjelibʼ utz, e rumal kʼuriʼ ronojel makaj e ronojel ri man nimanik taj kʼo utojibʼalil,
¿la kujkowin kʼu riʼ ri uj kujanimajik, we ri uj man kqaj ta ri kolotajem riʼ? We kolotajem riʼ xumajij ubʼixik ri Ajawxel; kʼatekʼuriʼ xjikibʼax chi ubʼixik kumal ri xetowik.
Ri Dyos xuyaʼ uchuqʼabʼ ri kitzij rukʼ taq kʼutbʼal, rukʼ nimalaj taq jastaq, rukʼ jujun taq mayibʼal xas pa ronojel, e xoqujeʼ rumal jujun taq usipanik ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼaxel jeriʼ jacha kraj ri areʼ.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ri Dyos man xuyaʼ ta ri uwachulew che ri kpe na chweʼq kabʼij chkech ri anjelibʼ, ri uwachulew che kqatzijoj uj riʼ.
Xane jun winaq, pa jun kʼolibʼal, xutzʼibʼaj we tzij riʼ: ¿Jas uwach ri winaq, che ri at knaʼtaj ri areʼ chawech? On ¿jas uwach ri ukʼojol ri winaq che ri at katok il chech?
Ri at, xakoj ri areʼ xas nitzʼ chi na jubʼiq chkiwach ri eʼanjelibʼ. Xayaʼ chech ri areʼ ri qʼijil e ri nimalaj ubʼantajik.
Ri at, ronojel xakoj chuxeʼ raqan. Aretaq chiʼ xukoj ronojel chuxeʼ ri ukowinem, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che man ta kʼo chuxeʼ ri ukowinem. Jeʼ, qastzij nakʼut, ukamik riʼ, majaʼ kqilo we ronojel kʼo chuxeʼ ri ukowinem.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Areʼ che xbʼan chi na nitz jubʼiqʼ chkiwach ri eʼanjelibʼ, ri Jesus, ri uj kqil ri Areʼ kʼo ri uqʼijil e nimalaj ubʼantajik, rumal rech che xukʼaxkʼolij ri kamikal: rumal ri usipanik ri Dyos, rajawaxik che ri Areʼ xretaʼmaj ri kamikal, arech utz chkech konojel winaq.
Qastzij na kʼut che utz, che ri Areʼ kraj kukʼam kibʼe sibʼalaj eʼalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ pa ri qʼijil; ri Areʼ che are xbʼanow ronojel e che rajaw ronojel, xtzʼaqatik rumal ri kʼax; ri areʼ kʼamal bʼe pa ri kolotajem.
Ri Areʼ che ktyoxrisanik e ri eʼareʼ che ketyoxrisaxik, junam ri kimajibʼal. Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri Areʼ man kkʼix taj aretaq chiʼ ix wachalal kcha chkech;
aretaq chiʼ kubʼij: Ri in, kinya na ubʼixik ri abʼiʼ chkech ri ewachalal, chkixoʼl ri komon Tyox kinbʼixon na waʼ. E xoqujeʼ:
Kinkubʼaʼ na waʼ ri nukʼuʼx chrij. E jumul chik kubʼij: Uj kʼolik waral riʼ, ri in e ri eʼalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ xuyaʼ ri Dyos chwech.
Jeʼ na kʼuriʼ, jeʼ jas ri eʼalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ kʼo junam kkikʼel e junam kibʼaqilal; xoqujeʼ, ri Areʼ, rukʼ waʼ weriʼ, xkowinik xukʼis tzij puwiʼ ri rajaw ri kamikal rukʼ ri ukamikal ri Areʼ, e ri rajaw ri kamikal are ri Kʼaxtokʼ,
e ri Kristo rukʼ ri ukamikal ri Areʼ, xutoʼ kiwach konojel ri winaq che pa ronojel kikʼaslemal iximitalik rumal rech che kixeʼm kibʼ chuwach ri kamikal, e xas pa jumpa ikʼas wi, eyutulik.
Rumal rech, che man are ta kok ilo chkech ri eʼanjelibʼ, xane are kok ilo chkech ri rijaʼlil ri Abʼraham.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, xas rajawaxik wi, che Areʼ, pa ronojel jeriʼ ubʼantajik jacha ri kibʼantajik ri erachalal, arech ri areʼ kuxik Nim Chuchqajaw rukʼ nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, che man kukʼex ta ri utzij chuwach ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ xas kutoj ri jetaq umak ri siwan tinimit.
Ri areʼ che xukʼaxkʼolij ri kʼax, kkowin riʼ ktobʼan kukʼ e kuyaʼ ri rajawaxik chkech ri jachintaq kkikʼaxkʼolij ri kʼax.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ix tyoxlaj taq achalaxik, ri ix che ixsikʼim chikaj, chitoqʼobʼisaj bʼa uwach ri Apostol e ri Nimalaj Chuchqajaw chrech ri qakojonik, che are ri Jesus,
ri areʼ che man kukʼex ta ri utzij chuwach ri Areʼ che xuʼuxisaj jeriʼ, ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ jacha ri Moʼises che man xukʼex ta ri Utzij xas pa ronojel ri rachoch.
Rumal rech, che ri areʼ, xilitaj ri usukʼil che are nim chi na uqʼijil chuwach ri uqʼijil ri Moʼises; rumal rech, che ri nimalaj ubʼantajik ri ajbʼanal ja, xas are nimalaj ubʼantajik chi na chuwach ri nimalaj ubʼantajik ri jun ja.
Jeʼ nakʼut, ronojel ja, kʼo jun winaq che kyakowik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ajyaknel chrech ronojel uwachulew, are ri Dyos.
Qastzij na kʼut, che ri Moʼises, man xukʼex ta ri utzij xas pa ronojel ri rachoch, jeriʼ jas jun ajpatanijel, arech kkʼuttajik ri ronojel ri tzij che rajawaxik kya ubʼixik;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Kristo, ri areʼ jun alkʼuwaʼlxel, man xukʼex ta ri utzij xubʼan kʼamal bʼe pa ri rachoch; e uj riʼ ri uj rachoch we kujkanaj pa uchuqʼabʼ e pa ri ukiʼkotemal ri qeyeʼbʼal.
Rumal kʼuriʼ, jacha kubʼij ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel: Pa we qʼij riʼ, we xita ri uchʼabʼal,
mibʼan ko chrech ri iwanimaʼ jeʼ jas pa ri chʼoʼj, pa ri uqʼij ri kʼax pa ri tzʼinalikalaj ulew,
jawiʼ ri eʼitat xkibʼan kʼax chwech e xinkitaqchiʼj pa ri makaj, aretaq chiʼ, che xilitaj neʼ kumal ri nuchak
pa kawinaq junabʼ. Rumal kʼu weriʼ, ri in xyaktaj woyowal chkech we ijaʼlil riʼ e xinbʼij: Ronojel mul xas sachinaq wi ri kanimaʼ, man xketaʼmaj ta ri nubʼe;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinkoj ri nutzij pa ri woyowal: ¡Jayiʼ! ri eʼareʼ, man keʼok taj pa ri wuxlanem.
¡Qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ ix achalaxik! Weneʼ kʼo jun chixoʼl ri ix che itzel ranimaʼ kʼolik; ri areʼ riʼ, kkowinik che naj kbʼe wi chech ri Dyos rumal che man kʼo ta ukojonik;
xane chiyaʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ ronojel taq qʼij, are ajtzij jumpa kuchʼij we jun kamik riʼ, arech man kʼo ta jun chixoʼl ri ix che kʼo jun ko ranimaʼ rumal ri makaj.
Rumal rech, che ri uj, xas uj kʼo pa ri Kristo, we ri uj kujkanaj chi kʼa pa ri ukʼisbʼalil na, pa ri uchuqʼabʼalil ri ukubʼisabʼal qakʼuʼx jacha pa ri nabʼe qakojonik.
Aretaq chiʼ kbʼixik: pa we qʼij riʼ, we kita ix ri uchʼabʼal, mibʼan ko chech ri iwanimaʼ jeriʼ jacha kbʼan pa ri chʼoʼj,
¿E jachin kʼuriʼ, che pa ri nabʼe xkita ri Tzij e pa ri ukabʼ xechʼoʼjinik? ¿La man eʼareʼ ta konojel ri xeʼel uloq pa ri Egipto rumal ri Moʼises?
¿E jachin kʼut ri xpe royowal chkech chi pa kawinaq junabʼ? ¿La man chkech ta ri eʼareʼ che xemakunik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kibʼaqil xtzaq kan pa ri tzʼinalik ulew?
¿E jachin kʼu riʼ ri xubʼij chkech che xas man keʼok ta riʼ pa ri ruxlanem, we man chkech ri jachintaq man xeniman taj?
Xa jeʼ kʼuriʼ, ri uj kqilo che man xekowin taj xeʼokik rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ xas xkikʼex ri kitzij chrech Areʼ.
Chqaxibʼij bʼaʼ qibʼ; we ukamik riʼ che kʼo na uchuqʼabʼ ri jikibʼam tzij chech; che loqʼ kbʼan na okem pa ri ruxlanbʼal ri Areʼ; kʼatekʼuriʼ, weneʼ kʼo jun chixoʼl ri ix, che kbʼeytajik arech kopanik.
Xoqujeʼ ri uj jachaʼ ri eʼareʼ qakʼamon jun utzalaj kʼakʼ tzij. Kʼatekʼut, ri tzij che xkikʼamo, man kʼo ta utzil xubʼanaʼ chkech, ri jachintaq man xekanaj ta pa ri are qastzij kojonik, rumal rech che man ekʼo ta kukʼ ri eʼareʼ che xetowik.
Ri uj che kʼo ri qakojonik, ujokinaq pa jun uxlanem, jeriʼ jacha ri ubʼim Areʼ: Rumal kʼuriʼ, ri in, xinjikibʼaʼ ri nutzij pa ri woyowal: ¡Jayiʼ!, ri eʼareʼ, man keʼok ta riʼ pa ri wuxlanem. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uchak ri Dyos, ukʼisom chi ubʼanik chi pa ri ubʼanik uloq ri uwachulew,
xane xas tzʼibʼatalik puwiʼ ri uwuq qʼij: kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos, xuxlanik pa ri uwuq qʼij che ronojel taq ri uchak.
Xoqujeʼ, kubʼij chi jumul pa ri tzʼibʼatalik: Ri eʼareʼ, man keʼok ta riʼ pa ri wuxlanem.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, saq chqawach, che rajawaxik che keʼok ejujun; e ri enabʼe chech ukʼamik ri utzalaj tzij, man xeʼok taj, rumal rech che ri eʼareʼ man xeniman taj.
Ri Dyos, kuchʼij jun chik qʼij, kamik riʼ e kubʼij chi rumal ri David, si pa kʼilaj taq qʼij chi aqʼanoq, jacha xtzʼibʼatajik ajsik: Pa we jun qʼij riʼ, we ri ix kita ri uchʼabʼal, mibʼan bʼaʼ abʼaj chech ri iwanimaʼ.
Rumal rech, ri Josuʼe, weta xukʼam kibʼe ri Eʼajisraʼelita pa ri uxlanem, ri Dyos man kchʼaw ta chi riʼ pa jun qʼij chi aqʼanoq.
Rumal kuriʼ, xas qʼalaj che kʼo jun uxlanem; ri uxlanem pa ri uwuq qʼij kya chkech ri eʼuwinaq ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, jachin kok pa ri ruxlanem, xoqujeʼ kuxlan riʼ che taq ri uchak, jeriʼ jacha ri Dyos che xuxlan chech taq ri uchak.
Chqakojoʼ bʼaʼ qachuqʼabʼ, arech ri uj kujok pa we uxlanem riʼ, arech man kʼo ta jun winaq ktzaqik rumal che are kubʼan rech kukʼ ri winaq che man xeniman taj.
Tzij nakʼut, che ri utzij ri Dyos kʼo ri ukʼaslemal e utzalaj ubʼantajik, e che are sibʼalaj kqupin chi na chuwach jun chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj che kʼo kebʼ utzaltmal; chi kokik kʼa pa ri kkijach wi kibʼ ri qalmaʼ e ri quxlabʼal, xas kʼa pa ri taq konsil e pa taq ri upam bʼaq; e ri areʼ kubʼan ri qʼatojtzij puwiʼ taq ri kunaʼo e ri kuchomaj ri animaʼ.
Chuwach ri areʼ, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach che awatalik kkanaj; xane xas ronojel chʼanalik e qʼalaj chuwach taq ri uwoqʼoch ri Areʼ, che xas chuwach ri areʼ, rajawaxik kbʼan ri qʼatojtzij paqawiʼ ri uj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj kʼo jun Nimalaj Qachuchqajaw, che xrokisaj ribʼ pa ri kaj. Ri Jesus, che ukʼojol ri Dyos –Chqakojoʼ bʼaʼ qachuqʼabʼ che ukʼolik ri tzij rech ri qakojonik.
Rumal rech6, che ri uj man kʼo ta jun Qachuchqajaw che mata kkowin che uchʼobʼik ri qatuʼqaril, xane ri Areʼ, xuriq kʼax xas pa ronojel e junam qukʼ ri uj, xuwi man junam ta qukʼ pa ri makaj.
Rukʼ chuqʼabʼalil, joʼ bʼaʼ pa ri tem che rech ri usipanik, arech kqariqo e kkʼojiʼ ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, e xoqujeʼ arech kqariq ri usipanik chqech qas arechiʼ kubʼanaʼ rajawaxik e qas arechiʼ kqaj uj.
Xas rumal che ronojel nim chuchqajaw chkixoʼl ri ewinaq kel wi uloq e ri areʼ kokisaxik arech kubʼan uchak rech tabʼal toqʼobʼ pakiwiʼ ri winaq chuwach ri Dyos, arech kuchiʼj ri taq sipanik e ri jetaq toʼbʼal rech sachbʼal uwach ri jetaq makaj.
Ri areʼ riʼ, kkowinik keʼuloqʼoqʼej ri winaq che man kenoʼjinik taj e ri winaq che esachinaq pa ri kibʼe, rumal rech, che ri areʼ xoqujeʼ sutalik rij che tuqaʼril,
e rumal we tuqaʼril riʼ, rajawaxik che kuchiʼj jujun taq toʼbʼal arech ksach uwach ri umak ri areʼ e xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kubʼano rech toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach ri siwantinimit.
Man kʼo ta jun kukoj ribʼ chuwach we nimalaj ukʼolibʼal patan riʼ, xuwi ri sikʼitalik xas rumal ri Dyos jeriʼ jas usikʼixik xubʼan chech ri Aʼaron.
Xoqujeʼ nakʼut, ri Kristo, ri areʼ, man xrokisaj ta chbʼil aqʼan ribʼ, ri uqʼijil ri nim chuchqajawasanik, xane xukʼam chech ri Areʼ che xubʼij chech: At, ri at nukʼojol qas pa we kamik riʼ; xatinwalkʼuwaʼlaj pa we jun qʼij riʼ;
xoqujeʼ, kubʼij pa jun chik tzʼibʼatalik: Ri at, at chuchqajaw chi pa junalik, jeriʼ jas ri ucholajil ri Melkisedek.
Ri areʼ, pa taq ri uqʼijil ri ukʼaslemal ri ubʼaqil, xuta rukʼ sibʼalaj raqoj chiʼaj e rukʼ sibʼalaj uwaʼl uwach chrech ri Areʼ, ri kkowinik kukol ri areʼ chuwach ri kamikal; e weriʼ, utz chuwach ri Dyos, rumal ri ukʼaslemanik rukʼ ri Dyos;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ che xoqujeʼ kʼojolxel, xas xretaʼmaj xnimanik pa ri kʼax;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ xopan pa ri tzʼaqatalaj utzil, ri areʼ xokik rech junalikalaj kolotajem toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach konojel ri keniman chrech ri Areʼ.
Rumal rech, che ri Dyos, xusikʼij ri Areʼ che Nim Chuchqajaw jacha ri ucholajil ri Melkisedek.
Puwiʼ weriʼ, ri uj, rajawaxik che kqayaʼ ubʼixik kʼilaj taq tzij, puneʼtaj che kʼax usolixik, rumal rech che ri ix, kamik riʼ kʼax e man utz ta ri ichomanik.
Ri ix, rumal taq ri ijunabʼ chik, kixkowin na kʼuriʼ che ixajtijabʼ chik, kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, kubʼanaʼ chi na rajawaxik chi jumul ri nabʼe taq utzij ri Dyos chiwech, e rumal nakʼut weriʼ xibʼano, che rajawaxik chi na ri ileche chuwach che kʼo ko ri iwa.
Rumal rech, che ri jun che majaʼ kuyaʼ kan ri leche, man kkowin ta riʼ kutij ri utzij ri qʼatbʼaltzij rumal rech che ri areʼ xas jun akʼal na;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri etzʼaqat taq winaq chik, ko chik ri kiwa kkitijo, ri eʼareʼ che xas rumal ri kikʼaslemal kkowinik che rilik, jawiʼ kʼo wi ri utzil e jawiʼ kʼo wi ri itzel.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, chqayaʼaʼ bʼa kan ri nabʼe taq tzij puwiʼ ri Kristo, e chujpaqalbʼaʼ xas rukʼ ri utzalaj taq tzij, e maqabʼij chi bʼaʼ jun chik tzij puwiʼ ri nabʼe taq tzij che are ri ukʼexik ri qakʼuʼx chuwach ri kaminaq taq chak e ri tzij puwiʼ ri qakojonik,
ri tijonik puwiʼ ri qasnaʼ e ri ukojik ri qʼabʼaj cho ri jolomaj, ri kʼastajibʼal kech ri kaminaqibʼ e ri junalik qʼatbʼaltzij.
E weriʼ, kqabʼan na waʼ, we kyaʼtaj chqech rumal ri Dyos.
Rumal rech, che si man loqʼ ta riʼ, che ri jachin taq ri xkʼojiʼ ri saqil kukʼ, ri eʼareʼ che xkinaʼo e xkʼojiʼ ri usipanik ri kaj kukʼ, xkʼojiʼ ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kukʼ,
xkʼojiʼ e xkinaʼ ri utzalaj taq kʼakʼ rech ri Dyos, xkʼojiʼ kukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri uwachulew ri kpe na chweʼq kabʼij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi rukʼ ronojel weriʼ, ri eʼareʼ xetzaqik; chikʼakʼar chi bʼaʼ pa ukamul rukʼ jun kʼakʼ kikʼaslemal rumal ri utzirik ibʼ rukʼ ri Dyos, rumal rech, che ri eʼareʼ riʼ kkiripabʼaʼ chi jumul ri ukʼojol ri Dyos rukʼ weriʼ, e kkiyaʼ pa etzelaxik uwach chkiwach ri winaq.
Rumal rech, jun ulew che jawiʼ kpe wi sibʼalaj jabʼ e che kuyaʼ utzalaj taq qʼayes chkech ri kkichakuj uwach, we jun ulew riʼ xasi chech ri yoqʼoj tzij kbʼan chech, e pa ri ukʼisbʼalil kporox ubʼi riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix che ixloqʼlaj, puneʼtaneʼ xas jeriʼ kqabʼij pa iwiʼ ri ix, ri in kinchomaj che xas kqeyej chi na chiwech ri ix, utzalaj taq jastaq, e che ri jastaq uwach riʼ qas kixukʼam ubʼi pa ri kolotajem.
Rumal rech, che ri Dyos, ri areʼ xas sukʼilalaj ri ubʼantajik, che mata neʼ knaʼtaj chrech ri ichak, on ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx xikʼutu, rech ri toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri ubʼiʼ ri Areʼ, rukʼ ri taq patanajik xiyaʼ chkech e kiyaʼ na chkech kamik riʼ ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Ri uj, xuwi kqaj, che iwonojel ri ix, chikʼutuʼ bʼaʼ, che kixok il chi pa ri ukʼisbʼalil arech qas kbʼantaj ri eyebʼal,
arech ri ix man, ixsaqʼor taj, xaneʼ chibʼanaʼ jeriʼ jacha ri eʼareʼ, che chi rumal ri kikojonik e ri kikochʼonik, kkechbʼej na riʼ ri jetaq chiʼm kanoq.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri Dyos, xubʼij ri chiʼnik chrech ri Abʼraham, ri Dyos, man loqʼ taj xuyaʼ ri utzij puwiʼ jun chik, rumal rech che man kʼo ta chi jun che are nim chuwach ri Areʼ, xa jeʼ kuriʼ, xuyaʼ ri utzij chbʼil aqʼan ribʼ,
e jeriʼ xubʼij: Jeʼ, ri in, katinnojisaj na riʼ chech tewchiʼbʼal, e ri in kinbʼan na riʼ che sibʼalaj kkʼyar na awach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Abʼraham, xkanaj kan pa ri kojonik, e xa je kʼuriʼ, xrilo aretaq chiʼ xbʼantajik ri chiʼnik che xubʼij ri Dyos chrech.
Ri winaq, kkiyaʼ ri kitzij rumal jun chik che are nimalaj ubʼantajik chkiwach eʼareʼ, e ri uyaʼik ri tzij riʼ, are waʼ ri kujikibʼaʼ che kkʼisik ronojel uwach chʼoʼj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ ri areʼ xraj xukʼut chkiwach ri keʼechbʼanik na ri chiʼnik, ri che man kukʼex ta riʼ ri xuchomaj, xuyaʼ ri utzij panikʼaj
arech, rumal kebʼ jastaq che man kkʼex ta uwach man loqʼ taj che ri Dyos xaq kubʼan tzij, e xa jeriʼ, ri uj kʼo chi na sibʼalaj qachuqʼabʼ –ri uj che kqatzukuj jun panibʼal jawiʼ kqatoʼ wi qibʼ– arech qas utz uchapik qibʼ kqabʼan chrij ri eyeʼbʼal che ubʼim chqech.
Pa we eyeʼbʼal riʼ, ri uj, chilaʼ kʼo wi ri uchuqʼabʼ ri quxlabʼal, jun kowlaj qachuqʼabʼ che xas naj kok ubʼik chuwach chi apanoq ri jun payuʼ che uchʼuqum qawach.
Jawijeʼ, xok wi nabʼe ri Jesus rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach ri uj; ri areʼ che kamik riʼ junalikalaj nim chuchqajaw rech ri uwachulew jeriʼ jacha ri ubʼantajik ri Melkisedek.
Xa jekʼuriʼ we Melkisedek riʼ, ri rajawinel ri Salem, chuchqajaw rech ri Nimalaj Ubʼantajik Dyos, ri areʼ che xel uloq che ukʼulaxik ri Abʼraham aretaq chiʼ xtzalej uloq aretaq chiʼ xechʼakatajik ri eʼajawinel, e ri Abʼraham xutewchiʼj ri areʼ;
e chrech areʼ xuyaʼ ri alkabʼal rech ronojel, e ri ubʼiʼ jewaʼ ucholajil riʼ: «Ajawinel rech nimalaj sukʼil», e xoqujeʼ, ri areʼ ajawinel rech ri Salem, e weriʼ kubʼij: «Ajawinel rech nimalaj utzil»,
ri areʼ man kʼo ta utat, man kʼo ta unan, man ekʼo ta eʼojer taq ratit umam, man kʼo ta umajibʼal uqʼij e man kʼo ta ukʼisbʼal ukʼaslemal; ri areʼ jeriʼ jacha ri Ukʼojol ri Dyos; ri areʼ junalikalaj chuchqajaw.
Chiwilampeʼ kamik riʼ, nimalaj rech ri Melkisedek; ri areʼ che xyaʼtaj chech ri chʼakʼoj rumal ri qaman Abʼraham.
Qastzij nakʼut, che ri eʼukʼojol ri Levi, ri eʼareʼ che xkikʼam ri chuchqajawisanik, ri eʼareʼ kʼo kukʼ ri utaqanik ri Pixabʼ che xas kkikʼam riʼ ri alkabʼal chkech ri siwantinimit, wa weriʼ kubʼij, che kkikʼam chkech ri ekachalal, puneʼtaj, xoqujeʼ ri eʼareʼ eʼelenaq ubʼik pa ri ukinaqʼ ri Abʼraham;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun, che xas man kʼo ta wi pa ri rijaʼlil, ri areʼ xyaʼtaj chrech ri alkabʼal che rech ri Abʼraham, kʼatekʼuriʼ xuternebʼej ri jun che kʼo taq ri chiʼnik rukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, qastzij wi, che ri chʼutiʼn, kukʼam ri tewchiʼbʼal pa uqʼabʼ ri nim.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, waral riʼ, ri eʼachijabʼ che erech kamikal, kyaʼtaj chkech ri alkabʼal; kʼatekʼut, chilaʼ riʼ, jun ri che kjikibʼaxik chrij che qastzij kʼaslik
Xoqujeʼ, ri Levi, ri areʼ che kukʼam ri alkabʼal; ri areʼ, xutojo pa ri uwinaqil ri Abʼraham;
rumal rech che ri areʼ, kʼo chi pa ri ukinaqʼ ri umam aretaq chiʼ ri Melkisedek xel ubʼi che ukʼulaxik ri areʼ.
Xajekʼuriʼ, weta ri tzʼaqat ubʼantajik, pa ri ukowinem ri uchuchqajawisanik ri Levi kʼo wi –rumal che puwiʼ ri areʼ okisam ri Pixabʼ che xyaʼ chkech ri siwantinimit– ¿jas kʼu che, che rajawaxik che kpe chi na jun chik chuchqajaw jeriʼ jacha ri ucholajil ri Melkisedek e man jeriʼ taj jeʼ jas ri ucholajil ri Aʼaron?
–Rumal rech, che xas aretaq chiʼ xkʼextaj ri chuchqajawisanik, rajawaxik wi xkʼextaj ri Pixabʼ–.
Rumal rech, ri areʼ che kbʼix weriʼ puwiʼ, ri areʼ rech jun chik juqʼat, e chrech we juqʼat riʼ, man kʼo ta jun winaq xpatanajik pa ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chi qʼalaj e etaʼmatalik, che ri Ajawxel rech ri ujuqʼat ri Juda, e puwiʼ ri ujuqʼat riʼ, ri Moʼises man kʼo ta jun tzij xubʼij puwiʼ, aretaq chiʼ kchʼaw puwiʼ ri chuchqajawisanik.
Rumal kʼu waʼ, qas utz rilik chi na riʼ kqabʼano, we kʼo jun chik chuchqajaw kpetik e jeriʼ jacha ri Melkisedek,
e jeriʼ, puneʼtaj man chuchqajaw taj rumal jun pixabʼ rech bʼaqilal, xane rumal ri uchuqʼabʼ jun junalikalaj kʼaslemal.
Qas rumal nakʼut, che bʼim we tzij puwiʼ riʼ: Ri at, at junalikalaj chuchqajaw rech ri uwachulew qas jeriʼ jacha ri ucholajil ri Melkisedek.
Rukʼ weriʼ, xchupataj ri nabʼe Pixabʼ, rumal rech che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ e man utz taj.
–Rumal rech, che ri Pixabʼ, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach xubʼano che tzʼaqatalaj utzil– rumal rech, che ri pixabʼ xa jun okibʼal qech pa jun utzalaj qeyeʼbʼal chi na, e rumal we eyeʼbʼal riʼ, kujqebʼ rukʼ ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, weriʼ, xas rukʼ uyaʼik ri tzij –ri enikʼaj chik, xeʼuxik echuchqajaw e man kʼo ta tzij xyaʼ chkij;
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ, chuchqajaw, rumal rech che ri Areʼ, xuyaʼ ri tzij chrij, e xubʼij chech: Ri Ajawxel xuyaʼ ri utzij chawij, ri Areʼ man kukʼex ta waʼ weriʼ: Ri at, at junalikalaj chuchqajaw rech ri uwachulew.
Xa je kʼuriʼ, ri Jesus, rech uchuqʼabʼ jun utzalaj chapbʼal qʼabʼ chi na.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri enikʼaj chik echuchqajawibʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼiʼ, rumal rech che are ri kamikal kbʼanow chkech che man loqʼ taj kekanaj pa junalik kʼaslemal.
Kʼatekʼut, ri Areʼ kʼo jun junalikalaj chuchqajawisanik rukʼ che man kkʼextaj ta wi.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, kqilo, che ri areʼ kkowinik kuyaʼ ri junalikalaj kolotajem chkech ri jachintaq che rumal ri Areʼ keʼopan rukʼ ri Dyos, rumal rech che kʼaslik pa junalik arech kchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos rech toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach.
Jeriʼ ubʼantajik ri Nimalaj chuchqajaw che rajawaxik chqech ri uj: Tyoxlaj ubʼantajik, sukʼil, chʼajchʼoj, tasatalik apanoq chkech ri eʼajmakibʼ, nimalaj paqabʼan chi na chuwach ri kaj,
man rajawaxik ta chrech che ronojel qʼij kuchiʼj jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ jacha ri enim taq chuchqajawibʼ; che rajawaxik chkech; nabʼe, rumal ri kimak eʼareʼ, e pa ri ukabʼ rumal ri kimak ri siwantinimit e weriʼ xas pa junalik xbʼantaj rumal, aretaq chiʼ xuchiʼj ribʼ.
Ri Pixabʼ keʼuʼuxisaj enim taq chuchqajawibʼ, e ri eʼareʼ ejujun taq achijabʼ che ri etuqaʼr; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri tzij che xyaʼ ubʼixik, chuwach chi aqʼanoq ri Pixabʼ, tzʼaqatalaj ubʼantajik kubʼan chrech ri kʼojolxel chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Ri nimalaj ukʼuʼx ri tzij che qataqem uloq ubʼixik, are we riʼ, che ri uj, kʼo jun Nimalaj Qachuchqajaw; ri areʼ tʼuyulinaq pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri utem ri Nimalaj chikaj
ri areʼ, ajpataninel chrech ri tyoxlaj kʼolibʼal e chrech ri Qastzijlaj Panibʼal, che are ri Ajawxel xyakowik e man jun ta winaq xyakowik.
Rumal rech, che ronojel Nim Chuchqajaw, xokisaxik arech kuchiʼj ri sipanik e ri taq tabʼal toqʼobʼ, xajekʼuriʼ, rajawaxik che ri areʼ kʼo jun jas uwach kuchiʼj.
Weta ri Jesus kʼo chuwach ri ulew, ri areʼ man chuchqajaw ta riʼ, rumal rech che ekʼo chi ejujun che kkichiʼj ri jetaq sipanik jeriʼ jacha kuta ri Pixabʼ;
ri eʼareʼ riʼ, kkipatanij ri uwachbʼal e ri umuʼj ri jastaq rech ri chikaj; jeriʼ jacha xubʼij ri Dyos chech ri Moʼises aretaq chiʼ xumajij uyakik ri Panibʼal: Chawilampeʼ e chabʼanaʼ ronojel jeriʼ jacha ri xkʼut chawach puwiʼ ri juyubʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, kamik riʼ, ri Kristo kʼo jun nimalaj upatan, rumal rech che chʼawel puwiʼ jun utzalaj chapbʼal qʼabʼ chi na, e we chapbʼal qʼabʼ riʼ, wokotajinaq puwiʼ utzalaj taq chiʼnik chi na.
Weta ri nabʼe chapbʼal qʼabʼ, man kʼo ta uyabʼ, man rajawaxik ta jun ukabʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ riʼ.
Ri areʼ, kuchʼa jun tzij e kubʼij chkech: Kpe na jujun taq qʼij, kcha ri Ajawxel, ri in, kukʼ ri rachoch ri Israʼel e ri rachoch ri Juda, kinbʼan chi na jun kʼakʼ chapbʼal qʼabʼ.
