Man jun chapbʼalqʼabʼ taj jeriʼ jacha ri xinbʼan kukʼ ri kitat, pa ri jun qʼij, che ri in xeʼinchap che kiqʼabʼ e xinkʼam kibʼe arech keʼel uloq pa ri Egipto. Rumal rech, che ri eʼareʼ, man xekanaj ta kan pa we chapbʼal nuqʼabʼ riʼ, xoqujeʼ ri in xeʼinya kanoq; kcha ri Ajawxel.
We chapbʼal qʼabʼ riʼ kinbʼan na riʼ kukʼ ri rachoch ri Israʼel, chuwach chi apanoq we jetaq qʼij riʼ, kcha ri Ajawxel: Kinkoj na riʼ, ri taq nupixabʼ pa ri kichomanik, kintʼiq na riʼ pa ri kanimaʼ, e in riʼ, ri in Kidyos e ri eʼareʼ, eʼare enusiwantinimit riʼ.
Pa taq we qʼij riʼ, man rajawaxik ta riʼ che jun winaq kukʼut we tzij riʼ chkiwach ri eʼuwinaq, on chuwach ri rachalal, e kubʼij: «Chachʼobʼo uwach ri Ajawxel», rumal rech, che konojel riʼ kkichʼobʼ nuwach, xas kʼa pa ri chʼutiʼn ubʼik e kopan na rukʼ ri nabʼeʼal chkech.
Rumal rech, che ri in kinsach na uwach riʼ ri ketzelal, e man kinnaʼtaj ta chi riʼ ri kimak.
Aretaq chiʼ kubʼij «kʼakʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ», xuqʼalajisaj na kʼut che qʼeʼl ri nabʼe. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri qʼel e ri man utz taj, xas ksachitaj na uwach riʼ.
Ri nabʼe chapbʼalqʼabʼ, xoqujeʼ kʼo ri uqʼijilaxik e kʼo jun ukʼolibʼal bʼanom waral chuwachulew.
Rumal rech che xsukʼumaxik jun panibʼal chrij ri nabʼe panibʼal, e chupam we kʼolibʼal riʼ kʼo ri chajbʼal e ri mexa, e chuwach ri mexa kʼo ri jetaq kaxlanwa, we kʼolibʼal riʼ ubʼiʼ: Tyoxlaj Ubʼantajik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chrij ri ukʼabʼ payuʼ kʼo jun panibʼal che ubʼiʼ ri Tyoxlaj Ubʼantajik chkixoʼl ri Etyoxlaj taq kibʼantajik,
chilaʼ kʼo wi ri kʼolibʼal rech ri utzalaj taq kunabʼal ri kʼolibʼal rech ri qʼan pwaq e ri tem rech ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ che ronojel chʼuqutalik uwiʼ chech qʼan pwaq, e chuwach kʼo jun qʼan pwaqalaj qʼebʼal che kʼo ri mana chupam, ri uchʼimiʼy ri Aʼaron che xtuxnik e ri jetaq mexa rech ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, puwiʼ ekʼo ri anjelibʼ che erech qʼijil, che rukʼ ri kimuj kkichʼuq uwiʼ ri jaʼmarisabʼal. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, man are ta ucholexik waʼ ronojel weriʼ.
Ronojel, jewaʼ ubʼanom weriʼ; ri echuchqajawibʼ, keʼok ronojel qʼij pa ri nabʼe panibʼal, arech kkibʼan ri kichak kipatan rech qʼijlanik.
Kʼatekʼut, pa ri ukabʼ panibʼal, xuwiʼ ri Nim Chuchqajaw kokik e xa jumul pa ri jun junabʼ kokik rukʼ ri kikʼel che rech sachibʼal umak ri areʼ e ri kimak ri siwantinimit.
Rukʼ weriʼ, ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel kukʼutu, che ri ubʼe ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolbʼal man jaqal taj, aretaq chiʼ kʼo na ri nabʼe panibʼal.
Waʼ weriʼ, jun wachibʼal rech taq we qʼij ri kujriqitaj wi kamik riʼ; rumal rech pa taq we qʼij kamik riʼ, kqayaʼ na jujun taq sipanik e jujun taq tabʼal toqʼobʼ che man kkowin taj kusukʼumaj pa rech wi ri areʼ che ktzukun chech ri Dyos;
e weriʼ xaq Pixabʼ rech ri bʼaqilal, che kuchʼa puwiʼ ri wa, ri ukʼyaʼ, ri atinem e ronojel weriʼ, rajawaxik waʼ kkʼis weriʼ chi kʼa pa ri uqʼij ri jun kʼakʼ chik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Kristo, xokisaxik Nimalaj Chuchqajaw rech ri utzalaj taq jastaq che kpe na chweʼq kabʼij, weriʼ, rumal jun nimalaj e utzalaj panibʼal che man uqʼabʼ ta winaq xbʼanowik e man kʼo ta rech we uwachulew chrech,
xok xas pa jumul pa ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolibʼal; man rukʼ ta kikikʼel ri eʼalaj taq kʼisikʼ on rukʼ kikikʼel ri emam taq wakax; xane xokik rukʼ ri ukikʼel, e jeriʼ xkowinik xuloqʼ chqech jun junalikalaj kolotajem.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, we ri kikikʼel ri ekʼisikʼ e ri kikikʼel ri emam taq wakax, e xoqujeʼ ri kichajil ri ekoʼl taq wakax che katukixik pakiwiʼ ri eʼajmakibʼ, kuyaʼ ri chʼajchʼobʼelil chech ri kibʼaqil,
nimalaj chʼajchʼobʼelil chi na riʼ kuyaʼ ri ukikʼel ri Kristo; che rumal ri Junalikalaj Uxlabʼxel, xuchiʼj ribʼ rukʼ nimalaj uchʼajchʼojil chuwach ri Dyos; ri areʼ, kusaqarisaj na riʼ ri qachomabʼal, kuchup na uwach riʼ ri kaminaq taq qachak, arech ri uj kujqʼijilan na chech ri kʼaslik Dyos.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri areʼ, are chʼawel puwiʼ jun kʼakʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ; xpe ri ukamikal arech kuloqʼ taq ri makaj rech taq ri nabʼe chapbʼalqʼabʼ, e jachintaq esikʼitalik, kkikʼamo ri junalikalaj echbʼal che bʼim chkech.
Rumal rech, che jawiʼ kʼo wi jun wuj ri xubʼij kanoq ri winaq xkamik rajawaxik che kqʼalajanik ri ukamikal ri xbʼanow kanoq we wuj riʼ.
Ri wuj che xubʼij kanoq ri winaq xkamik, xuwiʼ kchakunik e xuwiʼ utz aretaq chiʼ xkamik ri xbʼanow rech. Man kchakun taj e man kʼo ta upatan aretaq chiʼ kʼas na ri xbʼanowik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri nabʼe chapbʼalqʼabʼ xtikitaj ri umajibʼal xas rukʼ kikʼel.
Aretaq chiʼ xbʼitaj rumal ri Moʼises ronojel taq ri upixbʼanik ri Pixabʼ chkech nimalaj konojel; xukʼam ukoq ri kikikʼel ri ekʼakʼ taq mam wakax e ri kikikʼel ri ekʼisikʼ rukʼ ri joron; ri jun kyaqarinaq rismal chij e ri jun jipibʼal; xuchikej ri wuj chech, xuchikikej ribʼ ri areʼ e xeʼuchikikej konojel ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij: are waʼ ri kikʼel rech ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ che are ri Dyos xkojow chiwech.
Xoqujeʼ xuchikikej ri panibʼal e ronojel ri jastaq che kokisax pa ri qʼijilanik.
Jeriʼ jacha kubʼij ri Pixabʼ, ronojel kchʼajchʼobʼexik rukʼ ri kikʼel, e we man kʼo ta kikʼel, man kʼo ta utzil riʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, nabʼe, utz che ri jastaq uwachibʼal ri jastaq kriqitaj chikaj, kchʼajchʼobʼexik jacha weriʼ; e pa ukʼabʼ, utz che kchʼajchʼobʼexik ri kriqitaj wi chikaj; kʼatekʼut, rukʼ jun utzalaj tabʼal toqʼobʼ chi na chuwach ri tabʼal taq toqʼobʼ che rech we uwachulew.
Rumal rech na kʼuriʼ, ri Kristo, man xok ta pa jun Tyoxlaj Kʼolibʼal che uqʼabʼ winaq xbʼanowik, jun kʼolibʼal che xa uwachbʼal ri qas Tyoxlaj Kʼolbʼal; xane xokik chi pa ri kaj arech kamik riʼ, ri areʼ kkʼojiʼ chuwach ri Dyos rech toqʼobʼisabʼal qawach ri uj11.
E man xa ta kuchiʼj ribʼ kʼi taq mul jacha kubʼan ri Nim Chuchqajaw, che kok ronojel junabʼ pa ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolibʼal e rukʼ kikʼel che man ukikʼel ta ri areʼ;
weta jeriʼ, chi rajawaxik na kʼuriʼ che kʼi taq mul kuriq kʼax chi qas pa ri umajibʼal uloq ri uwachulew. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, si xa pa jumul xuqʼalajisaj ri uqʼijil pa ri ukʼisbʼalil, arech kuchup uwach ri makaj aretaq chiʼ si are areʼ kokik tabʼal toqʼobʼ.
Jeriʼ, jacha ri kibʼanik ri winaq, che xa jumul kikamik, kʼatekʼuriʼ keʼok chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij.
Xoqujeʼ, je nakʼuriʼ ri Kristo, ri areʼ xujach ribʼ chi xa pa jumul arech kuchup uwach kimak e kʼi siwan taq tinimit; kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ukamul, kukʼut chi na ribʼ riʼ –aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta chi rech chech ri makaj– chkiwach ri jachintaq keyeʼm arech kuyaʼ ri kolotajem chkech.
Pa ri Pixabʼ, che xuwiʼ kʼolik ri umuj ri mebʼil che kpe na; man kriqitaj ta riʼ pa ri areʼ ri kriqitaj choqʼijsaq; ri pixabʼ man kʼo ta jumul riʼ kkowinik kubʼan utz chkech ri keqibʼ rukʼ ri Dyos rukʼ nikʼaj taq tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kchiʼx ronojel taq junabʼ.
Weta jeriʼ, ¿la man xkikʼis ta kʼu uchiʼxik riʼ ri jetaq tabʼal toqʼobʼ, rumal rech che ri epatanijel chech we qʼijilanik riʼ, ri eʼareʼ xas eʼutzalaj taq winaq chik chi pa ronojel qʼij e chi ketaʼm pa kech wi che man kʼo ta chi jun makaj?
Man jeriʼ ta kʼut; rukʼ taq ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kchiʼxik chi pa ronojel junabʼ, knaʼtisaxik ri jetaq makaj,
rumal rech, che ri kikikʼel ri emam taq wakax e ri kikikʼel ri ekʼisikʼ, man kkowin ta riʼ kuchup uwach ri jetaq makaj.
Rumal kʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri Kristo kok pa we uwachulew riʼ kubʼij: Ri at, man xawaj ta jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ, man xawaj ta jun sipanik; kʼatekʼut, ri at xabʼan jun nubʼaqilal.
Man xakʼamowaj ta ri jetaq holokostos e ri jetaq tabʼal toqʼobʼ rech chupubʼal uwach ri jetaq makaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in xinbʼij: Jeʼ, ri in, inpetinaq –rumal rech che bʼim panuwiʼ in pa ri wuj– arech kinbʼanaʼ ri in, Dyos, ri arayibʼal.
Nabʼe kubʼij: Ri jetaq tabʼal toqʼobʼ, ri jetaq sipanik, ri jetaq holokostos, ri jetaq tabʼal toqʼobʼ che kuchup uwach taq ri makaj, man xakʼamowaj taj –kʼatekʼuriʼ, ronojel weriʼ, xchiʼxik jeriʼ jacha kubʼij ri pixabʼ–.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ –kutzʼaqatisaj chi ukoq–: Jeʼ, ri in, inpetinaq che ubʼanik ri arayibʼal. Ri areʼ kuchup uwach ri nabʼe ucholajil arech kuyaʼo kukoj ri ukabʼ ucholajil.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rumal we jun rayibʼal riʼ, ri uj, ujtyoxrisam, rumal che chi xa pa jumul, ri ubʼaqil ri Jesukristo xokik tabʼal toqʼobʼ.
Qastzij nakʼut, ronojel chuchqajaw, takʼal ronojel taq qʼij che uchiʼxik ri jetaq tabʼal toqʼobʼ e weriʼ man kʼo ta jumul riʼ kkowinik kuchup uwach ri jetaq makaj,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Areʼ xuchiʼj xa jun chi tabʼal toqʼobʼ rech chupbʼal uwach ri jetaq makaj, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xtʼuyiʼ pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos
e reyeʼm chi kʼateʼ na, ri eʼukʼulel keʼokisaxik e tem chuxeʼ raqan.
Rukʼ xa jun chi sipanik, ri areʼ, chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, chi pa junalik xubʼan tzʼaqat eʼutz chkech.
Ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, kubʼij che qastzij weriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kubʼij:
Are waʼ we chapbʼalqʼabʼ che kinbʼan na waʼ kukʼ ri eʼareʼ, kinbʼan waʼ chuwach chi aqʼanoq ri nikʼaj taq qʼij kanoq, kcha ri Ajawxel: Ri in, kinkoj na waʼ, ri jetaq nupixabʼ pa ri kanimaʼ, e kintʼiqʼ na waʼ pa ri kichomabʼal.
E man knaʼtaj ta chi riʼ chwech ri kimak e ri ketzelal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ chuputajinaq chi uwach ri makaj, man kʼo ta chi jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ riʼ kbʼanik rech uchupik uwach ri makaj.
Xa jekʼuriʼ eʼachalaxik, ri uj kʼo ri qachuqʼabʼ, arech kujok pa ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolibʼal rumal ri ukikʼel ri Jesus,
rumal rech ri kʼakʼ e kʼaslikaj bʼe che xujaq ri areʼ chqawach, weriʼ kbʼantajik rumal ri payuʼ –e ri payuʼ, are ri ubʼaqil–.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼo jun chuchqajaw ajawinel, kʼamal bʼe pa ri Rachoch ri Dyos.
Chujqibʼ bʼaʼ qas rukʼ ronojel qanimaʼ, rukʼ tzʼaqatalaj qakojonik, rukʼ jun chʼajchʼojlaj qanimaʼ chuwach ronojel itzel chomanik, e rukʼ jun chʼajchʼoj bʼaqilal che ichʼajom rukʼ tzintzojlaj jaʼ.
Utz ukʼolik bʼaʼ chqabʼanaʼ ri eyeʼbʼal, rumal rech, ri areʼ che xuyaʼ ri utzij, xas man kukʼex ta riʼ ri utzij.
Chujok bʼa il chbʼil taq qibʼ, arech ri uj, uj utz pa ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx e uj utz pa taq ri qachak;
miyaʼ bʼaʼ kanoq ri mulin ibʼ, jacha kʼamaninaq chkech ejujun winaq; xane chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ e weriʼ chinimarisaj chi na ubʼanik aretaq chiʼ kiwilo che naqaj chik kʼo wi ri qʼij che kpetik.
Rumal rech, we ri uj, xas pa qanimaʼ kkʼiy uloq ubʼanik ri makaj, aretaq chiʼ qakʼamom chik ri saqalajtzij; man kʼo ta jun chi tabʼal toqʼobʼ riʼ che kuchup uwach ri jetaq makaj.
Ri areʼ che jewaʼ kubʼano riʼ, xuwiʼ kʼo chi riʼ chuwach jun xibʼibʼalaj jas uwach, chuwach ri qʼatojtzij e chuwach ri xibʼibʼal royowal ri qʼaqʼ, che xas aninaq riʼ keʼutijej ubʼik ri eʼitzel taq winaq.
¿La kʼo jun winaq kupaqchiʼj ri Upixabʼ ri Moʼises? Utz riʼ che kkamisaxik, we ekʼo kebʼ on oxibʼ winaq che kkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri upaqchiʼnik.
¿La man kichomaj taj che nimalaj kʼax chi na riʼ chuwach weriʼ, ri taqal chrij ri jun che kutakʼaleʼj uwach ri ukʼojol ri Dyos e che man kril taj ri utzalaj ukikʼel rech ri chapbʼalqʼabʼ ri kubʼan tyoxlaj chrech areʼ, e xoqujeʼ che kubʼij ri itzel chrech ri Tyoxlaj Sipanik?
Ri uj qetaʼm uwach ri areʼ che xubʼij: In in rajaw ri yaʼbʼal utojbʼalil ukʼaxel, ri in xas kintoj na riʼ ri taqalik. Xoqujeʼ: Ri Ajawxel kubʼan na riʼ ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri eʼuwinaq.
Nimalaj kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx, aretaq chiʼ jun winaq kqaj pa ri uqʼabʼ ri kʼaslik Dyos, rumal ri kʼax.
Chnaʼtaj bʼaʼ chiwech, ri nabʼe taq qʼij; aretaq chiʼ kʼo chi ri saqil iwukʼ; ri ix jun nimalaj kʼax xkʼojiʼ iwukʼ,
kʼo jun taq mul, ix kʼo chuwach ri yoqʼonik e chuwach ri kʼax chkiwach ri winaq; kʼo jun taq mul chik, xikuyu e xiyaʼ iwach kukʼ ri kbʼan kʼax chkech.
Rumal rech, che ri ix, xinaʼo e xibʼan iwech chrech ri kikʼaxkʼolil ri ekʼo pacheʼ; ri ix, rukʼ kiʼkotemal xixkʼojiʼk, aretaq chiʼ xtoqix ri jastaq iwech, rumal rech che ri ix iwetaʼm che kʼo jun nimalaj iqʼinomal chuwach ronojel weriʼ e jun iqʼinomal che xas ko kʼolik.
Misach bʼaʼ kamik riʼ ri kubʼal ikʼuʼx, ri ichuqʼabʼ; waʼ, kʼo jun nim e sukʼalaj utojbʼalil.
Ri ix, rajawaxik kkʼojiʼ ikochʼonik pa ri kʼax arech qas kibʼan ri kraj ri Dyos e xa jekʼuriʼ ri ix kichʼak riʼ ri uchiʼnik ri Areʼ.
Rumal rech che xa jubʼiq chik; qas xa nitzʼalaj jubʼiq chik; ri Areʼ che kpe na, xas kpe na riʼ e xas chanim riʼ kpetik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri sukʼlaj nuwinaq, kʼo ukʼaslemal riʼ pa ri ukojonik; e we kanimajik; ri wuxlabʼal man kkiʼkot ta riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj man kujanimaj ta waʼ, man uj rech ta ri sachibʼal ibʼ, ri uj, uj winaq che kʼo riʼ ri qakojonik arech kqakol ri quxlabʼal.
Ri kojonik, are ujikibʼalil ri qeyeʼbʼal; are areʼ ri kambʼejabʼalil chech ri jastaq che man kilitaj ta uwach.
Rumal ri areʼ, sibʼalaj xelabʼajixik ri eqatiʼt qamam.
Rumal ri kojonik ri uj kqachʼobʼo, che ri nimalaj uwachulew xbʼantajik rukʼ jun utzij ri Dyos, e jekʼuriʼ, ri jastaq che kqil uwach uj, xel uloq rukʼ ri man kqil ta uwach.
Rumal ri kojonik, ri Abʼel xuyaʼ chrech ri Dyos jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ che are nimalaj ubʼanik chi na chuwach ri rech ri Kaʼin; e rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri areʼ sukʼil kuʼchuxik rumal ri Dyos, aretaq chiʼ utz xilitaj ri usipanik, e jeriʼ nakʼut, rumal weriʼ, puneʼtaj che ri areʼ kaminaq chik, ri ukojonik xas kchʼaw na puwiʼ.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Henok xkʼam ubʼik, xa jekʼuriʼ, man xril ta ri kamikal, man xriqitaj taj, rumal rech che xkʼam ubʼik rumal ri Dyos. Rumal rech, che chuxeʼ taq ri ukʼamik ubʼik, ri tzʼibʼatalik kuyaʼ ubʼixik puwiʼ ri areʼ che utz xubʼan chuwach ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta ri qakojonik, xas man loqʼ ta riʼ utz kujril wi ri Dyos. Rumal rech che jachin kqibʼ rukʼ ri Dyos, rajawaxik riʼ kkojonik che kʼo ri Dyos; e che ri Dyos, kuyaʼ na riʼ ri utzil chkech ri ketzukun chrech ri areʼ.
Rumal ri ukojonik ri Noʼe xretaʼmaj rumal ri Dyos ri jastaq uwach che majaʼ kilitajik, rukʼ jun kojonikalaj xibʼirikil chuwach ri Dyos, xubʼan jun jukubʼ, arech keʼukol ri eʼuwinaq eʼajpaja kʼolibʼal. Rumal ri ukojonik xubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ we uwachulew e ri areʼ xeʼuxoq echbʼanel chech ri sukʼil che kriqitaj rumal ri kojonik.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Abʼraham animanik chrech ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ kutaq ubʼik arech kbʼe kʼa jun ulew che kyaʼtaj na chrech pa echbʼanik; kʼatekʼuriʼ, xel ubʼik, xbʼek e man retaʼm taj jawiʼ kbʼe wi.
Rumal ri ukojonik, xbʼinkatik pa ri ulew che xbʼix chrech, e pa ri ulew riʼ, jun kaxlan winaq ri areʼ; ri areʼ kjeqiʼ pa taq panibʼal; xoqujeʼ jeriʼ xubʼan ri Isaʼak e ri Jakobʼ, ri eʼareʼ che xoqujeʼ eʼechbʼanelabʼ chrech ri chiʼnik.
Ri Abʼraham, kreyeʼj ri nimalaj tinimit che tzʼaqatalik qas chuxeʼ uloq, e che are ri Dyos ajtzʼaqal rech.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Sara, xoqujeʼ xkowinik xalkʼuwaʼlanik chi aretaq chiʼ man ujunabʼ ta chik, rumal rech che ri areʼ, xuchomaj che man kukʼex ta riʼ ri utzij ri xchiʼn weriʼ chrech.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, chi xa rukʼ jun winaq che naqaj chik kʼo wi chrech ri kamikal, xeʼalax wi ekʼiʼ rijaʼlil, sibʼalaj ekʼi jacha ri chʼimil pa kaj; e man loqʼ taj keʼejelaxik jacha ri sanyebʼ chuchiʼ ri polow.
Ri eʼareʼ, xekam pa ri kikojonik, e xas man xkil ta wi ri ubʼim kanoq ri chiʼnik: xuwi naj xkiyaw apanoq jun rutzil uwach, kʼatekʼuriʼ xkibʼij che xas ekaxlan wi e xa ebʼinel xa ekʼownel cho we uwachulew.
Ri jeriʼ kkibʼij, utz ukʼutik kkibʼano che tajin ebʼenaq che utzukuxik jun kulew.
Weta are xechoman puwiʼ ri jun ulew che xkiyaʼ kanoq; xekowinik na kʼuriʼ weta xetzalij pa we ulew riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ keyeʼm chi na jun utzlaj ulew pa ri kaj. Rumal kʼuriʼ, ri Dyos man kkʼix ta chkech ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kubʼij che are Areʼ Kidyos; rumal rech che usukʼumam chkech jun nimalaj tinimit.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Abʼraham xkajmexik pa ri kʼax e xuchiʼj ri Isaʼak ri xuwi ukʼojol; ri areʼ che xukʼam ri chiʼnik,
che xas puwiʼ ri areʼ bʼim chech: Rumal ri Isaʼak, ri at kkʼojiʼ awijaʼlil.
Kuchomaj, che nimalaj kowinnel riʼ ri Dyos che keʼuwaʼlajisaj na riʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ; rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, xyaʼtaj chi na ri ukʼojol Isaʼak chrech, e ri areʼ xokik jun wachibʼal.
Rumal ri ukojonik ri Isaʼak xuyaʼ ri tewchibʼal chrech ri Jakobʼ e chrech ri Esaʼu e xas are kril apanoq ri utz taq junabʼ che kpe na riʼ.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Jakobʼ aretaq chiʼ kamikal chik kubʼano, xeʼutewchiʼj konojel ri ukʼojol ri Jose, xulukbʼaʼ ribʼ e xuqʼoybʼaʼ ri ujolom cho ri uchʼimiy.
Rumal ri ukojonik ri Jose, aretaq chiʼ naqaj chik kʼo wi ri ukʼisbʼalil, xunaʼtisaj ri kiqʼaxebʼal ri eralkʼuwaʼl ri Israʼel, e xtaqan kan puwiʼ ri taq ubʼaq.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri Moʼises aretaq chiʼ jun alaj nochʼ, ri areʼ xwaxik oxibʼ ikʼ kumal ri unan utat, rumal rech che xkilo che jun utzalaj lochʼ, e ri eʼareʼ, man xkixibʼij ta kibʼ chuwach ri uwuj ri ajawinel.
Aretaq chiʼ tzʼaqat winaq chik ri Moʼises; rumal ri ukojonik xupaqchiʼj we kbʼix chrech, che ri areʼ ral jun umiʼal ri Faraʼon,
are utz chuwach che kʼo pa ri kʼax kukʼ ri eʼuwinaq ri Dyos chuwach che kukʼaslemaj pa kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij ri ujeʼlal ri makaj,
xuchomaj, che are nimalaj qʼinomal riʼ ri itzel uyoqʼik xbʼan ri Kristo chuwach ri uqʼinomal ri Egipto, rumal rech che ri areʼ, are uyaʼom apanoq ri uwoqʼoch chrij ri utojbʼalil kyaʼtaj na chrech.
Rumal ri ukojonik, xuyaʼ kan ri Egipto e man xuxibʼij ta ribʼ chrech ri royowal ri ajawinel; ri areʼ ko xtakiʼk qas jeriʼ che kril ri jastaq uwach che man loqʼ taj kqilo.
Rumal ri ukojonik ri areʼ xrokʼowisaj ri Paskuʼa e xuchikij ri kikʼel, arech ri kamisanel man keʼuchap ta ri eʼunabʼeʼal ri Israʼel.
Rumal ri kikojonik xeqʼax pa ri Kyaq polow jeʼ jas chaqiʼjilaj ulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri eʼajegipto aretaq chiʼ xkaj che xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kkibʼano; xeʼubʼiq ubʼi ri polow.
Rumal ri kikojonik ri jetaq utapya ri Jeriko xtzaq ubʼik, aretaq chiʼ ri eʼareʼ, wuqubʼ qʼij chik sutim kij.
Rumal ri ukojonik, ri ixoq Rajabʼ che kech nim chʼutiʼn, man xkam ta kukʼ ri man kekojon taj, rumal rech che pa jaʼmaril xeʼukʼulaj ri winaq che xa keʼetzalinoq.
Kʼatekʼut, ¿jas chi na kinbʼij? Rumal rech che man jamal ta waʼ weta kinwaj kʼo kinbʼij chi na puwiʼ ri Gedeʼon, ri Bʼarak, ri Samson, ri Jefte, ri David, ri Samueʼl e ri eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos,
waʼ we eʼareʼ riʼ, rumal ri kikojonik, xkiqasaj taq ajawibʼal xkibʼan ri qʼatojtzij; xkikʼam taq ri chiʼnik, xkitzʼapij kichiʼ ri ekoj;
xkiqasaj ri uchuqʼabʼ ri kʼyaqbʼal taq qʼaqʼ; xeʼanimaj chuwach ri upuchiʼ taq ri chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj; kʼo sibʼalaj kichuqʼabʼ; man eyawabʼ ta chik; kʼo sibʼalaj ukowil ri kanimaʼ pa ri chʼoʼj, e xkipaqchiʼj kiwach ri ekaxlan taq ajchʼoʼjabʼ,
ejujun ixoqibʼ, xkʼastaj kiwach ri ekikaminaqibʼ. Ejun chkech ri ekaminaqibʼ xbʼan nimalaj taq kʼax chkech pa ri kibʼaqil, man xkaj taj xetzoqopitajik rumal rech che kkaj jun utzalaj kʼastajibʼal wachaj chi na.
Enikʼaj chik xkichʼijo che ketzʼebʼax kiwach e ri kirapuxik, xoqujeʼ ri kijitʼixik rukʼ chʼichʼ e che xeʼokisax pacheʼ;
xekʼyaq che abʼaj, xequpixik xekamisaxik rukʼ taq uchʼichʼ chʼoʼj; ri eʼareʼ ebʼinnel xkibʼano e echʼuqutalik rukʼ utzʼumal chij on rukʼ utzʼumal kʼisikʼ; ri eʼareʼ man kʼo ta jun jastaq kech; ri eʼareʼ ekʼo pa ri kʼax kumal nikaj chik; sibʼalaj kbʼan kʼax chkech e keyoqʼik kumal ri eʼitzel taq winaq.
We winaq riʼ, man eʼutz taj chuwach we uwachulew; xebʼe pa taq tzʼinalik ulew, pa taq juyubʼ, pa taq ri pek, pa taq ri abʼaj.
Konojel ri eʼareʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ kʼo jun utzalaj tzij kbʼix pakiwiʼ rumal ri kikojonik; ri eʼareʼ man xkiriq ta ri chiʼm kanoq.
Ri Dyos, xas uchoman chi uloq jun utzalaj jas uwach chqech ri uj, arech ri eʼareʼ man keʼopan taj we man uj kʼo uj kukʼ.
Rumal weriʼ, ri uj, ekʼo chqawach ekʼi e eʼutzalaj taq winaq; xa jekʼuriʼ, rajawaxik che ri uj kqakʼyaq ubʼi ronojel eqaʼn e ri makaj che kusutij qij ri uj, arech qas rukʼ qachuqʼabʼ kqakoj anim pa ri qabʼe
e are qas chqilaʼ ri unimal qakojonik, ri Areʼ che are umajibʼal e are ukʼisbʼalil ri qakojonik, ri Areʼ che man kkanaj ta kan pa ri ukiʼkotemal, xane are xuchiʼj jun ripbʼal, man xuxibʼij ta ribʼ chuwach ri etzelal; e kamik riʼ kʼo pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri utem ri Dyos.
Chixchoman bʼaʼ chrech ri Areʼ, che xuchʼij we kʼax riʼ chi pa kiqʼabʼ ri eʼajmakibʼ, arech ri ix man kixtzaq taj rumal rech che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ ri iwuxlabʼal.
Ri ix, pa ri ukojik ichuqʼabʼ chuwach ri makaj, man ikochʼom taj kixopan chi kʼa pa ri kikʼel.
¿La man ixkanajinaq ta kan pa ri tzij che rech ichuqʼabʼ kbʼix chiwech, jeriʼ jas ixalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ?: Nukʼojol, mawetzelaj uwach ri yajanik rech ri Ajawxel; mubʼan kebʼ akʼuʼx aretaq chiʼ katuyajo.
Rumal rech, che ri jun che loqʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel, xas kyaj wi rumal ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ kukʼajisaj kiwach konojel ri eralkʼuwaʼl che eloqʼ chuwach.
Kiriq kʼax, rech utzil chiwech. Jeriʼ jacha ixalkʼuwaʼlaxelabʼ kubʼan ri Dyos chiwech, ¿jachin jun alkʼuwaʼlxel kʼolik, che ri utat man kukʼajisaj ta uwach?
We man kukʼajisaj ta iwach, jeriʼ jacha kubʼan chkech konojel; ri ix, xa ix ralkʼuwaʼl riʼ rukʼ chi jun ixoq e man ix ralkʼuwaʼl ta riʼ pa ri ukʼulanem.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj ekʼo na ri eqatat ri xeyoʼw ri qabʼaqilal e che ri kkikʼajisaj qawach, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj, keqanimaj ¿la man kujniman ta kʼu riʼ chech ri Tatxel che erajaw ri eʼuxlabʼal, che are nimalaj chuwach weriʼ, arech ri uj kkʼojiʼ ri qakʼaslemal?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eqatat, xkikʼajisaj qawach jeriʼ jacha ri usaqil pa ri kichomabʼal eʼareʼ, e xa rech kebʼ oxibʼ junabʼ; kʼatekʼut, ri Areʼ, kubʼan weriʼ chqech arech kkʼojiʼ ri tyoxalaj ubʼantajik qukʼ.
Qastzij nakʼut, aretaq chiʼ kyaj jun, man kʼo ta riʼ ri kiʼkotemal qukʼ, xane kujbʼison riʼ. Kʼatekʼut, pa jun qʼij chik, kuyaʼ riʼ ri utzalaj sukʼil chkech ri kkichakuj ubʼeʼal weriʼ.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ chiwaʼlisaj bʼaʼ ri iqʼabʼ che kaminaq e ri ichʼek che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ,
e chisukʼumaj bʼaʼ ri kʼax taq bʼe chrech ri iwaqan; arech man ksach ta ri chʼokoʼ; xane are utz riʼ che kkunatajik ri areʼ.
Chitzukuj bʼaʼ ri jaʼmaril e ri tyoxlaj kʼaslemal kukʼ konojel: we kʼo jun man kʼo ta weriʼ rukʼ, man kril ta uwach ri Ajawxel.
Qas chixok bʼaʼ il che rilik arech man kʼo ta jun winaq che mata kʼo ri usipanik ri Dyos rukʼ; chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ arech man kʼo ta jun kʼalaj urabʼ cheʼ katuxnik uloq e kubʼanaʼ kʼax chiwech e rumal ri areʼ kubʼanaʼ itzel ronojel ri qʼor.
Qas chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ arech man kʼo ta jun itzel winaq che kubʼan ri itzel taq jas uwach, jeriʼ jacha ri Esaʼu, che xa rumal jun rikil, xujal ri pixbʼanik taqal chrij ri areʼ rumal rech che nabʼeʼal Kʼojolxel ri areʼ.
Iwetaʼm chik, jas ri aninaq xubʼan chik aretaq chiʼ xraj che krechbʼej chik ri tewchiʼbʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ xpaqchiʼx ubʼik; e man xkowin ta che ukʼexik ri chomanik, puneʼtaj chi rukʼ roqʼej xraj weta xkowinik.
Ri ix, man xixqibʼ ta rukʼ jun jas uwach che kilitaj uwach: che qʼaqʼ, che qʼequʼmal, che nimalaj qʼequʼm; nimalaj kaqiqʼ,
che roqʼobʼal ri trompeta, roqʼobʼal taq tzij; kʼatekʼuriʼ ri xetow weriʼ, xkitzʼonoj arech man kechʼabʼex ta chi jumul rukʼ weriʼ.
Rumal rech, che man kekowin taj kichʼij we pixabʼ riʼ: Ri jun che kuchap na ri juyubʼ, puneʼtaj jun awaj, xas chi kʼyaqaʼ bʼaʼ ri abʼaj chrij.
Rukʼ ri nimalaj taq kʼax che xkilo, ri Moʼises xubʼij: Ri in sibʼalaj kinxibʼijj wibʼ e tajin kinbʼirbʼitik.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, xixqibʼ rukʼ ri Ujuyubʼal ri Siʼon pa ri utinimit ri kʼaslik Dyos, rukʼ ri Ujerusalem ri kaj, e kukʼ ri sibʼalaj eʼanjelibʼ, pa jun nimaqʼijalaj mulin ibʼ;
kukʼ ri winaq che enabʼeʼal e che kʼo ri kibʼiʼ pa ri kaj, rukʼ ri jun chi Dyos, qʼatbʼaltzij chrech ronojel uwachulew, kukʼ ri kuxlabʼal ri esukʼ taq winaq, ri eʼareʼ che eʼutzalaj pa ri ukʼisbʼalil,
e rukʼ ri Jesus, ri areʼ che qʼaxeltzij chech ri kʼakʼ chapbʼalqʼabʼ; rukʼ jun kikʼel che kuyaʼ ri sukʼil e che are utz chi na chuwach ri ukikʼel ri Abʼel.
Qas chiwilaʼ iwibʼ, arech ri ix mipaqchiʼj ri utzij ri Areʼ; rumal rech, che ri jachintaq xkipaqchiʼj ri utzij ri jun che xuya ubʼixik jujun taq pixabʼ pa ri uwachulew, man xekowin taj xeʼanimaj chuwach ri kʼax; are neʼ nimalaj man kujkowin ta riʼ ri uj kujanimajik we kqapaqchiʼj uwach ri Areʼ che qas pa ri kaj kujuchʼabʼej uloq.
Ojer kanoq, ri uchʼabʼal Areʼ xusilobʼisaj ri uwachulew. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ kubʼij we tzij chqech riʼ: Chi pa jumul chik, ri in, kinsilobʼisaj chi na ma xuwi ta we uwachulew, xane xoqujeʼ ri kaj.
Pa jumul chik riʼ, ri kubʼij we tzij riʼ; che ri jastaq uwach che kusilobʼisaj na uwach ri Areʼ, xas kkʼextaj na uwach riʼ, rumal rech che we jastaq uwach riʼ xa bʼanom; e kkʼextajik, arech are kkanajik ri jastaq che xas man kkʼextaj ta wi.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, we ri uj, xqakʼamowaj jun Ajawibʼal che man kkʼextaj ta uwach, rajawaxik e utz nakʼuriʼ riʼ che qas kqakʼol we sipanik riʼ, e rukʼ we sipanik riʼ chqayaʼaʼ bʼaʼ chrech ri Dyos jun qʼijilanik che utz chuwach ri areʼ, rukʼ jun kojonikalaj kʼaslemal e rukʼ xibʼrikil.
Rumal rech, che ri Qadyos, ri areʼ jun qʼaqʼ che ronojel kukʼatisaj ubʼik.
Chixkanaj bʼaʼ pa loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chbʼil iwibʼ.
Msach bʼaʼ chiwech che sibʼalaj utz we jun winaq kroqxaʼnij ribʼ choja e kikʼulaj uwach, rumal na kʼut weriʼ, ejujun xekikʼulaj eʼanjelibʼ e man xketaʼmaj taj.
Chnaʼtaj bʼaʼ chiwech ri ekʼo pacheʼ, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che, ix kʼo kukʼ eʼareʼ pa ri cheʼ; chnaʼtaj chiwech ri jetaq kʼax kbʼan chkech, rumal rech che xoqujeʼ ri ix kʼo jun ibʼaqil.
Nim chiwilaʼ wi ri kʼulanem e ri chʼat rech kʼulanem chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ che xas man kʼo jun jas uwach itzel chuwach. Rumal rech che ri Dyos, kubʼan na riʼ qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ronojel itzel kʼaslemal e puwiʼ ri mak rukʼ achi ixoq.
Utz ri pwaq, kʼatekʼut miloqʼoqʼej uwach; chixkiʼkot bʼa rukʼ ri jastaq che kʼo iwukʼ; rumal rech, che ri Dyos ubʼim: Ri in, man katinyaʼ ta kanoq e man katinwonobʼaʼ ta kanoq;
xa jekʼuriʼ, ri uj kujkowinik kqabʼij rukʼ qachuqʼabʼ: Ri Ajawxel, are areʼ ri Qakolonel; ri in man kʼo ta kinxibʼij wibʼ, ¿jas kkowinik riʼ kubʼan jun winaq chwech?
Misach bʼaʼ chiwech ri ekamal taq ibʼe, ri eʼareʼ che xkibʼano arech ri ix xita ri utzij ri Dyos, qas chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ ri kikʼaslemal pa ri ukʼisbʼalil arech ri ix kkʼojiʼ ri ikojonik, jeriʼ jacha ri kikojonik ri eʼareʼ.
Ri Jesus Kristo, ri areʼ ojer, ri areʼ kamik riʼ e xoqujeʼ chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Mijal bʼaʼ ri ibʼe rumal jujun kaxlan taq tzij; rumal rech, che are utz che ri animaʼ kʼo uchuqʼabʼ pa ri sipanik; e man are ta utz riʼ che ktij ri jetaq wa che man kʼo ta utz xubʼan chkech ri xetijowik.
Ri uj kʼo jun qatabʼal toqʼobʼ che jawi, ri eʼajpatanijel pa ri panibʼal, man yaʼtal ta chkech arech kewaʼ ri eʼareʼ chilaʼ.
Ri eʼawaj; che ri kikikʼel, kukʼam ubʼi ri Nim Chuchqajaw pa ri Tyoxlaj Kʼolibʼal, arech kubʼan ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ rech kuchup uwach ri makaj; ri kibʼaqil man kkʼatisax ta pa ri ekʼo wi ri winaq.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri Jesus, arech ri Areʼ keʼutyoxrisaj ri winaq rukʼ ri ukikʼel, ri areʼ xuqʼaxej ri kʼax man pa ri tinimit taj, xane xuqʼaxej ri kʼax chrij apan ri tinimit.
Xa jekʼuwaʼ, arech, uj kʼo uj rukʼ ri areʼ, chujel bʼaʼ uloq pa ri tinimit, chqeqaj bʼaʼ uloq ri retzalaxik uwach areʼ;
rumal rech, che ri uj, man kʼo ta jun junalikalaj qatinimit waral pa we uwachulew, xane tajin kqatzukuj ri jun che kpe na chweq kabʼij.
Chi rumal bʼaʼ ri Areʼ, ronojel taq qʼij, chqayaʼ bʼaʼ chech ri Dyos jun tabʼal toqʼobʼ rech qʼajajenik utzalaj taq tzij; wa weriʼ, are waʼ ri uwach, che kech ri jetaq chiʼaj che kkiqʼijilaj ri ubʼiʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chnaʼtaj bʼa chiwech, che rajawaxik ri jetaq sipanik chkech ri eʼachalaxik, chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ jun pwaq chkech konojel; waʼ weriʼ jun utzalaj tabʼal toqʼobʼ chuwach ri Dyos.
Chinimaj bʼaʼ kitzij ri eʼinimal e chikʼamaʼ uqʼabʼ ri keqeleʼn, ri eʼare echajinelabʼ chrech ri iwuxlabʼal, jeriʼ jacha kta na riʼ chkech piwiʼ ri ix pa ri kiqʼatojtzij; cheʼinimaj bʼaʼ arech kixkichajij rukʼ ri kiʼkotemal e man rukʼ ta kʼisbʼal kʼuʼx; weta jeriʼ, man kʼo ta jun utz riʼ kukʼamaʼ uloq chiwech ri ix.
Chixchʼaw bʼaʼ paqawiʼ ri uj rukʼ ri Dyos, rumal rech che ri uj qas qajikibʼam che utz ri uchomanik ri qanimaʼ, e kqaj che utz kqabʼano pa ronojel jas uwach.
Chi rukʼ ronojel wanimaʼ kinta chiwech qas chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ, arech man naj ta chik kʼo wi che ri in kintzalix ubʼi iwukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Dyos rech ri Utzil, ri Areʼ che are xbʼanowik che xas chkixoʼl ri kaminaqibʼ, ri Qajawxel Jesus, che Nim Ajyuqʼ chkech ri chij, rumal ri ukikʼel rech ri junalikalaj chapbʼalqʼabʼ
kuyaʼ ta bʼaʼ chiwech ronojel utzil, arech qas kibʼano ri kraj areʼ, e ri areʼ, kubʼan waʼ pa ri uj ri utz chuwach Areʼ chi rumal ri Jesus Kristo, che chrech areʼ ri qʼijil chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq. Amen.
Kinta bʼaʼ chiwech achalaxik, qas chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ we tzij riʼ che rech chuqʼabʼ, xane xa jubʼiqʼ kintzʼibʼaj chiwech.
Chiwetaʼmaj bʼaʼ, che ri qachalal Timoteʼo, ri areʼ xtzqopix uloq. We aninaq kpe uloq, kinbʼe ubʼiʼ riʼ rukʼ ri areʼ arech kixinwilaʼ ix.
¡Chiyaʼaʼ jun rutzil kiwach konojel ri ekʼamal taq ibʼe, xoqujeʼ chkech ri etyoxlaj taq winaq; konojel ri eʼajitaliʼa, kkiyaʼ apan jun rutzil iwach!
¡Chkʼojiʼ ta bʼaʼ iwukʼ iwonojel ri nimalaj sipanik!
Ri Santiʼago, ajpataninel chech ri Dyos e chech ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo, kuyaʼ jun rutzil kiwach ri ekabʼlajuj juqʼat che kijabʼum kibʼ chi naj wi.
Sibʼalaj chixkiʼkot bʼaʼ, ix achalaxik, aretaq chiʼ ri ix kiriq ronojel uwach kʼax.
Ri ix iwetaʼm: rukʼ waʼ we kʼax riʼ, ri ikojonik kkʼojiʼ uchuqʼabʼ;
kʼatekʼut, rukʼ ri uchuqʼabʼ ri ikojonik riʼ, qas chibʼanaʼ ri utzalaj jastaq uwach, arech ri ix, ix utz e ix sukʼlaj taq winaq, e jeriʼ, ri ix, man kʼo ta jun jas uwach riʼ kilitajik che kraj na chiwech.
We jun chiwech ri ix, man kʼo ta unoʼj, ri jun riʼ, chutaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ chech ri Dyos –ri areʼ, sibʼalaj kuyaʼo e man kʼo ta kuchʼaʼo– e ri Dyos kuyaʼ na riʼ chrech.
Kʼatekʼut, rajawaxik, che ri areʼ, kuto si rukʼ ronojel ukojonik man xaq ta rukʼ kebʼ ukʼuʼx, rumal rech che ri jun che kubʼan kebʼ ukʼuʼx, junam riʼ rukʼ ri uqʼet ri polow che kuwaʼlisaj ri kyaqiqʼ e kyakyatik jewaʼ jeriʼ.
Muchomaj jun achi che jeriʼ, che kʼo na kyaʼtaj chech rumal ri Ajawxel.
We jun winaq riʼ, kʼo jun paqʼtajinaq ruxlabʼal e man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ pa taq ronojel ubʼe.
Ri winaq che mebʼaʼ kʼo nimalaj uqʼijil riʼ, rumal rech, che ri areʼ xas kyak na riʼ,
e ri qʼinom winaq, ri areʼ, are uqʼijil riʼ ri kqasax na riʼ, rumal rech che ri areʼ, ksachtaj na uwach riʼ jeriʼ jas jun ukotzʼijal qʼayes.
Ri qʼij, kel uloq rukʼ ri uqʼaqʼal, kuchaqiʼjarisaj ri qʼayes e ktzaq ubʼi riʼ ri ukotzʼiʼjal; ri jeʼlikalaj ukaʼyibʼal ksach uwach riʼ; jeriʼ nakʼu riʼ, ri qʼinom winaq, kusach uwach ribʼ riʼ pa taq ri ubʼe.
Utz rech riʼ ri winaq che kuchʼij ri kʼax; aretaq chiʼ, ketaʼmaxik uwach areʼ che utz, ri areʼ, kjach na riʼ chech ri ketakik rech ujolom che are ri kʼaslemal; ri uchiʼm ri Ajawxel chkech konojel ri kkiloqʼoqʼej ri Areʼ.
Jun winaq che kkajmaxik rumal ri makaj, mubʼij bʼaʼ: «Are ri Dyos kinukajmaj». Rumal rech che, ri Dyos, man kkajmax taj rumal ri itzel e xoqujeʼ man kʼo ta jun kukajmaj areʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ronojel winaq kkajmax uwach rumal ri urayibʼal che krokisaj ri areʼ pa ri itzel.
Aretaq chiʼ ri rayibʼal xbʼantaj ri uchak: ri areʼ kril na uwach ri makaj; kʼatekʼuriʼ aretaq chiʼ ri makaj xbʼantaj ri uchak, kril na riʼ uwach ri kamikal.
Misach bʼaʼ, ixloqʼalaj taq wachalal:
ronojel utzalaj sipanik e ronojel sukʼilalaj jas uwach, xas petinaq uloq pa ri kaj, kqaj uloq tza rukʼ ri Utatxel ri kaj, ri areʼ che man kkʼextajik taj, ri areʼ che man kʼo ta kjalataj uwach rukʼ.
Ri areʼ xraj xujralkʼuwaʼlaj ri uj rumal ri Tzij che saqalajtzij, arech, uj ri uj nabʼe taq winaq chkech ri eʼuwinaq ri areʼ.
Qas chiwetaʼmaj bʼaʼ weriʼ, ixloqʼalaj taq wachalal: Chi ronojel winaq bʼaʼ, qas aninaq chutatabʼej ri tzij e man aninaq ta bʼaʼ kachʼawik, e man aninaq ta bʼa kpe ri royowal,
rumal rech, che ri royowal ri winaq man are ta kbʼanow utz chech usukʼil ri Dyos.
Chipaqchiʼj bʼaʼ, ronojel itzel jas uwach, ronojel itzel chomanik, e utz ukʼulaxik chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri Tzij che xokisax pa ri iwanimaʼ ri ix, e che kkowinik kukol ri iwuxlabʼal.
Qas chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, ri jastaq ri kubʼij ri Tzij. ¡Mibʼan bʼaʼ jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri enikʼaj che kkita ri tzij e are kkichomaj chi apan ri jastaq che man utz ta chkech!
Ri jun che kuta ri Tzij e man kubʼan taj, ri areʼ riʼ, jeriʼ jacha jun winaq che kril ri uwach pa jun lemoʼ.
Ri areʼ, kril ribʼ, kʼatekʼut, kbʼe uwiʼ rukʼ e man knaʼtaj ta chik chrech ri qas kkaʼy ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun, che utz kril ri Pixabʼ, are ajchaqʼeʼ riʼ ri tzoqopitajem e utz uchapik kubʼano, man jeriʼ ta riʼ jacha ri jun winaq che man kkanaj ta kan ri tzij chrech, xane utz ubʼanik riʼ kubʼan ri Tzij, e ri areʼ riʼ, nimalaj ukiʼkotemal riʼ aretaq chiʼ kubʼano.
We kʼo jun winaq kuchomaj, che ri areʼ utzalaj pa ri Komon Tyox, kʼatekʼuriʼ, man tzʼapital ta ri uchiʼ e kebʼ ukʼuʼx kubʼano; xas man utz ta riʼ ri ukojbʼal.
Ri saqililaj kojbʼal e chʼajchʼoj chuwach ri Dyos Qatatxel, are weriʼ: are ri kisoloxik ri akʼalabʼ che man kʼo ta kinan kitat, ri kisolik ri emalkaʼnibʼ chuchuʼibʼ aretaq chiʼ ekʼo pa nimalaj kʼax; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uchajixik ibʼ chuwach ri eʼitzel taq winaq che erech we uwachulew.
Ix wachalal; man are ta kiwil ri uwach ri winaq che kʼo pa ri ikojonik chrij ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo che nimalaj uqʼijil.
Chichomaj neʼ, che kok ubʼi pa ri Ikomon Tyox, jun achi che ukojom jun qʼanalaj pwaq umulqʼabʼ, kʼo jun utzalaj ratzʼyaq; xoqujeʼ, kok ubʼi sin mebʼaʼ rukʼ jun tzʼililaj ratzʼyaq.
Ri ix, are kiwil ri jun che kʼo ri utzalaj ratzʼyaq e kibʼij chrech: «Ri at, chattʼuyul waral riʼ, pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri nim uqʼijil». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chrech ri mebʼaʼ, ri ix kibʼij chech: «Ri at, at takʼalik chatkanaj kanoq», on kibʼij chrech: «Chattʼuytul bʼaʼ cho ri utem ri waqan».
¿La man kitas ta kiwach ri winaq chixoʼl ri ix riʼ, e ri jun iqʼatbʼaltzij kibʼano riʼ, la man jun itzelalaj chomanik ta kʼut?
Chitatbʼej bʼaʼ weriʼ, ixloqʼalaj taq wachalal: ¿La man xeʼuchaʼ ta ri Dyos ri emebʼaʼibʼ waral chuwachulew, che eqʼinomabʼ pa ri kikojonik e che kkechebʼej na riʼ ri Rajawibʼal, jeriʼ jas xubʼij chkech, ri eʼareʼ che keʼuloqʼoqʼej?
¡Kʼatekʼut, ¡ri ix, are kiwetzelaj uwach ri mebʼaʼ! ¿La man eʼare ta ri eqʼinomabʼ kibʼanow kʼax chiwech? ¿La man eʼare ta ri eʼareʼ kixkikʼam ubʼik chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij?
¿La man eʼare ta ri eʼareʼ ri kibʼin ri itzel taq tzij puwiʼ ri Utzalaj Bʼiʼaj che xbʼij piwiʼ ri ix?
We ri At, utz ubʼanik kabʼan ri Nim Pixabʼ, jeriʼ jacha kubʼij ri Tzij: «Chaloqʼoqʼej ri awachalal, jeriʼ jas uloqʼexik awibʼ». At, utz na kʼuriʼ ri kabʼano;
kʼatekʼut, we ri ix, are kiwil ri kikʼaʼyik ri winaq, ri ix, kixmakunik, e ri Pixabʼ, kubʼan qʼatojtzij riʼ piwiʼ.
We ri uj, kqabʼan ronojel ri Pixabʼ, kʼatekʼut kraj na chi xa jun, kbʼan qʼatbʼaltzij riʼ chqech puwiʼ ronojel.
Rumal rech, ri Areʼ che xubʼij: «Matmakun rukʼ ixoq achi»; xoqujeʼ xubʼij: «Matkamisanik». We ri at, man katmakun ta rukʼ ixoq achi, kʼatekʼut katkamisanik, ri at, xabʼan itzel chuwach ri Pixabʼ.
Chixchʼaw bʼaʼ e chixchakun bʼaʼ jeriʼ jas ri taqal chkij ri winaq che kbʼan na qʼatbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ rumal ri Pixabʼ rech ri Tzoqopinem.
Rumal rech, che kʼax riʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij chrij ri jun che man xkʼojiʼ ta loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx; kʼatekʼut, ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx kretzʼebʼej na uwach riʼ ri qʼatbʼaltzij.
¿Jas rutzilal riʼ, ix achalaxik, che jun winaq kubʼij: «Ri in kʼo nukojonik», kʼatekʼut we ri areʼ man kʼo ta uchak kubʼano? ¿La kkowin puch ri ukojonik che ukoloxik ri areʼ?
We kʼo jun qaxibʼal on jun qanabʼ chʼanalik e ronojel qʼij man kʼo ta uwa,
kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun chiwech ix, kubʼij chkech: «Jix bʼaʼ pa utzil, chimiqʼaʼ bʼaʼ iwibʼ e chixnoj bʼaʼ», kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kuyaʼ ta ri rajawaxik chkech ri kibʼaqil, ¿la utz kʼuwaʼ weriʼ?
Xoqujeʼ, je na kʼuwaʼ ri akojonik; we man kʼo ta uchak, jun kaminaq kojonik riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kʼo jun kubʼij chawech: «¿La kʼo ri akojonik ri at? Ri in kʼo ri nuchak. Chakʼutuʼ bʼaʼ chnuwach ri akojonik che man kʼo ta uchak; ri in, rukʼ ri nuchak, kinkʼut na riʼ ri nukojonik chawach.
Ri at, ¿la katkojonik che xa jun chi Dyos Kʼolik? Utz riʼ ri kabʼano. Ri eʼitzel taq uxlabʼal, xoqujeʼ jeriʼ kekojonik, kʼatekʼuriʼ kebʼirbʼatik.
¿La kawaj at kawetaʼmaj, ri at, che at winaq man kʼo ta anoʼjibʼal, ri kojonik che man kʼo ta uchak xas ma utz ta wi riʼ?
Ri Abʼraham, ri Qatat, ¿la man xuriq ta ri usukʼil rumal ri uchak, aretaq chiʼ xuchiʼj ri ukʼojol Isaʼak puwiʼ ri tabʼal toqʼobʼ?
Ri at, kawil weriʼ: ri ukojonik, xtobʼ rukʼ ri uchak, e rumal ri uchak xuriq ri tzʼaqalataj ukojonik.
Xa jekʼuriʼ qastzij xbʼantajik ri utzij ri Pixabʼ riʼ: Ri Abʼraham xkojon chrech ri Dyos, e weriʼ xejalaxik jeʼ jas usukʼil, e ri areʼ rachiʼl ri Dyos xuʼchuxik».
Qas chawilaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ: ri winaq rumal ri uchak kkʼojiʼ ri usukʼil, e ri usukʼil man kkʼojiʼ taj xuwiʼ rukʼ ri ukojonik.
Xoqujeʼ, jeʼ na kʼuriʼ ri Rajabʼ, ri ixoq che kech nim chʼutiʼn, ¿la man rumal ta ri uchak, ri areʼ xkʼojiʼ usukʼil aretaq chiʼ xeʼukʼulaj ri etaqoʼnelabʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, xuya alaj arech xeʼel ubʼi pa jun chik bʼe?
Jeʼ na kʼut, jas ri bʼaqilal; we ri bʼaqilal man kʼo ta ruxlabʼal xas kaminaq wi riʼ, xoqujeʼ, ri kojonik che man kʼo ta uchak xas kaminaq na kʼuriʼ.
Mikʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ekʼiʼ nimalaj taq eʼajtijabʼ chixoʼl ri ix, ix wachalal. Ri ix, iwetaʼm, che ri uj, kʼo chi na waʼ jun kʼaxalaj qʼatbʼaltzij paqawiʼ,
rumal rech, che qonojel waʼ, kʼi taq mul kqabʼan ri itzel. We kʼo jun winaq, man kubʼan ta ri itzel rukʼ ri tzij, ri jun riʼ utzalaj winaq riʼ, katkowin riʼ che uchajixik ronojel ri abʼaqil.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri uj kqakoj jun chʼichʼ pa uchiʼ jun kej arech kujunimaj, ri uj, jeriʼ kujtaqan chrech ronojel ri ubʼaqil.
Xoqujeʼ, chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ ri taq kukubʼ; puneʼtaj nimalaj ri kukubʼ e nimalaj kyaqiqʼ ksilobʼisanik, ri kukubʼ ktaq rukʼ jun chʼutiʼn cheʼ, jeriʼ jas kraj ri ajbʼinsanel rech.
¡Xoqujeʼ, jeʼ nakʼuriʼ ri qaqʼ; ri areʼ chʼutiʼn, kʼatekʼuriʼ kkowin chech ubʼixik nimalaj taq jastaq che aqʼan ribʼ! Chiwilampeʼ, nitzʼ ri qʼaqʼ kporon jun nimalaj kʼacheʼlaj.
Ri qaqʼ, xoqujeʼ jun qʼaqʼ; ri areʼ jun uwachulew rech ri itzel; ri qaqʼ che jun qatzʼaqatil, kubʼan itzel chrech ronojel qabʼaqil; e aretaq chiʼ tzijim rumal ri gehenna, kuporoj ronojel ri uwachulew.
Konojel ri awaj che erech ri uwachulew e ri awaj rech ri uwokaj, ri kumatz, e konojel ri awaj ekʼo pa ri polow, konojel kuyaʼo keniman chrech ri winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jun winaq kowininaq arech knimax utzij rumal ri qaqʼ, ri qaqʼ, jun nimalaj kʼax e man kʼo ta jaʼmaril rumal, pa ri qaqʼ kʼo sibʼalaj kamisanelalaj kunabʼal.
Rukʼ ri qaqʼ, kqatewchiʼj ri Ajawxel e xoqujeʼ rukʼ ri qaqʼ kqetzelaj kiwach ri winaq che eʼuwachibʼal ri Dyos.
Qas chi pa jun chiʼaj kel uloq ri tewchiʼbʼal e ri etzelal. Ix achalaxik, wa weriʼ, man utz taj.
Pa ri kʼwaʼ ¿la junam kkʼiy uloq kiʼlaj joron e kʼalaj joron?
Ix achalaxik, jun wikox, ¿la kkowinik uwach olivos kuyaʼoʼ? ¿La kkowin jun uva, wikox uwach kuyaʼo? Xoqujeʼ, ri jaʼ che rech ri polow man kkowin ta riʼ kuyaʼ jaʼ che mata tza.
Chixoʼl ri ix, ¿la kʼo jun winaq che kʼo unoʼjibʼal e retaʼmabʼal? Chukʼutuʼ bʼaʼ pa ri ukʼaslemal ri uchak che kubʼan rukʼ ri ukiʼal ri nojibʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri ix, kʼo pa ri iwanimaʼ jun kʼalaj tiʼtik e jun ajchʼojelalaj uxlabʼal; minimarisaj bʼaʼ iwibʼ, mibʼij bʼaʼ ri tzijtal chuwach ri saqalajtzij.
We jun noʼjibʼal riʼ man pa ri kaj taj qajinaq uloq, xane rech we uwachulew riʼ e awaj noʼjibʼal e kʼaxtokʼlaj noʼjibʼal.
Rumal rech, che jawiʼ kʼo wi achixinik e ri chʼoʼj, chilaʼ riʼ man kʼo ta riʼ ri usukʼ cholajil, xane are kʼo ronojel itzel uwach taq chak riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri noʼjibʼal che kpe uloq pa ri kaj, ri areʼ chi saqil wi, kuyaʼ jaʼmaril, utz kril ronojel, utz ubʼanik kubʼan ri qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ronojel, kʼo sibʼalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, xoqujeʼ utz taq uwach kuyaʼo, man are ta kril ri ukaʼyibʼal ri winaq e man kebʼ ta upalaj kubʼano.
Sukʼil taq uwach ktikitajik pa ri jaʼmaril, rech toqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach ri jachintaq kkiyaʼ ri jaʼmaril.
¿Jawiʼ kpe wi e jas kubʼan ri chʼoʼj chixoʼl ri ix? ¿La man petinaq ta rukʼ ri jetaq irayibʼal che kchʼoʼjin pa ri ibʼaqil?
Ri ix ¿la sibʼalaj kiwaj uwach taq ri jastaq, kʼatekʼuriʼ man kʼo ta kʼo iwukʼ? Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix kixkamisanik e kibʼan ri chʼoʼj. Ri ix, man kʼo ta jastaq iwech rumal rech che ri ix man kita ta ri jastaq.
Ri ix, kitaʼo e man kʼo ta kyaʼ chiwech, rumal rech che man utz ta utayik weriʼ kibʼano, ri ix, xane kixsach rukʼ ri jetaq irayibʼal.
Ri ix che ix ajmakunel rukʼ ri uwachulew, ¿la man iwetaʼm taj che ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chrech ri uwachulew are kbʼanowik che man kʼo ta ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx chrech ri Dyos? Ri jun che are krichiʼlaj we uwachulew, ri areʼ man krachiʼlaj ta riʼ ri Dyos.
Ri ix, ¿la kichomaj, che ri Tzij tzʼibʼatalik, xaq loqʼ kubʼij: kʼo nimalaj urayinik, ri uxlabʼal che xujeqabʼaʼ ri areʼ qukʼ ri uj?
Xane, kuyaʼ chi na jun nimalaj sipanik chi na; rumal nakʼuriʼ kubʼij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Ri Dyos, kchʼojin kukʼ ri winaq che nimal kkibʼano; kʼatekʼuriʼ, kuyaʼ ri usipanik chkech ri kkiwonej kibʼ.
Chinimaj bʼaʼ ri Utzij ri Dyos, chixchʼoʼjin bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Kʼaxtokʼ e ri areʼ naj riʼ kanimaj ubʼi riʼ chiwach.
Chixqibʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Dyos e ri areʼ kqibʼ na riʼ iwukʼ. Chichʼajchʼobʼej bʼa iqʼabʼ, ri ix che ixajmakibʼ; chityoxrisaj bʼaʼ ri iwanimaʼ, ri ix, ix winaq che kʼo jun saqʼor iwanimaʼ.
Chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ, che ri ix, ix kebʼ taq winaq, chikʼisaʼ bʼaʼ ikʼuʼx, chixoqʼoq. Chkʼextaj bʼaʼ ri itzeʼ pa jun oqʼej e ri ikiʼkotemal pa jun bʼisobʼal.
Chiwonobʼaʼ iwibʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel, kʼatekʼuriʼ ri Areʼ kixuchʼelej na riʼ.
Mitzijoj ri man utz taj pakiwiʼ ri enikʼaj chik. Ri jun che kutzijoj ri man utz taj puwiʼ jun rachalal on che kubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri rachalal, kutzijoj ri man utz taj puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ; e ri at kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ, we kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ; ri at man at bʼanal rech ta chik ri Pixabʼ, xane at qʼataltzij chik puwiʼ ri Pixabʼ.
Xa jun ri kbʼanow ri Pixabʼ e xa jun ri ajqʼataltzij, xuwi ri areʼ kkowinik kukol jun winaq on kusacho, e ri at, ¿At jachin kʼut che kabʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri awachiʼl?
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kamik riʼ, che ri ix kibʼij: «Kamik on chweʼq, ri uj, kujbʼe pa ri jun tinimit riʼ, kujkanaj kan waʼ jun junabʼ chilaʼ, ¡kujkʼayin riʼ chilaʼ e nim riʼ ri qachʼakoj kqabʼano!».
Ri ix, man iwetaʼm taj, jas kubʼan ri ikʼaslemal chweʼq kabʼij; rumal rech, che ri ix, ix jun sutzʼ che kukʼut ribʼ xas pa jubʼiqʼ e kʼatekʼuriʼ ksach chi uwach.
¿Jas kʼu che, che ri ix, man kibʼij taj: «We ri Ajawxel kraj, ri uj kʼo qakʼaslemal riʼ, e kqabʼan waʼ weriʼ on weriʼ»?
¡Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, are nim kiwil wi ri inimal! Ronojel nimal, che jeriʼ, xas itzel wi.
Ri jun che retaʼm kubʼan ri utzil e man kubʼan taj, ri are kubʼan jun umak.
Jeʼ na kʼut kamik riʼ, ri ix che ixqʼinomabʼ, chixoqʼoq, chiraqaqej ichiʼ chuwach ri kʼax che kpe na piwiʼ.
Ri iqʼinomal, man utz taj, qʼinaq; ri xjut tajin kkitij ri iwatzʼyaq.
Ri qʼan ipwaq e ri saq ipwaq, kyaqarinaq uwach, e waʼ weriʼ, kukʼut na waʼ ri iwetzalal: kutij na riʼ ri ibʼaqil jeʼ jas jun qʼaqʼ. Ri ix, ximulij iqʼinomal pa we qʼij riʼ che xas are kʼisbʼal taq qʼij.
Chiwilampeʼ, ri pwaq che man xitoj ta chkech ri ewajchakibʼ ri xechakun iwukʼ pa ri iwulew, tajin kuraqaqej uchiʼ; e ri raqow chʼiʼaj xopan chi pa ri uxikin ri Ajawxel ri rajaw sibʼalaj chʼumil.
Ri ix, xkʼojiʼ jun ikʼaslemal cho we uwachulew riʼ, jun kiʼlaj ikʼaslemal e nimal chiwech; ri ix sibʼalaj xinojisaj iwibʼ, aretaq chiʼ xekamisaxik sibʼalaj winaq.
Ri ix, xibʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri sukʼilalaj winaq e xikamisaj; ri sukʼilalaj winaq man xchʼojin ta iwukʼ.
Ri ix, ixachalaxik, chkʼojiʼ ta bʼaʼ ri ikochʼonik chi kʼa pa ri Upetbʼal ri Ajawxel. Chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ, ri jun che kusukʼumaj ri ulew, ri are rukʼ ukochʼonik kreyeʼj ri uwach tikoʼn chi kʼa pa ri nabʼe e taq jabʼ rech ri nabʼe ikʼ e pa ri kʼisbʼal taq jabʼ rech ri kʼisbʼal ikʼ.
Ri ix, che kʼo ikochʼonik, xoqujeʼ chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ uchuqʼabʼ ri iwanimaʼ, rumal rech, che ri Upetbʼal ri Ajawxel naqaj chik kʼo wi.
Ri ix, mixchʼoʼjin bʼaʼ chixoʼl, arech ri ix, man kʼo ta qatbʼaltzij kbʼan piwiʼ. Chiwilampeʼ, ri qʼataltzij, takʼal chik cho ri uchiʼ taq ja.
Eʼachalaxik, chikʼamaʼ bʼaʼ inoʼj chuwach taq ri kʼax e ri kochʼonik xkiqʼaxej ri eqʼaxel taq utzij ri Dyos, ri eʼareʼ che xkibʼij ri utzij ri Ajawxel.
Chiwilampeʼ, ri uj kqabʼij: utzalaj kech ri eʼareʼ che kʼo ri kikochʼonik. Ri ix, itom ri ukochʼonik ri Jobʼ, e iwetaʼm ri ukʼisbʼal urayibʼal ri Dyos xuyaʼ chrech; rumal rech che ri Ajawxel, ri areʼ loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx e toqʼobʼisanel wachaj.
Ix wachalal, are nabʼe, mikoj bʼaʼ tzij puwiʼ ri kaj on puwiʼ ri uwachulew on puwiʼ jun chik jas uwach. Ri kibʼij jaʼe chrech, jaʼe riʼ e ri kibʼij jayiʼ chrech, jayiʼ riʼ, arech ri ix man kixqaj ta chuwach ri qʼatbʼaltzij.
¿La kʼo jun winaq chixoʼl ri ix che kuyawajij jun kʼax? Chchʼaw bʼa rukʼ ri Dyos. ¿La kʼo jun che kkiʼkotik? Chbʼixon bʼaʼ.
¿La kʼo jun yawabʼ chixoʼl? Cheʼusikij bʼaʼ ri enim taq winaq erech ri Komon Tyox, arech ri eʼareʼ kechʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos puwiʼ ri areʼ, e arech kkikoj ri jiʼonsabʼal puwiʼ ri areʼ xas pa ri ubʼiʼ ri Ajawxel.
Ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos rukʼ kojonik kukol na riʼ ri yawabʼ, e ri Ajawxel, kuwaʼlajisaj na riʼ ri areʼ. We ri areʼ riʼ, ubʼanom umak, kkuytaj na riʼ.
Chibʼij bʼaʼ ri imak chbʼil taq iwibʼ e chixchʼaw bʼa rukʼ ri Dyos piwiʼ iwonojel e rech nimalaj toqʼobʼ piwiʼ iwonojel, arech ri ix kixkunatajik. Ri kutzʼonoj jun sukʼilalaj winaq rukʼ ronojel ukojonik, kʼo sibʼalaj uchuqʼabʼ.
Ri Eliʼas, jun winaq che jeriʼ uj jas ri uj; sibʼalaj rukʼ ronojel ranimaʼ xchʼaw rukʼ ri Dyos arech man kʼo ta jabʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ, man kʼo ta jabʼ xubʼano cho ri uwachulew chi pa oxibʼ junabʼ rukʼ waqibʼ ikʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xchʼaw chi jumul rukʼ ri Dyos, kʼatekʼuriʼ xpe ri jabʼ chi pa ri kaj uloq e ri uwach ulew xuya taq uwach.
Ix, achalaxik, we kʼo jun chixoʼl ri ix, naj kbʼe wi chrech ri saqalajtzij, kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun chik kkʼamow chi uloq pa ri saqalajtzij,
chretaʼmaj bʼaʼ weriʼ: Ri areʼ, che kutzalij uloq jun ajmakibʼ pa ri ubʼe, kukʼol riʼ ri ruxlabʼal cho ri kamikal e kusach na sibʼalaj kʼi taq makaj riʼ.
Ri Pedro, Apostol rech ri Jesus Kristo, chkech ri winaq che jacha ekaxlan taq winaq naj kijabʼum wi kibʼ ri eʼajponto, ri eʼajgalasiʼa, ri eʼajkapadosiʼa, ri eʼajasiʼa e ri eʼajbʼitiniʼa, che esikʼim
jeriʼ jas xuchomaj ri Dyos Tatxel chi pa ojer tzij, pa ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel, arech ri eʼareʼ kenimanik e kchikix chkij ri ukikʼel ri Jesus Kristo. Chiwech ri ix, jun nimalaj sipanik e jun nimalaj utzil.
Tewchiʼbʼal, chech ri Dyos, Tatxel rech ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo: ri Areʼ, che rukʼ nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx, xujralkʼuwaʼlaj chi jumul pa ri kʼastajibʼal uwach ri Kristo chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, xujralkʼuwaʼlaj chuwach jun kʼaslikalaj eyeʼbʼal,
chuwach jun echbʼal che man kqʼiy taj, man mes taj e man kchʼumuyar taj; e che kanajinaq kan pa ri kaj rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix,
ri ix, che rumal ri ikojonik, ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos xixukʼol chrech ri kolotajem; che xas aninaq riʼ kuqʼalajisaj ribʼ pa ri kʼisbʼal.
Ri ix, sibʼalaj kixkiʼkot rumal weriʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ rajawaxik che ri ix kamik riʼ kʼo jujun taq kʼax kiqʼaxej,
arech, chi pa ri ukajmaxik ri jeʼlikalaj ikojonik, che are jeʼlik chi na chuwach ri qʼan pwaq, ri qʼan pwaq che ksach uwach cho ri qʼaqʼ e kʼatekʼuriʼ sibʼalaj utz kqil pa ri qʼaqʼ, e rumal kʼuriʼ ri ikojonik kyataʼj chi nimalaj uqʼijil, utzalaj taq tzij e nimalaj ubʼantajik chech, chi pa ri Upetbʼal ri Jesus Kristo.
Ri areʼ, che ri ix man kiwil ta uwach kʼatekʼuriʼ kiloqʼoqʼej; ri areʼ che kixkojon chrech rukʼ nimalaj ikiʼkotemal e rukʼ uqʼijil, kneʼbʼaʼ ukamik riʼ man kiwil ta uwach,
Xa jekʼuriʼ, ri ix utz retaʼmaxik ibʼanom, che kpe na riʼ ri jastaq uwach che iweyeʼm pa ri ikojonik: ri kolotajem chkech taq ri uxlabʼal.
Are waʼ we kolotajem, che xkinikʼoj rij e xkitzukuj ri enim taq qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, ri eʼareʼ, che xkiyaʼ ubʼixik ri tzij puwiʼ ri sipanik che rech toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix.
Xkaj xkinikʼoj rij, xkaj xqʼalajin chkiwach, jachike uqʼij e jachike jastaq kuya ubʼixik e jachike are reyeʼm ri Ruxlabʼal ri Kristo, che enojinaq eʼareʼ chrech, aretaq chiʼ kubʼij chkech ri jetaq kʼax che kuriq na riʼ ri Kristo e ri jetaq uqʼijil che kpe chi aqʼan chuwach weriʼ.
Xqʼalajisax chkiwach che man kʼo ta jun utzil kkibʼano rech utoqʼobʼisabʼal kiwach eʼareʼ; xane rumal toqʼobʼisaxik iwach ri ix xkibʼij we tzij riʼ, we tzij che kyaʼ ubʼixik chiwech kumal ri kkibʼij ri Utzalaj Tzij chiwech pa ri ubʼi ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel che taqom uloq chi pa ri kaj uloq; jun tzij che ri eʼanjelibʼ rukʼ achixinik nimalaj kkikaʼyej weriʼ.
Xa jekʼu waʼ, rukʼ ri kʼaslikalaj inoʼjibʼal, utz ubʼanik bʼaʼ chibʼanaʼ ronojel jas uwach; chikubʼaʼ ri iweyeʼbʼal chrij ri nimalaj sipanik che kpe na riʼ rumal utoqʼobʼisaxik iwach, aretaq chiʼ kuqʼalajisaj na ribʼ ri Jesus Kristo.
Jeriʼ, che ix nimanel taq alkʼuwaʼlaxebʼ, minimaj bʼaʼ ri jetaq irayibʼal jacha ri ojer tzij kanoq aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta inoʼjibʼal.
Xane chibʼanaʼ ix jeriʼ jacha ri jun che ixusikʼim, che Tyoxlaj ubʼantajik ri Areʼ, xoqujeʼ ri ix, chibʼanaʼ ixtyoxlaj taq winaq pa ronojel ri ikʼaslemal.
Jeriʼ jacha kubʼij ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Rajawaxik che ri ix, ix tyoxlaj taq winaq, rumal rech che tyoxlaj nubʼantajik ri in.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri ix, Tatxel kixcha chech ri Areʼ, ri areʼ che man are ta kukaʼyij ri kekaʼx ri winaq e kubʼan qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ konojel winaq rumal ri kichak; rukʼ nimalaj xibʼrikil chixbʼin bʼa aretaq chiʼ ri ix naj ix kʼo wi chech ri qastzij iwulew.
Xoqujeʼ ri ix chiwetaʼmaj bʼaʼ, che xtoʼ iwach chuwach ri itzelalaj kʼaslemal che xiwechbʼej chkech ri inan itat, xtoʼ iwach man rukʼ ta jun jas uwach che ksach uwach, saq pwaq on qʼan pwaq,
xane rukʼ jun jeʼlikalaj kikʼel, kikʼel che jacha ukikʼel jun saquntuj jun alaj chij e chʼajchʼojalaj kikʼel che are ri Kristo
ri areʼ che okisam tza pa ri umajibʼal uloq we uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, pa ri ukʼisbʼalil, xqʼalajisax uwach rumal iwech ri ix,
ri ix, che rumal Areʼ, kixkojon chrech ri Dyos, che xukʼastajisaj uwach xas chkixoʼl ri ekaminaqibʼ, e xuyaʼ ri uqʼijil chech, arech ri ikojonik chech ri Dyos jeriʼ jeʼ jas ri iweyeʼm.
Aretaq chiʼ, ri ix kixniman chrech ri saqalajtzij, ri ix, kityoxrisaj ri iwuxlabʼal, arech kiloqʼoqʼej chbʼil iwibʼ ix jacha ixachalaxik. Rukʼ jun saqilalaj animaʼ, chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ chbʼil iwibʼ,
rumal rech ri ix, xixalkʼuwaʼlax chi na jumul rukʼ jun ijaʼ che man ksach ta uwach, rumal ri kʼaslikalaj Utzij ri Dyos e che xas kkanaj kanoq, man kʼo ta ukʼisik.
Rumal rech, che ronojel bʼaqilal, jeriʼ jacha jun qʼayes, e ronojel ri ujeʼlal jeriʼ jacha ri ukotzʼijal jun qʼayes; ri qʼayes kchaqijik e ri ukotzʼijal ktzaq uloq;
kʼatekʼut, ri Utzij ri Ajawxel kkanaj kanoq xas pa junalik. E we Tzij riʼ, are ri Utzalaj Tzij che xyaʼ ubʼixik chiwech.
Xa jekʼuriʼ chipaqchiʼj bʼaʼ ronojel jalajoj chomanik e itzelalaj chomanik, ri achixinik e ronojel itzel tzij.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, ix jeriʼ jacha ri eʼakʼalabʼ che kʼateriʼ keʼalaxik; chiweyeʼj bʼaʼ ri leche, che man kʼo ta retzelal, arech, rukʼ weriʼ kixkʼiyik, ix rech ri kolotajem,
jeriʼ na kʼuriʼ, we xqaj chiwach che ri Ajawxel utzalaj Ajawawxel.
Chixqibʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ ri Areʼ che kʼaslikalaj abʼaj che xkipaqchiʼj ri winaq, kʼatekʼut xchaʼik, utzalaj abʼaj chunaqaj ri Dyos.
Xoqujeʼ bʼaʼ ri ix, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ix kʼaslik taq abʼaj, xixok bʼaʼ pa ri uwokibʼal jun uxlabʼal ja, jun ja rech utoqʼobʼisabʼal uwach jun tyxolaj chuchqajawinik, arech kchiʼxik jujun taq uxlabʼalalaj taq toqʼobʼ che utz chuwach ri Dyos chi rumal ri Jesus Kristo.
Kʼo na kʼut pa ri Tzʼibʼatalik: Kamik riʼ, ri in kinkoj pa ri Siʼon jun abʼaj rech ri rajawal ja, jun chaʼom abʼaj, jun jeʼlikalaj abʼaj; jachin ri kukubʼa ukʼuʼx chrij, man kbʼan ta riʼ ri itzel chrech.
Ri ix che kʼo ri ikojonik, chiwech ri qʼijil; kʼatekʼut, ri jachintaq man kʼo ta kikojonik, chkech eʼareʼ ri abʼaj che xkipaqchiʼj ri ajchakibʼ, xokisax che rajawal ja,
jun abʼaj che bʼanal kʼax pa ri bʼe, jun abʼaj che kbʼan tzaqem rumal. Kkipachqʼij kaqan cho we abʼaj riʼ, rumal rech chech man kekojon ta chrech ri Tzij; are waʼ weriʼ esikʼital wi.
Kʼatekʼut, ri ix, ix jun chaʼom ijaʼ, ix jun ajawinel chuchqajawisanik, ix jun tyoxlaj amaqʼ, ix jun loqʼom siwantinimit arech kiyaʼ ubʼixik ri utzil rech ri Jun, ri xixsikʼin chi tza chuwach uloq ri qʼequʼmal chi kʼateʼ na chuwach ri utzalaj chaj,
ri ix, che ojer kanoq man ix jun siwan tinimit taj, e kʼu kamik riʼ, ix siwan utinimit ri Dyos, ri ix, che ojer man kʼo ta xtoqʼobʼisax iwach, e kamik riʼ, ri ix, xtoqʼobʼisax iwach.
Ix nuloqʼalaj, ri in, kinbʼij chiwech, rukʼ sibʼalaj chuqʼabʼ, ri ix che ix jacha ixkaxlan taq winaq e che man ix ajwaral taj, kinbʼij chiwech che chipaqchiʼj ri jetaq urayibʼal ri bʼaqilal che kchʼoʼjin rukʼ ri uxlabʼal.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun utzʼalaj ikʼaslemal chkixoʼl ri man eqatinimit taj, arech, aretaq chiʼ kbʼix jalum taq tzij chiwij, che ix elaqʼomabʼ; ri eʼareʼ, aretaq chiʼ kkil na ri utzalaj taq ichak, nim riʼ kkil wi ri Dyos pa ri Uqʼij ri Upetbʼal.
Chixniman bʼaʼ chkech konojel ajawabʼ qas rumal rech ri Ajawxel; chixniman bʼaʼ chrech ri ajawinel jeriʼ che jun ajawinel,
chixniman bʼaʼ chkech ri eqʼaxal utzij, rumal rech che are ri ajawinel keʼutaq uloq, arech kkikʼajisaj kiwaq jachintaq ri kkibʼan ri itzel e arech utz tzij kbʼix chkech kumal ri winaq che utz kikʼaslemal kkikʼaslemaj.
Rumal rech che are waʼ ri urayibʼal ri Dyos; ri ix rumal che utz kibʼano, kitzʼapij kichiʼ riʼ ri jachintaq man kʼo ta kinoʼjibʼal.
Chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, ronojel jas uwach, ix jeriʼ jacha ix winaq che kixkowinik kibʼan ri utzil, ix jeʼ jas ixajpatanijel chrech ri Dyos; mibʼan bʼaʼ jeriʼ, jachaʼ kkibʼan ri eʼareʼ, che kkikoj jun payuʼ puwiʼ ri itzelalaj kirayibʼal.
Nim cheʼiwilaʼ wi konojel winaq; cheʼiloqʼoqʼej ri eʼachalaxik, chixibʼij bʼa iwibʼ chuwach ri Dyos, nim chiwilaʼ wi ri ajawinel.
Ri ix, che ixpatanijel, rukʼ xibʼrikil chixniman bʼaʼ chkech ri iwajaw; man xuwi ta chkech ri eʼutz taq iwajaw, xane xoqujeʼ chkech ri ekʼaxkʼaʼy taq ajaw.
Rumal rech, che jun sipanik waʼ aretaq chiʼ ri uj kqakuy ri kʼax, ri man utz taj, e weriʼ ronojel chi xa rumal ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿jas uwach iqʼijil na kʼuriʼ kʼolik, we ri ix kiriq ri kʼax rumal rech che ri ix xibʼan ri itzel? Kʼatekʼut, we ri ix kibʼan ri utz e kikuy ri kʼax; waʼ weriʼ, jun nimalaj sipanik waʼ chuwach ri Dyos.
Xane rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, ri ix, xixsikʼixik, rumal che ri Kristo, xoqujeʼ xuriq kʼax rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal iwach ri ix, e xuyaʼ kan jun kʼamabʼal noʼj chiwech, arech ri ix kiterembʼej ri Areʼ.
Ri areʼ, che man xubʼan ta jun makaj –man xriqitaj ta jun itzel jas uwach pa ri uchiʼ–
ri Areʼ che aretaq chiʼ kyoqʼik, man kʼo ta jun tzij xutzalij uwach; aretaq chiʼ kʼo pa ri kʼax, man kʼo ta jun tzij xuchʼaʼo, xane xkojon chrech ri Areʼ, ri Jun che kubʼan qʼatojtzij chi rukʼ ri sukʼil;
ri areʼ, che cho ri jun cheʼ xutelej cho ri ubʼaqil ri jetaq qamak uj arech ri uj, aretaq chiʼ ujkaminaq chi chuwach ri jetaq qamak, kujkʼaslemanik chuwach ri sukʼil; ri areʼ, rukʼ taq ri sokotajinaq wi, ri ix xixkunatajik.
Rumal rech, ri ix, ix jeriʼ jacha ri esachinaq taq chij; kʼatekʼut ukamik riʼ, xixtzalij uloq rukʼ ri Ajyuqʼ, che ajchajinel chrech ri iwuxlabʼal.
Xoqujeʼ, ri ix, ixoqibʼ, chixniman bʼaʼ chkech ri iwachajil, arech, we xoqujeʼ neʼ ekʼo jujun chkech, man kkaj taj kekojon chrech ri Tzij, rumal neʼ, we man kechʼaktaj ta rumal ri jetaq tzij, che chʼaktajoq bʼaʼ rukʼ ri kikʼaslemal ri ixoqibʼ,
aretaq chiʼ kkil ri ikʼaslemal che xas pa nimalaj nimanik.
Ri nim iqʼijil, makʼojiʼ bʼaʼ chi xuwi chrij rukʼ ri pachʼum iwiʼ, rukʼ ri qʼan taq pwaq mulqʼabʼ e rukʼ ri jetaq atzʼyaq,
xane chkʼoji bʼaʼ pa ri iwanimaʼ, pa ri jaʼmarinaqlaj iwuxlabʼal che man ksach ta uwach; wa weriʼ nimalaj jeʼlik utzil chuwach ri Dyos.
Jeriʼ na kʼut xkibʼan ri etyoxlaj taq ixoqibʼ pa ojer tzij kanoq, ri xkeyeʼj ri Dyos; ri eʼareʼ xeniman chrech ri kachajil,
jeriʼ na kʼut, ri Sara xunimaj ri Abʼraham, Wajawxel xcha chech. Ri ix, ix ral ri areʼ, aretaq chiʼ utz kibʼano, aretaq chiʼ man kixibʼij ta iwibʼ e aretaq chiʼ man kʼo ta kʼax pa ri iwuxlabʼal.
Xoqujeʼ bʼaʼ ri ix, ix achajilal; ronojel qʼij, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ utz pa ri ikʼaslemal rukʼ ri iwixoqil; ix jeriʼ rukʼ ri areʼ, nojimal uchʼabʼexik, ri areʼ che man kʼo ta uchuqʼabʼ; chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ uqʼijil, rumal rech, che ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ echbʼanel chrech ri sipanikalaj kʼaslemal. Rukʼ weriʼ, man kʼo ta kʼax riʼ kuriq ri ichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Pa uwokibʼal ronojel, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ chi nimalaj iwonojel, xa jun iwuxlabʼal, ix utz kukʼ ri achalaxik, chiloqʼoqʼej bʼaʼ iwibʼ, chisachaʼ bʼaʼ imak, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun mochʼochʼikalaj iwuxlabʼal,
mitzalij itzel pa ukʼaxel itzel, mitzalij bʼaʼ yoqʼonik tzij rukʼ yoqʼonik tzij. Xane cheʼitewchiʼj ri eʼareʼ, rumal rech che ixsikʼital chrech weriʼ, arech ri ix kiwechbʼej ri tewchiʼbʼal.
Rumal rech, jachin kraj kuchajij ri ukʼaslemal e kraj kril utzil pa taq ri uqʼij; rajawaxik che mkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri itzel cho ri raqʼ, e mkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ri itzel tzij pa ri uchiʼ,
naj bʼaʼ chkʼojiʼ wi chrech ri itzel e chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ ri utzil, chutzukuj bʼaʼ ri jaʼmaril e chutijaʼ anim chrij.
Rumal rech, ri Ajawxel ukojom ri uwoqʼoch pakiwiʼ ri esukʼil taq winaq, ukojom ri uxikʼin che utatabʼexik ri kichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Ajawxel bʼenaq ri upalaj chkilik, chkikʼuleʼlaxik ri kkibʼan ri itzel.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ¿jachin kbʼanow itzel riʼ chiwech, we ri ix kibʼan sibʼalaj utzil?
Kneʼbʼaʼ kiriq kʼax rumal ri sukʼil, utzalaj iwech riʼ, aretaq chiʼ ri ix kikuy ri kʼax rumal toqʼobʼisabʼal uwach ri sukʼil. Mixibʼij bʼaʼ iwibʼ chkiwach ri eʼareʼ, e mubʼan bʼa kʼax ri ichomanik.
Xane chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ nimalaj uqʼijil ri Ajawxel, ri Kristo pa ri iwanimaʼ, e chi amaqʼel chijikibʼaʼ iwibʼ che utzalejixik uwach ri kitzij jachintaq kkitaʼ chiwech ri ucholajil ri eweyeʼbʼal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ weriʼ rukʼ chʼuchʼuj tzij e rukʼ utzil. Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ jun utzalaj iwanimaʼ, jun utzalaj ichomanik, arech, chi puwiʼ ri jastaq che kkichʼaʼ chipalaj, si are riʼ ri kchakun chech usachik kikʼuʼx ri jachintaq keyoqʼowik chech ri utzalaj ikʼaslemal rukʼ ri Kristo.
Are utz riʼ we kqariq ri kʼax rumal che kqabʼan ri utzil, we are waʼ ri ureyeʼbʼal ri Dyos; chuwach che we kqariq ri kʼax rumal che kqabʼan ri itzel.
Xoqujeʼ na kʼut ri Kristo, xa jumul xkamik rumal rech ri jetaq makaj, ri areʼ sukʼil rumal rech che kutoqʼobʼisaj kiwach ri man esukʼil winaq taj; arech ri Areʼ, kukʼam qabʼe chi kʼa chuwach ri Dyos. Xkamisax ri ubʼaqilal, xyaʼ ukʼaslemal pa ri Uxlabʼal.
Xoqujeʼ, ri Areʼ xbʼe che ubʼixik ri Tzij, chkech ri ekʼo pa cheʼ,
ri eʼareʼ che ojer kanoq man kekojon taj, chi aretaq chiʼ xkanaj kukʼ ri ukochʼonik ri Dyos, pa taq ri qʼij, aretaq chiʼ ri Noʼe xubʼan ri Arka, che chupam xa ekebʼ oxibʼ winaq, xa ewajxaqibʼ xekoltaj chuwach ri jaʼ.
We jaʼ riʼ, are waʼ ri ukʼaninaq kamik riʼ ri qasnaʼ che kixkolowik; e we qasnaʼ riʼ man xa ta esebʼal ri tzʼil pa ri qabʼaqil, xane are retal rech chuwach ri Dyos, jun utzlaj qanimaʼ e jun utzalal qachomanik chi rumal ri kʼastajibʼal uwach ri Jesus Kristo,
ri areʼ che kamik riʼ kʼo pa kaj pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri Dyos, e chuxeʼ raqan ri areʼ kojom ri jetaq Ajawibʼal e ri jetaq kowinem.
Ri Kristo xukʼaxkʼolij ri kʼax pa ri ubʼaqil; xoqujeʼ ri ix, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ ichuqʼabʼ pa we jun chomanik: Jachin kukʼaxkʼolij ri kʼax pa ri ubʼaqil man kkanaj ta kan riʼ ri mak rukʼ,
arech kukʼaslemaj ri kʼisbʼal taq qʼij che kʼo na ri ukʼaslemal, man jeriʼ taj jacha ri urayibʼal ubʼaqil, xane jeriʼ jacha ri urayibʼal ri Dyos.
Sibʼalaj ix najtajinaq che ri ubʼanik ri kirayibʼal ri man junam ta qakojonik kukʼ, ikʼasleman ri itzel rukʼ ixoq achi, ri itzel taq rayinik, ri itzel rukʼ ri amajaʼ, ri kixqʼax che uwiʼ iwa, ri itzel cho taq ri mexa, ri itzel taq qʼijilanik chkech ri eʼesal uwach dyos.
Chech weriʼ, ksach kikʼuʼx, che ri ix man kikoj ta anim kukʼ ri eʼareʼ e che man kixbʼe ta kukʼ che ubʼanik ri kqʼax uwiʼ kkibʼan eʼareʼ, xa jekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj nimalaj iyoqʼik kkibʼano.
Ri eʼareʼ, chi kebʼe wi riʼ chuwach ri areʼ, ri kbʼanow ri qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri ekaminaq e pakiwiʼ ri ekʼaslik.
Rumal na kʼu waʼ, xyaʼ ubʼixik ri Utzalaj Tzij chi xoqujeʼ chkech ri ekaminaqibʼ, arech, ri eʼareʼ che xas xbʼan ri qʼatojtzij pa ri kibʼaqil chkiwach ri winaq, kikʼasleman riʼ pa ri uxlabʼal chuwach ri Dyos.
Ri ukʼisbʼalil ronojel ri jastaq, xas tajin kqibʼ uloq. Chkʼojiʼ bʼa nimalaj inoʼjibʼal, chiwiʼlaʼ iwibʼ arech qas ix utz pa ri chʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos.
Nabʼe, qas are chichajij ri jun nimalaj loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chixoʼl, rumal rech, che ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx, kʼi taq makaj kusacho.
Chikʼulaj bʼaʼ iwibʼ chixoʼl e xaq bʼa miwixwetej iwibʼ.
Chijujunal; rukʼ ri nimalaj sipanik che xikʼam rukʼ ri Dyos, chipatanij bʼaʼ iwibʼ chixoʼl, xa jekʼuriʼ ix utz taq ajchakibʼ che ukʼyarisaxik ri jetaq usipanik ri Dyos.
We kʼo jun kchʼawik, ri utzij jeriʼ ta bʼa jacha ri Utzij ri Dyos; we kʼo jun kubʼan jun chak, chubʼanaʼ bʼaʼ jeʼ jas jun taqanik che petinaq rukʼ ri Dyos, arech ri Dyos, chi pa ronojel kʼo uqʼijil rumal ri Jesus Kristo, ¡che chrech ri areʼ ri qʼijil e ri kowinem chubʼeqʼij, chubʼesaq! ¡Amen!
Ix loqʼalaj taq winaq, michomaj bʼaʼ, che man utz ta ri qʼaqʼ che xtʼiqitaj chixoʼl arech kixkajmaxik pa ri kʼax, e michomaj neʼ che weriʼ jun sachibʼal kʼuʼx,
xane chixkiʼkotoq, we ri ix, kichʼij ri kʼax rukʼ ri Kristo, arech, aretaq chiʼ kuqʼalajisaj na ri uqʼijil, xoqujeʼ ri ix kkʼojiʼ ri ikiʼkotemal.
Utz iwech ri ix we kʼax iyoqʼik kbʼanik rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri Kristo, rumal rech, che ri Ruxlabʼal ri qʼijil, che Ruxlabʼal ri Dyos kanajinaq kan piwi ixʼ.
Muriq bʼaʼ kʼax jun chixoʼl ri ix, xa rumal che jun kamisanel, on jun elaqʼom, on rumal che jun itzel winaq, on rumal che kyoqʼonik,
kʼatekʼut, we jun kuriq kʼax xa rumal rech che Ajkristo, makʼix bʼaʼ, nim bʼaʼ chrilaʼ wi ri Dyos rumal rech che rukʼam we bʼiʼaj riʼ.
Rumal rech che kamik riʼ, xopan uchapaleʼxik ri qʼatojtzij rumal ri Rachoch ri Dyos. Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we kuchapaleʼj ubʼanik we qʼatojtzij qukʼ ri uj ¿jas kkikʼisbʼej na kʼuriʼ riʼ ri man kkaj taj kekojon chech ri Utzalaj Utzij ri Dyos?
We ri sukʼalaj winaq kkoltajik rukʼ kʼax ¿jas ukʼutik na ribʼ riʼ kubʼano, ri ajmakunel e ri itzel winaq?
Xa jeʼnakʼuriʼ, ri jachintaq kkiriq kʼax chi jeriʼ jacha kraj ri Dyos, chkijachaʼ bʼaʼ si kuxlabʼal chrech ri Utzalaj Ajbʼanal rech, Ajkʼiysanel rech we uwachulew, e chkibʼanaʼ bʼa ri utzil.
Ri in, kinta weriʼ, rukʼ chuqʼabʼ, chkech ri enim taq winaq che ekʼo chqaxoʼl, ri in che in nim winaq jeriʼ jas eʼareʼ, ri in che xinwil ri ukʼaxkʼol ri Kristo, e che kʼo nuqʼijil pa ri qʼijil che man naj ta chik kʼo wi kukʼut ribʼ.
Chiyuqʼuj bʼaʼ ri jupuq che xuyaʼ ri Dyos chiwech, qas utz rilik chibʼanaʼ, mibʼano che xa rumal xixtaqik, chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ rukʼ ronojel iwanimaʼ jeʼ jas jun urayibʼal ri Dyos;
man xa ta rumal arech ri ix, ix ajawxel chkiwach ri winaq, xane chibʼanaʼ bʼaʼ, ixkʼamabʼal noʼj chkiwach ri jupuq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, aretaq chiʼ kopan na riʼ ri kʼamabʼalbʼe chkech ri eʼajyuqʼ, ri ix, kyaʼtaj na riʼ ri utojbʼalil chiwech, jun nimalaj qʼijil che man ksach ta uwach.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xoqujeʼ ri ix, che ixalitomabʼ ixkʼojlabʼ, cheʼinimaj ri enim taq winaq; chimochʼochʼej iwibʼ chbʼil taq iwibʼ, rumal rech, che ri Dyos, keʼukʼuleʼlaj jachintaq ri kkinimarisaj kibʼ, e kuyaʼ ri nimalaj usipanik chkech ri kkimochʼochʼirisaj kibʼ.
Chimochʼochʼirisaj bʼaʼ iwibʼ chuxeʼ uchuqʼabʼ ri uqʼabʼ ri Dyos, arech, ri Areʼ qas kixuchʼelej pa ri utzalaj qʼij che kuriqaʼ na,
qas chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ pa ri uqʼabʼ ri areʼ, ronojel ri kixmayow rukʼ, rumal rech, che are Areʼ kchajin iwech e kubʼan utz chiwech.
Chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ jun utzalaj ikʼaslemal, e qas chixkʼasaloq. Ri ikʼulel, che are ri kʼaxtokʼ, kwaʼkatik jeriʼ jas jun koj e kjaninik, e tajin kutzukuj jachin loqʼ kutijo.
Rukʼ chuqʼabʼ chixkowir bʼaʼ pa ri ikojonik chuwach ri areʼ; e ri ix, iwetaʼm, che ri eʼachalaxik pa ri Komon ri ekʼo chuwachulew; xoqujeʼ tajin kkikʼaxkʼolij we kʼax riʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ ri ix, xkʼaxkʼobʼejtaj iwumal ri jubʼiqʼ kʼax, ri Dyos che ajchaqʼe e yaʼl rech ronojel nimalaj sipanik, ri areʼ che xixusikʼij chrech ri junalikalaj qʼijil pa ri Kristo, kixukowirisaj chijumul riʼ, kuyaʼ chi na ichuqʼabʼ riʼ; kixujikibʼaʼ chi na riʼ, e kubʼan na riʼ arech ri ix man kixtzaq taj.
¡Chrech ri Areʼ ri kowinem chubʼeqij, chubʼesaq! ¡Amen!
Ri in, kintzʼibʼaj we jetaq tzij chiwech riʼ rumal ri Silbʼano, ri areʼ che ri in kinchomaj jun achalaxik che man kukʼex ta ri utzij; xixintzʼibʼaj, arech ri ix kʼo kebʼ oxibʼ tzij rech ichuqʼabʼ; e che ri ix, iwetaʼm che are waʼ ri qastzij usipanik ri Dyos: chixkanaj bʼaʼ pa weriʼ.
Ri Komon Tyox che kʼo pa ri Bʼabʼiloniʼa; ri eʼareʼ che xesikʼixik jeʼ jas ri ix, kuyaʼ apan jun rutzil iwach; xoqujeʼ kuya apan jun rutzil iwach ri Markos, ri nukʼojol.
Chiyaʼaʼ bʼaʼ ri rutzil iwach chbʼil taq iwibʼ, rukʼ jun tzʼumanik che rech ri loqʼoqʼebʼal kʼuʼx. Ri nimalaj Utzil chiwech iwonojel ri ixkanajinaq pa ri Kristo.
Ri Simeʼon Pedro, ajpataninel e apostol rech ri Jesus Kristo, chkech ri eʼareʼ che rumal ri usukʼil ri Qadyos e Qakolonel Jesus Kristo, xkikʼam jun jeʼlik e nimalaj ubʼantajik kojonik jeʼ jas ri qakojonik ri uj,
chiwech ri ix, ri nimalaj sipanik e ri nimalaj utzil, aretaq chiʼ xiwetaʼmaj uwach ri Qajawxel.
Rumal rech ri uchuqʼabʼ ri Dyos, xyaʼtaj chqech ronojel jas uwach che rech ri kʼaslemal e che rech ri kʼaslemanik rukʼ ri Dyos, xubʼan chqech, arech ri uj qetaʼmaj uwach ri Areʼ; xujusikʼij rumal ri uqʼijil e rumal utzalaj ukʼaslemal.
Rumal kʼu weriʼ, xyaʼtaj chqech ri qʼinomal e ri nimalaj taq chiʼnik, arech ri ix, kixok pa ri ukʼaslemal ri Dyos aretaq chiʼ chixbʼoqtajik chuwach ri kkʼis uwach che kʼo pa we uwachulew rumal ri itzel rayibʼal.
Rumal kʼu waʼ weriʼ, chuwach weriʼ, xoqujeʼ chikojoʼ bʼaʼ ronojel ichuqʼabʼ, arech rukʼ ri ikojonik kkʼojiʼ utzalaj ikʼaslemal, e rukʼ ri utzalaj ikʼaslemal kkʼojiʼ ri inoʼjibʼal,
rukʼ ri inoʼjibʼal kkʼojiʼ ri tzʼaqat uqʼilik iwibʼ, rukʼ ri tzʼaqat uqʼilinik iwibʼ kkʼojiʼ ri ichuqʼabʼ, rukʼ ri ichuqʼabʼ kkʼojiʼ ri ikʼaslemanik rukʼ ri Dyos.
Rukʼ ri ikʼaslemanik rukʼ Dyos kkʼojiʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chkech ri achalaxik; rukʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ikʼuʼx chkech ri achalaxik kkʼojiʼ ri toqʼobʼisabʼal wach iwukʼ.
Rumal rech, we sibʼalaj kʼo weriʼ iwukʼ; weriʼ kubʼano chiwech che ri ix man yaʼtal taj che mata kʼo ichak, e man yaʼtal taj che mata kiwetaʼmaj uwach ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo.
Jachin man kʼo ta weriʼ rukʼ, ri areʼ xas moy wi riʼ, e ri uwoqʼochʼ chi man utz ta wi riʼ; man knaʼtaj ta riʼ chrech che xsach uwach ri umak.
Chuwach nakʼut weriʼ, ri ix, ix achalaxik, chikojoʼ bʼa ichuqʼabʼ pa ri ikʼaslemal e pa ri ixsikʼital wi. We ri ix, jeriʼ kibʼano, xas man kixtzaq ta wi riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ weriʼ, ri ix kixok na riʼ pa ri Junalik Rajawibʼal ri Qajawxel e Qakolonel Jesus Kristo.
Rumal kʼuwaʼ weriʼ, ri in, amaqʼel kinyaʼ ubʼixik waʼ chiwech ronojel qʼij we jastaq riʼ, kneʼbʼaʼ, ri ix iwetaʼm chik e kʼo chi ri ichuqʼabʼ pa ri saqalajtzij.
Kinchomaj in, che utz waʼ che ri in kinnaʼtisaj chiwech aretaq chiʼ ri in, in kʼo pa we jun kabʼal riʼ, arech qas ixkʼaslik rumal we nutzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in, wetaʼm, che xas man naj ta chi waʼ kʼo wi, che ri in kinel ubʼi waʼ pa we nukabʼal riʼ, rumal rech che jeriʼ xuqʼalajisaj ri Ajawxel Jesus Kristo chwech.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in kinok il waʼ, arech, aretaq chiʼ ri in xinelitaj ubʼi iwukʼ; ri ix, chi pa ronojel mul, kinaʼtisaj we jastaq riʼ.
Ri uj man kʼo ta xaq apas uwach tzij xqaterembʼej, aretaq chiʼ xqabʼano che ri ix kiwetaʼmaj ri Uchuqʼabʼ e ri Upetbʼal ri Qajawxel Jesus Kristo; xane aretaq chiʼ xilitaj qumal ri uj ri Nimalaj Ubʼantajik.
Rumal rech, che ri Areʼ, xukʼamo chi rukʼ ri Dyos Tatxel, ri Utzil e ri uqʼijil, aretaq chiʼ ri Nimalaj Qʼijil, rukʼ ri ubʼantajik xuyaʼ ubʼixik chrech areʼ we tzij riʼ: «Are areʼ ri nukʼojol, ri nuloqʼ, si areʼ sibʼalaj utz chnuwach».
We chʼabʼal riʼ, che petinaq uloq pa ri kaj chi uj wi xujtowik, aretaq chiʼ uj kʼo rukʼ ri Areʼ puwiʼ ri Tyoxlaj Juyubʼ.
Xa jekʼuriʼ, rukʼ weriʼ, xas kʼo wi ri uchuqʼabʼ ri kitzij ri eqʼaxel taq utzij ri Dyos, e sibʼalaj utz, che ri ix kibʼan chrech we tzij riʼ, jeʼ jas jun chajbʼal pa ri qʼequʼm si kʼateʼ na kwaʼlaj ri chʼimil rech aqʼabʼil pa ri iwanimaʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xas are utz che nabʼe kiwetaʼmaj weriʼ: man kʼo ta jun tzij kech ri eqʼaxel taq utzij Dyos che tzʼibʼatalik, kuyaʼo che jun winaq xaq pa rech wi kuchʼobʼo;
rumal che man kʼo ta jun tzij riʼ xpetik xaq rumal urayibʼal jun winaq, xane are ri Tyoxlaj Uxlabʼxel eʼuchʼikmim ejujun taq winaq arech kkibʼij jujun taq tzij che petinaq chi rukʼ wi ri Dyos.
Ojer tzij kanoq, ekʼo eʼitzelalaj taq eqʼaxal utzij ri Dyos chkixoʼl ri winaq; xoqujeʼ kepe na riʼ chixoʼl ri ix ejujun eʼitzel taq ajtijabʼ che kkibʼan na riʼ ejujun eʼitzel taq juqʼat chik, che man je taj kecha riʼ chrech ri Ajtij ri xixloqʼowik ri ix; e si chanim riʼ kpe na riʼ kʼax pakiwiʼ.
Ekʼi riʼ, ri kebʼe na rukʼ ri itzel kikʼaslemal; e kumal ri eʼareʼ sibʼalaj kyoqʼ na riʼ ri ubʼe ri saqalajtzij.
Rumal ri uloqʼoqʼebʼal kikʼuʼx chrech ri pwaq, e rukʼ unukʼik jujun itzel taq tzij, sibʼalaj kkichʼak na pwaq riʼ iwukʼ ri ix; kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri qʼatbʼal tzij pakiwiʼ man uxlaninaq taj e ri utzaqik kikʼaslemal man warinaq taj.
Rumal rech, ri Dyos man xeʼuyaʼ ta kanoq chilaʼ ri Eʼanjelibʼ che xemakunik, xane xeʼukʼyaq ubʼi pa ri qʼequʼmalaj siwan rech ri Tartaro, jawiʼ kekanaj kanoq chi kʼa pa ri uqʼij ri Qʼatbʼal Tzij.
We man xeʼuya ta kan chilaʼ ri ojer uwachulew, puneʼtaneʼ xeʼukol wajxaqibʼ winaq e jun chkixoʼl ri Noʼe, ri areʼ che jun winaq rech sukʼil; aretaq chiʼ xupetisaj ri nimalaj qʼalaj pakiwiʼ ri itzelalaj uwachulew;
we ri areʼ, xukʼis tzij pakiwiʼ e xuchajarisaj kiwach ri tinimit Sodoma e Gomorra, arech jun kʼamabʼal noʼj chkiwach ri jachintaq kepe na riʼ chweq kabʼij e che man kekojon taj;
we ri areʼ, xutoʼtajisaj uwach ri Lot, che sukʼ winaq; e che kʼax ubʼanom rumal ri itzel kikʼaslemal ri ekamisanel
–xa jekʼuriʼ, rumal rech we sukʼ winaq riʼ, che kʼo ri rachoch chkixoʼl ri eʼareʼ, ri areʼ, ronojel taq qʼij kʼax chech ri ruxlabʼal rumal rech che krilo e kuto ri itzel taq jastaq che kkibʼan eʼareʼ–.
Waʼ weriʼ, kubʼij, che ri Ajawxel, kkowinik, keʼutoʼ pa ri kʼax ri winaq che eʼutz pa ri kikojonik, e kkowinik keʼukʼol ri winaq che man kekojon taj arech ri Areʼ kubʼan kʼax chkech chi pa ri uqʼij ri qʼatbʼaltzij,
eʼare keʼunabʼisaj ri kebʼin chrij ri itzel taq rayibʼal rech ri bʼaqilal e ri kketzelaj uwach ronojel ri ujastaq ri Ajaw.
kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼanjelibʼ che are kʼo kichuqʼabʼ e kikowinem chkiwach, aretaq chiʼ ekʼo chkiwach ri eʼareʼ, man kʼo ta jun qʼatojtzij kkiyaʼ ubʼixik pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ chuwach ri Ajawxel.
Kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ, ejeriʼ jas ri awaj che man kichoman taj, rumal ri kibʼantajik, chi erech ketzaq na riʼ e chi kisach na wi; chi keyoqʼon chech jun jas uwach che man ketam ta ucholaj; jeʼ jas ri kʼax kech awaj, jeriʼ na ri kʼax kkiriq na eʼareʼ.
Ri eʼareʼ kkikʼaxkʼolij na riʼ ri man sukʼ taj, rumal rech chi man sukʼ taj xkibʼano. Ri eʼareʼ nimalaj utzil kkilo ri itzelalaj kʼaslemal kkiriq pa jun chi qʼij; ewinaq che xoqʼolitajinaq kij, eʼaqil pa ri itzelalaj kikʼaslemal e kkaj che kibʼan itzel ri ix, aretaq chiʼ kkibʼan jun jeʼlikalaj waʼim iwukʼ ri ix.
Nojinaq ri kiwoqʼoch che ri makunik rukʼ achi ixoq e sibʼalaj kkirayij we makaj riʼ, kkibʼan joʼs taq jas uwach e kekowin che kichʼakik ri etuqaʼr taq uxbʼal; chi are ri pwaq bʼenaq kikʼuʼx rukʼ, ri eʼareʼ ekyaqsaq kibʼantajik.
Aretaq chiʼ xkikʼyaq kan ri utzalaj bʼe, xkisach ubʼi kibʼ pa ri ubʼe ri Bʼalaʼam, ri areʼ che ukʼojol ri Bʼosor, che xas xuloqʼoqʼej ri man sukʼil taj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri areʼ xas xyajyatex wi rumal ri itzelalaj uchak. Ri areʼ jun awaj che man kʼo ta uchʼabʼal, jun awaj che rukʼ uchʼabʼal winaq xuqʼatej ri kʼax uchʼabʼexik ajqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos.
Ri eʼareʼ, echaqiʼj taq ukʼiybʼal jaʼ; esutzʼ che keʼujurej ubʼi nimalaj taq kyaqiqʼ; chkech eʼareʼ kʼolom apanoq ri nimalaj qʼequʼm.
Kkitzijoj nikʼaj taq tzij che man utz taj, rukʼ raqoj chiʼaj; rukʼ jas taq tzij, kkaj kekichʼak ri winaq pa ri urayibʼal bʼaqilal e pa ri itzel kʼaslemal, e ri winaq riʼ eʼare ri kʼateʼ xekiyaʼ kan ri winaq che xas ekʼo pa ri itzel kʼaslemal.
Ri eʼareʼ, kkichiʼj chkech we winaq riʼ ri tzoqopinem, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri eʼareʼ ejatʼil pa ri man utz taj, rumal rech, che jun winaq, jatʼilik kkanaj kanoq rukʼ ri jas uwach che kchʼakan puwiʼ ri ukʼaslemal.
Rumal rech, we xeʼanimaj na chuwach ri itzel rech we uwachulew, aretaq chiʼ xkichʼobʼ uwach ri unoʼjibʼal ri Ajawxel e Kolonel Jesus Kristo, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kebʼe chi jumul pa ri itzel e keʼuchʼak chi ri itzel; ri ukamul kikʼaslemal riʼ, sibʼalaj itzel chi na riʼ chuwach ri nabʼe kikʼaslemal.
Are utz riʼ chkech, weta mata xketaʼmaj uwach ri ubʼe ri sukʼil; xketaʼmaj na, kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkiyaʼ chi kan jumul ri Pixabʼ che xkikʼamo.
Kukʼ ri eʼareʼ riʼ xbʼantaj ri noʼjibʼaltzij che kubʼij jeriʼ: «Ri tzʼiʼ ktzalij chech utijik ri uxabʼ».
«E ri jun atiʼt aqʼ che xchʼajtaj rij, kubʼalkaʼt la chi ribʼ pa ri xoqʼoʼl».
Loqʼlaj taq achalaxik, are waʼ ri ukabʼ tzʼibʼanik che kintzʼibʼaj chiwech; pa we kebʼ tzʼibʼanik riʼ, ri kinnaʼtaj chiwech, kwaj kinkʼasuj chiwech ri ix ri utzalaj noʼjbʼal.
Chinaʼtaj bʼaʼ ri jastaq uwach che ojer kanoq xkiyaʼ ubʼixik chiwech ri etyoxlaj taq qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos e ri kipixabʼ ri ewapostolos, che xas are upixabʼ ri Ajawxel e Kolonel.
Nabʼe are chiwetaʼmaj che pa ri kʼisbʼal taq qʼij rech we uwachulew, kepe pa ejujun riʼ che kketzʼebʼej uwach riʼ ri winaq e che are kkiterembʼej riʼ ri kirayibʼal.
Ri eʼareʼ, kkibʼij na riʼ: «Jawiʼ kʼo wiʼ ri Upetbʼal che uchiʼm. Xane chi pa ri kikamikal uloq ri Eqatat, ronojel jas uwach, jeriʼ kanajinaq kanoq jas pa ri umajibʼal uloq ri uwachulew».
Ri eʼareʼ, man kkaj taj ketaʼmaj che ojer kanoq kʼo jun chik kaj e jun chik uwachulew, che xas pa ri unikʼyajal e chi rumal ri jaʼ, xel uloq rukʼ ri Utzij ri Dyos,
e xoqujeʼ rumal weriʼ, ri jun uwachulew xsach uwach pa ri jun qʼalaj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kaj e ri uwachulew kʼo kamik riʼ, chi rumal ri Tzij riʼ, xtoʼ kan uwach e kʼolom kanoq chech ri qʼaqʼ chi pa ri uqʼij ri qʼatojtzij e pa ri kʼisbʼaltzij pakiwiʼ ri eʼitzel taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ; ix loqʼlaj taq achalaxik, jun jas uwach che xas rajawaxik wi kiwetaʼmaj ri ix: chuwach ri Ajawxel, jun qʼij jeʼ jas mil junabʼ, e mil junabʼ jeʼ jas jun qʼij.
Ri Ajawaxel man kbʼeyitaj ta che uyaʼik ri jastaq che ubʼim, jeʼ jas ubʼixik kkibʼij ejujun, che ri Areʼ kbʼiytajik; xane ri areʼ kʼo ukochʼonik qukʼ, kraj che mata kʼo jun kusach ribʼ; xane are kraj che konojel kkikʼex na kibʼ chuwach ri utzil.
Ri uqʼij ri Ajawxel, kpe na riʼ jeʼ jas jun elaqʼom; pa we jun qʼij riʼ, ri kaj nimalaj kjanin riʼ e ksach uwach riʼ; ri jastaq che kjuluw pa ri qʼaqʼ kjaʼr uwach riʼ; ri uwachulew e ronojel ri jastaq uwach kʼo chuwach, xas kkʼat ubʼik riʼ.
Ronojel waʼ we jastaq riʼ, xas ksach wi uwach waʼ; rukʼ weriʼ, ri ix, rajawaxik che kʼo jun tyoxlaj ikʼaslemal e kkʼojiʼ ri ichʼawem rukʼ ri Dyos,
kiweyeʼj e kikowixtaj ri upetbʼal ri Uqʼijil ri Dyos, aretaq kbʼantaj weriʼ, ri kaj kjanin riʼ pa ri qʼaqʼ e ksach uwach riʼ, e ri jastaq che kjuluw pa ri qʼaqʼ, kjaʼr na uwach riʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri uj, qeyeʼm jun kʼakʼ kaj e jun kʼakʼ uwach ulew jawiʼ kjeqiʼ wi riʼ ri sukʼil, jeʼ jas ubʼim ri uchiʼnik ri Dyos.
Rukʼ weriʼ, ixloqʼaj, aretaq chiʼ tajin kiweyeʼj weriʼ; chikojoʼ bʼaʼ ronojel ichuqʼabʼ, arech ri ix, man ixxoqʼolitajinaq taj e man kʼo ta jun itzel pa ri ikʼaslemal xane kixiriqitajoq pa ri jaʼmaril.
Ri ukochʼonik ri Ajawxel, chiwilaʼ bʼaʼ jeʼ jas kolotajem, jeʼ jas xutzʼibʼaj ri loqʼalaj achalaxik Pabʼlo chiwech; xtzʼibʼan chiwech pa ri noʼjibʼal che xyaʼtaj chech.
Xoqujeʼ, kutzʼibʼaj weriʼ pa ronojel tzʼibʼanik kubʼano, jawiʼ kubʼij wi jun tzij puwiʼ we jastaq riʼ. Kʼo jujun taq jastaq pa we utzibʼanik che xas kʼax uchʼobʼik, che qʼeqʼuʼm uwach kkanaj jun rukʼ; e ri winaq che ma kʼo ta unoʼjibʼal e uchuqʼabʼ xas kujal ri ucholajil –e xoqujeʼ jewaʼ kkibʼan rukʼ nikʼaj chik che Tzʼibʼatalik– e rukʼ weriʼ, ri eʼareʼ kisach kibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ixloqʼlaj, ri ix che iwetaʼm chi weriʼ, chichajij bʼaʼ iwibʼ; chixibʼij bʼaʼ iwibʼ, weneʼ rukʼ jun itzel rayibʼal, ri ix ki- tzaq ri ichuqʼabʼ.
¡Chixkʼiy bʼaʼ pa ri nimalaj sipanik e pa ri unoʼj ri Qajawxel e Qakolonel Jesus Kristo! ¡Chech bʼaʼ ri Areʼ ri qʼijil kʼamik riʼ chi kʼa pa ri uqʼij ri junalik! ¡Amen!
Ri kʼo pa ri umajibʼal, che xqata ri uj, che xqil ri uj rukʼ taq ri qawoqʼoch, che ri uj xqamay uwach, che ri uj xqachap rukʼ ri taq qaqʼabʼ ri Tzij rech ri kʼaslemal
–rumal rech che ri Kʼaslemal xuqʼalajisaj ribʼ chqawach ri uj: ri uj xqilo e kqaya ubʼixik jeʼ jas rilik xqabʼano, e ri uj, kqabʼij chiwech we junalik kʼaslemal riʼ, ri areʼ che kʼo chunaqaj ri Tatxel, e xuqʼalajisaj ribʼ chqawach ri uj–;
ri jastaq uwach che ri uj xqilo e xqato, ri uj kqaya ubʼixik chiwech, arech ri ix xoqujeʼ, komon riqoj ibʼ kixkʼojiʼ qukʼ ri uj. E ri uj ujkʼo pa utzil rukʼ ri Tatxel e rukʼ ri Ukʼojol Jesukristo.
Ri uj qas kqatzibʼaj ronojel weriʼ chiwech arech tzʼaqatalaj ri qakiʼkotemal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, are waʼ ri tzij, che ri uj xqataʼ chi rukʼ ri areʼ e che ri uj kqaya ubʼixik chiwech: ri Dyos saqil ri areʼ, man kʼo ta qʼequʼm pa ri areʼ
We ri uj kqabʼij che ujkʼo pa ri utzil rukʼ ri areʼ, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri uj ujbʼenaq pa ri qʼequʼm ri uj ujajbʼanal tzij riʼ e man kqabʼan ta ri saqalajtzij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, we ri uj ujbʼenaq pa ri saqil jeriʼ jacha ri areʼ che kʼo pa ri saqil, ri uj junam qawach riʼ pa ri utzil e ri ukiʼkel ri Ukʼojol Jesus kujuchʼajchʼobʼej riʼ chuwach ronojel makaj.
We ri uj kqabʼij: «Ri uj man kʼo ta qamak», uj sachinaq riʼ, ri saqalajtzij man kʼo ta riʼ pa qanimaʼ.
We ri uj kqaya ubʼixik ri qamak, ri Areʼ man kukʼex ta riʼ ri utzij e sukʼalaj riʼ ri Areʼ kusach na riʼ ri qamak e kujuchʼajchʼobʼej na riʼ chrech ronojel ri itzel kʼo qukʼ.
We ri uj kqabʼij: «Ri uj man kʼo ta ujmakuninaq», ri uj, ajbʼanaltzij kqabʼan chrech ri Areʼ, e ri utzij man kʼo ta qukʼ ri uj.
Eʼalaj taq walkʼuwaʼl, ri in, kintzʼibʼaj weriʼ chiwech, arech ri ix man kixmakun taj. Kʼatekʼut, we kʼo jun winaq kmakunik, ri uj kʼo jun qʼaxel qatzij chuwach ri Tatxel: Are ri Jesus Kristo, ri sukʼalaj ubʼantajik.
Ri areʼ, are tabʼal toqʼobʼ chuwach taq ri qamak, man xuwi ta chuwach ri qamak uj xane xoqujeʼ chuwach ri kimak kech konojel ri uwachulew.
Rukʼ weriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che kqachʼobʼ uwach ri areʼ: We ri uj kqakʼol taq ri upixabʼ.
Ri jun che kubʼij: «Ri in wetaʼm uwach» kʼatekʼuriʼ man kukʼol ta ri taq upixabʼ, ri areʼ jun ajbʼanaltzij, e ri saqalajtzij man kʼo ta pa ri ranimaʼ ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jachin kukʼol ri utzij, qastzij na kʼu riʼ che tzʼaqatinaq pa ri ranimaʼ ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos. Rukʼ weriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che ri uj ujkʼo pa ri Areʼ.
Jachin kubʼij che jaqal pa ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ rajawaxik jeriʼ kbʼinik jacha ri kbʼin ri Areʼ.
Ixloqʼalaj, ri in man kintzʼibʼaj ta jun kʼakʼ pixabʼ chiwech, xane kintzʼibʼaj jun ojer pixabʼ chiwech che ri ix xikʼamo chi pa ri umajibʼal uloq. We jun ojer pixabʼ riʼ are ri tzij che xita ri ix.
Kʼatekʼut, ri in kintzʼibʼaj jun kʼakʼ pixabʼ chiwech –qastzij nakʼut che kʼakʼ chiwech ri ix e kʼakʼ chrech ri Areʼ– rumal rech che ri qʼequʼm kel ubʼik e ri qastzij saqil, kchubʼlinik chik.
Jachin kubʼij che kʼo pa ri saqil kʼatekʼuriʼ are kraj ri itzel chrech ri rachalal, ri areʼ riʼ kanajinaq kanoq pa ri qʼequʼm.
Jachin kuloqʼoqʼej ri rachalal, kanajinaq pa ri saqil e ri areʼ man kʼo ta ktzaqik.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jachin ri kraj ri itzel chrech ri rachalal, kanajinaq pa ri qʼequʼm, kbʼin pa ri qʼequʼm man retaʼm taj jawijeʼ kbʼe wi, rumal rech che kʼo qʼequʼm cho ri uwoqʼoch.
Kintzʼibʼaj chiwech ri ix, ix eʼalaj taq walkʼuwaʼl, rumal rech che xchup uwach ri imak rumal ri ubʼiʼ ri areʼ.
Kintzʼibʼaj chiwech ri ix, ix tatxel, rumal rech, che ri ix iwetaʼm uwach ri areʼ che xas are ri areʼ pa ri umajibʼal uloq. Kintzʼibʼaj chiwech ri ix, ix alabʼom ix alitomabʼ, rumal rech che xixchʼakan puwiʼ ri Itzel.
Ixnutzʼibʼam ri ix ix alaj taq akʼalabʼ, rumal rech, che ri ix iwetaʼm uwach ri tatxel. Ixnutzʼibʼam ri ix, ix tatxel, rumal rech, che ri ix iwetaʼm uwach ri Areʼ che si kʼo pa ri umajibʼal. Ixnutzʼibʼam ri ix, ix alabʼom ix alitomabʼ rumal rech che ri ix ix ko, e ri utzij ri Dyos kanajinaq iwukʼ ri ix e ri ix xichʼakan puwiʼ ri itzel.
Miloqʼoqʼej uwach ri uwachulew e ri jastaq uwach che kʼo chuwach ri areʼ, we kʼo jun winaq kuloqʼoqʼej uwach ri uwachulew ri loqʼoqʼebʼal ukʼuʼx ri Dyos man kʼo ta pa ri areʼ.
Rumal rech, che ronojel ri jastaq uwach kʼo pa ri uwachulew –ri bʼaqilal che kraj ri itzel ri woqʼochaj che kraj ri itzel e ri unimal ri qʼinomal– man petinaq taj rukʼ ri Tatxel, xane petinaq cho ri uwachulew.
Ri uwachulew, rukʼ taq ri urayibʼal kqʼax uwach; kʼatekʼut, jachin ri kukʼam ri urayibʼal ri Dyos ri areʼ, xas pa junalik kjeqiʼ riʼ.
Eʼalaj taq akʼalabʼ, petinaq ri kʼisbʼal kajbʼal ri ix, xito che kpetik jun Itzel Kristo kʼatekʼuriʼ, sibʼalaj ekʼi ri eʼitzel kristo epetinaq chik, kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ weriʼ, ri uj qetaʼm che ujkʼo chi pa ri kʼisbʼal kajbʼal.
Ri eʼareʼ, xeʼel uloq chi pa ri eqatinamit kʼatekʼut, ri eʼareʼ man ekʼo ta qukʼ ri uj. Ri eʼareʼ, weta ekʼo qukʼ, ri eʼareʼ xekanaj na kʼuriʼ qukʼ ri uj kʼatekʼut, rajawaxik che jeriʼ kkʼulmatajik arech kqʼalajinik che man konojel taj ekʼo qukʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ix xikʼam ri jiʼonsanik che petinaq rukʼ ri tyoxlaj ubʼantajik e iwonojel kʼo ri inoʼjibʼal.
