Ri kaj, chkiʼkotoq chech ri areʼ, xoqujeʼ ri ix che ix tyoxlaj taq winaq, ri ixtaqoʼnelabʼ, ri ix qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos, rumal rech che ri Dyos xubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri areʼ e xubʼan toqʼobʼ chiwech ri ix.
Chi chanim, jun anjel che nimalaj ukowinem xukʼam ubʼi jun abʼaj, jeʼ jas jun nimalaj abʼaj rech jokʼbʼal triko, kʼatekʼuriʼ xukʼyaq ubʼi pa ri Polow e xubʼij: «Jeʼ jas weriʼ, chi xa pa jumul, kkʼyaq na ubʼik ri Nimalaj Tinimit Bʼabʼiloniʼa, ri areʼ, man jumul ta chik kriqitajik».
Man ktataj ta chi jumul riʼ ri kiqʼojom ri kkiqʼojomaj ri arpa e ri kibʼix ri kebʼixonik ri kkiqʼojomaj ri suʼ e ri tum, ri eʼajchakibʼ rech ronojel uwach chak man kkikʼut ta chi riʼ puwiʼ ri abʼiʼ; e ri uchʼabʼal ri abʼaj jokʼbʼal triko man ktataj ta chi jumul riʼ.
Ri usaqil ri chajbʼal man kchuplin ta chi jumul riʼ pawiʼ; ri kichʼabʼal ri chʼabʼ ala e ri chʼabʼ ali man ktataj ta chi jumul riʼ. Rumal rech che ri eʼawajkʼayibʼ ri at, eʼareʼ kanoq ri eʼajawinel rech ri uwachulew, kʼatekʼuriʼ, rukʼ ri itznik kabʼano xeʼasubʼ konojel ri winaq;
e rukʼ ri areʼ xriqitaj wi ri kikikʼel ri eqʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, e ri kikikʼel ri etyoxlaj taq winaq e ri kikikʼel konojel ri xekamisax chuwach ri uwachulew.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinto jeʼ jas jun nimalaj kajininibʼal kech ejumulaj taq winaq chikaj che kkibʼij: «¡Aleluya! ri kolotajem, ri nimalaj qʼij e ri chuqʼabʼ rech ri Qadyos,
rumal rech che saqalajtzij e sukʼ ri qʼatojtzij kubʼano: xubʼan qʼatojtzij puwiʼ ri etaʼmatalik uwach ixoq che kech enim chʼutiʼn, ri areʼ che xukoj ri itzelalaj chʼamil pa ri uwachulew rukʼ ri itzelalaj ukʼaslemal, xtojtaj ukʼaxel puwiʼ ri areʼ ri kikikʼel ri eʼupatanijel».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkibʼij chi jumul: «¡Aleluya! ¡Ri usibʼal kaqʼan chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq!».
E ri juwinaq kijebʼ enim taq winaq e ri ekijebʼ Ekʼaskʼoj, jupalik xeqaj che uqʼijilaxik ri Dyos che tʼuyul cho ri nimalaj tem e kkibʼij: «¡Amen, Aleluya!»
Kʼatekʼuriʼ jun chʼabʼal xel uloq chi pa ri nimalaj tem: «Nim chiwilaʼ wi ri Qadyos, iwonojel ri ix ixupatanijel, ri ix ri kixibʼij iwibʼ chuwach ri areʼ, ri ix, ixchʼutiʼn e ri ix che ix nim winaq».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinto, jeʼ jas ri kijininibʼal sibʼalaj winaq, jeriʼ jeʼ jas kchojojik nimalaj jaʼ, jeriʼ jeʼ jas ujininibʼal nimalaj kaqulja; e kkibʼij: «¡Aleluya! Rumal rech che ri Ajawxel, ri Dyos Ajaw che rech ronojel jas uwach, xokik pa ri rajawibʼal.
Chixkiʼkotoq e chjaʼjat iwach e nim chiwilaʼ wi ri Dyos, rumal rech che xpe ri ukʼulanem ri Alaj Chij; e ri rixoqil sibʼalaj utz uwiqik ribʼ xubʼano,
ri areʼ ukojom lino ratzʼyaq che sibʼalaj saqpupuj». Ri lino, are ri utzalaj taq kichak ri etyoxlaj taq winaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chwech: «Chatzʼibʼaj: etewchiʼtalik ri winaq che kesikʼix pa ri ukʼulanem ri Alaj Chij. We tzij riʼ, utzij ri Dyos e saqalaj taq tzij».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jupalik xintzaq chuwach ri raqan chech uqʼijilaxik e ri areʼ kubʼij chwech: «Jayiʼ, ri in xa in jun ajpatanijel jeʼ jas ri at e jeʼ jas ri eʼawalalal che ko itakʼal che uyaʼik ri tzij chrij ri Jesus. Are ri, Dyos, rajawaxik kaqʼijilaj». Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri yaʼl tzij chrij ri Jesus, are riʼ ri uxlabʼal rech ri qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinwilo, jaqalik ri kaj, e petinaq jun saq kej: ri jun che ukejbʼem ubʼiʼ «kojonik» e «saqalajtzij», kubʼan qʼatojtzij e kchʼoʼjin chi pa sukʼil.
Ri jetaq uwoqʼoch jeʼ jas jun nimalaj qʼaqʼ; cho ri ujolom kʼo jujun taq ketakik chapbʼal wiʼ; tzʼibʼatalik puwiʼ jun bʼiʼaj, che xuwi ri areʼ etamaninaq;
ri ratzʼyaq ukojom, kmuʼmatik pa kikʼ, ¿e ri ubʼiʼ?: ri Utzij ri Dyos.
Ri ewinaq rech chʼoʼj chikaj, rukʼ saq taq kej e rukʼ lino katzʼyaq che saqalajpupuj, xkiterneʼbʼej ubʼi ri areʼ.
Pa ri uchiʼ kel uloq jun utzalaj chʼichʼ rech chʼoʼj arech keʼusoko ri man kʼo ta ri qakojonik kukʼ; ri areʼ keʼuyuqʼuj na riʼ rukʼ jun chʼichʼ chʼimiʼy; ri areʼ ktakʼiʼ puwiʼ ri yitzʼbʼal amajaʼ che rech ri nimalaj royowal ri Dyos, ri areʼ che Ajaw chech ronojel.
Tzʼibʼatalik jun bʼiʼaj cho ri ratzʼyaq e cho ri raqan: Ajaw chkech ri eʼajawinel e Ajawxel chkech ri eʼajawibʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinwil chi jun anjel, takʼal puwiʼ ri qʼij, kuraqaqej uchiʼ e rukʼ kowlaj uchʼabʼal kubʼij chkech konojel ri echikop ajuwokaj che tajin kerapap cho ri nimalaj kaj: «¡Chisaʼj, chimulij iwibʼ che ri nimalaj Uwaʼim ri Dyos!
Kitij na riʼ ri tiʼj kkitij ri eʼajawinel, ri tiʼj kkitiʼj ri ebʼinsanel taq ri jukubʼ, ri tiʼj kkitij ri winaq erech chʼoʼj, ri tiʼj kkitij ri kej e ri winaq che kkikejbʼem, ri tiʼj che kkitij konojel winaq, ri eʼajaw e ri eʼmokom, chi echʼutiʼn winaq e chi enim taq winaq!»
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinwil ri jun chikop e xeʼinwil ri erajawinel ri uwachulew, ekachiʼl ri ekiwinaq rech chʼoʼj, xkimulij kibʼ arech kechʼoʼjin rukʼ ri Jun che kʼo chrij ri kej e kukʼ ri eʼuwinaq erech chʼoʼj.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ ri chikop xyuttajik, xoqujeʼ, rukʼ ri man qastzij taj qʼaxal utzij ri Dyos –ri areʼ che upatanijel ri jun chikop, ri xubʼan ri nimalaj taq jastaq e rukʼ weriʼ xeʼusubʼ ri winaq che xkikʼam ri jun ukʼutbʼal ri Chikop e che xkiqʼijilaj ri uwachbʼal–, kʼatekʼuriʼ ekebʼ ekʼaslik xekʼyaq ubʼi pa ri polow rech qʼaqʼ, rech asufre che sibʼalaj kkʼatik.
Ronojel chi ri jastaq uwach; xchup uwach rumal ri chʼichʼ che kel uloq pa uchiʼ ri Jun che ukejbʼem ri jun kej, e konojel ri chikop ajuwokaj nimalaj xkitij ri kitiʼojal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinwil chi jun anjel che kqaj uloq chi chikaj uloq, rukʼam pa uqʼabʼ ri ulawibʼal ri Nimalaj Siwan, e jun nimalaj yutbʼal.
Xuyut ri Nimalaj Chikop, ri ojer kumatz kanoq –che are ri kʼaxtokʼ, are ri Satanas– kuyut ri areʼ chi pa kaqʼoʼ lajujkʼal junabʼ.
Kukʼyaq ubʼik pa ri Nimalaj Siwan, xutzʼapij taq ri tzʼapibʼal, xutʼiq uwiʼ, arech kataniʼ che kisubʼxik ri siwan taq tinimit pa mil junabʼ. E rajawaxik riʼ che ri areʼ kkir uloq xa pa kebʼ oxibʼ qʼij…
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xinwil nimalaj taq tem, xetʼuyiʼ chuwach, e xya chkech ri qʼatbʼal- tzij; xoqujeʼ xinwil ri kuxlabʼal konojel ri xket kijolom rumal ri uyaʼik tzij chrij ri Jesus e chrij ri Utzij ri Dyos, xeʼinwil konojel ri man xkaj taj xkiqʼijilaj ri Chikop e ri uwachbʼal, on ri man xkikʼam ta ri ukʼutbʼal cho ri ukursal kipalaj on cho ri kiqʼabʼ; kʼo chi jun kikʼaslemal e xeʼajawinik rukʼ ri Kristo pa kaqʼoʼ lajujkʼal junabʼ.
Ri enikʼaj kaminaqibʼ chik, man xekowin taj kʼo chi jun kikʼaslemal chi kʼa kkʼis na ri kaqʼoʼ lajujkʼal junabʼ. Waʼ weriʼ are waʼ we nabʼe kʼastajibʼal.
Utzalaj kech e etyoxlaj taq ri eʼareʼ che eʼutzʼaqatil ri nabʼe kʼastajibʼal! Ri ukabʼ kamikal man kʼo ta ukowinem pakiwiʼ ri eʼareʼ, xaneʼ echuchqajawibʼ rech ri Dyos e rech ri Kristo, e keʼajawinik kaqʼoʼ lajujkʼal junabʼ.
Aretaq chiʼ kkʼis ri kaqʼoʼ lajujkʼal junabʼ, kkiritaj na uloq riʼ ri Satanas pa ri tzʼapital wi,
e kbʼe na riʼ che kisubʼuxik ri jetaq amaqʼ pa ri kijebʼ uxkut kyaqiqʼ rech ri uwachulew, pa Gog e pa Magog, keʼumulij na riʼ che ubʼanik ri chʼoʼj, ekʼi keʼumulij jeʼ jas ri sanyebʼ rech ri polow,
xeʼaqʼan puwiʼ ronojel ri uwachulew e xeʼok pa ri kikʼolbʼal ri etyoxlaj taq winaq, ri loqʼalaj tinimit. Kʼatekʼut, jun qʼaqʼ xjabʼinik uloq pa ri kaj e xeʼuchasaj chiʼ ri eʼareʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kʼaxtokʼ, ri subʼunel kech, xkʼyaq ubʼi pa ri polow rech qʼaqʼ e rech asufre, jawiʼ kʼo wi ri Chikop e ri man qastzij taj qʼaxel utzij ri Dyos, chilaʼ riʼ kkiriq wi kʼax chi paqʼij chi chaqʼabʼ, chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri in xinwil jun saq tem, che jun nimalaj tem e ri Areʼ tʼuyul cho ri tem riʼ. Ri kaj e ri uwachulew xeʼanimaj chuwach ri ukʼolem e man xkiya ta kan jun retal kʼutbʼal.
E xeʼinwil ri kaminaqibʼ, chi enimaʼq chi echʼutiʼn etakʼal chuwach ri jun tem, xjaq nikʼaj wuj, e xjaq jun chik wuj che are wuj rech ri kʼaslemal; kʼatekʼuriʼ xbʼan qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ ri ekaminaqibʼ jeʼ jas ri tzʼibʼatalik pa taq ri wuj, jeriʼ jacha ronojel uwach ri kichak.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri polow xeʼutzalij ri kaminaqibʼ eʼukʼolom, ri kamikal e ri Hades xkitzalij ri ekaminaqibʼ kikʼolom e chkijujunal xbʼan qʼatojtzij pakiwiʼ jeʼ jas ri kichak.
Ri kamikal e ri Hades xekʼyaq pa ri polow rech qʼaqʼ –waʼ we polow rech qʼaqʼ riʼ are waʼ ri ukabʼ kamikal–.
E jachin che man tzʼibʼatal ta pa ri wuj rech kʼaslemal, xkʼyaq ubʼi pa ri polow rech qʼaqʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xinwil jun kʼakʼ kaj, jun kʼakʼ uwachulew –rumal rech, che ri nabʼe kaj e ri nabʼe uwachulew xsach uwach e ri polow man kʼo ta chik.
E xinwil ri Tyoxlaj Tinimit, ri kʼakʼ Jerusalem, che kqaj uloq chi chikaj uloq, chi pa ri ukʼolibʼal ri Dyos; jeʼlik uwiqik ribʼ ubʼanom, jeʼ jas jun chʼabʼ ali chuwach ri uchʼabʼ ala.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, xinta jun chʼabʼal che kubʼij chi pa ri nimalaj tem uloq: «Waral waʼ ri Rachoch ri Dyos kukʼ ri winaq, kkʼojiʼ ri Rachoch kukʼ ri eʼareʼ; e ri eʼareʼ eʼare usiwantinimit riʼ ri areʼ Dyos-kukʼ-ri eʼareʼ, ri areʼ are Kidyos.
Kusuʼ na riʼ ronojel uwaʼl kiwach pa ri kiwoqʼoch: man kʼo ta chi kamikal riʼ; e man kʼo ta chi oqʼej riʼ, man kʼo ta chi raqoj chiʼaj riʼ e man kʼo ta chi jun kʼax riʼ, rumal rech che ri ojer uwachulew okʼowinaq chik».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri Jun che tʼuyul cho ri nimalaj tem kubʼij: «Kamik kinbʼan ri kʼakʼ uwachulew». E kubʼij: «Chatzʼibʼaj: we tzij riʼ xas tzij wi e saqalajtzij».
Xoqujeʼ kubʼij chwech: «Bʼantajinaq chik, in ri in Alfa e ri Omega, in ri in Majibʼal e ri Kʼisbʼal; ri jun che kchaqij uchiʼ, kinya na riʼ chech ri ukʼiybʼal jaʼ rech ri kʼaslemal, e xaq kinsipaj riʼ chech.
Are waʼ ri rechbʼal ri ajchʼakanel winaq, e ri in, in Udyos riʼ, e ri areʼ walkʼuwaʼl riʼ.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kkixibʼij kibʼ, ri man kʼo ta kikojonik, ri kʼo itzelalaj kikʼaslemal, ri ekamisanelabʼ, ri kemakun rukʼ ixoq achi, ri eʼajitzabʼ, ri kkiqʼijilaj ri joʼs taq dyos e konojel ri ejoʼs taq winaq, kʼo riʼ ri kechbʼal pa ri polow rech qʼaqʼ e rech asufre: waʼ weriʼ, are waʼ ri ukabʼ kamikal».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, jun chkech ri ewuqubʼ anjelibʼ, ri kkikʼam ri wuqubʼ pajbʼal amajaʼ che nojinaq che ri wuqubʼ kʼisbʼal taq kʼax, xpetik e xubʼij chwech: «Tasaʼj uloq, ri in kinkʼut na chawach ri Uchʼabʼ, ri Rixoqil ri Alaj Chij».
Xinukʼam ubʼik puwiʼ jun nimalaj juyubʼ xaq pa ri wuxlabʼal e xukʼut chnuwach ri tyoxlaj tinamit, ri Jerusalem, che kqaj uloq chikaj, chi pa ri ukʼolbʼal ri Dyos,
rukʼam ri uqʼijil ri Dyos: Kjuluwik jeʼ jas jun Utzalaj abʼaj, jeʼ jas ri katzintzatikilaj jaspe.
Kʼo jun nimalaj utapiyil che kʼo kabʼlajuj rokibʼal, e chunaqaj taq ri uchiʼja ekʼo kabʼlajuj anjelibʼ e tzʼibʼatal nikʼaj bʼiʼaj; che are kibʼiʼ ri ekabʼlajuj juqʼat kech ri eʼuwinaq ri Israʼel;
pa ri relbʼal qʼij kʼo oxibʼ uchiʼja, pa ri rikyaqʼabʼ ri relbʼal qʼij kʼo oxibʼ uchiʼ ja; pa ri umox relbʼal qʼij kʼo oxibʼ uchiʼja; pa ri uqajibʼal ri qʼij kʼo oxibʼ uchiʼja.
Ri utapiyil ri tinimit kʼo puwiʼ kabʼlajuj abʼaj che are utikbʼalil, chuwach ronojel taq ri abʼaj kʼo jun bʼiʼaj che kech ri ekabʼlajuj eʼutaqoʼnelabʼ ri Alaj Chij.
Ri jun che tajin kubʼij weriʼ chwech, kʼo jun etabʼal rukʼ, jun aj che qʼanalaj pwaq, arech kretaj ri tinimit, kretaj ri uchiʼ taq ja e ri utapiyil;
we tinimit riʼ kʼo kijebʼ utzaltmal: ri raqan junam rukʼ ri uwach. Xretaj ri areʼ rukʼ jun aj e we tinimit riʼ kretaj kabʼlajuj mil estadiʼos ri raqan junam rukʼ ri uwach e rukʼ ri unimal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ xretaj ri utapiyil e xubʼan jun oʼkʼal kawinaq kijebʼ xkʼabʼ –Ri anjel xretaj rukʼ jun etabʼal che xas retbʼal winaq–.
We utapiyil, bʼanom rukʼ jaspya, ri tinimit bʼanom rukʼ chʼajchʼojalaj qʼanalaj pwaq che kjunamitaj rukʼ ri katzintzatikalaj abʼaj.
Ri jetaq abʼaj che utikibʼalil ri utapiyil, kʼo puwiʼ nikʼaj utzalaj taq abʼaj: ri nabʼe upaja, jaspya upam, ri ukabʼ safiro upam, ri urox kalsedoniʼa upam, ri ukaj esmeralda,
ri uroʼ sardonika, ri uwaq kornalina, ri uwuq krisolita, ri uwajxaq bʼerilo, ri ubʼelej topasiʼo, ri ulajuj krisoprasa, ri ujuʼlajuj jasinto upam, ri ukabʼlajuj amatista upam.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri kabʼlajuj uchiʼja kabʼlajuj taq perlas, chjujunal chkech ri uchiʼ taq ja bʼanom rukʼ xaq jun perla; ri ukʼayibʼal ri tinimit bʼanom rukʼ qʼanalaj pwaq che man xolom taj, ktzin- tzatik upam jeʼ jas ri kristal.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, man xinwil ta jun Rachoch ri Dyos chupam; rumal rech che ri Ajawxel, ri Dyos Ajaw chech ronojel jas uwach, are Areʼ ri Rachoch ri Dyos xoqujeʼ are Rachoch ri Dyos ri Alaj Chij.
Ri tinimit man kraj taj, man rajawaxik ta chech ri unikbʼal ri qʼij e ri unikbʼal ri ikʼ, rumal rech che ri uqʼij ri Dyos kchuplin puwiʼ e ri Alaj Chij are jun uchajbʼal.
Ri winaq kebʼin riʼ chuxeʼ ri usaqil, e ri eʼajawinel rech ri uwachulew kkikʼam na uloq riʼ chech ri kiqʼinomal.
Ri jetaq rokibʼal, jaqalik riʼ kkanajik kan pa Qʼij –rumal rech che man kʼo ta chaqʼabʼ riʼ chilaʼ–
kʼatekʼuriʼ, kkikʼam na uloq riʼ ri kiqʼinomal e ri kinimal ri eʼamaqʼ.
Jun tzʼajtajinaq uwach jastaq man kkowin ta riʼ kok chupam, xoqujeʼ man keʼok ta riʼ ri kkibʼan ri joʼs taq jastaq e ri itzel taq jastaq. Xuwi keʼok riʼ ri eʼareʼ ri tzʼibʼatal ri kibʼi pa ri uwuj ri ukʼaslemal ri Alaj Chij.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri anjel xukʼut chnuwach ri nimaʼ rech ri kʼaslemal, ktzintzatik jeʼ jas ri kristal, kbʼulbʼat uloq pa ri nimalaj utem ri Dyos e pa ri utem ri Alaj Chij.
Pa ri unikʼyajal ri kʼayibʼal; pa ri jun chʼaqap e pa ri jun chik chʼaqabʼ chech ri nimaʼ, kʼo cheʼ rech kʼaslemal, che kewachin kabʼlajuj mul, jumul chjujunal ikʼ; e ri uxaq kkowin che kikunaxik ri man kʼo ta ri qakojonik kukʼ.
E man kʼo ta jun jas uwach chik che kajawaxik itzel chech; ri nimalaj tem rech ri Dyos e ri Alaj Chij sibʼalaj utz riʼ ri ukanajik pa ri tinimit, e kkiqʼijilaj na riʼ ri eʼupatanijel ri Dyos;
kkil na riʼ ri uwachbʼal, kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri ubʼiʼ tzʼibʼatal riʼ cho ri ukursal kipalaj.
Man kʼo ta chi jumul chaqʼabʼ riʼ; man kkaj ta chi saqil riʼ, man kkaj ta qʼij riʼ arech kʼo kichaj, rumal rech che ri Ajawxel Dyos kchuplin riʼ pakiwiʼ e ri eʼareʼ keʼajawinik riʼ chubʼeqʼij chubʼesaq.
Kʼatekʼuriʼ kubʼij chwech: «Waʼ we tzij riʼ chi qastzij waʼ e saqalajtzij; ri Ajawxel Dyos, che kuya ri Ruxlabʼal chkech ri eqʼaxel taq utzij, utaqom ri anjel rech Areʼ arech kukʼut chkiwach ri eʼupatanijel ri jastaq che kpe na riʼ chi ukamik.
¡Chi kamik riʼ, ri in kinpe chi na jumul! Sibʼalaj utz riʼ ri areʼ ri kkʼolow taq ri utzij we qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos kʼo pa we wuj riʼ»:
In ri in Axwan, ri xinilowik e ri xintowik ronojel weriʼ; aretaq chiʼ xkʼis ronojel weriʼ, xintzaq chuwach taq ri raqan ri Anjel ri xkʼutuw chnuwach ronojel we jastaq riʼ arech kinqʼijilaj ri areʼ.
Kʼatekʼut, ri areʼ kubʼij chwech: «Jayiʼ, ri in, in jun patanijel jeʼ jas ri at, e in jun jeʼ jas ri eʼawachalal ri eqʼaxal taq utzij ri Dyos, in jun jeʼ jas ri eʼareʼ che kkikʼol ri tzij kʼo pa we wuj riʼ; are ri Dyos rajawaxik kqʼijilaxik».
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, kubʼij chwech: «Makuʼ bʼaʼ we tzij rech qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos kʼo pa we wuj riʼ, rumal rech che xas ukamik riʼ kopanik ri kajbʼal.
Ri ajmakunel winaq chi chmakunoq e ri tzʼajtajinaq winaq xas chutzʼajaʼ na ribʼ; ri areʼ che kʼo jun utzalaj ukʼaslemal xas chkanajoq pa ri utzil, e ri tyoxlaj winaq, chi chutyoxrisaj na ribʼ.
Chi kamik riʼ, ri in kinpe chi na jumul, e xas wukʼam uloq wukʼ ri tojbʼal kech konojel winaq rumal ri kichak.
In ri in Alfa e ri in Omega, ri Umajibʼalil e in ri Ukʼisbʼalil; in ri in Uwinqil Jolom, in ri in Ukʼisbʼalil.
Eʼutzalaj riʼ ri eʼareʼ ri kkichʼaj na ri katzʼyaq; ri eʼareʼ riʼ kʼo riʼ kukʼ ri cheʼ rech ri kʼaslemal e kekowin riʼ keʼok pa ri tinimit pa taq ri uchiʼ taq ja.
Chiʼel ubʼik ri etzʼiʼ, ri eʼajitzabʼ, ri etzʼajtajinaqalaj taq winaq, ri ekamisanelabʼ, ri kkiqʼijilaj ri joʼs taq dyos e konojel ri utz kkilo e kkibʼan ri itzel».
Ri in, ri in Jesus, nutaqom ubʼi ri anjel che wech in, arech kubʼij weriʼ chiwech puwiʼ ri Ekomon Tyox. In ri in rabʼ ri rijaʼlil ri David, ri utzalaj chʼimil rech ri aqʼabʼil.
Ri Uxlabʼal e ri Ixoqilal kkibʼij: «¡Tasaʼj uloq!». E ri katowik, chubʼij bʼaʼ: «¡Tasaʼj uloq!». E ri kchaqij uchiʼ, chukʼamaʼ bʼaʼ ri jaʼ rech ri kʼaslemal, e ri jun che kraj, chukʼamaʼ bʼaʼ ri jaʼ che xa sipam chech.
Ri in, kinbʼij chkech konojel ri ketow we tzij qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos che kʼo pa we wuj riʼ: «¡Ri jun che kukoj chi na ukoq jun tzij chik, ri Dyos kukoj na riʼ puwiʼ ri jetaq kʼax che kubʼij we wuj riʼ!
Kʼatekʼuriʼ, ri jun che kukʼam ubʼi jun tzij che rech we qʼaxebʼal utzij ri Dyos riʼ, ri Dyos, kukʼam ubʼi riʼ ri chʼaqap che rech ri areʼ pa ri jun cheʼ rech ri kʼaslemal e ri jun chʼaqap ¡che rech ri areʼ pa ri Tyoxlaj Tinimit, che cholem ubʼixik pa we wuj riʼ!».
Ri in, che kinya saqalajtzij puwiʼ we tzij riʼ, ri in kinbʼij: «¡Jeʼ nakʼut, chi ukamik kinpe in!». ¡Amen, Tasaʼj uloq Ajawxel Jesus!
¡Ri utzalaj usipanik ri Jesus, chkʼojiʼ bʼaʼ iwukʼ iwonojel! ¡Amen!
